column2: Mamona Yisasi Kalaisina aginagomogami amaki hane. Yisasia Teviti nofipiti kano maineanagino Tevitia Apalahamu nofipiti kanoe. Apalahamua Yisasina aginagomo maine.
Apalahamua Aisakina nefae.
Aisakia Yekopuna nefae.
Yekopua Yutagami konagamogami neamafae.
Yutaa Pelesigani Silagani neanafa maineanagino itaanimo agia Tamae.
Pelesia Hesalonina nefae.
Hesalonia Lamana nefae.
Lamaa Aminatapina nefae.
Aminatamia Nasonina nefae.
Nasonia Salamonina nefae.
Salamonia Poasina nefa maineanagino itaamo agia Lahapue.
Poasia Opetina nefa maineanagino itaamo agia Lutie.
Opetia Yesina nefae.
Yesia Tevitina nefa maineanagino Tevitia Isaleli veamogami ala sauve kanoami maineane.
Tevitia Solomonina nefa maineanagino itaamoa hagoteno Yulia a maineane.
Solomonia Lehopoamina nefae.
Lehopoamia Apiana nefae.
Apiaa Asana nefae.
Asaa Yehosafatina nefae.
Yehosafatia Yeholamina nefae.
Yeholamia Usiana nefae.
Usiaa Yotamina nefae.
Yotamia Ahasina nefae.
Ahasia Hesekiana nefae.
Hesekiaa Manasena nefae.
Manasea Emonina nefae.
Emonia Yosaiyana nefae.
Yosaiyaa Yehoiyakiniene ani koganamogami neamafae. Ani kanafina Papiloni kotega vayamoya tu huteya Isaleli veala amavaleya Papiloni kotega nofi mo hu-ma-tageya miya oali aliya ali-mainae.
Ani veamoya Papiloni kotega nofi huma-tageya miya oali aliyana aliya mainayanagino Yehoiyakinina Sealitielona nefae.
Sealitieloa Selapapelina nefae.
Selapapelia Apiutana nefae.
Apiutaa Eliakimana nefae.
Eliakimaa Asolana nefae.
Asolaa Satokina nefae.
Satokia Akimina nefae.
Akimia Eliutina nefae.
Eliutia Eleasana nefae.
Eleasaa Matanana nefae.
Matanaa Yekopuna nefae.
Yekopua Yosefena nefa maineanagino Yosefea Maliana anauamoagino ani amoa Yisasina ategeya agaifena Kalaisie huya Anumaya Kotia taugafa aligatigahe hu-tenea kanoe huya hu-mainae.

Apalahamua hagoteno maineno falitegeya haenagaa fotinia (14) aginagomoya maime maime haiya mo falitageno anile Tevitia evayi huno maineno falitegeya haenagaa fotinia (14) aginagomoya maime maime haigeya Papiloni vayamoya eya Isaleli veamogamina nofi hu-ma-tageya miya oali aliyana aliya mainageno haenagaa fotinia (14) aginagomoya maime maime haigeno Kalaisia falote hu-maine.

Yisasi Kalaisima atenea kea mage huno hu-maine itaamo agia Maliae Yosefete ago hage-malenaya munalagino nagola vene ofaenea munamoa aipaene maine. Anumaya Kotina Alu Aotage Avamualeti aipaene hu-maine.
Yosefetema, hage-malenaya kanoa, fatago kano maineanagino havigu Maliaa agaye huyafenagina kesi atalesue agesa havimaine.

Ani kehena agesa havige havigeteno faeno maineno himona ageana Anumayamo ensole kanoa evayi huno mage huno hie “Yosefegae, Tevitina neamogae, kolia ohuka Maliaa akamoagi afaa avalo. Anumaya Kotina Alu Aotage Avamualeti aipaene maineanagino nenafane ategahie. Ani nafanemoa agaia veamogamina kefo yaamimo nofi hu-matenea veala ali kalu heno amaugafa ali-gatisiafe agia Yisasie huka malegane.” huno hu-maine.
Nayona Anumayamo aune kanomo avayafiti mage huno hama-pai-maineane
“Haviho nagola vene ofaenesia munamoa aipaene huteno nenafane ategahie. Ani nafanemo agia mage huya ayegahae Imanuelie huya ayegahae.” huno hu-maineane.
“Tagai kefina ani agimoa Anumaya Kotia tagaiene maine.” huno hu-maine. Yisasina atenea yupa ani kemoa ago falote huno tamage hu-maineane.
Yosefea ani himona ageteno aupiti hetino Anumayamo ensole kanomoma hapaiya kea havino akave maleteno “Maliaga animogae.” huno ali-tene.
Yosefea ani afena “Animogae” huteno alave yana ohuno afaa maineana ani nafanea ategeno Yosefea agia Yisasie huno malene.
Helotia Yutia kotega ala sauve kano mainea kanafina Yisasina Petelehemu osi Yutia kumate atene. Atetegeya haenagaa yage vayi nehilegati kanale haviyaami hanea vayamoya Yelusalemu evayi hu-mainae.

Evayi huteya mage huya hae “Menima atea nafanea, Yuta vayamogami sauve kanoa, hanate atene? Nagola haegafa kanefila yagema evayi nehilegati evayi higeta ageteta ‘Ago atene.’ huta agai agi alisaga hugahe neone.” huya hae.
Hageno sauve kanoa Helotiene mukia Yelusalemu mainaya veanene ani kea haviteya atali talu hu-mainae.

Atali talu hageno Helotia mukia mono note kava vayafeene kahegi kema havilinaya anagafeene ke higeya agaite ageno mage huno hama-vige “Anumaya Kotima taugafa ali-gatigahema hu-tesia kanoa hana kumate ategahie?” huno hama-vi-ge-maine.
Hama-vi-gegeya mage huya hae “Ani nafanea Petelehemu ategahie. Nayona Anumaya Koti aune kanomoa mage huno kae-maleneane

‘Kagaya Petelehemu kumamoga Yutia kotega mainananagi Yutia kumayaga ago amakaseka hai-mainananagino kagaipiti ala kava kanoa falote huteno nagai veala Isaleli veate kava yakaigahie.’ huno kae-maleneane.” huya hae.
Hageno Helotia yage vayi nehilegati emainaya kanale haviyaami hanea vayayagahena kesi huno ke higeya ageno “Ani haegafa kanefila na yu falote hu-maine?” huno hama-vige.
Hama-vigeteno Petelehemu hu-ma-tegahe mage huno hie “Utama ani nafanehena ati-yetama age-falotema hinutamahena etetama me naha-paigena nagaienena ania huna agia molisaga hano.” huno hu-maine.
Higeya sauve kanomo kea haviteya mogayana yagema vayi nehilegati age-mainaya kanefimoa uhagote-ma-teno viayamo ani nafanema mainea nomo amupale umaineno amave-li-maine.
Amave-ligeya ageteya amaipamoa kanale higeya tusia muse hu-mainae.

Muse hu-teteya ani nopi hai-faleya agayana ani nafanegi itaamoa Maliaagi huana mainaageya mogeteya mopafi mope huya agia alisaga nehuya kuamifiti muse yana amigahe monegi manaage tanefagi kule fuki kana huno manaage mea tinagi huya aminae.
Amiteya himona agayana Anumaya Kotia himonafi mage huno hama-paiye “Heloti mainesilega etetama oviho” huno higeya alu kate uteya kumaamilega umainae.

Kanale haviyaami hanea vayala utageno Yosefea Anumayamo ensole kanoa himonafi agegeno mage huno hie “Hetika nafanene itaamoene Isipi kotega tamaiya-yetama viho. Anilega umainegena nagayama etena hisugetama etetama egahae. Helotia kagai nafanehe ati-yeno haesia ke nehie.” huno hie.
Higeno Yosefea ani himona ageteno aupaa hetino nafanene itaamoene ani kegela anavaleno Isipi kotega ugahe umainae.
Ani kotega ayaaya kanagefa umainageno Helotia falitegeya neataleya emainae. Ani yafena nayona Anumayamoa aune kanomo avayafiti mage huno hu-maineane
“Isipi kotegati nagaini nafanea ke hisugeno egahie” huno hu-maineane.
Nayoma hu-mainea kemoa ani yupa ago efalote huno tamage hu-maine.

Helotia agesa havitenoe “Ani kanale haviyaami hanea vayamoya aye-navataga hae.” huno tusia ke vai-maine. Kanale haviyaami hanea vayamogami kea haviteno “Yisasia ani augafa kafua hane.” huno nagoa vayala hu-ma-tegeya Petelehemu kumateene atupa kumayagaleene mukiama yaufa tole (2) kafua ohunaya nenafaneyaga “Hamaegeya faliho.” huno hu-ma-tene.
Yelemaiyaa nayona Anumaya Koti aune kanomoa mage huno hu-maineane

“Lama kumategati mukia veamoya ala kefiti ke huya hamau huya avi-taya kea vayamoya havimainae. Leselina aginagomogami nafaneyagahe tusia avi-tegeya nafaneyagaama faliya yafe veamoya aipa ali falu hutayanagi tusi avi-te-maine.” huno hu-maineane.
Ani yupa nayoma hu-mainea kemoa ago efalote huno tamage hie.
Helotia falitegeno Yosefea Isipi kotega maineno himonafi Anumayamo ensole kanomona agegeno mage huno hapaiye.
“Hetika nafanene itaamoene neanavaleka Isaleli kotega viho. Kagai nafanema haesaya amakesa haviya vayala ago faliye.” huno hie.
Higeno Yosefea hetino nafanene itaamoene neanavaleno Isaleli kotega umainae.

Umainagi “Helotia ago falitegeno agaia nafanemoa Akelausia Yutia kotega kava hu-maine.” huya haya kea Yosefea haviteno koli huno “Anilega ougahue.” huteno himonafina “Anilega oviho.” huno hia kea haviteno Kalili umaine.
Kalili viana osi kumala Nasaleti uno maine. Nayona Anumaya Koti amaune vayamoya Yisasifena mage huya hu-mainayane
“Agaya Nasaleti kano maine.” huya hugahae huya hu-mainayane
Ani yupa nayoma hu-mainaya kemoa ago efalote huno tamage hu-maine.
Ti fale-mate Yonia evayi huno Yutia kame kotega maineno Anumaya Koti kea hu-haleno hama-pai-maine.
Yonia mage huno hie Anumaya Kotima ikapinaga kava yagaisia yamoa aupaa evayi hugahie. Evayi hugahigi tamakaya tamakua aiyahae hutama kefo yatamia “Nagoene ohugahune.” hutama ataleho huno hu-maine.
Ani kema hisia kanomofena nayona Anumaya Koti aune kanomoa, Aisayaa mage huno hu-maineane
“Kame kotegati nago kanomoa keha keha huno mage hugahie ‘Anumayamo esia kamaa ali hilato hutama ali fatago hiho.’ huno hugahie.” huno hu-maineane.
Yonia kemolo afumo ayolagefaleti fakani-male kena fai-line. Fai-lineno pulamakao augafaleti amunofila aye-talako huno ki-lineno kavea kenuene tumemo timaaene neneane.
Ani kanafina Yelusalemu veanene Yutia kotega veanene nagoa Yotani ti agegayalega hanea kumate veanene Yoni mainelega umainae.
Yotani titega emaineya kefo yaamihena hu-falote hageno Yonia ani Yotani tipi tina fale-ma-tene.

Tina fale-neama-tegeya Falasia vayaene Satiusi vayaene “Ti fale-la-tesie.” huya neageno Yonia amaketeno mage huno hie “Tamakaya osifaveyagamo nafaneyaga mainagi tamakaya havigeage vayamogatama Anumaya Kotia kaiyekema hu-lama-tesigetama tamaugafa tamakata aisia kanamoa aupaa efalote hisia yafena ‘Faletama viho.’ kea ta tamaha-pai-maine?

Hagotetama kefo yatamihema tamakua ai-yahae hu-mainesaya yana nave-lisagena tina fale-lama-tegahue. Tamakaya ‘Apalahamu nafaneyaga mainone.’ hutama ohiho. Nagaya tamaha-nepauve Anumaya Kotia ma yafatetila Apalahamu nafaneyaga afaa talo hileasine.
Tamakaya yosa kana hutama mainayanagi menia Anumaya Kotia tuna alino yosamo aipale maleneno kanale alagama oayenesia yosa atagino atafi hagayu huno kaegahie.” huno hie.

Tamakua ai-yahae hutama kefo yatamia atalegena nagaya titeti fale-nelama-toanagino nakavela nago kanoma esiana Alu Aotage Avamutetiene ataletiene fale-lama-tegahie. Ani kanomoa tusia tokiyaa hanea kanogino nagaila ago nagase-maineanagina nagaya afa kano mainoanagina agai aiyale ayesuana onategahie.

Agaya sipeti ayopaa ali-lineno vitimo anoyaa fuhu hale-taleno alagaa alino nopi halaya hu-malegahigi anoyaa ata tegelege nehia atafi kae-talegahie. Ani avinamoma hu-mainea kava huno veala fako faka hugahie huno hu-maine.
Ani kanafina Yisasia “Yoni ayapiti tina fale-natesie.” huno Kalili kotegatila ataleno Yotani titega umaine.
Yonia Yisasifena “Tina fale-oka-tegahue. Nagaila kagaya tina fale-na-tanageno kanale hileasine naa higeka nagaifena ‘Tina fale-nato.’ huka nehane?” huno hie.

Higeno Yisasia Yonifena mage huno hie “Menia ania hisanana kanalele. Tima fale-na-tesanana mukia Anumaya Kotina fatago kavaa alitaa lama hugahue.” huno higeno Yonia Yisasi ke akave maleno tina fale-tene.
Tina fale-neategeno Yisasia aupaa tipiti aivati huno ageana ikamoa ai-hagalo higeno Alu Aotage Avamumoa nama kana huno agaitega elavi-maine.
Ageho enelavigeno ikapinagati age aino mage huno hie “Ma kanoa nagaini nafanehena agaifena aluya huno nahau nayamopafina nenagea nenimofena agaifena aluya huna musemaa nehue.” huno hu-maine.
Anumaya Kotina Alu Aotake Avamuamoa Yisasina veane omai kame kotega avaleno vigeno Satania Yisasife “Havi kava huo.” huno aye-vataga hu-maine.
Umaiyana fotia (40) yupagefa felugaene kegeene kavela oneno maigeno tusia agate-maine.
Agategeno Satania agaite uvayi huno mage hie “Kagaya Anumaya Koti nafanema mainenukahena ma yafayaga hapaigeno maya hapaeno.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia mage huno hie Anumaya Koti avopi kemoa mage huno hu-maineane
“Veamoya mayaagema nesayana kanaleya huya omaigahagi mukia Anumaya Kotima hu-mainea kene haviya nenesageno amaku nafanemoa kanaleya huno maigahie. huno hu-maineane.” huno hapaiye.
Satania Yisasina Yelusalemu tusia ala kumate avaleno ala mono nomo agotofule motene.
Moteteno mage huno hapaiye “Kagaya Anumaya Koti nafanema mainenukahena ma nomo agotofuleti mopafi asaga hulavigena agano. Anumaya Koti avopiti kemoa mage hu-maineane
‘Anumaya Kotia ensole vayaahe ‘Kava hiho.’ huno hu-ma-tesigeya amayateti kavalesaga hu-lisageka tavisanageno yafatela kaiyamona aye kofa ohugahie huno hu-maineane.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia kenonaa mage huno hie “Nagoene Anumaya Koti avopina mage huno kae-maleneane
‘Anumaya Kotikamona afa yafena ‘Tokiya kava huo.’ huka aye-vataga ohuo.’ huno hu-maineane.” huno hie.
Higeno Satania Yisasina avaleno nago ala agoyafi haiteno mukia ma mopafima hanea ala kumayagaene afenoyamaaene ave-li-maine.

Aveliteno Yisasife mage huno hie “Kagaya nagaifema ‘Tusia ala kano mainananagina kagai kagi alisaga nehue.’ huka kagesama havi namika mopafi kaleyama ayesanagenahena mukia ani kumayagaene afenoyaene kava yagaisanafe kamino.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia mage huno hie Sataniga mai haleka amulega vuo. Anumaya Koti avopi kae-malenaya kemoa mage huno hu-maineane
“Anumaya Kotikamona akaiagefe ‘Tusia ala kano maine.’ huka kagesa havi havi huka agai agia alisaga huka agai aliyamaage alio huno hu-maineane.” huno hapai-maine.
Higeno Satania anile ataleno vigeno ensole anagamoya Yisasina meya huya kava hu-tenae.
Yisasia “Yonina nofi hu-tenae.” huya haya kea ago haviteno Kalili kotega umaine.
Viana Nasaletia ataleno Kapaneamu umaine. Ani kumala Kalili ti kotumona agegayale haneanagino Sepuluni nofi veamogamiene Napatali veamogamiene koamia haneane.
Nayona Anumaya Kotia aune kanoamona, Aisaya avayafiti mage huno hu-maineane
“Sepuluni nofi veamogamiene Napatali veamogamiene mainesaya kaiyaga ala tikotu visaya katega haneanagiya Yotani lina takaeya vaaya kotega, Kalilie, Yuta veane omainaya veamoya nemaiya kumale.
Ani kotega mukia veamoya hani yapi mainayanagino menima aye-hale-matesia yana age-mainae. Mukia veamoya afaa maineya faligahe hayanagi Anumaya Koti kemoa ago aye-vasa hu-matene.” huno hu-maineane.

Ani yupa Yisasia aepa heno Anumaya Koti kanale mono kea hu-haleno hama-pai-maine. Mage huno hie “Ikapinagati Anumaya Koti kava yagaisia yana aupaa evayi hugahigi tamakaya tamakua aiyahae hutama kefo yatamia ataleho.” huno hu-maine.
Kalili ti kotumo agegayalega neuno Saimonina, nago agia Pitae, aganaamo agia Etaluene anakeana noyame kuya nehaa kanolatana maineana ala kukonogo hagayu huana ti kotupi nemalaageno anake-maine.
Anaketeno Yisasia mage huno hana-paiye “Nakave eo. Nakave eagena noyame kuyama haa avamete huna veane amavalesaa auava yana tanavelino.” huno hie.
Higeana aupaa kukonogoania neataleana Yisasi akave umainae.
Vaageno Yisasia anakeana Sepetina netalamaamoagani Yemesigani Yonigania tipi kalefi neanafaene maiana kukonogo nefakaniageno Yisasia momaketeno anakaife ke hie.
Ke higeana aupaa Sepetia neanafaene tipi kalene neataleana akave umainae.

Yisasia mukia Kalili kotega ute ete huno mono nopi Anumaya Koti kava yagai-latesia kanale mono kea mo hama-nepaino mukia kaliamima hanea veanene mukia veamogami amaugafama ali haviya nehia yana alino kanale hu-ma-tene.

Alino kanalema hu-ma-tea avagemoa mukia Silia kotega ute ete higeya haviteya mukia veamoya kalima aliya veanene alu kali alu kalima aligeno amaugafa amakata neaiya veanene Satani Avamuma amakuafi mainea veanene mananiya neamakia kali veanene amaiya amaya avayu hu-lavi-mainea veanene amavaleya Yisasite ageno alino kanale hu-ma-tene.
Alino kanale hu-ma-tegeya kasagoya veanea Kalilitiene naya-tolea kumayagaletiene Yelusalemutiene Yutiatiene alulega mainaya veanea Yotani tina takaeya Yisasina akave umainae.
Yisasia mukia alitalu hu-mainaya veanea amaketeno agoyafi haino mopale mainegeya agaienema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya Yisasitega emainae.
Ageno Yisasia avayafiti mage huno hie.

Mukia yaamima omalenea veamoya “Tagupi nagoa kanale yana omaleanagita tagaitia kanale kavala ohugahunagi Anumaya Kotia taya hisie.” huya hisaya veamogamina Anumaya Kotia amakaila kava yagai-ma-tegahigi ani yafena muse hutama maiho.
Hamaumana halesigeya hamau huya nemaisaya veamoya Anumaya Kotia amaya huno amaipa falu hisia yana amamisia yafena muse huya maisae.
Amaugafama aliya nohaiya veamogamina Anumaya Kotia haenagaa mukia mopa amamisia yafena muse huya maisae.
Anumaya Kotia fatago hu-mainea kavafena “Nelahaigeno ani yafena laga nele.” huya hisaya veamoya Anumaya Kotia amamu hisigeya maisaya fatago kavama amamisia yafe muse huya maisae.
Mukia veamoya nagoa neamafugamife kalagi ai-mateya hamau hu-neamatesaya veamogamina Anumaya Kotia ania huno kalagi aino hauna hu-matesia yafena huya maisae.
Mukia veamoya Anumaya Koti kema akave malesaya yafena tole amakesama ohavinaya veamoya Anumaya Kotima agesaya yafena muse huya maisae.
Neamafugamifena “Nagoke tamaku tamakesale maiho.” huya nehisaya veamogamina Anumaya Kotia “Nagai nafaneyaga mainae.” huno hu-matesia yafena muse huya maisae.
Nagoa veamoya fatagoma huya mainesageya nagoa veamoya amaipa kafa he-mateya ali-haviyama hu-ma-tesageya maisayana Anumaya Kotia amakaima kava yagai-ma-tenea yafena muse huya maisae.
Tamakaya nakavema nemalageya tamaketeya kamuge hu-lama-teya ali-haviya hu-nela-mateya “Ma kavala havi kava nehae.” huya havigema hu-lama-tesagetama afaa muse nehutama maiho.

Aniama hu-lama-taya kavala nayona Anumaya Koti amaune vayamogamina ania hu-ma-tenayane. Ani kavama hu-lama-tesaya kanafina ikapinaga anonaa kasagoya yayaga alisaya yafena tamaipamoa kanale nehinagetama muse hiho.

Tamakaya ma mopale veamogamina hagama nehamaiya sole kana hutama mainae. Solemoa hagama nehia yamaama hano hisigetama hanaa hutama hagama nehia yamaa ali falote hugahae? Hagama nehia yamaamoa ago yagu yaguma hisiana afa ya kana hinageya ani Solea veamoya faitega ai-tagu-fe-talesageya amaiyaleti ute ete huya aye-lata-pegahae.
Tamakaya mukia ma mopama hanea kotega kani kana veane mainae. Ala kumama agoyafima hanesiana fala okigahianagiya mukia veamoya agegahae.
Nagoa veamoya lamua hanagaliya susufanefinaga aiso hu-nomalagi nopinaga aye-halesigeya veamoya agesayafe ani lamua sipale nemalae.
Naa hu-mainegi tamakaya ani kava hutama lamumoa aye-hale-ma-tea kava hutama Yisasi kea hama-paitama kanale kavala veamogami amaule hisageya ageteya ikapinaga mainea Nelamafa agia alisaga hugahae.

Tamakaya ma lamakesa ohaviho “Nayona Mosese kahegi kene amaune vayamoya hu-mainaya kene Yisasia ali-talegahe emaine.” hutama ohiho. Nagaya ani yayaga alina oatalegahugi ani kea ali falote hisugetama “Tamage nehie.” hutama hisayafe emainoe.

Nagaya tamagelafa huna tamaha-nepauve ma mopaene ikaene fanane hugaanagi kahegi kefi mukia osi osi oagemo avoyaga afaa hanegahie. Nagoke ya kanoagela fanane ohugahigi mukiama hu-mainaya kemoa falote huno tamage-lafa hugahie.

Tamage-lafa hu-mainayafe nagoa veamoya ani kahegi kea osi kanoa “Akavela omalegahunema.” huya alu veamogamife “Ania hiho.” huya hisaya veamoya Anumaya Kotia kava yagai-mainea kumatela osi nafane kana veane maigahagi nagoa veamoya mukia kahegi kema ali hipoya huya “Ma kava hiho.” huya hama-paisayana Anumaya Kotia kava yagai-mainea kumatela ala huno agase-mainea amakiene veane maigahae.

Nagaya tamagelafa huna tamaha-nepauve Falasia vayaene kahegi kema havilinaya anagaene hu-mainaya fatago kavala tamakaya agasetama tusia kanale hu-mainea fatago kavama ohisayana amuha ohunayanagino tokiyatamia omaleneanagitama Anumaya Kotia kava yagai-mainea kumatela haitama omaigahae.
Tamakaya ago havilinae nayoma mainaya veamogamina mage huya hama-pai-mainayane “Veala hamaetama fali-oamateho. Veama haemaetama fali-matesayana kaiyeke hu-lama-tegahae.” huya hu-mainayane.

Nagi nagaya menia tamaha-nepauve nagoa veamoya neamafufema amaipa kafa hetesayana Anumaya Kotia kaiyeke hu-ma-tegahie. Nagoa veamoya neamafufema “Havi kavakeya nehana kano mainane.” huya hisayana ala kaiyekele he-tigahae. Nagoa veamoya neamafufema “Kagaya aifonafo kano mainane.” huya hisayana hani yapima tegelege nehia atafi ugahae.

Naa nehaya yafe tamakaya Anumaya Kotina nago yama amigahena mono nopi haitama mainetama “Veha nenafuna haviya hu-tenoanagino aipamoa haviya nehie.” huka kagesa haviteka Anumaya Kotina amisana yana anile neataleka negafutega tanaipa mo-li-falu hutetana eteka esanaamoga amisana yana Anumaya Kotina memio.

Nago kanomoa “Havi kava huna-tananagina kaiyekea hu-gategahe nehue.” huno kavalenoma vinagetana neutana “Nenafuga kaipa falu hisia yana kamigahue.” huka hapaiyo. Ania ohisanana kavaleno kaiyekema hu-gatesia kanomote vinageno haviteno ati kanomo ayapi katesigeno kavaleno nofila mo hu-gategahie.
Nofila mo hu-gategahigi tamage tamaha-nepauve kaiyekema hu-gatenea kanomoma “Mone namio.” huno hu-mainesia monema oaminesanana nofipitila ataleka omegane huno hu-maine.
Tamakaya nayo kea ago havimainae mage huno hu-maineane “Kumai he kavala ohiho.” huno hu-maineane.

Nage hu-maineanagi nagaya menia tamaha-nepauve nagoa veamoya nago amona aulagafiti age haye huno “Ani amofena naa hu-ga-tegahue.” huno aguafinaga havino hayema hiana ani atela ago kumai kava hu-maine.

Tamaga kaiyaga tamaulagamoma agea yafema kefo kavama hisaya tamaku tamakesa tamamisigetama ani tamaulaga ali fayitama atalesagenoa nago tamaugafa atupaa omalenea yafe kanaleya hutama maigahae. Aniama ohinutamahena muki tamaugafa hanimo aguafi tegelege nehia atafi hagayu hu-lama-talegahie.

Tamaga tamayamoma tamavayu huno kefo kava hisaya tamaku tamakesama tamamisigetama ani tamayana he-fakalitama ataleho. Naafene? Nago tamaugafa atupaa omalenea yafe kanaleya hutama maigahae. Aniama ohinutamahena muki tamaugafa hanimo aguafi tegelege nehia atafi hagayu hu-lama-talegahie.
Nayona mani kea hagetama havimainae. “Nagoa vayamoyama aamima hu-tesayana ani vayamoya aamimofena ‘Ago hu-negatoe.’ huno avona kaeno amino.” huno hu-maineane.

Hu-maineanagi nagaya menia tamaha-nepauve aamoma kumai ohenesigeno anauamoma atalesigeno ani amona alino kumai nehia a kana hu-tene. Nago kanomoa anima atalenea ama aliteana ani kanomoene kumai he yana nehie.
Nago kea nayoma hama-pai-mainaya kea ago havimainagi naa hu-maine “Kagaya ‘Anumayamo aufina tamage nehuanagina naa hugahue.’ huka hisanana fatago huka ani kavala huo.” huno hu-maineane.

Hu-maineanagi nagaya tamaha-nepauve tamakaya “Anumaya Koti aufina tamage nehue.” hutama ohiho. Tamakaya “Ikamo agile tamage nehue.” hutama ohiho. Ikapinaga Anumaya Kotia kava yagai-mainea kuma hanegetama agaife nehae.

Tamakaya “Mopamo agile tamage nehue.” hutama ohiho. Ani mopalega Anumaya Kotia aiya hayo hu-maleno mainea mopa hane. Tamakaya “Yelusalemu kumamo agle tamage nehue.” hutama ohiho. Ani Yelusalemu kumala ala sauvetimoa Anumaya Koti kava yagai-mainea kuma hane.
Tamakaya “Nanuteti huna lamage nehue.” hutama ohiho. Tamakaya tamayolagefahena “Anupa nayolegefaene tuhi nayolegefaene falote hino.” hutama hisaya tokiyatamia omalegi ani kea ohiho.
“E,” hinutamahena ani keage hiho. “Aao.” hinutamahena ani keage hiho. Nago kenema hisayana Kefo Avamumoa ani kea ali falote nehie.

Nayona mani kea hagetama ago havimainagi “Nago kanomoa kaulagama ai-lagatisigekahena ani kanomo aulaga anonaa ai-lagatio. Kavema ai-halalima hisigekahena anonaa agaila ania huka avela ai-halali huo.” huno hu-maineane.
Hu-maineanagi nagaya tamaha-nepauve nago kanomoa havi kavama hu-ga-tesigekahena kayona oamio. Nago kanomoa kagalamesalema kaiko-lisigekahena nago kaiyagakaa mai-yahae hugeno kaiko-lino.
Nago kanomoma “Haviya hu-natea kanoe.” huno kaiyekema hu-gateno “Anonaa kagaia siota namio.” huno hisigekahena ala yasi siotakaene amio.
Nago kava kanomoa tokiyaage ke huno “Afenoyania nago kilomita alika vuo.” huno hisigekahena ani kilomita mogaseka nagoene tole kilomita alika vuo.
Nago kanomoma “Nago yaka namio.” hunoma hisigekahena afaa hagayu huka amio. Nago kanomoma “Namisanagena yoka alitena etena kamigahugi namio.” huno hisigekahena afaa amio.
Nayoma hama-pai-mainaya kemoa ago havimainagi “Kumatamile mainesaya nelama-fugamifena tamahau tamayamopafi tamahainagetama kame vayatamihena tamaipa kafa he-mateho.” huya hu-mainayane.
Hu-mainayanagi nagaya menia tamaha-nepauve “Kame veatamimofena tamahau tamayamopafi tamahaino. Haviya hu-nelamataya veamogamina ‘Amaya huo.’ hutama Anumayamotega havigo.”

Ani kavama hisayana ikapinaga mainea Nelamafana nafanea maigahae. Anumaya Kotia kanale veaneleene havi veaneleene yagemona hu-tegeno nago avamete huno aye-hale-matene. Anumaya Kotia fatago nehaya veaneleene havi kava nehaya veaneleene kola hu-tegeno nago avamete huno kola neaiye.

Veamoya tamakaifema hamau amayamopafi neha-mainagetamahena tamakaya ania hutama amakaifema tamahaisiana ani kavamoa afa yanagino anonatamia oaligahae. Kefo kava nehuya amaugafaleti takisi mone nealiya vayamoya ania kavala nehae.
Nelamafuenekeyama kea kea nehisaya yana afa yanagi. Yisasi ke ohavinaya veamoya ania kavala nehae. Kame vayatamimoene kea kea hiho.
Ikapinaga Nelamafaa ala huno kanale kavakeya hu-maineanagitama tamakaya ania augafa veane mainetama ala hutama kanale kavakeya nehutama maiho.

Yisasia mage huno hu-maine “Havigu tamakaya veamogami amaufima kanale kava nehisageya ‘Nageteya kanale kano maine.’ huya hisae.” hutama nehae. Ani kavala hisayana anonatamia hai ali-mainagi ikapinaga mainea Nelamafaa kanale kava haya yafe anonatamia otamamigahie.

Ani yafe tamakaya kafuma hisaya veala amaya hutamama amamigahena ala kefiti keha keha hutama oamamitama kesi ako hutama amamiho. Nagoa vagala vayamoya mono nopiene kategaene “Veamoya tageteya ‘Kanale kava nehae.’ huya takia alisaga hisae.” huya keha keha huteya vaya amaya nehayanagi nagaya tamagelafa huna tamaha-nepauve kanale anonaamia hai ali-mainayanagino Anumaya Kotia nago yana oamamigahie.
Kagaya kafuma hisaya veama amaya hugahena tamaga kayamoa hauga kayamo hisia yana oagesigeka kesi momaya huo.
Kesi ako huka veamoya onagesagi huka amaya hisanana ani yakaa Anumaya Koti, Negafaa, kesi kavama nehaya yana neagea kanomoa age-maineanagino kanaleya huno anonakaa kamigahie.

Nunamuma hutama havigegahena vagala vayamoya nehaya kava hutama Anumaya Kotina havi-okeho. Ani vayamoya mono nopiene ka agegayaleene “Muki veamoya tagesae.” huya hetiya Anumayamotega havinegae. Nagaya tamagelafa huna tamaha-nepauve vayamoya anonaamia hai ali-mainae.

Ali-mainagi kagaya oagesaya kava huno mainea Nelafana Anumayamotegama havigegahena nokafinaga fita ki-maleteka maineka falakika havigesanageno Negafaa kesi kavama haya yama neagea kanomoa ani yana ageteno anonakaa kamigahie.

Nunamuma hugahena Anumayamo kema nohaviya veamoya havinegaya kavala hutama kasagoya afa keyaga hutama havi-okeho. Ani veamoya ayaaya nunamu ke nehuya mage huya amakesa nehaviye “Ayaaya ke huta havigesunageno havigahie.” huya nehae.
Nehagi amakaya nehaya kavala amakave omaleho. Nelamafama havi-oketama maiya kanafina nago yatamima omalene hutama haya yatamia ago havimaineafe nagoene tutu hu-oateho.
Anumayamotega havigenutamahena mage hutama havigeho “Ikapinaga mainana Nelafaga kagai kagimoa alu aotage huno hanesie.
Kava yagaisana kanamoa efalote hisie. Kahaisia kavala ikapinaga nehagi mopaleenena kahaisia kavala hisae.
Meni kanafina nesuna kavela tamio.
Tagaya havi kavama hu-la-tenaya veala aige amateta kefo yaamia atale-ma-tona kava huka kefo yatia aige-tateka atale-lato.
Kana yapiene Satanima aye-lavataga hisia yapiene tavaleka otato. Satania ‘Kefo kava hiho.’ hunoma hu-la-tesigeka tahamaika tavalesaga huo.” huno hu-maine.
Huteno mage huno hie tamakaya havi yama hu-lamatenaya veala aigeama-tetetama kefo yaamima atale-ma-tesayana ikapinaga mainea Nelamafaa ania huno kefo yatamia aige-tamateno atale-lama-tegahie.
Atale-lama-tegahigi tamakaima ali-havi yama hu-lama-tenaya veafena aigeama-tetama kefo yaamima atale-oama-tesayana ikapinaga mainea Nelamafaa ania huno kefo yatamia aige-tama-teno atale-otamategahie.

Tamakaya Anumaya Kotitegama havigegahena kavela mositama mainutama tamaugosa kalagunagu ohiho. Vagala veamoya ani kava huya amaugosafina hapaene tanefaene faleteya mage nehae “Veamoya tageteya kavema mosi-mainona kavala tagegahae.” huya nehayanagi tamagelafa huna tamaha-nepauve naa kava nehaya veamoya anonaamia hai ali-mainae. Tamakaya ania kavala ohiho.

Tamakaya Anumayamotegama havigegahena kavema mositama nemainutama titeti tamaugosa alitama masavema falesayana mukia veamoya kavema mosisaya yafena ohavigahagi mai falakino mainea Nelamafaa falakino hanea yana agaiage neageafe anonatamia tamamigahie.
Monetamiene afenoyatamienena ma mopale halaya ohiho. Halaya hu-malenesageno toto ayeno hakanomoya ali haviya higeya veamoya notamifi haiya ani yatamia musufa aligahae.

Naa hugahagi ma mopafi yafena tamakesa havi havi ohutama haenagama ikapinaga kanale yama alisaya yafe meni kanafina Anumayamofe tamakesa havi havi hutama maiho. Ikapinaga mukia yama malesayana totona ayeno okasaligahie. Hakanomoa ali haviya ohugahie. Nagoa musufa veamoya ani kumatela musufa yana ohugahae.
Muse yatamima malenesaya kumatefe tamakesa havi havi hutama ani kumate umaigahae.

Tamaulagamoa tamakupinaga aye halesia lamu hane. Tamaulagamoa kanale yama huno agesiana tamakupinaga ai-hale-mainegi tamaulagamoma kefo yama agesiana tamakupinaga hani-ki-maine. Ai-hale mainesia yamoa tamakupima asu hisigenoa hani kiteno ala hanikefa kino aye-talako hu-maine.

Nagoke kanomoa “Tole kava kanolatamo aliya kanoania maisue.” huno ohisie. Naama hisiana nago kava kanomofena “Nahaiya kano mainane.” huno hu-tegahianagi nago kava kanomofena “Hai vaiteno naipa nagata aiya kano mainane.” huno hugahie. Nago kava kanomona agua amiteno nago kanomofena “Falote onahaiya kava nehane.” huno hugahie. Tamakaya ania hutama Anumaya Kotifeene moneheenena ali lokaeana “Kava yagai-natesae.” hutama ohiho.

Ani yafe nagaya tamaha-nepauve kanaleya hutama maisaya yaene kave nesaya yaene ti nesaya yaene tamakesa havime havime oviho. Tamaugafale kena failisaya yafeenena tamakesa havi havi ohiho. Kave neyana aifa letale yanagi tamahaimula kanaleya hutama maisaya ya hane. Kena fai-lisana yana amegale yanagi veanea tokiyaage ya mainae.

Haleyama vaiyatete nehaya namayaga ageho. Amakaya avina yana nofaiye. Kavela hoyafinagati aliya nopina mo nomalagi ikapinaga mainea nelamafaa kavela neamamigi tamakaya Anumaya Koti aulagafina namayaga amakasetama mainaya veane mainayafe tamakaienena kava yakai-lama-tegahie.
Tamakaipitila nago kanomoa “Ofalina nagoene maime maime haigahue.” huno tokiyaage agesama havisiana anima havisia katela hanaa huno falote hugahie? Aao falote ohugahie.
Naa higetama kenatamihena tamakesa havi havi nehae? Ageho talapinaga vilasiyamoya haiya ausea nehae. Aliyana aliya kenaamia talo huya fai-noaligi kanale kenaamia hanegeya mainae.
Nagaya tamaha-nepauve nayoma mainea ala sauve kanotamia Solomonia kanale kenaa fai-lianagi ma vilasiyamoa kanaleya huno agase-maine.

Tala yana meni kanafina hoyafina haneanagi ega hataga huya atafi kae-talegahagi Anumaya Kotia ani tala yana kava yagaigeno kanaleya huno hanegi tamakaya mukia veamogatama nagaifena tamakupi maletama tamametitia osi kanoa nehayanagi Anumaya Kotia ania huno tamakaila kenatamia alino hilato hu-lamategahie.
Ani yafe “Kaveene tiene na ya negahune?” hutama tusia tamakesa havi havi ohiho. “Na kena fai-ligahune?” hutama tamakesa ohaviho.
Ani augafa yafena Anumaya Koti kema nohaviya veamoya amakesa havi havi huya nemaigi ikapinaga Nelamafaa nesaya yaene kena fai-lisaya yaenefena ago havimaine.

Havimaineafe tamakaya hagotetama Anumaya Kotima kava yagaisia kumate visaya yafeene agaiama nehaiya fatago kavama hisaya yafeene tamakesa havi havi hisayana Anumaya Kotia ani yaene mukia kavetamiene kenatamienena tamamiteno ani kumatela tamavaleno tamategahie.

Naa hu-maineafe “Ega hanaa hugahune?” hutama tamakesa ohaviho. Egama efalote hisiana tamakesa havi havi hisaya yaenena efalote hugahie. Nagoke yupa falote hisia kana yana ani yupa kanoage tamakesa haviho.
Nelamafufena “Naa maa hana kano mainane.” hu-oateho. Aniama ohisagenoa Anumaya Kotia tamakaifena “Havi kava haya veane mainae.” huno hu-otama-tegahie.

Tamakaya ani veafema “Naa maa hana kano mainane.” hutama hisayana ani augafa keleti Anumaya Kotia tamakaila ania hu-lama-tegahie. Ma mopalema nelama-fugamima hu-ma-tesaya kavala Anumaya Kotia tamakaila ani kava hu-lama-tegahie.

Tagaya tagaiti taguafima hanea yana oageneta alu veanehena “Havi veane mainae.” huta hisuna yafena Yisasia mage huno hu-maine “Negafu aulagafina osia havi yana hanegeka neagananagi naa higeka kagaikaa kaulagafina nagola muki yosa-lapagefa haneanagi ‘Omalene.’ huka nehane?
Naa higeka nega-fufena ‘Kaulagafitila havi yana ali-talegahue.’ huka nehananagi kagaikaa kaulagafina nagola muki yosa-lapagefa hane.

Kaguafinaga hanea yana agelama ohuneka kavayaleti havige huka vagala kano maineka kagaikaa kaulagafitila muki yosa-lapagefa ali-taleteka kanaleya huka ageteka negafu aulagafina osia havi yana ali-talegane huno hie.

Tamakaya Anumaya Kotina alu aotage yana alitama kalamogamina oamamiho. Amamisayana mahaiye huya tamakaila akafu tamanigahae. Afumogamina kanale sesua hagayu hutama oamamiho. Amamisayana amaiyaleti ayeya hapa kaligahae.”
Anumayamotega nago yafema havigesagenoa afaa tamamigahie. Nago yafema atiyesagenoa ali falote hugahie. Fitalema akalu kaluma hisagenoa Anumaya Kotia yaki-lama-tegahie.
Mukia havigesaya veamoya aligahae. Ati ayesaya veamoya ali falote hugahae. Fitalema akalu kaluma hisagenoa Anumaya Kotia yaki-lama-tegahie.
Hana kanomoga nafanekamoma mayahema kahavi-gesigeka nefaga yafana alika amigane? Aao ani yana oamigane.
Noyamehema kahavi-gesigeka nefaga osifavea alika amigano? Aao ani yana alika oamigane.
Oamiganagi tamakaya havi veane mainayanagitama nafanetamimona kanale yana neamamiyanagi ikapinaga mainea nelamafaa tusiya huno tamakase-maineanagitama havigesagenoa kanale yana tamamigahie.
Veafe “Maa kava hu-latesae.” hutama hisaya kavala ani kavakeya alu veanea hu-mateho. Ani yafena Moseseene Anumaya Koti amaune vayamoyaene hu-mainaya kahegi kemona aepaa hane.

Anumaya Koti kumatema visayana osi fia kanoafi ugahae. Hani-ki-mainea kumapi tegelege nehia atafi visaya kaana ala hiyenagefa haneno ala kakefa hanegeya kasagoya veamoya yoyo huya ani katela nevagi tamakaya osi fia kanoafi hai-faleho.
Agola maige maige hisuna kumatema visaya kaana osi fia kanoa haneanagiya kasageke huya ani katela kasagoya veala novae.
Nagoa vayamoya “Anumaya Koti ke hu-haleta nehuna vaya mainone” huya havigegeyama hisaya vayafena kayeho. Yuna afu kana vaya mainagetama neagayanagi amakusafinaga kaveage afu kana vaya mainae.

Tamakaya amakaipima falote nehia kavala agetetama aepaa hana augafa vaya mainae hutama havigahae. Ave nofite timaa hanea alaga tagisifi? Aao otagigahie. Avetanafa hanea uveuve inomote hagaage yosalaga motaga molagisio? Otagigahie.
Otagigahigi kanale yosamoa kanale yosalaga neayegi havi yosamoa havi yosalaga neaye.
Kanale yosamoa havi yosalaga noayeanagino havi yosamoa kanale yosalaga oayegahie.
Mukia yosamoya kanale yosalaga oayesayana atagiya atafi kae-talegahae.
Naa hinagetama havigegeyama huya falote nehisaya vayapiti falote hisia kavala agetetama aepaa “Hana augafa vaya mainae.” hutama havigahae.

Mukia veamoya nagaifena “Anumayatimogae Anumayatimogae.” huya hisaya veala Anumaya Kotima kava yagai-mainea kumatela ohaigahagi ikapinaga mainea Nenafana hau-mainesia kavama nehisaya veamoya ani kumatela umaigahae.

Anumaya Kotia kaiyekema hu-matesea yupa kasagoya veamoya nagaifena mage huya hugahae “Anumayatimogae Anumayatimogae tagaya kagai kagile Anumaya Koti kea hu-haleta nehunane. Kagai kagile Kefo Avamula neanatita tokiya avame yana amave-nelunane.” huya hugahae.
Hugahayanagi nagaya ani yupa mage huna hugahue “Tamakaila otamaketafa hu-mainoane. Kefo yakeya hugetama omai veanegi nagaitegatila mai-haletama viho huna hugahue.” huno hu-maine.
Nagoa veamoya anima hu-mainoa kea haviya ali hipoya huge huge huya nago kanale agu agesaene kanomo avamete nehae. Ani kanomoa noma kiana yafa agotofule ki-malene.
Ki-malenegenoa koma aino tima hogino tokiyaage yasimoa tusiya huno nona ali-lagape aigahe hianagi yafa agotofule ki-malenea yafe alino lagapea ai-oatalene.
Alino lagapea ai-oatalenegi nagoa veamoya nagai kema haviteya ali hipoya ohayana agesama omalea kanomo avamete nehae. Ani kanomoa ti kahaepapi nomaa ki-malene.
Ki-malenegeno koma aino tima hogino tokiyaage yasimoa alino ani nona ali lagape aino mopafi atalegeno tusiya huno haviya hu-lavi-maine huno hu-maine.
Yisasia mani kea hu-hano hutegeya kahegi kema havilinaya anagamoya nehaya augafa ke kana huno ohunegi tokiya yamaa hanea kanomo ke kana hia yafe mukia veamoya tusia amamayo ai-mainae.
Nagi Yisasia agoyalegati tavigeya kasagoya veala akave umainae.
Akave nevageno nagola fugitayamo augafa alino hayagino atalako hu-mainea kanoa Yisasite eno ape huno mage huno havige “Anumayamoga kahaisigekahena nagaila alika hilato hu-natateasine.” huno hu-maine.
Higeno Yisasia ayana hayo huno augafale avate hu-lineno mage huno hie “Nagaya nahaigena kaugafamoa menia kanale hino huna nehue.” huno higeno anile aupaa kalia hano hu-tene.

Yisasia mage huno hapaiye “Ali hilato hu-ga-toa yafena nago kanoa haopaika mono nopi kava kanomote uka kalikaama ali kanale hu-ga-toa kema mukia veamoya havinuyahena kagaya mono nopi kava kanomoa kaugafa kamota huno kage-tesigeka kaugafama ali hilato hu-ga-toa yafena Mosesema ‘Ma yama Anumaya Kotina amio.’ huno hu-mainea yana Anumaya Kotitega atalo.” huno tokiyaage ke hapaiye.
Yisasia Kapaneamu uvayi higeno nagola Lomu ati vayate kava kanomoa mage mo havige “Anumayamoga naya hisano? Aliya kanonimoa muki augafa avayu hu-lavigeno tusi agata aigeno nopi nemaiye.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia mage huno hie “Nagaya kalia mo alina kanale hu-tegahue.” huno hie.
Higeno Lomu ati vayate kava kanomoa mage hie “Anumayamoga nagaya kanale ohunoa kanomoni nopi esanana okategahigi afaa malegati aliya kanonimo kaliahena kea hu-tesanageno kalia falu hu-tegahie.

Nagaya kava kano mainoe. Nagaima kava yagai-natenea kanoa anale nagaseno maigena nagaya ania huna nagoa ati vayatela kava huna mainoe. Nago kanomofema ‘Vuoma.’ hugenoa umaine. ‘Enoma.’ hugenoa emaine. Aliya kanonihe ‘Naa huo.’ hugenoa ania hu-maine.” huno hie.

Yisasia ani kea haviteno agesa kumoa tusiya huteno akavema nevaya veamogamifena mage huno hie “Tamage tamaha-nepauve ma kanomoa tusiya huno nagaifena havino agupi maleno ametitia hu-maine. Ma kanomoma hia ya huya nagaifema haviya amakupi maleya ametiti hu-mainaya veala mukia Yuta veane mainaya kumatela oagenoe.” huno hie.
Tamaha-nepauve mukia veamoya yagemoma tavi nefalelegatiene evayi nehilegatiene Anumaya Kotima kava yagai-mainea kumatela taginagomoya Apalahamuene Aisakiene Yekopuene siale mo maineya kavela negahae.

Negahagi nagoa Yuta veamogamina nayoma Anumaya Kotia “Kava yagaisua kumate maigahae.” huno hu-maineanagi agaifema haviya amakupi omalaya yafe Anumaya Kotia amavaleno hani yapi amatalesigeya anifi avi neateya amave kemoa hugahae huno hie.

Yisasia Lomu ati vayate kava kanomofe mage huno hie “Nokalega eteka vuo. Aliya kanokama ali falu hu-tesua kea havika kagupi maleka kametiti hana kea hu-ga-tegahue.” huno higeno ani kema hia kana kanoale ani aliya kanoa kanale hu-tene.
Yisasia Pita nopinaga umaineno ageana Pitana aamona itaamo alekanoa tusia amukonako kali alino mainegeno moge-maine.
Mogeteno ayate avate nehigeno amuko-nako kaliamoa agola kanale hu-tetegeno ani amoa hetino kavela kaeno amamine.

Ani unena mukia ani kumate veamoya vayaamima Kefo Avamumo amakusafima mainea veala amavaleya Yisasite ageno Yisasia Kefo Avamumogamifena hu-mategeya amataleya vageno mukia kali veala alino kanale hu-matene.
Naa hu-maineafe nayona Anumaya Koti aune kanomoa, Aisaiyaa hu-mainea kemoa agola falote huno tamage hie. Mage huno hu-maineane
“Agaya agaia kalima nealuna yana ali-talene. Taugafamoa fulu fuluma nehuno akavima nohia yaene ago ali-talene.” huno hu-maineane.
Kasagoya veamoya Yisasite meye-kove hageno Yisasia agaiaene tokaeya nemaiya anagafe mage huno hie “Tikotumona atu faliga vigetao.” huno higeya umainae.
Umainageno nagola kahegi kema havilinea kanomoa Yisasite eno mage huno hie “Hu-mave-lina kanomoga mukia kumate visanana nagaya kakave ugahue.” huno hie.

Higeno Yisasia kenonaa mage huno hapaiye “Kepu yagamoya faesaya komuamia mopafinaga hanegi namamogamina noamia haneanagi ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomona faesua nonia omalene.” huno hie.
Nagola agai kema nehavia kanomoa mage huno hie “Anumayanimogae nenafana falisigena alina he-vai-tetena kakavela ugahue.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia mage huno kenonaa hapaiye “Atalo nagai kea ohavinesaya veala amaku amamemoa fali-mainaya veamoya falia kanomona aliya he-vai-tegahae amakaiami yanagi kagaya nakave eno.” huno hu-maine.
Yisasia tipi kalefi haisaga hu-maigeya agaiene tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya agaiene umainae.
Nevageno aupaa anileti ala yasimoa nealigeno timoa ai-galato huno ani tipi kalefi haiyanagi Yisasia aufaeno maine.
Faeno mainegeya agaiene tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya agafa huya mage huya hae “Kava kanomogae kava kanomogae tagaya ti nakaita falisuna kava nehunagi Anumayamoga hetika taugafa ali-gatio.” huya hae.

Hageno mage huno hama-vi-ge “Naa higetama kolia nehae? Nagaifena havitama tamakupi maletama tamametitima nehaya yamoa aupa nehio?” huno huteno hetino ani limofeene yasimofeene tokiyaage ke huno “Taga huo.” huno higeana alava hu-mainae.
Alava haageya mukiamoya amamayoma aiya yafena mage hae “Mani kanoa hana augafa kano mainegeno timoene yasimoene kea haviteya akave nemalae?” huya hu-mainae.

Ala tikotuna takaeya ame kaiyaga agegayamona Kelasasa veane mainalega uvayi hae. Uvayi hageana tole kanolana Kefo Avamuyaga anakuafi mainea kanolana matimatipinagati Yisasite emainae. Ani kanolatana tusi aifonafo nehaa yafe veamoya koli huya ani katela novayane.
Ovageana ani kanolatana ala kefiti mage huana hae “Anumaya Kotina neamogae naa hu-laategahe neane? Taagata aisia kanamoa falote ohunegi taagata aisia kava hu-laategahe neano?”
Haageya kasagoya afuyagamoya aluale maineya kavela nenae.
Nenageya Kefo Avamumoya Yisasife mage huya hu-mainae “Anakusafinagatima hu-latesanana ani afuyagamo amakuafi hu-lategeta vamano.” huya havigae.

Havigageno Yisasia “Anifi viho.” huno higeya ani Kefo Avamumoya ani kanolatamogani anakuafitila hati-laviya afuyagamogami amakupi hai-falageya ani afuyagamoya amaiya-yeya nagola aulufi kapi taviteya tipi asaga hu-laviya ti nakaiya fali hano hu-mainae.

Fali hano hageya ani afuyagale kava vayamoya ageteya faleya ala kumate mainaya veamogamife “Kefo Avamumoya anakuafi mainea kanolatamoganina na kava na kava hu-nateno higeta neone.” huya hama-pai-mainae.
Hageya ani ala kumatema mainaya veamoya ani ya agegahe eya Yisasina megeteya “Tagai kumala neataleka alu kumate vuo.” huya hu-mainae.
Yisasia tipi kalefi haisaga hu-maino tikotumona takaeno agaia kumatega eteno umaine.

Umainegeya nagoa vayamoya nago kanomona aiya aya fali-mainea kanoa hagifanale faeno mainegeya avaleya Yisasite emainae. Ageno Yisasia ageteno mage huno agesafinaga havimaine “Ma vayamoya nagaife haviya amakupi maleya amametiti nehae.” huno agesa haviteno ani kali kanohe mage huno hapaiye “Nafanenimoga kaha-nepauve menia kolia ohuo nagaya ago aige-ka-tena kefo yakaa atale-nega-toe.” huno hapaiye.
Higeya kahegi kema havi-linaya anagamoya amakaiami amakuafiti mage huya hae “Ma kanomoa Anumaya Kotife hu-haviya hu-neate.” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia amakupinaga haviya kea haviteno mage huno hie “Naa higetama tamakaya tamakesafinaga havi kea nehae?
Nagayama hutena hisua kea hana kemo kanaagela hu-maine? ‘Aige-ka-tena kefo yakaa atale-neka-toe.’ huna hisua kemoo? Ifi kali kanomofe ‘He-ti-ka ka vuo.’ huna hisua kemoe?

Nagaya ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomona ma mopale mainena aige-tama-tena kefo yatamia atale-lama-tesua tokiyania hane hutama havisaya yafe nago kavala huna tamave-ligahue.” huno kalima nealia kanomofena mage huno hie “Hetika hagifanaka nealika nokalega vuo.” huno hu-maine.
Higeno hetino nomaalega umaine.
Naa higeya mukia alitalu hu-mainaya veamoya ageteya tusi amamayo aiteya Anumaya Kotima tokiya yaama vayamogamima amamia yafena Anumaya Koti agia alisaga hu-mainae.

Anile neamataleno vilegati nago kanomo agia Matiue musufaya huno vaya amaugafaleti takisi mone ali-liteno nehia kanoa opisi nomaale mopale mainegeno Yisasia ani kanoa mogeteno mage huno hie “Kagaya nakave eno.” huno higeno Matiua hetino Yisasina akave umaine.

Vigeno Yisasia Matiu nopi umaineno kave negahe musufayama huya amaugafaleti takisi mone nealiya vayaene nagoa kefo yama nehaya vayaene ani nopi Yisasiene agaienema tokaeya nemaiya anagaaene tokaeya maineya ne-mainae.

Nenageya Falasia vayamoya Yisasienema tokaeya nemaiya anagafe mage huya hae “Naa higeno tamakaima hu-lamave-nelia kanomoa amaugafaleti takisi monema nealiya vayaene kefo yama nehaya vayaenena kavela nene?” huya hama-vigae.
Hageno Yisasia ani kea ago haviteno mage huno hama-paiye “Kalima noaliya veamoya tota kanomotega ougahagi kali veamoyage tota kanomotega ugahae.
Nagaya ania huna ‘Fatago veane mainone.’ huya nehisaya veanehe ke hugahe nagaya omenogi kefo yama nehaya veanehe ke hugahe emainoe. Anumaya Kotia agaia hu-mainea kea mage huno hu-maineane
Afu heya kolamaa takiya naminaya yafena onahaunegi kalagi ai-ma-taya yafekeya nenahaiye huno hu-maineane.
Hu-maineanagitama tamakaya ani kemo aepaa mo havilama hutetama ani kavala hiho.” huno hu-maine.
Yoni anagamoya Yisasite mage huya me havigae “Tagaya Yoni anagamogataene Falasia vayaene nagoa kavela mo-nesunanagi naa higeya kagaienema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya mukia kavela nenae?” huya havigae.

Hageno Yisasia mage huno hie “Nago kanoa aama faiya esagenoa avaya hesia imu kisia yupa vayaamoyaene mainesigeya ani vayamoya hamauna hu-tesao? Aao hamauna hu-oategahayanagiya haenagaa nago kanama falote hisigeya kame vayamoya ama alisia kanoa atafa huya amakaipiti avale-talesageya ani kanale vayaamoya hamau hu-teteya mosigahae.
Nago kanomoa haegafa kena alino atafa kenalela maleno ohatigahie. Maleno hatisiana haegafa kena atalaga huno ali haviya hugahie.

Nagi nago kanomoa haegafa nofi alagamo timaa atafa mememo augafa ti keayopina takino ovaigahie. Takino vaisiana timaamoa kanuka hesigeno ti kena falo huno taki-lavinageno ti kena ali haviya hugahie. Haegafa nofi alagamo timaa hefino haegafa meme augafamo ti keayopi takino vaino. Ania hisayana tiene keayoene kanaleya huno hanegahie.” huno hu-maine.

Yisasia ani kea nehigeno nagola soka kanomoa Yisasi aiyafi aleya meyeno Yisasina mage huno hapaiye “Munaniamoa ago fali-mainegi kagaya kayana augafale me malesanageno fali-mainefitila eteno he-tisie.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia hetino anilega vigeya agaienema tokaeya nemaiya anagala akave umainae.
Nevageno nago amoa tuelufua (12) kafu aigu nopinaga mukia kanale nemaiya amoa Yisasina akavelegati eno kenaamo atupale mevate hie.
Avate nealino agupi mage huno hie “Kenaaleke avate alisugeno kalinimoa hano hu-nategahie.” huno avate nealie.

Avate higeno Yisasia mai-yahae huno ani amona ageteno mage huno hapaiye “Ma amoga kolia ohuo nagaifema havika kagupi maleka kametitima hana yamo kagaila alino kanale hu-negate.” huno higeno aupaa kaliamoa kanale hu-tene.

Kanale hu-tegeno Yisasia soka kanomo note uvayi huno hamau nehuya kapufama haya veanene avima ataya veanene ali-talu huya maineya tusi ke-yesoma haya kea haviteno mage huno hie “Viho mani munala fali lavata ohunegi afaa faeno maine.” huno hama-paiye. Higeya ani munama faligeya age-mainaya yafenagiya kigi hu-tenae.
Hu-teteya kumatega umainageno Yisasia nopinaga haino ani munamo ayate atafa nehigeno aupaa hetie.
He-ti-teanagi Yisasima hia yamo avagemoa ute ete higeya mukia ani kotega veamoya havi-mainae.
Yisasia ani kumala ataleno nevigeana tole kanolana anaulaga asu hu-mainea kanolana akave neuana ala kefiti mage hae “Kagaya Tevitina aginagomogae taagaila kahau hu-laato.” huana hae.

Nehaageno Yisasia nopinaga hai-falegeana anaulaga asu hu-mainea kanolana agaite aageno Yisasia ani kanolafena mage huno hana-vige “Nagaya tanaulaga alina hale-lanatesua tokiyania hanea yafena tanakupina malenaao?” huno higeana “E, Anumayamogae kagaya ania hu-laatateasine.” huana hae.
Nage haageno Yisasia anaulagale aya maleno mage hie “Tanakaya nagaife havitana tanakupi malaa yafe hu-lana-tegahue.” huno hie.
Higeana ani kanolamogani anaulagamoa ai-gali hu-maine. Higeno Yisasia anakaifena tokiyaage ke huno kahegi ki-nateno mage huno hie “Mani yama hu-lana-toa yafena nagoa veala hamaopaio.” huno hie.
Hianagi ani kanolamogania uana mukia ani kotega veamogamina Yisasima hu-na-tea avagea hu-liteana hu-mainae.
Ani tole kanolana utaageno nago kanomona Kefo Avamumoa aguafi maineno avefuna alino ai-yahae higeno agea noaiya kanoa Yisasite avaleya ae.

Ageno Yisasia agema noaiya kanomo aguafiti Kefo Avamula anati-talegeno agea aino kea kea higeya alitalu hu-mainaya veamoya ageteya tusia amamayo neaiya mage hae “Mani augafa kavala nayona Isaleli kotega oagenaya kavale.” huya hu-mainae.
Hayanagi Falasia vayamoya mage huya hae “Pielesepulia Kefo Avamuyagale kava hu-mainea kanomoa tokiya amigeno Kefo Avamumona anati-neatale.” huya hu-mainae.
Yisasia ala kumateene nagoa ala kumayagaleene osi kumayagaleene neuno mono nopi huge amave-lige huno Anumaya Koti kava yagai-ma-tesia kanale mono kea hama-nepaino mukia kalia alino kanale hu-ma-tene.

Hu-neama-teno kasagoya melitalu hu-mainaya veala amaketeno hau hu-ma-tene. Ani veamoya kana yapi mainageno amakesa kumoa tusiya higeya sipi sipi kana huya mainayanagi kava yagaisaya vayala omainaya yafe Yisasia kalagi ai-matene.

Kalagi ai-mateteno Yisasia agaienema tokaeya nemaiya anagafe mage huno hama-paiye “Nagai kema havisaya veala kasagoya kavemoma hoyafima afule-mai-lemai hia kava hu-maineanagi hoyafima aliya alisaya veala osi kanoa mainayafe ani hoyamona Nefafena havigegeno nagoa aliya veala hu-matesie.” huno hu-maine.
Yisasia agaia tuelufua (12) anagaamogamife ke higeya ageno tokiyaa amamine. Mukia Kefo Avamuma veamogami amakusafiti anati-talesaya tokiyaene mukia kalima aliya kanale hu-matesaya tokiyaene amamine.

Agaia tuelufua (12) anagaamogami amakia hagote kanomo agia Saimonie nago agia Pitae aganaamoa Etalue Yemesigani Yonigania Sepeti nafanelataene Filipiene Patolomayuene Tomasiene amaugafaleti takesi mone nealia kanoa Matiuene Yemesia, Alafiusi nafane. Tatiusiene Saimoni Selotiene Yutasi Isakaliotia haenaga Yisasina agesi huno kame ya hu-tesia kanoe.
Yisasia ani tuelufua (12) anagaa hu-neamateno mage huno hama-paiye tamakaya Yuta vea omainaya veamogamitela oviho. Samelia veamogami kumayagaleene oviho.
Ougahagi tamakaya vayagi mainaya sipi sipi afuyaga kana hu-mainaya Yuta veate viho.
Neutama mani ke hu-haletama hama-paiho “Anumaya Kotia kava yagai-lama-tesia kanamoa ago aupaa falote hugahie.” hutama hiho.

Nehutama kali veanea ali kanale hu-matetama fali-mainesaya veala ali henelitama fugitaya amake-mainesia veala ali kanale hu-neama-tetama Kefo Avamula veamogami amakusafinagatila amanati-taleho. Nagaya kanale yana afaa nelamamuanagi anonaa oalinoane. Ania hutama anonaa monea oalitama afaa amaya hiho.
Tamakaya tamia alaga monene haesa monene kutamifina ai-oaliho afaa viho.
Tamakaya kama visalega kutamia oalitama oviho. Tole kena oaliho. Tamaiya noene ayopatamiene alitama oviho. Nagai aliyama alisaya yateti veamoya anonaa kavema tamamisayana tama-tegahie.
Tamakaya nago ala kumatelo osi kumatelo uvayi hisagenoma nago kanomoma kanale yama hu-lama-teno fatago kavama hisia kanoene maiho. Fae-litetama ohutama ataletama visaya yupa ani nopinagati viho.
Tamakaya nago nopima hai-falenutamahena hagotetama mage hutama hiho “Ma nopi mainaya veamogatama Anumaya Kotia yuna hesaya tamaku tamakesa tamamisie.” hutama hu falu fala hu-mateho.
Hu-matesageya ani nopi mainesaya veamoya fatago kavama nehisaya veama mainesagenoa Anumaya Kotia yuna hesaya amakesa amamigahianagi ania augafa veanema omainesayana anima yuna hesaya yana oaligahae.
Nagoa veamoya tamavaleya noamifima otama-teya ketamima ohavisagetamahena ani kumala neataletama “Havi kava hae.” hutama tamaiyafima hanesia kugukege yana ai-fopo hu-neataletama alu kumate viho.

Tamage-lafa huna tamaha-nepauve Anumaya Kotia kaiyekema hu-matesia kanafina Sotomu mainaya veamoyaene Komola mainaya veamoyaene amaugafa amagata aigahianagi tamakaima falu fala hu-otama-tesaya kumate veamoya anima kaiyeke hu-ma-tesia yupa tusiya huno amagata aigahie.

Haviho nagaya tamakaila hu-lama-togetama sipi sipi kana hutama afai kala kana kaveage veane mainesaya amunopi hu-lama-tesugetama visageya hu-haviya hu-lama-tesagetama osifavemo kalope lavino nevia avamete hutama tamakesaene vayalagi nama kana hutama kefo yana ohutama yuna hetama maiho.
Tamaugafa ali haviya hu-lama-tesaya vayafena kayeho. Vayamoya tamavaleya kanisole vayate kaiyeke mo hu-lama-teya mono nopina kayona tamamigahae.

Tamakaya nagai kema akave malenaya yafe tamakaila Kamani kava vayateene ala Sauve vayateene kaiyekea hu-lama-tesaya yafe tamavaleya amaufi tama-tesagetama nagai kanale mono kea hama-paisageya nagoa Yuta veane omainaya veanene havigahae.

Tama-valeyama kaiyekema hu-lama-tesaya yate tama-tesagetama kolia ohutama “Kenonaamia naane hisune?” hutama tamakesa kumoa ohiho. Ani yupa kanoa Anumaya Kotia “Mage hiho.” huno tamaha-painagetama hugahae.
Tamakaitamigeya ani kea ohugahagi Nelamafa Avamumoa ani kea tamakaila tamavayafiti hugahie.

Ani kanafina veamoya amakaiami nepuamimona kame vayaamimote amavaleya visageya “Hamaegeya faliho.” huya hugahae. Nefaa nafaneyagaa ani kava hu-ma-tegahae. Nafaneyagamoya itaafoamimogamina ali-yahae huya kamea hu-ma-teteya “Hamaetama faliho.” huya hugahae.

Nagima neayaya yafe mukia veamoya amaipa kafa he-lama-tegahagi nagoa veamoya nagai kema meni kanaleti aepa heya atafa huya tokiya hume hume nevisagena nagaya etenama esua kanafina nagai kema atafa hu-linaya veamogamina Anumaya Kotia amaku amamena ali-gatigahie.

Veamoya havi kavama hu-lama-tesagetama ani kumala neataletama nago kumate viho. Tamage-lafa huna tamaha-nepauve mukia Isaleli kumatela ounesageno ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea nafanemona egahue.
Nago sugulufi mainesia nafanemoa hu-ve-nelia kanoamona oagasenea yanagino ania huno nago aliya kanomoa kava kanoamona oagasene.

Sugulufi mainesia nafanemoa hu-ve-nelia kano kana huno maisiana kanaleya hugahie. Ania huno aliya kanomoa kava kanoamoene nago avamete huno maisiana kanale hugahie. Nagaifena mage huya hu-mainae “Pielesepulia Kefo Avamuyagale kava kanoami maine.” huya hu-haviya hu-nenateya aliya veanimogamina tusiya huya kamuge hatageya vai-lama-tegahae.

Ali haviya hu-lama-tegahayanagi amakaifena kolia ohiho. Aiso hu-mainea yamona Anumaya Kotia mukia alino fufute atalegahie. Falaki-mainesia yamona Anumaya Kotia mukia veamogami amaulagafi ali-falote hugahie.
Hanipinaga tamaha-pai-mainoa kea yagefi hama-paiho. Sumi sumi huya tamaha-pai-mainaya kea kuma amunopiti ala kefiti keha keha hutama hiho.

Amega tamaugafaage he-falisaya veafena kolia ohiho. Ani vayamoya tamaku tamameenema tamahae falisaya tokiyaamia omalene. He-faliteno hanimo aguafi ata tege-lege nehia yapi tamaku tamameene tamaugafaene he-falisia tokiya hanea kanoa, Anumaya Kotifeke, tusiya hutama kolia hiho.
Tolea osi namalatana nagoke haesa moneleti miya nehayanagi nagoke ani nama kanoa afaa ofalinegi ikapinaga Nelamafaa “Falisie.” huno ohinagenoa ofaligahie.
Tamakaya mukia namayaga agasetama veanea ala yaga mainae. Anumaya Kotia mukia hanea tamayolagefa ago hapalino havilinea yafe kolima hisaya yana neataletama afaa maiho.

Yisasia mage huno hie “Nagoa kanomoa veamogami amaulagafi nagaifema ‘Yisasina nagua amitafa hu-mainoe.’ huno hu-falote hisigenahena nagaya ikapinaga mainea Nenafa aulagafina agaifena ‘Nagai nafane maine.’ huna hu-falote hugahue.

Hu-falote hugahuanagi nagoa veamoya veamogami amaulagafima nagaifena ‘Nagua amitafa ohunoe.’ hunoma hu-falote hisigena nagaya ikapinaga mainea Nenafa aulagafina ani kanohena ‘Oagenoa kano maine.’ huna hugahue.”
Tamakaya na tamakesa nehaviye? “Ma mopale taipa falu huta maisuna yana tamigahe Yisasia emaine.” hutama nehao? Aao nagayama emainoafenagitama tamakaya tuma hisaya yatetila falu hutama omaigahae.
Omaigahagi nagaya emainoafe nago afamopina nafaneamoa nefana kame hu-tesigeno munaamoa itaamona kamea hu-tesigeno anofeloamoa anauamona itaamoene apasesaa yamoa falote hugahie.
Nagoa veamoya nagai kea akave nemalayafe amakai afamola kame vayaa maigahae.

Nagoa veamoya itaafoamimofema “Afa veane mainagi Yisasia tamakase-mainea kanogina nagula aminoe.” huya ohisaya veamoya nagai nafane maisaya avametela ohune. Nagoa veamoya nafaneamimofeene munaamimofeene “Afa vea mainagi Yisasia tamakase-mainea kanogina nagua aminoe.” huya ohisaya veamoya nagai nafane maisaya avametela ohunae.
Nagaila nagatama aisigena falisua yafema nagoa veamoya “Ania hugahune.” huya amakaiami yafaga yosa kofiya nakave visaya amakesa ohavisaya veamoya nagai nafane maisaya avametela ohunae.

Nagoa veamoya maiyaamima atafa huya ali-talakoma hu-lisayana maiyaamimoa falino afaya hapaegahigi nagoa veamoyama nagaifema hamainageya maiyaamima atalesaya veamoya maiyaamia ali-gatisugeya agola maige maige hugahae.

Nagoa veamoya tamakaima tamavaleya falu falama hu-lama-tesayana nagaila ania huya navaleya falu fala hu-nenatae. Nagaima navaleyama falu fala hu-natesayana hu-na-tenea kanomona ania huya falu fala hu-neatae.

Nagoa veamoya nago kanomona ageteya Anumaya Koti ke hu-haleno nehia kanoma mainesigeya falu falama hu-tesayana ani veamogamina Anumaya Kotia hu-haleno nehisia vayamogami amamisia avamete amamigahie. Nagoa veamoya nago kanomona ageteya fatago auava yama nehisia kanoma mainesigenoma falu fala hu-tesiana ani veamogamina Anumaya Kotia fatago kanomo alisia avamete amamigahie.
Nagoa veamoya nagola afa kanoa Yisasi kema nehavisia kanoma mainesigeya yasi lima amisayana tamage huna tamaha-nepauve ani veamoya anonaamia fanane ohugahianagiya afaa miyaamia aligahae.
Yisasia tuelufua (12) agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagamogamina huge ama-ve-lige huteno alu kumate kumate Anumaya Koti kea mo hama-paino hu-mave-li-maine.

Yonia ti fale neamatea kanoa nofipi maineno Kalaisima hia kavafena haviteno nagoa agaia anagala Yisasife havigegahe hu-ma-tegeya mage huya me hae “Kagaya egahiema hu-mainaya kano emainapi alu kanohe agava maisune?” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia mage huno hie “Tamakaya utama haviya yaene agaya yaene Yonina mo hapaiho.

Ma ya agone hutama hiho amaulaga asu hu-mainea veamoya amaulaga neagae. Amaiya haviya hu-mainea veamogami amaiyamoa kanale hu-mate. Fugitaya amake-mainea veala kanale hu-mate. Amakesa tile-mainea veala eteya nehaviye. Fali-mainaya veala hetiya mainae. Afenoami omalenea veala Anumaya Kotina kanale kea nehaviye.
Nagai kehema tole amakesa ohavisaya veamoya kanaleya huya maigahae.” huno hu-maine.

Yonima hu-ma-tegeya aya veamoya nevageno Yisasia anile mainaya veamogamina Yonife mage huno hamavige “Tamakaya kame kotega na ya mogegahe nevae? Nago kanoa yasimoa hopa kana huno ali fagagi mainea kanomona agegahe nevao?
Ifi na ya agegahe umainae? Kanale kena fai-linesia kano agegahe nevao? Aao kanale kena fai-linesaya vayala kame kotega omaigahagi sauve kanomo nopi maigahae.
Na ya agegahe nevae? Anumaya Koti aune kano agegahe nevao? Ifi tamage tamaha-nepauve mukia amaune vayamogamina amakase-mainea kanoa Yoni maine.
Yonife huya nayona Anumaya Koti autamafina mage huya kae-malenayane
‘Haviho nagaya Anumaya Kotina aliya kanonimona hu-tesugeno uhagotegatenoma visana kana valino ali-hilato huga-tegahie.’ huno kae-maleneane.

Tamage huna tamaha-nepauve Yonia ti fale-neamatea kanomoa mukia ma mopale vayamogamina ago amakase-maineanagino nagoa afa veamoya Anumaya Kotife ‘Kava yagailato.’ huya hu-mainesaya veala Yonina ago agase-mainae.

Yonia ti fale-neamatea kanomoa kea hama-pai-mainea kanaleti aepa heya tokiyaami hanea veamoya Anumaya Kotima kava yagai-lama-tesia yafe tokiyaage huya ‘Ani yapi maigahune.’ huya hu-mainayanagi nagoa vayamoya tusiya huya ani yafena kame nehae.
Mukia kanafina Moseseene Anumaya Koti amaune vayaene kea hu-haleya hu-mainayanagino Yonia evayi hu-maine.
Ani vayamoya nagoma esia kanomofena, Ilaiyae kanomofena ago tamaha-pai-mainayanagi ‘Yonia ani kano maine hutama havinutamahena havigahae.
Tamakesama hanesia veamogatama haviho.

Meni kanafima mainaya veamogatamahena hanaa veane mainae huna tamaha-paisue? Ma ma hisua augafa nafaneyagamoya mainaya avamete hutama mainae. Ani nafaneyagamoya veane alitalu huya mainalega maineya alu nafaneyagahena ke huya mage huya hae.
‘Yaveya aikolunana tamakaya amoa noayae. Tagaya tahau hisuna yagame nehunana tamakaya avia noatae.’ huya hu-mainae.
Yonia ti fale-ma-te kanomoa kaveene haviliene mosino emainegeya amakaya ‘Satani Avamula aguafina maine.’ huya hu-mainae.

Hayanagi ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea nafanemona tina kavela me nenogetama nagaifena ‘Kaveene tiene neno hano hugeno omai kano maineno musufaya huya amaugafaleti takisi nealiya vayaene kefo yama nehaya vayaene vayaamoya mainae.’ huya hu-mainae. Hayanagi Anumaya Kotina kanale agu agesama hanea yapiti kanale yana falote hu-maineafe vayamoya ‘Fatago kava nehie.’ huya hu-mainae.” huno hie.

Yisasia mani kea huteno aepa heno agayama tokiya avame yama higeya age-mainaya kumayagaletiene ani kumate veamoya kefo yaamia neataleya amakua ai-yahae huya akave nohaya yafe Yisasia tokiyaage ke huno mage hu-maine.

“Avoneo Kolasini mainaya veamogatamaene Petesaita mainaya veamogatamaene tusiya huna tamakaifena nahau nehue. Tamakai kumapina nagaya tokiyaage avameyana ago huanagi tamaipa ai-yahae ohayanagina ani tokiyaage avame yama Taiyaene Saitoniene huleasina ani kumate veamoya kefo yaamihena ago amaipa ai-yahae huya kefo yama hu-mainaya yafena kayavo kena fai-liya tanefafi maileasine.

Nagaya tamaha-nepauve Anumaya Kotia kaiyekema hu-ma-tesia kanafina Taiya mainaya veanene Saitoni mainaya veanene amaugafa amagata yana aligahayanagi tamakaya tusiya hutama nagoene tamaugafa tamagata yana aligahae.

Tamakaya Kapaneamu mainaya veamogatama ‘Taugafa alita anale haigahune.’ hutama nehao? Aao afete tavitama tamakaye nehinagetama maigahae. Tamakai kumapi hu-mainoa tokiyaage avame yana Sotomu kumatema huleasina ani kumate veamoya amakua ai-yahae hu-mainaleasina atafina fanane ohaleasine.
Tamaha-nepauve Anumaya Kotima kaiyeke hu-ma-tesia yupa Sotomu mainaya veala amaugafa amakata aigahianagi tamakaya amakasetama tusiya huno tamaugafa tamakata aigahie.” huno hu-maine.

Ani yupa Yisasia nunamuna mage huno hie “Nenafagae mukia ma mopafi yaene ikapinaga yaene kava yagai-mainana Anumayamoga kanale kava nehane. Nagoa veamoya ‘Havi haviyati hanea vea mainone.’ huya nehaya veamogamifena ohavisae huka fala-ki-malenane. ‘Ala avo nopi umainona vea mainone.’ huya hisaya veamogamifena ohavisae huka fala-ki-malenanagi ‘Inamu nafane kana huta mainone.’ huya nehaya veala ago amaveli-mainana yafena aluya huna musekaa nehue.
E, Nenafagae kagai kagu kagesamo hia kava huka ani kavala hu-mainane.” huno nunamuna hu-maine.

Veamogamifena mage huno hu-maine “Nenafaa mukia lokiya ago namine. Mukia veamoya nagaila neamonina aepania ohavinagi Nenafaa agaiage nagai aepaa haviline. Havilinegi mukia veamoya Nenafa aepaa ohavinae. Ania huna nagainige neamona Nenafa aepaa havilinena nahaisia veamogamina hu-mave-lisugeya Nenafana aepaa havigahae.
Tamakaya tusi aliya nealitama kana yama ali-mainaya veamogatama nagaitega egena mai-falu hisaya yana tamamino.
Nagai aliya aligeta tokaeta vaiyamano. Nagaya kayone kano mainena naugafa alina ohai kano mainoafe aepania havisagena tamakuamoma mai-falu hisia yana tamamigahue.
Tamakaya nagaiene ai-lokaetama vaiyesayana kana ohugahianagitama yoyo hutama vaiyegahae.”
Nago Sapati yupa Yisasiene agaiaene tokaeya nemaiya anagaaene nago atili hoya amunopi nevageno anagaamogamina amakategeya ani atilia kaleteya takiya ne-mainae.
Nenageya nagoa Falasia vayamoya amaketeya Yisasifena mage huya hae “Ago kagaienema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya Sapati yupama katile-malenaya yana ali haviya nehae.” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia mage huno hie “Tamakaya Tevitina agava huya umainaya vayaene amaka-te-mainea yamo kea hapalitama ohavinao?
Amakategeno Tevitia Anumaya Koti nopi hai-faleno ‘Afa vayamoya onesageya mono nopi kava vayamoya amakaiamige negahae.’ huya katile-malenaya maya Tevitia agaiaene tokaeya emainaya vayaenena ne-mainae.

Tamakaya kahegi kema kae-malenaya avopima hanea kea hapalitama ohavinao? Mage huno hu-maine mono note kava vayamoya mukia Sapati yupa aliyaamia nealiya Sapatimo kahegi kemona atagayayanagi Anumaya Kotia ‘Kefo ya haya vaya mainae.’ huno ohune.
Tamaha-pauve Anumaya Koti ala mono nomona agase-mainea kanoa nagainia ma mainoe.
Nayona Anumaya Koti autamafina mage huya kae-malenayane.
‘Nagaya Anumaya Kotina sipi sipia hetama kolama takiya nenamiya kavafena nonahaigena kalagi ai-ma-tesaya yafeke nenahaiye.’ huya kae-malenayane.
Kae-malenagi tamakaya ani kema havilamama hu-mainaleasina kefo yama ohunaya vayafena ‘Kefo ya nehae.’ hutama ohaleasine.
Ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea nafanemona Sapati yupa kava yagai-mainoe.” huno hu-maine.
Ani kumala neataleno mono nopi haino maine.

Maineno ageana nago kanoa aya avayu hu-lavi-mainea kanoa anile maine. Mainegeya nagoa vayamoya Yisasia havi kavama hisiafene huya ati neayeya Yisasife mage huya hae “Sapati yupa kali kanoa alino kanale hu-tesia yana kanale yano?” huya Yisasina havinegeya amata hu-mainae.
Yisasia mage huno hie “Nagola hana kanomoga afukama Sapati yupama komufi tavi-mainesigeka ago hevayu huka faitega ategano? E ania hugane.
Veamoya afua agaseya ala yaga mainaya yafenagiya kahegi kemoa ‘Sapati yupa kanale ya hu-ma-teho.’ huno hu-maine.”
Huteno ani ayama avayu hulavi-mainea kanomofe mage huno hapaiye “Kayana aipi huo.” huno higeno aipi hiana nago kaiyaga ayamoma hia kava huno kanale hu-maine.
Kanale hianagi Falasia vayamoya mono nopitila ataleteya hati-laviya melitalu huya huge havige huteya “Yisasina hanaa huta haesunageno falisie?” huya vege hu-mainae.
Yisasina haegahema huge havige haya kea ago haviteno ani kumala neataleno vigeya kasagoya veamoya akave vageno mukia kali veamogamina kaliamia alino kanale hu-ma-tene.
Hu-ma-teteno mage huno hie “Nagai aepaa veala hamaopaiho.” huno hie.
Mani kema hia kemofena nayona Aisaiyaa Anumaya Kotina aune kanomo hu-mainea kemoa falote huno tamage hie. Mage huno hu-maineane.

Anumaya Kotia mage huno hie ageho mani kanoa nagai aliya kano maisia yafe ago hapali-tenoe. Ani kanohena aluya huna musena nehuna nahau-mainea kanoe. Nagaya Avamunia amisugeno nagayama fatago huna yagai-matesua kehena mukia Yuta vea omainaya veala hama-paigahie.
Agaya kea ovaino ala kenake ohugahigi katega veamoya nagola agea ohavigahae.

Nagoma fagagi mainesia hopama alino kofa ohuno ania huno fulu fuluma hu-mainaya veamomogamina kayona oamamigahie. Asu hugahema hisia kanila asu ohuno ania huno fulu fuluma hu-mainaya veamomogamina kayona oamamigahianagino agaia fatago kavala huge huge hisiana ani fatago kavaamoa havi kavamona agaseno haigahie.
Haisiana muki mopale Yuta vea omainaya veamoya agai agihe haviya amakupi maleya amametiti hugahae.

Nago kanomona Kefo Avamumoa aguafi maineno aulaga alino asu huno avefuna alino ai-yahae higeno agea noaiyanagiya Yisasite avaleya ageno Yisasia ani Kefo Avamula anati-talegeno vigeno ani kanomoa aulaga age-gali huno ageteno agea aino kea kea hie.

Ani kava higeya alitalu hu-mainaya veamoya ageteya tusi amamayo ai-mainae. Amamayo aigeya mage hae “Mani kanomoa Tevitina aginagomo maineo? Anumaya Kotia taugafa ali-gatigahema hutea kano maineo?” huya hae.
Hageya Falasia vayamoya haviteya mage hae “Pielesepulia Kefo Avamuyagale kava hu-mainea kanomoa tokiyaa amigeno Kefo Avamumona anati-neatale.” huya hae.

Hageno Yisasia amakupi haviya amaku amakesa ago haviteno mage hie “Mukia nagoke kotega veamoya aye-fako huya tuma hisayana ani kotega veanene haviya hu-lavigahae. Nago kumate afamopina aye-fako huya ‘Alu vaya mainone.’ huya tuma hisayana ani kumaene afamoene haviya hu-lavigahae.
Satania agaia aliya Avamuyagamona anati-talesiana agaia nofi vayama aye-fako huya ‘Alu vaya mainone.’ huya hisayana Satania kava yagaisia tokiyaa hanaa huno hanegahie?

Nagaifena ‘Kagaya Pielesepulimo tokiyaleti anati-neatalane.’ hutama hayanagi tamakaitami anagatamimoa Kefo Avamula anati-talageno Pielesepulimo amakaila amaya nehio? Ani anagatamia amakaiami manima haya kea ali fako huya tamave-neliye.
Tamage nagaya Anumaya Koti Avamumo tokiyaleti ani Kefo Avamuyaga anati-neataloafe Anumaya Kotia kava yagaisia kanamoa tamakaitela ago emaine.

Nagola tokiyaage kanomoma nomaafima nago kanomoa musufa ya hugahe vinunoa hagoteno ani tokiya kanomona nofiteti ki-teteno afenoyamaa musufa yana hugahie. Nagaya ania hu-mainoafe Satanina agasena nofiteti ki-tetena agai Avamula ago anati-talenoe.
Nagoa veamoya nagai kanapa veane omaisayana kame vayania mainae. Sipi sipinima naya huya ali-taluma ohisaya veamoya amanati-neatalae.”

Naa hu-maineafe nagaya tamaha-nepauve mukia alu kefo ya alu kefo yaene hu-haviya hu-neataya yaene Anumaya Kotia aigeama-teno ani kefo yaamia atale-ma-tegahianagi nagoa veanemoya Alu aotage Avamumofema hu-haviya hu-tesayana Anumaya Kotia aigema-teno ani kefo yaamia atale-oama-tegahie.

Nagoa veamoya ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomonihema hu-haviya hu-natesayana Anumaya Kotia aigeama-teno ani kefo yaamia atale-ma-tegahianagi nagoa veamoya Alu Aotage Avamumofema hu-haviya hu-tesayana Anumaya Kotia aigeamateno ani kefo yaamia meni kanafiene haenagama falote hisia kanafiene agola atale-oama-tegahie.

“Kanale yosama hanesigenoa alagaamoenena kanaleya hugahie. Havi yosama hanesigenoa alagaamoenena haviya hugahie. Veamoya yosalaga ageteya kanale yosalaga hanesigeyahena ‘Kanale yosa hane.’ huya hugahae.
Tamakaya osifavemo nafaneyagamogatama havi vayalagitama hanaa hutama kanale kea hugahae? Veamoya amaku amakesafinaga havateteno ai-vali-lavi-mainea kea amavayafiti hu-falote nehae.
Fatago huya mainaya veamoya kanale amaku amakesa havilineya kanale kavala nehayanagi kefo yama nehaya veamoya havi amaku amakesa havi-lineya havi kavakeya nehae.
Nagaya tamaha-nepauve Anumaya Kotia veala kaiyekema hu-ma-teno ali fako hisia yupa mukia veamoya amakesa ohavi ke huya hu-haviya hu-ma-tenesaya kehena Anumaya Kotia hama-vi-gegahie.
Hu-mainesana keleti Anumaya Kotia kagaifena ‘Havi kavala ohunane.’ huno hu-ga-tegahianagi hu-mainesana keleti ‘Kefo ya hu-mainane.’ huno hu-ga-tegahie.”
Nagoa kahegi kema havilinaya anagaene Falasia vayaene Yisasife mage huya hae “Huma-ve-nelina kanomogae tokiya avame yana tavelio.” huya hae.

Hageno Yisasia mage huno hama-paiye “Ma kanafima mainaya veamoya tusiya huya havi veane mainae. Anumaya Kotina amakaveno hu-tenaya veane mainae. ‘Tokiyaage avame yana tavelio.’ hutama nehayanagi alu avame yana Anumaya Kotia otamamigahigi nagoke avame yake tama-ve-ligahie. Nayoma mainea Anumaya Koti aune kanoa Yonama hu-mainea avame yamaage tama-ve-ligahue.

Yonana ala noyamemoa asaga huno nakaigeno tagufa (3) kegeene felugaene aipafinaga mainea kava huna ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomona he-vai-natesagena tagufa (3) kegeene felugaene mopafinaga maigahue.

Ninive kumate mainaya veamogamina Yonaa Anumaya Koti kea hama-paigeya kefo yaamihena amaipa aiyahae hu-mainagi haviho menia Yonana agase-mainea kanoa ma mainegetama tamakaya kefo yatamihena tamaipa ai-yahae nohae. Tamaipa ai-yahae nohayafe Anumaya Kotia kaiyekema hu-lama-tesia kanamoa nayoma Ninive kumate mainaya veamoya hetiya menia ma kanafima mainaya veamoya kefo yama hu-mainaya yafena hu-falote hu-lama-tegahae.

Nagola alu haupalegati emainea sauve amoa mopamona atupaleti eno Solomonina kanale agu agesaene kanomo kea me havigahe emaine. Emaineanagi haviho Solomonina agase-mainea kanoa ma mainegetama tamakaya agai kea nohaviye. Nohaviyafe Anumaya Kotia kaiyekema hu-lama-tesia yupa ani amoa hetino menia ma kanafima mainetama kefo yama nehutama agai kema nohaviya yafena hu-falote hu-lama-tegahie.”
Nagola Kefo Avamumoa vaya aguafi haino maineleti ataleno viayamo hau hu-mainea kopinaga mo vaiyatete huno mai-faluma hisia kumafena ati yegeteana mai-falu hisia kumala oagene.
Oageno “Hagotena maigena emainoa agu nopi etena umaigahue.” huno huteno mogeana ani agu nopina vayala omaigeno ago sese huno kanale ya hu-malenegeno moge-maine.

Mogeteno eteno viayamo sevenia (7) kefo yaamimoma agase-mainaya Kefo Avamuyaga momavaleno egeya ani agu nopi hai-faleya mainageno hagoteno ani kanomoa nagoke Kefo Avamumo agu nopina mainegeno haviya huno maineanagino menia kasagoya Kefo Avamumo agu nopina haiya maigeno tusia kefo yatafa huno maine. Ani kavala menima mainetama kefo yama nehaya veamogatama hu-lama-tegahie huno hu-maine.
Yisasia mani kea veamogamina hama-nepaigeya itaamoene aganaamoyaene “Kea me hapaisune.” huya kumatega emainae.
Emainageno nago kanomoa Yisasife mage huno me hapaiye “Itakamoene kaganakamoyaene kea kaha-paigahe kumate me hetiya mainae.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia mage huno hie “Itanimoene nagananimoyaenena taya mainae?” huno havi-ge.
Havigeteno agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagatega ayana hagayu huno mage huno hie “Ageho itanimoya nagananimoya ma mainae.
Ikapinagama mainea Nenafana haiya kava huya avayama ali hipoya nehaya veamoya nagaila itanimoya nagananimoya nasanimoya mainae.” huno hu-maine.
Ani yupa Yisasia nopinagati hati-lavino tikotumo agegayalega mopale umaine.
Mopale mainegeya kasagoya veamoya agaitega melitalu huya yageyage haya yafe tipi kalefi hai-saga huno mainegeya yageyage haya veala ti agegayalega hetiya mainae.
Heti-mainageno Yisasia alu ke alu kea avame kefiti mage huno hama-pai-maine
“Nago kanomoa viti avina faigahe alino vie.
Viayamo ani avina alino ai-he-lafino nefaigeno nagoa avinamoa kapi tavino hanegeno namayagamoya nageno hano hie.
Nagoa avinamoa yafa mopafi taviteno osi mopa hanea yafe aupaa hage-maine.
Hagetegeno yagemoa hetino amuko-nako higeno hafuya omalea yafe fayoteno asagali-maine.
Nagoa avinayagamoa avetanafa ino hanea amunopi tavino hageanagi avetanafa hanea inoene tokaeno hageteno avetanafa inomoa ayetegeno haviya hu-maine.

Nagoa avinamoa kanale mopafi tavino hageteno alagaama ayeana nagoa yosalela tetia (30) alaga ayegeno nagoa yosalela sikisitia (60) alaga ayegeno nagoa yosalela kasagoya alaga vani hataletia (100) ayeno vasai-mai vasai-mai hu-maine.
Mani kea tamakesama hanesigetamahena havilama hutama haviho.” huno hie.
Agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya mage huya havigae “Naa higeka avame kefitila veamogamina hama-nepaine?” huya havigae.

Hageno Yisasia mage hie “Tamakaya Anumaya Kotia kava yagai-lama-teneanagitama falaki mainea kemona Anumaya Kotia tamaya higetama ago havi-linagi mukia veamoya avame kema hama-paisugeya amakesa havigahayanagi haviteya havilama huya ohavigahae.
Havilama huya havilinaya veamogamina Anumaya Kotia nagoene havisaya yana amamisigeya havilama huya havigahagi ‘Hai nehavune.’ huno hisaya veamogamina havilinayamaa hamanafalegahie.” huno hie.
Ani veamoya neagayanagi agelama huya oagegahae. Amakesa havigahayanagi haviteya havilama huya ohavisayafe avame kefiti hama-nepauve.
Ani kavama nehaya yafena Aisaiyaa Anumaya Koti aune kanomoa hu-mainea kemoa ago falote huno tamage hie. Mage huno hu-maineane
“Tamakaila tamakesamoa havime havime haigahianagi ani kemona aepaa havilama hutama ohavigahae. Tamaulagamoa ageme geme haigahianagi nago yana agelama hutama ohugahae.

Kemona aepaa ohavisaya yafe amaku amakesa omale veane mainae. Amakesamoa ani ke ohavisiafene huno amakesamoa tile-maine. Amaulagamoa ani yana oagesayafene huno ago asu hu-maine. Havigu ani kea haviya amakua ai-yahae huya nagaitega esagena ali hilato hu-lama-teyafene.” huno higeya kae-malenayane.
Anumaya Kotia tamakaila tamaulaga kanaleya hutama neagaya yaene tamakesama nehaviya yaene tamaminea yafena tusia muse hutama maiho.

Tamage huna tamaha-nepauve “Nayona mukia mainaya amaune vayaene fatago kavama hu-mainaya vayaene tamakayama neagaya yana ‘Agesune.’ huya hayanagi oagenae. Nehaviya kea ‘Havisune.’ huya hayanagi ohavinayane.” huno hama-pai-maine.
“Avina yama fai-malenea kanomo avame kemona aepaa hu-falote huna tamaha-paisue.
Kapima tavi-mainea avinamoa maa hu-maine nagoa veamoya Anumaya Koti kava yagai-latesia kea haviteya havilama ohageno Satania eno amakuafiti anima fai-malenea kea ali-talene.

Yafa mopafima tavi-mainea avinamoa maa hu-maine nagoa veamoya Anumaya Koti kea haviya muse huteya aupaa atafa hayanagi hafuya mopafi otavia yamoa alige atalege veane maineya osi kana kanoa osia haviya amakupi maletageya nagoa veamoya ani kea heya fala-negiya yafe havi kanamoma amakaite falote nehiana aupaa Anumaya Koti kea neatalae.

Avetanafa ino hanea amunopima tavi-mainea avinamoa maa hu-maine nagoa veamoya Anumaya Koti kea haviteya ma mopafi mukia yayagaamihena amakesa haviya moneamiene yokaloamienefe kalagi aigeno ani yayagamoa Anumaya Koti kea alino aiso hu-malegeya atalageno alagamoa aye he-lafino lama nohie.

Kanale mopafima tavi-mainea avinamoa maa hu-maine nagoa veamoya Anumaya Koti kea haviteya havilama hageno anifiti alaga mukia aye he-nelafie. Nagoa veamoya nagoke avina yosalela kasagoya vani hataletia (100) aye-maine. Nagoa veamoya nagoke avina yosalela sikisitia (60) alaga aye-maine. Nagoa veamoya nagoke avina yosalela tetia (30) alaga aye-maine.” huno hu-maine.
Yisasia nago avame kea mage huno hama-paiye. Anumaya Kotia kava yagai-lama-tesia yamoa maa hu-maine nago kanomoa kanale avina yana hoyaafina fai-malene.
Fai-malenegeya veamoya faeya mainageno kame kanomoa havi inomo alaga alino ani hoyafi ai-he-lafino umaine.
Utegeno haenaga ani viti alagamoa neayegeno havi ino talamoa anifiti hageno nagopi hai-mainae.
Haigeya aliya vayamoya hoyamona nefate mage huya mo hae “Ala kanomogae kanale avinama hoyakaafima fai-malananagi naa higeno havi ino talamoa anifitila falote nehie?” huya havigae.
Havigageno hoyamona nefaa mage huno hie “Nagola kame kanomo mani kavala me hu-malene.” huno higeya aliya vayamoya mage huya havigae “Tagaya kanale uta havi inona vakai-talesuno?” huya havigae.
Havigageno ani hoyamona nefaa mage hie “Aao, mo vakai-talesayana havigu kanale avinaene vakai-taleyafenagi ataleho.

Atalegeana nagopi tokaeana haneo. Kavema afule yupa hoya aliya vayania mage huna hama-paigahue ‘Hagotetama ino talana hakaitama atafi kaesayafe haya kitetama nemaletama anile kanale avinamo yosaa alitalu hutama kave noniafi maleho.’ huna hugahue.” huno hu-maine.

Yisasia nagola avame kea hama-paino mage huno hie “Anumaya Koti kava yagai-lamatesia yamoa maa hu-maine nago kanomoa masatati avina alino hoyafi fai-malene. Ani yosamo avina kanoa oagemo avina kanoa haneanagino mukia alu alagayagamoya ani alaga kanoa agasageno osi hu-maine.

Nago kanomoa ani avina kanoa alino hoyafi fai-malegeno hageno ala huteno mukia hoyafima hanea yosayaga agaseno yosa haigeya namayagamoya me kale-maineya ani yosamo akopale noamia kigahae.” huno hu-maine.

Yisasia nago avame kea mage huno hama-paiye “Anumaya Kotia kava yagai-lama-tesia yamoa kai-hamema hale-negia avamete hu-maine. Nago amoa ani kai-hamema halegisia yana alino talia (3) ala yopafi tanefa falauvaene ali havigu higeno haenagaa mukia tanefa palauvamoa halegi-maine.” huno hie.
Yisasia melitalu haya veamogamina mukia kema hama-paiya kea avame kegeya hama-nepaino nagola kea hu-falote huno hamaopaine.
Ani kavama hia yafena nagola Anumaya Koti aune kanomoa hu-mainea kemoa ago falote huno tamage hie. Ani kea mage huno hu-maineane
“Nagaya avame kea hu-falote nehuna nayoma ma mopama taloma hu-malenea kanaletima fala-ki-mainea kea menia hama-paigahue.” huno hu-maineane.

Yisasia anima melitalu hu-mainaya veala amataleno nopinaga vigeya agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya mage huya me hae “Havi inomoma hoyafima falote nehia avame kemona aepaa hu-halegeta havimano.” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia kenonaamia mage huno hie “Kanale avinama fai-malenea kanoa ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanoa nagaya mainoe.
Mukia ma mopa ani hoyae. Anumaya Kotife ‘Kava yagai-lato.’ huya nehaya veala ani kanale avina mainae. Satani kema akave nemalaya veala havi ino mainae.
Kame kanoa havi inoma fai-malenea kanoa Satanie. Kavema afulesia yupa ma mopama hano hisia kanae. Mani hoyafi aliya vayala Anumaya Kotina ensole vayaae.
Ani havi inoma alitalu huya mukia atafi kae-talesaya yana ma mopama hano hisia yupa ania hugahae.

Ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natena kanomonia ensole vayania hu-ma-tesugeya mukia veamoya neamafugamina ‘Kefo kava hiho.’ huya ali haviyama hu-mainesaya veanene Anumaya Koti kema ali-tagae-mainesaya veanene Anumaya Kotia kava yagai-mainea yapitila amavaleya hagayu hu-talegahae.
Ala atagefafi hagayu hu-ma-talegahae. Ani atamoa teno neamasagalisigeya amakata yana nealiya avovo huya avi neateya amave kemoa hugahae.
Havi veanea atafina kaegahayanagi fatago amaku amakesaene veala Neamafaa kava yagai-mainea kumatela hai-faleya maineya yagemoma aye halea kava hugahae. Agesama hanesia kanomoa havilama huno havisie.”
