Anumaya Kotia kava yagai-mainea yamoa maa hu-maine nagola mone keayola hoyafi he-vai-malenaya avamete hu-maine. He-vai-malenegeno nago kanomoa mopafiti moli-falote huteno eteno anifi he-vai-maleteno tusi muse huno aupaa “Ma mopa miya hisugeno nagai ya hapaesie.” huno mukia afenoyamaa moli meli huno monea aliteno ani mopa miya hu-maine.

Anumaya Kotia kava yagai-mainea yamoa maa hu-maine. Nago kanomoa kitana kana yafena atiyege yegeteno nagola miyamoa hai-mainea kitana kana yana alino falote hu-maine. Higeno “Ala mone namio.” huno higeno mukia afenomaa moli meli huno mukia yamaa ataleteno monea alino ani kitana kana yana miya hu-malene.
Nago kene hugahue. Anumaya Kotia kava yagai-mainea yamoa maa hu-maine nagola noyame kukonagoma ti kotupima hagayu hu-talegenoa alu noyamea alu noyamea hagagino fale-mainea avamete hu-maine.
Ani kukonagopina hiya higeya ti agegayalega he-vayu huya maleneya kanale noyameyaga yopafi yogiya nemaleya havi noyamea aliya hagayu hu-neatalae.
Ma mopama hano hisia yupa ani kava hugahae. Ensole vayamoya kefo yama hu-mainesaya veanene fatago kavama hu-mainesaya veanene amunopiti ali fako hugahae.
Huteya ani kefo veala amavaleya tusia ata nelesia atafi hagayu hu-talesageno atamoa teno neamasagalisigeya amakata aisigeya avovo huya amave kemo nehuya avitegahae.
Yisasia mage huno hama-vige “Tamakaya mani kemona aepaa havilinafi ohavinae?” huno higeya “E, havilinone.” huya hae.

Hageno mage huno hama-paiye “Tamakaya mono kea havilinaya vayamogatama menia nagai kea nehaviya veane mainagi ania hutama nayoma Anumaya Koti kea hu-mainaya kene menima tamaha-nepauva kea Anumaya Kotia kava yagai-lama-tesia kenena havitetama ala afeno nomona nefaa atafa kanale yaene haegafa kanale yaene nopiti alino neamamia avamete hutama atafa kene yaufa kene hu-haletama hiho.”
Yisasia ani avame kea hu-hano huteno ani kumala ataleno umaine.

Uteno ko aepaalega Nasaleti uvayi huno mono nopi haino Anumaya Koti kea hama-paigeya mukia veamoya atali talu huteya mage hae “Mani kea haviyaami hanea vayamogami avamete kea mukia hanateti alia ke nehie? Ayapitima tokiyaa avame yama hu-mainea tokiyaa hanateti ali-maine?
Mani kanoa noma negia kanomo nafaneo? Malia nafaneo? Yemesiene Yosefeene Saimoniene Yutasienena aganaamoya mainao?
Mukia asaamoya tagaiene nagopi mainagi agaya mukia tokiya yana hanateti ali-maine.” huya hae.

Huteya amaipa kafa heteya amakaveno hu-tageno Yisasia mage huno hie “Anumaya Koti kema nehisia kanomoa mukia kumatema mono kema hama-paisiana agia alisaga hugahayanagi agaia afamoene no kumaale veanenena agia alisaga ohugahae.” huno hu-maine.
Higeno agaife haviya amakupi maleya amametitima ohaya yafe ani kumatela kasagoya tokiya avame yana ohune.
Ani kanafina Helotia sauve kanogino Yisasia mukiama hu-mainea kavamona avagea havimaine.
Haviteno Helotia agaia aliya vayaahe mage huno hie “Ma kanoa Yonie, tima fale-neama-tea kanoa, fali-mainefitila ago heti-maineafe ayapitila tokiyaage avame yana nehie.” huno hie.

Helotina aganaamo agia Filipie. Filipi amo agia Helotiasie. Helotia Helotiasina kumai a ali-tenea yafe Yonia Helotife mage huno hie “Anumaya Koti kea ali-tagaeka ali-tenane.” huno hu-mainea yateti Helotia Yonina atafa huno tokiya nofiteti nofi kiteteno kina nopi hu-tene.
Nofi huteteno Helotia Yonifena “Haesugeno falisie.” huno hianagi mukia veamogamife koli hu-maine. Ani veamoya Yonifena “Aune kano maine.” huya haya yafe ohaene.

Ohaenegi nago yupa, Helotina atenea kanahe, huya muse hu-taya yupa nagoa veamoya Helotiene melitalu hu-mainageno Helotiasina munaamoa mukia veamogami amunopi amoa aye-maine. Neayegeno anima ayea yafena Helotia tusiya huno musena hu-maine.
Nehuno ani munafena mage huno hie “Nagaya tamage Anumaya Koti aulagafi kaha-nepauve kahaisia yafena hisanagena afaa kamigahue.” huno hu-maine.
Higeno ani munamona itaamoa nagoa agu agesa amiteno mage huno hie “Yonia ti fale-neama-tea kanomo ageya fakalika agenopaa ai-fakalika yopafi maleteka me namio.” huno hie.

Higenoa ala sauve kanomo aipamoa tusia kanaage higeno Anumaya Koti aulagafima huno lokiya vai-malea yafeene mainaya vayaamofeene agesa haviteno aliya vayaahe mage hie “Ani munamo kea ali hipoya hiho.” huno hu-maine.
Huteno aliya vayaa hu-mategeya kina nopinaga Yonina ageya mo fakali-talenae.
Fakaliteya hatagama haya anumaa yopafi maleteya ani munala aliya memigeno itaamotega alino umaine.
Yoni anagamoya augafaa me hipoya huya mo he-vai-teteya Yisasina mo hapai-mainae.
Hapaigeno Yisasia ani kea haviteno tipi kalefi haisaga hu-maino kame kotega umaine. Vigeya mukia veamoya ani kea haviteya kumaamileti mopafi akave uya anile umainae.
Yisasia tipi kalefiti hati-lavino ti agegayalaga maineno ageana kasagoya melitalu hu-mainaya veamogamina amaketeno kalagi ai-mateno kali nealiya veala alino kanale hu-ma-tene.

Une kigeya agaiene tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya agaite mage huya me hae “Tagaya vaya omai kaiyaga mainonanagino hani-kisia yafe mukia veamogamina hu-ma-tesanageya kumama hanesilega ute ete huya nesaya kavela miya hisae.” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia mage huno hama-paiye “Naa hinageya ugahae? Tamakaitami kavela amamiho.” huno hie.
Higeya mage hae “Tagaipina osi kave kanoa hane faefua (5) mayaene tole noyame kanoagi huno hane.” huya hae.
Hageno “Ani kavela alitama eho.” huno hu-maine.

Huteno Yisasia mage hie “Mukiamogatama alitalu hute hute hutama apete mopale maiho.” huno higeya mopale mainageno Yisasia faefua (5) mayaene tole noyamene alino ikapinaga age-saga huno Anumaya Kotitega huno muse huteno ani maya kolino agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagaa amamigeya mukia veala amamite amamite hu-mainae.
Hageya mukia nageno amamu higeya atalaya atupa-tapaa aliya tuelufua (12) kula ai-hava-te-mainae.
Kavema naya vayayaga faefu tausenia (5,000) vemoya ne-mainae. Ne-mainagi ane nafaneamia ohapalinae. Ohavunamaa ane nafanene ne-mainae.

Netageno Yisasia agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagamogamina mage huno hama-paiye “Tamakaya nagaila nataletama tipi kalefi haisaga hu-maitama atu kaiyaga hagotetama utegena nagaya veala hu-ma-tesugeya viho.”
Hu-ma-tegeya utageno agaiage Anumayamotega havigegahe agoyafi haino agaiage mainegeno hani-ki-maine.
Hani-ki-geno tipi kalea ti amunopi utegeno yasimoa aulegati eno ani lipi kalea molino mo ai-yahae me ai-yahae hu-maine.
Koti avametega Yisasia timo agupile aiya aiyeme aiyeme tipi kalema hanelega umaine.
Nevigeya ani anagamoya Yisasia ti agupilema aiya ayeme ayeme eayana ageteya tusia amamayo aiteya mage hae “Hakalo neefi?” huya “Avovo.” hae.
Avovo nehageno aupaa Yisasia mage huno hie “Kolia ohutama maiho. Nagaya neogi tokiyaage hutama maiho.” huno hie.
Higeno Pitaa kenonaa mage huno hie “Anumayamogae kagayama mainenuka nagaifena ‘Timo agupile kaiya ayeme yeme eno.’ huka hugena vano.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia Pitafe mage hie “Kagaya elavika eno.” huno hapaigeno Pitaa tipi kalefitila hati-lavino timo agupile aiya ayeme yeme Yisasitega ugahe hie.
Ugahe hianagi ala yasimoma tokiyaage huno eayate ageteno koli huno tipi hapanesia ya huteno mage hie “Anumayamogae naugafa ali-gatio.” huno hie.

Higeno aupaa Yisasia ayana hagayu huno Pitana atafa huteno mage huno hie “Kagaya nagaifena havika osi kanoa kagupina maleka kametitia hu-mainana kanomogae naa higeka tole kagesa nehavine?” huno hu-maine.
Naa huteana tipi kalefi haisaga hu-maiageno yasimoa taga hu-maine.
Taga higeya tipi kalefima mainaya vayamoya Yisasife muse huya agia alisaga huya mage hae “Tamage kagaya Anumaya Koti nafane mainane.” huya hu-mainae.
Ani ti kotumona takaeya Kenesale kotega uvayi hu-mainae.
Vigeya ani kumate veamoya Yisasina age-lama huya ageteya alu kumate kumate ke huya mage hae “Kali veala amavaletama eho.” huya hageya kali veala amavaleya Yisasite emainae.
Kali nealiya veamoya emaineya Yisasife mage huya havigae “Kenakamo atupalekeya avate hisune.” huya nehuya avate hu-mainaya veamogamina kalimoa kanale hu-ma-tene.

Ani yupa nagoa Falasia vayaene kahegi kema havilinaya anagaene Yelusalemuti Yisasite eya mage huya hae “Naa higeya kagaienema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya taginagomogami kea ali-tagaeya kavema negahena amayana sese nohae?” huya havigae.
Hageno Yisasia kenonaamia mage hie Naa higetama tamakinagomogami auavala akavema malaya yafe Anumaya Koti kahegi kea ago neatagayae?
Anumaya Kotia agaia autamafina mage huno hu-maineane.
“Tamakaya itatami afotamimogami amakia alisaga nehutama keamia veganokano ohutama amaiyaafinaga maiho. Nago kanomoga itakafokamona kamugema vaitenukahena faligane.” huno hu-maineane.

Hu-maineanagi tamakaya mage hutama nehae “Nago kanomoa itaafoamogani anaya hisia monema hanesigenoma itaafoamoganima anaya ohinunoa mage huno hisie ‘Ani monea Anumaya Kotina amisua yane huna hu-mainoe.’ huno hinunoa nefana aya huno agia alisaga ohisie.” hutama nehae. Ani ke nehutama tamakinagomogami auavala akavema malaya yafe “Anumaya Koti kea afa ya kana nehie.” nehutama alitama neatagayae.
Tamakaya vagala vaya mainae. Aisaiyaa Anumaya Koti aune kanomoa tamakaifena tamage huno Anumaya Koti autamafina mage huno hu-maineane
“Ani nofi veamoya amavayaleti nagai nagia alisaga nehagi amakuamoa aluale hanegeya ani kavala nehae.
Ma mopafi veamoya malenaya kahegi kehena ‘Mamona Anumaya Koti ke hanegi akave maleho.’ huya nehayanagi nagai nagia alisaga nehayanagi afa kava maiya nehae.” huno kae-maleneane.
Yisasia agaite esae huno kasagoya veamogamifena ke higeya ageno mage huno hie “Tamakaya mani kea havilama hutama haviho.
Nagola tamavayafima nesaya yamoa tamakuamona alino oniyaagela ohugahigi tamavayafitima hati-lavisia yamo ali-falote hisigeno tamakuamoa oniyaagela hugahie.” huno hu-maine.
Higeya agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya Yisasife mage huya hae “Falasia vayamoya ani kea haviteya amaipa kafa he-gataya kea ago havimainano?” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia mage huno hama-paiye “Ikapinaga mainea Nenafaa okalinesia yana agaia mevakaino hafuyaene tagasi hugahie.

Tamakaya mani vayafena tamakesa ohaviho. Amaulaga asu hu-mainea vaya mainae. Nagoma aulaga asu hu-mainea kanomoa nago aulaga asu hu-mainea afaluamona avaleno vaiyesiana tolemogania komufi asaga hu-lavigae.” huno hie.
Higeno Pitaa Yisasife mage hie “Kagaya mani avame kemo aepaa hugeta havimano.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia mage huno hie “Tamakaya meni kanaene havilama ohunetama nehao?
Tamakaya ohavinao? Mukia yama tamavayafi nageno tamakuafina ounogi tamaipafike taviteno haenagaa aifayolagafi tavino afa ya kana nehie.
Afa ya kana nehianagi nago yana tamavayafitima hati-lavia kemoa tamakupiti falote huno tamakuamona alino oniyaagela nehie.

Tamakuafinagati efalote hia yana maa huno falote nehie kanale ohu tagu tagesa nehavuna yaene vaya he-fali kavaene alu kanomo ane avayu hu yaene ane munanele kumai he yaene musufaya hu yaene havige hu-ma-te yaene kamuge vai-ma-te yaene taguafitila ali falote nehie.
Naama haya yafe tamakupina oniyaagela tamahau-mainegi veamoya amayama sese ohuya kavema naya yamoa amakupina oniyaagela ohugahie.” huno hu-maine.
Yisasia nemaiya kumala ataleno Taiya kotegaene Saitoni kotegaene umaine.

Umainegeno nagola anile mainea Kenani amoa, Yuta vea omainea amoa, agaife ke huno mage me hie “Ala kanomogae, Tevitina aginagomoga, nagaila kahau hunato. Kefo Avamumoa nagai munala aguafi faleno maineno tusi havi kava hu-nea-te.” huno hie.

Higeno Yisasia nagola osi ke kanoa ohunegi agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya agaife mage me hae “Ani amoa tagai takave neeno tusiya huno keha keha nehuno tutu nehigi kagaya hu-tegeno vino.” huya hae.
Yisasia mage hie “Isalelima vayagi-mainea sipi sipileke Anumaya Kotia hu-na-tegena emainoe.” huno hie.
Higeno ani amoa Yisasi aiyafi aleya meye-maineno mage huno hie “Ala kanomogae naya huo.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia mage huno hie “Havigu nafaneyagamogami kave hama-faleya kalamogami amamisagi nagaya Isaleli veala amatalena alu vayane amaya hisuana haviya hugahie.” huno hie.

Higeno ani amoa mage huno hie “Ala kanomogae tamage nehananagi kalamogamina neamafaya nenageya kalamoya sipaletima asaga hu-lavia atupaa yogiya nenae. Kagaya ani kava huka nagaya Isaleli a omainogi osia nahamao.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia mage hie “Amogae tusiya huka nagaifena havika kagupi maleka kametiti hanafe nahavigana yana kamigahue.” huno nehigeno ani kana kanoale munaamona kanale hu-tene.
Yisasia ani kumala ataleno Kalili ti kotumo agegayalega uteno nago agoyafi haino mopale maine.

Mainegeya kasagoya veala agaite melitalu nehuya aiya avayu hu-mainea veanene aiya aya haviya hu-mainea veanene amaulaga asu hu-mainea veanene age tagane-mai veanene nagoa kali veanene amavaleya Yisasina aiyafi mematageno alino kanale hu-ma-tene.

Kanale hu-ma-tegeya mukia veala agayana higeya tusia amamayo ai-mainae. Age tagane-mai veamoya kaiyeke hageya amaiya amayamo kayagi-mai veamogamina amaiya amayamoa kanale higeya amaiya haviya hu-mainea veamogami amaiyamoa kanale higeya nevageya amaulaga asu hu-mainea veamogami amaulagamoa kanale higeya amaulaga age-mainae. Naama haya yate ageteya Isaleli veamogami Anumaya Koti agia alisaga hu-mainae.

Yisasia agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagafe ke higeya ageno mage hie “Mani veamoya talia (3) yupa nagaiene mainageno nesaya kaveamia omalea yafe nahau hu-neama-toe. Havigu amatalesugeya katega nevisageno amakatesigeya amaugetunatu huya takatiyafena nonahaiye.” huno hie.
Higeya agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya mage huya hapaiye “Mani kotega vaya omai kotegagi hanateti kosa hesia maya alita ani veanea amamisune?” huya havigae.
Hageno Yisasia mage huno hama-vige “Tamakaya namagi maya hane?” huno higeya mage hae “Tagaya sevenia (7) mayaage hanegi nagola osi noyame kanoa hane.” huya hapaiye.
Hageno Yisasia mukia veafena “Mopale maiho.” huno hama-paigeya mopale mainae.
Mopale mainageno Yisasia ani sevenia (7) mayaene noyamene alino Anumayamotega muse huno havigeteno kolite kolite huno agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagala amamigeya mukia veamogamina amaminae.
Amamigeya mukia veala nageno amamu higeya atalaya maya atupayaga agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya alitalu huteya sevenia (7) kupi ai-hava-te-mainae.
Ani kavema ne-mainaya venenea fo tausenia (4,000) vemoya ne-mainae. Nafaneyagaamiene aneyagaamiene nayanagi ohapalinae.
Netageno Yisasia hu-mategeya utageno agaia tipi kalefi haisaga hu-maino Magatana kaiyaga umaine.
Falasia vayaene Satiusi vayaene Yisasina meye-vataga hisayafe mage huya me hae “Kagaya ikapinagati tokiya avame yana hugeta agamano.” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia mage huno hie “Unena tamakaya mage nehae ‘Ikamoa haesa hianagino ega kanale yage falote hugahie.’ hutama nehae.

Natepiti hetitama mage nehae siamoa okomaage huno ikamoa ai-haesa hianagino ‘Menia yasimoene komoene falote hugahie.’ hutama nehae. Tamage tamakaya ikana neagetama ‘Naa hugahie.’ hutama fako nehayanagi meni kanafima falote hia yana age-lama hutama noagae.

Tamakaya meni kanafima mainaya veamogatama tusiya hutama kefo veane mainae. Anumaya Kotina tamakaveno hu-neataya veane mainae. Tamakaya ‘Tokiya avame yana hugeta agamano.’ hutama nagaifena hayanagi nagaya nago avame yana ohugahuanagi Yonama hu-tenea tokiya avame yamaage tamave-ligahie.” huno huteno Yisasia amataleno umaine.
Yisasienema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya tikotuna lakaeya vayana amake-kaniya nagoa maya oaliya umainae.

Oaliya vageno Yisasia mage huno hama-paiye “Tamakaya Falasia vayamoyaene Satiusi vayamoyaene amakupi hanea yana age-lama ohuya amavayaleti havigema nehaya yana kai hame hale-negia avamete huno halegino alakefa hisia yafena kaye ho.” huno hie.
Higeya ani vayamoya amakaiami huge havige huya mage hae “Tagaya maya oalita emainona yafe nehie.” huya amakaiami hae.

Hayanagi Yisasia ani vayamoya haya kea ago haviteno amakaife mage hie “Naa higetama ‘Kavetia alita omenone.’ hutama tamakaitamia huge havige nehae. Tamakaya nagaifena osi kanoa havitama tamakupi maletama tamametitia hu-mainae.
Tamakesa omalegetama havilama nohao? Faefua (5) mayama faefu tausenia (5,000) vemoya ne-mainaya yafena tamakesa nohavio? Netagetama namagi kupi atalaya maya atupayaga ai-mainone hutama nohavio?
Tamakaya sevenia (7) maya kanoa fo tausenia (4,000) vemoya netagetama namagi kupi aitama havate-mainone hutama tamakesa nohavio?

Nagaya mayahena tamaha-opainogi. Naa higetama ohavinae? Tamakaya Falasia vayaene Satiusi vayaene amakusafinaga hanea yana agelama ohuneya amavayaleti havigema nehaya yana kai hamemo hale-negia avamete huno halegino alakefa hia yafena kaye ho.” huno hu-maine.
Mani kema higeya haviyana Yisasia afaa “Kai hame maya hale-negia yafe tamaugafa kaye ho.” huno ohunegi agaya “Falasia vayaene Satiusi vayamoya nehaya kehe kaye ho.” huno hu-maine.

Yisasia Sisalia Filipai kaiyaga uvayi huno agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagafe mage huno hama-vige “Veamoya nagaifena, ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomonihena tae huya nehae?” huno hama-vige.

Hamavi-gegeya kenonaa mage huya hae “Nagoa vayamoya kagaifena Yonie, ti fale-neamatea kano, maine huya hageya nagoa veamoya kagaifena Ilaiya maine huya hageya nagoa veamoya Yelemaiya maine huya hageya nagoa veamoya nayo Anumaya Koti aune kanoa fali-mainea kano maine huya nehae.” huya hapai-mainae.
Hapaigeno Yisasia amakaifena mage huno hama-vige “Tamakaya nagaifena tae hutama nehae?” huno hamavi-ge.
Hamavi-gegeno Saimoni Pitaa mage huno hie “Kagaya Kalaisigae, Anumaya Kotima taugafa ali-gatigahe hu-ga-tenea kano mainane. Haimuaene mainea Anumaya Koti neamoga mainane.” huno hie.

Higeno Yisasia Pitafena mage huno hapaiye “Saimonigae, Yona nafanemoga, mani kea hanafe Anumaya Kotia muse hisana yana kamine. Nagola ma mopafi kanomoa ani yana kaveotinegi ikapinaga mainea Nenafa kave-li-maine.

Nagaya kaha-nepauve kagaya Pitagae ani kagimo aepaa yafamogae. Kagaya yafa kana nehananagina nagaya mukia amakua naminaya veala mani yafamo agupile no kana huna ki-malenesugeya vayama hamae-nefalisaya tokiyaamia anima ki-malesua nona alino haviya ohugahie.

Nagaya Anumaya Kotima kava yagai-mainea kumama yakisana ki nofila kamigahue. Kagaya ma mopafi maineka ‘Ma yana atafa hutama tokiya vaiho.’ huka hisanana Anumaya Kotia agaienena ikapinaga ‘Ani yana atafa hu-liho.’ huno hugahie. Kagaya ma mopafi nago yafema ‘Afaa ataleho.’ hukama hisanana Anumaya Kotia agaienena ikapinaga ania hugahie.” huno hie.

Yisasia agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagafe tokiyaage ke huno mage hie “Tamakaya nagoa veala nagaifena ‘Kalaisie, Anumaya Kotima taugafa aligatigahe hutenea kanoa ma maine.’ hutama hama-opaiho.” huno hu-maine.

Ani yupa Yisasia agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagafena haenagama falote hisia yamofe aepa heno amave-li-maine. Mage huno hie “Nagaya Yelusalemu visugeya ala vayaene mono note kava vayaene kahegi kema havilinaya anagaene tusia nagata aisia kava hu-nateteya nahaesagena faligahue. Falisugeya komufi he-vai-natesagena tole yupa maina tagufa kanale fali-mainesufitila hetigahue.” huno hu-maine.
Higeno Pitaa Yisasina faitega avaleno moteneno aepa heno Yisasife mage hie “Anumaya Kotia ani kavala ohisaya amaku amakesa amamisie. Anumayanimogae kagaila ani kavala hu-okatesae.” huno hie.

Higeno Yisasia mai-yahae huno Pitafena mage huno hie “Satanigae mai halenato kagaya nagai nagua ali haviya hugahe nehanagi kagaya Anumaya Koti havimainea aguagesa kanaleya huka nohavinagi vayamoya kaha-paiya amaku amakesa nehavine.” huno hie.

Yisasia agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagafena mage huno hama-paiye “Nagoa veamoya nagai nakavema visaya amakesa havinuyahena amaugafama aliya hai yana amakaveno hu-teteya nagaima nagata aisigena falisua kava hisaya amakesa haviteya yafaga yosa kofiya nakave aliya visae.

Nagoa veamoya maiyaamima atafa huya ali-talakoma hu-lisayana maiyaamimoa falino afaya hapaegahigi nagoa veamoya nagaifema hamainageya maiyaamima atalesaya veamoya maiyaamia ali-gatisugeya agola aliya maigahae.

Nagoa veamoya mukia ma mopafi mone afenoyayaga aliteya maineya falisayana agola maige maige hisaya haimula ago atalenayanagiya ali-mainaya mone afenoamimoa hanaa huno amaya hugahie? Aao amaya ohugahie.

Nagaya ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomonia Nenafaa tokiya hale yamaaene Anumaya Kotina ensole vayaamoyaene etena esua kanafina mukia veamoya ma mopalema hu-mainesaya yateti anonaa amamigahue.

Tamage-lafa huna tamaha-nepauve nagoa veala malema hetiya mainaya veala aupaa ofaligahayanagiya hagoteya nagaya ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomonina Anumaya Kotia kava yagai-mainea yapi mainena esugeya nagegahae.” huno hu-maine.
Yisasia sikisia (6) kana maiteno Pitana Yemesina Yonigamina amavaleno ayaaya agoyafi hai-mainae.
Haiya mainageno Yisasina augosamoa alino alu augosa kaligeno augosafitila yage kana huno ai-vasa nehigeno kenaamoa efeage huno alave alave hu-maine.
Ageho tole kanolana nayoma fali-mainaa kanolana Moseseene Ilaiyaene Yisasiene kea kea nehae.

Nehaageno Pitaa Yisasife mage hie “Anumayamogae tagaya male maunana kanaleya hie. Kahaisigekahena katega nona talia (3) ki-lama-tesue kagaila nagolagi Mosesena nagolagi Ilaiyana nagolagi huno hanesie.” huno hie.

Ani kea hanepaigeno nagola hale yamaaene siamoa evayi huno alino aiso hu-mategeno siapinagati ala kefiti age aino mage huno hie “Mani kanoa nagai nafanegi nahau nayamopafi nenagea kanogi agaifena aluya huno nenahaigi agai kea haviho.” huno hie.
Higeya agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya koli huya amamayo aigeya mopafi amakoya aiye-mainae.
Amakoya aiyeya mainageno Yisasia avate eno mage hie “Kolia ohiho. Hetiho.” huno hu-maine.
Higeya age-saga huya agayana Yisasia agaiage mainegeya age-mainae.

Ageteya agoyafiti enelaviya Yisasia kahegi mateno mage huno hie “Anima agaya yafena nagoa veanea hamaopainegena ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomona fali-mainesufiti hetisua yupa hama-paigahae.” huno hie.

Higeya agaiaenema lokaeya nemaiya anagamoya mage huya havigae “Naa higeya kahegi kema havilinaya anagamoya ‘Ilaiyaa hagoteno neesigeno Anumaya Kotia taugafa ali-gatisia kanoa egahie.’ huya nehayane?” huya havigae.
Havigageno Yisasia mage huno hie “Tamage Ilaiyaa hagoteno egahianagino mukia yana alino kanaleya huno talo tala hugahie.

Hugahianagi tamaha-nepauve Ilaiyaa ago emaineanagi agaila age-lama ohuya hamaiya kava huya agaila havi kava hu-tenaya kavala ania huya ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomonina ali haviya hu-natesageno naugafa nagata aigahie.” huno hie.
Mani kema hiana “Yonia tima fale-neamatea kanomofe hie.” huya hu-mainae.
Yisasiene agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya mukia veala melitalu huya mainale evayi hageno nago kanomoa Yisasite mepe hu-maine.
Yisasifena mage huno hie “Anumayamogae kagaya nenafanenimona kahau huto. Ani nafanenia mananiya neagegeno augafamona ali haviya nehigeno mukia yupa ata tanekino tipi asaga hu-nelavino nehie.
Naa nehigena kagaiene tokaeya nemaiya anagakamogamite avalena oana aliya kanale hu-tesaya amukoamia omalene.” huno hie.

Higeno Yisasia mage huno hama-paiye “Vae tamakaya meni kanafima mainaya veamogatama nagaifena havitama tamakupi maletama tametitia ohutama fatago hutama nomaiye. Ania haya yafe kasalo nenahaegi namagi yupa tamakaienena mainesugetama nagaifena havitama tamakupina malegahae? huno nehuno ani nafanemo nefafe ‘Nafanekaa avaleka eno.’ huno hie.
Higeno avaleno egeno Yisasia anima agupi mainea Kefo Avamufena ke-makino ‘Ataleka hati-lavio.’ huno hutegeno hati-lavigeno aupaa ani nafanemona kanale hu-tene.”
Yisasiene tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya amakaiamige Yisasite mage huya me havigae “Tagaila naa higeno Kefo Avamuma anatisuna amukotia omale?” huya havigae.

Hageno Yisasia mage huno hama-paiye “Nagaifema havitama tamakupi maletama tamametiti haya yatamimoa osi hu-mainea yafe ani kava hisaya amukotamia omalene. E, nagaya tamage-lafa huna tamaha-nepauve tamakaya osi kanoa oagemo avina kanoa Masatati avinamoma hia kava hutama nagaifena havitama tamakupi malaleasina ma agoyamofena mage hutama hapaisagenoa ‘Hetika alule vuo.’ hisagenoa ani agoyamoa agola vileasine. Nagaifema havitama tamakupi malesayana tamakaya nago aliyafena ‘Amuha ohunone.’ hutama ohugahagi mukia tokiya kavala iohugahae.” huno hu-maine.

Kalili kotega alitalu huya mainageno Yisasia agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagafe mage huno hama-paiye “Osi kanaa maitesugeno nago kanomoa nagesi huno ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomonina kame vayamogami amayapi navaleno nategahie.

Natesigeya nahaesagena falisugeya he-vaina-tesagena tole yupa komufi maitena tagufa (3) molisia kanale etena he-tigahue.” huno higeya ani kehena agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya havigeno kanaage hamau-maine.

Nago yupa Yisasiene agaiene tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya Kapaneamu evayi hageya mono noma ali fatago hisaya monea vaya amaugafaleti takesi nealiya vayamoya Pitate mage huya me havigae “Tamakaila hu-lamave-nelia kanomoa ani mono note monea neataleo.” huya hae.

Hageno Pitaa mage hie “E, ani monea neatale.” huno nehuno nopinaga hai-falegeno Yisasia hagoteno mage huno havige “Saimonigae naane kagesa nehavine. Ma mopale sauve vayamoya vaya amaugafaleti takesi monea aliya tagami neamamiye? Mukia amakaiami kotega vayateti nealio ifi alu vayamogamiteti nealiyo?” huno havige.

Havigegeno Pitaa mage huno hie “Alu vayatetila afaa nealiye.” huno higeno Yisasia mage hie “Tamage hane. Ania huya amakaiami kotega vayamogami amaugafaletila takesi noaliye. Ania huta lagaya Anumaya Koti anaga mainonagi tagaitetila takesia oalisae.

Oaligahayanagi havigu naa hisunageyahena amaipamoa haviya hugahayanagika kagaya ti kotute visanaamoga noyame hukua atalesanageno tavisigeka hagote noyamema avayuma hinuka avaya ali aka hu-lineka nagola monea agegane. Ani monea alika ani vayala memamisanageya tolemogatia taaugafaleti takesi monea aligahae.” huno hu-maine.
Ani yupa Yisasiene tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya Yisasite mage huya me havigae “Hana kanomo muki vayala amakaseno Anumaya Koti kava yagai-mainea kumatela uhakote-mainea kanoa maigahie.” huya havigae.
Havigageno Yisasia nago osi nafanea ke higeno egeno mukia vayamogami amunopi avaleno he-ti-tene.

He-ti-teneno mage huno hie “Nagaya tamage-lafa huna tamaha-nepauve tamakayama tamakua ai-yahae hutama nafanemoyama amaugafa aliya nohaiya kava hutama osi nafanemogami avamete ohisayana Anumaya Kotima kava yagai-mainea kumatela hai ofalegahae.”
Nago kanomoa agaia augafama alino ohaino osi nafanemo avamete maisiana ani kanomoa nagoa veala amakaseno Anumaya Koti kava yagai-mainea kumatela hagote kano maigahie.
Nagoa veamoya nagaifema huya ma ma osi nafanema avaleya falu fala hu-tesayana nagaienena navaleya falu fala hu-nenatae.

Nagoa veamoya nagoma nagaife haviya amakupi malenaya anagapiti nago osi kanohema “Kefo yama huo.” huya hisayana tusia kefo kava nehayanagina tusia kana ya amamigahue. Ala yafakefaleti ani kanomo ageyafi maleya nofi ki-teteya hage lipi hagayu hu-talageno ti nakaino falisiana ani kana yamoa afa ya kana ya haneanagi nagaya tusia kana ya amamigahue.

Avonio ma mopale veamogatama tusi nahau hu-nelama-toe. Mopafi mainaya kanafina “Kefo yama hiho.” huya aye-mavataga hisaya yana falote hugahianagi nagoa veamoya “Kefo yama hiho.” huya aye-mavataga hisaya veafena “Avonio kefo kava nehananagika kana yana aligane.” huna tusi nahau hu-nelama-toe.

Kayaene kaiyamoene “Kefo yama huo.” huana kavaleana havi kapima katesaagekahena ani kaiya kayana ai-fakalika hagayu hutalo. Hagayu hu-talesanana kanalele. Kaugafa haviya hu-mainesia kano maisanana kanalelagika hano ohu kahaimuka hanesia kano maiyo. Havigu tole kayano tole kaiyao kefo ya hisana kagesa kaminegeka kefo yama hu-mainesana yafe kavaleno hani yapi agola tegelege nehia atafi hagayu hu-gatalegahie.

Kaulagamoa agesia yamoma kefo ya hisana kagesama kaminageka ani kaulaga ali fayika hagayu hutalo. Ali fayi-talesanana kanalele. Nagoke kaulaga hanesigeno kanale hano ohu kahaimula kamisigeka alika maigananagi havigu tole kaulagamoa kefo ya hisana kagesa kaminegeka kefo yama hisanafe hani yapi tegelege nehia atafi kavaleno hagayu hu-ga-talegahie.

Tamakaya kaye ho. Havigu nagoa osi anaganihe “Afa ya kana veane mainae.” hutama huyafenagi nagaya mage huna tamaha-nepauve ani osi anagala ensole vayaamimoya ani nafaneyagale kava neyagaiya mukia yupa ikapinaga maineya Nenafa aufina neagae.

Na tamakesa nehaviye? Nago kanomoa vani hataletia (100) afu mainefiti nagola fanane higeno ani afumona nefaa mukia afua talapinaga amataleno talapinaga viayamo nagokema fanane hu-mainea afuahe ati-yeno yeno ali falote hisio? E, fananema hisigenoa ania huno ati-yegahie.

Nagaya tamage-lafa huna tamaha-nepauve agoma fanane hu-mainesia afuma ali falote huno avalesiana tusia muse hugahie. Naiti nainia (99) afuyagaahena muse hianagi nagokema fanane hu-mainesia afuma ali falote hu-tenoa tusiya huno musena hugahie.
Naa hu-mainegi ikapinaga mainea Nelamafaa nagola osi anagaa fanane hisia yafena nohaiye.

Kafu-kaganama kefo yama hu-ga-tesigeka tanakaya tokaetana mainetana kefo yama hu-mainesia yana avelio. Ave-lisanageno kagai kema haviteno kefo yama hisifitila agua ai-yahae hisigeka avaleka kagaika kametega ategane.
Ateganagi kekama ohavisigekahena nagokepi tole kanola anavaleka vinuka tolefi (2) tagufa (3) vayamoya hu-ga-tenea yana ageteya hu-falote huya fako huya ani kanomona aumono maleho.

Aumono maletesageno ani kanomoma nagoene amakai kema ohavisigeka kagaya Yisasife haviya melitaluma huya maisaya veapi avaleka ugeya aumonola maleho. Aumonoma malesageno ani vayamogami kema ohavisigeka kagaya mage huka huto “Yisasi kea ohavi vaya kana hana kanomoga tagaienena eomaika kahaote maiyo.” huka huto.

Ani kema hu-tesayana tamage-lafa huna tamaha-nepauve tamakaya ma mopale mainayana “Ma ya atafa hutama tokiya vaiho.” hutama hisayana Anumaya Kotia ikapinaga ania huno “Ani yana atafa hiho.” hu-lokiya vaigahie. Tamakaya ma mopale mainetama nago yafema “Afaa ataleho.” hutama hisayana Anumaya Kotia ikapinaga ania hugahie.
Etena nago kea tamaha-nepauve mopafi mainetama tole kanolaganima nago yafema nagoke anaku anakesalema mainenuana ani yafena Anumaya Kotitega havigesaageno ikapinaga mainea Neanafaa anamigahie.
E, tole (2) kanofi tagufa (3) vayapi nagai nagilema haviya melitalu hisayana nagaya nagainia amunoamifina maigahue huno hu-maine.

Pitaa Yisasite eno mage huno hie “Anumayamogae namagi kana nafunaganana kefo yana hu-na-tesigena ani kefo yamaahe aigeatena atale-tesue? Sevenia (7) yupa kefo yama hu-na-tesigena aigeatena atale-tesuo?” huno havige.

Havigegeno Yisasia mage huno hapaiye “Kagaifena sevenia (7) yupa ani kavala huo huna nohugi nagaya mage huna nehue kasagoya yupa ohavunamaa kanale havi yama hu-ga-tesigeka ania huka ohavunamaa kana aigeateka ataleto huna nehue.”
Anumaya Kotife “Kava yagai-nato.” huya hu-mainesaya veamoya ma kava nehae. Nago kumate sauve kanomoa agai aliya veafe mage huno hie “Yoka kaminoa monenia anonania fatago hutama namiho.” huno hie.
Huteno fatago hugahe nago kanoa avalegeno eno aminea yatefe anonaa ohavunamaa monegefa, nago kanomoma fifitinia (15) kafu aliya alino ne-mainea augafa mone eteno anonaa amisia yana hane.
Haneanagi monema amisia amukoa omalegeno kava kanomoa mage huno hie “Kagaikaene akamoene nafanekaene afenoyakaene alu kanomote atalegeno miya hisigena kagaiteti anonaa monea alino.” huno hie.
Higeno ani aliya kanomoa kava kanomo aiyafi aleya meyeno mage huno hie “Naa ohuka kahau hu-na-teka ako huka nagava mainegena nagaya haenagaa naminana yatela anonakaa mukia kamigahue.” huno hie.
Higeno ala kava kanomoa aliya kanoahena tusia hau hu-teteno anonaama oamia yafena aigeateno atale-tene.

Atale-teanagi ani aliya kanomoa hati-lavino viayamo tokaeana aliya nealia kanomona moge-maine. Ani kanomoa nago yupa agaifena mage huno hie “Nagoke Sotama aliyana aliya nenaya augafa mone yoka namio.” huno higeno amianagi anonaa oamine. Oaminea yafe ani kava kanomoma hau hu-tenea kanomoa ani afaluamona ageyafi atafa hu-lineno mage huno hie “Kagaila yoka kaminoa yana anonaa mukia yania aupaa namio.” huno hie.
Higeno aliya tokaeana nealia kanomoa aleya ayeno mage hie “Naa ohuka ataleka afaa kahau hu-na-teka ako huka nagava mainegenao. Haenaga anonakaa kamigahue.” huno hie.
Higeno ani kanomoa mage huno hie “Aao naa kehena nonahaiyafe nofi nopi hu-ga-tesugeka maineka haenaga anonaa namiteka nofi nopitila ataleka maigane.” huno hie.
Higeya nagoa tokaeyama aliya nealiya veamoya naama hia yafena haviteya amaipamoa haviya higeya kava kanomote mukia hu-mainea kavafena mo falote hae.

Mo falote hageno ala kava kanomoa atale-tenea aliya kanoahe ke higeno egeno mage huno ha-paiye “Kagaya tusiya huka havi aliya kano mainane. Hagoteka nagaifena avi metanagena anonakaa aigekatena atalega-tenoe.
Nagaya kagaifena nahau hu-ga-toanagi naa higeka ani avamete kavala ohuka kagaya tokaeka aliya nealina kanohena kahauna hu-oatane?” huno hie.

Huteno kava kanomoa tusia hai-vaiteno kina nopi avaleno viayamo kayo amisaya vayamogami amayapi ategeno mage hie “Tusi agata ya amitegeno haenagaa mukia yania anonaa namitesigetama atalegeno vino.” huno hu-maine.

Yisasia mage huno hu-maine “Tamakaya tamafu-tamakanaya kefo yama hu-lama-tesagetamahena amegatila hu kanale ohutama tamage hutama tamaipa kanale yapiti aigeamatetama atale-oama-tesayana ikapinaga mainea Nenafaa ania huno ani mukiamogatamina kinama hu-tenea avamete huno hu-lamategahie.” huno hu-maine.
Yisasia mukia mani kema hu hanoma nehunoa Kalili kotega ataleno Yotani limoa ame kaiyaga Yutia kotega uvayi hu-maine.
Mukia veamoya Yisasi akave vageno kaliamia alino kanale hu-ma-tene.

Nagoa Falasia vayamoya Yisasite eya kanale ohunea kema hisiafene huya nagola aye-vataga hisaya kea mage huya havigae “Nago kanomoa aamoma nehia kavafe atalesia agesama hisigenoa kanalelagino atalesio? Kahegi kemoa ani yafena naane nehie?” huya havigae.
Hageno Yisasia kenonaamia mage huno hie Tamakaya Anumaya Koti avona hapalitama ohavinao? Mage huya kae-malenayane

Anumaya Kotia ehe yupa aepa heno vene aene talo hu-maleteno mage hie “Vene aene talo humalenoafe nago kanomoma itaafoamoma ataleno aamoene ai-lokaeno maisiana ani tolemogania nagoke anaugafa kaligae.” huno kae-maleneane.

Naa hu-maineafe nagoene tolea omainaagi menia nagoke anagufa kaliana mainesaageno Anumaya Kotia anakaila alino hagelafi-na-teneanageno nago mopale kanomoa ani alavelamogani mai yaania alino apase oana-tesie.” huno hie.

Higeya Falasia vayamoya Yisasife mage huya havigae “Naa higeno Mosesea nagola kahegi kefina ma kea huno taha-pai-maineane ‘Vemoa aamona avo kaeno neamino hu-tesigeno hano huno ugahie.’ huno hu-maineane?” huya hae.

Hayanagi Yisasia mage huno hama-paiye “Nayona ehela ani yafena Anumaya Kotia malegeno omalenea kavala haneanagi tamakaya ke ohavitama veganokano haya yafe Mosesea ama atalesaya kaana tama-ve-li-maineane.
Nagaya tamaha-nepauve nago kanomona aamoma kumaima ohenesigenoma anauamoa neataleno nago ama alisiana ani kanomoa kumai kano maine.” huno hie.
Higeya agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya Yisasina mage huya hapaiye “Alavemoya tokaeya maisaya auava yamofe tusia tokiya kema hanesigetahena afaa neyave maineta anea oalisune.” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia mage huno hama-paiye “Haya kea tamage nehagi mukia neyavemoya anema oalisaya amukoamia omaleneanagino Anumaya Kotia tokiya amaminea vayamoyage anea oaligahae.

Nagoa neyavemoya anema oalisaya tokiyaamia hane. Ani vayapitila nagoa neyavemoya itaamimo ama-tenea yupa amakayamoma fayi-talenesaya vayama mainesayana anea oaligahae. Nagoa neyavema alu vayamoyama amakayamoma fayi-talenesaya vayamoya anea oaligahae. Nagoa vayamoya ‘Anumaya Kotia kava yagai-la-tesie.’ huya amakesa havi-mainesaya vayamoya Yisasi kema hama-paisaya yafenagiya ‘Anea oaligahune.’ huya hugahae. Ani kema havilinesia kanomoa ani kava hisie.”
Veamoya osi osi nafaneyaga Yisasife “Aya maleno amakaife Anumayamotega havigesie.” huya amavaleya neageya agaiaene tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya ageteya “Naa kavala ohiho.” huya ke-amaki-mainae.

Ke-amakiyanagi Yisasia mage huno hie “Amatalegeya nagaitega eho. Nafaneyaga nagaite esaya yafena kahegi oama-teho. Naa huya nafanemogami avamete maisaya veamoya mage hugahae ‘Tagaya tokiyatia omalenegi Anumaya Kotiga kava yagai-lato.’ huya hugahae.” huno hu-maine.
Anumaya Kotia hamamaesia yafe ayana amaugafale maleteno neamataleno alu kotega umaine.
Nago kanomoa Yisasiteka eno mage huno havige “Hu-mave-nelina kanomogae nagaya hana augafa kanale kava hutena agola maige maige hisua nahaimula alisue?” huno havige.

Havigegeno Yisasia kenonaa mage huno hie “Naa higeka kanale auavafena nahavi-negane? Nagoke kanoa Anumaya Kotia agaiage kanale kano maine. Agola maige maige hisana kahaimuma alinukahena Anumaya Koti kahegi kea akave malo.” huno hie.

Higeno Yisasifena mage huno havige “Hanaa kahegi kehe nehane?” huno higeno Yisasia mage huno hie “Vayala haegeno ofalino. Kumai he yana ohuo. Musufayana ohuo. ‘Ma kanoa havi kava nehie.’ huka havigea hu-oato.
Itakafokamo kea oatagaeka anakia alisaga huo. Kagaika kaugafahena kahaiya avamete huka ania huka negafu augafahena kahaino.” huno hie.
Higeno ani kanomoa mage huno hie “Nagaya mukia ani kea akave nemaloe. Na yamo nagoa kosa he-ona-tene? Na yaene hisue?” huno hie.

Higeno Yisasia mage huno hie “Nago kavaene hisanana kosa he-ga-tesigeka fatago kano maigane. Mukia malenana mone afenoyayagaka alika fako faka huka moneamima omalenesia veane amamisanageno Anumaya Kotia ikapinaga hanea afenoyana kamigahie. Afenoyayagaka amamite amamite huteka nakave eno.” huno hu-maine.
Higeno ani kanomoa ani kea haviteno mone afenomaamoma kasagoma hu-mainea yafe oatalesia agesa haviteno aipamoa tusi kanaage higeno umaine.
Vigeno Yisasia agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagafe mage huno hie “Tamage huna tamaha-nepauve mukia mone afenoyaamima hanesia veamoya tusia kasageke huya Anumaya Kotife ‘Kava yagai-lato.’ huya hugahae.

Nagoene tamaha-nepauve nagola pulumaka kana afumo agia kemolomoa nekayamo kapima hai-falesiana afaa yoyo huno hai-falegahianagi mukia mone afenoyaamima hanesia veamoya Anumaya Kotife ‘Kava yagai-lato.’ huya kasageke-voke hugahae.” huno hu-maine.
Higeya agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya amamayo neaiya mage huya hae “Naama hu-mainesiana Anumaya Kotia hana veamogami amaku amame ali-gatigahie?” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia neamakeno mage hie “Veamogamina amukoamia omaleneanagiya ohugahayanagi Anumaya Kotia mukia kavala hisia amukoa haneanagino afaa huno ali-gatigahie.” huno hie.
Nage higeno Pitaa mage huno hie “Havio tagaya mukia yatia ataleteta kakave neonagi tagaya na ya aligahune?” huno hie.

Higeno Yisasia mage huno hama-paiye “Tamage huna tamaha-nepauve haegafa kanamoa mukia yana yaufa ya falote hisigena nagaya ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea nafanemona kava yagaisuafe tusia tokiya hale yamaa hanea siale mainesugetama tamakaya nakave nehaya vayamogatama tuelufua (12) siale mainetama tuelufua (12) Isaleli nofi veamogamina kava yagai-ma-tegahae.

Mukia veamoya nagaifema haviya veamogamina nagai kema hama-paigahena noamiene nepuamiene amasaamiene itaafoamiene nafaneamiene hoyaamiene amataleya visagenoa Anumaya Kotia anonaamia atalenesaya yaene vani hataletia (100) mani yayaga amamiteno maige maige hisaya hamaimuene amamigahie.
Meni kanafina hagoteya mainesaya veamoya ani kanafina haenagalafa maigahagi meni kanafima haenagalafa mainesaya veamoya ani kanafina hagoteya maigahae.” huno hu-maine.
Anumaya Kotia kava yagai-mainea yamoa maa hu-maine. Nofi alagamo hoyamona nefaa kege aluganale ani hoyafi aliya alisaya vayafe ke hugahe umaine.
Uno mage hie “Nagoke yupa kanoa aliyama alisagenahena nagoke vani (1) kina tamamite tamamite hugahue.” huno higeya nagoke amaipa hageno hoyafi hu-ma-tegeya umainae.
Umainageno yagemoa naeni (9) kilokile haigeno vaya atagu-nefaya kumapi viana nagoa vayala afaa hetiya mainageno momake-maine.
Momaketeno mage hie “Tamakaienena nofi alagamo hoyanifi aliya molisagena miyana fatago huna tamamigahue.” huno higeya umainae.
Umainageno yagemoa amunokano higeno ania hu-maine. Yagemoa alitulu huno lavigeno ania huno nagoa vayafe “Aliya moliho.” huno hie.
Higeno unena aupaa velo hugahe higeno nagoa vayala afaa heti-mainageno momaketeno mage huno hie “Naa higetama ayaaya kanagefa heti-taletama afaa mainae?” huno hamavi-ge.
Hamavi-gegeya mage hae “Nago kanomoa aliyana otamigeta afaa mainone.” huya hageno “Kanalelagi tamakaya nagai hoyafi aliyana moliho.” huno hama-paiye.

Hama-paigeya mo-nealigeno une velo hilega nofi alagamo hoyamona nefaa agaia aliya kava kanohe mage huno hapaiye “Aliya vayafe ke hugeya egeka miyana amamio. Haenagama amavaloa vayamogami miyana amamiteka hagotenama amavale-mainoa vayala haenaga amamio.” huno hie.
Higeya une avavema amavalea vayamoya ageno nagoke vani kina amamite amamite hu-maine.
Amamite amamite higeya hagotenoma amavalegeya aliyama meli-mainaya vayamoya mage huya amakesa haviye “Ala miya aligahune.” huya haviyanagi nagoke vani kinageya ali-mainae.

Aliteya hoyamona nefafena tusiya huya kea-makiya mage hae “Haenagama amavale-mainana vayala yagemoa osi kana kanoa nagoke kana nehigeya aliyana meli-mainagi tagaya afaa hetita omainonagi tusia amukonako hia aliya ali-mainonanagi nagoke avamete havi miya nelamine.” huya hae.

Hageno ani hoyamona nefaa amunoamifi mainea kanohe mage huno hie “Nenafuga havio nagaya havi kavala hu-notama-toe. Natema tamaha-vi-gogetama ‘E, nagoke vani kina aligahune.’ hutama hagetila naa higetama mani kea nehae?
Aliyama alitama aliya monea alitama notamilega viho. Nagaya nahaiya avamete huna haenagama amavaloa vayaene nago avamete miyana nelamamue. Nagaini yanagi haile.
Ani monea nagainia mone. ‘Nagayama hugahue.’ huna hisua yafena ‘Ohuo.’ hutama nehao? Nagaya vayama kauva yafe tamaipa haviya nehao?” huno hu-maine.
Yisasia mage hie “Nagaya ania hugahue. Haenagalafa mainesaya veala hagoteya maigahae. Hagoteya mainesaya veala haenagalafa taviya maigahae.” huno hu-maine.

Yelusalemu haigahe katega neuno Yisasia tuelufua (12) anagaamogamina amahaote amavaleno moma-teteno mage huno hie “Haviho tagaya Yelusalemu haisunageya ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomonia nagaila nagesi hinageya mono note kava vayamoyaene kahegi kema havilinaya anagaene kame vayamogami amayapi navaleya na-teteya ‘Haegeno falino.’ huya hugahae.

Yuta vea omainaya vayate navaleya momamisageya nagaye hisifa kea hu-nateya hu-haviya hu-na-teteya hegi kayoteti nahaeteya yafaga yosale nili nahaeya asaisagena faligahue. Falisugeya he-vai-natesagena tole yupa komufi maitena tagufa (3) kanale fali-mainesufitila Anumaya Kotia ali he-ti-na-tegahie.” huno hu-maine.
Sepetina aamoa netalamaaene Yisasite eya ani amoa nago yafe havigegahe aiyafi aleya meye-maine.

Aye-mainegeno Yisasia mage huno havige “Naa hu-gatesue?” huno higeno mage huno hie “Kava yagaisana kumate umainesanageana mani tole nenimogania kavate maineana nagomoa tamaga kayatega maisigeno nagomoa hauga kayatega maisie.” huno havige.

Havigegeno Yisasia mage huno netalamaamogania hana-paiye “Nahavi-gea yana ohavinae. Falisua yana satuage hu-mainea timo avamete ti hanea keayopiti negahugi tanakaya kanale negao?” huno higeana “E, tokiyatia haneanagitaa negahue.” huana hae.

Haageno mage huno hie “Tamage satuage hu-mainea tina negaanagi ala vaya mainelega tamaga nayategaene hauga nayategaene siale maisaya yana nagaini yana omalenegi Nenafaa ani yana nagoa vayafe ago talo tala huno fatago hu-ma-tene.” huno hie.
Higeya tenia (10) anagaamoya ani kea haviteya ani kanolafe amaipa haviya haviya hu-na-tenae.

Yisasia “Nagaitega eho.” huno higeya ageno mage huno hie “Ma mopale ala kava vayamoya ‘Tusia ala vaya mainone.’ huya Yuta vea omainaya veafe ke amama-kiya aliya ke hu-ma-teya kava vayamogami avamete nehae.
Naa nehayanagi tamakaya ani kavala ohiho. Tamakaipina ‘Nagi hanea kanoma maigahue.’ huno hisia kanomoa aliya kanotami maino.
‘Uhagotena maigahue.’ huno hisia kanomoa mone oali aliya kanotami maino.

Nagaya ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomona vayamoya naya huya kanaleya hu-na-tesaya yafe omenogi nagaya amaya huna aliya kanoami maisua yafe emainoanagina mukia veamoya kefo yama hageno ai-gagi-ma-tenea yapiti kalu he-ma-tesua miya atalesua yafe faligahe emainoe.”
Yisasia agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya Yeliko kumala ataleya ugahe hageya kasagoya veamoya amakave umaine.

Nevageana tole anaulaga asu hu-mainea kanolamogania kate mopale mainanageya “Yisasia tanakaseno nevie.” haya kea haviteana ala kegefafiti mage huana hae “Anumayamogae, Tevitina aginagomogae, taagaila kahauna hu-laato.” huana hae.
Haageya umainaya veamoya kenama-kiya “Ke ohutana maio.” huya hayanagi nagoene ala kefiti keha keha hae “Anumayamogae, Tevitina aginagomogae, kahauna hulaato.” huana keha keha hae.
Haageno Yisasia haviteno aupaa anile heti-maineno “Naa hu-lana-tesue hugetana nehae?” huno hie.
Higeana “Museka nehuagi taagaya etetaa taaulaga agesue hutaa nehue.” huana hae.
Haageno Yisasia kalagi ai-na-teno anaulagale aya malegeana aupaa anaulaga neageana Yisasi akave vae.

Yelusalemu aupaa uvayi hugahe Petafasi umainae. Petafasi kumala Olivi yosa hanea agoyamona agegayalega hanegeno Yisasia agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagapiti tole kanolana hu-na-teno mage huno hana-paiye “Atu kumate utana aupaa hosi kana afumo agia tokigi ani tokimona itaamoene nafaneaene aye-tenayanagitana agegae. Agetetana kalu hetana avaletana male eo.
Nagoa vayamoyama tanahavi-gesagetana mage hutana hio ‘Kava kanotimoa nago aliya aligahe higetaa neoe.’ hutana hama-paisaageya aupaa lanamigahae.” huno hie.
Hiana ani yupama haya kavala Anumaya Koti aune kanomoa nayoma hu-mainea kemoa agola falote huno tamage hie. Mage huno kae-maleneane
Yelusalemu veamogamina mage huka hama-paiyo “Agegeho menia tamakaite kava yagai-lama-tesia kanoa augafa alino ohaino hosi kana afumo agia tokimo nafanemo agupifi maiteno enee.” huno kae-maleneane.
Tole Yisasiene tokaeana nemaia kanolana uana Yisasima hana-paiya kea mo hae.
Ani hosi kana afumo nafanene itaamoene Yisasitega anavaleana kenaania anaugafaleti hateana ani afumo agupile yakai-malaageno Yisasia anile haino maine.
Haino maiteno neegeya mukia veamoya “Ala kano nee.” huya nagoamoya amaugafaleti kenaamia hateya visia katela yakaiteya yosa akopa kofa huya katela yakai-tenae.

Hagoteya vaya veamoyaene akave aya veamoyaene mage huya hae “Taugafa ali-gatisana kanoa Teviti aginagomogae kanale ya huka neane. Anumayamo aliya aligahe hanageno hu-ga-tenea kanoa Anumaya Kotia kanale manu kamino kaya hu-maine. Anafinaga mainea Anumaya Kotia taugafa ali-gatisiafe musena hisune.” huya hae.
Yisasia Yelusalemu hai-falegeya anile mainaya veamoya atali talu nehuya mage hae “Mani kanoa ta nee?” huya havigae.
Nehageya alitalu hu-mainaya veamoya mage huya hae “Mani kanoa Nasaleti Yisasie Kalili kotegati emainea aune kano nee.” huya hae.

Yisasia ala mono nopi hai-faleno ageana ani nopi mainaya veamoya monehe ke huya nealiya veanene afaa miyama nehaya veanene “Mai haleho.” huno nehuno vayamoya alu kote nehanea monea nealiya ani kotegama nehanea monea neamamiya veamogami folamoa ali-talegeno aige helafige hie. Higeno kugofa kana nama miya nehaya veala ani mono nopi mopale mainaya sipa ania huno ali-talegeno ai-helafi-lavigeno amanati-tale-tene.
Mage huno hie “Anumaya Koti autamafina mage huno kae-maleneane
‘Nagai nona mukia veamoya Anumaya Koti agi ayeya nunamu hisaya no hane.’ huno kae-maleneanagi
tamakaya musufa yama nehaya kava hugahe ma nopina emainae.” huno hie.
Yisasia ala mono nopi mainegeya nagoa amaulaga asu hu-mainea veanene amaiya avayu hu-mainea veanene agaite ageno ani kaliamia alino kanale hu-ma-tene.

Alino kanale hu-ma-teanagi ala mono note kava vayaene kahegi kema havilinaya anagaene mono nopi mainaya nafaneyagamoya Yisasifena “Teviti nafanemogae, taugafa ali-gatigahe hu-ga-tenea kanomogae.” huya kema haya kenefena Yisasima kanale auava yama hia yafeene haviya amaipa haviya hu-tenae.
Amaipa haviya huteya Yisasifena mage hae “Kagaya mani kema haya kea havilinano?” huya havigageno Yisasia mage huno hie “E, tamakaya Anumaya Koti avona hapalitama ohavinao? mage hu-maineane
‘Anumaya Kotiga osi nafaneyagaene nute nafanemogami amavayafitila kagai kagia kanaleya huya alisaga hisayafe hu-ma-tenane.’ huno kae-maleneane.” huno hu-maine.
Mani kea huteno ala kumatetila ataleno ani kegela Petani kumate mo faene.
Faeteno kotigeno Petania neataleno Yelusalemu ugahe nevigeno Yisasina aga-te-maine.

Aga-tegeno ka haigilega nagola fiki yosa hanegeno ageteno ani yosa aepale mogeana alagaa omalegeno haisaage hanegeno mogeteno Yisasia ani yosahe mage huno hie “Namo yosa hetika maiyo. Agola kagai kaugafafitila nagola alaga falote ohisie.” huno higeno aupaa fayo-te-maine.
Yisasiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya ageteya tusia amamayo aigeya mage huya hae “Naa higeno ani fiki yosamoa aupaa fayo-nelie?” huya havigae.

Hageno Yisasia mage huno hama-paiye “Lamage huna tamaha-nepauve Anumaya Kotifena tole lamakesa ohavitama ‘Mukia yama hisanana kanalelageka hateasine.’ hutama tamakupi maletama tametiti hisayana fiki yosama hu-toa kavaene nagoa kavaenena hugahae. Ma agoyamofena ‘Kofa hu-lavika ala ti kotumo amunopi mo hetika maiyo.’ hutama hapaisagenoa ketamia akave maleno ugahie.
Mukia yafema ‘Anumaya Kotitega havigesunana kanaleya huno tamigahie.’ hutama tamakupi maletama tamametiti hisayana afaa amamigahie.” huno hie.

Yisasia ala mono nopi umaineno alitalu huya maiya vayala hu-mave-neligeya mono note kava vayamoyaene ala vayaene agaitega mage huya me hae “Hana augafa ala kanomo hu-gategeka mani kavala menehane? Tokiya yakaa ta kamine?” huya havigae.
Havigageno Yisasia mage huno hie “Nagaya ania huna nago yafema tamaha-vigesugetamama naha-paisagenahena ala kanomo hu-na-tegena emainoa kanomo agia tamaha-paigahue.

Yonima tima fale-ma-tenea yana Anumaya Koti hu-tegeno ani kavala me-nehifi afa vayamoya hu-tageno tina me fale-mateneo? Hu-falote hutama naha-paiho.” huno hu-maine. Higeya “Naa maa hugahune.” huya mohu mehu huteya mage hae. “Anumaya Koti hu-tegeno emaine.” huta hisunagenoa Yisasia “Naa higetama agai kea tamakupina nomalae?” huno hugahie.
Hugahiafe tagaya “Afa vayamoya hutageno emaine.” huta hisunageyahena mukia veamoya “Yonia Anumaya Koti aune kano maine.” huya ago havimainaya yafe ali haviya hu-la-tegahae huya mohu mehu nehae.

Huteya Yisasifena kenonaa mage huya hae “Tapiga hu-tene? Tagaya ohavinone.” huya hageno Yisasia mage huno hama-paiye “Nagaya ania huna hana kanomo hu-na-tegena emainoe huna tamaha-opaigahue.” huno hu-maine.
Na tamakesa nehaviye? Nago kanomoa tole nenafanea mainaanagino neanafaa hagote nafaneahe mage huno mo hie “Nafanenimogae meni yupa nofi alagamo hoyafi aliyana molio.” huno hapaiye.
Higeno nafaneamoa mage huno hie “Ougahue.” huno huteno haenagaa agu ai-yahae huno aliyana moli-maine.
Neanafaa haenaga nafaneahena ani ke huno hapaigeno mage huno hie “Nagaya moligahue.” huno huteno oune.

Hana nafanemo nefa kea ali hipoya hu-maine? huno hama-vi-gegeya “Hagote nafanemoe.” huya hageno Yisasia mage huno hie “Tamage-lafa huna tamaha-nepauve musufayama nehuya vaya amaugafaleti takesi mone ali-liteya nehaya vayaene moli hu-liteya nehaya aneyagaene hagoteya tamakaseya Anumaya Kotifena ‘Kava yagai-lato.’ huya nehae.

Yonia hu-haleno huno fatago hutama maisaya kaana tamave-lianagi tamakaya agai kea havitama tamakupi maletama tamametitia ohunagi musufayama nehuya vaya amaugafaleti takisi mone ali-liteya nehaya vayaene moli hu-liteya nehaya anene Yoni kea haviya amakupina malenae. Amakupi malagetama tamakaya agetetama haenagaa kefo yatamihena tamaipa aiyahae hutama tamakua oamitama agai kea tamakupina omalenae.”

Yisasia “Nagola avame kea haviho.” huno mage huno hama-paiye Nago kanomoa vaini nofi alagamo hoya kali-maleteno kegiya hu-gove hu-maleteno ani alagayagama vaiteno aye-latigeno timaamoma lavisia komua kafiteno yagainoma nemaiya nona anafi ki-maleteno noagea vayafe “Etama hoyanifina yagaitama maineho. Ani nofimo alagafitila ali fako hutama nagoa aliho.” huno hu-ma-teteno alu kotega umaine.
Umainegeno afuma nelea kanafina ani hoyamona nefaa nagoa aliya vayala hu-ma-tegeya kava vayatega nagoa vaini nofi alaga aligahe umainae.
Vageya hoyale kava vayamoya ani vayala amatafa huya nago kanoa kayo amiteya nago kanomona tavata haeteya nago kanomona yafa kayoteti hae-mainae.
Hamayageya utageno hoyamona nefaa eteno nagoa kasagoya aliya vayaa hu-ma-tegeya vayana hoyalema kava yagai-mainaya vayamoya ani kavakeya hu-ma-tenae.
Hu-ma-tageno hoyamona nefaa eteno agaia nafanea hu-tegahe mage huno hie “Nafanenimo kea havigahae.” huno hu-teno hu-tegeno ani hoyalega umaine.

Vigeya ani hoyafima kava vayamoya ageteya mage huya hae “Mamona mani hoyamona nefa nafane. Nefama falisigenofena mani nafanemoa hoyaa aligahianagita agaila ago haegetao. Haesunageno falisigeno mani hoya tagai ya hapaegahie.” huya hae.
Huteya avaleya hoyafinagatila ai-halatu huya malaga hagayu hu-taleteya haeyageno fali-maine huno hie.

Huteno mage hie “Naa hayanagi hoyamona nefaa naa hu-ma-tegahie?” huno hama-vigegeya mage huya hae “Eteno hoyaafima kava yagai-mainaya vayala tavata me-hamaesigeya faligahae. Fali hano hisageno alu vayafe ‘Hoyanifina kava me yagaiho.’ huno hugahie.” huya hu-mainae.
Hageno Yisasia mage huno hama-paiye ani yafena Anumaya Koti avopina ago hapali-mainao? Mage huno hu-maineane

“Vayamoya yafa noma kigahena nago yafafena ‘Haviya hu-maine.’ huya atalenayanagi haenagaa ani yafamofena ‘Tusia kanale yafane.’ huya nomo aye-tagenale malenae. Anumayamoa ani avamete hu-mainegeta ageteta tusia kanaleyanagino tamayo aiya kava nehie huta nehune.” huno kae-maleneane.

Kae-malenegi mukia veamoya ani yafatema asaga hu-lavisayana amaugafamoa atalaga huno haviya hu-lavigahianagi ani yafamoa vaya amaugafalema asaga hu-lavisiana ai-latapeno ai-talaga talago hu-talegahie. Naa huyafe tamaha-nepauve Anumaya Koti kava yagai-mainea yana tamayapitila tamaha-faleno alu veamogami amayapi malegahie. Kanale alagama ayesaya veamogami amayapi malegahie huno hie.
Higeya mono note kava vayaene Falasia vayaene haviteya “Tagaife mani avame kea nehie.” huya havimainae.
Haviteya “Menia avaleta kina nopi ategahune.” huya hayanagi veamoya Yisasife “Aune kano maine.” huya haya yafe vaya amauhe koli huya atalenae.
Yisasia nagoene mukia vayafe avame kea mage huno hie Anumaya Koti kava yagai-mainea kumate maa hu-maine nagola sauve kanomoa agaia nafanemoa a aligahe higeno nefaa ala kave talo tala hugahe hie.

Agaia aliya vayala hu-ma-tegahe mage huno hie “Kema hu-ma-tenoa vayatega utama hama-paisageya ani imuma ki-maloa kavela me nesae.” huno hu-ma-tegeya uya mo hama-paiyana ani vayamoya imulena omesaya ke hae.

Hageno eteno nagoene alu aliya vayaa hu-ma-teno mage huno “Tamakaya utama kema hu-ma-toa veafe mage hutama hama-paiho Tamakaya haviho nagaya ve pulamakaene tali ovai afuniene ago hena mukia yana ago talo tala hu-malenogi tamakaya a alisia imule eho.” huno hie.

Higeya ani aliya vayala uya mani kea mo hama-paiyanagi ani veamoya ohavisaya ke huya ataleya vageya nagoa veala hoyaamilega vageya nagoa veala mone aliyaamile vageya nagoa vayamoya ani aliya vayala amatafa huya hamayageya fali-mainae.
Naa hageno sauve kanomo aipamoa haviya higeno agaia ati vayaa hu-ma-tegeya uya mo hamaeya hano hu-taleteya no kumaamia kaeya hano hu-talenae.
Hu-talageno ala sauve kanomoa aliya vayaahena mage huno hama-paiye “A alisia imua ago kina talo tala hu-malogi ‘Eho.’ hunama hu-ma-toa veala amakaiamia kanale huya omesaya avamete hu-mainae.
Naa hu-mainagi tamakaya kamo avayalema momakesaya veafena ‘A alisia imule eho.’ hutama hiho.” huno hie.
Higeya aliya vayamoya anima katega momakaya veala haviya hu-mainaya veanene kanale veanene amavaleya melitalu hageno mukia sauve kanomo nafanemoma ama alisia imulela ani nopina me hiya hae.
Hageno sauve kanomoa amakegahe ani nopi haino mogeana nago kanomoa ama alisia kanalema fai-nealiya augafa kena fai-oalinegeno moge-maine.
Mogeteno ani kenama fai-oalinea kanohena mage hie “Nenafugae naa higeka a alisia kanalema nefaiya kena ofaika ma nopina emainane?” huno havigegeno ani kanomoa kea ohuno maine.

Afaa maigeno sauve kanomoa agaia aliya vayafe mage huno hama-paiye “Aiya ayate nofi kitetama asaga hutama haniyapinaga malaga hagayu hu-talegeno avi-neateno avekemo nehinageno agaia augafahe kalagi aino.” huno hie.
Anumaya Kotia kasagoya veafe kea hianagi mukia veala omageya nagoke nagoke huyo-gi-malenea veaneage ehai-nefalae.
Falasia vayamoya neuya “Hanaa huta Yisasima hisia keletila atafa hisune?” huya hu-mainae.

Huteya keamima nehaviya vayaene Heloti vayaene Yisasite hu-ma-tageya ani vayamoya mage huya mo hae “Humave-nelina kanomogae tagaya havunana kagaya tamageage kano mainane. Kava vayaene afa vayaenefena kagesa ohavika nagoke kate tamagegeya nehuka Anumaya Koti kea hama-nepainane.
Nagi takisi he yatela kava kanoa Sisana kanale amigahuno ifi oamisune? Na kagesa nehavipi? Taha-paiyo.” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia havi kavama hisaya amaku amakesa ago amaketeno “Vagala vaya mainagi amegati afa ke nehae. Naa higetama nagaila aye-navataga hutama natafa hisaya yafena nahavi-negae?
Nagola takisima nehaya alaga monea alitama naveliho.” huno higeya aliya ave-li-mainae.
Aveligeno mage huno hie “Mani alaga monelela ta augosaene ta agiene hane?” huno hie.
Higeya “Sisa augosaene agiene hane.” huya hae. Hageno Yisasia mage hie “Sisana agaia yanagi agaila amiho. Nagi Anumaya Kotina agaia yana agaila amiho.” huno hie.
Higeya anima kesi katema vaiyaya vayamoya anima hia kehena amamayo aigeya ataleya umainae.
Ani kanafina nagoa Satiusi vayamoya Yisasitega emainae. Ani Satiusi vayamoya mage nehaya vayale “Fali-mainaya vayala eteya he-otigahae.” huya nehaya vayale.

Vayalegiya Yisasina mage huya me havigae “Humave-nelina kanomogae Mosesea mage huno hu-maineane ‘Nago kanomoa nafanema oate kanomoa aama ataleno falisigenoa aganaamoa ani aala ali-tesigeno fali-mainea kanomofe huno anonaa nafanea atesie.’ huno kae-maleneane.
Sevenia (7) koganamoya tagaipina mainayanagino nepuamimoa aala ali-teneanagino nafanea oate kano maineno faligeno anile aganaamoa aamona ali-tene.
Ali-teanagi nafanea oate kano maineno faligeno anile aganaamoa eteno ali-tene. Ania hute hute hayanagi mukia sevenia (7) konagamoya ani aala ali-tayanagi nafaneamia oateya afaa fali-mainae.
Faltageno haenagalafa ani aala fali-maine.
Sevenia (7) konagamoya ani aala ali-tenayanagiya fali-mainesafitima hetisaya kanafina hana kanomo ani aala alikahie?” huya havigae.
Havigageno Yisasia mage huno hama-paiye Anumaya Koti kema kae-malenaya kene tokiya yamaaenefena havilama hutama ohaviya yafe tamakaya havi lamakesageya nehaviye.
Veamoya fali-mainesafitima hetisaya kanafina nago vemoa anea oaligahianagi amoa venena oaligahie. Ensole vaya kana huya maigahae.
Fali-mainaya veama he-ti-saya kea Anumaya Kotia tamakaifema hu-mainea kea avopina mage huno hu-mainea kea hapalitama ohavinao?
Mage huno hu-maine
“Nagaya Anumaya Kotina Apalahamunagi Aisakinagi Yekopugami Anumaya Kotiami mainoe.” huno hu-maineane.
Ani anagala fali-mainayanagi “Anumaya Kotiamimona mainoe.” huno hu-maineafe amaku amamemoa ofalinegi afaa mainae huno mani kea hu-maine.
Higeya melitalu hu-mainaya veamoya haviteya anima hia kehena amamayo ai-mainae.
Yisasima hia kehena Satiusi vayamoya kea ohuya maiya yafe Falasia vayamoya haviteya Yisasite melitalu huya mainae.
Maiya vayamogami amunopina nagola kahegi kema havilinea kanomoa Yisasina aye-vataga hugahe mage huno havige.
“Hu-lave-nelina kanomogae hana kahegi kemo mukia kahegi kemona amakaseno uhagoteno tokiyaage kea hane?” huno havige.
Havigegeno Yisasia mage hie “Anumaya Kotia alakamofena tusiya huno kahaino. Kaguafinagatiene kagu kametetiene kahaino. Aliyama nealina himamukaene kagesama nehavina yaenena ami hano huka amio.
Mani kemoa uhagoteno amakase-mainea ke hane.
Anilema molia kemoa ani kemoma hia avamete hu-mainea kemoa mage huno hu-maine ‘Kagaikaa kaugafahema kahaisia avamete mukia veamogami amaugafahena kahaino.’ huno hu-maine.
Mukia Anumaya Koti amaune vayamogami kene Mosese kemoenena ani tole kefi aepaa hane.” huno hie.
Falasia vayala melitalu hageno Yisasia mage huno hama-vige “Kalaisifena naane tamakesa nehaviye? Ta nafane maine?” huno higeya “Teviti nafane maine.” huya hae.
Hageno “Naa higeno Tevitia Avamumo hapaiya ke huno Kalaisifena ‘Anumayanimogae.’ hunoma hu-maineana ani kemo aepaahena naane hutama nehae? Tevitia mage huno hu-maineane

Anumaya Kotia Anumayanimofena mage huno hie ‘Tamaga nayatega, ala vaya mainalega hanea siale emainesanagena kame vayakaa kaiyafinaga ama-tesugeya kagaifena ‘Ago tagasane.’ huya hugahae.’ huno kae-maleneane.
Tevitia Kalaisifena ‘Anumayania mainane.’ huno hu-maineanagi naa higeno Tevitia haenagama atesia aginagomofena ‘Anumayania mainane.’ huno hu-maineane?” huno hama-vi-ge.
Hama-vi-geanagi nago kanomoa kenonaa nago kea ohunegi ani kanaleti aepa heya kolia huya nago yafena haviokenae.
Yisasia melitaluma hu-maiya vayafeene agaiaenema tokaiya nemaiya anagafeenena mage huno hie kahegi kema havilinaya anagaene Falasia vayaene Mosese kea huge hama-velige nehae.
Nehayanagi tamaha-paiya kea akave malegahayanagi kefo yama nehaya kavaamia tamakaveno hu-teho. Amakaya ala kenakea nehayanagi amakaiamima haya kemona akave nomalae.
“Kahegi kea akave maleho.” huya mukia veamogamina kanaage yakefa amayonalela nemaleya nehagi amaya hugahena nagoke amakinagoa maleya amaya ohageya tusia kana yakefa nealiye.

Mukiama nehaya kavaamia “Veamoya tagesae.” huya Anumayamo kae-malenea kea hanea keayola veamoya agesayafe ala keayola talo huya yagamusago kana huya hamanile ko nefiya kena atupaamile ayaaya konagali nofila aye-maleneya hu-nealiyane.
Nehuya mono nopiene imuleene “Ala vayaage nemaiya siale maigahune.” huya nehae.
Vaya atagu-nefaya kumapi mo-vaiyatete nehuya “Naa vaya mainae huya ali falu fala hu-la-tesae.” huya nehayane.
Nehayanagi nagaya tamakaifena “Ala tisa kanomogae.” huya ohiho. Tamakaila nagoke huge lama-ve-lige hisia kanotami nagaya mainogi tamakaya nagoke avamete mainetama nagoke konaga kana maiho.
Ma mopafi mainetama nago kanomofena “Nelafae.” hutama ohiho. Tamakai Nelamafaa nagoke ikapinaga maine.
Tamakaifena nagoa veamoya “Kava kanotimogae.” huya ohiho. Kalaisia agaiage kava kanotamia maine.
Tusia ala kanoa tamakaipima mainesiana aliya kanotami kana huno maino.

Nagoa veamoya amakaiami amaugafama aliya haisagenoa Anumaya Kotia “Osi kano maiyo.” huno hu-tegahianagi nagoa veamoya “Osi kano mainoe.” huno hisigenofena Anumaya Kotia agia alisaga huno anale malegahie huno hie.

Avonio kahegi kema havilinaya anagamogatamaene Falisia vayamogatamaenena vagala vayalagi kaye ho. Anumaya Kotia kava yagai-mainea yapi veamoya ugahe nehayanagi “Oviho.” hutama katile-neamatae. Tamakaya “Ani nopi ohaigahune.” hutama haleti nagoa veamoya “Hai falegahune.” huya haya veamogamifena “Hai-ofalegahae.” hutama katile-neamatae.

Avonio kahegi kema havilinaya anagamogatamaene Falasia vayamogatamaenena vagala vayalagi kaye ho. Tamakaya hagelimo agegayalegaene mopafiene vai-neayetama “Nagoke kanomo Yuta vayamogati mono kea havisie.” hutama huge ave-lige nehayanagi kefo yafe hu-ve-nelitama havi kapi avaletama atageno tamakayama haya kavala tamakaila tamakaseno tusia kefo yana nehianagino hani yapi tegelege nehia atafi tamakaiene ugahie.

Avonio tamakaila tamaulaga asu hu-mainegetama veafena “Kaana tamave-ligahune.” hutama nehaya vayamogatama kaye ho. Mage hutama nehae “Nagoa veamoya ‘Ala mono nomo agile hu-lokiya vaina tamagelafa nehue.’ hunoma hisiana ‘Afa ke kana hu-maine.’ hutama hu-mainagi nagoa veamoya ‘Ani mono nopima kanileta yafatetima talo hu-malenaya yamo agile hu-lokiya vaina tamagelafa nehue.’ hunoma hisiana ani kema hisia kanomoa hia kea hu-lama huno hino.” hutama nehae.

Tamakaila tamaulagamoa asu hu-mainegetama aifonafo vaya mainae. Na yamo ala yana hane? Ani kanileta yafateti talo hu-malenaya yano? Ifi ani mono nomoa ala yakefa haneo? Aao anima kanileta yafateti talo hu-malenaya yana mono nopinaga malenaya yafekeya alu aotage yana hane. Naa hu-maineafe mono nomoa agaseno ala yakefa hane.

Tamakaya mage hutama nehae “Nagoa veamoya ‘Mono nopi sipi sipi heya nemalaya folamo hanea yate agi ayena hu-lokiya vaina tamagelafa nehue.’ huno hisiana afa ya kana ke nehigi hesaya yafe folamole nemalaya sipi sipihena nagoa veamoya ‘Agi ayena tamagelafa hu-lokiya vaina nehue.’ huno hisia kemona ani veamoya hu-mainesaya kemona akave maleya hiho.” hutama nehae.

Nehayanagi tamaulaga asu hu-mainea vea mainae. Na yamo ala yana hane? Anumaya Kotina sipi sipi amisaya yano ifi muse yama nemalaya folamoa ala yane? E, folamoa ala ya hane. Nagoa sipi sipia ani folamole nemalayafe alu aotage sipi sipi haneanagino folamoa tusia ala yane.
Nagoa veamoya “Folamomo agi neayone.” huya hisaya veamoya mukia yama ani folamolema nemalaya yafeene nehae.
Nagoa veamoya “Ala mono nomo agi ayena hu-lokiya vaina tamagelafa nehue.” huyama hisayana ani mono nomofeene ani nopima mainea Anumaya Kotifeene nehae.
Nagoa veamoya “Ikamo agile hu-lokiya vaina tamagelafa nehue.” huyama hisayana Anumaya Kotina siaaene ani yatema mainea kanomofeene nehae.

Avonio kahegi kema havilinaya anagamogatamaene Falasia vayamogatamaene vagala vayalagi kaye ho. Tamakaya supu tala yaene atuene hefi kana yaene osi osi yana alitama tenia (10) haya malenafiti nagoke haya Anumaya Kotina neamiyanagi kahegi kefina ala yamona aepaa neatalae. Fatago hutama kaiyeke hu-matesaya yaene kayone hutama maisaya yaene Anumaya Kotife havitama lamakupi maletama tamametiti hisaya yaene ago neatalae. Hagotetama ani aepaa hanea kea hutetama anile supu tala yaene atuene hefi kana yaene alitama tenia (10) haya malenafiti nagoke haya Anumaya Kotima amisayana kanaleya hugahie.

Tamaulaga asu hu-mai veala “Nakave eho.” hutama nehaya veamogatama tamakaya mage nehae “Osi osi havigafa nesuna tipina maineanagita onegahune.” hutama neatalayanagi ala hosia nesaya tipina mainegetama netama nenakaiye.

Avonio kahegi kema havilinaya anagamogatamaene Falasia vayamogatamaene vagala vayalagi kaye ho. Amega lamaugafale kava hutama masutamiene yopatamiene amega kaiyagaa sese nehayanagi tamakupinaga musufa yama nehaya yaene tamaugafa age lama-haye nehaya yatamiene hiya hu-lama-teneanagi sesela nohae.
Tamaulagamoa asu hu-mainea Falasia vayamogatama hagotetama ti kemo ayopinagaene yopamo ayopinagaene sesema hisayana amega kaiyagaenena oniyaagela ohugahie.

Avonio kahegi kema havilinaya anagamogatamaene Falasia vayamogatamaene vagala vayalagi kaye ho. Tamakaya maa nehae vaya komulema mopama ayeya ali-masave huya ali konagali hu-malayanagi ani komufinaga vayala kasaligeno ayamufama ali yogita huno havi yama hu-lavia avamete kava nehae.

Nehayanagi tamakayaenena ani kavakeya hutama mainae. Veamoya amega tamaugafale nelamakeya “Fatago veane mainae.” huya nehayanagi tamakupinaga havigema nehaya yatamiene kefo yama nehaya yatamiene kasago hu-maine.

Avonio kahegi kema havilinaya anagamogatamaene Falasia vayamogatamaene vagala vayalagi kaye ho. Anumaya Koti amaune vayaene fatago kavama hu-mainaya veanenema faligeya he-vai-ma-tenaya komulega tamakaya kanagune hu-maletama mainae.
Mainetama mage hutama nehae “Tagaya tototimoya mainaya kanafima mainoteasina Anumaya Koti amaune vayala hamaonageya ofalileasine.” hutama nehae.
Ani kema nehaya kemoa “Amaune vayala hamayageya fali-mainaya vayamogami nafaneamimogata mainone.” hutama nehae.
Nehayanagi tamakinagomoya kefo yama hu-mainaya kavala tamakaya nagoene hisageno hiya hisie.
Tamakaya osifavemogatamae. Osifaveyagamo nafanemogatama Anumaya Kotia “Hanimo aguafi agola tamakata aisia kumate umaiho.” huno kaiyekema hu-lama-tesiana hanaa hutama faletama ugahae?

Ani yafe nagaya amaune vayaene havi haviyaami hanea vayaene hu-lama-ve-neliya vayaene tamakaitema hu-ma-tesugeya esagetamahena nagoamogamina yafaga yosale nili hetama asaisageya faligahae. Nagoamogamina mono nopinaga hegi kayoteti hamaetama ali-haviya hu-matesageya alu kumate kumate faleya ugahae.

Hamaesageya falisaya yafe ma mopafina mukia fatago veamogamina ago hamayageya fali-mainaya kolamoa Evoloa kefo yana ohunea kanoagi hagoteya hayageno falitegeya nagoa hamaeme hamaeme ageno hano higeya haenagalafa Pelakia nafanea Sekalaiyana ala mono nomo kegiyamo amunopi yafa folamole heti-mainegeya hayageno fali-mainegi tamakaya menima mainaya veamogatama agoma hu-mainaya kefo yamo anonaamia aligahae.
Tamage huna tamaha-nepauve ago hamayageya fali-mainagi tamakaya menima mainaya veamogatama agoma hu-mainaya kefo yamo anonaamia tamakaya aligahae.

Vaeha Yelusalemu mainaya veamogatama tamakaya Anumaya Koti amaune vayala nehamaetama Anumaya Koti hu-ma-tegeya tamakaitega aya vayala yafa kayoteti tavata hamae-mainagi nagaya mukia yupa a kokolemoma nafaneama agekonafinaga alitaluma nehia avamete huna tamakaila nagaya nagainialega alitalu hu-lama-tegahe nehugetama tamakaya “Ania kavala ohuo.” hutama nehae.

Nehagi haviho na ma mainaya kumafena Anumaya Kotia ago neataleno “Aoteyamaae.” huno hu-maineanagitama menia nagoene onagegahagi “Anumayamo aliya aligahe higeno hu-tenea kanoa Anumaya Kotia kanale manua amisie.” huya hisaya kanafina nagoene nagaila nagegahae huno hu-maine.
Yisasia ala mono nona neataleno vigeya agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya ayaamoya ala mono noyaga ave-liye.

Ave-ligeno Yisasia mage huno hie “Tamakaya mukia ma noyaga neagao? Tamage huna tamaha-nepauve ani nomo yafayaga mukia alino lagape ai-talesigeno aposi-lavigeno nago yafamoa nago yafamo agupifina ai-kalo huno omaigahie.” huno hie.

Yisasia Olivi yosa hanea agoyamo agegayalega haino mopale mainegeya agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagala amakaiamige mage huya me hae “Na kanafi ani yamoa falote hugahie? Hana augafa tokiya avame yamo esana kanaene ma mopama hano hisia kanaene falotema hisia yana taveligahie?” huya havigae
Hageno Yisasia mage huno hie Nagoa veamoya havigema tamaha-paisagetama ohavisaya yafe kaye ho.
Kasagoya vayamoya nagai nagi ayeya nagoke nagokemoya “Tamaugafa ali-gatisua yafe Anumaya Kotia hu-na-tegena neue.” huya hisageya kasagoya veamoya amakai kea haviteya amakave malegahae.

Malegahagi “Nagoa kotega kame nehae. Nagoa kotega tu hugahe nehae.” huya tamaha-paisagetamahena kolia ohiho. Ani yayagamoa hagoteno falote hugahianagi ma mopama hano hisia kanamoa aupaa huno falote ohugahie.

Nagoa vayamoya alu vayaenena kamea hugahae. Ala kotega vayaene nago ala kotega vayaene kamea hugahae. Kasagoya alu kote kotega tusia kafu nehuya amakatesia kanaene falote hisigeno tusia imila aligahie.
Ani yayagamoa afaa anemoya nafanema ategahe hageno aepa heno agatama neaiya avamete kava hugahianagi haenagaa tusia tamakata aisia yana falote hugahie.
Tamakaya nakavema neaya yafe tamatafa huya ali haviya hu-lama-teteya tama-haesagetama faligahae. Nagima neayaya yateti kasagoya vayamoya amaipa kafa he-lama-tegahae.
Amaipa kafa he-lama-tesaya yateti kasagoya veamoya nagaifena haviya amakupi maleya amametitima nehaya yana ataleya nagoa veala amakesi huya amaipa kafa he-lama-tegahae.
Kasagoya havige amaune vayamoya havige hisageya kasagoya veamoya amakai kea haviteya amakave malegahae.
Kefo yama nehaya yamoma ala hisigeno nagoa veamoya nagoamimogamifema hamau amayamopafi nehamaiya yamoa osi hugahie.
Osi hugahigi nagoa veamoya nagai kema atafa huya tokiyaage hume humema visagenahena nagaya etenama esua kanafina nagai kema atafa hu-linesaya veamogamina Anumaya Kotia amaku amamena ali-gatigahie.
Anumaya Kotima kava yagai-mainea yafe kanale mono kea mukia ma mopafi veamogamina hama-paisageya havitesageno ma mopamoa hano hugahie.

Yisasia mage huno hie nayoma mainea aune kanoa Tanioloa tusi havi yana, ma mopa alino hagagitalesia yamoa tamayo aisia kava falote hisia yafe taha-pai-maine. Anima hu-mainea kema hapalitama havisamogatama havilama hiho. Ani yamoa alu aotage yapi he-ti-mainesigetama agegahae.
Agenutamahena Yutia mainesaya veamogatama tamaiyayetama agoyalega faletama viho.
Nagoa veamoya nogatofule haiya mainesaletila afenoyaamima alisaya yafena eteya nopinaga ohaiho.
Nagoa veamoya hoyafinaga mainesaletila eteya kenaamima alisaya yafena notega oviho.
Avonio ani kanafina amaipaene anene nute ani-linesaya nafanemogami itaamimoyaenefena tusia nahau nehie.
Nehigi nunamuna mage hutama havigeho “Tani koma tisia ikateene Sapati yupaenena ani yamoa falote ohinageta faleta ovisune.” hutama havigeho.

Ani kanafina tusia kana yamo falote hugahie. Ehema Anumaya Kotia ma mopama taloma hu-malenea kanaletiene meni kanafiene ani avamete ala kana yamoa falote ohuneane. Falote ohuneanagi tusia kana yamo ala hutesigeno haenagaa ania huno falote ohugahie.

Anumaya Kotia ani havi kanama alino aupa hu-malene. Aniama ohileasina mukia veamoya falileasinagi. Anumaya Kotia haigenoma hapali-ma-tenea veafe agesa havino amaugafama ali-gatisia yafe ani kanaa alino aupa hugahie.

Ani kanafina nagoa veamoya mage huya hugahae “Anumaya Kotima taugafa aligatigahie huno hutenea kanoa ma mainegi ageho. Atu mainegi ageho.” huyama hisagetamahena “Tamage nehae.” hutama tamametitia ohiho.

Ani kanafina nagoa havigeage amaune vayaene “Nagaya Anumaya Kotia tamaugafa aligatigahie huno hu-na-tenea kano mainoe.” huya havigema hisaya vayaenena evayi huya veamogamina aye-mavataga hugahe tokiyaage avame yana hugahayanagi Anumaya Kotia haye higeno hapali-ma-tenea veamoya ani kea ohavigahae.
Tamage ani yana falote ohunaya kanafi mani kea ago tamaha-paugi haviho.
Nagoa veamoya “Ani kanoa kame kotega maine.” huya hisagetamahena oviho. “Nopinaga maine.” huyama hisagetamahena ani kea havitama tamametitia ohiho.
Ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea nafanemona etena esua yamoa maa hugahie yagema vayi nehilegati aulumaya kotino aupaa mukia kotega ai-vasa nehia avamete huna nagaya etena egahue.
Afuma fali-mainea kefafima hakikimoya yage yage huya alitaluma nehaya avamete huna ikapinagati emainoa kanomona mukia veamogami amunopi egahue.
Ani havi kanamoma hano hisigenoa yagemoa hani-kinageno ikamoa ai-vasa ohugahie. Kanefimoa ikatetila atafai-lavigahie. Ikatema hanea yamoa alu kate kate huno vaiyegahie.

Ani yayagamoa hano hutesigena ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea nafanemona esua alekana yana ikate falote hisigeya mukia ma mopafima mainaya veamoya hamau huya avi-tegahae. Ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea nafanemona ikapinagati siate elavisugeya nagegahae. Tusia tokiya yaniaene tusia hale yaniaene esugetama nagegahae.

Nagetesagena ensole vayania hu-ma-tesugeya ala ufe kemo nehinageya yagemoma tavi nefalelegatiene evayi nehilegatiene aluga aluga haupalegatiene mukia ma mopafi nagainia nahaye higena hapali-ma-tenoa veanea amavalesageya aluga aluga ma mopamona atupaleti melitalu hugahae.

Yisasia nagoene mage huno hie fiki yosamoa nago avame yana tamave-ligahigi ageho. Ani yosamoa hagoteno akopapiti agusasima ayeno amumalesigetamahena “Anuna nevalea kanamoa ago falote hugahie.” hutama nehae.
Naa hugahianagi manima tamaha-nepauva kuguva yama agenutamahena “Yisasia esia kanamoa ago aupa higeno fiate hetino maineanagino ago egahie.” hutama tamakesa havigahae.
Nagaya tamage huna tamaha-nepauve meni kanafima mainaya veanea ofalinesageno ani yamoa falote hugahie.
Ikaene ma mopaene fanane hugahianagi nagai kemoa fanane ohugahie.

Manima tamaha-nepauva kanama falote hisia kanahena nago kanomoa ohavine. Ikapinaga mainaya ensole vayamoyaenena ohavinae. Anumaya Kotina nafaneamonaenena ani kanama falote hisia kanahena ohavinoe. Ohavinogi Nenafaa agaiage haviline.
Nagaya ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea nafanemona etena esua kanafima mainesaya veamoya nayoma Noama mainea kanafima mainaya veamoya hu-mainaya avamete kava hugahae.

Timoa yaufa hookinea kanafima mainaya veamoya kavela neneya tina neneya nehuya anema aliyamoene vele uyamoene mukia kanafina ani yafekeya amakesa havi havi huya mainageno Noaa ala tipi kalefi haisaga hu-maigeno tusia lina hogino mukia ani veanea alino haviya higeya agola fali hano hu-mainayane. Nagaya ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomona etena esua kanafima mainesaya veamoya nayona Noama mainea kanafima mainaya veamoya hu-mainaya avamete kavala hugahae.
Tamage tamaha-nepauve nagayama etena esua kanalema tole vekalatana nagola hoyafima aliya nealisaagenofena Anumaya Kotia nagoke neavaleno nagola alita-ye-talegahie.
Tole atalama tokaeana aliya nealisaagenofena Anumaya Kotia nagoke neavaleno nagola alita-ye-talegahie.
Anumayatamimoa evayima hisia kanahena ohavinagi tamakesa havige havige hutama kava yagaitama maiho.
Tamage huna tamaha-nepauve nomona nefaa musufa kanomoa nomaafima ehai-falesiana kegela na kanalelo huno agoma havimainesiana yagaino mainageno musufa kanomoa nomaafina ehaino ofalegahie.
Tamakaienena talo tala hutama maiho. “Menia omegahie.” hutama hisaya kana kanoale ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea nafanemona egahue.

Anumayamoa mage huno hie aliya kanoa kanale agu agesa hanea kanoa aliyamaale agegeno alige aligema nehia kanoa tamakaipina hanate maine? Naama nehisia kanomofena kava kanomoa mage huno hugahie “Mukia aliya veatela yagai-maineka kavela fako huka mukia kanafina amamite amamite huo.” huno hugahie.
Hugahianagi haenagama ani ala kanomoa eteno esiana hapai-mainea augafa kavama nehinunofena ani aliya kanomoa muse hugahie.
Tamage huna tamaha-nepauve naama nehisia aliya kanomofena kava kanomoa mage hugahie “Mukia yania kava yagaiyo.” huno hugahie.

Hugahianagi ani aliya kanomoa kefo yama nehisia kanoma mainenunofena agaia agesa mage hunoma havisiana “Kava kanonia menia hivi huno omegahie.” huno nehuno agaia yagai-mainesia venenegi munanegi nehamaeno ala kanomo kaveene havilienena neneno aneginagi hugahie.
Ani kavala maino nehisiana “Omegahie.” huno hisia yupamo kana kanoale ani kava kanoa egahie.

Enunofena ani havi kavama maino nehisia kanomona kayo kevea amiteno alino haviya hu-teteno mage hugahie “Vagala vayaene amakupi haviya omaleya amegati nehaviya vayaene maiyo.” huno hu-tesigeno visiaamo anilega avia mo neateno ave kemoa tusiya hugahie.

Anumaya Kotima kava yagai-mainea yamo aepa hesia kanamoa maa hugahie Yisasia avame kea mage huno hie nago kanomoa anea meni kanoa ali-mainea kanoa egahe higeya tenia (10) vele omainaya munanemoya lamuamia nealiya katega neuya avalegahe umainae.
Vayana faefua (5) munanemoya aifonafo hageya faefua (5) munanemoya kanale havi haviyamia hane.
Ani aifonafo munanemoya kanaleya huya lamua aliya vayanagi ata kaesaya tina oaliya umainae.
Vageya kanale havi haviyaamima hanea munanemoya kanaleya huya lamuma hanagalisaya tina keayopi taki-liya lamuamiene aliya umainae.
Umainageno ani ama alisia kanoa aupaa omegeya ani munanemoya agava-mainageno amau lokotoko higeya faeya mainae.
Faeya mainageno kege amunona nagola ala kemoa mage huno hie “Ama alisia kanoa ago neegi tamakaya kategati movaletama eho.” huno hie.
Higeya mani tenia (10) velema omainaya munanemoya hetiya lamuamia hanagaliya talo tala hae.
Hageya aifonafo munanemoya kanale havi haviyamima hanea munanehena mage huya hae “Tagai lamumoa ago asu hisia kava nehigi atama nelea tina keayopitamifiti takitama tamiho.” huya hae.
Hageya kanale havi haviyamima hanea munanemoya kenonaamia mage huya hae “Tagaiene tamakaienema aye halesuna timoa kosa ohenegi tamakaya afeno nopiti mo miya hiho.” huya hama-paiye.
Hageya ani timaa miya hugahe vageno ama alisia kanoa anile egeya talo talama hu-malaya munanemoya agaiene ala kave negahe nopinaga hai-falageno fita agola ki-malene.
Ki-malenegeya haenaga aifonafo munanemoya mage huya me hae “Ala kanomogae ala kanomogae fita yaki-la-to.” huya me hae.
Me hageno ama alisia kanomoa mage huno kenonaamia hie “Aao tamage huna tamaha-nepauve no-tama-koa anaga emainae.” huno hie.
Yisasia mage huno hie “Nagayama esua yupamona kanaaenena ohavinaya yafe menia kava yagaiho.” huno hie.
Yisasia Anumaya Kotia kava yagai-mainea yamoa maa hu-maine “Nago kava kanomoa ayaaya kotega ugahe nehuno aliya vayaamofena ke higeya ageno monea ali fako huno amamite amamite hie.

Aliya aepaamia ageteno nago kanomona faefu tauseni kina (K5,000) amino nago kanomona tole tauseni kina (K2,000) amino nago kanomona vani tauseni kina (K1,000) amino huno amamite amamite huteno alu kotega umaine.
Umainegeno faefu tauseni kinama (K5,000) amigeno ali-mainea kanomoa ani moneleti aliya aligeno ava monea nago faefu tauseni kina (K5,000) aliteno teni tauseni kina (K10,000) higeno ali-maine.
Ali-geno tole tauseni kinama (K2,000) ali-mainea kanomoa ani moneleti aliya aligeno ava monea nago tole tauseni kina (K2,000) aliteno foa tauseni kina (K4,000) higeno ali-maine.
Ali-geno vani tauseni kinama (K1,000) ali-mainea kanomoa ani monea alino mopafi kafino kava kanomo monea he-vai-malene.
Ani aliya vayamogami kava kanomoa ayaaya kanagefa umaiteno eteno eno mage hie ‘Monema fako huna tamaminoa monea namagi mone malenae?’ huno hama-vige.
