Hama-vigegeno faefu tauseni kinama (K5,000) aminea kanomoa teni tauseni kina (K10,000) alino neeno mage huno hie ‘Kava kanomogae musekaa nehugi faefu tauseni kinama (K5,000) naminapitila etena ava monene alugeno teni tauseni kina (K10,000) hane.’ huno hie.

Higeno kava kanomoa mage huno hie ‘Kagaya kanale kano maineka kanaleya huka osi mone kanoa kaminofitila efi efi huka aliyana alinageno ala hu-maineafe ala yakefa kagaila kava yagaisanafe kamigahue. Nopinaga ehaigetaa tokaetaa muse hutaa maiano.’ huno hie

Higeno tole tauseni kinama (K2,000) aminea kanomoa mage huno me hie ‘Kava kanomogae musekaa nehugi kagaya tole tauseni kina (K2,000) naminapitila ava monene tole tauseni kina (K2,000) higena alina neoe.’ huno hie.

Higeno kava kanomoa ani kanomofena mage huno hie ‘Kagaya kanale kano maineka kanaleya huka osi mone kanoa kaminofitila efi efi huka aliyana alinageno ala hu-maineafe ala yakefa kagaila kava yagaisana yafe kamigahue. Nopinaga ehaigetaa tokaetaa muse hutaa maiano.’ huno hie.

Higeno vani tauseni kinama (K1,000) aminea kanomoa eno mage hie ‘Kava kanomogae musekaa nehugi kagaya keage kanoa alu kanomo yana alika kaugafa hegeka omai kano mainane. Nago kanomoa hoyaafima kali-malenea yaene alika negeka omai kano mainane.
Mainanafe kolikaa huna vani tauseni kinama (K1,000) naminanamaga mopafi kafina he-vaina ka-tenoanagina menia kagaikaa yanagina negamue.’ huno hie.

Higeno kava kanomoa ani aliya kanohena mage hie ‘Kagaya havi kanoe. Feluage aliya kano mainane. Kagaya ago nehavine nago kanomoma hoyaafima kali-malenea yaene alina negena omai kano mainoa yafena kagaya ago havimainano?
Naa higeka monema nemalaya nopina monenima malenateasina menia nagaya nagoa ava monene aluleasine.
Vani tauseni (K1,000) kinania hafaletama teni tauseni kinama (K10,000) malenea kanomona amiho.
Nagaya tamaha-nepauve nagoa yaamima hanesia veamogamina nagoene amamisigeno kasago hu-ma-tegahianagi nagoa yaamima omalenesia veamogamina ali-linesaya yamaa hamana-falegahie.
Ani havi kavama nehisia aliya kanomona hani yapinaga avaletama hagayu hu-talesageno tusiya huno avia neateteno avekemoa hugahie.’ huno hie.”
Yisasia nagoene mage huno hie Ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea nafanemona kava yagaigahema esuana tokiyaage hale yaniaene ensole vayaene tokiyaage hale yanialeti kava yagaisua siale maigahue.
Mainesugeya mukia kotega veamoya nagaite melitalu hisagena sipi sipile neyagaiya kanomoma memene sipi sipiene ali fakoma nehia avamete huna mukia veala ali fako hugahue.
Ali fako hutena sipi sipiyaga tamaga nayatega neamatena memeyaga hauga nayatega amategahue.

Amatetena ala sauve kanomona tamaga nayategama amatesua veafena mage huna hugahue “Nenafaa kanale manua tamaminea vealagi eho. Ma mopama taloma hu-mainea kanaleti aepa heno tamakaife huno talo tala hu-maleteno kava yagai-mainea kumatelagi emaiho.” huna hugahue.
“Nagaila nagama tegetama kavela naminae. Tifema nagegetama afaa naminae. Natu kanoma ogetama navaletama falu fala hu-natetama notamifina na-tenae.

Kenanima omalegetama kena fai-natenae. Kalima alugetama navaletama yagai-natenae. Kinafima mainogetama nagegahena emainayane. Naa kavama hu-mainayafe talo hu-lama-tenea kumatela emaiho.” huna hugahue.
Hugeya tamaga nayategama fatago kavama nehaya veamoya mage huya hugahae “Anumayamogae na yu kagala tegeta kageteta kavela kaminone? Na yu tifena kagegeta tina kaminone?
Na yu natu kanoa evayi hanageta alita kanale huta ka-tenone? Na yu kenakaa omalegeta kena kaminone?
Na yu kalia alinageta kage-mainone? Na yu kinafina mainanageta mo kage-mainone?” huya hugahae.
Huya hisagena ala kava kanomona kenonaamia mage hugahue “Tamagelafa huna tamaha-nepauve tamakaya amakima omale nagananimogamima ani kavama hu-ma-tayana nagai ani kavala hu-natenae.” huna hugahue.

Hugahuanagi haoga nayatega veafena mage huna hugahue “Tamakaya hu-haviya hu-matenoa kefo kavakeya nehaya veamogatama mai-haletama viho. Sataniene aliya vayaaenena agola tegelege nehia atafi maisaya kumala ago talo hu-malenogi ani kumate agola umaiho.
Nagaila nagama liana kavela onaminae. Tifema nagegetama tina onaminae.
Natu kanoma ogetama navaletama falu fala hu-ona-tenae. Kenanima omalegetama kena fai-ona-tenae. Kalima alugetamao kinafima maugetamao me onagegenayane.” huna hugahue.

Hisugeya kenonania mage huya hugahae “Anumayamogae na yu kagala tegeta kage-mainone? Na yu tifena kagegeta kage-mainone? Na yu natu kanoa anageta kage-mainone? Na yu kenakaa omalegeta kage-mainone? Na yu kalia alinageta kage-mainone? Na yu kinafina mainanageta kage-mainone? Tagayama kage-mainoteasina ago kaya hu-mainoteasine.” huya hugahae.
Hisagena nagaya etena amakaifena mage hugahue “Tamagelafa huna tamaha-nepauve tamakaya amakima omalenea nagananimogamina ani kavama hu-oama-tayana namona nagaiene hu-ona-tenayane.” huna hugahue.
Huteno kefo yama nehaya anonaamia hu-ma-tenageya agola amakata aisia hani yapi maisaya kumate ugahagi fatago kavama hu-mainesaya veamoya ofaliya agola maige maige hisaya kumate ugahae huno hie.

Yisasia mukia mani kea hu hano huteno agaiaenema lokaeya nemaiya anagafena mage huno hie “Tamakaya ago havimainae tole kana mainesunageya kafuahe kafuahe Anumaya Kotia taginagomogami amaugafama ali-gati-mainea kanahe alitalu huya imua kigahae. Ani imuma kisaya kanafina ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea nafanemonia natafa huya yafaga yosale nili heya nasasaigena faligahue.” huno hie.
Mono note kava vayaene Yuta vayatamaene ala mono note uhagote-mainea kava kanoa, Kaiyafasie ani kanomo nopi, melitalu huya mainae.
Maineya mage hae “Hanaa huta agesi huta Yisasina atafa huta haesunageno falisie?
Ala imuma kisaya kanafina atafa ohugahune. Atafa hisunageya veamoya havigu tusia ke huya tu huyafenagita atalegahune.” huya hae.
Yisasia Petani viana nayona fugitaya age-mainea kanomo agia Saimonie kanomo nopi umaine.

Umainegeno nago amoa yafa keayola alilino anilema eana ani keayoma taloma hu-malenaya yafamo agia alapasata. Ani li keayopina nagola tusia miyamaa hanea masavena manaage tina haneanagino Yisasia kave maino nenegeno ani amoa Yisasi anupi ani masavena takino fale-tene.
Takino fale-nea-tegeya Yisasienema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya ageteya ke vaiya mage hae “Naa higeno mani manaage masavena afaa neatale?
Ani masavena nago kanomoma miya hileasina tusia mone aliteta ani masaveteti monea afenoamima omalenea veane amamuteasine.” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia ani kea haviteno mage huno hie “Kea oama-kitama afaa ataleho. Havige nehagi nagaila tusia kanale kava hu-nena-te.
Moneamima omale veamoya mukia kanafina tamakaienekeya maigahayanagi nagaya tamaikaienena mukia kanafina omaigahue.
Mani amoa masavena naugafalema takino fale-nena-teana afaa ofalina mainogeno masavema faleya he-vai-na-tesaya avamete huno fale-nena-te.
Tamage huna tamaha-nepauve mukia ma mopafi veapima nagaifena kanale mono kema hama-paisafina mani amoma hia kavafeenema hama-paisageya mukia veamoya agaifena amakesa havigahae.” huno hie.
Higeno Yutasi Isakaliotia Yisasina tuelufua (12) anagaene tokaeno nemaiya kanogino neamataleno viaamo mono note kava vayate umaine.
Uvayi huno mage huno hie “Agesi huna tamave-lisugetama Yisasima atafa hisayana na kano namigahae?” huno higeya muse huteya aupaa tetia (30) siliva alaga mone aminae.
Amigeno Yutasia vaya kulata oaiya yate kesi kateti Yisasina movalesigeya atafa hisaya kafe ati-ye-maine.

Hale oki kai-hamema nenaya kanamona hagote kanale Yisasienema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya Yisasife mage huya me havigae “Anumaya Kotia Yuta vaya amaugafama ali-ga-ti-mainea kanahe kagesa havisana kavela hana nopi mo-lalo tala hisune hunageka nehane?” huya hae.

Hageno Yisasia mage huno hama-paiye “Ala kumate uvayi hutama nago kanomote mage hutama mo hiho ‘Hu-lave-nelia kanomoa mage hie ‘Falisua kanamoa ago aupa higena kagai nopi nagaienema tokaeya nemaiya anagaaene Anumaya Kotia Yuta vaya amaugafama ali-ga-ti-mainea kanahe tagesa havisuna kavela nesune huna nehue huno hie.’ hutama hiho.” huno hie.
Higeya agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya Yisasima hama-paiya avamete huya ani kavela mo-lalo tala hu-mainae.
Talo tala hu-malageya yagemoma tavi faleamaa Yisasia tuelufua (12) anagaaene kave negahe folamole mainae.
Maineya kavela nenageno Yisasia mage huno hie “Tamage huna tamaha-nepauve nagaienema mainafitila nago kanomoga nagesi huka nahaesana yatela vai-neayane.” huno hie.
Higeya anagaamoya amaipa haviya huteya agaifena mage huya havigae “Anumayamogae nagaife nehano?” huya nagoke nagokemoya havigae.
Havigageno Yisasia mage huno hie “Nagaienema nagoke yopafiti ayateti vayagofinoma nenea kanomo nagesila huno nahaesia yatela vai-neaye.

Nagaya ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomona nagaife huya Anumaya Koti avopina kae-malenaya kate ugahuanagi vayamoya havisagi huno nagesi hisia kanomofena avonio nahau hanagi kagaya kayeka maiyo huna nehue. Ani kanomoga itakamoma okateneleasina kanale hileasine.” huno hie.
Higeno Yutasia agesima hisia kanomoa mage huno hie “Hu-lave-nelina kanomogae nagaife nehano?” huno higeno Yisasia mage huno hapaiye “Kagaya kagaika ago hu-falote nehane.” huno hu-maine.

Kavela nenageno Yisasia kai-hame kana maya alino nunamu huno muse huteno kolite kolite huno agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagala neamamino mage huno hie “Mamona nagaini naugafagi alitama neho.” huno hie.
Nagola vaini nofi alagamo ti hanea keayola aliteno nunamu huno muse huteno amamite amamite nehuno mage huno hie “Mukiamogatama neho.

Ma lina nagaia kolaniae. Nahaesagena falisugeno kolaniamoa tamakaifene huno take take hu-lavisiafe haegafa kea, Anumaya Kotiene hagelafitama maisaya kea ali fatago hugahianagino Anumaya Kotia ani kolatetifene huno kasagoya veamogami kefo yaamia aige-ama-teno atale-ma-tegahie.

Nagaya tamaha-nepauve menia nagaya vaini nofi alagamo tina nagoene onegahuanagina Nenafaa kava yagai-mainea kumate umainena haegafa nofi alagamo tina etena tamakaiene tokaena mainena negahue.” huno hie.
Higeya nagola yagamea huteya Olivi yosa hanea agoyafi hai-mainae.

Yisasia mage huno hama-paiye “Tamakaya mukiamogatama meni kegela nagaima hu-na-tesaya kavafena nagaifema havitama tamakupi maletama tamametiti nehaya yana ataletama asaga hu-lavisagi nayona ani yafena mage huno kae-maleneane
‘Nagaya sipi sipi kava kanoa haesugeya sipi sipiyaga atagufeya faleya ute ete hugahae.’ huno kae-maleneane.
Kae-maleneanagi fali-mainesufiti Anumaya Kotia alino he-ti-na-tesigena Kalili uhagote-lama-tena ugahue.” huno hie.

Higeno Pitaa kenonaa mage huno hie “Hu-ga-tesaya yafema mukia anagamoya kagaifema haviya amakupi maleya amametiti nehaya yama ataleyama falesagenahena nagaya mukia kanafina katalena ofalegahue.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia kenonaa mage huno hie “Pitaga tamage kaha-nepauve meni kegela kokolemoa agea oainesigeka tagufa (3) kanale ‘Nagaya oagenoa kanoe huka avane hugane.” huno hie.
Higeno Pitaa mage huno hie “Kagaiene nahaesagena faligahuanagina kagai kagia avanena huna ali fala okigahue.” huno higeya mukia agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya nagoke kegeya hu-mainae.
Yisasia amakaiene viaamo Ketesemani uvayi huteya Yisasia agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagafena mage huno hie “Tamakaya male maineho. Nagaya amule visuaamona nunamuna huna havigegahue.” huno hie.
Pitaene Sepeti nafanetalaene amavaleno viana aipamoa kanaage higeno haumanamoa halegeno kasageke nehie.
Huteno mage huno hama-paiye “Nahau nayamopamoa tusia kanaage nehigena ago falisua kava nehugi male mainetama kava yagaitama maineho.” huno hie.

Osia viaamo Anumayamotega ke huno havigegahe mopafi agoya moyeno maineno nunamuna mage huno havige “Nagaya ago falisua kava nehugeno ani havi kanamoa satuage hu-mainea tima hanea keayola kahaisigekahena ani keayola naha-fale-talo. Nagai nagu nagesa akave omaleka afaa kahaisia yana huo.” huno havige.
Havigeteno momakeana agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya faeya mainageno Pitafena mage huno mo hie “Vae kagaya aupa yage kanoa kava oyagaika mainano?

Satania aye-lama-vataga hisigeno tamakuamoa ‘Ohugahue.’ huno tokiyaage hugahianagi amega tamaugafamoa tokiyaa afaa omaleneanagino ‘Hugahue.’ huno hisia yana hugahigi Satani kema ohavisaya yafena kava yagaitama mainetama Anumayamotega ke hutama havigeho.” huno hama-paiye.

Huteno amataleno viaamo tole (2) kanale nagoene nunamuna mage huno havige “Nenafagae nagaya falisua kava hugeno ani havi kanamoa satuage hu-mainea tima hanea keayola kahaisigekahena ani keayola naha-fale-talo huna nehuanagi afaa kahaisia yana huo.” huno havige.
Havigeteno eteno momakeana amau tokotoko higeya faeya mainae.
Faeya mainageno tagufa (3) kanale nunamuna nagoene ani avamete huno havige-maine.

Havigeteno Yisasia agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagate eteno mage huno mo hama-vige “Mai-falu hutamage faetama mainao? Haviho kanania ago falote nehie. Nagaya ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea nafanemonia nagesi huno navaleno kefo yama nehaya vayamogami amayapi natesigeya nahaegahe nehae.
Mukiamogatama hetitama vigetao. Ageho nagesi huno nahaesia kanoa ago neegi vigeta mogamano.” huno hu-maine.

Ani kea nehigeno Yutasia tuelufua (12) anagaaene tokaeno nemaiya kanomoa evayi higeya agaiene mukia vayala, mono note kava vayaene nagoa Yuta vayatamaenema hu-matea vayaenena, ayaaya naepege naepege huya muki kayoene aliya emainae.

Agesi huno Yisasima haesaya avame yama huno amavalea kanomoa ani vayafena mage huno hama-paiye “Atakoma hisua kanoa haesaya kano mainegi atafa hutama tokiyaage hutama avaletama viho.” huno hama-paiye.
Hama-paiteno Yutasia aupaa Yisasite viaamo mage hie “Hulave-nelina kanomogae.” nehuno atako hu-maine.
Atako higeno Yisasia mage huno hie “Nenafugae hugahema esana yana aupaa huo.” huno higeya ani vayamoya Yisasina atafa huya aye-talako hu-mainae.
Atafa nehageno nagola agaiaenema he-ti-maiya kanomoa ayaaya naepea he-vayu huno ala mono notema uhagote mainea kava kanomona aliya kanoamona agesa ai-fakali-talegeno asaga hu-lavi-maine.
Ai-fakali-talegeno Yisasia ani kanomofena mage huno hie “Ayaaya naepekaa tafugepi eteka vaiyo. Ayaaya naepeleti tu hisaya vayamoya ayaaya naepeleti hamaesageya faligahae.
Kagaya ohavinano? Nagaya Nenafategama ke huna havigesuana seveti tausenia (70,000) ensole vayaa nahauke heya tuma hisaya yafena hu-ma-tesigeya egahae.
Egahayanagi naama hisagenoa hanaa huno nagaifena ‘Naa kavala hu-tesageno faligahiema.’ huya Anumaya Koti avopima kae-malenaya kemoa falote huno tamagea hugahie?” huno havige.

Anilema melitalu hu-maiya vayafena Yisasia mage huno hie “Tamakaya nagaifena ‘Vaya hamaeno musufaya nehia kano maine.’ hutama ayaaya naepene muki kayoene alitama natafa hugahena neao? Nagaya mukia kanafina efi efi huna tamakaiene ala mono nopina mainena mono kea tamaha-pauvanagi naa higetama natafa ohunayane?
Ohunayanagi nayoma mainaya amaune vayamoya kae-malenaya kemoa falote huno tamage hisia yafe mukia mani kavala hutama natafa nehae.” huno hie.
Higeya mukia agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagala neataleya fale hano hu-mainae.
Yisasima atafa haya vayamoya avaleya ala mono note uhagote-mainea kava kanomo note, Kaiyafasi note, avaleya vageya kahegi kema havilinaya anagaene Yuta vayatamaene alitalu huya mainae.

Pitaa akave anatino vianagi avatela ounegi ago aluale umaineno ala mono note hagote kava kanomo nomo haupale uvayi huno hai-faleno maineno ati vayaene mopale maineno “Yisasina hu-tesaya yana agesue.” huno umaine.
Mono note kava vayaene mukia kanisole vayaene Yisasima haesaya kaiyeke hu-tegahe nagoa vaya “Kefo kava higeta age-mainone.” huya havige hu-tesaya vayafe ati-ye-mainae.

Atiyayana omaigeya kasagoya vayamoya havige huya Yisasifena huteya haenaga tole kanolatana he-tiana Yisasifena mage huana hae “Ma kanomoa mage huno hu-maine ‘Nagaya Anumaya Kotina ala mono nomaa alina lagape ai-talena tagufa (3) kanale ani nona etena ki-talegahue.’ huno hu-maine.” huana hae.
Haageno ala mono note hagote kava kanomoa heti-maineno Yisasina mage huno havige “Kagaifena na augafa kea nehae? Kaiyekema hu-ga-taa kemo anonaania hu-falote huka nohane?” huno havige.

Higeno Yisasia avaya tukino ke ohuno maineno nago ke kanoa ohune. Ohigeno ala mono note hagote kava kanomoa eteno mage huno havige “Haimuaene Anumaya Koti aufima kaha-vi-goa kea tamage huka taha-paiyo. Kagaya Anumaya Kotia taugafa ali-gatigahema hu-ga-tenea kanoa, Kalaisiga, mainano? Kagaya Anumaya Kotina nafaneamoga mainano?” huno havige.

Havigegeno Yisasia hu-falote huno mage huno hie “E, kagaya ani kema hanana hai nehane. Tamage ani kano mainoe. Tamaha-nepauve tamakaya haenaga ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomona tusia himamua hanea Anumaya Kotina aya tamaga kaiyaga hanea siale mainena ikate hanea siate esugetama nagegahae.” huno hie.

Higeno ala mono note hagote kava kanomoa ani kea haviteno aipamoa tokiyaage higeno kenaa alino hatata nehuno mage huno hie “Anumaya Kotife hu-haviya hu-neatea kea hai havunanagiya nagoa vayamoya kaiyekea hu-oatesae. Tamakaya Anumaya Kotife hu-haviya hu-neatea kea ago haviye.
Hai havunagi na tamakesa nehaviye?” huno higeya mage hae “Anonaa alisia yafe haesageno falisie.” huya hae.

Huteya nagoa vayamoya Yisasi augosafi amavetuna he-neateya amayateti aiko-ligeya nagoamoya amayana ali atale-lineya aiko neliya mage huya havigae “Kalaisigae kaune laga huka taha-paiyo taya negahayae?” huya havigae.
Pitaa nomo haupalega mopale mainegeno nago aliya munamoa eaamo Pitafe mage huno hie “Kagaya Kalili Yisasiene tokaeka nemaina kano mainane.” huno hie.
Higeno Pitaa avane huno mukia vaya amaufi “Aao, ani kanoa oagenoa kanohe maika nehane.” huno hu-maine.
Huteno fiatega umainegeno nago aliya munamoa megeteno anile he-ti-mainaya vayafe mage huno hie “Mani kanoa Nasaleti Yisasiene vai-neayea kanoe.” huno hie.
Higeno Pitaa nagoene eteno “Aao Anumayamo aufi tamage nehue oagenoa kanomofe nehane.” huno hie.

Osia mainegeya anile he-ti-maiya vayamoya Pitafena mage huya me hae “Tamage kagaya Kalili kano mainananagika kavefuna ali-yahae higeka kema nehana yana tave-linageta havune agai anagapi kano mainane.” huya hae.

Hageno Pitaa mage huno hie “Nagaya tamakema ohisugenoa Anumaya Kotia nahaesie. Anumaya Koti aulagafi tamage huna tamaha-nepauve tamakayama nehaya kanoa nagaya oagenoa kanoe.” huno nehigeno kokolemoa age ai-maine.

Agea aigeno Pitana agesamoa aikalo higeno Yisasima hapaigeno havi-mainea kea mage huno hu-maineane “Kokolemoa agea oainesigeka kagaya tagufa (3) kanale avane huka nagaifena ali fala-kigane.” huno hu-mainea kemoa Pitana agesamoa aikalo higeno haviteno hati-lavino viaamo tusia avi mo-te-maine.
Koma alino ha-neleana mukia mono note kava vayaene Yuta vayamogami vayatamaene Yisasina haesageno falisia kea huge havige hu-mainae.
Huteya Yisasina nofi kiteteya ala kamani kava kanoa, Pailatite, avaleya ayapi motenae.

Yutasia Yisasina agesi huno kame yama hu-tea kanomoa ageana Yisasina kaiyekema hu-teteya “Faligahie.” huya haya yana ageteno aipamoa kanaage higeno eteno aminaya monea tetia (30) siliva alaga monea alino ala mono note kava vayaene Yuta vayatamaene momamine.

Mo neamamino mage huno hie “Nagaya tusia kefo yama huna kefo yama ohunea kanomona agesila huna kame yana hu-toanagino afa yafe faligahie.” huno higeya ani vayamoya mage hae “Kahaote yakae. Tagai yana omalenegi kagaikaa yane.” huya hu-tenae.
Hu-tageno Yutasia ani yafa monea ala mono nopi hagayu hu-neataleno viaamo agaia ayapiti nofila alino anomu mo-ye-maine.
Mo-yegeya mono note kava vayamoya ani monea aliteya mage huya hae “Mani monea ‘Vaya haesageno falisie.’ huya ali hage-mainaya monegita alita ala mono note monenena omalesune.” huya hae.
Huteya aliya haya kiteya “Mani monea hapaleti susufane talo nehia kanomo mopa miya hugahune. Ani mopa natu vaya he-vai-ma-tesuna mopa hanegahie.” huya hu-mainae.
Naa huteya ani mopamo agia kolamo tavi-mainea mopae huya agia malenayanagino meni kanafina ani agimoa hanegeya neayae.
Naama hayana nayona aune kanoa Yelemaiyama hu-mainea kemoa ani kanafina falote huno tamage hie. Mage huno hu-maineane
“Ani tetia (30) silva alaga monea Isaleli vayamoya ‘Haesageno falisigeta ani monea kamigahune.’ huya hu-mainae.
Anumayamo naha-pai-mainea kava huya ani monea aliya hapaleti susufanema talo nehia kanomo mopa miya hu-mainae.” huno hu-maineane.
Ani mopama miya hu-mainaya yupa ani kemoa falote huno tamagea hu-maine.

Yisasia ala kava kanoa, Pailatite, he-ti-mainegeno Pailatia Yisasifena mage huno havi-ge “Kagaya Yuta veamogami Sauveami mainano?” huno havigegeno Yisasia mage hie “Kagaikaa mani kea hai nehane.” huno hie.
Higeya mono note kava vayaene Yuta vayatamaene “Maa avamete kefo ya hu-maineane.” huya hu-tayanagi Yisasia kenonaamia ohune.
Ohigeno Pailatia nagoene mage huno hie “Mukia kefo yama nehana yana ali-falotema nehayana nohavino?” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia kenonaa nagola osi kea ohigeno Pailatia amayo ai-maine.

Kafuahe kafuahe Anumaya Kotia amaugafama ali-gati-mainea kanahe amakesa haviya imua negiyanagino Pailatia mukia ani imu negia kanafina nagoa nofi hu-matageya nemaiya vayapiti vayayagamoya haesagama huya “Agaya esie.” huya haya kanohe nofipitila “Hai hano hanagi vuo.” huno hu-neatea kanae.
Ani kanafina nago kanomo agia Palapasie vayala tavata nehamaya kanoa kina nofipi maineane.

Maineanagiya vayayagamoya melitalu hageno Pailatia mage huno hama-vige “Palapasife ‘Hai hano hanagi vuo.’ huna hisuo ifi nagaya Yisasife, veamoya ‘Anumaya Kotia taugafa ali-gatigahema hu-tenea kano maine.’ huya nehaya kanomofe, ‘Hai hano hanagi vuo.’ huna hisue? Tafe musena nehae?” huno hama-vige.

Higeya Yisasima atafa huyama avaleya emainaya vayamoya ma amakesa haviye “Mukia vayala Yisasina agai ke nehaviya tagai kea nohaviye.” huya nehayanagiya Yisasifena amaipamoa haviya higeya Pailatite avaleya metalaya yafe Pailatia agesa haviteno hama-vige.

Huteno kaiyeke hu-ma-tesia siale mainegeno aamoa nago kanomofe “Mage huka hapaiyo.” huno hu-tegeno eaamo mage huno hie “Akamoa mage huno hie ‘Namona fatago kanogi afaa atalo. Nagaya meni kegela tusiya huno koli nagesa hia himona agaitela age-mainoe.’ huno higena me kaha-nepauve.” huno hie.
Mono note kava vayaene Yuta vayatamaene mukia veafe mage huya mo hama-paiye “Mage hutama hiho ‘Yisasina haegeno falino. Tagaya Palapasife nofipitila hano hisie huta nehune.’ hutama hiho.” huya hae.
Hageno Pailatia vayayagahe nagoene mage huno hie “Tole kanolata mainaagi hana kanohe ‘Hai hano hanagi vuo.’ huna hisue?” huno higeya “Palapasina afaa atalegeno eno.” huya hae.

Hageno Pailatia mage huno hama-vige “Ma kanomofena amakaya ‘Anumaya Kotia taugafa ali-gatigahema hu-tenea kanoe.’ huya nehaya kanoa naa hu-tesue?” huno hama-vige. Higeya mukia veamoya “Yafaga yosale nili hetama asaigeno falino.” huya hu-mainae.

Hageno Pailatia mage huno hama-vige “Naa higetama ani kea nehae? Hanaa kefo yama hu-maine?” huno hianagi eteya aliya alapi ataleya ala kefiti mage huya hae “Yafaga yosale nili hetama asaigeno falino.” huya hu-mainae.

Hageno Pailatia “Nagai kea ohaviyanagiya tu hugahe nehae.” huno agesa haviteno mage huno hie “Ani fatago kanomo kolamoa nagaipina kumila omalegahigi tamakaitamifi kumitamia hanegahie.” huno nehuno tina alino ani vayamogami amaule ayana sese hie.
Sese higeya mukia veamoya mage huya hae “Haesanageno falisia kumimoa tagayaene nafanetimoyaene afaa aligahune.” huya hae.
Hageno Pailatia Palapasina nofipitila avaleno neataleno Yisasina agata aisifa kayoteti haifu amiteno Yisasina ati vaya amayapi ateteno “Yafaga yosale nili hetama asaigeno falino.” huno hie.
Ala kava kanomo ati vayamoya Yisasina avaleya ala kava kanomo no haupalega umaineya mukia amakaienema nemaiya ati vayafe ke hageya emainae.
Ayaamoya Yisasina kenaa asagi-taleteya akaya ateya “Ala kano mainane.” huya hisaya yafe ayaaya haesa kena fai-tenae.

Fai-teteya avetanafaage nofiteti tumano kula talo huteya anutela vai-teteya kupaga kayona tamaga ayapi amiteya amaleya neayeya hu-haviya hu-teteya kigi hu-teya kamuge hatageya vai-nea-teya mage huya hae “Felugae. Yuta veamogami ala sauve kanomogae.” huya kigi hu-tenae.
Augafale amavetuna he-teteya anutela kupaga kayoteti aiko-li-mainae.
Hu-haviya hu-teteya kigi hu-nea-teya haesa kena hate nea-taleteya agaia kena fai-teteya yafaga yosale nili hegahe avaleya umainae.
Yisasina avaleya kategama vayana Sailini Saimoniene mo-fotu huteya ati vayamoya motafa huya tokiyaage ke huya “Yafaga yosa Yisasi akave kofika vuo.” huya hu-tageno alino vie.
Vigeya Yisasina Kologota kumale, ani agimoa tagai kefina anu ayamufae huya nehaya kumate avaleya umainae.

Ani ati vayamoya “Haesunageno falisiana agata ai yafenagita agatama oaisia tina nesie.” huya nehuya ani atuage timo agia gala. Ani atuage tiene nofi alagamo tiene nagopi ali havigu huteya aliyama amiyana Yisasia ani lina neno agegeana higeno masu hugeno atalene.
Onegeya yafaga yosale nilia heya asai-maleteya kenaa fako huya aligahe musufa yama nehaya yokalo lageno amakasesaya vayamoya ali-mainae.
Aliteya mopale maineya kava yagaiya mainae.
Anutela kaiyekema hu-taya kema kaeya malaya avomoa mage huno hie “Mani kanoa Yuta veate ala Sauve kanoe.” huya kaeya malenae.
Kae-maleteya Yisasiene tole kanolatana vaya nehamaeana musufa ya nehaa kanolatana nago kanoa tamaga kaiyagaa haeya asai-maleya nago kanoa haoga kaiyagaa haeya asai-maleya hu-mainae.
Hu-malenageya katema ute ete huya agasaya veamoya amakeya kayo neaiya “Kefo kano maine.” huya kigi yokalofiti hu-haviya hu-tenae.

Mage huya hae “Oho kagaya ‘Ala mono nona alina lagape ai-taletena tagufa (3) kanale etena ki-talegahue.’ huka nehana kano mainane? Kagaya Anumaya Koti nafane mainenukahena menia yafaga yosa ataleka elavika kagaikaa kaugafa aligatio.” huya hae.
Hageya mono note kava vayaene kahegi kema havilinaya anagaene Yuta vayatamaene ania huya kamuge hatageya vai-neateya hu-haviya hu-tenae.

Mage huya hae “Nagoa veala amaugafa ali-negatia kanogi agaia augafa naa higeno ali-nokatie? Isaleli veamogami Sauve kanoamima mainenunofena yafaga yosaletila ataleno elavinageta agamano. Agesunana ‘Kagaya lamage nehane.’ huta tametitia hugahune.
Agaya Anumaya Kotife ametiti nehuno mage huno hu-maineane ‘Nagaya Anumaya Koti nafanemonae.’ huno nehianagino Anumaya Kotia agaifema hainagenoa menia augafa ali-gatisie.” huya hu-haviya hu-tenae.
Agaienema musufa kanolatama yafaga yosalema asai-malaya kanolatamoganienena ania huana Yisasina hu-haviya hu-tenae.
Anile yagemoa euno amunokano higeno hale-mainea yamoa hano higeno mukia kotega tusia hani-kino viaamo une kanalega eteno ali hale-maine.

Une kanalega Yisasia ala kefiti ke huno agaia kefiti mage huno hie “Eli Eli lema sapakatani.” huno hie. Tagaiti kefina mage huno hie “Anumaya Kotinimogae Anumaya Kotinimogae naa higeka nagaila nenatalane?” huno hie.
Higeya nagoa anile heti-mainaya veamoya haviteya
mage huya hae “Ilaiyafe ke nehie.” huya hae.

Hageno nago kanomoa aiya-yeno viaamo hava koyafa kana yana alino atuage nofi alagamo tipi ayeteno alino viaamo kupaga kayote maleno ani hava koyafa kana yana kiteno “Yisasia mayu mayu huno nesie.” huno amine.
Amigeya nagoamoya mage huya hae “Atalo, agava mainesunageno Ilaiyaa esiaamo yafaga yosaletila mevaleno elavisiaamo augafama ali-gatisia yafe esio. Agetetae.” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia nagoene ala kefiti nehuno agu nafanea atalegeno vigeno fali-maine.

Faligenofena ala mono nopi asai-malenaya kenagefa ayaaya ala kenagefamoa Yisasima falia kana kanoale ani kenamoa analeti aepa heno tavigeno amunopiti hatata hu-lole huno mo-talegeno imila aligeno yafayagamoa aposi-lavi-maine.
Higeya veama he-vai-ma-tenaya komumoa ai-hagalo higeya kasagoya veala, Anumaya Kotina amakuama amitafa huteya fali-mainaya veala, he-ti-mainae.
He-tigeya ani veala komufitila hetigeno Yisasia fali-mainefiti he-ti-mainea yupa Yelusalemu vageya mukia veamoya amake-mainae.

Ati vayaene kava kanoene Yisasitema yagaiya maiya ati vayamoya imima alia yaene alu ya alu yama falote hia yana ageteya tusia amamayo aigeya mage huya hae “Tamage huno mani kanoa Anumaya Koti nafane-lafa maine.” huya hu-mainae.
Nagoa aneyaga Yisasina aya hugahe Kaliliti akave emainaya aneyaga aluale hetiya maineya age-mainae.
Nagoamogami amakia osi Yemesiene Yosefegani itaanimoa Maliae Magatala kumate Maliaene tole Sepeti nafanelatamaamogani itaanimoene anifina mainae.

Yagemoa tavi falegahe higeno Yosefea Alimatia kumate kanoa, ala monea hanea kanoa Yisasi ke havino akave nemalea kanogino Pailatite mage huno me havige “Yisasina augafaa aligahe nehue.” huno havigegeno Pailatia “E” higeno ati vayaahe “Yisasi augafa aliya Yosefena amiho.” huno hu-maine.
Hapaigeno Yosefea augafa alino me-maleneno kenaleti aigalaki kalaki huno haya kino anovai-tene.

Anovai-teteno alino alino viaamo agaima he-vai-tesaya yafe higeya he falegeya kafi-malenaya yafakapi Yisasina mo he-vai-tene. He-vai-teteno ani yafa kamo avayalema ai-lilesia yafana, ala yafakefa ayetu-feno anile mo ai-lile-maleteno umaine.
Vigeana Magatala Maliaene hamoamoene anile mopale maineana he-vai-tea yafa kana age-mainae.
Sapati kanahe haviya kavela talo tala hu-maleya faeteya kotigeya ala mono note kava vayaene Falasia vayaene ala kanoa Pailatite mage huya me hae “Ala kanomogae tagaya ago havune
anima havigeage kanomoa afaama mainea kanafina mage huno taha-pai-maine ‘Nagaya tagufa (3) kanale maitena komufitila he-tigahue.’ huno hu-maine.

Nage hu-maineafe kagaya tokiyaage ke hugeya ani yafa kamona ai-lileya tokiya vai-malesageno tagufa (3) kanafina tokiyaage huya yagaisae. Havigu agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya ani komufiti Yisasi augafa musufaya huya aliya uteya veafe ‘Fali-mainefitila agaia he-tino umaine.’ huya hama-paisageno ani kema hisaya kemoa hagoteno hu-mainea kemona agasegahie.” huya hae.
Hageno Pailatia mage huno hie “Kava yagaisaya ati vayala tamamisugetama ani komule amavaletama moma-tesageya yagai-lama hugahae.” huno hie.
Higeya vayayamoya ani yafa katema malenaya yafana fukiteti aye-gamaeya ai-lileteya nagoa ati vayafe “Yagaiho.” huya hu-ma-tenae.
Sapati kanamoa hano hu-tegeno Sota yupa kola otinegeya Magatala Maliaene hamoamoene he-vai-taya komulega agegahe umainae.
Nevaageno tusia imi aligeno Anumayamo ensole kanoa ikapinagati elavino ani yafakefa ayetu-fe-neataleno agupile mopale maine.
Mainegeno augosamoa aulumayama alia kava huno aye-vasa higeno kenaamoa efeage huno alave alave hu-maine.
Higeya he-vai-taya yafakatema yagaiya maiya ati vayamoya ani ensole kanoa ageteya atili huya amakoya faiteya fali-mainaya vaya kana hu-mainae.
Hageno ensole kanomoa ani atalafena mage huno hie “Tanakaila tanamayoa oaino. Nagaya ago havimainoe tanakaya Yisasina, yafaga yosale nilima heya asai-malenaya kanohe ati-neayae.
Mafina omainegi fali-mainefitila ago heti-maine. Tamaha-pai-mainea kemoa falote higeno ago he-ti-mainegi etana malenaya kumala ma hanegi megeo.

Megetetana tanaiyayetana agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagala mage hutana mo hama-paio ‘Yisasia ofalino afaama maineno tamaha-pai-mainea kea haviho. Uhagotela-mateno Kalili ago umainegi anilega neutama Yisasina mogeho.’ hutana hio. Hai tanaha-pauve.” huno hie.
Higeana tolemogania anamayoa neaiana musena nehuana anaiyayeana agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anaga mo hama-paigahe umainae.
Nevaageno anile aupaa Yisasiene fotu mo haageno Yisasia mage huno hanapaiye “Neao?” huno higeana eana aiyale metafa huana ali soso hae.
Haageno Yisasia mage huno hie “Tanamayoa oaitana mage hutana nafunaganagamina mo hama-paio ‘Kalili neutama anilega mo nagegahae.’ hutana hama-paio.” huno hie.
Tole atalana yaufa nevaageya nagoa komulema yagai-maiya ati vayala ala kumate uya ala mono note kava vayafena mukia yama falotema hia yafena mo hama-paiye.

Mo hageya ala mono note kava vayaene Yuta vayatamaene melitalu huya huge havige huteya hu-haya kiteya ani ati vayamogamina ala mone hageya neamamiya “Mani kea hutama falote ohisaya yafe ma monea negeno hano hino.” huya hae.
Huteya mage huya hae “Tamakaya veafena mage hutama hiho ‘Yisasiene tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya kege ayaamoya faeta mainonageya augafa musufaya huya aliya vae.’ hutama hiho.
Ala kamani kanomoa mani kema haya kea haviteno kema tamama-kisiana tagaya ali fala-ki-lama-teta ‘Amakaipina kea omale.’ huta alu kema hapaisunanagenoa kea-otamama-kigahie.” huya hae.
Hageya ati vayamoya ani monea aliteya ma ma hama-paiya kemo akave malageno mukia Yuta vea mainalega mani kemoa ute ete huno menia ania huno hane.
Yisasina alevenia (11) anagamoya Kalili agoyalega umainae.
Valegati Yisasina mogeteya agia alisaga hayanagi nagoamoya tole amakesa havimainae.

Yisasia ani vaya mainale emaineno mage huno hie “Anumaya Kotia ikategaene mopafiene tusia kava yagaisua tokiya yana ago namiafe tamakaya mukia ma mopaene mopaene neutama nagai kea hama-paigeya amakua namisagetamahena Nenafa agileene nafaneamoni nagileene Alu Aotage Avamumo agileene tina fale-ma-teho.

Tina fale-ma-tetama nagayama tamaha-pai-mainoa kea ‘Akave maleho.’ hutama huge hama-velige hiho. Tamage nagaya tamakaiene mukia kanafina maime maime nevisugeno ma mopama hano hisia kanamoa falote hugahianagina otama-talegahue.” huno Yisasia hu-maine.
Yisasi Kalaisia Anumaya Kotina neamofena kanale kea mage huno aepa hie.
Anumaya Koti aune kanoa Aisaiyaa mage huno kaemaleneane
Anumaya Kotia mage huno hie “Haviho ke hamapaisia kanonia Yisasi aulega hagotena hutesugeno kana valino hilato hugahie.
Kame kotegati nago kanomoa keha keha huno mage hugahie “Anumayamo esia kana ali hilato hutama fatago hiho.” huno humaineane.

Yonia ti faleneamatea kanoa evayi huno kame kotega maineno mage huno hie “Tamakaya tamakua aiyahae hutama kefo yatamia ‘Nagoene ohugahune.’ hutama ataletesagena tina falelamatesugeno Anumaya Kotia kefo yatamia aigetamateno atalelamategahie.” huno humaine.
Ani yupa Yelusalemu veaene Yutia kotega veaene Yoni mainelega umaineya kefo yaamihena hufalote hageno Yonia Yotani lipi tina falematene.
Yonia kemolu afumo ayolagefaleti kenaa fakanino failineno amunofila pulamakamo augafaleti ayetalako huno kilineno kavea kenuene tumemo timaaene neneane.
Mage huno hamapaiye “Nakavela nago kanoa ago egahie. Ani kanoa tusia tokiya yamaa hanea kanogino nagaila ago nagaseno maigena nagaya afa kano mainoanagina agai aiyale ayesuana onategahie.
Nagaya titeti falenelamatoanagino ani kanomoa Anumaya Kotina Alu Aotage Avamualeti falelamategahie.” huno hie.
Ani kanafina Yisasia Kalili kotega hanea kumala Nasaleti kumateti egeno Yonia Yisasina Yotani lipi tina faletene.
Tina faleneategeno Yisasia tipinagati aivati huno aupaa ageana ikamoa aihagalo higeno Anumaya Koti Alu Aotage Avamumoa nama kana huno agaitega elavimaine.
Elavigeno ikapinagati nagola agea aino mage huno hie “Kagaya nagaini nafanemoga kagaifena aluya huno nahau nayamopafi nenagea nenimoga kagaifena aluya huna musekaa nehue.” huno hie.
Anumaya Kotina Alu Aotage Avamuamoa Yisasina veane omai kame kotega anatino umaine.
Umainegeno Satania Yisasife “Havi kava huo.” huno ayevataga higeno fotia (40) yupa Yisasia ani kotega afela afuyagaene mainegeya ensole anagamoya meya huya kava hutenae.
Yonina nofi hutenageno Yisasia Kalili kotega Anumaya Koti kanale kea mo hamapaiye.

Yisasia mage huno hie “Anumayamo malenea kanamoa ago evayi humainegi Anumaya Koti yagailamatesia kanamoa aupaa evayi hisia yafe tamakaya tamakua aiyahae hutama kefo yatamia ataletetama nagaifena kanale kea humainea kemoa ‘Tamage humaine.’ hutama tamakupi maletama tamametitia hiho.” huno humaine.
Yisasia Kalili ti kotumo agegayalega neuno Saimonina aganaamoene Etaluene anakeana noyame kuya nehaa kanolana maineana ala kukonogo ti kotupi hagayu huana nemalae.
Yisasia mage huno hanapaiye “Nakave eo. Nakave esaagena noyame kuyama haa kava huna vaya kuya hulanategahue.” huno hie.
Higeana aupaa kukonogoania neataleana Yisasi akave umainae.
Vaageno Yisasia nagoene neuno Sepetina netalamaamogania Yemesiene Yoniene tipi kalefi maineana kukonogo nefakaniageno Yisasia monake.
Anaketeno Yisasia ke higeana Sepetia neanafaene aliya vayaaene tipi kalefiti neamataleana Yisasina akave vae.
Kapaneamu kumate taviteya Yisasia Sapati yupa mono nopi haino Anumaya Koti ke humavelie.
Humaveligenoa agai kemoa tokiya yamaa hanea kanomo ke kana hia yafena tusia amamayo aigeya mage hae “Nagoa kahegi kema havilinaya anagamoya nehaya avamete ke nehie.” huya hae.
Anile nago kanoa Kefo Avamumoa aguafi falemainea kanoa mono nopi emaine.

Emaineno ala kenake huno mage hie “Avo Yisasigae Nasaleti kumate nafanemoga naa hulategane? Tagaila tahaeka falilategahe emainano? Nagaya kagaifena ago havimainoe kagaya alu aotage kanoa Anumaya Koti hugatenea kano mainane.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia Kefo Avamufena tokiyaage ke huno mage hie “Kea ohuka maiyo. Mani kanoa ataleka agusafinagati vuo.” huno hutene.
Higeno ani Kefo Avamumoa moyege meyege huteteno kasageke hia kava huteteno alakenake huno agusafiti ataleno hatilavimaine.

Vigeya mukia vayala amamayo aigeya huge havige huya mage hae “Na kava nehie? Na augafa haekafa ke nehie? Tusia tokiyaleti anumayaage ke higeya Kefo Avamumoya agai kea ali hipoya huya hatilaviya vae.” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasima humainea avagemoa mukia Kalili kotega ute ete higeya mukia veamoya havimainae.
Yisasia Yemesiene Yoniene mono nona ataleya anileti Saimonigani Etalugani nopinaga umainae.
Umainageno Saimonina aamona itaamo alekanoa amukonako kali nealigeno Yisasia uvayi higeya aupaa ani alekanohe Yisasina hapaimainae.
Hapaigeno Yisasia agaite eno ayate alino hetitegeno amukonako kaliamoa agola kanale hutegeno kavela kaeno amamine.
Unena yagea tavifalegahe higeya veamoya kasagoya kali veanea Kefo Avamumoya amakuafima ali haviya nehia veanea Yisasite amavaleya emainae.
Mukia ani kumate veala fiate elitalu humainae.

Yisasia havigu havagu kali nealiya veanene ali hilato humateno mukia Kefo Avamumola amakuafiti amanatitalegeya Kefo Avamumoya Yisasina agoma agemainaya yafe Yisasia mage huno hamapaiye “Mani yafena kea ohiho.” huno hamapaiye.
Natena tani kotigeno Yisasia hetino ani nona ataleno vaya omai kotega umaineno nunamuna humaine.
Umainegeya Saimoniene nagoa anagaamoyaene agaife aiyaka maeya agaitega uya mage huya mo hae “Mukia veamoya kagaifena katineayae.” huya hapaiye.
Hapaigeno Yisasia mage huno hamapaiye. “Alu kumate kumate vigetao nagaya mono kea mo hamapaigahue. Mono kema hamapaisua yafe nagaya emainoe.” huno hamapaiye.
Mukia Kalili kotega viayamo mono nopi Anumaya Koti kea hamapaino Kefo Avamula veamogami amakuafiti amanatitalene.
Nagola fugitayamo augafa alino hayagino atalako humainea kanomoa Yisasite mepe huno mage huno hapaiye “Kahaisigekasina nagaila ago ali hilato hunatateasine.” huno humaine.
Higeno Yisasia kalagi aiteteno ayana hayo huno augafale avate nehuno mage huno hie “Nahaigena kaugafamoa menia kanale hino huna nehue.” huno higeno anile aupaa kaliamoa hano hutene.

Hano hutetegeno Yisasia mage huno hapaiye “Aupaa visanaamoga ali hilato hugatoa yafena nago kanoa haopaika mono nopi kava kanomote uka mukia veala kalikaama alina kanale hugatoa kema havinuyahena mono nopi kava kanomoa kaugafa kamota huno kagetesigeka kaugafama ali kanale hugatoa yafena Mosesea ‘Ma yama Anumaya Kotina amio.’ huno humainea yana Anumaya Kotina momio.” huno tokiyaage ke hapaiye.

Hapaiyanagi ani kanomoa viaamo kanalema hutea avagea alu kumate kumate hamapaigeya kasagoya veane haviteya “Kalitia alino kanale hulatesie.” huya Yisasite emainae. Aya yafe Yisasia fufuyate visia kana omalegeno amataleno vaya omai kotega umainegeya alu kumateti kumateti veala Yisasite emainae.
Yisasia aupa kana kanoa maiteno Kapaneamu kumate eteno nomaafi “Emaine.” haya kea veamoya havimainae.
Haviteya veamoya melitalu hageno nomaafiene nosimekaenena hiya higeya nagoa veala fiategaenena maisaya yana omalegeno Yisasia Anumaya Koti kanale mono kea hamapaiye.
Hamanepaigeya foa (4) vayamoya nago kanoa aiya aya falimainea kanoa hagifanale avaleya faeteteya Yisasite avaleya ae.
Ayana kasagoya vea hiya haya yafe kana omalegeya nogatofulega haiteya Yisasi maineamaaleti hanae yosa alisaga humaleneya ani hagifanale kali kanoa atalageno Yisasina avate elavimaine.
Elavigeno Yisasia “Ma vayamoya nagaife haviya amakupi maleya amametiti hae.” agesa haviteno kali kanohe mage hie “Nafanenimoga nagaya kahanepauve ago aigekatena kefo yakaa atalegatoe.” huno hapaiye.

Higeya kahegi kema havilinaya anagamoya anile mopale emaineya amakaiami amakuafiti mage hae “Naa higeno mani kea nehie? Ma kanomoa Anumaya Kotifena huhaviya huneate. Nagoa vayamoya aigetateya kefo yatia ataleotategahayanagi Anumaya Kotia agaiage aigetateno kefo yatia atalelatesia kanoa maine.” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia aupaa amakuafinaga haviya kea agupi ago haviteno mage huno hie “Naa higetama mani kea tamaku tamakesafinaga nehaviye?
Nagayama huna hisua kea hana kemo kanaagela humaine? ‘Aigekatena kefo yakaa atalenegatoe.’ huna hisua kemoo? Ifi kali kanomofe ‘Hetika hagifanakaa alisaga hulika vuo.’ huna hisua kemoo?

Nagaya ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomona ma mopale mainena kefo yafe aigetamatena kefo yatamia atalelamatesua tokiyania hanea yafema havisaya yafe nago kavala huna tamaveligahue.” nehuno kalima alia kanohena mage huno hie “Hetika hagifanakaa nealika nokalega vuo.” huno hapaiye.

Higeno ani kali kanomoa aupaa mukia vea amaulagafi hetino hagifanaa nealino hatilavimaine. Hetino via yafe mukia melitalu huya mainaya veamoya tusia amamayo aigeya Anumaya Koti agia alisaga nehuya mage huya hae “Menia ma yupa noagona tokiyaage yana neagone.” huya hae.
Yisasia amataleno Kalili tikotumo agegayalega nevigeya mukia veamoya agaitega molitalu hageno Yisasia humavelie.

Vilegati nago kanoa mogeana ani kanomo agia Livaie Alafiusi nafanea mogeanagi Livaia musufa ya huno vaya amaugafaleti takisi mone aliliteno nehia kanogino opisi nomaale mopale mainegeno Yisasia ani kanoa mogeteno mage huno hapaiye “Kagaya nakave eno.” huno higeno Livaia hetino Yisasina akave umaine.

Haenaga Yisasia Livaina nomaafi kave mo nenegeya mukia musufaya huya amaugafaleti takisi mone nealiya vayaene nagoa kefo yama nehaya vayaene Yisasiene tokaeya nemaiya anagamoyaene ani nopina tokaeya maineya kavela nenae. Ani yupa kasagoya vayamoya Yisasi kea haviteya akave umainae.

Yisasia ani kefo yama nehaya vayaene vaya amaugafaleti takisi miya nealiya vayaene kave nenegeya nagoa kahegi kema havilinaya Falasia vayamoya mogeteya Yisasiene tokaeya nemaiya anagafe mage huya hae “Naa higeno Yisasia amaugafaleti takisi monema nealiya vayaene kefo yama nehaya vayaenena kavela nene?” huya hamavigae.

Hamavigageno Yisasia ani kea ago haviteno kenonaamia mage huno hamapaiye “Afaa kalima noaliya veamoya tota kanalega ougahagi kali veake tota kanalega ugahae. ‘Fatago vea mainone.’ huya nehaya veafe ke hugahe nagaya omenogi kefo yama nehaya veafe ke hugahe emainoe.” huno hie.

Nago yupa Yoniene tokaeya nemaiya anagamoyaene Falasia vayamoyaene kave monesiya yafe nagoa vayala Yisasite eya mage huya havigae “Naa higeya Yoniene tokaeya nemaiya anagaene Falasia vayaene kavela mosiya nemaiyanagi kagaiene tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya kavela nege nege huya nemaiye?” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia mage huno hie “Nago kanomo ama faiya esageno avaya heno nesia imu kisia yupa vayaamoyaene tokaeyama maisayana ani vayamoya kavela mosisao? Aao ani kanoa maineanagiya moosigahae.
Moosigahagi haenaga alu kana falote hisigeya kame vayamoya ama alisia kanoa atafa huya amakaipiti avalesageya ani kanafina mainesaya vayaamoya hamau huteteya mosigahae.
Nago kanomoa haegafa kena alino atafa kenalela maleno ohatigahie. Maleno hatisiana haegafa kenamoa taga huno ali haviya hugahie.

Nago kanomoa haegafa nofi alagamo timaa takino atafa mememo augafa ti keayopina otakigahie. Takisiana ani limoa kanuka hesigeno ti kena falo huno takilavinageno ani liene keayoene ali haviya hugahie. Haegafa nofi alagamo timaa hefino haegafa meme augafamo ti keayopi takino vaino.” huno humaine.
Nago Sapati yupa Yisasiene agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagaene atili hoyafi neuya atilia kalemainae.
Negalageya nagoa Falasia vayamoya ageteya Yisasife mage huya hae “Ago Sapati yupahena nagalu humalenaya kea neatagayae.” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia mage huno hie “Tamakaya Tevitia agaima avagi huya vaya vayaene amakategeya humainaya yafena nayoma kaemalenaya kea hapalitama ohavinayanagitama nehao?

Amakategeno Anumaya Koti nopi haino afa vayamoya onegahae mono note kava vayala amakaiamige negahae.’ huya nagalu humalenaya kavela Anumaya Koti aulagale malenaya kaihame maya Tevitia neneno tokaeya umainaya vayaaene amamigeya nemainae.” huno humaine. Ani kanafina Apiataa ala mono note uhagote mainea kava kano mainea kanafine.
Yisasia Falasia vayafe mage huno hamapaiye “Vayamoya maifalu hisaya kana Anumaya Kotia Sapati kana talo humalenegi veamoya ani kanamona atafa hisaya yafe veala talo ohune.
Ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea nafanemona Sapati kanamona kava yagaimainoe.” huno hie.
Yisasia nago yupa mono nopi haino mainegeno nago kanoa ayamo falimainea kanoa anile maine.
Mainegeya nagoa vayamoya Yisasima havi kavama hisiafene huya amata huya mainageno “Yisasia Sapati yupa ani kali kanoa alino kanale hutesio.” huya Yisasina amata huya mainae.
Amata huya mainageno Yisasia ayama falimainea kanomofe mage huno hapaiye “Hetika vaya amunopi me hetio.” huno hapaiye.

Hapaiteno Yisasia amata huya maiya vayafena mage huno hie “Tamahavigoe Sapati yupama hisaya yafena mono kemoa naane humaine? Sapati yupa vayala aliya kanale humategahao ifi ali haviya humategahae? Sapati yupa veala amavaleya avina me matesao ifi veala tavata hamaegahae?” huno hamavigegeya kea ohuya mainae.

Kea ohuya maigeno Yisasia mukia vaya amaulagafi moge mege hiana mukiamogami amakumoa atalako hia yafe aipamoa kana higeno kali kanomofe mage huno hapaiye “Kayana aipi huo.” huno higeno aipi hiana ayamoa kanale hutene.
Kanalema hutea yafena Falasia vayamoya mono nona neataleya Heloti vayaene alitalu huya huge havige huteya “Yisasina hanaa huta haesunageno falisie.” huya vege humainae.

Yisasiene agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagaaene Kalili ti kotumo agegaya nevageya kasagoya veane Kaliliti akave vae. Yutiatiene Yelusalemutiene Itumeatiene Yotani tifaligati veanene Taiyatiene Saitonitiene mukia veala Yisasima hia avagea haviteya agaitega vae.
Nevageno agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagafe mage huno hamapaiye “Mukia alitalu haya veamoya nagaila ayenatunefayafe tipi kalea talo tala hunateho.” huno hie.
Kasagoya veala kaliamia alino kanale humatea yafe mukia kali veamoya Yisasi augafale avate hugahe ayetufeliya vae.
Nevageya Kefo Avamumoya vea amakusafi maineya ageteya Yisasina aulegati mopafi amakoya meyeya ala kenake huya mage hae “Kagaya Anumaya Kotina nafaneamoga mainane.” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia tokiyaage ke huno mage hie “Ani kea nagoa veala hamaopaiho.” huno hamapaiye.
Yisasia agoyafi haiteno haiya vayafe ke higeya emainae.

Ageno ani vayapiti tuelufua (12) vaya hapalimateteno agaiaenema tokaeya maisaya yafeene agai kema huhaleya hisaya yafeene hapalimatene. Hapaliteno tokiyaa neamamino Kefo Avamula veamogami amakusafiti amanatitalesaya yafeene hapalimatene. Mage huno hamapaiye “Nagai kema havigena hulamatoa vayala (Aposolo vaya) maiho.” huno hapalimatene.
Ani tuelufua (12) anagamogami amakia Saimonie kanomo agia Yisasia Pitae huno malene.
Yemesiene aganaamoa Yoniene Sepetina neamogania Yisasia anakia Poanesie huno malene. Ani anakimoa tagai kefina monagemoma hia avamete huana tokiyaage ke nehaa kanolatane huno anakia malene.
Etalue Filipie Patolomiue Matiue Tomasiene Yemesia Alafiusi nafanene Tatiusiene Saimonina hamoamoa nago agia Selotie.
Yutasi Isakaliotia Yisasina haenagaa agesi huno kame vaya amayapi avaleno atesia kanoe.
Yisasia nomaalega umainegeya mukia veala Yisasite elitalu hageno Yisasiaene tokaeya nemaiya anagaene kave negahe haya yapi veala mehiya hageya onenae.
Agaia konaga afamoamoya haviteya Yisasife “Aifonafo nehie.” huya Yisasina avalegahe emainae.
Yelusalemu kumateti kahegi kema havilinaya anagamoya Yisasife mage huya mehae “Kefo Avamuma kava humainea kanoa Pielesepulimoa agupi maineno tokiya amigeno Kefo Avamula anatineatale.” huya humainae.
Hageno Yisasia haviteno “Nagaite eho.” huno ke higeya ageno avame kefiti mage huno hamapaiye “Satania hanaa huno Satanina anatitalegahie?
Nagoke kotega veamoya ali fako huya “Alu vea mainone.” huya tuma hisayana ani kotega veanenena hano hugahae.
Nagoke afamomoya ali fako huya “Alu anaga mainone.” huya tuma hisayana ani afamola hano hugahae.
Hano hugahagi Satani anagamoya ali fako huya “Alu vaya mainone.” huya hisayana Satani kava yagaisia tokiyaa omalegahianagino haviya huno hano hugahie.
Nagola tokiya kanomoa nomaafima yagaino mainesigenoa nago kanomoa musufa yama hugahe vinunoa hagoteno ani tokiya kanomona nofiteti kitalako huteteno afenoyamaa musufa yana hugahie.

Naa humaineafe nagaya tamage huna tamahanepauve veamoya mukia alu kefo yama alu kefo yaene huhaviya humate yaene hisayana Anumaya Kotia aigetamateno kefo yana atalelamategahianagi nagoa veamo Alu Aotage Avamufema huhaviya hutesayana Anumaya Kotia aigeoamategahianagi ani kefo yamaa hanege hanege huno hanegahie.” huno humaine.
Higeya “Kefo Avamumoa Yisasina agupi maine.” huya haya kehe Yisasia ani kea huno hamapaiye.
Yisasina itaamoene aganaamoyaene eya kumatega me hetiya maineya nago kanoa hutageno Yisasife ke hie.
Ke higeya mukia veala elitalu huya Yisasina aiyafi mopale maineya agaife mage huya hae “Itakamoene kaganakamoyaene kumatega emaineya kagaife ke nehae.” huya hapaiye.
Hapaigeno Yisasia mage huno hie “Itanimoene nagananimoya taya mainae?” huno hamavige.
Hamavigeno agaienema mopale mainaya veala momake memake huno amaketeno mage huno hie “Itanimoyaene nagananimoyaenena ma ma nagaiene mopale mainae.
Anumaya Koti kema haviteya haiya kavama nehaya veala itanimoya nagananimoya nasanimoya mainae.” huno hie.

Yisasia tikotumo agegayalega umaineno nagoene humaveligeya kasagoya veanea agaite elitalu huya yageyage haya yafe tipi kalefi haisaga humaino mopale maiteno ti amunopi umainegeya yageyage haya veamoya ti agegayalega hetiya mainae.
Hetiya mainageno Yisasia alu ke alu kea avame kefiti mage huno hamapaiye “Haviho nago kanomoa avina hanaigahe vie.
Avina yamaa alino aihelafino nehanaigeno nagoa avinamoa kapi tavino hanegeya namayagamoya me neya hano hae.
Nagoa avinamoya yafa mopafi taviteya osia mopa hanea yafe aupaa hagemainae.
Hagayanagi yagemoa teno amukonako higeno hafuya omalea yafe fayoteya asagaliye.
Nagoa avinamoa avetanafa inomo amunopi tavino hageteno avetanafa inoene tokaeana haiteteana avetanafa inomoa ayetegeno haviya higeno alagaa falote ohune.

Falote ohunegi nagoa avinamoa kanale mopafi tavino hageteno ala huno alaga ayeana nagoa avinamoa tetia (30) alaga ayegeno nagoa avinamoa sikisitia (60) alaga ayegeno nagoa yosalela kasagoya vani hataletia (100) alaga ayeno vasaimai vasaimai humaine.
Tamakesama hanesigetama havilama hutama haviho.” huno hie.
Mukia veala utageya agaia tuelufua (12) anagaamoyaene nagoa veaene ani avame kemona aepaahe havigae.

Havigageno Yisasia mage huno hamapaiye “Tamakaila Anumaya Kotia kava yagailamatenea yafe falakimainea kea Anumaya Kotia tamaya hinagetama havigahagi nagai kema nohaviya veala avame kekeya hamanepauve.

Ani veamoya ageme geme nehaiyanagi agelama huya oagegahae. Havime havime nehaiyanagi havilama huya ohavigahae. Havilama ohisaya yafe avame kea hamanepauve. Havigu havilama huya amakua aiyahae hisageno Anumaya Kotia aigeamateno kefo yaami atalemateyafe nehue.” huno hie
Yisasia mage huno hie “Mani avame kea havilama ohunao? Mukia avame kea hanaa hutama havigahae?” huno hie.
Avina yama hanaigahe via kanomoa Yisasife kanale mono kea nefaiye.
Nagoa veamoya kapi tavimainea avinamo avamete mainageno kanale kea faimalegeya maineya Anumaya Koti kea haviyanagi amakupi omalesaya yafe Satania amakupitila ani kea melitalene.
Ania huno yafa mopafima tavimainea avinamoa maa humaine nagoa veamoya Anumaya Koti kea haviya aupaa atafa huteya muse hae.

Muse hayanagi hafuyamoa mopafi otavinea yamoa alige atalege veane maineya osi kana kanoa osia haviya amakupi maletageno havi kanama falote nehiano Anumayamo kema haviya yafe veamoya ali haviya humatesaya kanamoma amakaite falote nehiano aupaa Anumaya Koti kea neatalae.

Nagoa avina avetanafa hanea inomo agusafi tavimainea avinamoa maa humaine nagoa veamoya Anumaya Koti kea haviteya ma mopafi mukia yayagaamihena amakesa haviya moneamima yokaloamihena kalagi aigeya ani yayagamoa Anumaya Koti kea aliya ayetalako huteya atalageno alaga aye helafino tama nohie.

Tama nohianagi kanale mopafima tavimainea avinamoa maa humaine nagoa veamoya Anumaya Koti kea haviya amakupi malageno ani alaga mukia aye henelafie. Nagoa veamoya nagoke avina yosalela tetia (30) alaga ayemainae. Nagoa veamoya nagoke avina yosalela sikisitia (60) alaga ayemainae. Nagoa avina yosalela vani hataletia (100) alaga ayemainae.” huno humaine.
Hamapaiya yafe Yisasia mage huno hamavige “Nagoa veamoya lamua hanagaliya susufaneletila aiso hunemalao ifi sipa kapinaga hanagaliya aiso hunemalae? Aao aihalesia yafe sipale hanagaliya nemalae.
Haenagaa mukia falakimainesia yamoa efalote hugahie. Mukia kesi kava nehisaya yamoa efalote hinageya veamoya agegahae.
Tamakesama hanesimogatama havilama hutama haviho.” huno hie.
Huteno mage huno hie “Anumaya Koti kema havisaya yafena tamakesa havilama hutama haviho. Havisaya kea akave malesageno nagoa kene tamahapaisigetama havigahae.
Havilama huno havilinesia kanomona Anumaya Kotia nagoene havisia yana amigahianagi ‘Ago havilinoe.’ huno nehisia kanomona havilinesiamaa hafalegahie.” huno hie.

Yisasia mage huno hie “Anumaya Koti kava yagaimainea yamoa maa humaine. Nago kanomoa avina yana hoyafi hanaemaleteno kegela mo faeteno feluga hetiteno huge hugeteana ani avinamoa hanaa huno falote huno ala nehia yamona aepaa ani kanomoa oagene.
Oagenegi afaa mopamoa agaiageya nuna amigeno aifalo huno hageteno haisa falote huteno haenaga alaga ayeno afu nele.
Akavi huteno afuma nelea kanamoa ago evayi hia yafe aupaa viayamo naepeleti hataga humaine.
Yisasia mage huno hie “Anumaya Kotia kava yagaimainea yamoa hanaa maine? Naane huna maa huno hane huna avame kefitila tamahapaisue?
Ma ma osi alagamo hia avamete humaine. Ani alagamo agia masatatie. Ani osi osi alagamoa nagoa yosalagama negaliya yosalagamoa agaseno osi kanoa hane.
Osi osi humaineanagi kalimaletegeno hageno haiteno ala yosagefa haino mukia hoyafima hanea yosayaga amakaseno ayaaya humainegeya namayagamoya akopatela noamia me negiye.” huno hie.
Yisasia ania huno kasagoya avame kea alumo alumo huno amakupima havisaya avamete kea hamapaiye.
Yisasia vayayagaene maineno mukia kema hamapaiya kea avame kegeya hamahapaiyanagi agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagala amahaote mainageno hufalote huno hamapaimaine.
Ani yupa yagemoa tavifalegahe higeno Yisasia agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagafe mage huno hie “Tikotumona atu faliga vigetao.” huno hamapaiye.
Higeya mukia elitalu humainaya veala neamataleya tipi kalefi haisaga humaiya Yisasina avaleya vageno nagoa tipi kaleyagamoya agai tipi kalene tokaeya vae.
Nevageno tusia yasimoa alino timona aikalato kalato huno tipi kalefi atalegeno tipi kalefi havategahe hie.

Havategahe higeno Yisasia tipi kalemona akavelega tala yosale afita aino faemainegeya agafa huya mage hae “Hulavenelina kanomogae tikotupi asaga hulavita ti nakaita falisunageka kahauna huotategano?” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia hetino ani limofeene yasimofeenena tokiyaage ke huno “Taga huo.” higeno yasimoene timoenena taga huana alava humainae.
Alava higeno Yisasia agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagafe mage huno hie “Naa higetama kolia nehae? Nagaife havitama tamakupi maletama tamametiti nehaya yamoa kaleyo humaineo?” huno hamavige.
Hamavigegeya amamayo aiteya huge havige huya mage hae “Ma kanoa tae? Yasimoene timoene agai kea haviteya akave nemalae.” huya hae.
Kalili ala tikotuna takaeya ame agegayamona Kelasa vea mainalega uvayi hae.
Yisasia ani tipi kalea neataleno ti agegayalega nevigeno nago kanomona Kefo Avamumo agupi mainea kanomoa matimatipinagati Yisasite emaine.
Ani kanoa yafakapinaga nomaa hanegeno anifinaga mainegeya tokiyaage seni nofiteti kitesaya vayala omainae.

Vayamoya seni nofiteti aiya ayaene kisalu kimalenageno ani nofila aigalu heneataleno aiyafi nofila yafateti ailatapegeno nofila aikano higeno “Ako huka maiyo” huya hapaisaya tokiyaamima hanea vayala omainae.
Omaigeno ani kanomoa nateene kegeene efi efi huno matimatipinagaene agoyaleene maineno tusi aviteno avovo nehuno yafateti agaia augafa aige talaga talagoma humainea yamoa amumoa tusiya humaine.
Ani kanomoa Yisasina ayaayate neegeno ageteno aiyayeno eno aiyafi aleya meyeno mopafi maineno alisoso huneate.

Yisasia mage huno hie “Kefo Avamumogae agusafinagatila hatilavio.” huno hutea yafe ani kanomoa ala kegefafiti mage huno hie “Yisasigae, ago tagaseno anale mainea Anumaya Kotina neamogae, naa hunategahe nehane? Musekaa nehugi nagata aisia kavala huonato.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia ani kanohena mage huno hie “Kagai kagia tagae?” huno havigegeno “Nagia Kasagoya-monae. Mukia Kefo Avamumoya nagupi haifaleya mainaya yafe nagia Kasagoyamonae.” huno hie.
Huteno Yisasifena mage huno hie “Musekaa nehue ma kumatetila Kefo Avamula humatesanageya alulega ovisae.” huno hie.
Nehigeya kasagoya afuyagamoya agoyafi maineya kave nenae.
Nenageya Kefo Avamumoya Yisasife mage huya havigae “Ani afuyagamo amakuafi hulategeta vamano.” huya havigae.

Havigageno Yisasia “Ania hiho.” huno higeya Kefo Avamumoya ani kanomo agupitila hatilaviya afuyagamogami amakupi haifalageno ani afuyagamoya amaiyayeya nagola aulufi kapi taviteya tipi asaga hulaviya ti nakaiya fali hano humainae. Afua tu tausenia (2,000) afuyaga fali hano humainae.

Fali hano hageya ani afuyagale kava neyagaiya vayala faleya ala kumatega mainaya veaneheene hoyafinaga mainaya veaneheene “Naa maa higeta neone.” huya hamapaigeya ani veala “Hia yana agesune.” nehuya emainae.
Yisasite eya kasagoya Kefo Avamumoma agupifiti hatilavino via kanomona agesa akalo higeno kenaa failino anile mopale mainegeya megeteya koli hae.
Yisasima humainea kavama agemainaya veamoya naa maa huno Kefo Avamula agupima mainea kanoa alino kanale hutea yafeene afuyagama humatea yafeene hamapaiye.
Hamapaigeya ani veamoya Yisasifena “Tagaila tataleka ago vuo.” huya hae.

Hageno Yisasia ugahe tipi kalefi haisaga hunemaigeno Kefo Avamuma agupiti ataleno umainea kanomoa Yisasifena “Kagaiene visue.” huno havigegeno Yisasia “Aao kagaya nokalega visanaamoga mukia Anumayamoma aigekateno hugatea yafena vayakamogamina mo hamapaiyo.” huno hie.
Higeno ani kanomoa viayamo tenia (10) ala kumayaga hanea kotega uno Yisasima hutea yafena hamapaigeya mukia veamoya amamayoa aimainae.
Yisasia tipi kalefi asaga humaino tina lakaeno eteno ti agegayalega egeya muki veamoya agaite melitalu humainae.
Emainageno nagola soka kanoa, Yailasie nehaya kanoa, emaineno Yisasina mogeteno aiyafi mope humaine.
Mope humaineno tokiyaage huno Yisasina mage huno havige “Vae nagai munala faligahe ayaya neaigi kaya mo maletesanageno kanale hutesie.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia agaiene vigeya veala yageyage huya akave umainae.
Vageno tuelufua (12) kafua mukia kanale aigu nopinaga nemaiya aala anile maine.
Nagoa tota vayate ute ete hugeteana agataiya kavala hageno moneama amaminea yamoa hano higeno ani kalia nago kanomoa ali kanale huoatenegi kaliamoa ala humaine.
Ani amoa Yisasi avagea haviteno ani yageyagema haya veapi Yisasina akavelegati kenaale mevate hie.
Avate nehuno agesa mage huno havie “Kenaale avate nehisugeno kalinimoa hano hunategahie.” huno agesafinaga havimaine.
Haviteno ania higeno aupaa kolamoa tanegeno augafafinaga malegeno ageana kaliamoa ago kanale hutene.
Kanale huteanagi Yisasia “Nagoa tokiyania ago nataleno vie.” huno agesafinaga haviteno anifima alitalu humainaya veamogami amunopi maiyahae huno mage hie “Ta kenanilela mevate hie?” huno humaine.
Higeya agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagaamoya mage hae “Mukia veala yageyage hageka neaganagi naa higeka na kea hamavinegane?” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia moge mege huno avate hia kanohe ati ayemaine.
Ati neayegeno ani amoa kalia ago kanale hutegeno agea yafe koli huno atili huteno aiyafi mope huno Yisasima hutea yafena tamage huno hapaiye.
Hapaigeno Yisasia mage huno hie “Amogae nagaifema havika kagupi maleka kametiti hanageno ago kalikaamoa kanale hugategi kaipamoa yasi nehinageka afaa vuo. Kalikaa agola hano hie.” huno hapaiye.
Hanepaigeya nagoa vayala soka kanoa, Yailasi notegati mage huya me hapaiye “Munakamoa ago falimainegi ataleka kava kanomona kasalo haegi nagoene havioko.” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia hapaiya kehena ohavisia agesa haviteno soka kanohena mage huno hie “Kolia ohuka nagaife havika kagupi maleka kametiti huo.” huno humaine.
Mukia veafena omeho huneamateno Pitaene Yemesiene nepuamoa Yoniene amavaleno umainae.
Soka kanomo note uvayi huya agayana mukia veala tusia avineatageno Yisasia nopi haifaleno amakaifena mage huno hie “Naa higetama tusia avianeatae? Ma munala ofalinegi afaa faeno maine.” huno hie.

Mani kea higeya veamoya faligeyama agaya yafe kigia hutageno “Kumatega hatilavitama viho.” huno higeya kumatega hatilavigeno Yisasia itaafoamoganiene agaiaenema vaya anagaene amavaleno falimainea munama malalega amavaleno haimaine.
Haino umaineno ayate atafa hulineno agaia kefiti mage huno hie “Talita kumi.” huno hie. Tagaiti kefina “Ma munamoga kahanepaugi hetio.” huno humaine.
Higeno aupaa ani munamoa hetino ute ete hie. Ago ala munalagino tuelufua (12) kafua hanea munalagino hetino ute ete higeya anile mainaya veamoya amamayo aiye.
Amamayo aigeno Yisasia tokiyaage ke huno “Anima agaya yafena veala hamaopaiho” huno kahegi neamateno “Kavela amiho.” huno humaine.
Yisasia ani kumala ataleno viaamo ko aepaalega vigeya agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya akave umainae.

Sapati yupa mono noamifi haino Anumaya Koti kea mukia vayala hamapaigeya haviteya amamayo aigeya mage huya hae “Mukia havi haviyana hanateti alia kea nehie? Ayapitila tokiyaage avame yama humainea tokiyaa hanateti alimaine?

Mani kanoa no negia aliyate kano maineanagi Malia nafane mainegi Yemesiene Yoseseene Yutasiene Saimonienena aganaamoya mainagi asaamoya tagaiene nagopi mainae.” huya huteya amaipa kafa heteya amakaveno hutenae.

Amakaveno hutayanagi Yisasia mage huno hie “Anumaya Koti kema nehia kanomoa mukia kumate mono huhaleno hamapaisiana agia alisaga nehagi kumaale maisiana agaia afamoene no kumaale vayaenena agia alisaga ohugahae.” huno humaine.
Mani kumatela ala tokiya avame yana ohunegi afaa nagoke nagoke kali vayake aya malegeno kanale humatene.
Kanale humatenegi afaa mukia veala agaife haviya amakupi maleya amametiti ohaya yafe Yisasia amayo aigeno alu kumate kumatela vaiyeno monola hamapaino humaveli maine.
Yisasia tuelufua (12) anagaamogamife ke higeya ageno mukia Kefo Avamuma veamogami amakupiti amanatitalesaya tokiya amamiteno mage hie “Tole ali lokaete lokaete hutama viho.” huno humatene.
Huneamateno mage huno hie “Kama visayana ayopatamige alilitama viho. Kutamiene mayaene monetamiene alitama oviho.
Tamaiya nona vaigahayanaki tole siota vaioaliho.”
Nagoene mage huno hie “Nago nopima haifalenutamahena ani nopi faetama maitama hutetama amataletama alu kumatela viho. Faelitetama ohiho.

Nagoa kumatema visageya veamoya ali falu falama huotamateya ‘Tamakai kema ohavigahune.’ huya hisagetama ani kumala neataletama ‘Havi kava hae.’ hutama hisaya yafe tamaiyafima hanesia kugukege mopa aihehe huneataletama viho.” huno hamapaiye.
Hamapaigeya ani vayala neuya mukia veanehe mage huya hae “Kefo yatamihena havitama tamakaye nehinagetama tamakua aiyahae hiho.” huya hamapaiye.
Hamapaiya mukia Kefo Avamula veamogami amakupitila amanati neataleya kasagoya kali veala amaugafale masavena falematageno kanale humatene.

Ani kanafina Yisasi avagemoa ala higeno nagola sauve kanomo agia Helotie anima haya kea havimaine. Nagoa veamoya Yisasifena mage huya hae “Ma kanoa tima falematea Yonie falimainefiti hetimaine. Hetimaineafe tokiyaa hanegeno ma tokiya aliyana nealie.” huya hae.
Hageya nagoa veamoya Yisasifena mage huya hae “Ma kanoa Ilaiya maine.” huya hageya nagoa veamoya “Aune kanoa nayo amaune vaya kana nehie.” huya hae.
Hageno Helotia haviteno mage huno hie “Yonina haeho huna hugeya ageya hataga hutalenaya kanoa faliteno komufiti hetimaine.” huno hie.

Helotina aganaamo agia Filipie. Filipi amo agia Helotiasie. Helotia Helotiasina kumai a alitenea yafe Yonia Helotife mage huno hie “Anumaya Koti kea atagaeka kaganakamo aala kumai a alitenane.” huno hia yafe Helotia vayala humategeya Yonina motafa huya avaleya kina nopi hutenayane.

Hutenageno Helotiasia Yonifena tusi hai vaiteteno haesageno falisia agesa havino maiyanagi Helotia agesa mage huno havimaine “Yonia kefo yana ohuno fatago kanoa alu aotage kano maine.” huno havilinea yafe Yonifena koli huno “Ohaegahae.” huno aunevaino agai kea haviteno agesa kumo nehuno tole agesa havino afaa muse huno kea nehaviane.
Nago yupa Helotina atenea kanamoa falote higeno Helotia ala imu kimaleteno mukia kamani kava vayaene ati kava vayaene Kalili kotegama afenomaa kasago humainea vayayagaene ke higeya imulega emainae.
Emainageno Helotiasina munaamoa eno amoneayegeno Helotiene vayaamoyaene neageya tusia musemaa hageno Helotia ani munamofena mage huno hie “Kahaisia yafena afaa hisanagena kamigahue.

Anumaya Koti aulagafi kahanepauve nagoa yafema nahavigesanana afaa kamigahue. Mone fenoenefema nehuka mopaenefema hisanana afaa nagai yayaga haneanagina amunopiti ali fako huna kamigahue.” huno humaine.

Higeno ani munamoa viaamo itaamofena mage huno havige “Na kanohe ke huna havigesue?” huno higeno itaamoa mage huno hie “Yonia ti falemate kanomo ageya fakaliteka anumaa aifakalika me namio huka hapaiyo.” huno hie.
Higeno aiyayeno ala sauve kanomotega viaamo mage huno hapaiye “Aupaa ti falemate Yonina ageya fakaliteka anumaa yopafi maleka me namio.” huno hie.

Higeno ala sauve kanomoa haviteno aipamoa tusia kanaage higeno Anumaya Koti aulagafima huno lokiya vaimalea yafeene maiya vayafeene agesa haviteno mage huno hie “Ani munamo kea he falaokigahue.” huno hie.
Higeno aupa kanoa nago ati kanoa huteno mage huno hapaiye “Yonina ageya mo fakalika anumaa alika eno.” huno higeno kina nopi viaamo Yoni ageya mo fakalitalene.
Fakaliteno anumaa yopafi maleno alino eaamo ani munamona memigeno itaamona alino amine.
Amigeya Yonienema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya ani kea haviteya uya augafaa moliya yafakapi mo hevaitenae.
Aposolo vayala Yisasitega eteya mukia humainaya kavaene humaveliya kene eya me hapaimainae.

Me hanepaigeya mukia veamoya agaitega neuya neeya maiya hageno Yisasienema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya kaveamima nesaya kanaamia omalea yafe Yisasia mage huno hie “Egeta tagaitige kame kotega umaifalu hamano.” huno hie.
Higeya amakaiamige tipi kalefi haisaga humaiya kame kotega ugahe umainae.
Vageya mukia veamoya amaketeya amaugosafina ago agemainaya vayalegiya kumaamileti mopafi amaiya yeya uhagoteya ani kame kotega uvayi humainae.

Uvayi hageno Yisasia tipi kalefiti asaga hulavino ageana mukia veanea elitalu humaiya veala amaketeno agesa mage huno havie “Ma veanea sipi sipi kana huya mainayanagi kava yagaisaya vayala omainae.” huno agesama havia yafe kalagi aimateno alu ke alu kea hamapaiye.

Hamanepaigeno yagemoa tavi falegahe higeya agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya agaite eya mage huya hae “Ma kumala vaya omai kuma hanegeno yagemoa tavi falegahe nehiafe ma veala humatesanageya uya nagoa veamogami hoyafitiene notegatiene nesaya kaveamia mo miya hisae.” huya hae.

Hageno Yisasia mage huno hamapaiye “Tamakaya tamakaitami nesaya kavela amamiho.” huno higeya agaifena mage huya hae “Nago kanomoa tu hataletia (200) kanafi aliya aliteno ani moneleti kosa hesia maya miya ohileasine. Tagaya ani moneleti mo miya hulita ani maya memamisune hunageka nehano?” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia mage huno hie “Mogeho namagi maya hane?” huno higeya uya mogayana higeya “Faefua (5) mayagi tole noyamegi huno hane.” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia mage hie “Mukiamogatama alitalu hute hute hutama kanale apepate mopale maiho.” huno hie.
Higeya fifitia (50) veala nagopi alitalu huya maigeya vani hataletia (100) veala nagopi alitalu huya mainae.

Yisasia faefua (5) mayaene tole noyamene aliteno anafinaga agesaga huno neageno Anumaya Kotitega ani kavefe huno muse huteno maya kofa huno agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagala amamigeya aliya fako hutele huya veala neamamigeno tole noyamene kolino mukia veama nesayafe amamine.
Amamigeya mukiamoya neya amamu hae.
Amamu higeya atalaya mayaene noyamene atupatapaa alitalu huya kupi aiteya tuelufua (12) kupi aigeno havatemaine.
Ani kavema nemainaya vayala faefu tausenia (5,000) vemoya nemainae.

Aupaa Yisasia agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagafe mage huno hie “Tamakaya nagaila nenataletama hagotetama tipi kalefina haisaga humaitama atu kaiyaga Petesaita kumatega utegena nagaya veala humatesugeya viho.” huno hie.
Viho humategeya utageno Yisasia Anumayamotega ke huno havigegahe agoyafi haimaine.
Haino mainegeno hanikigeno tipi kalemoa tikotumona amunopi utegeno Yisasia agaiage ti agegayale maine.
Maineno ageana amaulegati yasimoa eaamo tipi kalemona meyetu fegeteana ovigeno Yisasia ageteno kotigahe hia avametega ti kotumona agupile viaamo amakaitela momakasegahe hie.
Amakasegahe ti agupile vianagi eneegeya ageteya amakesa mage huya haviye “Hakalo neefi?” nehuya “Avovo.” hae
Avovo huya tusia koli huteya atali talu hayanagi aupaa amakaifena mage huno hie “Kolia ohutama maiho. Nagaya neogi tokiya vaitama maiho.” huno hie.
Huteno tipi kalefi haino amakaiene nemaiyana yasimoa taga higeya ani vayamoya tusia amamayoge humainae.
Yisasia tokiyaaleti kavema amaminea yafena amakuamoa hayagino atalako higeya aepaa havilama ohunae.
Ti kotuna takaeya Kenesale kotega uvayi huteya hatilaviyama vayana tipi kalea nofiteti ayetenae.
Tipi kalefiti hatilavino nevigeya aupaa veamoya Yisasina augosafina agemainae.
Ageteya note note amaiyayeya ute ete huya kali veala hagifanale amavaleya “Yisasia ma kumate maine.” huya haya kea haviteya agaite amavaleya etele humainae.

Yisasia vilega osi kumatelo ala kumatelo talapinagao kali veala amavaleya kuma amunopi momateneya Yisasifena mage huya havigae “Kanale kenakamo atupalela avate hisuno?” huya hateya avate humainaya veala kalimoa kanale humatene.
Nagoa Falasia vayaene kahegi kema havilinaya anagaene Yelusalemuti Yisasite emainae.
Emaineya agayana nagoa Yisasiene tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya amayana sese ohuya kavela nenageya amakemainae.
Falasia vayaagela omainagi mukia Yuta veamoyaene amakinagomoya humainaya kava akave maleya amayama sesema ohayana kavela onenagi sese huteyage nenae.

Situatega ugeyama enuya tima ofalesayana onegahagi tina faleteyage amaugafamoa hilato hutegeya kavela nenae. Ani yamaagelomagi nayona vayamoya kahegi kea tokiyaage huya humainaya kehe haviya masuene yopaene susufanene mukia sese nehae.

Falasia vayaene kahegi kema havilinaya anagaene Yisasife mage huya me hae “Naa higeya kagaienema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya taginagomogami kavala neataleya ani kea atagaeya kavema negahena amayana sese nohae?” huya havigae.
Hageno Yisasia kenonaamia mage hie “Tamakaya vagala vaya mainae. Aisaiyaa Anumaya Koti aune kanomoa tamakaifena tamage huno Anumaya Koti autamafina mage huno humaineane
‘Ani nofi veamoya amavayaleti huya nagai nagia alisaga nehayanagi amakuamoa alulega hanegeya ania kavala nehae.

Amakaya ma mopafi veamogami amavayafiti humainaya kahegi kehe mage humainayane ‘Mani kea Anumaya Koti ke hanegi akave maleho.’ huya humainayanagi nagai nagia alisaga hisaya kavala ohuya afa kava maiya nehae.’ huno kaemaleneane.
Anumaya Koti kahegi kea ataletama veamoya malenaya kea akave nemalae.
Huteno nagoene mage huno hie “Tamakaitami tamakinagomogami kavama akave nemalaya yafe Anumaya Koti kahegi kea ago atalenae.
Mosesea mage huno humaineane
‘Tamakaya itatami afotamimogami amakia alisaga nehutama keamia veganokanola ohutama amaiyaafinaga maiho. Nagoa veamoya itaafoamimogamima kamugema vaimatesayana faligahae.’ huno humaineane.

Humaineanagi tamakaya mage hutama hae ‘Nago kanomoa itaafoamogani anaya hisia monema hanesigenoa itaafoamoganina anayama ohinunoa mage huno hisie ‘Ani monea Anumaya Kotina amisua yane huna humainoe.’ huno hinunofena itaafoamoganina nagoene anayama ohisiana kanalele.’ hutama nehae.
Ani kema haya yafe tamakinagomogami kavala akave malenayafe Anumaya Koti kehena ‘Afa yane.’ hutama mukia ani kavala nehae.” huno humaine.
Yisasia kasagoya veala agaite esaya yafe nagoene ke higeya ageno mage huno hie “Tamakaya mani kea havilama hutama haviho.
Nagoa nesaya yamoma tamavayafi visia yamoa tamakuafina oniya otamahaugahigi tamakuafitima hatilavisia yamo ali falote hisigeno tamakuamoa oniyaagela hugahie.” huno hie.
Huteno neamataleno nopinaga haino mainegeya agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya Yisasife mage huya hae “Kagaya mani avame kemona aepaa hugeta havimano.” huya havigae.
Havigageno Yisasia mage huno hie “Tamakaienena havilama ohutama nehao? Tamakaya ohavinao mukia yana tamavayafima nesaya yamoa oniya otamahaugahie.
Tamavayafi nayaamoa tamakuafina ouno afaa tamaipafike taviteno haenagaa aifayolagafina taviteno afa ya kana nehie.” huno hie. Mani kema hiana mukia kavela afaa nesaya kavekeya hane huno hie.
Huteno mage huno hie “Nagoa yama tamavayafitima hatilavisia kemoa tamakuamona alino oniyaage nelamahaiye.

Veamogati taguafitima efalote hia yamoa maa huno ali falote nehie kanale ohunea tagu tagesa nehavuna yaene ane munanene kumai he yaene musufaya hu yaene vaya hamaefali yaene alu kanomo ane amavayu hu yaene alu kanomo yafe age haye hu yaene kefo yaene havige huno savale savala hu yaene age lamahaye nehaya yaene veamogami taipa havita haviya huneamatona yaene veafe havige humate yaene taugafa alita hai yaene kema ohavi yaene taguafitila ali falote nehie.
Mukia ani kefo yama nehaya yana tamakuafiti efalote hia yamo tamakuafina oniyaagela humaine.” huno hie.
Yisasia ani kumala neataleno Taiya kumamo kaiyaga umaineno agaiama anilema emainea yafena veamoya ohavisae huno nago nopi haino maiyanagi afaa agaia falaokigahie. Veamoya ago haviye.
Aupaa nago amoa Yisasi avagea haviteno eno aiyafi aleya meyemaine. Ani amo munamona agupi Kefo Avamula mainea alagino.
Isaleli vea omainea alagino Kaliki ke nehuno Fonisia nofi ale. Silia kotega alagino munaamona agupi mainea Kefo Avamu anatitalesie huno aukaya huno havige.
Yisasia mage huno hie “Nafanemoya hagoteya kavela negahae. Havigu nafanemogami kavela hamanafaleta kalayagamogami amamisunana haviya hugahie.” huno hie.

Higeno ani amoa mage huno hie “Anumayamogae tamage hananagi nafanemoya nenageno osi atupaa sipaleti asaga hulavia yana kalamoya yogiya nenae. Kagaya ani kava huka nagaya Isaleli a omainoanagi osia nahamao.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia ani afena mage huno hapaiye “Kekaa ago hanagena havuafe nokalega vuo. Kefo Avamumoa munakamona ago ataleno vie.” huno humaine.
Higeno nomaalega viaamo mogeana Kefo Avamumoa ago ataleno vigeno munaamoa kanale huno sipale faemainegeno itaamoa mogemaine.
Yisasia Taiya kumala ataleno aiyahae huno Saitoni kumala agaseno viaamo tenia (10) kuma hanelega mogaseno Kalili ti agegayalega uvayi humaine.
Uvayi higeya veamoya nagola yuna aifo kanoa Yisasitega avaleya vayana ani aifo kanomoa hagifali ke nehatagegeya Yisasife mage huya hae “Augafale kayateti avate hisane.” huya havigae.
Yisasia ani kanoa neavaleno veala amataleno faitega anakaianige umaineana aya avoyaleti aifo kanomona agesafi vaiteno avetuna heno ayateti avefunale avatemalene.
Malegeno anafinaga agesaga huno “Vaeha ausonio.” huteno agaifena agaia kefiti mage huno hie “Efata.” huno hie. Tagai kefina “Kagesa akalo hino.” huno hapaiye.
Higeno agesamoa akalo higeno avefunamoa kanale higeno aikalo huno kea kea hie.
Yisasia mage huno hie “Nagoa veala mani yafena hamaopaiho.” huno kahegi mateanagi ani kea huya atile male huya mukia veamogami amakesale mohu mehu humainae.
Hageya haviya veamoya tusia amamayo aigeya mage hae “Mukia yana aligeno kanale kanale nehie. Yuna aifo vayala aya malegeya kea nehaviye. Aifo vayala keamia ali falote huneamamie.” huya nehae.

Nago yupa kasagoya veamoya alitalu huya maiyana nesaya yana omalegeno Yisasia agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagafe ke higeya ageno mage hie “Mani veala tagufa (3) yupa nagaiene mainageno nesaya kaveamia omalea yafe nahau huneamatoe.
Nagoa veala ayaaya kotegati emainagi havigu amatalesugeya katega nevisageno amakatesigeya amaugetunatu huya takatiyafena nonahaiye.” huno hamapaiye.
Yisasienema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya mage huya hapaiye “Mauna kola vaya omai kolagi hanateti maya alita ani veanea amamisune?” huya havigae.
Hageno Yisasia mage huno hamavige “Tamakaya namagia maya hane?” huno higeya mage hae “Tagaipina sevenia (7) mayaage hane.” huya hapaiye.

Hageno Yisasia muki veafena “Mopale maiho.” huno higeya mopale mainageno Yisasia ani sevenia (7) maya alino Anumayamotega muse huno havigeteno aposite aposite huteno agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagala amamigeya mukia veapina vaya kaimainae.
Nagoke okasi noyame kanoa hanegeno Yisasia Anumayamotega ani noyamehe muse huteno “Amamite amamite hiho.” huno higeya vaya kaimainae.
Kaigeya mukia veanea nageno amamu higeya atalaya maya atupayaga Yisasienema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya alitalu huteya sevenia (7) kupi aihavatemainae.
Ani kavema naya venenea fo tausenia (4,000) vayamoya nemainae. Netageno Yisasia humategeya umainae.
Utageno Yisasia agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagaene tipi kalefi haisaga humaiya Talamanuta kumatega umainae.
Falasia vayamoya Yisasite eya agaiene ke vaiya ayevataga hisaya yafe mage huya hae “Kagaya ikapinagati tokiyaage avame yana hugeta agamano.” huya hae.

Hageno Yisasia aipa havino kanaage huteno mage huno hie “Naa higetama meni kanafima mainaya veamogatama tokiyaage avame yafena nahavinegae? Tamage tamahapaisua kea haviho meni kanafima mainaya veamogatamina tokiyaage avame yana tamaveotigahue.” huno hie.
Huteno neamataleno tipi kalefi haisaga humaino atu faliga ugahe umaine.
Yisasienema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya tima lakaeya vayana amakekaniya nagoke maya kanoa aliya umainae.

Aliya vayanagino Yisasia mage huno hamapaiye “Tamakaya Falasia vayaene Helotiene amakupima hanea yana agelama ohuneya amavayaleti havigema nehaya yamoa kaihamemo halenegia avamete huno halegino alakefa hisia yafena kaye ho.” huno hie.
Higeya ani vayamoya amakaiamia huge havige nehuya mage hae “Tagaya maya oalita emainona yafe nehie.” huya amakaiamia hae.

Hageno Yisasia ani vayamoya haya kea ago haviteno mage hie “Naa higetama ‘Kavetia alita omenone.’ hutama tamakaitamia huge havige nehae. Tamakesa havilama hutama ohavinao? Tamakuamoa tilemainegetama nohavio?

Tamaulaga haneanagi agelama nohao? Tamakesa haneanagi havilama nohao? Faefua (5) maya alina apositena faefu tausenia (5,000) veyagama amaminoa yafena tamakekanitama mainao? Namagi kupi atupatapa aimalageno havatemaine?” huno hamavigegeya “Tuelufua (12) kule.” huya hapaiye.
Hageno mage huno hie “Sevenia (7) maya alina apositena fo tausenia (4,000) vaya amamugeya neteya namagi kupi atupatapa aigeno havatemaine?” huno hamavigegeya “Sevenia (7) kule” huya hapaiye.”
Hageno mage huno hie “Naa higetama nohaviye?” huno hamavige.
Petesaita kumate uvayi hageya veamoya nagola aulaga asu humainea kanoa avaleya Yisasite neeya mage huya hae “Musekaa nehunagi augafale avate huo.” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia aulagama asu humai kanoa ayate alino kumala ataleno avaleno malaga viaamo aulagafi avetuna heteno aya nemaleno mage huno havige “Nago yana neagano?” huno havige.
Higeno agesaga huno ageana higeno mage huno hie “Veala neagogeya yosa kana huya vaiyatete nehae.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia nagoene ania huno ayana aulagale malegeno aulagamoa kanale higeno agemaine. Aulaga age haleno muki yana kanaleya huno agemaine.
Agegeno Yisasia mage huno hie “Ma kumatela ouka eteka nokalega vuo.” huno hie.
Yisasia agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagaene Sisalia Filipai kotega hanea kumate ugahe katega neuno mage huno hamavige “Veamoya nagaifena tae huya nehae?” huno hamavige.

Hamavigegeya kenonaa mage huya hae “Nagoa veamoya kagaifena ‘Tima fale neamatea Yonie.’ huya hageya nagoa veamoya ‘Ilaiya maine.’ huya hageya nagoa veamoya ‘Anumaya Kotina aune kanoa maine.’ huya nehae.” huya hapaiye.

Hapaigeno Yisasia mage huno hamavige “Tamakaya nagaifena tae hutama nehae?” huno hamavigegeno Pitaa kenonaa mage huno hie “Kagaya Kalaisigae Anumaya Kotia taugafa aligatigane huno hugatenea kano mainane.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia amaumono maleno mage huno hie “Mani kea nagoa veala hamaopaiho.” huno humaine.
