Ani yupa Yisasia agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagafena haenagama falote hisia yafe aepa heno hamapaino mage huno hie “Nagaya ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomona tusiya huna nagata yana alisugeno Yuta vayatamaene mono note kava vayaene kahegi kema havilinaya anagaene amakaveno hunateya nahaesagena falisugeya komufi hevainatesageno naugafamoa tole yupa maitenagena tagufa kanale falimainesufitila etena hetigahue.” huno hamapaiye.
Hufalote huno hamapaigeno Pitaa Yisasina faitega avaleno mage huno mo hapaiye “Kagaya ani kea ohuo.” huno hie.

Higeno Yisasia maiyahae huno nagoa agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagala amaketeno Pitafe keamakino mage huno hie “Sataniga mai halenato kagaya Anumaya Koti havimainea aguagesa kanaleya huka nohavinagi vayamoya kahapaiya amaku amakesa nehavine.” huno hie.

Huteno kasagoya alitalu haya veanene agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagafeene ke higeya ageno mage huno hamapaiye “Nagoa veamoya nakave visaya amakesa havinuyahena amaugafama aliya hai yana amakaveno huteteya nagaima nagata aisigenama falisua avamete amakesa haviteya yafaga yosa kofiya nakave visae.

Nagoa veamoya hamaimuma hanesigeya mai yaamima atafa hutalako hisagenoa ani yamoa fanane hugahianagi nagoa veamoya nagaife huya nagai kanale mono kema hamapaisaya yafema mai yaamiene hamaimuamiene atalesagenoa ani mai yaami aligatisigeya agola maigahae.
Nago kanomoa mukia ma mopafi afeno yama alisia yafe faliteno agola maige maige hisia haimua atalesiana alimainea mone afeno yamoa hanaa huno hamaegahie? Aao haomaegahie
Falitesigenofena agola maige maige hisia haimula eteno alisia yafe mukia ma mopafi mone fenoyana afaa atalegahianagi aya ohugahie.

Nagoa veamoya meni kanafina kefo yama nehaya veanene, Anumaya Koti kema ataleteya alu kate nevaya veanene, maineya nagai kene nagainienefema huya ‘Aoteyamaae.’ hunatesagena nagaya ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomona esua yupa Nenafana tokiya hale yamaaene alu aotage ensole anagamoyaene etena esuana ania huna ani veanehena nagaye huna ‘Tamahaoteyatamie.’ huna humategahue.” huno humaine.

Yisasia mage huno hamapaiye “Tamage huna tamahanepauve malema hetiya mainaya veala nagoamogatama ofalinesageno hagoteno Anumaya Koti kava yagaisia yamoa himamu yamaaene efalote hinagetama agetetama haenaga faligahae.” huno hamapaiye.
Yisasia sikisia (6) kana maiteno Pitana Yemesina Yonigamina amavaleno ayaaya agoyafi haiya amakaiamige maineya agayana Yisasi augafamoa alino alu augafa kalimaine.
Kenaamoa mopafima mainaya veamoya sese nehageno efeage nehia avamete ohunegi tusiya huno efeage huno alave alave humaine.
Tole kanolatana Moseseene Ilaiyaene evayi huana Yisasiene kaiyeke nehaageya agemainae.

Pitaa Yisasife mage huno hie “Hulavenelina kanomogae tagaya male maunana kanale nehie. Tagaya katega nona tagufa (3) kilamatesune kagaila nagolagi Mosesena nagolagi Ilaiyana nagolagi huta kilamatesune.” huno hie.
Tusiya huya kolima haya yafe Pitaa ‘Naane ke hisue?’ huno agesa havigeno mani kea humaine.

Ani kea hanepaigeno agola siamoa evayi huno melino aiso humategeno ani siapinagati age aino mage huno hie “Mani nafanea nagai nafanegi naguafifena nenahaiya nafanegi agai kea haviho.” huno siapinagati humaine.
Higeya aupaa moge mege huya agayana nagoa vayala omaigeno Yisasia agaiage mainegeya agemainae.

Ageteya agoyafitila enelaviya Yisasia kahegi maleno mage huno hamapaiye “Manima agaya yafena nagoa veanea hamaopaiho. Haenagama nagaya ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomona falimainesufiti hetisua yupa hamapaigahae.” huno hie.
Higeya ani kemo akave maleya hamaopainagi “Falimainesufitila etena hetigahue.” huno hia kemo aepaahe atiyeya amakaiami huge havige hae.
Mage huya Yisasina havigae “Naa higeya kahegi kema havilinaya anagamoya Ilaiyaa hagoteno etesigeno Anumaya Kotia hutesigeno taugafa aligatisia kanoa egahie huya humainae?” huya havigae.

Hageno Yisasia mage huno hie “Tamage Ilaiyaa hagoteno eno mukia yana melino talo tala hugahie. Ania huya nagaifena Anumaya Koti autamafina kaemalenayane “Ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomonina amakaveno hunateya ali haviya hunatesageno naugafa nagata aigahie.” huya nagaifena humainayane.
Tamahanepauve Ilaiyaa ago egeya Anumaya Koti autamafina kaemalenaya avamete huya amakaiamia hamaiya avamete agaila havi kavala hutenae.” huno humaine.

Nagoa agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagatega evayi huya agayana kasagoya veala anile alitalu humainageya kahegi kema havilinaya anagamoya Yisasienema tokaeya nemaiya anagaene mo huhaviya me huhaviya huya kea vaiye.
Nevaigeno mukia veamoya Yisasina ageteya tusi muse nehuya amaiyayeya moli falu fala hutenae.
Yisasia mage huno hamavige “Naafene hutama mo huhaviya me huhaviya nehae?” huno hamavige.
Higeno nagola anile maiya kanomoa mage huno hie “Humavenelina kanomogae Kefo Avamumoa nafanenimona agupi haimaineno nafanenimo avayale maihiya humainegena kagaitega avalena neoe.

Neogi Kefo Avamumoa atafa huteno atalegeno takatino faemainegeno agalemoa selu selu nehigeno ave kume neganeno augafamoa apipupapu nehigena kagaienema tokaeya nemaiya anagafe ‘Kefo Avamula anatitaleho.’ huna huana ya hugeteya anatioatalenae.” huno hie.

Higeno Yisasia mage huno hie “Ae meni kanafima mainaya veamogatama nagaifena havitama tamakupina omalenetama tamametitia nohaya veamogatama namagi kanafi tamakaienena mainesugetama havigahae? Ohaviya yafena kasalo nenahae. Namagi kanafi tamakaienena kanaleya huna ako huna maisue? Nagaitega avaletama eho.” huno hie.

Higeya avaleya ageno Kefo Avamumoa Yisasina ageteno ani nafanemona alino kigepagige hia kava huteteno ali takatitalegeno ani nafanemoa mopafi asaga hulavino kasegase nehigeno agalemoa selu selu humaine.
Higeno Yisasia nefafena mage huno havige “Namagi kanafi ania haumaine?” huno havigegeno nefaa mage huno hie “Osi nafane mainegeno ania haumaine.
Mukia kanafina Kefo Avamumoa ayelakatitalegeno atafiene tipiene haefalisia kava nehigena kagaya kanale humainenuka kahau hulateka tahamao.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia mage huno hie “Naa higeka nagaifena kanale humainenuka nahamao huka nehane? Nagaifema agupi maleno ametiti nehia kanomoa mukia yana alu ya alu yana afaa hileasinagi.” huno hie.
Higeno aupaa ani nafanemona nefaa mage huno hie “Nagaya kagaifena nagupi malena nametiti nehuanagi nagupi malena nametiti hua yanimoa aupa nehigi alika ayaaya hunato.” huno hie.

Hanepaigeya veala tusiya huya amaiyayeya elitalu hageno Yisasia neamakeno Kefo Avamufena kemakino mage huno hie “Kagaya Kefo Avamumogae agesama ailileka avaya alilu kimainana Kefo Avamumogae hai kahapauve agupitila hatilavika vuo. Nagoa kanafina nagoene agupina haiofalo.” huno hutene.

Higeno Kefo Avamumoa ala kenake nehuno ani nafanemona tusiya huno alino kigepagige hia kava huteteno hatilavino ataleno vigeno ani nafanemoa fali vaya kana huno faemainegeya kasagoya veamoya “Ago falimaine.” huya hae.
Nehageno Yisasia ayate alino avalesaga hutegeno hetimaine.
Haenaga Yisasiene nopinaga haino mainegeya agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya amakaiamige maineya mage huya havigae “Tagaya ya hugetonana ani Kefo Avamula naa higeta anatioatalenone?” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia mage huno hamapaiye “Maa augafa Kefo Avamula alu yatetila oanatigahagi Anumaya Kotitega ke huta havigesaya yatetike anatigahae.” huno hamapaiye.

Ani kumala neataleya Kalili kotegama vayana “Veamoya visua kumafena ohavisae.” huno higeya ako huya falakiya nevageno agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagala Yisasia mage huno humavenelie “Ikapinagati emainea kanoa vayamo atenea kanoa agaila atafa huya avaleya vaya amayapi atesageya haesageno faligahie. Faliteno hevaitesageno tole yupa komufi maiteno tagufa (3) kana falimainesifitila hetigahie.” huno hamapaiye.
Anima hamapaiya kea havilama ohaya yafe kolia huya haviokenae.
Kapaneamu evayi huteya Yisasia nopi haino maineno amakaife mage huno hamavige “Katega naane kea kea hume hume emainae?” huno hamavige.
Katega neeya ma ke hume emainae “Kagaya ala kano mainapi nagaya kagasena ala kanoa mainoe?” huya huge havige hume aya kehenagiya kea ohuya mainae.

Mainageno Yisasia mopale maineno “Egena tamahapaino.” huno higeya tuelufua (12) anagala ageno mage huno hamapaiye “Nago kanomoa ‘Ala kanoma maisue.’ hinunofena haenagalafa maineno mukia veala kayo kayoma humatesiana ala kano maigahie.” huno hamapaiye.

Huteno nagola okasi nafanea avaleno amunoamifi hetiteneno avalesaga huno anukilineno mage huno hie “Nagoa veamoya nagaifema haviya maa augafa osi nafanema avaleya falu fala hisayana nagaiene navaleya falu fala hunenatae. Nagaima navaleya falu fala hisayana hunatenea Nenafaene avaleya falu fala huneatae.”

Yonia mage huno humaineane “Hulavenelina kanomoga tagaya agonana nago kanomoa kagai kagile Kefo Avamula vea amakusafinagatila anatineatalegeta neageteta takavema nohia yafe ‘Ania ohuo.’ huta ‘Aao.’ hutenone.” huno hapaiye.
Yisasia Yonife mage huno hapaiye. “Ani kanoa alitama ‘Aao.’ huoateho. Nagoa veamoya nagai nagile tokiyaage aliyama alisayana aupaa nagaifena huhaviyana huonategahae.
Veamoya kamema huotatesayana tagai kanapa maigahae.
Tamage tamahanepauve nagoa veamoya tamakayama Kalaisi nafanema mainaya yafe yasi tima tamamisagetama nesayana anonaa kanale miya aligahae.”

“Nagola osi nafaneni, nagaife havino agupi maleno ametiti nehisia nafanehema nagoa veamoya ‘Kefo yama huo.’ huya havi kapima avaletesayana tusia havi kava nehayanagina tusia kana ya amamigahue. Ala yafagefaleti ani kanomo ageyafi maleya nofi kiteteya hage lipi hagayu hutalesayana afa ya kana kana ya haneanagi nagaya tusia kana ya amamigahue.

Kayamoa ‘Kefo yama huo.’ huno kavaleno havi kapima katesigekahena ani kayana aifakalitalo. Aifakalitalesanana kanale hugahie. Kaugafamoa haviya humainesia kanoma maisanana hano ohisia kahaimula hanesia kano maigane. Havigu tole kaya hanenageka kefo ya hisana kagesa kaminegeka kefo yama humainana yafe kavaleno hani yapi agola tegelege nehia atafi hagayu hugatalegahie.

Kaiyamoa ‘Kefo yama huo.’ huno kavaleno havi kapima katesigekahena ani kaiya aifakalika atalo. Aifakalitalesanana kanale hugahie. Kaugafa haviya humai kano maisanana hano ohu kahaimula hanesia kano maigane. Havigu tole kaiyamoa kefo ya hisana kagesa kaminegeka kefo ya humainana yafe kavaleno hani yapi agola tegelege nehia atafi hagayu hugatalegahie.

Kaulagamoma agea yafema kefo yama hisana kagesa kaminagekahena ani kaulaga ali fayika atalo. Ali fayitalesanana kanale hugahie. Nagoke kaulaga hanesigeno Anumaya Kotia kava yagaimainea kumatela umaigananagi havigu tole kaulagamoa kefo ya hisana kagesa kaminegeka kefo ya humainana yafe hani yapi tegelege nehia atafi kavaleno hagayu hugatalegahie.
Anima ata legelege nehia kumapi veamoya ani atafi mainageno kani kafaamimoa ofalisigeno atamoa asua ohugahie.
Hagema kavete falea avamete huno veala mukiamogatamina ataleti falelamategahie.

Hagea kanale ya haneanagi hagaagema nehia yamaa hanoma hisiana hanaa hutama hagaagema nehia yamaa ali falote hugahae? Hage kana yana tamakuafi hanesigetama alava hutama nagoke tamaku tamakesale kigi yokalo hutama maiho.” huno humaine.
Yisasia ani kola neataleno Yutia kotega viaamo Yotani timoa ame kaiyaga uvayi huno mainegeya mukia veala agaite melitalu hageno nehia kava huno nagoene hamapaiye.

Hamanepaigeya nagoa Falasia vayamoya Yisasite eya ase ohisea kema hisiafene huya nagola ayevataga hisaya kea mage huya havigae “Nago kanomoa aama atalesia agesa hisigenoa kahegi kemoa ‘Afaa atalegahie.’ huno humaineo?” huya havigae.
Hageno Yisasia kenonaamia mage huno hamavige “Mosese kahegi kemoa ani yafena naane humaine?” huno hamavige.
Higeya mage huya hae “Mosesea nagola kahegi kefina mage huno tahapaimaine ‘Vemoa aamona avo kaeno neamino hutesigeno hano huno ugahie.’ huno humaineane.” huya hae.
Hayanagi Yisasia mage huno hamapaiye “Tamakaya ke ohavitama veganokano haya yafe Mosesea ama atalesaya kea kaemaleneane.
Kaemaleneanagi Anumaya Koti avopina mage huno humaineane

‘Ehe yupa Anumaya Kotia vene aene talo humaleneane. Vene aene talo humalenea yafe nago kanomoma itaafoamoganima anataleno aamoene ailokaeno maisiana ani tolemogania nagoke anaugafa kaligae.’ huno humaineane.
Naa humaineafe nagoene tolelatana omaigaagi nagoke anaugafa kaliana maigae.
Anumaya Kotia ago alino hagelafimaleneanagino nagola ma mopale kanomoa ani alavelatana mai yaania alino apase oanatesie.” huno hie.
Mani kea huteno nopinaga haino maineno agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya ani kehena havinegae.
Havigageno mage huno hie “Nago kanomoa aama ataleno alu ama aliana ani kanomoa kumai kava huno hagote aamona ali haviya huneate.
Nagi nago amoma anauamoma ataleno alu velema viana ani amoa kumai kava nehie.” huno hie.
Veamoya nafaneamia avaleya Yisasite “Aya malese.” huya neageya agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya “Naa ohiho.” huya kemamakimainae.

Yisasia kema amamakiya yana ageteno haivaimateno mage huno hie “Nafaneyaga amatalegeya nagaitega eho. Ka heakioamateho. Nafane avamete maiya veamoya mage nehae ‘Tagaitige maunana tokiyatia omalegi Anumaya Koti kava yagailatesie.” huya hae.

Tamagelafa huna tamahanepauve nafane avamete maisaya veamoya ‘Tagaitige maunana tokiyatia omaleafe Anumaya Kotia kava yagailatesie.’ huya ohisayana Anumaya Kotia kava yagaimainea kumatela ougahae.” huno hie.
Huteno Yisasia ani nafaneyaga amavaleno amanukilineno “Anumaya Kotia kanale manua tamamisie.” huno amaugafale ayana malene.

Yisasia katega ugahe nehigeno nago kanomoa aiyayeno eaamo aule aleya meyeno mage huno havige “Kagaya kanale ya huka humavenelina kanomogae hanaa hutena agola maige maige hisua nahaimula alisue?” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia mage huno hie “Naa higeka nagaifena ‘Kanale kano mainane.’ huka nehane? Anumaya Kotia agaiage kanale kanoa maine.

Kagaya Anumaya Koti kahegi kea havilinane ani kemoa mage huno humaine ‘Vayala haegeno ofalino. Kumai he yana ohuo. Musufa yana ohuo. ‘Ma kanomoa havi kava nehie.’ huka havigehena kena ovalo. Havigea ayevataga huka alu veamo yana oalio. Itakafokamo kea ‘Kahaoteyakaae.’ ohuo.” huno hie.
Higeno ani kanomoa mage huno hie “Hulavenelina kanomogae nagaya nafanema mainoa kanaleti aepa hena mukia ani kema hana kea akave nemaloane.” huno hie.

Higeno Yisasia ani kanoa ageana agaifena hau ayamopafima haiya yafena ageteno mage huno hie “Nagoa yafena kosa heokatene. Nago kavaene huo. Mukia malenana mone afenoyakaa alika fako huka moneamima omalenesia veanema amamisanagenoa Anumaya Kotia ikapinaga afenoyana kamigahie. Afenoyakaa fako huka amamite amamite huteka nakave eno.” huno hie.
Higeno ani kanomoa ani kea havianagi mone afenomaama kasago humainea yafe oatalesia agesa haviteno augosamoa atili kaegeno aipamoa tusi kanaage higeno ataleno umaine.

Vigeno Yisasia agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagala moge mege huno neamakeno mage huno hie “Mukia mone afenoyaamima hanesia veamoya kasageke humaiya humaiya Anumaya Kotife ‘Kava yagailato.’ huya hugahae.” huno hie.

Higeya agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya ani kehena amamayoa aiyanagi Yisasia nagoene mage huno hie “Nafanenimogatama veamoya kasageke humaiya humaiya Anumaya Kotifena ‘Kava yagailato.’ huya hugahae.

Nagola pulumaka kana afumo agia kemolumoa nekayamo kapima haifalesiana afaa yoyo huno haifalegahianagi mukia mone afenoyamaa hanesia kanomoa Anumaya Kotifena ‘Kava yagainato.’ huno kasageke huno haifalegahie.” huno humaine.
Haviya anagamoya tusia amamayo aigeya mage huya hae “Naama humainesiana hana veamogami amaku amame Anumaya Kotia aligatigahie?” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia amakeke huno amakemaineno mage huno hie “Veamogamina tokiyaamia omaleneanagiya ohugahayanagi Anumaya Kotia mukia kava hisia tokiyaa haneanagino afaa aligatigahie.” huno hie.
Higeno Pitaa mage huno hie “Havio tagaya mukia yatia ataleteta kagai kakavela neone.” huno hie.

Higeno Yisasia mage huno hapaiye “Tamage huna tamahanepauve mukia veamoya nagaifema huya nagai kanale mono kema veamogamima mo hamapaigahena noamiene nepuamiene amasaamiene itaamiene neamafaene nafane-amiene mopaamiene amataleya visagenoa Anumaya Kotia mopale mainaya kanafima atalenesaya noamiene nepuamiene amasaamiene itaamiene nafaneamiene mopaamiene nagoene nagoene ohavunamaa ya aliteya huhaviyama humatesaya yaene aliteyagi haenagaa maige maige hisaya hamaimula amamigahie.
Meni kanafima hagoteya mainaya veala ani kanafina haenagalafa maigahayanagi meni kanafima haenagalafa mainaya veala ani kanafina hagoteya maigahae.” huno humaine.

Yelusalemu haigahena katega neuya Yisasia hagoteno vigeya agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya amamayo aiya nevageya amakave vaya veamoya koli nehageno Yisasia eteno nagoene tuelufua (12) anagaamogamina amahaote amavaleno momateneno haenagama agaila hutesaya yafena hamanepaiye.

Mage huno hie “Haviho tagaya Yelusalemu haisunageya ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomonia natafa huteno mono note kava vayamogami amayapiene kahegi kema havilinaya anagamogami amayapiene natesigeya nagaifena ‘Afaa falisie.’ huya Yuta vea omainaya vayamogami amayapi navaleya nategahae.

Natesageya nagaye hisifa ke hunateya amavetuna henenateya hegi kayoteti haifu namiteya nahaesagena yafaga yosale faligahue. Falisugeya hevainatetesagena tole yupa komufinaga maitena tagufa (3) kanale falimainesufitila hetigahue.” huno hie.
Sepeti nafanelatana Yemesiene Yoniene Yisasite eana mage huana havigae “Hulavenelina kanomogae nago yafe kahavigesuageka ani yana hulaato.” huana havigae.
Haageno Yisasia mage huno hanavige “Naa hulanatesue?” huno hie.
Higeana mage huana hae “Tokiya hale yakaafima umaisanagetaa taagaya kavate mainesuageka ‘Nagomoga tamaga nayatega maiyo.’ huteka ‘Nagomoga hauga nayatega maiyo.’ huka hulaato.” huana havigemainae.

Havigaanagi Yisasia mage huno hanapaiye “Nahavigaa yafena ohavinae. Falisua yana satuage humainea ti kana humainea ti hanea keayopitila negahugi tanakaya naaleasino onaaleasine? Nagaila falenatesaya yamoa, nagatama aisia yatetila tanakaila ani yateti falelanatesagetanahena afaa aligao?” huno hie.
Higeana “E, tokiyatia haneanagitaa ania hugahue.” huana haageno Yisasia mage huno hie “Tamage satuage humainea tina negaanagi falenatesaya yamoa nagatama aisia yateti falelanategahae.

Falelanategahayanagi ala vayama mainalega tamaga nayategaene hauga nayategaenena siale maisaya yana nagai yana omalegi Anumaya Kotia agaia ani yana ago nagoa vayafe huno talo tala huno ali fatago humatene.” huno hie.
Higeya tenia (10) anagamoya ani kea haviteya Yemesigani Yoniganina amaipa haviya haviya hunatenae.

Yisasia “Nagaitega eho.” huno higeya ageno mage huno hie “Ma mopafi ala kava vayamoya ‘Tusia ala vaya mainone.’ huya Yuta vea omainaya veafe ke amamakiya aliya ke humateya kava vayamo nehaya avamete kava nehae.
Naa nehayanagi tamakaya ania kavala ohiho. Tamakaipima ‘Nagi hanea kanoma maigahue.’ huno hisia kanomoa aliya kanotami maino.
‘Uhagotena maigahue.’ huno hisia kanomoa miya oali aliya kanotami maino.

Nagaya ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomona veamoya naya huya ali kanale hunatesaya yafene huna omenogi nagaya amaya huna aliya kanoami maisuafene huna emainena mukia veamoya kefo yama nehaya yamo aigagimatenea yapiti alikalu hematesuafe miya atalesue huna faligahe emainoe.”

Yisasia agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagaene kasagoya veanene Yeliko kumate uvayi huteya ani kumala mogaseya ugahe nehageno nagola aulaga asu humainea kanomo agia Patimeusia Timeusi nafanegino ka agegayale mopale maineno monehe aukaya huge huge huno maine.
“Nasaleti Yisasia ago nee” huya haya kea haviteno ke huno mage huno hie “Yisasigae, Tevitina aginagomogae nagaila kahau hunato.” huno hie.
Higeya kasagoya veamoya kemakiya “Ke ohuka maiyo.” huya hayanagi nagoene ke huno “Tevitina aginagomogae nagaila kahau hunato.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia anile mo hetimaineno mage huno hie “Hapaigeno eno.” huno higeya ani kanohe ke huya mage huya hae “Kagua ali lokiya vaika aupaa hetio. Kagaife ke nehie.” huya hae.
Hageno ayaaya yasi kenaa asagi neataleteno aupaa hetino Yisasite vie.
Vigeno Yisasia mage huno hie “Naa hugatesue?” huno higeno aulagama asu humai kanomoa mage huno hie “Humavenelina kanomogae naulaga agesue huna nehue.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia mage huno hapaiye “Afaa vuo nagaifema havika kagupi maleka kametitima hana yateti ago alina kanale hugatoe.” huno higeno aupaa aulagamoa kanale higeno Yisasi akave umaine.

Yelusalemua aupate hanegeya tole osi kumatalana Petafasiene Petaniene hanea kumate umainae. Ani kumatalana Olivi yosa hanea agoyamo agegayalega hane. Anile maineya Yisasia tole agaiaenema tokaeana nemaia kanolatana hunateno mage huno hanapaiye “Atu kumate utetana atupa note hosi kana afumo agia tokimo nafanea ayetenayanagitana agegae. Ani tokimo nafanea vayala oamavalenea tokie. Kalu hetana avaletana male eo.

Neeageya nagoa vayamoya ‘Naa higetana naa kavala nehae?’ huya hisagetanahena mage hutana hio ‘Kava kanotimoa nago aliya aligahe higetaa neoanagino aliyamaa aliteno aupaa eteno tamamigahie.’ hutana hamapaio.” huno hie.
Higeana ani kanolatana uana ani tokimo nafanea no fiate ayetageno ka agegayale hetino mainegeana mogefalote huteana nofila alikalu hemainae.
Nehaageya nagoa anile hetimainaya vayamoya mage huya hae “Naa higetana tokimo nafanea kalu nehae?” huya hae.
Hageana Yisasima “Nage hutana hio.” hunoma hia kea hamapaiageya ani vayamoya “Afaa tokia avaletana vio.” huya hae.
Hageana ani tokimo nafanea Yisasite avaleana evayi huteana kenaania anaugafaleti hateana ani afumo agupile yakaimalaageno Yisasia anile haino maine.

Maigeya mukia veapiti nagoamoya amaugafaleti kenaamia hateya via katela yakaigeya nagoamoya haisa hanete hanete yosayaga kofanafa huya katela yakaimalageno Yisasia ani kate afumo agupifina maiteno umaine.

Hagoteya vaya veamoyaene haenagama vaya veamoyaene ala kenake kefiti mage huya hae “Alamogae taugafa aligatisana kanoa kanaleya huka neane. Anumayamo aliya alisana yafe hugategeka emainana kanomoga Anumaya Kotia kanale manu kamino kaya humaine.

Taginagomoa Tevitie nayona kava hunoma yagaimainea avamete kavala eteno ania huno falote hugahie. Ani yafena muse higetao. Anafinaga Anumaya Kotia taugafa aligatisia kanohe muse hisune.” huya humainae.
Yisasia Yelusalemu uvayi huteno ala mono nopi umaineno mukia mono nopima hanea yana ako huno ageliteno huno ageteno neataleno hani kisia avamete higeno ataleno tuelufua (12) anagaaene Petaniga vae.
Faeteya kotigeya Petania ataleya nevageno Yisasina agatemaine.

Agategeno nagola haisa afaa hanea fiki yosamoa aluale hanegeno ageteno alagaahe mogegahe ani yosamo aepale uno mogeana alagaa omalegeno haisayagaage hane. Ani fiki yosamoa alagaama neayea kanamoa yaufa falote ohune.
Mogeteno Yisasia ani yosahena mage huno hie “Namo yosa hetika maiyo. Agola kagai kaugafa veamoya nagoene onegahae.” huno huhaviya hutegeya agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya ani kea havimainae.

Yelusalemu evayi huteya Yisasia ala mono nopi haino mone aliya nealiya veanene afaa miyama nehaya veanene “Maihaleho.” huno amanatineataleteno nagoa veamoya alu kotegama nehanea monea nealiya ani kotegama nehanea monea neamamiya veamogami folomoa alitalegeno aige helafige higeno kugofa kana namama miya nehaya veamogami sipaamia ania huno alitalegeno aihelafilavimaine.
Afenoma aliliteya nehaya veafena mage hie “Ala mono no kumapina afenona alitama ute ete ohiho.” huno hie.
Huteno mage huno hamapaiye “Anumaya Kotima humainea kemoa autamafina mage huno kaemaleneane
‘Nagai nona mukia kotega veamoya Anumaya Koti agi ayeya havigesaya no hane.’ huno kaemaleneanagi
tamakaya musufa yama nehaya veamogami nomo avamete kava hutama falakitama musufa ya hugahe ma mono nopina emainae.” huno nehie.

Higeya mono note kava vayamoyaene kahegi kema havilinaya anagamoyaene Yisasima hia ke haviteya muki veamoya Yisasima hamapaiya kema haviteya amamayoma aiya yafe koli huteya “Hanaa huta haesune.” huya humainae.
Hayanagi Yisasia anagaamoyaene hani kigeya Yelusalemua ataleya umainae.
Yisasia faeteno natena agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagaaene kate vayana anima alaga oayenea fiki yosa mogayana hafuyayagafiti amagino haisamoa amagiteno fayo temaine.
Yisasia ani yosahema humainea kehena Pita agesamoa hao higeno haviteno Yisasife mage huno hie “Humavenelina kanomogae ago fiki yosama huhaviya hutana yosamoa ago fayotemaine.” huno hie.

Higeno Yisasia mage huno hamapaiye “Anumaya Kotifena mage hutama hiho ‘Kagaya mukia yana hateasine.’ hutama tamakupi maletama tamametiti hisayana tamage huna tamahanepauve Anumaya Kotifena tole lamakesa ohavitama ‘Havigesua yana falote hugahie.’ hutamama hisagenofena ani yamoa falote hugahie. Ani kavama hisia kanomoa ma agoyahena ‘Ma agoyamoga kofa hulavika ala tikotumo amunopi ufaemaiyo.’ huno hapaisigenofena akave maleno ania hugahie.
Ani yafe mage huna tamahanepauve mukia yafena Anumaya Kotitega havigesayana ‘Anumaya Kotia kanaleya huno lamigahie.’ hutama tamakesa havisagenofena afaa tamamigahie.

Tamakaya hetitama Anumaya Kotitegama ke hutama havigegahena hagotetama kefo yama hulamatenesaya veafena aigeamatetama kefo yaamia atalematesagenofena ikapinaga mainea Nelamafaa kefo yatamia aigetamateno atalelamategahie.
Yelusalemu alehate evayi hayana Yisasia ala mono no kumapi ute ete nehigeya mono note kava vayamoyaene Yuta vayatamaene kahegi kema havilinaya anagaene agaitega evayi hae.
Evayi huteya mage huya hae “Hana augafa ala kanomo hugategeka mani kavala me nehane? Himamu yakaa ta kamine?” huya havigae.
Hageno Yisasia kenonaamia mage huno hie “Nagaya hagotena nago yafena tamahavigesugetama nahapaisagena nagaya ani yama talo nehua himamunima hanea navagea tamahapaigahue.
Yonia tima fale neamatea yana Anumaya Koti hutegeno ani kavala me nehifi afa vayamoya hutageno lina faleneamate? Tamakaya hufalote hutama nahapaiho.” huno hamavige.
Higeya “Naa maa hugahune.” huya mohu mehu huteya mage hae “Anumaya Koti hutegeno emaine.” huta hisunagenoa Yisasia “Naa higetama agai kea havitama tamakupina nomalae?” huno hugahie.

Hugahianagita mukia veamoya Yonifena “Anumaya Koti aune kano maine.” huya tokiyaage kema nehaya yafe tagaya “Afa vayamoya hutageno emaine.” huta hisunagenofena kelamakigahie huta koli nehune.” huya hae.

Kolia nehuya Yisasifena mage huya hae “Tagaya ohavinonanagita hufalote huta kahaopaigahune.” huya hageno Yisasia mage huno hie “Nahaopaisayana nagayaenena ania huna hufalote huna ani yama taloma nehua himamunima hanea navagea tamahaopaigahue.” huno humaine.

Yisasia aepa heno avame kea mage huno hamapaiye nago kanomoa vaini nofi alaga hoya humaleteno kegiya hugove humaleneno ani alagayagamo timaa ayelatisigeno timaamoa tavino umaisia komua kafiteno yagaiyama maisaya nona anafi kimaleteno alu vayafe ke huno “Etama hoyanile me yagaitama maineho. Ani nofimo alagafitila aye fako hutama nagoa aliho.” huno humateteno alu kotega umaine.
Umaineno fuma nelea kanafina ani hoyamona nefaa nagola aliya kanoa hutegeno ani vaini hoyalema neyagaiya vayatega alaga aligahe umaine.
Vigeya hoyalema neyagaiya vayamoya ani aliya kanoamona atafa huya kayo amiteya mage hae “Okamigahunagi kagaya eteka vuo.” huya hageno eteno umaine.
Eteno vigeno hoyamona nefaa alu aliya kanoa hutegeno viana ania huya atafa huya anu aliteya tusia agaye hisifa kava hutenae.

Hutageno vigeno eteno alu aliya kanoa hutegeno ani hoyafi viana atafa huya hayageno falimaine. Falitegeno hoyamona nefaa kasagoya aliya vayayaga humategeya vageya nagoa aliya vayala amatafa huya nehamaeya nagoa kuyafa neamataleya nagoa tefa hamae falimainae.
Mukia vageno hau ayamopafima nehaiya nafanea agaiage maigeno nefaa mage huno hie “Nafanenimo kea havigahae.” huteno hutegeno haenagalafa ani hoyalega umaine.

Vigeya ani hoyafima yagaimainaya vayamoya mage huya hae “Mamona mani hoyamona nefa nafane. Nefama falisigenofena mani nafanemoa hoyaa aligahianagita ago haegetao. Haesunageno falisigeta mani hoya tagai ya hapaegahie.” huya hae.
Huteya atafa huya hayageno faligeya augafaa aliya hoyafinagati ai halatu huya malaga hagayu hutalenae.” huno hie.

Huteno Yisasia mage huno hamavige “Naa hayanagino hoyamona nefaa hanaa humategahie? Eno hoyaafima yagaimainaya vayala tavata me hamaesigeya faligahae. Fali hano hisageno alu vayafe “Tamakaya hoyalela kava me yagaiho.” huno humategahie.” huno hie.
Nagoene Yisasia mage huno hie “Manima Anumaya Koti avopima hanea kea ago hapalitama havimainao? Mage huno humaineane
‘Vayamoya yafa noma kiyana nago yafafena ‘Haviya humaine.’ huya atalayanagi ani yafamoa haenagaa ‘Tusia kanale yafanagino amakaseno haimainea yafane.’ huya nomo ayetagenale malenae.
Anumayamoa ania humaineanagita neageta tusia kanale ya hane huta nehune.’ huya kaemalenayane.” huno hie.

Yisasia mani kea higeya mono note kava vayamoya “Mani avame kema hiana tagaife nehie.” huya amakesa haviteya mage hae “Avaleta kina nopi ategahune.” huya hayanagi alitalu humainaya veafe koli huteya Yisasina ataleya umainae.
Nagoa Falasia vayaene nagoa Heloti vayaene humatageya Yisasima havigaya keleti ayevataga huya atafa huya haegahe Yisasi mainelega umainae.

Umaineya mage huya havigae “Humavenelina kanomogae tagaya ago havunana kagaya tamageage kano mainane. Amakima hanea vayaene amakima omale vayaenefena nagoke katekeya havi neamamika kelamage nehuka Anumaya Koti kea tahanepainane. Takisi monema ataleyatela Sisaa kava kanomotega kanale atalesuno ifi oatalesune? huya havigae.

Hageno Yisasia amakupinagama haviya kea ago haviteno “Vagala vaya mainetama amegati ke nehae. Naa higetama nagaila ayenavataga hutama natafa hisaya yafena nahavinegae? Nagola alaga monea alitama me namigena agano.” huno hie.
Higeya nagola alaga monea aliya memigeno ageteno mage huno hamavige “Mani alaga monelela ta augosaene ta agiene hane?” huno hamavigegeya “Sisa augosaene agiene hane.” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia mage hie “Sisana agaia yana agaila amiho. Nagi Anumaya Kotina agaia yana agaila amiho.” huno higeya ani kehena amamayo aimaine.
Nagoa Satiusi vayamoya Yisasitega emainae. Ani vayamoya mage nehaya vayale “Falimainaya vayala eteya heotigahae.” huya nehaya vayale.

Vayalegiya Yisasina me havigeya mage huya hae “Humavenelina kanomogae Mosesea tagaifena mage huno kaemaleneane ‘Nago kanomona nepuamoa nafanea oate kanoa aama ataleno falinagenoa aganaamoa ani aala aliteneno agoma falimainea kanomofe anonaa nafane atesie.’ huno kaemaleneane.
Nago kanafina sevenia (7) konaga mainayanagino nepuamimoa aala aliteneanagino nafanea oate kano maineno falimaine.
Falitegeno anile aganaamoa ani aala aliteana nafanea ania huno oatenea kano falitegeno anile aganaamoa ania humaine.
Mukia sevenia (7) konagamoya aliteme aliteme ayana nafanea oateya fali hano hageno haenagalafa ani aala falimaine.
Sevenia (7) konagamoya ani aala alitenayanagi falimainesafitima hetisaya kanafina hana kanomo ani aala aligahie?” huya havigae.
Havigageno Yisasia mage huno hamapaiye “Anumaya Koti kefima kaemalenea kene tokiya yamaaenefena havilama hutama ohaviya yafe tamakaya havi tamakesageya nehaviye.
Veama falimainesafiti hetisaya kanafina ensole vaya kana huya vemoya aala oaligahae. Amoyaenena vea oaligahae.
Falimainaya veama eteya hetisaya yafe nahavinegao? Mosese kaemalenea avopima ohapalinao? Nagola osi yosalema ala ata anefela leanagi ani osi yosa otene.” huno kaemalenea kea ohavinao?
Anumaya Kotia ani kanafina Mosesefena mage huno humaineane “Nagaya Apalahamunagi Aisakinagi Yekopugami Anumaya mainoe.” huno humaineane.

Ani anagala falimainayanagi “Nagaya Anumaya Kotiamimona mainoe.” huno humainea yafena amaku amamemoa ofalinegi afaa mainaya yafe ani kea humaine. Tamakaya veamoya heotigahae hutama nehaya kea havige nehae.” huno hamapaimaine.

Nago kanoa kahegi kema havilinea kanomoa anile eno huge havige haya kea haviana Yisasia kanale kema huhaleno hamapaiya kea me haviteno Yisasifena mage huno havige “Anumaya Koti kahegi kefitila hana kemo mukia kemona agaseno uhagoteno tokiyaage kea hane?” huno havige.
Havige-geno Yisasia mage huno hie “Uhagoteno tokiyaagema humainea kemoa mage huno humaine

‘Isaleli vayala haviho Anumayamoa tagaiti Anumaya Kotia agaiage mainegi nagoa Anumaya omaine. Kagaya Anumaya Kotikamofena kahau kayamopafina tokiyaage huno kahaino. Mukia kagesama havisana yaene kagu kamema havisana yaene aliya nealina kayamufaene tokiyaage huka Anumaya Kotina amio.’
Anile nago kea mage huno humaineane
‘Mukia vayafena tusiya huno kahau kayamopafi kahaino. Kagaika kaugafahema kahaisia avamete ania huno alu veamogami amaugafahena kahaino.’
Menima tole kema kahapauva kemoa mukia Anumaya Koti kahegi kemona ago amakasemainea ke hane.” huno hie.
Higeno ani kahegi kema havilinea kanomoa Yisasifena mage huno hie “Humavenelina kanomogae tamage nehane. Nagoke Anumaya Koti mainegi nagoa Anumaya Koti omaiye.

Omaigi tagaya mukia tahau tayamopafi tokiyaage huno tahaisigeta mukia tagesama havisuna yaene tagu tamema havisuna yaene aliya nealuna tayamufaene tokiyaage huta mukia Anumaya Kotina amisune. Amiteta mukia veafena tahau tayamopafi tahainageno tagaiti laugafahema tahaisia avamete ania huta alu veamogami amaugafahena tahaisie. Naama hisuna yamoa mukia alu kavala amakasemaine. Nayona veamoya ‘Anumaya Kotina muse yana neamune.’ huya nagola sipi sipi heya neamiya nago sipi sipia atafi kae salamana aineataleya nehaya yamona menima kahapauva kemoa ani kavala ago agasemaine.” huno hie.

Yisasia anima huhalenoma hia kea haviteno “Haviyamaaene kano maineafenagino nahapaiye.” huno agesafinaga haviteno kenonaa mage huno hie “Ani kema hana kemoga aupaa Anumaya Kotife ‘Kava yagainato.’ huka hugane.” huno hie. Higeya vayayagamoya haviteya koli huya Yisasina nagoene haviokenae.

Yisasia ala mono nopi mo humavenelino mage huno hamavige “Kahegi kema havilinaya anagamoya naa higeya Kalaisifena, ‘Anumaya Kotia hutenea kanomofena Tevitina aginagomoa mopale kano maine?’ huya nehae.” huno hamavige.
Hamavinegeno mage hie “Tevitia Anumaya Kotina Alu Aotage Avamumo hapaiya kea mage huno humaineane

‘Anumaya Kotia Anumaya-niamofena mage huno humaine ‘Tamaga nayatega, ala vaya mainalega hanea siale emainesanagena kame vayakaa kaiyafinaga amatesugeya kagaife ‘Ago tagasane.’ huya hugahae.’ huno kaemaleneane.

Tevitia Kalaisife ‘Anumayania mainane.’ huno humainegi naa higeno Tevitia haenagama atesia aginagomofena ‘Anumayaniamoga mainane.’ huno humaineane?” huno hamavige. Higeya mukia alitalu humainaya veamoya Yisasi kea haviteya tusia muse hae.

Yisasia hamapaiya kefiti mage huno hamapaiye “Kahegi kema havilinaya anagafena kayeho. Ani vayamoya ayaaya kena failiya yafena ‘Nelagafi notagafi?’ huyama haya yafena tusiya huno nehamaiye. Vaya atagu nefaya kumapi mo vaiyatete nehuya ‘Naa vaya mainae.’ huya ‘Ali falu fala hulatesae.’ huya nehae.
Mono nopiene imuleene ‘Ala vayaagema nemaiya sialekeya maigahune.’ huya nehae.

Ani vayamoya keto aneyagahena ‘Mono nopima atalesaya monea tamiho.’ huya nehuya noamifima hanea yayaga musufaya huya moneamia ali hano nehaya vayalagiya. Vayayaga ayemavataga huya ‘Kanale vaya mainae.’ huya hisae huya ayaaya nunamu nehayane. Aniama nehaya vayamoya havi miyana tusiya huno amaugafa amagata aisia yaene aligahae.” huno hie.
Yisasia mono nopi mone neatalaya kaiyaga maineno monema atalaya veala amakeana moneamima hanea veamoya “Monetia Anumaya Kotina amigahune.” huya ala mone pokisifina atalenae.
Atalageno nagola monea omale keto amoa tole osi haesa monea metalene. Ani haesa yafatalamogania tokayaagenoa vani toya kana humaine.

Yisasia ani yana ageteno agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagafe ke higeya ageno mage huno hamapaiye “Nagaya tamagelafa huna tamahanepauve ma ma monea omale keto amoa hagoteyama metalaya veamogamina amakaseno ala mone metale.

Metaleneanagi moneamima hanea veamoya aliyamaa omalenea monegiya havigu malenaya monegiya afaa metalayanagi ani amoa mukia yamaa ali hano huno metale. Mukia kaveama alino nesia monea mukia alino metale.” huno hie.

Yisasia ala mono nona neataleno vigeno nagola agaiaenema tokaeno nemaiya kanomoa mage hie “Hulavenelina kanomogae male ago. Ala yafana kanale yafayagaleti kimalenaya kanale noyaga hanegeka neagane.” huno hie.

Higeno Yisasia mage huno hie “Kagaya mani kanalenale ala noyaga neagano? Ani mukia yafayaga alino lagape aitalesigeno aposilavisianagi nago yafamoa nago yafamo agupifina aikalo huno omaigahie.” huno hie.
Yisasia Olivi yosa hanea agoyamo agegayalega haino mopale maineno ageana ala mono nona atu kaiyaga hanegeno neagegeya Pitaene Yemesiene Yoniene Etaluene Yisasima mainelega emainae.
Eya Yisasife mage huya havigae “Ani yafa nomoa tagapema aisia kana na kanafine? Hana augafa tokiya avame yamo ani kanama falotema hisia kanafina taveligahie?” huya havigae.
Hageno Yisasia mage huno hie “Nagoa vayamoya havigema lamahapaisagetamahena ohavisaya yafe kaye ho.
Mukia vayamoya nagai nagia neayeya ‘Anumaya Kotia tamaugafa aligatisuna yafe hulategeta neone.” huyama hisayana kasagoya veane havige ayemavataga hugahae.

“Nagoa kotega kamema nehae.” huya hisagetamaene “Kotamile-gaenema kamema nehae” huyama tamahapaisagetamahena kolia ohiho. Ani yayagamoa hagoteno falote hugahianagi ma mopama hano hisia kanamoa yaufa falote ohune.

Nagoa vayamoya alu vayaenena kamea hugahae. Ala kotega vayaene nago ala kotega vayaenena kamea hugahae. Kasagoya alu kote kotela tusia imila aligahie. Alu kote kotela tusia kafu nehuya amakatesia kanamoa falote hugahie. Ani yayagamoa afaa anemoya nafanema ategahema hageno aepa heno amagata neaiya avamete kava hugahianagi haenagaa tusia tamagata yamo falote hugahie.

Tamakaitamia kava yagailama hiho. Nagoa veamoya tamakaila tamavaleya kanisole vayate kaiyekea hulamategahae. Mono nopi tamavaleya kayona mo lamamigahae. Nagai nakavema haya yafe tamavaleya ala kava vayateene amakasemainea sauve vayateene tamavaleya hetilamatesageya kaiyekea hulamatesagetama nagai kanale mono kea hamapaigahae.
Hamapaigahayanagi hagoteya Yisasi kanale mono kea aliya ute ete huya mukia kote veamogamina hamapaitesageno ma mopamoa hano hugahie.

Tamavaleyama kaiyeke hulamatesaya kanafina kema hisaya yafena “Naane huta hugahune hutama tamakesa kumoa ohutama afaa viho. Ani kanafina kanale kema hisaya kea Anumaya Kotia tamahapainagetama hugahae. Ani kea tamakai kea omalegi Anumaya Koti Alu Aotage Avamumoa huno lamakesa hinagetama hugahae.

Ani kanafina veamoya amakaiami nepuamimona kame vayaamimote amavaleya visayaamoya ‘Hamaegeya faliho.’ huya hugahae. Nefaa nafaneyagaa ania humategahae. Nafaneamimoya itaafoamimoene-na aliyahae huya kamea humateteya ‘Hamaetama faliho.’ huya hugahae.

Nagima neayaya yafe mukia veamoya haviya amaipa kafa helamategahae. Nagoa veamoya nagai kemona meni kanaleti aepa heya atafa huya tokiyaage hume hume nevisagena Yisasina etenama esua kanafina nagai kema atafa hulinesaya veamogamina Anumaya Kotia amaku amamena aligatigahie.

Yisasia nagoene mage huno hie tusia havi yana ma mopa alino hagagitalesia yana alu aotage yapi hetimainesigetama agegahae. Anima tamamayoma aisia yama agenuta-mahena Yutia mainaya veamogatama tamaiyayetama agoyalega viho. Ani Yisasima humainea kema hapalitama havisamogatama havilama hutama haviho.
Nagi nago kanomoa nogatofulema haino maineno ani kema havinunofena tavino nomaafinagati haifaleno nagoa yana oalino. Afaa aiyayeno vino.
Nagoa veamoya hoyafinagama mainesaletila kenaamima aligahena notega eteya oviho.
Avonio ani kanafina tusia havi yamo falote hugahie. Amaipaene anene nute anilinesia nafanemogami itaamimoyaenefena tusia nahau nehie.
Anumaya Kotitega nunamuna mage hutama havigeho “Ani havi yamoa tani koma ikate tisia kanafina falote ohisie.’ hutama havigeho.

Ani kanafina tusia kana ya falote hugahie. Ehema Anumaya Kotia ma mopama talo humalenea kanafiene meni kanafienena ania ala kana yana falote ohuneanagi tusia ala kana yamoa nagoene haenagaa ania huno falote ohugahie.
Anumaya Kotia ani havi kanama alino aupa ohileasina mukia veamoya falileasinagi Anumaya Kotia haigenoma hapalimatenea veafe agesa havino amaugafa aligatisia yafe ani kanaa alino aupa hugahie.

Ani kanafina nagoa veamoya mage hugahae “Anumaya Kotima taugafa aligatigahie huno hutenea kanoa ma mainegi ageho. Atu mainegi ageho.” huya hisagetamahena “Tamage nehae.” hutama havitama tamametitia ohiho.

Ani kanafina nagoa havigeage amaune vayaene “Nagaya Anumaya Kotima tamaugafa aligatigahie huno hunatenea kano mainoe.” huno havige hisia kanoene evayi huya veamogamina ayemavataga hugahe tokiyaage avame yana hugahayanagi Anumaya Kotia haye huno hapalimatenea veamoya ohavigahae.
Ohavigahagi falote ohunaya kanafina ago tamahapaimainogi kayetama maiho.
Ani havi kanamoa hano hutesigeno yagemoa hanimaage hinageno ikamoa aivasa ohugahie.
Kanefimoya ikatetila atafailavigahie. Ikatema hanea yayagamoya kanage kanage huno alu kate kate vaiyegahie.
Mukia ani yamoa falote hutesigena ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomona ikapinagatila siate elavisugeya nagegahae. Tusia tokiyaniene tusia hale yaniaene esugetama nagegahae.

Nenagesagena ensole vayania humatesugeya yagemoma tavi nefalelegatiene evayi nehilegatiene aluga aluga haupalegatiene mukia mopaene mopaene nagainia nahaigena hapalimatenoa veanea aluga aluga mukia ma mopamona atupaletiene ikamo atupaletiene amavalesageya melitalu hugahae.
Yisasia mage huno hie “Fiki yosamoa nago avame ya tamaveligahigi ageho. Ani yosamoa hagoteno akopapitima agusasiyeno amuma malesigetamahena ‘Anuna valesia kanamoa falote hugahe nehie.’ hutama nehae.
Naa hugahayanagi manima tamahanepauva kuguva yama agenutamahena “Yisasia esia kanamoa ago aupa higeno fiate hetino maineanagino ago egahie.’ hutama tamakesa havigahae.
Nagaya tamage huna tamahanepauve meni kanafima mainaya veala ofalinesageno ani yamoa falote hugahie.
Ikaene mopaene fanane hugahianagi nagai kemoa fanane ohugahie.

Manima tamahapauva kanama falote hisia kanahena nago kanomoa ohavine. Ikapinaga mainaya ensole vayamoya ohavinae. Anumaya Kotina nafaneamona ani kanama falote hisia kanahena ohavinoanagi nenafaa agaiage haviline.
Tamakaya ani kanama falote hisia kanahena ohavinaya yafe tamaula ofaetama tamakaitamile yagaiho.

Nago kava kanomoma hia kava huno Yisasia egahie. Ani kava kanomoa aliya vayaamofena ‘Ma aliyana alu aliya alu aliyana tamahaote tamahaote yagaitama maiho.’ huneamateno “Fiatema mainamoga kagaikaa yagaiyo.” huneateno ataleno alu kotega umaine.

Naa humaineafe tamakaya ania hutama yagaiho. Nomona nefama esia kanahena ohavinae. Une esio? Kege amunopi esio? Kokolemoa age neaisigeno esio? Ifi nate esio? Esia kanahena ohavinaya yafe kava yagaitama maiho.
Faetama mainesageno havigu aupaa esigetama tamakaye hu yafenagi kayetama maiho.
Mani kea tamakaifema hua kea mukia veamogamife nehugi kava yagaitama tokiyaage hutama maiho.” huno hamapaiye.

Ani kanafina tole yupa maiteya kafuahe kafuahe Anumaya Kotima amakinagomo amaugafama aligatimainea yafe alitalu huya hale oki kaihamena nenaya imu kigahe nehageya mono note kava vayamoyaene kahegi kema havilinaya anagaene Yisasina haesaya kea kesi ako huya atafa hisaya yafe ke huge havige humainae.
Mage huya hae “Mukia veala imulema alitalu huya maisafima Yisasina atafama hisunageya mukia veamoya ageteya ke huya atile male huya tu hugahae.” huya hae.

Yisasia Petani umaineno nayona fugitaya agemainea kanomo agia Saimonie kanomo nopi umaine. Mopale umaineno kave nenegeno nago amoa anile eno manaage masavena havatemai yafa keayola alilino emaine. Ani keayopina nagola tusia monele hanea masavena manaage tina hane. Ani limo agia natie. Ani keayoma taloma hia yafamo agia alapasata yafane. Ani amoa masave keayola alino aitagino Yisasi anupi takino faletene.
Faletegeya nagoa anile mainaya vayamoya ageteya ke vaiya mohu mehu nehuya mage huya hae “Naa higeno mani amoa manaage masavena afaa neatale?

Nago kanomoma miya hileasina tali hataleti kina (K300) aluteasine. Aliteta ani masavete monea alita afenoamima omalenea veanea amamuteasine.” huya ani amofena “Kefo kava talo hane.” huya kemakimainae.
Ke neamakigeno Yisasia mage huno hie “Agaila afaa ataleho. Naa higetama kea neamakiye? Ani amona aipamoa haviya hisia kava nehagi nagaila tusia kanale kava hunenate.
Afenoamima omalenea veamoya mukia kanafina tamakaiene maigahayanagitama amaya hisaya tamakesama havisayana amaya hugahayanagi nagaya tamakaienena mukia kanafina omaigahue.
Ani amoa amukoa hanegeno ani kavala hagoteno afaa ofalina mainogeno masavema faleya hevainatesaya masavena agola fale nenate.
Tamage huna tamahanepauve mukia ma mopafi veapima Yisasifena kanale mono kema hamapaisayana ani amoma hia kavafeenena hamapaisageya mukia veamoya agaife amakesa havi havi huya maigahae.” huno hie.
Ani kanafina Yutasi Isakaliotia tuelufua (12) anagaaene nemaiya kanomoa viaamo Yisasina agesi huno momavalesigeya metafa hisaya yafe mono note kava vayatega umaine.
Viaamo mo hamapaigeya ani kea haviteya tusia muse huteya ‘Mone kamigahune.’ huya hapaitageno Yutasia vaya kuluta oai yate kesi kateti momavaleno esigeya Yisasina haesaya kafe atiyemaine.

Hale oki kaihame kana maya nenaya kanamoa ehe kanale Anumaya Kotia Yuta vaya amaugafama aligatimainea kanahe amakesa nehaviya imuma kigahena sipi sipi heya kiya nenaya kanamoa falote higeya Yisasiene tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya Yisasina mage huya havigae “Hanatega kahaisia kumatela Anumaya Kotia amaugafama aligatimainea kanahe kagesa havisana kavela mo lalo tala hisune?” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia tole kanolatana hunateno mage huno hanapaiye “Ala kumate neviageno ti keayoma alino esia kanoene fotu hutetana akave vio.

Akave neviageno haino mo falesia nopi haitana ani nomona nefafe mage hutana havigeo ‘Hulavenelia kanomoa mage hie ‘Hanate ayenalagimalenana nona hane? Yoka namisanagena nagaiene tokaeya nemaiya anaganiene Anumaya Kotia amaugafama aligatimainea kanahe tagesa havisuna kavela nesune?’ huno hie.’ hutana havigeo.
Hisaagenoa folamo huno anale kimalenea nona ago alino hilato humaleneanagino ala nona tanavelisigetana kavetia talo tala hio.” huno hanapaiye.
Higeana ala kumate vaana Yisasima hia kemoa mukia falote higeana ageteana Anumaya Kotia amaugafa aligatimainea kanahe amakesa havi havi hisaya kavela talo tala humainae.
Talo humalenaageya yagemoma tavi faleamaa Yisasia tuelufua (12) anagaamoyaene emainae.
Mopale emaineya kavela nenageno Yisasia mage huno hie “Tamage huna tamahanepauve nagaienema kavema nenaya anagamogatama tamakaipiti kesi nahaesaya yatela nago kanomoa vaineaye.” huno hie.
Higeya ani anagamoya amaipa haviya huteya agaifena amahaote amahaote mage huya hae “Nagaife nehano?” higeya “Nagaife nehano?” higeya huya havigae.

Havigageno Yisasia mage huno hie “Tamakaya tuelufua (12) anaganimogatama tamakaipiti nagokemoga kesi nahaesaya katela vaineayane. Ani kanomoa nagaiene nagoke yopafiti kaihame kana maya ali vayagofino nene.

Nagaya ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea nafanemonihena Anumaya Koti autamafima kaemalenaya avamete kava hugahuanagi vayamoya havisagi huno nagesi hunatesia kanomofena ‘Avonio nahau hanagi kagaya maigayeka mainekao.’ huna nehue. Ani kanomoga itakamoa okateneleasina tusia kanale kava hileasine.” huno hie.
Ani kavela nenageno Yisasia kaihame kana maya alino nunamu huteno muse huno havigeno kolite kolite huno neamamino mage huno hie “Aliho. Mamona nagaini naugafae.” huno hie.
Nagola vaini nofi alagamo ti hanea keayola aliteno nunamu huno muse huno havigeno alino amamite amamite higeya nemainae.

Nenageno Yisasia mage huno hie “Mamona nagaini kolane. Vayamoya nahaesagena falisugeno kolaniamoa takilavino mukia veafene huno takilavisia yafe Anumaya Kotia hulokiya vaino alino halegafilamatenea kemo aepamoa alino fatago hugahie.
Tamage huna tamahanepauve menia nagaya vaini nofi alagamo timaa nagoene onegahuanagina Anumaya Kotima kava yagaimainea kumate umainena haegafa nofi alagamo tina etena negahue.” huno hie.
Higeya yagamea nagola huteya Olivi yosa hanea agoyafi haimainae.
Yisasia mage huno hamapaiye “Tamakaya mukiamogatama nagaife havitama tamakupi maletama tamametiti nehaya yana ataletama asaga hulavisagi nayona ani yafe kaemaleneane
‘Nagaya sipi sipi kava kanoa haesugeya sipi sipiyaga atagufeya falegahae.’ huno kaemaleneane.
Kaemaleneanagi falimainesufiti Anumaya Kotia alino hetinatesigena Kalili uhagotelamatena visugetama nakave egahae.” huno hie.
Higeno Pitaa kenonaa mage huno hie “Mukia anagala kagaifema haviya amakupi maleya amametiti nehaya yama ataleya falesagenahena nagaya ania ohugahue.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia mage huno hie “Tamage huna kahanepauve meni kegela kokolemoa tole kanale agea oainesigeka kagaya tagufa (3) kanale mage hugane ‘Nagaya oagenoa kanoe.’ huka avane hunategane.” huno hie.
Higeno Pitaa tokiyaage ke huno hie “Kagaiene nahaesagena faligahuanagina kagai kagihena avanena huna fala okigahue.” huno higeya mukia anagamoya nagoke kegeya humainae.
Huteya Ketesemani uvayi hageno Yisasia agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagafena mage huno hie “Tamakaya male maineho. Nagaya Anumaya Kotitega nunamu huna havigegahue.” huno hie.
Pitaene Yemesiene Yoniene amavaleno viana aepa heno aipamoa kanaage higeno haumana halegeno kasageke hie.
Huteno mage huno hamapaiye “Nahau nayamopamoa tusia kanaage nehigena ago falisua kava nehugi male mainetama kava yagaitama maineho.” huno hie.
Osia viaamo nunamu huno havigegahe mopafi agoya moyeno maineno nunamuna mage huno havige “Kahaisigekahena falisua kanania alitalesane huna kahavinegoe.

Nenafagae kagaya mukia yana kanale hateasine. Nagaya falisua kava nehugi ani havi kanamoa satuage hia ti kana tima hanea keayola nahafaletalo. Afaa nagai nagu nagesa akave ohuka kahaisia yana afaa huo.” huno havige.
Havigeteno viaamo momakeana agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagala faeya mainageno Pitafena mage huno hie “Saimonigae faekage mainano? Vae kagaya aupa kana kanoa kava oyagaikage mainano?

Satania ayelamavataga hisigeno tamakuamoa ‘Ohugahue.’ huno tokiyaage humaineanagi afaa amega tamaugafamoa tokiyaa omaleneanagino ‘Hugahue.’ huno hisia yana hugahigi Satani kema ohavisaya yafena kava yagaitama mainetama Anumayamotega ke hutama havigeho.” huno hamapaiye.
Huteno amataleno viaamo Anumayamotega havigea kea ania huno nagoene mo havige.
Havigeteno eteno momakeana amau tokotoko higeya faeya mainageno momakeanagi “Vae tagaya naane hisune?” hugeya amakesagumo humainae.

Hageno Yisasia eteno eaamo tagufa (3) kanale amakaifena mage huno hamavige “Maifalu hutamage faetama mainao? Hailagino kanania ago falote nehie. Nagaya ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea nafanemonia nagesi huno navaleno kefo yama nehaya vayamogami amayapi natesigeya nahaegahe nehae.
Mukiamogatama hetitama vigetao. Ageho nagesi huno nahaesia kanoa ago neegi vigeta mogamano.” huno humaine.

Yisasia mani kea nehigeno aupaa Yutasia tuelufua (12) anagaaenema tokaeno nemaiya kanomoa evayi higeya agaiene mukia vayayagaene mono note kava vayaene kahegi kema havilinaya anagaene nagoa Yuta vayatamaenema humataya vayamoya ayaaya naepege naipege huya muki kayoene aliya emainae.
Agesi huno Yisasina haesaya yama amavalisea kanomoa vayayagahena mage huno hamapaiye “Atakoma hisua kanoa haesaya kano mainegi atafa hutama tokiyaage hutama avaletama viho.” huno hamapaiye.
Yutasia evayi huno Yisasite eaamo mage hie “Hulavenelina kanomogae.” nehuno atako me hie.
Atako higeya ageteya vayayagamoya Yisasina atafa huya ayetalako humainae.
Atafa nehageno nagola agaiaenema hetimaiya kanomoa ayaaya naepea hevayu huno ala mono note hagote kava kanomo aliya kanoamo agesa aifakalitalegeno asaka hulavimaine.
Aifakalitegeno Yisasia mage huno hie “Tamakaya nagaifena ‘Vaya nehamaeno musufaya nehia kano maine.’ hutama nagaima natafa hugahena ayaaya naepene muki kayoene alitama neao?

Mukia kanafina efiefi huna tamakaiene mainena ala mono nopina mono kea huhalena nehuanagi nagaila natafa ohunayanagi afaa kanalele. Nayoma kaemalenaya kemoa falote huno tamage hisia yafe menia natafa nehae.” huno hie.
Higeya mukia agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagala neataleya fale hano humainae.
Nago neyamoa aye ohati kena kenalafamaage failino Yisasi akave umainegeya agaila atafa hugahe hageno kenaa hateno neataleno augafa alapaage aiyayeno faleno umaine.
Yisasina avaleya ala mono notela hagote kava kanomote ageya mono note kava vayayagaene Yuta vayatamayagaene kahegi kema havilinaya anagaene alitalu huya mainae.
Pitaa akave anatino vianagi avatela ounegi aluale umaineno ala mono notela hagote kava kanomo nomo haupale uvayi huno ati vayaene mopale umaineno atale tota huno maine.
Mono note kava vayamoyaene mukia kanisole vayaene Yisasima haesaya kaiyekema hutegahena nagoa vayamoya “Kefo kavala higeta agemainone.” huya hutesaya vayafe atiyayana omainae.
Omaigeya kasagoya vayamoya havige huya Yisasifena hayanagi amakai kemoa nago katela ohunagi alu ke alu ke maiya humainae.

Nagoa vayamoya hetiya havige huya Yisasifena mage huya hae “Tagaya agaiama humainea kea havilinone mage huno humaine ‘Nagaya vayamoyama kimalenaya ala mono nona alina lagape aitalena tagufa (3) kanafi ani nona etena vayamoya nokiya avamete no ali hetigahue.’ huno higeta havilinone.” huya nehae.
Hayanagi ani kemoa nago avamete kea ohunagi alu ke alu ke maiya humainae.

Hageno ala mono notela hagote kava kanomoa amunoamifi hetimaineno Yisasina mage huno havige “Na augafa ke kagaifena nehae? Kagaifena kaiyekema hunegatayana kenonaamia hufalote huka nohane?” huno havige.

Havigeanagi Yisasia kea ohuno avaya lukino maineno nagola osi ke kanoa ohutafa huno mainegeno ala mono notela hagote kava kanomoa eteno nagoene havige “Kagaya Anumaya Kotia taugafa aligatigahema hugatenea kano mainano? Kagaya agima alisaga nehaya Anumaya Kotina nafaneamoga mainano?” huno havige.

Havigegeno Yisasia hufalote huno hie “E, nagaya ani kano mainoanagitama tamakaya haenagaa Ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea nafanemonia tusia tokiya yamaa hanea Anumaya Kotina tamaga ayatega hanea siale mainena ikate hanea siate esugetama nagegahae.” huno hie.
Higeno ala mono notela hagote kava kanomoa ani kea havigeno aipamoa tokiyaage higeno kenaa alino hatata nehuno mage huno hie “Tagaya hai havunanagiya nagoa vayamoya kaiyekea huoatesae.
Anumaya Kotifema huhaviya hutea kea ago nehavigi. Na tamakesa nehaviye?” huno higeya mage huya hae “Tamage nehane anona yamaa alisia yafe haesageno falisie.” huya hae.

Huteya nagoa vayamoya Yisasina amavetuna heneateya aulagafi aiso huteneya aikoneliya mage huya havigae “Kaune kema nehana kanomoga tahapaiyo taya negahayae?” huya havinegeya ati vayamoya amayateti aikolimainae.

Pitaa nomo haupalega afetega mainegeno ala mono notela hagote kava kanomona aliya munamoa anile emaineno ageana Pitaa ata lota nehigeno ani munamoa megeteno Pitana agesagali maineno mage huno hie “Kagayaenena Nasaleti Yisasiene vaiyatete nehana kanoe.” huno hie.
Higeno Pitaa avane huno “Aao nagaya ani kanoa oagenoa kanohe maika nehane.” huno nehuno fiate nevigeno anile kokolemoa agea aimaine.
Fiate mainegeno ani munamoa mogeteno anile hetimaiya vayafena mage huno hie “Mani kanoa Yisasi anagapiti kanoe.” huno hie.

Higeno Pitaa nagoene eteno “Aao nagaya ani kanoa omainoe.” huno hie. Osi kana kanoa maigeya anile hetimaiya vayamoya mage huya hae “Tamage kagaya Kalili kano mainana yafe agaiene vaiyatete nehana kano mainane.” huya hae.
Hageno Pitaa mage huno hie “Nagaya tamagema ohisugenoa Anumaya Kotia nahaesie. Anumaya Koti aulagafina tamage huna tamahanepauve tamakayama haya kanoa nagaya oagenoa kanoe.” huno hie.

Nehigeno aupaa hagoteno agema aiya kokolemoa anile viaamo agea aigeno Pitana agesamoa aikalo higeno Yisasima hapaigeno havimainea kea mage huno humaineane “Kokolemoa tole kanale agea oainesigeka kagaya tagufa (3) kanale avane huka nagaifena ‘Noagoa kano maine.’ huka hugane huno humainea kemoa Pita agesamoa aikalo higeno haviteno tusia avitemaine.

Kola alino halegeya mukia mono note kava vayaene Yuta vayatamaene kahegi kema havilinaya anagaene kanisole vayaene Yisasina haesageno falisia kea huge havige huteya Yisasina nofi kiteteya ala kamani kava kanole, Pailatite avaleya ayapi motenae.
Motageno Pailatia Yisasifena mage huno hie “Kagaya Yuta veamogami Sauve kano mainano?” huno havigegeno Yisasia mage hie “Kagaikaa ani kea hai nehane.” huno hie.
Higeya mono note kava vayamoya kasagoya kea “Maa kefo kava humainane.” huya hutenae.
Huneatageno Pailatia nagoene mage huno hie “Havio mukia kefo yama nehana yana ali falote nehagi kagaya kenonaamia naa higeka nohane?” huno hie.
Hianagi Yisasia kenonaa nagola osi ke kanoa ohigeno Pailatina amayo aimaine.

Kafuahe kafuahe Anumaya Kotia amaugafama aligatimainea kanahe amakesa haviya imua negiyanagino Pailatia mukia ani imu kisaya kanafina nagoke nofi hutegeno nemaiya kanoa vayayagamoya haesaga huya “Agaya esie.” huya haya kanohe nofipitila “Hai hano hanagi vuo.” huno huneatea kanae.
Ani kanafina nago kanomo agia Palapasie kamani vayaene tuma nehaya vayaene maineno tuma haya kanafina vayala tavata nehamaeyaya vayaene mainegeya kina nopi avaleya hutenayane.
Hutenayanagiya vayayagamoya Pailatife mage huya me hae “Mukia imuma kina kanafima nehana kavala hulato.” huya hae.
Hageno Pailatia mage huno hamavige “Nagaya Yisasifena Yuta veate Sauve kanomofe ‘Hai hano hanagi vuo.’ huna hisugetama musena hugahao?” huno hamavige.

Higeya mono note kava vayamoya ma amakesa haviye “Mukia veala Yisasi kegeya nehaviya tagai kea nohaviye.” huteya ani yafe Yisasifena amaipamoa haviya huteteya Pailatite avaleya ageno Pailatia ani yafe agesa nehavino humaine.
Havianagi mono note kava vayamoya mukia vayamogami amaipa moyeya mage huya hamapaiye “Mage hutama hiho ‘Palapasina atalesanageno afaa esie.’ hutama hiho.” huya hae.
Hageno Pailatia vayayagahena mage huno hamavige “Ania hisuana ma kanomofe tamakaya Yuta vayate Sauve kano maine hutama nehaya kanomofena naa hutesue?” huno hamavige.
Hamavigegeya mukia vayamoya ala kefiti mage huya hae “Yafaga yosale nili hetama asaigeno falino.” huya hae.

Hageno Pailatia mage huno hamavige “Naa higetama na kea nehae? Hanaa augafa kefo kava humaine?” huno hianagi amakaya eteya aliya alapi ataleya ala kefiti mage huya hae “Yafaga yosale nili hetama asaigeno falino.” huya hae.

Hageno Pailatia mukia vayamoya muse hisaya kava hugahue huno Palapasina nofipiti avaleno neataleno Yisasina agata aisifa kayoteti haifu amiteno Yisasina ati vaya amayapi ateteno “Yafaga yosale nili hetama asaigeno falino.” huno hie.
Ati vayamoya Yisasina avaleya ala kava kanomo no haupalega umaineya mukia amakaiene nemaiya ati vayafe ke hageya emainae.

Emaineya Yisasina akaya ategahe “Ala kano mainane.” huya hisaya yafe ayaaya haesa kena aliya faiteteya avetanafaage nofi aliya mo aigalaki me aigalaki huya tumano kula talo huya Yisasina anute vaitenae.
Vaiteteya aepa heya huhaviya hutegahena mage huya hae “Felugae. Yuta vayamogami sauve kanomogae.” huya akaya atae.
Neateya anute kayoteti nagoene nagoene huya aikoneliya augafale amavetuna heneateya amaleya ayeya mopale maineya “Ala kano mainane” huya ayevataga vatago humainae.
Kigi huneateya haesa kena hateneataleteya agaia kena faiteteya yafaga yosale nili hegahe avaleya umainae.

Kategama vayana Saimoniene fotu humainae. Ani kanoa Sailini kumate kanoe. Alekasataene Lufasiganiene neanafae. Ani Saimonia hoyafinagati kate enevigeya ati vayamoya tokiyaage ke huya “Kaiyayeka yafaga yosa melika vuo.” huya hageno molino umaine.
Alino vigeya Yisasina avaleya vayaamoya Kologota kumate uvayi hae. Ani kumamo agimoa tagaiti kefina anu ayamufa kumale huya nehae.

Ani ati vayamoya “Haesunageno falisiana agata ai yafenagita agatama oaisia tina amisunageno nesie.” huyama hayana anima agata oaisia timo agia mea. Meaene nofi alagamo tiene nagopi ali havigu huteya aliya amiyana Yisasia ani tifena “Aao.” huno onene.
Onegeya yafaga yosale nili heya asaimaleteya kenaa fako huya aligahe musufa yama nehaya yokalo lageya amakasaya vayamoya alimainae.
Natena naeni (9) kiloki yagemoa anale hai vayi higeya Yisasina yafaga yosalela nilia maleya heteya asaimainae.
Asaiteya “Ma kava higeta haune.” huya kaemalenae “Mani kanoa Yuta veate ala Sauve kanoe.” huya kaeya malenae.
Kaemaleteya Yisasiene tole kanolatana vaya nehamaeana musufa yama nehaa kanolatana nago kanoa Yisasina tamaga kaiyagaa haeya asaimaleya nago kanoa haoga kaiyagaa haeya asaimaleya humainae.

Humalenageya katema ute ete huya agasaya vayamoya amakeya kayo aiya “Kefo kano maine.” huya kigi yokalofiti huhaviya huneateya mage huya hae “Oho kagaya ‘Ala mono nona alina lagape aitaletena tagufa (3) kanafi etena kitalegahue.’ huka nehana kano mainane?
Menia kagaya yafaga yosa neataleka kagaikaa elavika kaugafa aligatio.” huya hae.

Hageya mono note kava vayaene kahegi kema havilinaya anagaene amakaiami vayamoyaene ania huya kamuge hatageya vaineateya mohu mehu huya huhaviya huneateya mage huya hae “Nagoa vea amaugafa aligatimainegi naa higeno agaia augafa ali nokatie.

Kalaisiga Isaleli vayate Sauve kanoamimoga yafaga yosa neataleka elavigeta agamano. Agesunana kagaifena havita tagupi maleta tametitia hugahune.” huya huhaviya huneatageno agaienema yafaga yosalema asaimalaya musufa kanolatamoganienena ania huana Yisasina huhaviya hutenae.
Yagemoa euno amunokano higeno halemainea yamoa hano higeno mukia kotega tusia hanikino viaamo une kanalega eteno ali halemaine.

Une kanalega Yisasia ala kefiti ke huno agaia kefiti mage huno hie “Eli Eli lema sapakatani.” huno hie. Tagaiti kefina mage huno hie “Anumaya Kotinimogae, Anumaya Kotinimogae naa higeka nagaila nenatalane?” huno hie.
Higeya nagoa anile hetimaiya veamoya haviteya mage huya hae “Ilaiyafe ke nehigi haviho.” huya hae.

Hageno nago kanomoa viaamo hava koyafa kana yana alino atuage nofi alagamo tipi ayeteno alino viaamo kupaga kayote maleno ani hava koyafa kana yana kiteno “Yisasia mayu mayu huno nesie.” huno neamino mage huno hie “Agava maineta agesune Ilaiyaa yafaga yosaletila mevaleno elavisifi agegahune.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia ala kegefa huteno falimaine.
Faligenoa ala mono nopima ala kena ayaaya kenagefama asaimalenaya kenamoa Yisasima falia kana kanoale analeti aepa heno amunopiti hatata hulole hulavino mo talene.
Ati vayate kava kanomoa Yisasina aulega hetimaineno Yisasia kema huteno falia yana ageteno mage huno hie “Tamage huno mani kanoa Anumaya Koti nafanelafa maine.” huno hie.
Nagoa aneyaga aluale maineya agemainae. Nagoamogami amakia, osi Yemesiene Yosefegani itaanimoa Maliae Salomiagi Magatala kumate Maliaagi huya mainae.
Yisasia Kalilima mainea kanafina ani aneyagamoya akave vaiyatete nehuya kavela kaeya neamiyane. Mukia aneyaga Yisasiene Yelusalemu tokaeya umainaya aneyaga aluale hetiya maineya Yisasina agemainae.

Sapati yupahe haviya talo tala hisaya kanagino yagemoa lavi falegahe higeno Yosefea Alimatia kumate kanoa Yuta kanisolefi nemaiya kanoa evayi hie. Ani kanoa Anumaya Kotima kava yagaisia kanahe muse huno agava nehia kanogino kolia ohuno Pailatite viaamo mage huno havige “Yisasina augafaa aligahe nehue.” huno mo havige.
Havigegeno Pailatia “Aupaa ago falimainegeka nehano? Avonio namayo aiye.” huno agesa nehavino nagoa ati vayate kava yagaimainea kanohe ke higeno egeno “Yisasia ago falimaineo?” huno havige.
Havigegeno ati vayate kava kanomoa “E, ago falimaine.” huno higeno Pailatia Yosefena mage huno hapaiye “Kanalelagi augafa afaa moligane.” huno hie.

Higeno Yosefea viaamo kayo muki ayaaya kena molino viaamo augafa yafaga yosaleti alino maleneno kenaleti augafalela aigalaki kalaki huno haya kiteno alino viaamo hefalegeya kafimalenaya yafakapi Yisasina hevaiteteno avayalema aililesia yafana ayetufeno anile mo aililemalene.
Magatala Maliaene Yosefena itaamoa Maliaene maineana hevaitea yafa kaana agemainae.
Sapati yupamoa hano higeya Yemesina itaamoa Maliae hamoamoa Magatala kumate alagi Salomiene Yisasina augafale manaage masaveteti faletegahe ani masavena aliya emainae.
Sota yupa yagemoa yaufa nehaigeya ani aneyaga komulega vae.
Kategama vayana amakaiamige kea hume hume umainae “Komumo avayalema aililemalea yafana ta taya huno avayaletila alino avayu huno faitega atalelategahie?” huya hae.
Nehuya agesaga huya agayana ani ala yafakefa ago alikelitalageno faitega hanegeya agemainae.
Ageteya ani yafakapinaga hai faleya mogayana nago neyana aya tamaga kaiyaga mopale mainegeya agayana ani kanomoa ayaaya efe kena failinegeya ageteya tusia amamayo aimainae.

Amamayo neaigeno ani kanomoa mage huno hie “Tamakaila tamamayoa oaino. Tamakaya Nasaleti Yisasife ati neayae. Yafaga yosale nilima heya asaimalaya kanohe ati neayayanagi agaya falimainefiti ago hetimaine. Mafina omainegi ani kanoma malaya kumala ma hanegi ageho.

Tamakaya utama Yisasienema tokaeya nemaiya anagaene Pitaene mage hutama hamapaiho “Yisasia ofalino afaa mainenoma tamahapaimainea kemoa ago uhagotelamateno Kalili umainegi anilega neutama Yisasina mogeho.” huno hamanepaiye.
Higeya amakaya atili huteya amamayo aigeya yafakapitila hatilaviya amaiyayeya vayanagi kolima haya yafe nagoa vayala ani kea hamaopainae.

Sota yupa nate alakefafi Yisasia falimainefitila hetino viaamo hagoteno Magatala kumate Malia mainelega uvayi higeno agemaine. Nayona ani amo agupina sevenia (7) Satani Avamula mainegeno Yisasia anatitaleneane.

Ani Maliaa ageteno viaamo Yisasienema tokaeya nemaiya anagala mogeana tusia hamau huya avineatageno ani amoa mage huno mo hamapaiye “Yisasia falimainefitila ago hetigena nagaya agaila ago agetena neoe.” huno hamapaigeya haviteya “Havige nehane.” huya amametitia ohunae.
Haenagaa ani vayapitila tolemogania kumala ataleana katega nevaageno Yisasia evayi higeana agemainae.
Ageteana ani kanolatana eteana vayaanimoya mainalega vaaamogani “Yisasia naa kano agoe.” huana mo nehaana ani vayamoya “Havige nehae.” huya haviya amametitia ohunae.

Haenagaa alevenia (11) anagala kave maiya nenageno Yisasia evayi huno maineno amakaya vayamoyama haya kemoa “Yisasia falimainefitila ago hetigeta agemainone.” huya haya kema havisaya yafena amakuamoa tilegeya haviya amametitima ohaya yafe Yisasia ke memamakie.
Kemamakiteno mage huno hamapaiye “Mukia kotega utama nagai kanale mono kea alitama veamogamina mo hamapaiho.

Hamapaisageya nagoa veamoya ani kehena ‘Tamage nehae.’ huya haviya amakupi maleya amametiti hisagetama tina falematesageno Anumaya Kotia amaku amamena aligatigahianagi nagoa veamoya ani kehena ‘Havige nehae.’ huya haviya amakupi omalesaya veafena Anumaya Kotia ‘Hani yapi tegelege nehia atafi viho.’ huno humategahie.

Nagai kema haviya amakupi maleya ametiti hisaya veamoya ani tokiyaage avame yana hugahae nagai nagile Kefo Avamula vea amakupitila amanati neataleya amaku amakesafiti ohavinesaya kefitila alu amake alu amakea aigahae.

Veama akafu neamanisia osifavema atafa hisayana amaugafa amagata oaisigeya ofaligahae. Vayama nefalia posini lima nesayana amaugafa amagata oaisigeya ofaligahae. Kalima nealiya vayamogami amaugafalema amayama malesagenoa kaliamimoa kanale humategahie.” huno hie.
Yisasia, Anumayatimoe mani kea hamapaitegeno ikapinaga avalesaga higeno haino Anumaya Kotina tamaga ayatega umaine.

Umainegeya Yisasiene tokaeya nemaiya anagala mukia kotega ute ete huya Yisasi mono kea hamanepaigeno Anumayamoa amakaiene vaiyeno amaya huno tokiya yamaaleti “Ani kea tamage nehae.” huya veamoya havisaya yafe kasagoya tokiya avame yana humainae. Mani kema hua kea tamage.
Tiofilasiga ala kava kanomoga mukia vayamoya Yisasima tagai amunopi humainea yana ago kaemalenae.
Yisasi kema hamanepaiya vayamoya ehe kanale aepa heya ani yana ageteya tamahapaimainae.
Mukiama kahapaiya kemona aepaa kelamake ke havisa-nafe nagaya kanaleya huna havilama huna havilinoafe fatago huna kaena kamigahue huna nehue.

Nagi Yutia kotega ala kava kanomo agia Helotie kava yagaino mainea kanafina nago kanomo agia Sekalaiyae mono note kava kano maineanagino Apaisa nofi kano mai-geno aamoa Eloni nofi vayapiti falote humaineane. Ani amo agia Ilisapetie.
Ani alavelatana Anumaya Koti aulagafina fatago huana mai-neana mukia Anumayamo kahegi kea haviana akave maleana havi kavala ohunaane.
Ilisapetia namo a maineafe nafaneania omai alavelata kosuna alekano lemainae.

Apaisa nofi vayamoya aliya alisaya kana Sekalaiyaa Anumaya Koti aulagafi aliyamaa nealigeya mono nopi kava vayamoya Sekalaiyafe “Kagayae.” huya hageno Sekalaiyaa Anumaya Koti mono nopi maineno manaage yana kaesalamana Anumaya Kotina huneateane.
Halinamo manaa Anumaya Kotina neamigeya mukia veane-yaga kumatega maineya Anumaya Kotitega havigemainae.
Havigageno Sekalaiyaa mono nopi mainegeno Anumayamo ensole kanomoa agaite efalote huno manaage ata kaemalea folamole tamaga kaiyagaa me hetimainegeno agemaine.
Sekalaiyaa ani kanoa ageteno atali talu huno koli humaine.
Koli hianagi ani kanomoa mage huno hie “Sekalaiyaga kolia ohuka afaa maiyo. Nunamuma humainana yafena Anumaya Kotia ago havianagino akamoa Ilisapetia ne nafane atesigeka agia Yonie huka malo.
Kagaya tusia muse nehisanageya mukia veamoya ani nafanema falote hisia yafena tusia muse hugahae.
Ani nafanemoa Anumaya Koti aulagafina ala agiene kano maineno havilina onegahia-nagino atenea kanaleti aepa heno Anumaya Koti Alu Aotage Avamumoa aguafina hiya hugahie.
Hiya hisigeno mukia Isaleli kumate veanemoya agai kea haviteya amakua aiyahae huya amakaiami Anumaya Kotitega ugahae.

Anumayamo aulega hagoteno Ilaiyama humainea kavaene aminea tokiyaaene vigeya amafaheya agai kea haviteya amakua aiyahae huya nafaneamihena amakesa havigahae. Veganokano nehaya veanemoya agai kea haviteya amakua aiyahae huya fatago veanemoya humainaya kanale kea havigahae. Aniama hisayafe veaneyaga Anumayamoma esiafe amakua talo tala huya maigahae.” huno hie.
Higeno Sekalaiyaa mage huno hie “Tamage nehapi havige nehane? Nagaya kosunagina animoa alekano lemaineanagitaa hanaa hutaa ani kea havisue?” huno humaine.
Higeno ensole kanomoa mage huno hie “Nagaya Kepalielinae Anumaya Koti aule hetina mainogeno Anumaya Kotia ani kanale kema kahapaisuafene huno hunategena emainoe.

Havio nagai kemoma haenagaa efalotema huno tamage hisigeka kenia ohavinanafe menia tugogekamoa tileno atalako hinageka kaiyekea ohugananagika kema hua kemoa efalote huno tamage hisia kanale tugogekamoa akalo hinageka kagea aikalo hugane.” huno humaine.
Higeya kumate mainaya veamoya Sekalaiyafe agava huge hugeteya ayaaya kanagefa Anumaya Koti noma hunalagimale nopima maiya yafe “Naa higeno aupaa nome.” huya amakesa haviya mainae.

Mainageno ani nopinagati hatilaviana kaiyekea nohie. Kaiyekema ohia yafe veamoya amakesa mage huya havimainae “Nopinaga maiya yamo alu ya agemai kano maine.” huya havigeno ani kanomoa ayateti avamename huno kea hamapaiya-nagi avayamoa tuki maine.
Tuki mainegeno aliyamaama hano hia kanale nomaalega umaine.

Umainegeno haenagaa aamoa, Ilisapetia aipaene maineno faefua (5) ikana falakino maineno mage hie “Anumayamoa kanale ya hunatene. Nageteno veamogami amaulagafina nagayema humainoa yana ago alitalene.” huno humaine.
Ilisapetia aipaene mainea ikana sikisia (6) ika agasetegeno Anumaya Kotia nago ensole kanoa, Kepalielina, nago Kalili kotega hanea kumala, Nasaleti hutene.
Anumaya Kotia nagola vene ofaenea munate Kepalielina hutegeno umaine. Ani munamo agia Maliae. Yosefena agaite hagemalenaya munale. Yosefena aginagomo agia Tevitie.
Kepalielia Maliate eno mage huno hie “Mainano? Anumaya Kotia kagaila muse nehia munamoga Anumayamoa kagaiene maine.” huno hie.
Higeno anima hia kehena Maliaa tusi amayo neaino ma agesa havimaine “Ani kea naane ke me nahapaiye?” huno humaine.
Higeno ensole kanomoa agaife mage huno hie “Maliaga kolia ohuo. Anumaya Kotia kagaifena aipa kanale hunegate
Havio kagaya kaipa ya huteka ne nafane ateteka agia Yisasie huka malo.

Ani nafanemoa agi hanesia kano mainesigeya veamoya ‘Anale mainea Anumaya Koti nafane maine.’ huya hugahae. Aginagomoa, Teviti kava yagaimainea tokiyaa Anumaya Kotia amisigeno Yekopu nofi veate agola kava yagaino maineno kava yagaisia tokiyaa hanege hanege huno hanesigeno hano ohugahie.” huno humaine.
Higeno Maliaa ensole kanomofe mage huno hie “Hanaa huna ania hisue? Nagaya velela omainoa muna mainoe.” huno hie.

Higeno ensole kanomoa agaife mage huno hie “Anumaya Kotina Alu Aotage Avamuamoa kagaite emaisigeno anale mainea Anumaya Kotina tokiyaamoa aiso hugatesigeka maineka nafanea ategane. Atesanana alu aotage kanale nafane mainesigeya veamoya ani nafanehena ‘Anumaya Kotina neamo maine.’ huya hugahae.
Havio neitakamoa, Ilisapetia, alekano lemaineanagi aipaene maineanagino ne nafane ategahie. ‘Namo a maine.’ huya humainaya alekanomoa aipaene mainea ikamaa sikisia (6) ika agasemaine.
Anumaya Kotia tagaya ohuteasina yanagi afaa hugahie.” huno humaine.
Higeno Maliaa mage huno hie “Nagaya ago Anumayamo aliya muna mainoe. Hana kemoa kanalelagino nagaitela falote hunategahie.” huno hie. Higeno ensole kanomoa anileti neataleno umaine.
Maliaa ani kanafina hetino aiyayeno agoyafi haino Yutia kotega hanea kumate umaine.
Uvayi huno Sekalaiya nopi hai faleno Ilisapetina falu fala hutene.

Falu fala huneategeno Ilisapetia Maliama hia kea nehavigeno aipafima mainea nafanemoa kanage kanage higeno Anumaya Koti Alu Aotage Avamumoa Ilisapetina aguafina hiya higeno Ilisapetia ala kefiti mage huno hie “Kagaya mukia aneyaga amakaseka mainanageno Anumaya Kotia kanale muse ya kamianagika atesana nafanea kanale muse ya alimainea nafane kaipafina maine.
Nagaya hanaa a mainogeka Anumayaniamona itaamoga nagaitega neane.
Havio hu falu fala hunatana kea nagesafi nehavugeno naipafinaga mainea nafanemoa tusi muse nehuno kanage kanage nehie.
Kagaya Maliaga Anumayamo ensole kanomoa kahapaiya kea ago tamage huno falote hugahie huka ago havika kagupi maleka kametiti humainanafe Anumaya Kotia muse hisana yana ago kamine.” huno hie.
Maliaa mage huno hie “Nagu nafanemoa Anumayamo agi alisaga nehigeno nagu namena alinegatia Anumaya Kotiniamofena tusi muse nehue.

Muse nehuanagina nagaya afa munalagina aliya munaa mainoanagi agaia nagaila kalagi ainateanagina ani nafanea atesugeya mukia veala meni veanene haenagama falote hisaya veanene nagaifena ‘Ma amona Anumaya Kotia tusia muse hisia ya aminea ale.’ huya hugahae.
Tusi tokiyaa hanea kanomoa nagaila kanale ya hunatene. Ani kanomo agia ‘Kanale alu aotage kano.’ maine huya nehae.
Agaife ‘Ala kanoni maine.’ huya humai-naya veamofena menima mainaya veanene haenaga veamogamifeene tusia kalagi aimaine.
Ayateti tokiya aliyana alimaineanagino ‘Tagaya ala veane mainone.’ huya amakuafinaga nehaviya amaugafa aliya haimainaya amakesa haviya veamogamina amanatitalene.
Tokiyaage kava vayala alino mopafi amataleneanagi amakima omale veamogamina amakia alisaga humaine.
Amakuafinaga amaka-nelea veamogamina kanale yana kasagoya alino amamigeno amamu higeya havatemainae. Mukia yaamima hanea veala oamamino humategeya ataleya umainae.

Taginagomoa Apalahamuene agaia nofi veanene haenagama falote hisaya veanenefe mage huno hie ‘Kalagi ailamategahue.’ huno nayona humainea kele menia agesa haviteno Isaleli kumate aliya vayaamogamina amaya humaine.” huno Maliaa humaine.
Maliaa Ilisapetiene tagufa (3) ika maiteno kumaalega eteno umaine.
Ilisapetina inamu ya alitegeno ne nafane atene.
Atetegeya agaia kumate veanene agaia nofi veanene Anumaya Kotia kalagi aitenea yafena haviteya tusia muse humainae.
Nago sota maiteya ani ne nafanemona agoya anoya taga hisia ya agegahune huya emaineya nefate hamoya hugahe agia Sekalaiyae huya malegahe nehageno itaamoa “Aao agia Yonie huta malegahune.” huno hie.
Higeya veamoya mage huya hae “Naa higeka ani agia nemalane? Tanakai nofi veamoga-mina ania amakia omalene.” huya hae.
Nefa tugokemoa tilemainegeno agema oaiya yafe avamename huya “Na agi malegane?” huya havigae.
Havigageno avamename huno “Avo kaesua ya namiho.” huno higeya amigeno “Agia Yonie.” huno kaegeya ageteya vayamoya “Nohaya kava hie.” huya amamayoa aiye.
Ani agia kaemaletegeno aupaa Sekalaiya tugokemoa akalo higeno avefunamoa ayaaya higeno kaiyekea huno Anumaya Koti agia alisaga hie.
Ani kumate veamoya tusia amamayo aigeya ani yafena ke hu atile male hageno ani kemoa mukia Yutia agoya hanea kumatega ute ete higeya havimainae.
Haviteya veamoya haviya amakupi maleteya mage huya hae “Anumayamoa aya hugahe agaiene maineafe haenagaa mani nafanemoa hanaa hisia nafane maigahie?” huya humainae.

Nefaa, Sekalaiyana aguafi Anumaya Kotina Alu Aotage Avamuaamoa me hiya huno havatemainegeno Anumaya Koti aune kano kana huno mage hie “Isaleli veamogati Anumaya Kotia agaia veanele me laya huno taugafa aligatimainea yafe agia alisaga hisune.
Tevitia Anumaya Kotina aliya kanoamo nofi anagapiti nago tokiyaage kanoa taugafa aligatisia kano ali hetitene.
Ani kea Anumaya Kotia nayona alu aotage aune vayaamogami amavayafiti hu falote humaineane.
Mage huya humainae ‘Kame vayatimoya ago tatafa hulinaya vayamogamiene tagaife amaipa kafa henelataya vayamogami amayapitila tavaleno taugafa aligatigahie.’
Anumaya Kotia taginagomofe ‘Aigetamatena tamaya hugahue.’ huno humainea yana hugahie. Alu aotage huno alino hagelafilateneafe agesa havi havi huno agekani otategahie.
Alino hagelafilatenea kemona hulokiya vaino taginagomona Apalahamufe humaineane. Nayoma humainea kea menia ani kava hisiafe hie.

Anima hulokiya vaimalenea kemoa mage huno humaine ‘Nagaya kame vayatamimogami amayapitila tamavalesaga huna tamaugafa aligatisugetama tamakaya kolia ohutama mukia kanafina tamahaimula hanesigetama kefo yatamia omale veanea fatago kavaage hutama nagai naulela aliyania aligahae.’ huno humaineane.

Humaineanagi kagaya Yoniga nafanenimogae haenagaa kagaifena ‘Anafinaga mainea Anumaya Kotina aune kanoa mainane.’ huya hugahae. Kagaya uhagoteka Anumayamo visia kana talo tala hugane. Anumaya Kotia tagaifena tusiya huno kalagi ailateneafe agaia veanea kefo yaamia agetamateno ataleamateno amaku amamena aligatisiafe humavelisanageya havigahae. Monafinagati halemainea kanoa falote huno tagaitema esiana ani kava hugahie.
Hani yapi maineta faligahe humainona veamogata ayevasa hulateno ako huta maisuna kate tategahe egahie.” huno humaine.
Ani nafanemoa ala huno agu agesamoa tokiyaage higeno kame kotega umaiteno Isaleli veamogami amaulagale efalote higeya agemainae.
Ani kanafina nago kava kanomo agia Sisa Ogasatasie mage huno humaine “Mukia Lomu kamanimoya kava yagaimainesaya kumate veala amaki me ayegeya kaeho.” huno humaine.
Higeno ani kanafina hagote kanale aepa heya amakia kaemainayane. Ani kanafina nago osi kava mainea kanomo agia Kuiliniusie ani kanoa Silia kotega kava yagaino nemaiya kanoe.
Mukia vayala amaki aligahe hageya mopa aepaamilega umainae. Yosefena aginagomoa Tevitima maineafe Yosefea Kalili kotega hanea kumala Nasaleti kumaa ataleno Petelehemu, Tevitina atenea kumate umaine.
Maliana hagemalenaya munala aipaene mainegeana “Taagi alisae.” huno avaleno umaine.
Ani kumate umainaageno inamu yana alitene.
Maliaa yage nafanea ne nafane ateteno mukia faesia nona hiya higeno pulamakamo nopi ateteno kupi asaga huno aiteno pulamakamoya kave nenaya yopafi faetene.
Ani kegela sipi sipi kava vayala talapinaga maineya sipi sipiyagale kava yagaiya mainae.
Mainageno anile Anumaya Koti ensole kanomoa egeno Anumayamo tokiya hale yamaamoa aivasa hulino egeya ageteya koli humainae.
Hageno ensole kanomoa mage huno hie “Kolia ohutama mainetama haviho nagaya kanale kaiyekea tamahapaigahe alina neoe. Tusia muse hisaya kea tamahapaisugeya mukia veamoya havigahae.
Meni kegela Teviti kumatela tamaugafa aligatisia kanoa ago neate. Ani kanomo agia Anumaya Kalaisie, Anumaya Kotima taugafa aligatigahema hutenea kanoe.
Ani nafanea kupi aiteteno pulamakamo kave nenea yopafi faeteneanagitama mogetetama ‘Ma yafema hia yana ago falote humaine.’ hutama hugahae.” huno hie.
Higeya mukia ensole vayayaga ani kanomote aupaa melitalu huya Anumaya Koti agia alisaga nehuya mage huya humainae.
“Anumayatimogae anafinaga mainane huta kagi alisaga nehunageka mopale mainaya veamogamina kaipa falu humatesana veamoya amaipa falu huya kanaleya huya maigahae.” huya humainae.
Ensole vayamoya neamataleya ikapinaga haigeya sipi sipi kava vayamoya ke mohu mehu huya mage hae “Petelehemu vigetao Anumayamoa tahapaiya yana mogegahune.” huya humainae.
Amaiyayeya agegahe vaayana Maliagani Yosefegania nafaneania afumo kave nenea yopafi faeteteana mainaageya mogemainae.
Mogeteya ensole vayamoya ani nafanehema hamapaiya kea mukia veanea hamapaiye.
Hamapaigeya mukia havimainaya veamoya sipi sipi kava vayamoyama hamapaiya kehena tusia amamayo aimainae.
Amamayo aiyanagi Maliaa mukia yama humainea kavala aguafi maleneno agesa havino maine.
Mainegeya sipi sipi kava vayamoya eteya kumaamilega neuya agoma hamapaigeya haviteya agemainaya yafena Anumaya Kotitega muse huya agia alisaga hume hume vae.
Yisasina atetegeya nago sota maiteya agoya anoya tagama haya kanale agia Yisasie huya malenae. Ani agia oatenegeno itaamoa aipa yana ohunegeno ensole kanomoa ani agia malenea agie.
