Itaamoene nafanene faeana hali hutaageno Mosesema humainea kemo akave maleana Yisasina avaleana Anumaya Kotina amigahe Yelusalemua haimainae.
Anumaya Koti ke kaemalenaya kefina mage huno humaine “Mukia yage ne nafaneyaga Anumaya Kotina alu aotage nafanea maisie.” huya kaemalenayane.
Kaemalenayana Anumaya Kotitega muse ya amigahe haimainae. Anumaya Koti ke kaemalenaya kefina mage huno humaine “Tole nama haefatalapi tole ala namalata amigahae.” huya kaemalenayane.

Ani kanafina nagola Yelusalemu mainea kanomo agia Simionie. Fatago kano maineno Anumaya Koti kea akave nemalea kanoa Isaleli veamogami amaugafa aligatisia kanomo esiafe agava mainegeno Alu Aotage Avamumoa agaiene maineno mage huno hapaiye “Aupaa ofaligananagika Anumaya Kotima amaugafa aligatigahema hutesia kanoa ageteka faligane.” huno hapaimaineane.

Hapaimaineanagino ala mono nopi avaleno egeno anile mainegeana Yisasina itaafoamogania mono kemo avaya ali hipoya huana avaleana aageno ani kanomoa Yisasina avaleno anukilineno Anumaya Koti agia alisaga humaine.

Avalelineno Simeonia mage huno hie “Anumayamoga hagoteka nahapaimainana nafanea menia ani nafanemoa tagaila taugafama aligatisia kanoa neagoafe naipamoa kanale hinagena aliya kanokamonia ‘Falio.’ hisanagena falisue.

Mukia veamogami amaulagafina anima taugafa aligatisia kanoa tavelinanagino ani kanomoa kagaikaa Isaleli veamogamina amakia alisaga huteno Yuta veala omainaya veamogamina aye vasa humateno kagai kea hamapaigahie.” huno hie.
Yisasina itaafoamogania Simeonia ani nafanehema hia kehena tusi anakesa havi havi humainae.

Haageno Simeonia kanale manu anamino ani nafanemo itaamoa, Maliafena mage huno hie “Havio Anumaya Kotia mani nafanea huteneafe mukia Isaleli kumate veanea nagoamogamina ali lakatineamataleno nagoamogamina ali hetimategahe hutegeno emaine. Anumaya Kotia nagola alegana ya kana huno hanesiafe hutegeno emaineanagi mukia veamoya agaifena ‘Kahaoteyakae.’ huya hugahae. Hugahayanagi mukia veamoya amaku amakesa haviya kemoa falote humategahie. Maliaga haenagaa kagaila kahaumanamoa tusiya huno halegahie.” huno hapaiye.

Ani mono nopina nagola Anumaya Koti aune aala maine. Ani amo agia Anae nefa agia Fanuelie. Anakai nofi veanea Asa nofi veane mainae. Ani aala alekano maine. Yauva a mainea kanafina neveene sevenia (7) kafu mainegeno nevea falitegeno megusa heno maino haimainea kafua eiti foa (84) kafu maine. Ani amoa mono nona oataleno anifi mukia kanafina kegeene felugaene Anumaya Koti agia alisaga nehuno kavela mosino Anumaya Kotitega havinegeane.
Ani amoa anile evayi huno Yisasina megeteno Anumaya Kotifena tusi muse huteteno mukia Yelusalemu veanea amaugafa aligatisia kanohe agava mainaya veala Yisasifena hamapaiye.
Yisasina itaafoamogania mono kema hamanepaiya kavala hano huteteana Kalili uana kumaanilega Nasaleti umainae.
Yisasia ala huno tokiyaage nafane maineno kanale agu agesaene nafane mainegeno Anumaya Kotia agaiene maineno kayone hu yana amine.
Isaleli kotega veanea mukia kafuahena Anumaya Kotima amaugafa aligatimainea yafe amakesa hao hisia imu negigeana Yisasina itaafoamogania mukia kafulema ani imulega Yelusalemuga umainae.
Vaageno Yisasia tuelufua (12) kafua hanegeana mukia kafule nehaa kava huana Yelusalemu ani imulega haimainae.
Anima imuma kiya kanamoa hano higeya itaafoamogania noamilega aepa heya ugahe hageno ani nafanea Yisasia ouno afaa Yelusalemu mainegeana maiya yafena ohavinae.
“Nagoa vayatiene katega nevifi?” huana nago yupa kate uteana kegela agai nofi vayaamogami amunoamifiene nefugami amunoamifiene atiyaana oagenae.
Oagetafa huteana atiyegahe Yelusalemu alehate eteana umainae.
Tagufa (3) feluga atiyegetaana oageana ala mono nopi haiana mogaana anile ala humaveli vayaene mopale maineno amakai ke haviteno anonaamia hamavige.
Hamavigegeya mukia ani kema haviya vayamoya kenonaahena tokiyaage agesama hanea yafena tusiya huya amamayoa aimainae.
Amamayoa neaigeno itaafoamogania mogeteana anamayo neaiana itaamoa mage hie “Nenimoga naa higeka ma kavala hu nelaatane? Negafaene taaipa havitaa kanaage hutaa kagaifena katineayoe.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia anakaifena “Naa higetana nagaifena natineayae? Nagaya Nenafa nopina aliya alisua yafe nenahaiye huna hua kea nohaviafio?” huno hie.
Higeana agayama hia kea havilama ohunae.
Havilama ohaageno Yisasia anakaiene tavino Nasaleti umaineno anakai ke haviteno akave malegeno itaamoa mukia humainea kavala alino aguafi malene.
Malegeno Yisasia ala hutegeno kanale aku agesamoa ala higeno Anumaya Kotiene veamoyaene tusia muse hutenae.

Taipiliasi Sisaa mukia Lomu veanela ala kava maine. Fifitinia (15) kafu ala kava kano maigeno ani kanafina Potiusi Pailatia Yutia kotega Gavana kava kano maigeno Helotia Kalili Kavana kava kano maigeno aganaamoa Filipia Ituliaene Talakonaitisiene Gavana kava kano maigeno Laiseniasia Apilini Gavana kava kano maigeno huya mainae.
Mainageana ani kanafina Anasiagi Kaiyafasiagi ala mono note kava kanolata mainaanagino ani kanafina Sekalaiya nafanea, Yonia kame kotega umainegeno Anumaya Kotia nago ke hapaiye.

Yonia ani kanafina Yotani ti agegaya kumayagale uno Anumaya Koti kea hamapaino mage huno hie “Kefo yatamihe tamakua aiyahae hutama ‘Nagoene ohugahune.’ hutama vigena tina falelamatesugeno Anumaya Kotia kefo yatamia aigetamateno atalelamateno.” huno humaine.
Nayona Anumaya Koti aune kanomoa, Aisaiyaa, mage huno kaemaleneane
“Kame kotegati nago kanomoa keha keha huno mage hugahie ‘Anumayamo esia kamaa ali hilato hutama ali fatago hiho.
Otufina male havatetama osi agoyaene ala agoyaene kafilava higeno tavino afete hanesie. Ugayagi egayagi humainea kamona ali fatago nehutama yafama hanea kaene ali fatago hulama hiho.
Mukia veala Anumaya Koti amaku amamena aligatisia yana agegahae.’ huno kaemaleneane.”

Mukia veala Yonitega “Ti falelatesie.” huya neageno Yonia amakaife mage huno hamapaiye “Tamakaya osifaveyagamo nafaneyaga mainetama, havigeage vayamogatama, Anumaya Kotima kaiyeke hulamatesigeno tamaugafa tamagata aisia kanaa aupaa efalote hisia yafena ‘Faletama viho.’ kea ta tamahapaimaine?

Hagotetama kefo yatamihena tamakua aiyahae humainayafe tamakaitami kanale kava humainesaya yafema navelisayana tina falelamategahue. Tamakaya ‘Apalahamu nafaneyaga mainone.’ hutama ohiho. Nagaya tamahanepauve Anumaya Kotia ma yafatetila Apalahamu nafaneyaga kanale talo hileasine.
Tamakaya yosa kana humainayanagi menia Anumaya Kotia tuna alino yosamo aipalela maleneno kanale alagama oayenea yosa atagino atafi hagayu huno kaegahie.” huno hie.
Higeya mukia veamoya mage huya havigae “Tagaya na kava hisune?” huya hae.
Yonia mage huno hie “Nago kanomoga tole siotama hanesigekahena siotaa omalesia kanoa nagola afaa amio. Kaveama hanesia kanomoa ania huno kavea omalesia kanomona afaa amino.” huno humaine.
Nagoa vayala amaugafaleti takisi mone nealiya vayamoya “Ti falelatesie.” huya emaineya agaife mage huya hae “Hulaveli kanomoga tagaya naa hisune?” huya hae.
Hageno amakaifena mage hie “Ala kava kanomoma ‘Naa mone aliho.’ hisia kate aliho. Afa moneamienena oaliho.” huno hie.

Nagoa ati vayamoya mage huya havigae “Tagaya naa hisune?” huya hageno amakaifena mage hie “Tamakaya veala hamaetama moneamia oaliho. Havigea hutama alu moneamia ali oamateho. Alisaya moneage muse hutama aliho.” huno nehie.
Mukia veamoya Anumaya Kotia amaugafama aligatigahe hutesia kanohe “Aupaa egahie.” huya agava maineya Yonifena tusia amaku amakesa haviya “Yonia ani Kalaisie haya kano mainefi?” huya humainae.

Hageno Yonia kenonaamia mage huno hie “Nagaya titeti fale nelamatoanagino haenagama nago kano esiana Alu Aotage Avamutetiene ataletiene falelamategahie. Ani kanomoa tusia tokiyaa hanea kanogino nagaila ago nagasemaineanagina nagaya afa kano mainoanagina agai aiyale ayesuana onategahie.

Agaya sipeti ayopaa alilineno vitimo anoyaa fu huno haletaleno alagaa alino nopi halaya humalegahigi anoyaa ata tegelege nehia atafi kaetalegahie. Ani avinamoma hia kava huno veala fako faka hugahie.” huno nehie.
Mani kene alu ke alu kene Anumaya Kotina kanale kea hamapaiye.

Helotia Gavana kanomoa mukia kefo ya humainea yafeene aganaamo aala Helotiasina kumai heno vigeno alitenea yafeene Yonia aufi ke ayesali huno humainea keleti Helotia mukia kefo ya humainea yana agaseno Yonina nofi hutene.

Nofila hu oatenegeno Yonia mukia veala tina fale neamategeno Yisasia anile egeno agaila fale neategeno Anumaya Kotitega ke huno havigegeno ikamoa aihagalo higeno Alu Aotage Avamumoa nama kana huno agaitega enelavigeno ikapinagati age aino mage huno hie “Kagaya nagaini nafanemoga kagaifena aluya huno nahau nayamopafi nenagea nenimoga kagaifena aluya huna musekaa nehue.” huno humaine.
Yisasia tetia (30) kafua hanegeno aliyamaa aepa hemaine. Mukia veamoya agaifena “Yosefe nafane maine.” huya hae.
Yosefena nefa agia Helie.
Helina nefa agia Matatae.
Matatana nefa agia Livaie.
Livaina nefa agia Melekie.
Melekina nefa agia Yanaie.
Yanaina nefa agia Yosefea.
Yosefena nefa agia Matatiasia.
Matatiasina nefa agia Amosia.
Amosina nefa agia Nahumia.
Nahumina nefa agia Esalia.
Esalina nefa agia Nagaia.
Nagaina nefa agia Matie.
Matina nefa agia Matatiasie.
Matatiasina nefa agia Semenie.
Semenina nefa agia Yosekie.
Yosekina nefa agia Yotae.
Yotana nefa agia Yoananae.
Yoananana nefa agia Lesae.
Lesana nefa agia Selupapelie.
Selupapelina nefa agia Sealitieloe.
Sealitielona nefa agia Nelie.
Nelina nefa agia Melekie.
Melekina nefa agia Atia.
Atina nefa agia Kosamae.
Kosamana nefa agia Elamatamae.
Elamatamana nefa agia Eae.
Eana nefa agia Yosuae.
Yosuana nefa agia Eliesae.
Eliesana nefa agia Yolimae.
Yolimana nefa agia Matatae.
Matatana nefa agia Livaie.
Livaina nefa agia Simionie.
Simionina nefa agia Yutae.
Yutana nefa agia Yosefee.
Yosefena nefa agia Yonamae.
Yonamana nefa agia Eliakimae.
Eliakimana nefa agia Meleae.
Meleana nefa agia Menae.
Menana nefa agia Matatae.
Matatana nefa agia Natanae.
Natanana nefa agia Tevitie.
Tevitina nefa agia Yesie.
Yesina nefa agia Opetie.
Opetina nefa agia Poasie.
Poasina nefa agia Salamonie.
Salamonina nefa agia Nasonia.
Nasonina nefa agia Aminatapie.
Aminatapina nefa agia Atamie
Atamina nefa agia Anie.
Anina nefa agia Hesalonie.
Hesalonina nefa agia Pelesie.
Pelesina nefa agia Yutae.
Yutana nefa agia Yekopue.
Yekopuna nefa agia Aisakie.
Aisakina nefa agia Apalahamue.
Apalahamuna nefa agia Telae.
Telana nefa agia Nahoe.
Nahona nefa agia Selukie.
Selukina nefa agia Leue.
Leuna nefa agia Pelekee.
Pelekena nefa agia Epee.
Epena nefa agia Selae.
Selana nefa agia Kainanie.
Kainanina nefa agia Apakasatie.
Apakasatina nefa agia Siemie.
Siemina nefa agia Noae.
Noana nefa agia Lamekae.
Lamekana nefa agia Metuselae.
Metuselana nefa agia Enokie.
Enokina nefa agia Yaletie.
Yaletina nefa agia Mahalalelie.
Mahalalelina nefa agia Kenanie.
Kenanina nefa agia Enosie.
Enosina nefa agia Setie.
Setina nefa agia Atamue.
Atamuna nefa agia Anumaya Kotie.

Anumaya Kotina Alu Aotage Avamuamoa Yisasina aguafi hiya higeno Yisasia Yotani tina atalenoma neviana Alu Aotage Avumumoa veane omai kame kotega avaleno motegeno fotia (40) yupa mainegeno Satania Yisasina “Havi kava ho.” huno ayevataga humaine. Ayevataga huge huge nehigeno Yisasia kavela ani fotia (40) kanafina oneno afaa mainegeno tusia agatemaine.
Satania Yisasife mage hie “Kagaya Anumaya Koti nafanema mainenukahena ma yafana hapaigeno maya hapaeno.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia kenonaa mage huno hapaiye “Anumaya Koti avopiti kemoa mage humaineane
‘Vayamoya mayaage nesayana kanaleya huya omaigahae.’ huno humaineane.” huno hie.
Satania Yisasina anale avaleno viayamo aupaa mukia ma mopafi hanea ala kumayagaene afenoyamaaene avelimaine.
Aveliteno Satania agaifena mage hie “Mani kanale kumayaga kavama yagaisana tokiya kamigahue. Ani kava yagaisia tokiyaa nagaini ya haneanagina nagaya nahaisia kanomona afaa amigahue.
Kagayama nagaifema ‘Tusia ala kano mainane.’ huka naiyafi ape huka ala nagi namitesanagena ani kavama yagaisana tokiya kamigahue.” huno hie.
Yisasia kenonaa mage huno hie “Anumaya Koti avopi kaemalenaya kemoa mage huno humaineane
‘Anumaya Kotikamona agaiagefe ‘Tusia ala kano maine.’ huka kagesa havi havi huka agia alisaga huka agai aliyamaage alio.’ huno humaineane.” huno hapaimaine.
Satania Yisasina Yelusalemu avaleno ala mono nomo agotofule ateneno mage huno hapaiye “Kagaya Anumaya Koti nafanema mainenukahena ma nomo agotofuleti mopafi asaga hulavio.
Anumaya Koti avopiti kemoa mage humaineane
‘Anumaya Kotia ensole vayaahe ‘Kava hiho.’ huno humatesigeya amayateti kavalesaga hulisageka tavisanageno yafatela kaiyamona aye kofa ohugahie huno humaineane.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia kenonaa mage huno hie “Anumaya Koti avopiti kemoa mage humaineane
‘Anumaya Kotikamo tokiya ayevataga ohuo. Afa yafe ‘Tokiya kava huo.’ huka ohuo.’ huno humaineane.” huno hie.
Higeno Satania mukia alu ya alu ya huno ayevataga hugeteana higeno Yisasina ataleno nagoa kanale ayevataga hisia kanalefe agava maine.
Yisasia Alu Aotage Avamumo tokiyaaene Kalili kotega egeno agai avagemoa ani kotega ute ete higeya havimainae.
Mono noyagaamifi huge amavelige higeya mukia veamoya agai agi alisaga humainae.
Yisasia Nasaleti maino ala humainea kumate uno Sapati yupa mukia kanale nehia kava huno mono nopi hai faleno Anumaya Koti ke hapaligahe hetimaine.
Hetimainegeno Anumaya Kotina aune kanoamo Aisaiya kaemalenea autama aliya amigeno vakayeno hapalino autamafiti kea mage huno hamapaimaine.

“Anumayamoa Alu Aotage Avamuamona nagaite hutegeno nagaiene emainegena mukia yamaa omale veamogamina agaia kanale ke hamapaisuafeene kina humainaya veane kalu hematesuafeene amaulaga asu humainaya veane aligali humatesuafeene amakaiami amaugafahe tusia kalagi aiya mai haviya humainaya veane amaugafa aligatisuafeene Anumaya Kotia tokiyaa namiteno hunategena emainoe.
Nagaya menia ma kanafina Anumayamoa tamakaife kalagi ailamatesia kanaa ago efalote humaine huna tamahapaisuafe nagaila hunategena emainoe.” huno hamapaiye.
Huteno avona alino ailileteno kava kanoa amiteno mopale mainegeya mukia mono nopi mainaya veamoya Yisasi aulagafi aulu heya mainae.
Mainageno aepa heno mage huno hie “Menia ma ma kaemalenea kea tamakai tamakesale ago egetama havigeno ago efalote huno tamage hie.” huno hie.
Higeya mukia veamoya “Tamage hane.” huya avayafitima hia ke haviteya muse haya kehe amakesa havi havi huya mage hae “Mamona Yosefe nafanefi?” huya hae.

Hageno Yisasia amakaife mage huno hie “Tamage, tamakaya ma ma haya kea nagaife mage hugahae ‘Tota kanomoga kagaika kaugafa hagoteka ali hilato hugeta agamano. Kapaneamu kumate ‘Naa maa kava hie.’ hageta havimainona yana male kagaika kumate hugeta agamano.’ hutama hugahae.
Tamagelafa huna tamahanepauve nagola Anumaya Koti ke hamanepaiya kanomoa agaia vayaamogami amunopi mainegeya veaamoya ‘Ala kanomo kegi havigetao.’ huya ohugahae.

Nagaya tamage huna tamahanepauve nayona Ilaiyama mainea kanafina tagufa (3) kafugi sikisia (6) ikanagi huno kola oaigeya ani Isaleli kotega mainaya veamoya tusia amakateno kaveamia omalene. Ani kanafina mukia megusa aneyaga Isaleli kotega mainayanagi Anumaya Kotia agaia aune kanomona, Ilaiyana, ani megusa anele hu oatenegi nago Salefati kumate mainea megusa amote hutegeno umaine. Ani kumala Saitoni kotega hane.

Nayona Ilaisama mainea kanafina mukia fugitaya amakemainea veala Isaleli kotega mainayanagi ani veanefitila nagoa veala kanale hu oamatenegi alulega mainea kanoa, Nemanie, Silia mainea kanomona agaiage fugitayama agemainea yana kanale huteneane.” huno hie.
Higeya ani kea haviteya mukia mono nopi mainaya vayamoya tusiya huya ke vaiya hamai vaitenae.
Hamai vaiteteya hetiya Yisasina atafa huya kumapiti avayu huya avaleya ani kumama kimalenaya agoyale haiteya ani agoyafiti aye lakatiya hagayu hutalegahe humainae.
Hayanagi Yisasia mukia veane mainaya amunopiti afaa amataleno ago alu kotega umaine.
Yisasia nagola Kalili hanea kumate Kapaneamu taviteno Sapati yupa Anumaya Koti ke hamapaimaine.
Hamapaigeya agai kemoa tokiya yamaa hanea kanomo ke kana hia yafe tusia amamayo aimainae.
Anile nago kanoa Kefo Avamumoa aguafi mainea kanoa mono nopi maineno “Avovo.” huno alakenake humaine.

Mage huno hie “Avo Yisasiga Nasaleti nafanemoga na ya hulategane? Tagaila tahaeka falilategahe emainano? Nagaya kagaila ago kagemainoe kagaya kanale alu aotage kanoa Anumaya Kotia hugatenea kano mainane.” huno hie.

Higeno Yisasia Kefo Avamufe tokiyaage ke huno mage hie “Ke ohuka afaa maiyo. Mani kanoa ataleka agusafinagatila hatilavio.” huno higeno ani Kefo Avamumoa mukia veane mainaya amunopi ani kanomona mopafi ayelakatino agoya fai neateno agusafitila hatilavino vianagi ani kanomona ali haviya hu oatene.
Hatilavigeya mukia veamoya tusi amamayo aigeya huge havige huya mage hae “Naane ke hie? Tusi tokiyaaleti tokiyaage ke higeya Kefo Avamuyagamoya agai ke hipoya huya hatilavie.” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasima hia kavamo avagemoa mukia ani kumayagalega ute ete higeya mukia veamoya havimainae.

Yisasia hetino mono nona ataleno Saimonina nomaafinaga umainegeno Saimonina aamona itaamo alekanoa tusia amukonako kali alino mainegeya Yisasife “Melika kanale huto.” huya havigageno avate uno ani kaliahe ke amakigeno ani kaliamoa ataleno vigeno aupaa ani alekanomoa hetino kavela amine.

Ani unena yagemoa tavi falegahe higeya mukia ani kumate veamoya vayaamima alu kali alu kali alimainaya veala amavaleya Yisasite ageno mukia nagoke nagokemogamina amaugafale aya maleno kaliamia alino kanale humatene.

Alino kanale humatetegeya nagoa veala amakusafiti Kefo Avamumoya amataleya neuya ala kefiti mage huya hae “Kagaya Anumaya Kotina neamoga mainane.” huya hageno Yisasia ke neamamakigeya agaife Anumaya Kotia “Amaugafa aligatigahie huno hutenea kanoa ma maine.” huya havilinayafe Yisasia “Nagoene osi kea ohiho.” huno hamapaimaine.
Natena tani ko tigeno Yisasia amataleno veane omai kotega umainegeya mukia veamoya agaifena atiyeya ayeya agaite uvayi huya mage huya hae “Tataleka ouka tagaiene maisane.” huya hae.
Hayanagi Yisasia mage huno hamapaiye “Nagaila Anumaya Kotia kava yagaisia kanale kea alu kumate kumate ute ete huna hamapaigahue. Anumaya Kotia ani aliyatefe hunategena emainoe.” huno hie.
Yisasia mukia Yutia kumayagalega ute ete huno mono nopi Anumaya Koti kea hamapaimaine.
Nago yupa Yisasia Kenesaleti tikotumo agegayalega hetimainegeya mukia veamoya Anumaya Koti ke havigahe meligovegave hutenae.
Hutageno Yisasia ageana tole tipi kale ti agegayalega avayu huya maleteya noyame kuyama nehaya vayala ani tipi kalea ataleya kukonago sese humainae.

Sese nehageno Yisasia Saimoni tipi kalefi haisaga humaino maineno mage hie “Saimoniga ti agegaya neataleka osia tipi vuo.” huno hapaiteno ani tipi kalefi haino mopale maineno mukia alitalu humainaya veamogamina kea hamapaiye.
Hamapaiteno Saimonife mage hie “Tipi kalekaa ti amunopi ayetufeka kotumona augelifi kukonagokaa ataleka noyame kuya huo.” huno hie.

Higeno Pitaa Yisasife mage huno hapaiye “Ala kanomogae tagaya kegela noyame kuya huge hugetonana noyamea oalunageno ko timaine. Oalinonagi kagayama hana kemo akave malena kukonagona malegahue.” huno hie.

Ani kukonagona tipi maleana kasagoya noyame hai falegeno kukonagomoa kanaage huno atalaga hisia kava higeya nago tipi kalefi mainaya vaya amakaiene tokaeya aliya nealiya vayafe amayateti avamename huya “Etama taya hiho.” huya hageya emainae. Eteya ani tole lipi kalelatapina noyamea aliya male havatageno kanaage huno hapanesia kava humaine.
Saimoni Pitaa ani yana ageteno Yisasina aiyafi aleya ayemaineno mage hie “Anumayamogae nagaya kefo kava nehua kano mainogi nagaila nataleka vuo.” huno hie.
Saimoniene agaiaene mainaya vayamogamina noyamemoma havateno hiya hia yafena tusia amamayo aimainae.

Saimoniene aliya nealia kanolatana, Sepeti nafanelatane, Yemesiene Yoniene ania huana tusia anamayo aiageno Yisasia Saimonife mage hie “Menia kolia ohuo. Noyame kuyama hana avamete Anumaya Kotia agola maisaya hamaimula amamigahe veane kuya hugane.” huno hie.
Higeya tipi kalea aliya kahaepatega nemaleya mukia yayaga neataleya Yisasina akave umainae.

Nagi nago yupa Yisasia nago ala kumate mainegeno nago fugitayamo augafa alino hayagino atalako humainea kanoa maineno Yisasina ageteno agaitega eno mopafi agoya ayemaineno mage huno havige “Anumayamoga kahaisigekahena nagaila ago alika hilato hunatateasine.” huno humaine.
Higeno Yisasia ayana hayo huno augafale avate hulineno mage huno hie “Nagaya nahaigena kaugafamoa menia kanale hino huna nehue.” huno higeno anile aupaa kalia hano hutene.

Yisasia mage huno hapaiye “Ali hilato hugatoa yafena nago kanoa haopaika mono nopi kava kanomote uka mukia veala kalikaama kanale hugatoa kema havinuyahena mono nopi kava kanomoa kaugafa kamota huno kagetesigeka kaugafama ali hilato hugatoa yafena Mosesema ‘Ma yama Anumaya Kotina amio.’ huno humainea yana Anumaya Kotitega atalo.” huno tokiyaage ke hapaiye.
Hapaiyanagi kalima alino kanale hutea kemoa ute ete higeya kasagoya veamoya haviteya “Agai ke havita kalitia alino kanale hulatesie.” huya emainae.
Emainayanagi Yisasia ani veala neamataleno veane omai kotega umaineno Anumayamotega ke huno havige havige huno maine.

Nagi nago yupa Yisasia humaveli hamaveli nehigeya mukia Falasia vayaene kahegi kemo aepaama havilinaya anagaene Yelusalemutiene mukia Kalili kumayagaletiene Yutia kumayagaletiene eya avate mopale maineya havimainageno kali veane kanale humatesia tokiyaa Anumayamoa amigeno Yisasipi hane.

Anile nagoa vayamoya nago kanomona aiya aya falimainea kanoa hagifanale faeno mainegeya avaleya “Yisasi avate motegahune.” huya hayanagi kasagoya veamoya hiya humainaya yafe kana omalegeya amega nogatofule haiteya hanae yosa alisaga humaleneya ani hagifanale faeno mainea kali kanoa mukia veamogami amunopi atalageno Yisasi avate tavimaine.

Tavigeno Yisasia “Ma vayamoya ago nagaife haviya amakupi maleya amametiti nehae.” agesa haviteno kali kanohe mage huno hie “Nenafuga kahanepauve nagaya ago aigekatena kefo yakaa atale negatoe.” huno hapaiye.

Higeya kahegi kemo havilinaya anagaene Falasia vayaene haviteya amakaiami amakuafiti mage huya hae “Mani kanoa Anumaya Kotife huhaviya hutea kanoa tae? Nagoa vayamoya aigetateya kefo yatia atale otategahayanagi Anumaya Kotia agaiage aigetateno kefo yatia atalelatesia kano maine.” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia amakupi haya kea ago nehavino mage huno hie “Naa higetama mani kea tamaku tamakesafinaga nehae?
Nagayama hutena hisua kea hana kemo kanaage humaine? ‘Aigekatena kefo yakaa atalenegatoe.’ huna hisua kemopi? Kali kanomofe ‘Hetika ka vuo.’ huna hisua kemoe?

Nagayama ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomona ma mopale mainena aigetamatena kefo yatamia atalelamatesua tokiyania hane hutama havisaya yafe nago kava huna tamaveligahue.” huno kalima nealia kanomofe mage huno hie “Hetika hagifanaka nealika nokalega vuo.” huno humaine.
Higeno ani kalima nealia kanomoa aupaa mukia veamogami amaulagafi hetino faeno nemaiya hagifanaa nealino Anumaya Koti agia alisaga hume hume nomaalega umaine.
Na kava higeya mukia alitalu humainaya veamoya ageteya tusi amamayo aigeya Anumaya Koti agia alisaga nehuya mage huya hae “Meni kanalela alua ya neagone.” huya humainae.

Anile neamataleno vilegati nago kanoa agia Livaie musufa huno vaya amaugafaleti takisi mone aliliteno nehia kanoa opisi nomaale mopale mainegeno Yisasia ani kanoa mogeteno mage huno hie “Kagaya nakave eno.” huno hie.
Higeno Livaia hetino mukia yamaa neataleno Yisasina akave umaine.
Livaia nomaafina tusia kave Yisasina kaetegeya mukia musufa huya amaugafaleti takisi mone nealiya vayaene nagoa vayaene ani nopi Yisasiene tokaeya maineya kavela nemainae.

Nemainageya Falasia anagaene kahegi kemo havilinaya anagaene Yisasienema tokaeya nemaiya anagahe kalugalu ke nehatageya mage huya nehae “Naa higetama tamakaya amaugafaleti takisi monema nealiya vayaene kefo yama nehaya vayaenena kavela maitama nenae?” huya hamavigae.
Hageno Yisasia kenonaamia mage huno hamapaiye “Kalima noaliya veanea tota kanomotega ougahagi kali veamoyage tota kanomotega ugahae.
‘Fatago veane mainone.’ huya nehaya veanehena ke hugahe omenogi nagaya kefo yama nehaya veanehe ‘Tamakua aiyahae hiho.’ huna hamapaigahe emainoe.” huno hamapaiye.

Vayamoya mage huya nehae “Yonienema tokaeya nemaiya vayaene Falasia vayaene mukia kanalela kavela mosiya Anumayamotega havige havige huya nemaiyanagi kagaienema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya mukia kaveene tiene nege nege nehae.” huya hae.

Hageno Yisasia mage huno hie “Nago kanoa aama faiya esakenoa avaya hesia imu kisia yupa vayaamoyaene tokaeya mainesigeya ani vayayaga kavela mosisafio? Aao moosigahayanagiya haenagaa alu kana falote hisigenoa kame vayamoya ama alisia kanoa atafa huya amakaipiti avaletalesageya ani kanale mainesaya vayaamoya hamau huteteya mosigahae.” huno humaine.

Yisasia nago avame kea mage huno hamapaimaine “Nago kanomoa haegafa kena alino laga huteno atafa kenalela maleno ohatigahie. Maleno hatisiana haegafa kena laga huno ali haviya hugahie. Haegafa kenamoa atafa kenalela nagoke avamete ohune.
Nago kanomoa haegafa nofi alagamo timaa atafa mememo augafa ti keayopina takino ovaigahie. Takino vaisiana timaamoa kanuka hesigeno ti kena falo huno takilavinageno ti kena ali haviya hugahie.
Naa hugahiafe haegafa nofi alagamo timaa hefino haegafa meme augafamo ti keayopi takino vaimaleno.
Kanuka hemainea nofi alagamo timaa nemainaya veanemoya haegafa nofi alagamo timaahena ohamaigeya mage huya hae ‘Kanuka hemainea nofi alagamo timaahena nelahaiye.’ huya humainae.” huno hie.
Nago Sapati kanale Yisasiene agaiaene tokaeya nemaiya anagaaene nago atili hoya amunopi neuya anagaamoya nago atilia kaleya atafaiya nae.
Nenageya nagoa Falasia vayala anile mainaleti ageteya mage huya hae “Sapati kanama katilemalenaya yana naa higetama ani kavala nehae?” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia mage huno hie “Tamakaya Tevitiene avagi huya umainaya vayaene amakatemainaya yafena hapalitama ohavinafio?

Amakategeno Tevitia Anumaya Koti nopi hai faleno ageana ‘Afa vayamoya onesageya mono nopi kava vayamoya amakaiamige negahae.’ huya katilemalenaya maya Anumaya Koti aulagale malenaya kaihame alino neneno avagi huya emainaya vayala amamine. Tamakaya ani kea hapalitama ohavinafio?” huno hie.
Yisasia mage huno hie “Nagaya ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomona Sapati kana kava yagaimainoe.” huno hie.
Nago Sapati yupa Yisasia mono nopi haino mono ke hamanepaigeno nago kanoa tamaga aya avayu hulavimainea kanoa anile maine.

Mainegeya nagoa kahegi kema havilinaya anagaene Falasia vayaene Yisasia havi kavama hisiafene huya ati neayeya “Yisasia Sapati kanale ani kali kanoa alino kanale hutesifi huotesifi?” huya Yisasina amata huya mainae.
Mainageno Yisasia ani vayamoyama haviya amaku amakesa ago haviteno ayama avayu hulavimainea kanomofe mage huno hapaiye “Hetika vayamogami amunoamifi me hetio.” huno higeno hetino anile me hetimaine.

Me hetimainegeno Yisasia amata huya maiya vayafe mage huno hie “Tamahavinegoe Sapati yupahe mono kemoa naane ke nehie? Sapati yupa veane ali hilato humatesifi alino haviya humategahie ifi Sapati yupa veanea amavaleno avina me mategahafi ifi veala tavata hamaegahie?” huno hamavige.
Hamavigeteno mukia vayamogami amaulagafi ageno ute ete nehuno kali kanomofe mage huno hapaiye “Kayana aipi huo.” higeno aipi hiana ayamoa ago kanale hute.
Hutegeya amata huya maiya vayamoya tusiya huya amaipa kafa heteteya “Yisasina na kava hutesune.” huya humainae.
Nago yupa Yisasia Nefatega nunamu huno havigegahe agoyafi haino ani kegela Anumaya Kotitega ke huno havige havige nehigeno kola ali halemaine.

Kola alino halegeno agaienema tokaeya nemaiya anagaamofe ke higeya ageno ani anagapiti tuelufua (12) anaga hapalimateteno “Nagai kema nehavigena hunelamatoa anagala Aposolo anaga maiho.” huna hapalinelamatoe.

Anima agaiene tokaeya nemaiya anagaamogami amakia Saimonie kanomo agia Yisasia Pitae huno malene. Pitana aganaamoa Etalue, Yemesie Yonie Filipie Patolomayue Matiue, Tomasie, Yemesia Alafiusi nafane Saimonina hamoamoe nago agia Selotie.
Yutasia Yemesi nafane, Yutasi Isakaliotia haenaga ani kanomoa Yisasina agesi huno kame hutesia kanoe.

Yisasia agaienema tokaeya nemaiya anagaaene tavino otufi hetimainegeya nagoa kasagoya agai kema nehaviya veanea Yutiatiene Yelusalemutiene hage limo agegayalega tole kumatalana Taiyaene Saitonitiene kasagoya vea elitalu huya agai kea nehaviya “Kalitia alino kanale hulatesie.” huya emainageno Yisasia Kefo Avamuyaga veamogami amakupiti amanati neataleno alino kanale humatene.
Tokiyaamoa efalote higeno mukia veanea alino kanale humategeya mukia veamoya ageteya augafale avate hugahe hae.
Yisasia agesaga huno agaiene tokaeya nemaiya anagaamogamina neamakeno mage huno hie “Mukia yatamima omalenaya veanemogatama Anumaya Kotia tamakaila kava yagai nelamatea yafe musena hiho.
Tamakaila menia tamakama nelea veamogatama haenagaa nesageno tamamu hisiafe musena hiho. Menia tamakaya avi neataya veanemogatama haenagaa kigi hisayafe musena hiho.

Ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea nafanemonima nakave nemalayafe veanemoya amaipa kafa helamateya ‘Aluale maiho.’ hulamateya kamuge vailamateya ‘Otahaiya kagi hane.’ huya hisagetamahena tamakaya ani kanafina afaa muse hutama maiho.

Aniama hulamatenaya veanemogamina amakinagomoya nayona Anumaya Koti amaune vayamogamina ania huya humatenayane. Aniama hisaya kanafina haenagaa ikapinaga umainetama anonaa kasagoya ya alisayafe tamaipa kanale hutama muse hiho.
Avonio mukia yatamima hanea veanemogatama tamakaya kaye ho. Tamaipa kanale hisia yana hai ali mainae.

Avonio tamakaya menia mukia yama nelamamuma nehaya veamogatama tamakaya kaye ho. Haenagaa tusia lamakategahie. Avonio menia kigima hutama nemaiya veanemogatama kaye ho. Haenagaa tamahau nelagitama avia ategahae.
Avonio veamoya ‘Ala vaya mainae.’ huya tamaki alisaga nehisaya anagala kaye ho. Aniama humainaya veanemogamina amakinagomoya nayona ania huya havigeage amaune vayamogami amaki alisaga humainayane.”
“Nagai kema havisaya veamogatama ‘Kame veanetamimofena tamahau tamayamopafi tamahaino. Amaipa kafama henelamataya veanemogamina kanale kava humateho.’
‘Anumaya Kotia ali haviya hugatesie.’ huya nehaya veamogamife ‘Kanale ya amamio.’ huka Anumayamotega ke huka havigo. Hu haviya hunegatesaya veanemogamifena ‘Amaya huo.’ huka Anumayamotega havigo.
Nago kanomoma kagalamesalema kaikolisigekahena ‘Nago kaiyaga nagalamesaleene naikolio.’ hisanageno kaikolisie. Nago kanomoma ala yasi siotakama musufama alisigekahena nago siotakaa afaa kaufila ohuo.
Nago kanomoma ‘Nago yakahema namio.’ hisigekahena afaa hagayu huka amio. Kagai yama alimainesia kanomofena ‘Eteka namio.’ huka tokiya kea hu oato.
Veaneyagahe ‘Ma kava hulatesae.’ hutama hisaya kavala ani kavakeya alu veanea humateho.

Veamoya hamau amayamopafi tamakaifena nehamainagetamahena tamakaya ania hutama amakaifena tamahaisia yana afa yanagi anonaa oaligahae. Kefo yama nehaya veanemoya ania huya amahau amayamopafima amahaiya veafena nehamaiye.
Kanale kavama hulamataya veanemogamina ania hutama kanale ya humatesayana ani yana afa yanagitama anonaa oaligahae. Kefo yama nehaya veanemoya ania kavala nehae.
‘Eteno namigahie.’ hutama hutetama amisaya veala yoka amisayana afa yanagitama anonaa oaligahae. Kefo yama nehaya veamoya nagoke augafa ya alisayafe kefo yama nehaya veaneamimona yoka neamamiye.

Anumaya Kotia kefo veanemoyaene agaifena musema nohaya veanemogamifeene kayone huneamatea yafe tamakaya ani kava hutama kame veanetamihena tamahau tamayamopafi nelamahaisigetama kanale kavakeya humateho. ‘Anonaa nago yana oaligahune.’ hutama hamaisia yana amamiho. Naama hisayana haenagaa Anumaya Kotia kasagoya anonaa tamamisigetama ala Anumaya Koti kana hutama nafaneyagaa maigahae.
Nelamafama hauma huneamatea kavala ania hutama tamahauna humateho.”

“Nelamafufena ‘Naa maa hana kano mainane.’ hu oateho. Aniama ohisagenoa Anumaya Kotia tamakaifena ‘Havi kava haya veane mainae.’ huno hu otamategahie. Nelamafugamina kaiyekema hu oamatesayana Anumaya Kotia tamakaila kaiyekea hu otamategahie. Haviya hulamatenesia kanomona aigeatetama kefo yamaa ataleteho. Ania hisagenoa Anumaya Kotia kefo yatamia aigetamateno atalelamategahie.

Nelamafugamima amamisaya kavala Anumaya Kotia ania huno lamamigahie. Tamakaila kutamifina aye talako huno havatesia kava huno ku ailamategahie. Ma mopalema nelamafugamima humatesaya kavala Anumaya Kotia tamakaila ani kava hulamategahie.” huno humaine.
Nago avame kea mage huno hie “Nagoma aulaga asu humainesia kanomoa nago aulaga asu humainesia nefaluna avaleno kanale vaiyesaafi? Aao avalenoma vaiyesiana tolemogania komufi asaga hulavigae.
Nago sugulufi mainesia nafanemoa huveli kanoamona oagaseneanagino mukia huvenelia yamaa havilama hulineno huvelimainea kano kana huno maigahie”

Tagaya tagaiti taguafima hanea yana ageteta alu veanehena “Havi veane mainae.” huta hisuna yafe Yisasia mage huno hie “Naa higeka negafu aulagafina osia havi yana hanegeka neagananagi kagaikaa kaulagafina nagola muki yosalapagefa hanegeka ‘Omale.’ huka nehane?

Naa higeka negafufena ‘Kaulagafitila havi yana alitalegahue.’ huka hananagi kagaika kaulagafina nagola muki yosalapagefa hanegeka ‘Omalene.’ huka nehane? Kaguafinaga hanea yana agelama ohuneka kavayaleti havige huka vagala kano maineka kagaikaa kaulagafitila muki yosalapagefa alitaleteka negafu aulagafina kanale neageka osia havi yana alitalegane.” huno hie.
“Kanale yosamoa havi yosalaga noayegi havi yosamoa kanale yosalaga noaye.
Noayegi veamoya yosalaga ageteya kanale yosalaga hanesigeyahena ‘Kanale yosa hane.’ huya hugahae. Avetanafa yosaletila kaimona hataga ohugahae. Avetanafa nofitetila fulutu alaga avayu huya notagiye.

Fatago huya mainaya veamoya kanale amaku amakesa havilineya kanale kavala nehayanagi kefo ya nehaya veamoya havi amaku amakesa havilineya havi kavakeya nehae. Veamoya amaku amakesafinaga havateteno aivalilavimainea kea amavayafiti hu falote nehae.”
“Nagaifena afa kava nehune hutama ‘Anumayatimogae, Anumayatimogae.’ hutama nehayanagi tamahapauva kea ali hipoya nohae.
Nagoa veamoya nagaite neeya nagai ke havige havige huya ali hipoya nehaya veamogamina maa augafa veane mainae huna tamaveligahue.

Nago kanomoa noma kigahena ayaaya komu kafiteno yafana anifinaga maleteno u posia ani komufinaga yafa agotofule maleteno aye talako huno nona kimalegeno timoa tusia li hogino ani note eanagi tokiyaage no kimaleneafe anima hogino ea timoa alino lagape aioatalene.

Ali lagape aioatalenegi nagoa veamoya nagai ke haviteya ali hipoya nohaya veamoya maa veane mainae. Nago kanomoa noma kiana amega komu kafiteno fulu fulu posi ayeno nona kimalenegeno timoa hogino ani note eana aupaa ani nomaa ali lagape aino mopafi atalegeno tusiya huno haviya hulavimaine.”
Yisasia mukia humainea kea veala hamapaigeya havitageno Kapaneamu umaine.
Nago Lomu ati vayate kava humainea kanomoa agaia aliya kanoa tusiya huno nehaiya kanoagino tusia kali alino ago faligahe hie.

Faligahe nehigeno ati vayate kava humainea kanomoa Yisasi avagea haviteno nagoa Yuta vayate ala vayamoya humateno mage humaine “Nagayama hua kea Yisasina havigeho ‘Musekaa nehugi kanale eka aliya kanonia ali kanale huto huno hie.’ hutama havigeho.” huno hie.

Nage higeya neuya Yisasite uvayi huya tutu huya mage hae “Ani kava kanomoa tagaiti Yuta vayamogatife aluya huno nehaigeno mono notia kilatene. Ani yafe kanale kano mainegi afaa hamaisanana katesia kava hugane.” huya hae.

Yisasia amakaiene tokaeno viaamo nomaale uvayi hugahe nehageno Lomu ati vayate kava humainea kanomoa vayaamogamife “Mage hutama hiho.” huno humategeya Yisasite eya mage huya mehae “Mage hie ‘Anumayamoga kasalo kahaesigekahena atalo. Nagaya kanale ohunoa kanomoni noniafi esanana okategahie huna ani yafe kagaitega ounogi afaa menia aliya kanonimona kaliahena kea hutesanageno kanale hutesie huna nehue.

Nagaya kava kano mainoe. Nakaima kava yagainatenea kanoa anale nagaseno maineanagi nagaya ania huna nagoa ati vayatela kava huna mainoe. Nago kanomofe ‘Vuoma.’ hugenoa umaine. ‘Enoma.’ hugenoa emaine. Aliya kanonihe ‘Naa huo.’ hugenoa ania humaine.’ huno hie.” huya hapaimainae.

Hapaigeno Yisasia ani kea haviteno agesagumoa tusiya huteno kasagoya akavema umainaya veamogamifena mage huno hie “Tamahanepauve ma kanomoa tusiya huno nagaifena havino agupi maleno ametiti humaine. Ma kanomoma hia ya huya nagaifema haviya amakupi maleya ametiti humainaya veala mukia Yuta veane mainaya kumatela oagenoe.” huno hie.
Higeya humatenea vayamoya notega eteya uya mogayana ani aliya kanoa ago kanale huno mainegeya mo gemainae.
Yisasia osi kanaa maiteno agaiene tokaeya nemaiya anagaaene mukia veanene Neni kumate umainae.

Ani kumala kegiya humalenaya fiate nevageya nagola falimainea kanoa aliya hevaitegahe emainae. Anima falimainea neyamona itaamoa aiya nagoke nafaneagino itaamoa megusa alagiya ani yafe mukia ani kumate veamoya ani amo akave umainae.
Nevageno Anumayamoa ani amona ageteno tusia hau huteteno mage huno hapaiye “Kagaya kahauma huka avima atana yana hano huka afaa maiyo.” huno hapaiye.
Hapaiteno alilinaya hagifanale motafa hulineno hagifanama aliya aya vayala anile hetimainageno Yisasia mage hie “Ma neyamoga hetio huna nagaya kahanepauve.” huno hie.
Higeno anima falimainea neyamoa hetino kaiyekea aepa henoma nehiana Yisasia avaleno itaamona amine.

Amigeya mukia veanemoya tusia amamayo aiteya Anumaya Koti agia alisaga nehuya mage hae “Anumaya Koti ala aune kanoa tagai amunopina ago emaine. Anumaya Kotia mukia veaa amaugafa aligatigahe emaine.” huya humainae.
Yisasia aniama hia avagemoa mukia Yutia kotegaene alu kotegaene ute ete humaine.
Yoni kema nehaviya vayamoya Yisasi avagea Yonina hapaimainae.

Hapaigeno Yonia agaiene tokaeya nemaiya anagapiti tole kanolafe ke higeana agaite aageno Anumayamotega hunateno “Mage hutana havigeo.” huno hanapaiye “Kagaya egahiema humainaya kano emainapi alu kanohe agava maisune?” hutana havigeo. huno hie.

Higeana ani tole kanolatana Yisasitega eana mage huana hae “Yonia tima fale neamatea kanomo hulaategetaa kagaitega neoe. Mage hutana havigeo huno taahapaiye ‘Kagaya egahie huya humainaya kano mainapi alu kanohe agava maisune.’ huno hie.” huana hae.
Ani kanafina Yisasia mukia alu kali alu kali alimainaya veanene Kefo Avamula amakusafinaga mainea veanene ali hilato humatene. Amaulaga asu humai veanea amaulaga agesaya ya humatene.

Anakaifena kenonaania mage huno hie “Tanakaya utana agaa yaene havia yaene Yonina hapaio. Amaulaga asu humainea veamoya amaulaga neagae. Amaiya haviya humainea veamogami amaiyamoa kanale humate. Fugitaya amakemainea veala kanale humate. Amakesa tilemainea veala eteya nehaviye. Falimainaya veala hetiya mainae. Afenoami omalenea veala Anumaya Kotina kanale kea nehaviye hutana hapaio.
Nagai kehema tole amakesa ohavisaya veamoya kanaleya huya maigahae.” huno humaine.

Yonima hunategeana emainaa kanolatana utaageno Yisasia anile mainaya veamogamina Yonife mage huno hamavige “Tamakaya kame kotega utama na ya agegahe nevae? Nago vemoa hopa kana huno yasimoa ali fagagi mainea kanomona agegahe nevafio?

Ifi na ya agegahe nevae? Kanale kena failinesia kanoa kame kotega agegahe nevafio? Aao kanale kena failinesaya vayala kanale kave nege nege nehaya vayala kame kotega omainagi ala kanomona kanale nomaafi maigahae.
Na ya agegahe nevae? Anumaya Koti aune kano agegahe nevafio? Tamage tamahapauve mukia Anumaya Koti aune vayamogamina amakasemainea kanoa Yoni maine.
Yonife nayona Anumaya Koti autamafina mage huya kaemalenayane
‘Haviho nagaya Anumaya Kotina aliya kanonimona hagotena hutogeno uhagotegateno visana kana valino ali hilato hugategahie.’ huno kaemaleneane.
Tamahapauve Yonia mukia ma mopale atenaya vayamogamina ago amakasemaineanagino nagoa afa veamoya Anumaya Kotife ‘Kava yagailato.’ huya humainaya veala Yonina ago agasemainae.

Kasagoya veala musufaya nehuya vaya amaugafaleti takisi nealiya vayaene Yoni humainea kaiyekea haviteya ‘E, Anumaya Kotia ‘Naa maa huo.’ huno humainea kea fatago ke huno hie.’ hutageno Yonia tina falemateanagi Falasia vayaene kahegi kema havilinaya anagaene ‘Anumaya Kotima ‘Naa maa hiho.’ humainea kehe tagaifena ohune.’ Yonima falematea tina ofalegahune.” huya amakaveno hutenae.
Meni kanafima mainaya veamogatamahena hana augafa veane mainae huna tamahapaisue?

Ma ma hisua augafa nafaneyagamoya mainaya kava hutama mainae. Ani nafaneyagamoya veane alitalu huya mainalega maineya alu nafaneyagahena ke huya mage huya hae ‘Yaveya aikolunana tamakaya amoa noayae. Tagaya tahau hisuna yagame nehunana tamakaya avia noatae.’ huya hae.
Yonia ti fale neamatea kanomoa kaveene haviliene mosino emainegetama tamakaya ‘Satani Avamula aguafina maine.’ hutama nehae.

Hayanagi ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea nafanemona tina kavela nenogetama nagaifena ‘Kaveene tiene neno hano hugeno omai kano maineno musufaya nehaya vayaene amaugafaleti takisi nealiya vayaene kefo yama nehaya vayaene vayaamoya mainae.’ hutama nehae.
Hayanagi Anumaya Kotina kanale agu agesama hanea kavala akavema nevaya veamoya ‘Fatago kava nehie.’ huya nehae.” huno hie.
Nagola Falasia kanoa Saimonie Yisasife “Nagaiene kavela meno.” huno higeno Yisasia kave mo negahe Falasia kanomo nopi haino mopale maine.

Haino mainegeno nagola kumai aala ani kumate nemaiyanagino “Yisasima Falasia kanomo nopiti kave negahe umaine.” huya haya kea haviteno manaage masavena havatemai yafa keayo alilino emaine. Ani keayoma talo hia yafamo agia alapasatae.

Yisasi akavelega aiyafi umaineno Yisasife “Ala kano mainane.” nehuno aiyafi ape huno avi neategeno aunumoa takilavino Yisasi aiyale tavigeno agaia ayolagefaleti aye hamino alisoso hu neateno aiyale atako nehuno manaage masaveteti faletene.

Fale neategeno kema humainea Falasia kanomoa ani amoma hia kavala ageteno agesafinaga mage huno havie “Ma kanomoa Anumaya Koti aune kanoma maineleasina aiyalema alisoso hutea amofena ago havileasine. Ani amoa tusia kefo yamaage nehia a maine.” huno nehavie.
Agesafinaga ani kea nehavigeno Yisasia agaife mage huno hie “Saimonigae nago kea kahapaisue.” huno higeno “Hulavenelina kanomogae nahapaigena havino.” huno hie.

Higeno Yisasia mage huno hie “Nagola monea hanea kanomote tole kanolatamogania uana nagomoa ‘Vani hataleti kina (K100) namigena alino.’ higeno nagomoa teni kina (K10) namigena alino. Alitetaa anonaa haenaga megamiano huana haageno anamigeana aliana umainae.

Uteana haenagaa anonaama amisaa monea kosa ohegeana oamiageno ‘Kanalelagi onamitana ataleo.’ huno humaine. Ani kema humainea yafena ani tole kanolatalapitila hana kanomo monema aminea kanohena tusia musena huno hau ayamopafina haugahie?” huno havige.
Saimonia mage hie “Nagesa havuana ala monema alimainea kanohe atalo hunoma hutea kanomoa tusia muse huno hau ayamopafi haugahie.” huno higeno Yisasia mage huno hie “Tamage hane.” huno humaine.

Ani kea huteno maiyahae huno ani amona agemaineno Saimonina mage huno hapaiye “Kagaya mani amona ago. Nagaya kagai nopi ogeka naiya sese huonatanageno ma amoa agaia aunuleti naiya sese hunateteno agaia ayolagefaleti ali hau hunenate.
Kagai nopi ogeka nagaila naugafalela alisoso hu onatenanagi ma amoa naiyalela eno aluya huno alisoso hunenate.
Kagaya afa masavetetila nanupina fale onatenanagi mani amoa manaage masaveteti naiyalela falenatene.

Ani yafe kahanepauve mani amoa kefo yamaamoa kasago humainegeno Anumaya Kotia ago aigeateno ataletea yafe tusiya huno hau ayamopafi haumaineanagino osi kefo yamaama hanea kanomona Anumaya Kotia ani kefo yamaa aigeateno ataletesiana osia hau ayamopafina haugahie.”
Yisasia mage huno ani afena hie “Nagaya kefo yakaa ago aigekatena atalegatoe.” huno hapaiye.

Agaiaene tokaeya mopale mainaya veamoya sumi sumi kefiti mage huya hae “Mani kanoa hanaa kano maineno ‘Kefo yakaa aigekatena atalegatoe.’ huno nehie.” huya hae. “Nagaifena havika kagupi maleka kametiti hanafe kagu kamena ago aligatigatogi kamena male falu huka vuo.” huno hapaiye.

Yisasia osi kanaa maiteno ala kumayagaleene osi kumayagaleene vaiyatete huno Anumaya Koti kava yagaimatesia kanale mono kea hamapaimaine. Agaia tuelufua (12) anagaaene nagoa aneyagaene Yisasia amakupitima Kefo Avamuma anatitaleno kaliamima alino kanale humatenea aneyagaene agaiaene vaiyatete humainae. Nago amo agia Magatala Maliae. Yisasia hagoteno sevenia (7) Kefo Avamuyaga aguafiti anatitalenea ale.

Nago amo agia Yoanae Heloti nopi kava kanomo alagi. Ani kava kanomo agia Susae. Nago amo agia Susanae nagoa aneyagaene Yisasiene vaiyatete nehuya ani aneyagamoya amakaiami moneamifiti Yisasiene anagaamogamiene amaya humainae.
Mukia alu kumateti kumateti veala Yisasite melitalu hageno Yisasia nago avame kea hamapaimaine.
Mage huno hie “Nago kanomoa avina faigahe alino vie. Avina alino aihelafino nefaigeno nagoa avinamoa kapi tavino hanegeno veamoya ani avinale amaiya ayeya ute ete hageno namayagamoya nageno hano hie.
Nagoa avinamoa yafa mopafi taviteno hageana tina omalea mopafinagino eteno fayoteno asagalimaine.
Nagoa avinayagamoa avetanafa ino hanea amunopi tavino hageteno avetanafa hanea inomoa ayetegeno haviya humaine.

Nagoa avinamoa kanale mopafi tavino hageteno alagaama ayeana nagoke yosalela kasagoya alaga vani hataletia (100) ayeno vasaimai vasaimai humaine.” huno hie. Ani kea huteno ala ke huno mage hie “Mani kea tamakesama hanesigetamahena havilama hutama haviho.” huno hie.
Agaienema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya ani avame kemo aepaahe havigae.

Havigageno Yisasia mage hie “Tamakaya Anumaya Kotia kava yagailamateneafe kemoa falaki mainea kea Anumaya Kotia tamaya higetama ago havilinagi mukia veamoya avame kema hamapaisugeya amakesa havigahagi haviteya havilama huya ohavigahae. Veamoya neagayanagi agelama huya oagegahae.
Mani avame kemona aepaa hu falote huna tamahapaisue. Mani avinamoa Anumaya Koti ke kana humaine.

Katema tavimainea avinamoa maa humaine nagoa veamoya Anumaya Koti kea havitageno Satania mage hie ‘Amakupi aliya omalesageno Anumaya Kotia amaku amamena ali okatisie.’ huno amakupitila ani kea alitalene.

Yafa mopafima tavimainea avinamoa maa humaine nagoa veamoya Anumaya Koti kea haviya muse huya atafa hayanagi hafuya mopafi otavia yamoa alige atalege veane maineya osi kanaa osia haviya amakupi maletageno havi kanama amakaitema falote nehiana aupaa Anumaya Koti kea neatalae.

Avetanafa ino hanea amunopi tavimainea avinamoa maa humaine nagoa veamoya Anumaya Koti kea haviteya ma mopafi mukia yayagaamihe amakesa haviya moneamiene yokaloamienefe kalagi aiteya ani yayagaamimo Anumaya Koti kea alino aiso humalegeya atalageno alagaamoa aye helafino lama nohie.

Kanale mopafima tavimainea avinamoa maa humaine nagoa veamoya tokiyaage amaku amakesa hanegeya Anumaya Koti kea haviteya aliya amakupi maleya atafa hu talako huya mainaya veamoya ani alagaa mukia aye henelafie.”

Anumaya Koti ke nehaviyafe Yisasia mage huno hamapaiye “Nagoa veamoya lamua hanagaliya susufaneleti aiso hu nemalafi ifi sipa kapinaga hanagaliya aiso hu nemalae? Aao lamua hanagaliteya esaya veamoya ani lamule agesayafe sipale nemalae.
Ani yafe haenagaa mukia falakimainesia yamoa efalote hugahie. Mukia kesi kava nehaya yamoa efalote hinageya veamoya agegahae.

Ani yafe Anumaya Koti ke havisaya yafena tamakesa havitama havilama hutama haviho. Havilama huno havilinesia kanomona Anumaya Kotia nagoene havilisia yana amigahianagi nagoamoya ‘Ago havilinoe.’ huno hisia kanomona havilinesiamaa hanafaletalegahie.” huno humaine.
Yisasina itaamoene aganaamoyaene agegahe ayanagi kasagoya veamoya hiya huya maigeno Yisasima mainea avatela omenae.
Omenagi nago kanomoa Yisasife mage hie “Itakamoene kaganakamoyaene kagai kagegahe emaineya kumatega hetiya mainae.” huno hie.
Higeno kenonaa mage huno hie “Mukiama Anumaya Koti kema haviya akave nemalaya veala itanimoya nagananimoya mainae.” huno hapaiye.
Nago yupa Yisasienema tokaeya nemaiya anagaene tipi kalefi haisaga humaiya neuya Yisasia mage huno hamapaiye “Tikotumona atu faliga vigetao.” huno higeya umainae.
Yaufa nevageno Yisasia aukalokalo higeno faemainegeno tusia yasimoa tina mevaleno tipi kalefi atalegeno ani lipi kalefina havatesia kava higeya mukiamoya haviya hisaya kava humainae.

Huteya Yisasia faemainegeya mogafa huya mage hae “Kava kanomogae, kava kanomogae tagaya ti nakaita falisuna kava nehunageka notagane.” huya hageno hetino ani limofeene yasimofeene tokiyaage ke huno “Taga huo.” huno higeno yasimoene timoene taga huana alava humainae.

Alava hutegeno Yisasia agaiaene tokaeya nemaiya anagafe mage huno hamavige “Nagaifena havitama tamakupi maletama tamametitima haya yana hanate atalae?” huno higeya koli huya tusia amamayo neaiya huge havige huya mage hae “Mani kanoa tae? Timoene yasimoene kea haviteya akave malae.” huya hae.
Kaliliti ala tikotuna takaeya ame kaiyaga agegayamona Kelasasa veane mainalega uvayi hae.

Yisasia tipi kalea ataleno ti agegayalega neuno ageana nagola ala kumate kanoa Kefo Avamuyagamoya aguafi mainaya kanoa Yisasite emaine. Ani kanoa ayaaya kanafi kenaa fai oalino nopina nomaiyane. Matimatipikeya nemaiya kanoe.

Ani kanomoa Yisasina ageteno mopafi agoya ayemaineno ala kefiti mage hie “Yisasiga tagasenoma anale mainea Anumaya Kotina nafaneamoga naa hunategahe neane? Musekaa nehugi nagata aisia kavala hu onato.” huno nehie.

Higeno Yisasia Kefo Avamufe mage huno hie “Agusafitila hatilavio.” huno higeno Kefo Avamumoya mukia kanafina ani kanomona atafa nehigeya kava neyagaiya vayamoya aiya ayapi seni nofiteti kisalu kitayanagi ani nofila aikanokanu huneataleana Kefo Avamumoya afai kotega anatigeno faleno neviane.

Yisasia ani kanohe mage hie “Kagai kagia tagae?” huno higeno mage hie “Nagai nagia kasagoyamonae.” huno hie. Naafene kasagoya Kefo Avamumoya aguafima hai falemainayafe “Nagia kasagoyamonae.” huno hie.
Ani Kefo Avamumoya Yisasifena mage hae “Hanikimainea kumapina tagaila hulategeta ovamano.” huya hae.
Nehageya kasagoya afuyagamoya agoyafi maineya kave nenageno ani Kefo Avamumoya Yisasifena mage huya hae “Amuga afuyagamo amakuafina hulategeta vamano.” huya havigageno Yisasia “Ania hiho.” huno hie.

Higeya ani Kefo Avamumoya ani kanomo aguafitila hatilaviya afuyagamogami amakupi hai nefalayana ani afuyagamoya amaiyayeya nagola aulufi kapi taviteya tipi asaga hulaviya ti nakaiya fali hano humainae.

Fali hano hageya ani afuyagale kava vayamoya ani afuyaga tima nakaiya fali hanoma haya yana ageteya faleya ala kumate mainaya veamogamifeene hoyafinaga mainaya veamogamifeene “Naa maa higeta neone.” huya hamapaimainae.
Hageya ani veamoya humainea yama agegahe Yisasite eya Kefo Avamumoma agusafiti ataleno umainea kanomona agesa akalo higeno kenaa failino Yisasi aiyafi mopale mainegeya megeteya koli humainae.
Yisasima humainea yama agemainaya veamoya “Naa maa huno Kefo Avamumogamina agusafi mainea kanomona alino kanale hutene.” huya hamapaiye.
Hamapaigeya mukia Katalaga kumate veamoya Yisasifena tusia koli huteya “Tagaila tataleka vuo.” huya hageno Yisasia amataleno emainelega ugahe tipi kalefi haisaga humaine.

Haisaga hunemaigeno Kefo Avamumoma agusafiti hatilavino umainea kanomoa Yisasifena “Kagaiene ugahe nehue.” huno higeno Yisasia “Aao kagaya eteka nokalega uka mukia Anumaya Kotima hugatenea yafena veaneyaga mo hamapaiyo.” huno higeno ani kanomoa viayamo mukia ala kumaale veamogamina Yisasima hutea yafena hamapaimaine.
Yisasia eteno egeya mukia veamoya agava maineya tusia muse huya falu fala hutenae.
Falu fala huneatageno nago kanoa Yailasie nehaya kanoa emaine. Ani kanoa soka kano maineanagino Yisasi aiyafi mepe humaineno tutu nehuno Yisasina mage huno havige “Nonialega egetaa vaano.” huno hie.

Ani kanomoa aiya nagoke munaa maine. Ani munala kafua tuelufua (12) kafua hanea munala faligahe ayaya neaigeno “Nonialega eno.” huno tutu higeno Yisasia anilega vigeya veamoya yageyage huya aulega akavelega huya akave umainae.
Vageno ani veanefiti nago amoa tuelufua (12) kafu aigu nopinaga mukia kanale nemaiya aala nagoa vayamoya aliya kanale hu oataleasine.
Ani amoa Yisasina akavelagati eno kenaamo atupale avate aligeno aupaa kolamaamoa tanemaine.

Tanegeno Yisasia mage huno humaine “Ta kenanilela mevate humaine?” huno higeya mukiamoya “Tagaya naa ohunone.” huya hageno Pitaa mage hie “Kava kanomoga mukia veamoya yageyage huya kaulegati kakavelagati nehagi naa higeka mani kea hamavinegane?” huno hie.
Yisasia mage huno hie “Tamage huna nehue nago kanomoa kenanile avate higena nagaya nagesa nehavugeno navate aligeno nagoa tokiyanimoa ago nataleno umaine.” huno hapaiye.

Hapaigeno ani amoa “Falakigahe huanagi ago nagane.” huno atili huteno Yisasi aiyafi mepe humaineno mukia veamogami amaulagafi “Naa maa huna kali alimainoafe avate alugeno kalinia aupaa kanale hunate.” huno hapaimaine.
Hapaigeno Yisasia mage huno hapaiye “Ma amoga nagaife kagupi maleka kametiti hanafe kanale negahaiye kagaya kaipamoa yasi nehinageka vuo.” huno hapaiye.
Ani kea nehigeno nago kanomoa soka kanomo notegati anile evayi huno Yailasife mage huno hie “Munakamoa ago falimainegi ataleka kava kanomona kasalo haegi nagoene havioko.” huno hie.
Yisasia ani kea haviteno Yailasife mage huno hie “Kolia ohuka afaa nagaife kagupi maleka kametiti hisanageno munakaa falimainefitila hetigahie.” huno hie.
Soka kanomo note uvayi huno Yisasia mukia veanehe “Omeho.” huno Pitaene Yoniene Yemesiene ani munamo itaafoamoene amavaleno ani nopi haimainae.
Mukia veamoya ani munama falimainea yafena tusia avi neatageno Yisasia mage huno hie “Avia oateho mani munala falilavata ohunegi afaa faeno maine.” huno hamapaimaine.
Ani munala faligeyama agemainaya yafena ani veamoya Yisasina kigia hutenae.
Kigi hutayanagi Yisasia ani munamo ayate atafa nehuno mage hie “Ma munamoga hetio.” huno hie.
Nehigeno agu nafanea eteno egeno aupaa hetie. Hetigeno Yisasia mage hie “Nagoa nesia kavela amiho.” huno hamapaimaine.
Itaafoamogania ani yana ageteana tusia anamayo aimaianagi Yisasia mage hie “Nago kanomona ma ma hua yafena hamaopaio.” huno kaheginatene.
Yisasia tuelufua (12) anagaamofe ke higeya ageno mukia Kefo Avamuyagama veamogami amakusafiti amanatitalesaya tokiyaene kalima aliya kanale humatesaya tokiyaene amamine.
Amamiteno Anumaya Kotima kava yagaisia yafe hamapaigahe kalima hamaemainea yana aliya kanale humatesayafe humatene.
Huneamateno mage huno hamapaiye “Kama visayafena ayopatamiene kutamiene mayatamiene monetamiene alitama oviho. Tole kena oaliho. Alu nopi alu nopi faelitetama ohiho.
Nago nopima hai falenutamahena ani nopi faetama maitama amataletama alu kumatela viho. Faelitetama ohiho.
Nagoa kumate veamoya falu falama huotamatesagetamahena ani kumala neataletama ‘Havi kava hae.’ hutama tamaiyafima hanesia kugukege yana aifopo huneataletama viho.” huno hamapaimaine.
Hamapaitegeya alu kumate kumate neuya mukia kumatela Anumaya Kotina kanale kea hamanepaiya kaliamia aliya kanale huneamateya humainae.

Ani kanafina Helotia sauve kanogino Yisasia mukiama humainea kavamo avagema haviana nagoa veamoya ani yana ageteya “Yonia falimainefiti ago hetimaine.” huya hageya nagoa veamoya “Ilaiyaa eteno falote humaine.” huya hageya nagoa veamoya “Nayoma Anumaya Kotina aune kanoa falimainefiti hetimaine.” huya haya yafe Helotia ani kea haviteno agu agesamoa anilega vigeno “Hana veamogami kemo tamagea nehafi?” huno humaine.

Huteno Helotia mage hie “Nagaya aliya vayania humatogeya Yonina ageya ago fakalitalageno falimaine. Naa maa kava nehie huya avagema humainaya kanoa tae?” huno nehuno Yisasima agesia kafena ati ayemaine.
Aposolo anagala eteya “Naa maa kava huteta neone.” huya Yisasina me hapaigeno Yisasia haviteno ani anagaa amavaleno Petesaita kumatega ugahe katega umainae.
Nevageya mukia veamoya haviteya akave agaitega ageno Yisasia falu fala humateteno Anumaya Kotima kava yagaisia yafe hamapaiteno kalima nealiya veala alino kanale humatene.

Une kigeya tuelufua (12) anagaamoya Yisasite mage me hae “Tagaya vaya omai kaiyaga mainonafe mukia veamogamina humatesanageya hanesia kumateene noma hanesilegaene ute ete huya faesaya nofeene nesaya yafeene atiyesae.” huya humainae.

Hageno Yisasia mage huno hamapaiye “Tamakaitami kavela amamiho.” huno hamapaigeya mage hae “Utama mukia mainaya veamogami kavela miya hiho huka nehano? Tagaipina osi kave kanoa hane faefua (5) mayaene tole noyame kanoagi huno hane.” huya hae.

Anifima mainaya vayala faefu tausenia (5,000) vayayaga mainayanagi Yisasia agaienema tokaeya nemaiya anagaamogamife mage huno hamapaiye “Hamapaigeya fifitia (50) veane ‘Alitalu hutama maite maite hutama mopale maiho.’ hutama hamapaiho.” huno humaine.
Hamapaigeya ania hute hute huya mopale mainae.

Yisasia faefua (5) maya nealino tole noyamene nealino huteno ikapinaga agesaga huno Anumaya Kotitega huno muse huteno ani mayaene noyamene koliteno agaienema tokaeya nemaiya anagaa amamigeya mukia veala amamite amamite humainae.
Amamite amamite hageya mukia nageno amamu higeya atalaya atupatapaa aliya tuelufua (12) kula aihavatemainae.
Nago yupa Yisasia agaiage Anumaya Kotitega havinegegeya agaienema tokaeya nemaiya anagaamoya avate mainageno mage huno hamavige “Veamoya nagaifena tae huya nehae?” huno hamavige.

Hamavigegeya kenonaa mage huya hae “Nagoa veamoya kagaifena ‘Ti faleneamatea Yoni maine.’ huya hageya nagoa veamoya kagaifena ‘Ilaiya maine.’ huya hageya nagoa veamoya ‘Anumaya Koti aune kanoa nayo ago falimainea kano falimainefiti eteno hetimaine.’ huya nehae.” huya hapaimainae.

Hapaigeno Yisasia amakaifena mage huno hamavige “Tamakaya nagaifena tae hutama nehae?” huno hamavigegeno Pitaa mage huno hie “Kagaya Kalaisigae Anumaya Kotia taugafa aligatigahe hugatenea kano mainane.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia tokiyaage ke huno “Mani kea nagoa veala hamaopaiho.” huno humaine.

Yisasia mage huno hamapaiye “Soka vayaene mono note kava vayaene kahegi kema havilinaya anagaene nagaila ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomonihena ‘Kahaoteyakae.’ huya hunatesageno tusia nagata aisigeya nahaesagena faligahue. Falisugeya komufi hevainatesagena tole yupa maina tagufa kanale falimainesufiti hetigahue.” huno humaine.

Alitalu humaiya veanene agaiaene tokaeya nemaiya anagaenefe mage huno hie “Nagoa veamoya nagai nakavema visaya amakesa havinuyahena amaugafama aliya hai yana amakaveno huteteya nakaima nagata aisigena falisua kava hisaya amakesa haviteya yafaga yosa kanaaene kanaaene kofiya nakave aliya visae.

Nagola veamoya maiyaamima atafa huya ali talakoma hulisayana maiyaamimoa falino afaya hapaegahigi nagoa veamoyama nagaifema hamainageya maiyaamima atalesaya veamoya maiyaamia aligatisugeya agola aliya maigahie.
Nagola veamoya mukia ma mopale mone fenoyaga aliteya maineya falisagenoa agola maige maige hisaya haimula ago atalenayanagiya alimainaya mone fenoamimoa hanaa huno amaya hugahie? Aao amaya ohugahie.

Nagoa veamoya keniaene nagaienefema amakaye huya ‘Aoteyamaae.’ huya hunatesayana nagaya ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomona esua kanafina tokiya hale yaniaene Nenafana tokiya hale yamaaene alu aotage ensole anagaamoyaenema etena esuana ania huna ani veanehena nagaye huna ‘Tamahaoteyatamie.’ humategahue.
Tamagelafa huna tamahanepauve nagoa veala malema hetimainaya veamoya aupaa ofaligahayanagiya hagoteya Anumaya Kotima kava yagaisia kanaamoma efalote hisia yana agegahae.” huno humaine.
Yisasia mani kea huteno sevenia (7) kana maiteno Pitana Yonina Yemesigamina amavaleno Anumayamotega ke huno havigegahe agoyafi haimainae.
Haimainageno Yisasia Anumayamotega ke huno havinegegeno augosamoa alino alu augosa kaligeno kenaamoa efeage huno alave alave humaine.
Tole kanolatana nayo falimainaa kanolatana Moseseene Ilaiyaene tokiya hale yaene maineana Anumaya Kotia Yisasifema “Naa maa huka Yelusalemu faligane.” huno hutenea kehe Yisasiene kea kea humainae.
Ani kaiyekea nehageya Pitaene anagaamoyaene amaukalokalo higeya faemainafiti aupaa hetiya agayana Yisasia tokiya hale yamaaene avate tokaeana hetimaia kanolataene amakemainae.

Neamakageana ani lole kanolatana Yisasina ataleana ugahe nehaageno Pitaa Yisasife mage hie “Anumayamoga tagaya male maunana kanale ya hie. Katega nona talia (3) kilamatesune. Kagaila nagolagi Mosesena nagolagi Ilaiyana nagolagi huno hanesie.” huno hianagi agesa havilama ohuno ani kea hapaiye.
Hanepaigeno nago siamoa evayi huno alino aiso humategeana Mosesegani Ilaiyagania ani siapi falaageya Pitaene anagaamoyaene tusia koli humainae.
Koli nehageno siapinagati ala kefiti age aino mage huno hie “Mani kanoa nagaini nafane ago hapalina hutenoa nafanegi agai kea haviho.” huno hamapaimaine.
Hamapaigeya ani kea haviteya agayana Yisasia agaiage mainegeya ageteya ke ohuya mainayanagiya ani kanafina nagoa veala hamaopainae.
Faeteya kotigeya Yisasiene Pitaene Yoniene Yemesiene ani agoya neataleya elavigeya kasagoya veamoya Yisasi agegahe emainae.
Aya veanefiti nago kanomoa hetino ala kefiti mage huno hie “Humavenelina kanomoga tusiya huna kahavinegoe. Aiya nagoke ne nafaneniagi mego.

Kanaaene kanaaene Kefo Avamumoa agusafinaga haimainegeno nafanenimoa ala kegefafiti ke nehigeno Kefo Avamumoa aige hafalege huneategeno avayafitila efeage agalemoa selu selu nehigeno augafa alino haviya nehuno aupaa ataleno ovisia kava nehie.
Naa higena kagaiene tokaeya nemaiya anagakamogamife ani Kefo Avamula nafanenimo agusafinagati anatitalesae huna hamavige hamavige hugetoana amuha ohunaya yafe anati oatalenae.” huno hie.

Higeno Yisasia mage huno hamapaiye “Vae tamakaya meni kanafima mainaya veamogatama nagaife havitama tamakupi maletama tametiti ohutama fatago hutama nomaiye. Ania haya yafe kasalo nenahaegi namagi yupa tamakaienena mainesugetama nagaife tamakupi malegahae?” nehuno ani nafanemo nefafe “Nafanekaa avaleka eno.” huno hie.

Higeno ani nafanea yaufa avaleno neegeno Kefo Avamumoa alino mopafi ailakatitalegeno faemaineno kasegase nehigeno Yisasia ageteno Kefo Avamumofe kemakino “Ataleka hatilavio.” huno hutegeno hatilavigeno ani nafanea alino kanale huteteno nefana amine.

Amigeya mukia anile mainaya veamoya ageteya Anumaya Kotina tokiya yamaahe tusia atalitalu huya amamayo aiyanagi Yisasia agaienema tokaeya nemaiya anagaamogamife mage huno hie “Menima hisua kea tamakesa havilama hutama haviho. Osi kanaa maitesugeno nago kanomoa nagesi hinageya ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomonia kame vayamogami amayapi navaleya nategahae.” huno hie.
Higeya ani kemona aepaamoa ago falakimaineafe havilama ohunagi koli huya ani kemo aepaahena haviokenae.
Yisasiene tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya “Tagaipima uhakotemainea kanotia ta maine?” huya huteya ani yateti ke vaimainae.
Yisasia amakaipima hanea amaku amakesa ago haviteno nagola osi nafanea avaleno avate hetitene.

Ateteno mage huno hamapaiye “Nagoa veamoya nagaifema huya ma osi nafane avaleya falu fala hutesayana nagaiene navaleya falu fala hunatae. Nagaima navaleya falu fala hunatesayana hunatenea kanoene avalemainae. Tamakaipina ‘Osia afa kano kana huna mainoe.’ huno hisia kanomoa tamakaila tamakaseno kava kano maine.” huno hamapaiye

Yonia mage huno hie “Kava kanomoga tagaya agonana nago kanomoa kagai kagi neayeno Kefo Avamula veamogami amakusafinagati amanatigeta ageteta kagaienema kakave nohia yafe ‘Ania ohuo.’ huta nagalu huneatone.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia agaife mage huno hie “Ani kanoa alitama nagalu hu oateho. Vaya nagomo kamema hu otamatesiana nelamafuya mainae.” huno hapaiye.
Yisasia ikapinaga haisia kanamoa aupa higeno Yelusalemu visia agesa havino tokiya vaiteno katega umaine.
Nagoa anagaa talo tala hisaya yafe hagoteno humategeya nago Samelia kumate uya vayafe mage huya hae “Yisasia egahigi mukia yana talo tala hiho.” huya mo hamapaimainae.
Samelia kumate veamoya Yisasia Yelusalemu ugahe hia yafe amakesa haviteya mage huya hae “Tagaya avaleta ali falu fala hu oategahune.” huya hae.

Agaienema tokaeana nemaia kanolatana Yemesigani Yonigani ani kavama haya kavala ageteana mage hae “Vae Anumayamoga kahaisiana taagaya ikapinagati atahe ke hisuageno ata maleno ani veala asagalisie?” huana hae.
Haageno Yisasia maiyahae huno keanamakiteno “Aao ania ohio.” huno humaine.
Huteno anileti neataleya alu kumatega umainae.
Katega neuya nago kanomoa Yisasifena mage huno humaine “Mukia kumate visanana nagaya kakave ugahue.” huno hie.

Higeno Yisasia kenonaa mage huno hapaiye “Kepu yagamoya faesaya komuamia mopafinaga hanegi namamogamina noamia haneanagi ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomona faesua nonia omale.” huno hie.
Nago kanohe mage huno hapaiye “Nakave eno.” huno higeno mage huno humaine “Alanimogae nenafana falisigena alina hevaitetena kakavela ugahue.” huno hie.

Higeno Yisasia mage huno kenonaa hapaiye “Atalo nagai kea ohavinesaya veala amaku amamemaamo falimainaya veamoya falia kanomona aliya hevaitegahae amakaiami yanagi kagaya neataleka veamogamite Anumaya Koti kava yagaimatesia kaiyekea mukia veamogamina hamapaiyo.” huno hie.
Nago kanomoa hetino mage huno hapaiye “Alanimogae kagai kakave malegahe huanagi natalegena nenafa nopi mainaya veala nayana amamite amamite hutena kakavela vano.” huno hie.

Higeno Yisasia kenonaa mage huno hapaiye “Nagoa veamoya avina yama kaligahena amakavelega maiyahae huya moge mege hinuyahena Anumaya Kotia ania hisaya veafena ‘Nagai aliya alitama veamogamite kava yakaisua kea hamapaiho.’ huno ohugahie.”

Anile Anumayamoa sevetitua (72) vaya hapaliteno “Nagainima visua kumate ali lokaete lokaete hutama uhagotetama neviho.” huno humategahe amakaife mage huno hamapaiye “Nagai kema havisaya veala kasagoya kavema hoyafi afulemailemai hia kava humainegi hoyafima aliya alisaya veala osia veane kanoa mainayafe ani hoyamona nefafe havigegeno nagoa aliya vayala kavema alisayafe humatesie.
Tamakaya neutama haviho tamakaya sipi sipi nafane kana hutama mainagi nagaila ago amakaveno hunenataya veala afai kala kana kaveage veane mainaya amunopi hulamatesugetama ugahae.
Ugahagi monetamiene kutamiene tamaiya noene alitama oviho. Katega nevisaya veanenena ayaayate maitama kaiyekea ohiho.
Nago nopima hai falenutama hagotetama mage hutama hiho ma nopima mainaya veamogatamina ‘Anumaya Kotia tamaipa falu hisaya tamaku tamakesa tamamisie.’ hutama hiho.
Aipa falu hisia agesaene kano ani nopima mainesiana Anumaya Kotia aipa falu hisia agesa amigahigi ania kana kanoma omainesiana aipa falu hisia yana oaligahie.
Ani nopi mainetama nesaya yama tamamisagetama afaa neho. Nagai aliya alisaya anonaa nesaya yana afaa alisayana kanale hugahie. Alu nopi alu nopi faelitetama ohiho.
Nago kumatema visageno falu fala hulamateteya tamamisaya kavela afaa neho.
Ani kumatema mainesaya kali veala ali kanale humatetama mukia veafe mage hutama hamapaiho ‘Anumaya Kotia kava yagailamatesia kana ago efalote huno aupa humaine.’ hutama hamapaiho.

Nago kumatema visageya falu fala hu otamatesagetama ani kumala ataletama veamoyama mainesaya katega utama mage hiho ‘Havi kava hae. Tamakai kumapiti kugukege yana taiyalegati aifopo hutalegahunagi tamakaya havilama hutama haviho Anumaya Kotia kava yagaisia kanamoa ago efalote huno aupa humaine.’ hutama hamapaiho.

Nagaya tamahanepauve Anumaya Kotia kaiyekema hulamatesia kanafina Sotomu mainaya veamogami amaugafa amagata aigahigi tamakaima falu fala hu otamatesaya kumate veamoya tusiya huno amakaseno amaugafa amagata aigahie.”

“Avonio Kolasini mainaya veamogatamaene Petesaita mainaya veamogatamaene tusiya huna tamakaifena nahau nehue. Tamakai kumapi nagaya tokiya avameyana ago huanagi tamaipa aiyahae ohageno ani tokiya avameyana Taiyaene Saitoniene huleasine ani kumate veamoya kefo yaamihena ago amaipa aiyahae huya kefo yama humainaya yafena kayavo kena failiya tanefafi mopale maileasine.
Anumaya Kotia kaiyekema humatesia kanafina Taiya mainaya veanene Saitoni mainaya veanene amaugafa amagata yana aligahayanagi tamakaya tusiya hutama nagoene tamaugafa tamagata yana aligahae.
Tamakaya Kapaneamu mainaya veamogatama ‘Taugafa alita anale haigahune.’ hutama nehao? Aao afete tavitama tamakaye nehinagetama maigahae.” huno hie.

Nagoene humatenea vayamogamife mage huno hamapaiye “Tamakai kema havisaya veamoya ania huya nagai kea havigahae. Tamakaifema ‘Tamahaoteyatamie.’ hisaya veamoya ania huya nagaifena ‘Kahaoteyakae.’ huya hunategahae. Nagaife ‘Kahaoteyakae.’ hisaya veamoya ania huya hunatenea kanomofena ‘Kahaoteyakae.’ huya hutegahae huno hamapaigeya umainae.”
Uteyama ayana ani sevetitua (72) vayala muse huya eya mage hae “Anumayamoga tagaya kagai kagileti Kefo Avamua humatonageya tagai ke akave malae.” huya me hae.
Hageno Yisasia amakaifena mage huno hie “Nagaya agoana Satania ikateti aulumaya alia kava huno aupaa asaga hunelavigena agoe.

Haviho nagaya tokiya ago tamaminoe. Nagoa yamoa tamakaila alino haviya otamahaugahie. Satani tokiyamona agasesaya tokiya ago tamaminoe. Vaya anigeno nefalia osifavene yapaveene tamaiyaleti ayelatapesayana nagaini tokiya ago tamaminoafe otamahaegahie. Nagoa yamoa tamakaila ali haviya otamahaugahie.
Tokiyania ago tamaminogi Kefo Avamula amakasesaya tokiya tamaminoa yafena musena ohutama Anumaya Kotia tamakima ikapinaga kaemalenea yafena tusia muse hiho.” huno hamapaiye.

Ani kanafina Alu Aotage Avamumoa tusiya huno muse hisia agu agesa amigeno Yisasia muse nehuno mage huno hie “Nenafagae mukia ma mopafi yaene ikapinaga yaene kava yagaimainana Anumayamoga kanale kava nehane. Ma ma hamapauva kea nagoa ‘Mukia yafena havilinoa kano mainoe.’ huya haya veamogamifena ohavisae huka falakimalenane. ‘Ala avo nopi umainona vea mainone.’ huya hisaya veamogamifena ohavisae huka falakimalenanagi ‘Inamu nafane kana huta mainone.’ huya humainaya veala ago huhaleka amavelimainanafe aluya huna musekaa nehue. E, Nenafagae kagai kagu kagesamoa ania humainegeka ani kavala humainane.” huno hie.

Veamogamifena mage huno humaine “Nenafaa mukia lokiya ago namine. Mukia veamoya nagaila neamonina aepania ohavinagi Nenafaa agaiage nagai aepaa haviline. Havilinegi mukia veamoya Nenafa aepaa ohavinae. Nagainige neamona havilinena nahaisia veamogamina humavelisugeya Nenafa aepaa havigahae.” huno hie.
Yisasiene tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya amahaote mainageno Yisasia mage huno hamapaiye “Anumaya Kotia tamaulagama neagaya yana ago tusia kanale ya ago tamamia yafena tusia muse hutama maiho.
Tamahapauve nayona mukia mainaya amaune vayaene sauve vayayagaene tamakayama neagaya yana ‘Agesune.’ huya hayanagi oagenae. Havilinaya kea ‘Havisune.’ huya hayanagi ohavinae.” huno hamapaimaine.
Nagoa kahegi kema havilinea kanomoa hetino Yisasina ayevataga huno mage huno havige “Humavenelina kanomogae nagaya hanaa hutena agola maige maige hisua nahaimula alisue?” huno havige.
Havigegeno Yisasia mage hie “Anumaya Koti autamafina naane huya kaemalenae? Kagaya hapaliteka ani kemo aepaa naane huka nehavine?” huno havige.

Havigegeno mage hie “Ani kemoa mage humaine ‘Ala Anumaya Kotikamofena tusiya huno kahaino. Kaguafinagatiene kahaino. Kagu kameene amio. Aliya nealina himamukaene amio. Kagesama nehavina yana amio. Kagaika kaugafahema kahaisia avamete mukia veamogami amaugafahena kahaino.’ huno humaineane.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia mage hie “Kagai kemoa tamage huka nehane mukia kanafina ani kava huge huge hisanana maige maige hisana kahaimula aligane.” huno hapaiye.
Higeno ani kanomoa agesafinaga mage huno havie “Yisasia nagaife kanale kagesa hanea kano mainane.” huno hisiafene huno havige “Mukia veala tagamife nehane?” huno havige.

Havigegeno Yisasia mage hie “Nago Yuta kanoa Yelusalemu kumala ataleno Yeliko kumatega ugahe katega nevigeya nagoa musufa vayamoya katega ageteya atafa huya mukia afenomaa hanafaleteya aikolimainae. Aikoliteya ataleya vageno falisia kava huno maine.
Mainegeno ani yupa mono note kava kanoa ani kate taviana ani kanoa mo neageno agaseno ka agegayalega umaine.
Umainegeno nago Yuta kanoa Livai nofi kanoa ania huno mo neageno agaseno nago kaiyaga ka agegayalega umaine.
Naa haageno nagola Samelia kanoa kame kanoamoa anile neeleti megeteno tusia hau hutene.

Hau huteteno avate umaineno masave tiene nofi alagamo tiene haemalaya amupina takino haya kiteteno avaleno agaia toki afumo agupifi ateteno avaleno viayamo natu vaya nefayaya nopi moteneno kanale huno kava hutene.

Kava huteno mainegeno ko tigeno ani nomona nefana tole kina neamino mage huno hapaiye ‘Kagaya kanaleya huka mani kanoa kava huto. Nagoa monekamoma ani kanolema hano hisigena nagaya etena anonakaa kamigahue.’ huno hapaiye.”

Yisasia anima hia kea hu hano hugahe mage hie “Naa humainagi na kagesa nehavine? Talia (3) vayala agaseya vageno hana kanomo musufa vayamoya hae-malenaya kanomona alino kanapa vayamoya nehaya kavala hu-tene?” huno havige.

Higeno ani kahegi kema havilinea kanomoa mage hie “Tusia hau hutenea kanomoa kanapa vaya kana kavala hutene.” huno higeno Yisasia agaifena mage hie “Kagaya visanaamoga mukia kanafina aniageya huo.” huno hapai-maine.
Yisasiene agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagala katega nevageno Yisasia nago kumate vigeno nago amo agia Matae Yisasina avaleno nomaafinaga umaine.
Umainegeno Matana negana agia Maliae Yisasina aiyafi mopale emaineno Yisasima hia kaiyekea nehavie.

Havino mainegeno nunaamoa, Mataa, mukia kavela talo tala hiana agesamoa tole-lole higeno Yisasite eno mage huno hie “Anumayamogae nagananimoa natalegena nakainige kavela tusiya huna nealugi ani yafena kagesa nohavino? Hapaigeno me naya hino.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia mage huno hie “Mataga mukia yafena kagesamoa tole-lole huka aliyana nealinana havi kava nehane.
Nagoke yamaage alisana kagesa havige havige huka maiyo. Maliaa ani yafena agesa havi havi huno atafa nehigi ani yana nago kanomoa hana-ofalegahie.” huno hapaiye.

Nago yupa Yisasia nago kotega maineno Anumaya-motega ke huno havige-maine. Havigeteno agaiaene tokaeno nemaiya anagapiti nago kanomoa mage huno havige “Anumayamogae Yoniene tokaeya nemaiya anagamogamina humavelimainea kavala huka ‘Naa maa hutama nunamuna hiho.’ huka hulavelio.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia mage huno hie “Nunamuma hinutamahena mage hutama hiho ‘Nelafaga kagai kagimoa alu aotage huno hanesie. Kava yagaisana kanamoa efalote hisie.
Mukia kanafima nesuna kavela tamio.
Tagaya havi kavama hulatenaya veala aigeamateteta kefo yaamia atalematona kava huka kefo yatia aigetateka atalelato. Satanima ayelavataga hisia katela tavaleka otato.’ hutama hiho.” huno hamapaiye.
Hamapaiteno mage huno hie “Hana kanomoga kege amunona negafute uka mage huka hugane ‘Nenafugae talia (3) maya yoka namisano?

Nago nenafua kategati eana nesia yana omalegi kanale namisano?’ hukama hisanageno negafua nomaafinagati make huno kahapaisio ‘Kasalo nenahaegi natalo. Fita ago ki-maletena nafaneyaganiene ago fae-mainonanagita nagaya hetina nahavigana yana okamigahue.’ huno hisio?
Aao tamahanepauve ‘Negafuma mainoe.’ huno hisia yafena oamigahigi tutuma hia yafe hetino havigea yana amigahie.”

Ani yafe tamahanepauve Anumaya Kotitega nago yafema ke hutama havigesagenoa ago tamamigahie. Nago yafema atiyesagenoa afaa tamaveligahie. Fitalema akalu-kaluma hisagenoa Anumaya Kotia yakilamategahie.
Mukia havigesaya veamoya aligahae. Atiyesaya veamoya ali falote hugahae. Fitalema akalu-kalu hisaya veamogamina fita yakimategahie.
Hana kanomoga nafanekamoa noyamehema kahavigesigeka nefaga osifavea alika amigano? Aao ani yana alika oamigane.
Kokole amufema kahavigesigeka yapavena alika amigano? Aao ani yana alika oamigane.
Oamiganagi tamakaya havi veane mainayanagitama nafanetamimona kanale ya amamiyanagi ikapinaga mainea nelamafaa tusiya huno tamakase-maineanagitama havigesageno Alu Aotage Avamua tamamigahie.

Nago kanomona Kefo Avamumoa aguafi mainegeno avefuna alino aiyahae higeno agea noaiyane. Yisasia ani Kefo Avamula anati-talegeno vigeno ani kanomoa age aino kea kea higeya alitalu hu-mainaya veamoya ageteya tusia amamayo aimainae.
Amamayo neaigeya nagoa veamoya mage hae “Pielesepulia Kefo Avamuyagale kava hu-mainea kanomoa tokiyaa amigeno Kefo Avamumona anati-neatalie.” huya hae.
Hageya nagoa vayamoya aye-vataga hugahe mage hae “Monafinagati avame yana hugeta tokiyakaa agamano.” huya hae.

Hageno Yisasia amakupinagama ma haviya amaku amakesa ago haviteno mage hie “Nagoke kotega veamoya aye fako huya tuma hisayana ani kotega veanene haviya hu-lavigahae. Nago afamo aye fako huya ‘Alu vaya mainone.’ huya tuma hisayana ani afamola haviya hu lavigahae.

Satania anagaaenema aye fako huya ‘Alu vaya mainone.’ amakaiami tuma hisayana Satani kava yagaisia tokiya hanaa huno hanegahie? Aao tokiyaa omalegahie ani yafe tamakaya nagaifena ‘Pielesepulimoa tokiya kamigeka ani yateti Kefo Avamula neanatine.’ hutama nehayanagi havige nehae.

Nagaifena ‘Kagaya Pelesepulimo tokiyaleti anati neatalane.’ hutama hayanagi tamakaitami anagatamia Kefo Avamula amanati-talageno Pielesepulimo amakaila amaya nehio? Ani anagatamia amakaiami manima haya kea ali fako huya tamaveneliye.
Tamage nagaya Anumaya Koti tokiyaleti ani Kefo Avamula anati neataloe. Ani yafe Anumaya Kotia kava yagaisia yana tamakaitela ago emaine.
Nagola tokiyaage kanomoma nomaafima ati kevea alino yagai-maleno maisiana mukia yamaamoa kanale huno hanegahie.

Nagola tokiyaage kanomoma eno ani tokiyaage kanoenema tuma hisaana tokiyaage kanomoa agasesiana hagote kanomoma ametitima huno mainea ati kevea melino ani kanomo afeno yamaa musufa alino vayaamogami amamite amamite hugahie.
Nagoa veamoya nagai kanapa veane omaisayana kame vayania mainae. Nagoa veamoya sipi sipiniama naya huya ali-taluma ohisayana amanati neatalae.” huno hie.

Nago Kefo Avamumoa vaya aguafi haino maineleti ataleno viayamo hau hu-mainea kopinaga mo vaiyatete huno mai-faluma hisia kumafe ati neaye. Ati ayegeteana mai-falu hisia kumala omalegeno “Hagotena maigena emainoa aguafi etena mo maigahue.” huno hie.
Uno mogeana ani agupi ago sese huno kanaleya hu-malenegeno mogemaine.

Mogeteno eteno viayamo sevenia (7) kefo kavaamimoma agase-mainea Kefo Avamuyaga momavaleno egeya ani agupi hai-faleya mainageno hagotenoa ani kanomoa nagoke Kefo Avamumoa aguafima mainegeno haviya huno maineanagino menia mukia Kefo Avamumoya aguafina haiya maigeno tusia kefo ya hutafa huno maine.”
Mani kema higeya anifima alitalu hu-mainaya veanefiti nago amoa ala kefiti mage huno hie “Katetenoma numa kaminea amona Anumaya Kotia tusia muse huno haiya yana amine.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia mage huno hie “Ani amoa musena hugahianagi Anumaya Koti kema haviya akave malesaya veamoya tusia muse hugahae.” huno hie.

Mukia veala agaite melitalu hageno mage huno hamapaiye “Menia ma kanafima mainaya veamoya tusiya huya kefo veane mainae. ‘Tokiyaage avame yana tavelio.’ huya hayanagi Anumaya Kotia ani yana oamamigahigi nagoke avame yana nayoma mainea aune kanoa Yonama hutenea tokiya avame yana tamaveligahie.

Yonana noyamemoa asaga huno nakaigeno talia (3) yupa aipafinaga maineafe Ninive mainaya veamoya avame yana amaveli-maineane. Nagaya ikapinagati emainoa kano vayamo natenea kanomona menia ma kanafima mainaya veamogamina nagaya ania kavala hisua kavania avame yana tamaveligahue.

Nagola alu haupalegati emainea sauve amoa mopamona atupaleti eno Solomonia kanale agu agesaene kanomo kea havigahe emaineanagi haviho Solomonina agase-mainea kanoa ma mainegetama tamakaya agai kea nohaviye. Nohaviyafe Anumaya Kotia kaiyekema hulamatesia yupa ani amoa hetino menia ma kanafima mainaya veafe kefo kava hutama agai kema ohavinaya yafena hu falote hulamategahie.

Ninive kumate mainaya veamogamina Yonaa Anumaya Koti kea hamapaigeya kefo yaamihena amaipa aiyahae hu-mainagi haviho menia Yonana agase-mainea kanoa ma mainegetama tamakaya kefo yatamihena tamaipa aiyahae nohae. Tamaipa aiyahae nohayafe Anumaya Kotia kaiyekema hulamatesia kanamoa Ninive kumate nayoma mainaya veamoya hetiya menia ma kanafima mainaya veamoya havi kava hu-mainayafe hu falote hulamategahae.”
“Veamoya lamua hanagaliteya nopinaga hanesia komufinaga omalegahae. Susufaneletila aiso ohugahagi ani nopima hai falesaya veamoya agesayafe sipale nemalae.
Tamaulagamoa tamakupinaga aivasa hisia lamu hane. Tamaulagamoa kanale yama agesiana tamakupinaga aivasa hu-mainegi tamaulagamoa kefo yama agesiana tamakupinaga haniki-maine.
Tamakesa havilama hiho ‘Nagupinaga aivasa hu-maine.’ hutamama hisayana asu huno haniki-mainesia yafe hisagi kava yagaitama maiho.
Mukia tamaugafa aivasa hisigeno nagoke kaiyaga hanima okisiana lamumoma aivasa hia avamete mukia lamakupinaga tusiya huno aivasa hugahie.” huno hie.
Nagola Falasia kanomoa Yisasifena mage huno hie “Menia kagaya nagaiene kavela me negane.” huno higeno Yisasia kave mo negahe Falasia kanomo nopi haino mopale maine.
Mainegeno ani Falasia kanomoa mogeana Yisasia kavema negahena ayana sese ohuno mopale maiya yafena agesa havi havi huno maine.
