Mainegeno Yisasia mage huno hapaiye “Tamakaya Falasia vayamogatama amega kava hutama masutamiene yopatamiene amega kaiyagaa sese nehagi tamakupina musufa yaene kefo yatamiene hiya hulamatenegetama sesela nohae.
Tamakaya aifonafo vaya mainageno Anumaya Kotia amega kaiyagaage talo nehuno agusafinaga talo ohuneo?
Masutamiene yopatamienema hanesia kavela kasagoya yaamima omalenesia veamogamima amamisayana tamakuamoa oniyaage ohugahie.

Avonio Falasia vayamogatama kayeho. Tamakaya supu tala yaene atuene hefi kana yaene osi osi yana alitama tenia (10) malenafiti nagoke Anumaya Kotina neamitama nehayanagi fatago hutama maisaya yaene Anumaya Kotifema lamahaisia yaene ago atalenae. Hagotetama fatago hutama mainetama Anumaya Kotifena tamahau tamayamopafi tamahau-maineanagitama haenagaa supu tala yaene atuene hefi kana yaene tenia (10) malenafiti nagoke Anumaya Kotina amisayana kanale hugahie.
Avonio Falasia vayamogatama kayeho. Mono nopima neutama ‘Kava vayayaga nemaiya sialefekeya maigahune.’ hutama veane atagu nefaya kumapina ‘Nagaifena ala kano mainane huya hisae.’ hutama nehae.

Avonio tamakaya kayeho. Tamakaya vaya hevaimatenaya komu kana hutama mainae. Tamakuamoa oniyaage higetama falaki-mainageya veamoya oniyaage yama hanea komufi vaya hevaitenaya komule oageya ute ete nehae.” huno hie.
Higeno nagola kahegi kema havilinea kanomoa kenonaa mage huno hapaiye “Hulavenelina kanomogae ani kema hanana tagaienefe tagaye hia ke nehane.” huno hie.

Higeno mage huno hie kahegi kema havilinaya vayamogatama tamakaifeene nehugi avonio kayeho. Tamakaya kahegi ke malenaya ke hutama tusia kanaage ya mukia veamogami amayonale malenetama amaya hugahena nagoke tamakinagoa maletama amaya ohageya tusia kana yakefa nealiye.
Avonio kayeho. Tamakinago-moya Anumaya Koti amaune vayaa hamayageya fali-mainayanagitama tamakaya anima fali-mainaya amaune vayamogami komulega vilasi hoya maitama nehae.
Vilasi hoya maitama nehayafe “Tamakinagomoya amaune vayala hamayageya fali-mainaya yafena kanale kava humainae.” hutama nehae.
Anumaya Kotia kanale agu agesaene kanomoa mage huno humaine “Nagaya nagaini amaune vayaene Aposolo vayaene amakaipina visageya nagoa veamoya ali haviya humateya nagoa veamoya hamaesageya faligahae.”

Hamayageya fali-mainaya yafe ma mopama talo hu-mainoa kanafina aepa heya mukia kafua amaune vaya hamayageya fali-mainagi tamakaya meni kanafima mainaya veamogatama amakaima humatenaya havi kavamo anonaamia aligahae.

Hagoteno Epolona haegeno fali-maineane. Nagoa hamaeme hamaeme ageno hano hutegeya haenagalafa Sekalaiyana ala mono no kegiyamo amunopi yafa folamole heti-mainegeya hayageno fali-maineane. Nagaya tamage huna tamahanepauve hamayageya fali-mainagi tamakaya menima mainaya veamogatama hu-mainaya havi kavamo anonaamia aligahae.

Avonio kahegi kema havilinaya anagamogatama kaye ho. Mukia Yisasi kea havimainayanagi veamoya ohavisae hutama fita ki-maletetama yakisaya ki nofila ago alitama atalenae. Tamakaya “Ani nopi ohaigahune.” hutama haleti nagoa veamoya “Hai falegahune.” huya haya veamogamife “Hai ofalegahae.” hutama katile neamatae huno hamapaiye.

Yisasia ani nopiti hati-lavigeya mukia kahegi kema havilinaya anagaene Falasia vayaene akave neuya tusiya huya amaipa kafa heteteya amata huya alu yafe alu yafe agaila havige havige nehuya mage hae “Agaiama hisia keleti atafa huta kaiyekea hutegahune.” huya humainae.

Ani kava higeya ohavunamaa veamoya alitalu humainaya yapina nagoa veamogami amaiya aye latapemo huya mainageno Yisasia agaienema tokaeya nemaiya anagaamogamife nagoa veanenefe mage huno hie “Falasia vayamoya amakupima hanea yana agelama ohuya amavayaleti havigema nehaya yafena kayeho. Ani yana kai hamemoma halegia kava huno halegino alakefa hugahie. Tamakaya ani yafena kayeho.
Aiso humainea yamona Anumaya Kotia mukia alino fufute atalegahie. Falaki-mainesia yamona Anumaya Kotia mukia veamogami amaulagafi ali falote hugahie.
Hanipinaga hu-mainesaya kea veamoya yagefi havigahae. Notamifinaga sumi sumi hutama hu-mainesaya kea kuma amunopiti ala kefiti keha keha huya hugahae.”
Nenafugatama tamahanepauve amega tamaugafaage hefalisaya veafena kolia ohiho. Ani veamoya tamaku tamameene tamahae falisaya himamuamia omalene.

“Hana kanomofe kolia hisune?” hutama hayanagina tamahapaigahue. Hefalitenoma hanimo aguafi ata tegelege nehia yapi tamaku tamamema hagayu hulama-talesia tokiyaama hanea kanoa, Anumaya Kotifeke tusiya hutama kolia hiho huna tamahanepaugi Anumaya Kotifeke kolia hiho.

“Faefua (5) osi osi namayaga tole haesa moneleti miya nehayanagi Anumaya Kotia ani nama nagokefena agelaokanino amakaifena agesa havi havi huno mainegi tamakaitamifiti nagokemoga mukia namayaga agasetama mainayanageya veanea ala yaga mainae. Anumaya Kotia mukia hanea tamayolagefa ago hapalino haviline. Kolima hisaya yana neataletama afaa maiho. huno hie.”

Tamahanepauve nago kanomoma veamogami amaulagafi nagaifema “Yisasina nagua amitafa humainoe.” huno hu falote hisigena nagaya ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomona Anumaya Koti ensole anagamogami amaulagafina agaifena “Nagai nafane maine.” huna hu falote hugahue.

Hu falote hugahugi nago kanomoma veamogami amaulagafi nagaifema “Nagua amitafa nohue.” hunoma hufalote hisigena nagaya Anumaya Koti ensole anagamogami amaulagafina ani kanohena “Oagenoa kano maine.” huna hugahue.

Nagoa veamoya ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomonihema hu-haviya hunatesayana Anumaya Kotia aigeamateno ani kefo yaamia atalemategahigi veamoya Alu Aotage Avamumofema hu-haviya hutesayana Anumaya Kotia aipa haviya huno aigeamateno ani kefo yaamia ataleoamategahie.
Nagai kema huhaletama hisaya yafena kaiyeke hulamategahae. Tamavaleya mono nopi ala kaiyeke hulamate vayate visagetama kolia hutama “Kenonaamia naane ke hisune?” hutama tamakesa kumoa ohiho.
Ani yupa kanoa Alu Aotage Avamumoa “Mage hiho.” huno tamahapainagetama hugahae.
Anima alitalu hu-mainaya veapiti nago kanomoa Yisasina mage huno havige “Humavenelina kanomogae nepunimona hapaigeno nelaafama ataleno fali-mainea afenopiti fako huno nagoa namisie.” huno havinege.
Havigegeno kenonaa Yisasia mage huno hapaiye “Nagaya kaiyekea huna fako hisua kanoa omainoe.” huno hapaiye.

Hapaiteno Yisasia amakaifena mage huno hie “Tamakaya maihao hutama maiho. Alu kanomo yafena agetama tamahayea ohiho. Nago kanomoa kasagoya afenomaa haneanagi ani afenomaamoa kanaleya huno maisia haimula oamigahie.”
Nago avame kea mage huno hamapaiye “Tusia afenomaa hanea kanomona hoyaafina tusiya huno alaga aye-maine.
Aye-mainegeno agesafinaga mage huno havimaine ‘Na ya hisue? Kavenia alina halaya hisua nona omaleanagina hanaa hisue?’
Maa hisue. Yu noyagania tagape aitaletena ala noyaga kasagoya kigahue. Kitena mukia kaveniaene afenoyaniaene anifi halaya hu-malegahue.

Hu-maletena nagainihena mage huna hugahue ‘Nagu nagesamoga mukia kafua nesua kaveene afenoyaniaene ago halaya hu-malenogi menia nagaya maifalu huna mainena kaveniene tiniaene nege nege nehuna muse huna maigahue.’ huno humaine.

Hianagi Anumaya Kotia agaifena mage huno humaine ‘Ani kava hana kavala aifonafo kano kana kano mainananagika meni kegela kahaimula kahafalesugeka faligane. Falitesanageya talo tala humalenana afenoyagakaa taya aligahae?’ huno humaine.

Huteno Yisasia mage huno hie nagoa veamoya amakaiami amaugafa aliya haisaya yafe mone afenoamia halaya nehayanagi Anumaya Kotia musema hisia kavala aliya halaya nohayafe ani kanomoma humainea kava kana veane mainae.” huno humaine.

Tuelufua (12) anagaamogamife mage huno hamapaiye “Ani yafena nagaya tamahanepauve kanale hutama maisaya yaene kave nesaya yaene ti nesaya yaene tamakesa havi havi ohiho. Tamaugafale kena failisaya yafeene tamakesa havi havi ohiho.
Kave neyana aifa letale yanagi kahaimuna kanaleya huka maisana yana kanale ya hane. Kena failisana yana amegale yanagi veanea tokiya ya mainae.

Hakiki namayaga ageho. Amakaya avina yana ofaiya kavela hoyafinagatila noaliye. Kave malesaya noamiene yu noamiene omaleneanagi Anumaya Kotia kavela afaa neamamie. Tamakaya namayaga amakase-mainaya veane mainayafe tamakaiene kava yagailamategahie.
Tamakaitamifitila nago kanomoa ‘Ofalina nagoene maime maime haigahue.’ huno tokiyaage agesa havisiana anima havia katela hanaa huno falote hugahie? Aao falote ohugahie
Ohugahigi ani osi ya kanoa ohaleasine naa higetama nagoa maisaya yafena tamakesa havime havime nehaiye?

Ageho talapinaga hanea vilasiyamoya haiya ausea nehae. Aliyana aliya kenaamia talo huya fainoaligi kanale kenaami hanegena nagaya tamahanepauve nayoma mainea ala sauve kanotamia Solomonia kanale kenaa failianagi ma vilasiyamoya kanaleya huya agase-mainae.

Tala yana meni kanafina hoyafina haneanagi ega hataga huya atafi atalegahagi Anumaya Kotia ani tala yana kava yagaigeno kanaleya humainegi tamakaya mukia veamogatama nagaifena tamakupi maletama tamametitia osi kanoa nehagi Anumaya Kotia ania huno tamakaila kenatamia alino hilato hulamategahie.
Ani yafe ‘Kaveene tiene na ya negahune?’ hutama tusia tamakesa havi havi ohiho.
Naa yafena ma mopale mainaya veamoya Anumaya Koti kema nohaviya veala amakesa havi havi huya nemaigi Nelamafaa nesaya yaene kena failisaya yaenefena ago havimaine.

Havimaineafe tamakaya ani kavala ohutama Anumaya Kotima kava yagaisia kumate visayafe tamakesa havi havi hutama maisayana Anumaya Kotia ani yaene mukia kavetamiene kenatamiene tamamiteno ani kumatela tamavaleno tamategahie.” huno hie.
Nenafugatama tamakaya osi kanoa sipi sipia mainagi kolia ohiho. Nelamafaa kava humainea kumatela utama visageno kava yagailama-tesigetama maisayafe agesa havino mainegi kolia ohiho.

Ani agesa havimaineanagitama afenoyatamia alitama afenoyaami omalesia veamogami amamiho. Na kava hisayana ikapinaga muse yatamia talo hugahae. Ani ikapinaga muse yana hano ohugahie. Musufaya nehaya vayamoya musufayama hugahena ani kumatela ougahae. Hakanomoa ali haviya ohugahie.
Muse yatamima malenesaya kumatefe tamakesa havi havi hutama ani kumate visaya tamaku tamakesa havitama maigahae.
Yisasia mage huno hie “Ala kanoma esiafe kenatamia alitama aupa hutama failinetama tamamu nofila hulinetama kanitamia aye haletama maiho.

Nagoa aliya vayamoya ala kanoamimofe agava maisaya kava hutama maiho. Ani ala kanomoa ama alisia imulegati eteno no fitaalema me kalu-kalu hisigeya aupaa hetiya yakitesayafe agava mainae. Tamakaya ania hutama nagava maiho.

Ala kanoma emainea kanafina hetiya maineya agavama mainaya aliya vayaamoya tusia muse huya maigahae. Tamage tamahanepauve ani ala kanomoa kenaa ali aupa huno failineno aliya vayaahe ‘Mopale maiho.’ huno humateteno kavela amamite amamite hugahie.
Kege amunopi esio? Kokolemoa agea oainesigeno esio? Esigenofena hetiya agava maisaya aliya veamoya tusia muse hugahae.
Tamage huna tamahanepauve nomona nefama musufaya hisia kanomoa nomaafi ehai falesia kanahema havimaineleasina nomaa ataleno ovigeno nomaafina ehaino musufayana ohileasine.
Tamakaienena talo tala hiho. ‘Menia omegahie.’ hutama hisaya kana kanoale ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomona egahue.” huno humaine.
Pitaa mage huno humaine “Anumayamogae tagaifekeya ani avame kaiyekea tahanepaino ifi mukia veane havisae?” huno havigemaine.

Anumayamoa mage huno humaine “Aliya kanomoa kanale agu agesa hanea kanoa aliyamaa agegeno alige alige nehia kanoa tamakaipina hanate maine? Aniama humainea kanomofe kava kanomoa mage hugahie ‘Mukia aliya veate yagai-maineka kavela fako faka huka mukia kanafina amamite amamite huo.’ huno hugahie.
Hugahigi haenagaa ani ala kanomoa eteno esigenoa hapai-mainea augafa kavama hinagenofena ani aliya kanomoa muse hugahie.
Tamage huna tamahanepauve aniama humainesia aliya kanomofena ala kanomoa mage hugahie ‘Mukia yania kava yagaiyo.’ huno hugahie.

Hugahianagi ani aliya kanomoa agaia agesafinaga mage huno havisiana ‘Kava kanonia menia hivi huno omegahie.’ nehuno agaia aliyate kava yagai-mainesia vegi munanegi nehamaeno ala kanomo kavela tina neno havilina neno aneginagi nehuno ‘Omegahie.’ huno hisia yupaene kanaaene kava kanoa egahie. Enunoa ani havi kavama humainea kanomona kayo kevia ami-maleteno alino haviya huteteno mage hugahie nagaima veganokano hunenataya veanene umaiyo huno hutegahie.
Nago aliya kanomoa agaia ala kava kanomona haiya kavafena ago havitenoagi kava kanomona haiya kavala ohuno talo talama ohunesiana ala kava kanomoa agaila alakefa huno haegahie.

Haegahigi nago aliya kanomoa ala kanomona haiya kavafema ohavino havi kavama maino nehisigenoa ala kava kanomoa ako huno haegahie. Mukia yama ali-mainaya veafena ‘Anonaa etetama mukia yania namiho.’ huno hugahie. Mukia yamaa amamigeya ali-mainesaya veafena ‘Anonaa ava monene etetama menamiho.’ huno hugahie.”
Yisasia mage huno hie “Nagaya ma mopafi ata kaesugeno tesia yafe emainoe. Ani atamoa aupaa tesie huna nagu nagesa nehavue.
Nahaesagenofena nagaila tusia nagata aigahie. Aupaa huya onahaesaya yafe nagu nagesa havua nagesamoa hivi huno talavanote.
Tamakaya na tamakesa nehaviye? ‘Ma mopale taipa falu huta maisuna yana tamigahe Yisasia emaine.’ hutama nehafi? Aao nagaya tamakaila ali fako hisua yafe emainoe.
Meni kanafina aepa heya faefua (5) afamola nagoke nopi nemaisaletila tolemogania (2) taliamogamina (3) kame humategae. Taliamoya (3) tolemoganina (2) kame hunategahae.

Mago afamotalamogania nefaa agaia nafanemona kame hutesigeno nafaneamoa agaia nefana kamea hutegahie. Nago tayametalamogania itaamoa munaamona kame hutenageno munaamoa itaamona kamea hutegahie. Vemona itaamoa anofeloamona kame hutenageno anofeloamoa ania huno nevena itaamona kamea hutegahie.” huno humaine.
Alitalu humainaya veamogamifena mage hie “Tamakaya yagemoma tavi nefalelegati siamoma evayi higetamahena aupaa mage nehae ‘Ko aigahe nehie.’ hutama nehageno ani yana tamage huno falote nehie.
Oko ikama agetetama ‘Amukoage hugahe nehie.’ hutama nehageno ani yana tamage huno falote nehie.

Tamakuafina havitama omaletama amegati kea nehaya vagala veala tamakaya mopale yaene ikate yaene agelama hutama neagayanagi naa higetama meni kanafima falote hia kavala agelama hutama noagae?” huno humaine.
“Naa higetama fatago kavafena tamakaitamia tamakesa havilama hutama nohaviye?

Nago kanomoma ‘Haviya hunatanagena kaiyeke hugategahe nehue.’ hunoma kavaleno vinagetana kaiyekema havi kanomotema ugahema neutana ‘Nenafuga kaipa falu hisia yana kamigahue.’ huka hapaiyo. Ania ohisanana kavaleno kaiyekema hugatesia kanomote vinageno ani kea haviteno ati vayamogami ayapi katesigeno kavaleno nofila hugategahie.
Nofi hugatesigekahena kaiyekema hugatenea kanomoma ‘Mone namio.’ huno hu-mainesia yamaa oaminukahena nofi nopitila ataleka omegane.” huno humaine.

Ani yupa nagoa vayala Kalili vayafe Yisasina kea hapaigahe eya mage hae “Ani Kalili vayamoya Anumaya Koti muse yama amigahena sipi sipi nehageno Pailatia, kava kanomoa, ati vaya humategeya me hamayageya faligeno kolaamiene sipi sipi afuma haya kolaamoene nagopi tavi-maine.” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia mage huno hie “Kalili vayama fali-mainaya vayamogami kefo yaamia nagoa Kalili vayamogami kefo yaamimona ago amakaseno hai-mainea yafe fali-mainae hutama tamakesa nehavio?
Tamahapauve ani vayayaga kefo yaamia ala huno otamakaseneanagi tamakaya kefo yatamihena tamakua aiyahae ohisayana ania hutama faligahae.

Nago yupa Siloamu kumate ayaaya nona tagape ailavino eitinia (18) vaya hamaegeya fali-mainaya kea havilinao? Na tamakesa nehaviye ani vayamogami kefo yaamimoa nagoa Yelusalemu mainaya veamogami kefo yaami ago amakaseno hai-maineafe fali-mainae hutama tamakesa nehavio?
Tamahanepauve anima fali-mainaya vayala kefo yaamimoa ala huno otamakasenegi tamakaya kefo yatamihena tamakua aiyahae ohisayana ania hutama faligahae.”
Yisasia nago avame kea huno mage hie “Nago kanomoa hoyaafina figi yosa hane. Nago yupa alagaa tagigahe vianagi alagaa omale.

Omalegeno hoyafi aliya nealia kanomofe mage huno hie ‘Havio nagaya talia (3) kafu alaga aligahe ete ete huanagi alaga omalene. Oayeneafe ani yosa atagi-talo. Naa higeno mopamona limaa afaa nenegena alu yosa faisue huna nehue.’ huno hie.
Higeno hoyafi aliya kanomoa mage hie ‘Musekaa nehugi ma kafuene atalegena hafuyafina aipopoma huna afumo aifa katena malena agano.
Malesugeno nago kafulema alagaa ayesio? Oayesigeka afaa atagi-talegane.’ huno humaine.”
Nago Sapati yupa Yisasia nago mono nopi maineno humavenelie.

Humaveneligeno nagola kali nealia alagino ani nopina maine. Ani amona aguafina Kefo Avamula hai fale-maineno tusia kali neamigeno eitinia (18) kafu ani kalia ali-maineanagino akaveya ayamufamoa fagagigeno hetino fatago huno nomaiyane.
Yisasia ageteno ke huno mage huno hie “Ma amogae kalikaa ago ali neataloe.” huno hie.
Nehuno ani amo augafale aya malegeno anile aupaa akaveya aifatago higeno hetino maineno Anumaya Koti agia alisaga humaine.

Nehigeno ani mono nopi soka kanomoa Yisasima Sapati kanalema hutea yafena aipa kafa heteteno mukia veafe mage huno hamapaiye “Aliya kana sikisia (6) kana hanegi kalitima alino kanale hisie hinutamahena ani aliya kanale eho. Sapati kana kalitami alilino kanale hulamatesia yafena omeho.” huno humaine.

Higeno Anumayamoa kenonaa mage huno hie “Tamakaya tamakuafina havi omaletama amegati ke nehaya vagala vayamogatama tamakaya mukiamogatama Sapati yupa toki afuene pulamakatamiene noamifina mo kalu hetama ti amigahena amavaletama nevayane.
Naa nehayanagi ma amona Apalahamu aginagomona Satania eitinia (18) kafu nofi hutegeno kalia ali-maineafe Sapati yupa ani yana ali kalu hetaloa yafe ‘Havi kava hane.’ hutama nehao?” huno humaine.
Higeya kame vayaamoya tusia amakaye higeya mukia veamoya kanale kava hia yafe tusia muse humainae.
Yisasia mage huno hie “Anumaya Kotima kava yagaisia kavamoa ma kava humaine? Hanaa huna maa augafa yana hane huna tamahapaisue?

Ma osi osi alagamoma hia avamete nehie. Ani alagamo agia masatatie. Osi osi alagama nago kanomoa alino hoyafima fai-malegeno hageteno haino haino ala yosagefa hanegeya namayagamoya akopale noamia ki-mainae.” huno hie.
Nagoene mage huno hie “Anumaya Kotima kava yagaisia kavafena hanaa huna maa yana hane huna tamahapaisue?
Kaihamema hale negia avamete humaine. Nago amoa ani kaihamema halegisia yana alino talia (3) ala yopafi tanefa falauvaene ali havigu higeno haenagaa mukia tanefa falauvamoa halegi-maine.” huno hie.
Yisasia Yelusalemu ugahe osiosi kumayagaleene ala kumayagaleene uno humavelie.

Humaveneligeno nago kanomoa mage huno havige “Anumayamogae Anumaya Kotia namagi veane amaku amamena aligatigahie? Osia veanefi kasagoya veane?” huno higeno Yisasia alitalu humainaya veamogamina mage huno hamapaiye “Anumaya Koti kumatema visaya fiana osi fia kanoa hane. Ani fiapima vinutamahena tamayamufa alitama tokiyaage hutetama hai falegahae. Hai falegahagi kasagoya veamoya ‘Hai falesune.’ huya hugahayanagi amukoamia omaleneanagiya hai ofalegahae.

Haenagaa ani notema kava yagai-mainea kanomoa hetino fita alino kilamatesigetama fiate heti-mainetama fitale aiko nelitama mage hutama hugahae ‘Anumayamogae fita yakilato.’ hutama hisagenoa mage hugahie ‘Nagaya otamakenoane. Tamakaya hanategati aya veane neae?’ huno hulamategahie.
Hulamatesigetama mage hutama hugahae ‘Kagaiene kavela nenonane. Tagai kumate kaiyekea tahapai-mainana kano mainane.’ hutama hugahae.

Hugahayanagi mage huno hulamategahie ‘Ago tamahanepauve tamakaila otamakenoane. Hanategati aya veane neae? Kefo kavakeya ali falote hutama nehaya vealagi nagaitegatila mai-haletama viho.’ huno hulamategahie.

Tamakaya mogesayana Apalahamuene Aisakiene Yekopuene Anumaya Koti amaune vayaene Anumaya Koti kumatela mainesagetama mogegahayanagi tamakaya anilela ougahayanagitama malaga mainetama tusiya hutama avia neatetama tamakaitami tamaugafahena tusia kalagi aigahae.
Nagi mukia veamoya yagemoma tavi nefalelegatiene evayi nehilegatiene aluga aluga haupalegatiene Anumaya Koti kumate melitalu huya siale maineya kavela negahae.
Haviho meni kanafina nagoa veamoya haenagalafa mainaya veamoya uhagoteya maigahae. Hagoteya mainaya veamoya haenagalafa maigahae.” huno hamapaiye.
Higeya ani kanafina nagoa Falasia vayamoya mage me hae “Ma kumala ataleka alu kumate vuo. Helotia ala kava kanomoa ago kahaegahe nehie.” huya humainae.

Hageno Yisasia mage hie “Tamakaya utama ani afai kalamona, kesi kate vaiyatete nehia kalamona, nagayama hisua kea mage hutama hapaiho ‘Havio nagaya osi kanaa Kefo Avamula veamogami amakuafiti ali-taletena kali veanene alina kanale humatetena talia (3) kanale aliyania ali avaya ayegahue.’ huna tamahapai-mainoa kea mo hapaiho.” huno hamapaiye
Hamapaiteno “Anumaya Koti aune kanomona alu kumatela ohaegahayanagiya Yelusalemuge haegahae. Ani yafe nagaya meniene egaene olagaene kate vaiyegahue.

Vaeha Yelusalemu mainaya veamogatama tamakaya Anumaya Koti amaune vayayaga nehamaetama yafa kayo alitama Anumaya Koti humategeya tamakaitega emainaya vayala yafa kayoteti tavata hamae-mainayanagi nagaya mukia yupa a kokolemoa nafaneama agekonafinagama alitalu nehia avamete huna tamakaila nagaya nagainiale alitalu hulamategahe nehugetama tamakaya ‘Ani kavala ohuo.’ hutama nehae.

Haviho ma mainaya kumatefena Anumaya Kotia ago ataleno ‘Aoteyamaae.’ huno humaineanagitama menia nagoene onagegahagi ‘Anumayamo aliya aligahe higeno hutenea kanoa Anumaya Koti kanale manu amisie.’ huya hisaya kanafi nagoene nagegahae.” huno humaine.
Nago Sapati yupa Yisasia Falasia vayate kava humainea kanomo nopi kave mo nenegeya nagoa Falasia vayamoya Yisasina ageya mainae.
Mainageno nagola augafa halegimai kanoa, faligahe nehia kanoa, anile maine.

Mainegeno Yisasia ani kanoa ageteno ani nopi mainaya Falasia vayaene kahegi kema havilinaya vayaene mage huno hamavige “Sapati kanafina kaliamia alino kanale hutesia yana kanale yapi havi yane? Tamakai mono kemoa naane nehie?” huno hamavige.
Hamavigegeya ani vayamoya nagola osi ke kanoa ohuya afaa mainageno Yisasia ani kali kanoa atafa hulineno kalia alino kanale huteteno atalegeno umaine.

Vigeno Yisasia mage huno hamavige “Hana kanomoga Sapati kanafima nafanekafi pulumakafi komufima tavi-mainesigetama ‘Sapati yupae.’ hutama anifinaga atalesafi ifi aupaa amavayu hugahae?” huno hamavige.
Hamavigegeya mukia vayamoya kenonaa kea ohuya mainae.
“Kavema me neho.” huno ke higeya emainaya vayamoya “Ala kanomo nemaiya siale emaisune.” huyama nehaya kavala Yisasia ageteno ani kavama nehaya yafena mage huno hamapaiye.

“Nago kanomoa kagaifema ‘Ala imulema eno.’ huno kema hinageka vinukahena ala kanomo nemaiya sialela uomaiyo. Havigu anile mainesanageno nago kanoa kagaseno mainesia ala kanomofe ke hinagenoma emainesigeno kava kanomoa kagaifena mage me hugahie ‘He-tio. Ala kanomo sialelagi kagaya omaiyo.’ huno hugatesigeka kagaye nehinageka akavelaga mo maigane.

Nago kanomoma kagaifema ‘Ala kave meno.’ huno kema hinageka vinukahena osi kanomo mainesile mo maiyo. Mopale mainesanageno kagaifema ke humainesia kanomoa megagesiana hinagenoa mage huno hugahie ‘Nenafugae malela omaika neataleka ala kanomo siale haisaga humaika maiyo.’ huno hugategahie. Ani kema hisigeya mukia anile mainesaya veamoya kagai kagi alisaga hugahae.

Nagoa veamoya ‘Ala vaya mainonanagita tagia alisaga hugahune.’ huya hisagenoa Anumaya Kotia ‘Afa vaya mainae.’ huno humategahigi nagoa veamoya ‘Tagia omale veane mainone.’ huya hisagenoa Anumaya Kotia ani veamogami amakia alisaga hugahie.” huno hie.

“Kavela me neho.” huno ke humainea kanomofe Yisasia mage huno hie “Ala imuma kigahena mukia kameta negafuene kafukaganaene kagaika nofi vayaene moneamima hanesia veaneheke ‘Kave me nesae.’ huka kea hu oamato. Haenagaa kagaife ‘Kave meno.’ huya hisagekama mo nesanana anonakaa hai ali-mainane.

Hai ali-mainanagi ala imuma kigahena maa veafe kea huo moneamima omale veanegi amaugafa haviya humai veanegi amaiya haviya humai veanegi amaulaga asu humai veanegi huka ke hisanageno Anumaya Kotia muse yana kamigahie. Ani veamoya anonaa kavekale kamisaya amakula omalenea yafe kagaya muse hisanageno fatago humainaya veanema fali-mainesafiti hetisaya kanafina Anumaya Kotia agaia anonakaa kamisigeka muse hugane.”
Nago kanomoa Yisasiene maineno kave neneno Yisasi kea haviteno mage hie “Nagoa veamoya Anumaya Koti kava yagaisia kumate haiya maineya kavela neneya tusia muse hugahae.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia mage huno hapaiye “Nago kanomoa ala imu kigahe mukia veaneyaga ‘Meneho.’ huno ke humaine.
Ke humateteno imua ago kimaleteno aliya kanoamona hutegeno viayamo kema humatenea veanehe ‘Tamakaya eho. Mukia nesaya yana ago talo tala humalene.’ huno hamapai-maine.

Hamapaigeya ani mukia veala nagoke nagokemoya mage hae ‘Tagaya ougahune.’ huya hae. Hageno nagoke kanomoa mage hie ‘Nagola hoya yaufa miya humalenoanagina mogegahe nehue. Museka nehugi nagaya ougahue.’ huno hie.
Higeno nago kanomoa mage hie ‘Nagaya tenia (10) aliya alisia pulumaka miya humalenena nehuanagina kanale aliya nealifi agegahe neue. Museka nehugi nagaya ougahue.’ huno hie.
Higeno nago kanomoa mage huno hie ‘Menia nagaya yaufa ania alitenoanagina museka nehugi nagaya ougahue.’ huno hie.

Nage hageno eteno ani aliya kanomoa kava kanomona mo hapaigeno ani kava kanomona aipamoa haviya higeno aliya kanoamofe mage huno hapaiye ‘Kagaya aupaa eteka uka kumate mainaya veanegi moneamia omale veanegi aiya haviya humai veanegi aulaga asu humai veanegi aumiya haviya humai veanegi amavaleka eno.’ huno hie.
Higeno ani aliya kanomoa ani kava huteno eteno mage huno kava kanomona me hapaiye ‘Kagai kavaya ali hipoya huanagi nagoa siale maisaya yana afaa hanegeno nokaafina hiyala ohune.’ huno hie.
Higeno ala kanomoa aliya kanoahena mage huno hapaiye ‘Kagaya kumala neataleka ala katega neuka tala agegayalega nemaiya veanea ke huka amavayu huka amavaleka noniafina memategeya hiya hiho.
Nagaya kahanepauve hagotena kema nehugeyama omenaya veanea mukiamoya menia kavela meliya onegahae.’ huno hie.” huno hamapaiye.

Kasagoya veamoya Yisasiene nevageno maiyahae huno hamapaiye “Nagoa veamoya nagai nakavema egahena nefaene itaamoene aamoene nafaneamoene nepuamoene asaamoene aganaamofeenena ‘Afa vaya mainagi Yisasia tamakase-mainea yafe nagua aminoa kano mainoe.’ huno ohisia kanomoa nagai kea havino akave omale kano maine.
‘Kanaleya huna maisua nahaimula afa ya hanegi Yisasia agasemai kanogina nagua aminoe.’ huno ohisia kanomoa nagai kea havino akave omale kano maine.
Nagaila nagatama aisigena falisua yafema nago kanomoa ‘Ani kava hugahue.’ huno agaia yafaga yosa kofino nakave visia agesa ohavisia kanomoa nagai kea havino akave omale kano maine.

Tamakaipiti nago kanomoga ‘Ala nokefa kigahue.’ kagesa havinukahena hagoteka ‘Ani nonia kina avaya ayesua monenia hanefi?’ huka kagesa havi havi hugane. ‘Mukia kisua monea hane.’ huteka ani nona aepa heka kigane.

Hagotekama naa ohinuka aepa heka amalagu aiteka posia ayesanageno monekaa hano hisigeka ani no kika avaya ayesana amukoka omalesigeya mukia agesaya veamoya kigika hugateya ‘Ma kanomoa nona aepa heno kianagi ani nona hivi huno ki hano hisia amukoa omalene.’ huya hugahae.

Nagi nagola sauve kanomoa ‘Nago sauve kanoenema aepa hena tu hugahue.’ huno agesama havinunofena hagoteno mage huno agesa havisie ‘Nagaya teni tausenia (10,000) ati vayania mainagi nago sauve kanomoa tueti tausenia (20,000) ati vayaa mainayanagina tuma hisua himamunia haneo?’ huno agesa havigahie.

Agesa haviteno ‘Aao tuma hisua himamunia omalene.’ hunoma hinunofena agaiene tuma hisaya vayamoya ayaayate mainesageno nagoa vayala humateno mage huno hugahie ‘Mage hutama mo havigeho ‘Hanaa hutaa taaipa ali falu hutaa maisue.’ hutama mo havigeho.’ huno hamapaisigeya mo havigegahae.
Mo havigegahagi tamakaipitila nagoa veamoya mukia yaamima amakaveno hu oatesayana nagai kea ohavi veane maigahae.”
Tamakaya havilinae solea kanale ya haneanagi hagama nehia yamaa hanoma hisigetama hanaa hutama hagama nehia yamaa ali falote hugahae?
Hagama nehia yamaa omalesiana afa ya hanegi afumo aifaene aliya ituyaene hoyafi malesayana afovaage ohugahigi veamoya afaa hagayu hutalegahae. Tamakesama hanesiana havilama hutama haviho.
Vaya amaugafaleti takisi mone huhatiya aliliteya huya musufayama nehaya vayaene kefo yama hume hume nehaiya veanene Yisasi ke havigahe avate emainae.
Emainageya Falasia vayamoyaene kahegi kema havilinaya anagamoyaene ageteya mage huya ke vaimainae “Ma kanomoa kefo ya nehaya vayaene tokaeno maineno kavela nene.” huya hae.

Nehageno Yisasia avame kea mage huno hamapaiye “Hana kanomoga tamakaipitila vani hataletia (100) afua mainefiti nagola fanane higeno ani afumona nefaa mukia afua talapinaga amataleno viayamo nagokema fanane humainea afuahe atiyeno yeno ageno ali falote hisifi? E, fananema hisigeno ania huno ati ayegahae.
Atiyeno agefalote huteno tusia muse huno ageyafi aigagino avaleno umaine.
Kumate uvayi huteno vayaahe ke higeya melitalu hageno mage hie ‘Fananema humainea afua ago agefalote huafe tamakaiene nagaiene muse hisune.’ huno humaine.”

Yisasia hufalote huno mage hie “Ani kava huno mukia vani hataletia (100) veamoya kefo yafe amakua aiyahae huya fatago kava nehaya veafena Anumaya Kotia muse hugahianagi nagoke kanomoa kefo yama hume hume nehaisiletima ‘Kefo yania atalena nagaye higena aigagina Anumaya Kotitega etena nagua amigahue.’ hunoma hisigenofena Anumaya Kotia tusia muse hutegahie.”
Nago amoa teni (10) kina malenefiti nagola fanane higeno lamua hanagaliteno nomaafina halafi huno atiyeno yeno ali falote humaine.
Ali falote huteno vayaahe ke higeya melitalu hageno mage hie “Tamakaiene nagaiene muse hisune. Monenima fanane humainea monea ago atiyena yena ali falote hue.” huno humaine.

Yisasia hufalote huno mage hie “Nagaya tamahanepauve ani kava huya Anumaya Kotina ensole vayaamoya nagoke kanomoma kefo yama hume hume nehaisiletima ‘Kefo yaniahena nagaye higena aigagina Anumaya Kotitega etena nagua neamue.’ hunoma hisigenofena ensole anagamoya tusia muse hutegahae.”
Yisasia amakaifena mage huno hie nago kanomoa nafanelatamaa tole mainae.

Mainaanagino haenaga nafanemoa nefafe mage huno hapaiye “Nenafagae falisanana nagai ya hapaegahie huka hunatenana yana ago namio.” huno higeno nefaa mukia yamaa alino fako huno tole nafanelatamaamokani anamine.

Anamitegeno haenaga nafaneamoa osi kana kanoa maiteno mukia mone afenoyamaa alino ayaaya kotega umaineno hu osuyate mone afenomaa motale metale huno age haye hu yateene mone afenomaa mukia atale hano humaine.
Mukia yamaa hano higeno ani kumatega ala kafu haya kanamoa falote higeno nagoa nesia yana omalegeno tusia agatemaine.
Agategeno nagola ani kumate kanomotega viayamo “Aliyakaa alisue.” huno havigegeno “E.” huteno talapinaga hutegeno viayamo afuale kava yagaino maineno kaveamia amamine.
Neamamino mage hie “Vae nesua kavela omaleanagina afumo kavepiti haletinaa nesue.” huno humaine. Hianagi nago kanomoa nesia yana oamine.
Oamigeno agesamoa hao higeno agesafinaga mage huno hie “Mukia nenafa aliya veamoya amamu hia no maineya kasagoya kavela nenagena nagaya nagala legena maa huna falisua kavala nehue.
Nehuafe hetina nenafatega una mage huna hapaigahue ‘Nenafagae nagaya kefo ya hugatenoe. Kagaiene Anumaya Kotiene kefo ya hulanatoe.
Nagaila natenana nafanekamonae huna hisuana onategahianagina musekaa nehugi aliya kanokaa maisua yafe navalo.’ huna hugahue.” huno agesa havimaine.
Haviteno nefatega neeno aluale neegeno nefaa ageteno kalagi aino aiyayeno monukino atako humaine.
Atako nehigeno nafaneamoa agaifena mage huno hie “Nenafagae nagaya kefo ya hugatoe. Kagaiene Anumaya Kotiene kefo ya hulanatoe. Nagaya natenana nafanekamonae huna hisuana onategahie.” huno hie.
Higeno nefaa aliya veaamofena mage huno hie “Aupaa utama kanaleyama humainea kukena alitama me vaiteho. Ayapi vaisia kihana vaitetama aiya noene vaiteho.
Ala pulumaka afovaagema humainesia afua hetama kisageta neneta musekase hutesune.
Ma ma mainea nafanenimoa fali-mainefiti hetia yafeene fananema hu-mainefiti efalote hia yafeene musena hutesune.” huno higeya aepa heya tusi muse hutenae.

Huneatageno yage nafaneamoa hoyafinagati eno note evayi nehuno haviana yagame haya yaene amo ayaya kene me haviteno aliya kanomofena ke higeno egeno mage huno havige “Na kava nehae?” huno havigemaine.
Havigegeno mage hie “Kaganakamoa ago emaine. Augafamoa kanaleya higeno ea yafe negafaa afovaage afua hegeya neneya hafali ateya mainae.” huno hie.

Higeno nepuamoa aipa haviya higeno “Nagaya nopinaga ohaigahue.” huno higeno nefaa nopinagati eno mage hie “Musekaa nehugi ehaiyo.” huno tutu higeno nefafe mage huno hapaiye “Havio nagaya kasagoya kafua kagai aliya alige-lige huna kekaa nago kanafina ‘Aao.’ huna ohunuanagika vayaniamogamiene muse hisuna yana nagoke meme ataaua heka onamitafa hu-mainanane.
Onaminana yana ma nafanekamoa mone fenoyagakaa alino kumai anele momi memi higeno monekaa hano higeno emainegeka afovaage afua heka musekase huneatane.” huno hapaiye.

Higeno nefaa mage huno hie “Nafanenimogae mukia kanafina nagaiene nemainanagino mukia yania kagai ya hanegi kaganakamoa falino fanane humainefiti evayi hianagita muse huta taipamoa kanale hinageta maisunana ani yamoa kanale hulatesie.” huno hapaimaine.

Yisasia agaiaene tokaeya nemaiya anagafe mage huno hamapaiye nagola tusia monea hanea kanomoa ani afenomaale kava nehea aliya kanoamoa mainegeya nagoa vayala ayaamoya ani aliya kanomofe akavelaga ke huya mage hae “Kagai aliyate kava kanomoa mukia yakaa alino motale metale humaine” huya hae.

Hageno moneama hanea kanomoa kava nehea aliya kanoamofena ke higeno egeno mage hie “Naane huya kagaifena nahanepaiye? Kagaila kava hisana tokiya ago kaminoafe kagaya hanaa huka kava humainane? Huyogiteka menahapaiyo. Nagoene kagaya mani aliyana oaligane.” huno humaine.
Higeno ani aliya kanomona agu agesamoa mage hie “Aliyania nahafalegahe higi hanaa hisue? Hoya aliya alisua tokiyania omaleneanagina aukaya hisugenoa nagaye hugahianagina hanaa hisue?
Hisua yafena menia nagesa havue. Ani kava humatesugeno aliyaniama nahafalesigeya anonaa ani vayamoya ‘Notifi emaiyo.’ huya hugahae.” huno havimaine.
Nagoa ala kanoamoteti nofi humainaya veafe amahaote amahaote ke higeya ageno hagote kanomofena mage huno havige “Nagai kava kanomoa namagi ya nofila hugatene?” huno havige.

Havigegeno mage hie “Nagaya vani hataletia (100) kalasini talamu nofila huanagi anonaa oaminoe.” huno higeno aliya kanoamoa mage hie “Anima kae-malenea autama ma hanegi ani vani hataletie (100) huno hanea avona ayehananeka fifitiae (50) huka kao.” huno hapaiye.

Nago kanomofena mage hie “Nofima humainana yana namagi ali-mainane?” huno higeno “Vani hataletia (100) alaisi kula nofi huanagi anonaa oaminoe.” huno higeno aliya kanoamoa mage hie “Anima kae-malenea autama ma hanegi ani vani hataletia (100) ayehananeka eitiae (80) huka kao.” huno humaine. Ani kavama hia yamoa ma agesa havie “Haenagaa aliyaniama nahafalesigeya ani vayamoya mage hugahae ‘Notifi emaiyo.’ huya hisayafenagina naa kava hugahue.” huno hie.

Ani musufaage aliya kanomoa agesa havi havi huno ani kava humainea yafe ala moneama hanea kanomoa mage hie “Kanale kagu kagesa hane.” huno humainegeno Yisasia mage huno hie “Ma mopale yafema muse nehaya veamoya mone alisaya yafe amakesa havi havi huteya aliyama aliyana hale yapi mainaya veala ago amakaseya amakesaene veane mainae.

Nagaya tamakaitamige tamahanepauve tamakaya ma mopale monea alitama veamogami amamisageya nelamafuya maisagetama falisaya yupa ani monea hano hisigeno Anumaya Kotia maige maige hisaya nopina tamavaleno ali falu fala hulamategahie.

Nagoa veamoya osi osi yate kanaleya huya yagaisayana ala yakefalela ania huya kanaleya huya yagaigahayanagi nagoa veamoya osi osi yatema kanaleya huya oyagaisayana ala yakefalela ania huya kanaleya huya oyagaigahae.
Tamakaya ma mopale monema kanaleya hutama kava oyagaisayana ikapinaga tama afenoyatema yagaisae huno otamamigahie.
Tamakaya alu veamogami yatema kanaleya hutama kavama oyagaisayana tamakaitami afenona otamamigahie.

Nagoke aliya kanomoa ‘Tole kava kanolatamogani aliya kanoania maisue.’ huno ohisie. Ania hisiana nagoke kava kanomofe ‘Haivaino naipa nagata aiya kano mainane.’ huno hugahianagi nago kava kanomofena ‘Nahaiya kano mainane.’ huno hugahie. Nago kava kanomona aipa amiteno nago kava kanomofe ‘Falote onahaiya kava hana kano mainane.’ huno hugahie. Tamakaya ania hutama Anumaya Kotienefe ma mopale mone fenoenefe ‘Ali lokaetana kava yagailateo.’ hutama hisayana haviya hugahie.” huno humaine.
Falasia vayamoya ani kea haviteya mone fenofema nehamaiya yafena tusiya huya kigia nehuya kamuge hatageya vaitenae.

Kigi hutayanagi Yisasia amakaifena mage hie “Tamakaya veamogami amaulagafina ‘Fatago anaga mainone.’ hutama nehayanagi Anumaya Kotia tamakupina ago agelama huno agemaine. Age-maineanagiya tamakaifema veamoya tamakeya ‘Tusia kanalenale kava nehae.’ huya nehaya kavafena Anumaya Koti aulagafina himanaage hia kava nehae.

Mukia kanafina vayamoya Moseseene Anumaya Koti amaune vayaene humainaya kea haviyanagi Yonima falote humainea kanaleti aepa hena Anumaya Koti kava yagailamatesia kanale mono kea tamahapaugetama mukia veamogatama ‘Anumaya Kotia kava yagailatesie.’ hutama hugahe tamayamufa aitama tusi ya maitama nehae.
Ikaene mopaene hano hugahianagi Anumaya Koti kema kae-malenaya kemoa nagoke kanoa afa ya kanala ohugahie.”
Nago kanomoma aama neataleno alu ama alisiana kumai kava humaine. Nagi nago ama anauamoa atalesigenoma mainesia ama alu kanomoma alisayana ania huno kumai kava humaine.
Nago kanoa tusia monea hanea kanomoa mukia kanafina kanalenale siotaaene kava vayamoya nehaya kava huno haesa kenaaene failino maineno kanalenale kavekeya neneane.
Neneanagino no fiamaalela nago kanoa afenomaa omale kanomona amumoa augafa alino hayagi-mainea kanoa mopale nemaiyane. Ani kanomo agia Lasalusie.
Ani kanomoa agesa mage huno havimaine “Afenomaa hanea kanomo nea kavemo atupa-napaa yogina nesue.” huno huteno emainegeya kalayagamoya amutetila me haene haene humainae.
Naa hageno maineno haenagaa afenomaa omale kanoa faligeya ensole anagamoya mevaleya Apalahamu mainele motageno maine. Mainegeno moneama hanea kanoa ania huno faligeya aliya mo hevaitenae.
Mo hevaitageno haniki-mainea kumapi umaineno augafa agata tusiya huno aigeno maineno agesaga huno anafinaga ageana amuga aluafi Apalahamuene Lasalusiene mainaageno anakemaine.

Anaketeno mage huno ke hie “Vae Apalahamuga naginagomogae kagaya tusiya huka kahauna hunato. Kahau hunateka Lasalusina hutegeno eno aya aginagoleti tipina ayeteno navefunale malesigeno tani tani nahaisie. Nagaya tusia atafi mainogeno tusia nagata neaiye.” huno hie.

Hianagi Apalahamua mage huno hie “Nafanenimoga kagaya nayona mopalema kanaleya huka mainana kanafina mukia kanalenale yakaa ago ali-mainananagi Lasalusia mukia havi yamaage ali-maine. Ani yafe kagesamoa aikalo hinageka havio. Menia Lasalusia ma kumate egenoa aipamoa kanale huno yasi yasi higeno mainegeka kagaya kaugafa kagataenena mainane.

Nago yana tagaya mauna kaiyagaene tamakaya mainaya kaiyagaene amunotifina Anumaya Kotia tusia ayo omale komugefa kafi-maleneanagiya ma kumate mainaya veamoya tamakaitega visaya amakesa haviya usaga humaiya ougahae. Ania huya kagaiene mainaya veanea esaga humaiya ma kaiyaga omegahae.” huno hie.
Higeno ani kanomoa mage hie “Naginagomogae nagaya tusiya huna tutu hugatena kalagi neauve. Lasalusina hutesanageno nenafa notega visie.

Visigeya faefua (5) nagananimoya mainagena nagaya tusia nagata aiya kumate emainoafe kagaya Lasalusina hutegeno visiaamo ala kefiti mage huno hisie ‘Tamaipama aiyahae ohinutamahena nagayama mainoa kumatela egahae.’ huno hamapaisie.” huno hie.
Higeno Apalahamua mage hie “Amakaya Mosesea humainea kene Anumaya Koti amaune vayamogami kene hanegi ani kemona hapaliya havisae.” huno hie.

Higeno moneama hanea kanomoa mage hie “Aao, naginagomogae, Apalahamuga, nani kea ohavinayanagino nagola fali-mainea kanoma komufiti hetino amakaitega mo hamapaisigeya kefo yaamia ataleteya amakaye huya aigagiya Anumaya Kotina amakua amigahae.” huno hie.

Higeno Apalahamua agaifena mage hie “Mosesema humainea kene Anumaya Koti amaune vayamoya humainaya kene amakupima omalenesayana nagola fali-mainea kanomoa komufitila hetino mo hamapaisiana ani kea haviya amakupina omalegahae.” huno humaine.

Yisasia agaiaene tokaeya nemaiya anagafe mage huno humaine kefo yama huo huno ayemavataga hisaya yana falote hugahianagi kefo yama hisaya kate tamavaleno visia kanomofena “Kefo kava nehananagika kana yana aligane.”

Ani kanomoa nagoa osi anaganihe “Kefo yama huo.” huno hisiana tusia kefo kava nehianagina tusia kana ya amigahue. Ala yafakefaleti ani kanomo ageyafi maleya nofi kiteya hage lipi hagayu hutalesayana ani kana yana afa avamete kana ya haneanagi nagaya tusia kana ya amigahue.
Amigahuanagi tamakaya kaye ho. Negafua kefo yama hinageka “Naa kavala ohuo.” huka kemakio. Amakigeno agayama agua aiyahaema hinageka aigeateka kefo yamaa ataleto.
Negafua nagoke yupa sevenia (7) kanalema kefo yama hugateteno ani kefo yafe “Nagua aiyahae nehue.” huno hisigekahena kagaya ania huka sevenia (7) kanale aigeateka kefo yamaa ataleto huno humaine.
Yisasiene tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya Anumayamofe mage hae “Kagaife havita tagupi maleta tametiti nehuna yana kagaya nagoene alika ayaaya hulato.” huya hae.

Hageno Yisasia mage hie “Tamakaya nagaifena havitama tamakupi maletama tamametiti nehaya kavala osi masatati yosamo alaga kanoa hanea avamete hutama osia havitama tamakupi malesayana ma yosahe mage hutama hapaigahae ‘Ma yosamoga kagaya aepa muki tagasi huka ala tipi hageka haiyo.’ hutama hapaisageno tamakai kea akave malegahie.” huno hamapaiye.

Tamakaipiti nago kanoa aliya nealia kanoamoa hoya aliyapi, afu kava aliyapi, ani aliyana alino hano huno esigenoa ala kanomoa ani aliya kanohe mage huno hapaisio “Kagaya aupaa me maifalu huka maineka kavela no.” huno hapaisio?
Aao ani kea ohugahianagino mage huno hugahie “Kagaya kavenia talo tala hunateka kenakaa faiteka kavenia alika me namigena hagotena netesugeka kagaya haenaga negane.” huno hugahie.
Anima hapaiya kema akave malenea yafena ala kanomoa “Kanale kava hanafe musekaa nehue.” huno hisifi? Aao ania ohugahie.
Tamakaya ania hutama mukia tamahapai-mainoa aliyana alitama avaya ayetetama mage hutama hiho “Tagaya kanale aliya anaga omainone. Tagaiti aliyanagita ago alune.” hutama hiho huno humaine.
Yisasia Yelusalemu ukahe viana Sameliaene Kaliliene amunopi katega umaine.
Nago kumate uvayi higeya tenia (10) fugita kali nealiya vayala aluale heti-maineya ala kefiti mage hae “Yisasiga ala kano mainanagi tagaila kahau hulato.” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia amaketeno mage hie “Tamakaya mono nopi kava vayate utama tamaugafa momaveliho.” huno higeya ani vayatega nevageno katega amaugafamoa eteno kanale humatene.
Kanale humategeya vafiti nagoke kanomoa augafa ageana kanale higeno eteno katega viaamo ala kefiti muse huno Anumaya Koti agi alisaga humaine.
Huteno Yisasite aiyafi mepe huno maineno aiyale alisoso nehuno “Kagaifena tusia musekaa nehue.” huno hie. Aiyale alisosoma hia kanoa Sameliati kanoe.
Yisasia ani kanoa ageteno mage hie “Nagesa havuana tenia (10) vaya ago alina kanale humatenofi? huna huanagi nainia (9) vayala hanate mainagekae?
Naa higeya ani vayayaga Anumaya Koti agia melisaga ohae? Mani nagoke kanoa alu kotegati emainea kanomoa agaiage Anumaya Koti agia melisaga nehie.” huno hie.
Yisasia ani kanomofena mage huno hapaiye “Kagaya hetika vuo. Nagaifema havika kagupi maleka kametiti hana yamo kagaila alino kanale hugate.” huno hie.

Nagoa Falasia vayamoya mage huya havigae “Na kanafi Anumaya Kotia aepa heno kava yagaigahie?” huya hageno Yisasia mage huno humaine “Anumaya Kotima kava yagaisia kanama falote hisiana tamaulagamoa oagesia kava huno egahie.
Veamoya ‘Malega hane. Amualega hane.’ huya ohugahagi haviho Anumaya Kotia tamakaipi ago kava yagaino maine.” huno hie.

Yisasia agaiaene tokaeya nemaiya anagafe mage huno hamapaiye “Haenagaa nago kanama falote hisigetama mage hutama hugahae ‘Ikapinagati emainea kanoa vayamo atenea nafanemona nagoke yupa kanoa agesune.’ hutama hugahayanagi afaa oagegahae.
Oagegahagi nagoa veamoya ‘Amugalega mainegi ageho.’ nehuya ‘Malega mainegi ageho.’ nehuyama hisagetamahena amakavela oviho.
Ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea nafanemona etena esua yamoa maa hugahie ikamoa nago kaiyaga aupaa aulumayamoma nehia avamete huno mukia kotega aivasa nehinagena nagaya etena egahue.
Egahuanagi hagoteya meni kanafima mainaya veamoya nagaifena ‘Kahaoteyakae.’ huya hunatesageno tusiya huno nagata aigahie.
Nagaya ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea nafanemona etena esua kanafima mainaya veamoya nayoma Noama mainea kanafima mainaya veamoya humainaya kavala hugahae.

Noama mainea kanafina kavela neneya tina neneya anema aliyamoene vele uyamoene mukia kanafina ani yafekeya amakesa havi havi huya mainageno Noaa ala tipi kalefi haisaga humaigeno tusia lina hogino mukia ani veanea alino haviya higeya ago fali hano humainayane.
Lotima mainea kanafina ani kava huya kaveene tiene neneya nagoa yaamia miya nehuya hoya aliyaamia nealiya noamia negiya mukia kanafina ani yafekeya amakesa havi havi humainayane.

Ani amakesale mainageno Lotia Sotomua neataleno umainea kanalela Anumaya Kotia ikapinagati tusia himanaage ata nelea yafayaga komopa hia kava huno asaga hulavino mukia veanea hamaegeya fali-mainayane.
Nagayama ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomona etena esua kanafima mainesaya veamoya nayona Loti mainea kanafima mainaya veamoya humainaya kavala ania hugahae.

Yisasima esia kanafina nagoa veamoya kumatega mainesaletila afenoyaamia alisaya yafena eteya nopinaga ohaisae. Nagi ania huya hoyafinaga mainesaya veamoya eteya noamilegama hanesea afenoya alisaya yafena ovisae.
Tamakaya Loti amoma hutenea kavafena tamakesa aikalo hinagetama havilama hutama haviho.

Nagoa veamoya hamaimuma hanesigeya ‘Mai yatia atafa hutalako huligahune.’ huya amakesama havisayana ani kanale mai yaamimoa fanane hugahianagi nagoa veamoya ‘Kanalelagita maisuna yatiene tahaimuene Yisasife tagesa nehavita afaa atalegahune.’ huya hisagenoa kanaleya huno mai yaamia aligatimatesigeya maige maige yana aliteya agola maigahae.
Tamahanepauve nagayama etena esua yupa ani kegela tole vekalatana nagoke sipale faeana mainesaagenofena Anumaya Kotia nagoke avalegahianagino nagola alitaye-talegahie.
Tole atalana tokaeana aliya nealisaageno Anumaya Kotia nagoke avalegahianagino nagomona alitaye-talegahie.” huno hie.

Higeya mage huya havigae “Anumayamogae mani kavala hana kumate falote hugahie?” huya havigageno Yisasia mage huno hamapaiye “Afumoma fali-mainesia kefafina hakikimoya yage yage huya alitalu hunemaiyanagi ikapinagati kanomona ania huna mukia veamogami amunopi egahue.” huno hamapaiye.

Yisasia mage hie “Mukia kanafina nunamuna hiho. ‘Kasalo tahae.’ hutama oataleho. Ani kema havisaya yafe nagola huvame ke tamahapaigahue.” huno mage huno hie “Nago ala kumatela Yasi kanoa maine. Ani kanomoa veanehe agesa havioamamino Anumaya Kotifena kolia nohiane.
Nagola megusa alagino ani kumatela maineno mukia kanafina ani Yasi kanomote ete ete huno mage huno nehiane ‘Nago kanomoa ali-haviya hunategi kagaya kaiyekenia havika fatago ho.’ huno havige.

Havige havige maino higeno ani Yasi kanomoa hagote kanafina ‘Kaya ohugahue.’ huno hu-maineanagi eteno haenagaa agu agesamoa mage hie ‘Tamage huna nagaya Anumaya Kotifeene veafeene kolia nohuanagi ma megusa amoa nagaite ete ete hia yamoa onahaiyanagina afaa kaiyekea havina fatago hugahue. Ania ohisuana mukia yupa ete ete hisigeno tusia kasalo nahaegahie.’ huno humaine.”
Yisasia mage huno hie “Fatago kava ohunea Yasi kanomoma humainea kehena havilama hutama haviho.

Anumaya Kotima hisia yafena na tamakesa nehaviye? Agaia havinoma hapalimatenea veamoya nateene kegeene mage huya havinegae ‘Ali-haviya hulataya veamogamina ageteka fatago huka kaiyekea humato.’ huya havige havige hisageno ani kea havisio? E, afaa havigahie. Ayaaya kanagefa maiteno amaya hisio? Aao tamahanepauve ali-haviya hu-neamataya veamogamina aupaa anonaamia humategahie. Nagaya ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomona etena esuana nagaifema haviya amakupi maleya ametiti nehaya veanea ma mopafina mainesao omainegahao?” huno humaine.

Nagoa veamoya amakaiami amaku amakesafiti “Kanale kava nehunageya nagoa veanea kefo kava nehaya anaga mainae.” huya nehaya veamogamifena Yisasia avame ke huno mage huno hie “Tole kanolatamogania nunamu hugahe mono nopi haiana umainae. Nago kanoa Falasia kanoe. Nago kanoa musufaya huno vaya amaugafaleti takisi mone aliliteno nehia kanoe.

Falasia kanomoa amunote mo hetino maineno Anumayamotega agaiahe mage huno hie ‘Nagaya nagoa veamoya nehaya kavala nohue. Musufayama haya kavala nohue. Fatago ohunaya veamogami augafa kavala nohue. Anele kumai nehaya kavala nohue. Mama mainenoma vaya amaugafaleti takisi mone aliliteno nehia kano kana ohunoe. Ani yafe musekaa nehue.
Mukia sotamo aliyapina nagaya tole yupa kavela mosina mainena mukia nealua yapitila teniama (10) malenofitila nagoke alitayena negamuane.’ huno hie.

Hianagi vaya amaugafaleti takisi monema aliliteno nehia kanomoa aluale maineno Anumaya Kotitega ke huno havigegahe hetimaineno ‘Nagaya kefo kano mainoe.’ huno ikapinaga agesaga ohuno ape huno havi kafa yonegino Anumaya Kotitega mage huno havige ‘Anumayamogae nagaya kefo kava hume hume nehauva kano mainoe. Nagaifena kalagi ainateka kahau hunato.’ huno havige.”

Yisasia mage huno hie “Nagaya tamahanepauve anima musufayama huno takisi monema aliliteno nehia kanomofena Anumaya Kotia ‘Fatago kano mainane.’ huno hutegeno nomaalega eteno umaineanagi hagote kanomofena ani kea hu oatene. Nagoa veamoya amakaiami amaugafa aliya haisayana Anumaya Kotia ‘Osi veane kanoa mainae.’ huno humategahianagi nagoa veamoya ‘Osi veane kanoa mainone.’ huya hisayana Anumaya Kotia amakia alisaga hugahie.” huno humaine.
Nagoa veamoya osi osi nafaneyaga Yisasite “Aya malesie.” huya amavaleya neageya agaiaene tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya ageteya “Naa kavala ohiho.” huya kemamaki-mainae.

Kemamakiyanagi Yisasia ani nafaneyagahe mage hie “Amatalegeya nagaitega eho.” higeya ageno mage hie “Nafaneyaga nagaite esaya yafena kahegi oamateho. Naa huya nafanemogami avamete maisaya veamoya mage hugahae ‘Tagaya tokiyatia omalenegi Anumaya Kotiga kava yagailato.’ huya hugahae.

Tamagelafa huna tamahanepauve nagoa veamoya nafane mainaya avamete maisaya veamoya mage hugahae ‘Tagaila tokiyatia omaleanagika Anumaya Kotiga kava yagailato.’ huya ohisayana Anumaya Kotima kava yagaisia kumatela ougahae.” huno hie.
Nago kava kanomoa mage huno havige “Kagaya kanaleya huka humavenelina kanomoga nagaya hanaa hutena agola maige maige hisua nahaimula alisue?” huno havige.
Havigegeno Yisasia kenonaa mage huno hie “Naa higeka nagaifena kanale kanoa mainane huka nehane? Anumaya Kotia agaiage kanale kanoa maine.

Kagaya Anumaya Koti kahegi kea ago havilinanagi ani kemoa mage huno humaine ‘Kumai he yana ohuo. Vayala hamaegeya ofaliho. Musufayana ohuo. ‘Ma kanomoa havi kava nehie.’ huka havigea huoato. Itakafokamo kea oatagaeka anakia alisaga huo.’ huno humaineane.” huno hie.
Higeno ani kanomoa mage hie “Nagaya nafanema mainoa kanaleti aepa hena mukia ani kema hana kea akave nemaloane.” huno hie.

Higeno Yisasia ani kea haviteno mage huno hie “Nago kavaene huo. Mukiama malenana mone fenoyayagaka alika fako faka huka moneamima omalenesia veane amamisanageno Anumaya Kotia ikapinaga hanea afenoyana kagaila kamigahie. Afenoyayagaka fako huka amamite amamite huteka nakave eno.” huno humaine.
Higeno ani kanomoa ani kea haviteno mone fenomaamoma kasagoma humainea yafe oatalesia agesa haviteno aipamoa tusi kanaage humaine.
Kanaage higeno Yisasia ageteno mage huno hie “Mukia mone fenoyaamima hanesia veamoya tusia kasageke huya ‘Anumaya Kotife kava yagailato.’ huya hugahae.

Nagola pulumaka kana afumo agia kemolomoa nekayamo kapima hai falesiana afaa yoyo huno hai falegahianagi mukia mone fenoyamaa hanesia kanomoa Anumaya Kotife ‘Kava yagainato.’ huno kasageke-voke hugahie.” huno humaine.
Higeya ani kea haviteya veamoya mage huya hae “Naama hu-mainesiana Anumaya Kotia hana veamogami amaku amamemaa aligatigahie?” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia mage hie “Veamogamina himamuamia omaleneanagiya ohugahayanagi Anumaya Kotia mukia kava hisia himamua haneanagino afaa aligatigahie.” huno hie.
Nage higeno Pitaa mage huno hie “Havio tagaya mukia yatia ataleteta kagai kakavela neone.” huno hie.

Higeno Yisasia mage huno hamapaiye “Tamage huna tamahanepauve mukia veamoya Anumaya Kotia kava yagaisia kea veanema mo hamapaigahena noamiene aamiene amasaamiene nepuamiene itaafoamimoene nafaneamiene amataleya visagenoa Anumaya Kotia mopalema mainaya kanalema atalenaya yaene nagoene nagoene anonaa ohavunamaa ya amamiteno haenagama falote hisia kanafina maige maige hisaya hamaimuene amamigahie.” huno humaine.

Yisasia agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagala hamaote amavaleno momateneno mage huno hie “Haviho tagaya Yelusalemu haisunageya mukia Anumaya Koti amaune vayamoya ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomonihema kae-malenaya kemoa efalote huno tamage hugahie.
Nagaila natafa huya Yuta vea omainaya vayate navaleya momamisageya nagaye hisifa kea hunateya hu-haviya hunateteya amavetuna henategahae.
Hegi kayoteti nahaeteya tavata nahaesageya hevainatesagena tole yupa komufina maitena tagufa kanale fali-mainesufitila etena hetigahue.” huno hie.
Hianagi Yisasiene tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya kea haviyanagi ani kemo aepamoa falaki-mainea yafe havilama ohunae.
Yisasia Yeliko kumate uvayi hugahe mo aupa higeno nagola aulaga asu humainea kanomoa kate mopale maineno monehe aukaya hie.
Aukaya maino nehigeya mukia veamoya agaseya eutele haya yafe “Naa higeya mukia veamoya nagaseya enevae?” huno hie.
Higeya “Nasaleti Yisasia neegeya kagaseya enevae.” huya hae.
Hageno ala kegefafiti mage huno hie “Yisasiga Tevitina aginagomogae nagaila kahauna hunato.” huno hie.
Higeya aulegama mainaya veamoya kemakiya “Ke ohuka maiyo.” huya hayanagi nagoene ala kefiti keha keha hie “Yisasiga, Tevitina aginagomogae kahauna hunato.” huno keha keha humaine.

Higeno Yisasia haviteno anile heti-maineno “Avaletama nagaite eho.” huno higeya avaleya ageno Yisasia “Naa hugatesue hugeka nehane?” huno havigegeno “Musekaa nehue nagaya etena naulaga agesua yafe nehue.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia agaifena mage hie “Kaulaga agegali huo. Nagaifema havika kagupi maleka kametiti hanafe kaulagamoa ago kanale hugate.” huno hie.
Higeno aupaa ani kanomoa agegali nehuno Yisasi akave neeno Anumaya Koti agi alisaga nehigeya mukia anile alitalu humainaya veamoya ageteya Anumaya Koti agia alisaga humainae.
Yisasia Yeliko kumate uvayi huteno agaseno alulega ugahe vie.
Nevigeno ani kumatela nago kanomo agia Sakiusia musufaya huno vaya amaugafaleti takisi mone aliyate kava kanogino moneamoa kasago humainea kanoe.
Ani kanomoa “Yisasia hanaa augafa kano neefigagina agesue.” huno hianagi aupa kanogiya yage yage humainaya veamoya agasageno “Hanaa huna Yisasina agesue?” huno humaine.
Yisasima visia katega aiyayeno uhagoteno nagola fiki yosafi moliteno haimaine.
Haino mainegeno Yisasia ani yosamo aepale neeno agesaga huno ageteno Sakiusifena mage huno hie “Kagaya aupaa elavio menia kagai nopi momaigahue.” huno hie.
Higeno Sakiusia aiyayeno laviteno tusia muse huno Yisasina avaleno nomaalega atene.
Avaleno vigeya veamoya aniama hia yana ageteya Yisasifena kalugalu ke vaiya mage huya hae “Kefo kavakeya maino nehia kanomo nopinaga maigahe viana havi kava hie.” huya hae.

Hayanagi Sakiusia hetino Anumayamofe mage huno hie “Havio Anumayaniamoga menia nagaya afenoyania amunopiti ali fako huna moneamima omale vaya amamigahue. Havigema huna moneamima musufa ali-mainoa monea etena foa (4) malete malete huna amamigahue.” huno humaine.
Higeno Yisasia mage huno hapaiye “Kagaya Apalahamuna aginagomoga mainanagi menia anagakaene kagaiene Anumaya Kotia tamaku tamamena ago alinegatie.
Ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomona fanane humainaya veafe amatiyena amaku amame aligatigahe emainoe.” huno hie.

Yisasia Yelusalemu uvayi hugahe higeya veamoya amaku amakesa mage huya haviye “Anumaya Kotia kava yagaisia kanamoa aupaa falote hugahie.” huya amakesa haviya yafe Yisasia mage huno nago avame kea hamapaiye.
“Nago kava kanomoa kava yagaisia tokiyaa aligahe ‘Ayaaya kotega mo mainena alitena etena egahue.’ huno humaine.

Ayaaya kotega ugahe nehuno tenia (10) aliya vayaamogamife ke higeya ageno monea ali-fako huno tueti (20) kina tueti (20) kina amamite amamite hie. Amamiteno mage huno hamapaiye ‘Mani moneleti aliyana aligeno ali kosa nehenagena nagaya etena ano.’ huno hamapai-maine.

Hamapaiteno ataleno umainegeya nagoa vayaamoya ani kava kanomofe amaipa haviya huteteya nagoa aliya vayala humatageya mo humakesa huya ‘Mage hutama hiho. Tagaya mani kanoma kavatima maisia yafena notahaiye hutama hiho.’ huya hae.
Hageno ani kava kanomoa kava yagaisia tokiyaa ago moliteno ani kotegati eteno monema fako huno amaminea aliya vayamogamife ‘Namagi mone halaya humalenafi?’ huno havisia yafe amakaife ke hie.
Ke higeno hagote kanomoa evayi huno mage hie ‘Ala kanomogae kagaya tueti (20) kinama naminapitila etena nagoene aliya alina kosa hua monene tu hataleti (200) kina alugeno hane.’ huno hie.

Higeno ala kanomoa mage huno hie ‘Kagaya kanale kano mainane. Kanaleya huka osi mone kanoa kaminofitila efi efi huka aliyana alinageno ala hiafe kagaila tenia (10) ala kumate kava yagaisane huna hapalinegatoe.’ huno hapaiye.
Higeno anile kanoa eno mage huno hapaiye ‘Ala kanomogae kagaya tueti (20) kina naminapitila etena nagoene aliya alina kosa hoa monene vani hataleti (100) kina alugeno hane.’ huno hie.
Higeno ani kanomofena ala kanomoa mage huno hapaiye ‘Nagaya faefua (5) kumate kava yagaisane huna hapalinegatoe.’ huno hapaiye.
Higeno nago aliya kanomoa anile eno mage hie ‘Ala kanomogae tueti (20) kinama naminana monea afaa omanafi haya kina katenoanagina menia ma ma alina me negamue.

Kagaya keage kanoma mainananagina kolikaa hue. Alu veamogami yana alika kaugafa hegeka omai kano mainananagika nago kanomoa hoyaafima kali-malenea yaene alika negeka omai kanogina kolikaa hue.’ huno hie.

Higeno kava kanomoa ani aliya kanohena mage hie ‘Kagaya havi aliya kano mainane. Kagaikaa kemo eteno maiyahae huno kaiyekea hugategahie. Kagaya ago havimainane nagaya keage kano mainoe. Alu veamogami yama alina naugafa hegena omai kano mainoanagina nago kanomoma hoyaafima kali-malenea yaene alina negena omai kano mainoanagika kagaya nagaifena ago havimainano?
Naa higeka monema nemalaya nopina monenia omaleka afaa malenane. Monema nemalaya nopima malenateasina menia nagaya nagoa ava monene aluleasine.’ huno hie.
Anile hetiya mainaya vayafe mage huno hie ‘Tueti (20) kinania hafaletama tu hataleti (200) kinama malenea kanomona amiho.’ huno hie.
Higeya amakaya kava kanomofena mage huya hapaiye ‘Ala kanomogae ani kanomoa tu hataleti (200) kina ago alino malene.’ huya hae.
Hageno mage hie ‘Tamage huna tamahanepauve nago yama hanesia veamogamina nagoene amamigahigi nago yama omalesaya veamogamina alilinesamaa hanafalegahie.
Kame veaniamoya nagaifena ‘Kavatima maisia yafena notahaiye.’ huya humainaya veala amavaletama naulagale hamaegeya faliho.’ huno hie.”
Yisasia anima hia kaiyekea huno hano humaleteno Yelusalemu ugahe uhagoteno katega umaine.

Petafasiene Petaniene ani kumatalana Olivi yosa hanea agoyamona agegayalega hanegeya aupaa uvayi hugahe hageno Yisasiene tokaeya nemaiya anagapiti tole kanolatana hunateteno mage huno hanapaiye “Atu kumate utana atupa notela hosi kana afumo agia tokigi ani tokimo nafanea ayetenayanagitana agegae. Ani tokimo nafanea vayala oamavalenea tokigi kalu hetana avaletana male eo.
Nagoa vayamoya ‘Naa higetana kalu hetana nevae?’ huya tanahavigesagetana mage hutana hio ‘Kava kanotimoa nago aliya aligahe higetaa neoe.’ hutana hamapaio.” huno hie.
Hunatea kanolatamogania mogeteana Yisasima hanapaiya yana ago moge falote humainae.

Ani tokimo nafanea kalu nehaageya ani afumo nefaya megeteya mage huya hae “Naa higetana tokimo nafanea kalu nehae?” huya hageana mage huana hae “Kava kanotimoa aliya aligahe higetaa kalu nehoe.” huana hamapaie.
Huteana Yisasite avaleana evayi huana kenaania anaugafaleti hateana ani afumo agupile yakai-malaageno Yisasia anile haino maine.
Haino maiteno katega nevigeya veamoya “Ala kanoa neie.” huya amaugafaleti kenaamia hateya visia katela yakaitenae.

Yisasia viayamo Olivi yosa hanea agoyamona agegayalegati enelavigeya mukiama melitalu humainaya veanene agaienema tokaeya nemaiya anagaaene tokiya avameyama higeya age-mainaya yafe aepa heya ala kefiti Yisasife muse nehuya Anumaya Koti agia alisaga hume hume neuya mage hae

“Ala kava kanomogae kanaleya huka neane. Anumayamo aliya aligahe hanageno hugategeka emainana kanomoga Anumaya Kotia kanale manu kamiteno kaya humaine. Ikapinaga amaipa falu hisaya yana hanesie. Anafi mainea Anumaya Kotina agai agia alisaga hisune.” huya hae.

Hageya anima melitalu humainaya veapiti nagoa Falasia vayala anifi maineya Yisasife mage huya hae “Humavenelina kanomogae kagaienema tokaeya nemaiya anagakamogamifena ‘Kea ohutama maiho.’ huka hamapaiyo.” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia mage hie “Nagaya tamahanepauve ani veamoya kema ohuya maisayana yafayagamoya amakaiami ani kea hugahae.” huno humaine.
Yelusalemu kumala aupate hanegeno Yisasia ageteno ani kumate veafe avite-maine.
Avia ateteno mage hie “Ma kea meni havisae huna nehugi nagaya tamaipamoa falu hisia yana tamamisua kano mainoe. Menima mainogetama ani yana falaki mainegetama noagae.
Nagola alu kana falote hisigeya kame vayatamimoya esayaamoya kegiya lafi humalenaya kegiyafi me kagi kagi nehuya ali haviya hulamategahae.

Anumaya Kotia tamaya hugahe neegetama agai kema ohaviya yafe kame vayatamimoya tamakaiene nafanetamiene mukia lafifima mainaya veanene falifalutisageya yafatetima kimalenaya nona mukia ani yafamoa mopafi helafilavigahie.” huno hamapaiye.

Yisasia ani kaiyekea huteno ala mono nopi hai faleno ageana ani nopi mainaya veamoya monehe ke huya nealiya veamogamina aepa heno amanatigahe nehuno mage hie “Anumaya Koti autamafina mage huno kae-maleneane
‘Nagai nona mukia veamoya Anumaya Koti agi ayeya ke huya havigesaya no hane.’ huno kae-maleneanagi
tamakaya musufa yama hisaya kava hugahena ma nopi emainae.” huno hie.
Mukia kanafina ani ala mono nopi hai faleno huge amavelige nehigeya ani mono note kava vayaene kahegi kema havilinaya anagaene mukia veate kava vayaene Yisasima haesaya kafena atiyemainae.
Ati maiya ayayanagi mukia veamoya agai kehema muse huya agima alisaga haya yafe ala vayamoya haesaya kana ageya ali falote ohunae.

Nago yupa Yisasia ala mono nopi maineno alitalu humainaya vayala humavelino Anumaya Koti kanale mono kea hamapaigeya ani kumate vayatamaene mono note kava vayaene kahegi kema havilinaya anagaene agaitega emainae.
Mage huya hae “Hana augafa ala kanomo hugategeka mani kavala me nehane? Tokiya yaka ta kamine?” huya havigae.

Havigageno Yisasia mage huno hie “Nagaya hagotena nago yafena tamahavigegahue nagaila nahapaiho. Yonima tima falematenea yana Anumaya Kotia hutegeno ani kavala me nehifi afa vayamoya hutageno lina fale neamate? Hufalote hutama nahapaiho.” huno hamavige.

Higeya “Naa maa hugahune.” huya mohu mehu huteya mage hae “Anumaya Koti hutegeno emaine.” hisunagenoa Yisasia “Naa higetama agai kea tamakupina nomalae?” huno hugahianagita tagaya “Afa vayamoya hutageno emaine.” huta hisunana mukia veamoya “Yonia Anumaya Koti aune kano maine.” huya ago humainayafe “Yafa kayoteti tahaesageta faliyafene.” huya mohu mehu huteya Yisasifena kenonaa mage huya hae “Tapiga hutene? Tagaya ohavinone.” huya humainae.
Hageno Yisasia mage huno hamapaiye “Nagaya ania huna hana kanomoa hunategena emainoe huna tamahaopaigahue.” huno hie.

Yisasia aepa heno veafe nago avame kea mage huno hamapaiye nago kanomoa vaini nofi alaga hoya kali-maleteno noagea vayafe mage hie “Etama hoyanilela yagaitama maineho. Ani nofimo alagafitila aye fako hutama aliho.” humateteno ayaaya kanagefa umaigahe alu kotega umaine.

Afu nelea kanafina ani hoyamona nefaa nago aliya kanoa hutegeno kava vayatega nagoa vaini nofi alaga aligahe umaine. Vigeya hoyale kava vayamoya atafa huya aikoliteya “Okamigahunagi ataleka vuo.” huya hageno ataleno umaine.
Utegeno nagola kayo kayo kanoa hutegeno viana ania huya aikoliteya agaye hisifa kava huteteya “Okamigahunagi ataleka vuo.” huya hageno ataleno umaine.
Utegeno eteno nagola kayo kayo kanoa hutegeno viana ania huya aikoligeno kolamoa higeya hoyafinagati avaleya malaga hagayu hutalenae.
Hagayu hutalageno hoyamona nefaa agesafinaga mage huno havie “Hanaa hisue? Nafanenimona nahau nayamopafi nenahaiya nafanenia hutesugeno visigeya agai kea havisao?” huno havimaine.

Agesa haviteno hutegeno nevigeya ageteya mage huya hae “Mamona mani hoyamona nefa nafane. Nefama falisigenofena mani nafanemoa hoyaa aligahianagita agaila ago haegetao. Haesunageno falisigeta mani hoya tagai ya hapaegahie.” huya hae.
Huteya hoyafinagati avaleya hagayu hutaleteya hayageno fali-maine. Yisasia mage hie “Naa hayanagi hoyamona nefaa naa humategahie?

Eteno hoyaafima kava yagai-mainaya vayala tavata me hamaesigeya faligahae. Fali hano hisageno alu vayafe ‘Hoyanilela kava me yagaiho.’ huno hugahie.” huno hie. Higeya anifima alitalu humainaya veamoya mage hae “Avonio ani kavala ohisie.” huya humainae.
Hageno Yisasia nago kea mage huno hie “Kae-malenaya kemoa mage huno humaineane
‘Vayamoya yafa noma kigahena nago yafafena ‘Haviya humaine.’ huya atalayanagi haenagaa ani yafamoa ‘Tusia kanale yafane.’ huya nomo ayetagenale malenae.’ huya kae-malenayane.” huno hie.
Huteno amakeno ute ete hiana higeno mage huno hie “Agoma kae-malenaya kemona aepaa havilinao?
Mukia veamoya ani yafatema asaga hulavisayana amaugafamoa atalaga huno haviya hugahianagi ani yafamoa vaya amaugafalema asaga hulavisiana ailatapeno aitalaga talago hutalegahie.” huno hie.
Higeya kahegi kema havilinaya anagaene mono note kava vayaene “Tagaife ani avame kea nehie.” huya ago haviteya “Menia avaleta kina nopi ategahune.” huya hayanagi vaya amauhe koli huya atalenae.

Ataleya ala tokiyaama hanea kanomote kaiyeke hutesiafe Yisasifena kesi amata huya maineya agesaya vayala humatageya moyevataga hisayafe ani vayala “Kanale fatago vaya mainone.” huya fau nehuya Yisasima hisia keleti atafa hugahe humainae.

Anima kesi katema vaiyaya vayamoya mage huya hae “Humaveli kanomogae tagaya havunana nehana kea fatago katekeya hana kanoe. Nagi kava vayaene afa vayaene nagoke katekeya hamapaika veama amaipa aye kea nohanagi tamage hutafa huka Anumaya Kotia ‘Ma kate vuo.’ huno hia kegeya taveneline.
Nagi takisi he yatela kava kanoa Sisana kanale amisupi oamisune?” huya havigae.

Havigageno Yisasia agaima ayevataga haya kea ago haviteno mage huno hamapaiye “Nagola alaga monea alitama naveliho.” higeya aveligeno “Mani alaga monelela ta augosaene ta agiene hane?” huno higeya “Sisa augosaene agiene hane.” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia mage huno hie “Sisana agaia yanagi agaila amiho. Nagi Anumaya Kotina agaia yana agaila amiho.” huno hie.
Higeya anima kesi katema vaiyaya vayamoya “Vaya amaulagafi hisia keleti atafa hugahe hunanagi tokiya ke hianagita atafa ohugahune.” huya nehuya hia kehe amakesa havi havi huya ke ohuya mainae.

Nagoa Satiusi vayamoya Yisasitega emainae. Ani vayala mage nehaya vayale “Falimainaya vayala eteya heotigahae.” huya nehaya vayalagiya Yisasite mage huya me havigae “Humavenelina kanomoga Mosesea tagaifena mage huno kae-maleneane ‘Nago kanoma nepuamoa nafanea oate kanomoma aama ataleno falisigenoa aganaamoa ani aala aliteno maineno fali-mainesia kanomofe anonaa nafane atesie.’ huno kae-maleneane.
Sevenia (7) konaga mainayanagino nepuamimoa aala aliteneanagino nafanea oate kano maineno falimaine.
Falitegeno anile aganaamoa aliteana nafanea oate kano falimaine.
Falitegeno anile aganaamoa eteno ania hute hute hayana mukia sevenia (7) konagamoya ani aala alitayana nafaneamia oateya afaa falimainae.
Haenagalafa ani aala falimaine.
Sevenia (7) konagamoya ani aala alitenayanagi fali-mainesafitima hetisaya kanafina hana kanomo ani aala aligahie?” huya havigae.

Havigageno Yisasia mage huno hamapaiye “Ma mopafi mainaya veamoya vea aligeya ane aligeya nehayanagi haenagaama falote hisia kanafina veamoya amatea kavama agoma huteya maineya fali-mainesafitima hetisaya kanafina vemoya anea oaligahae. Amoyaenena vea oaligahae.
Ikapinaga ensole vaya kana huya maisayafenagiya nagoene ofaligahae. Agoma fali-mainafitila heti-mainayafe Anumaya Koti nafaneyaga maigahae.
Fali-mainaya veamoya hetisaya kea Mosesea ago haviline. Nago osi yosale ala ata anefela leanagi ani osi yosa otene huno kae-malenea kefiti mage huno kae-maleneane
‘Anumaya Kotia Apalahamuagi Aisakiagi Yekopugami Anumaya Kotiami mainoe.’ huno humaineane.
Ani anagala fali-mainayanagi ‘Anumaya Kotiami mainoe.’ huno humaineafe amaku amamemoa ofaliya afaa mainae huno ani kea humaine. Anumaya Koti aulagafina ani anagala hamaimula afaa hane.” huno humaine.
Higeya nagoa kahegi kema havilinaya anagamoya agaifena mage hae “Humavenelina kanomoga kanale ke nehane.” huya hae.
Hageya Satiusi vayamoya koli huya nagoene haviokenae.
Yisasia mage huno hamavige “Veamoya Kalaisifena, Anumaya Kotima hutenea kanomofena, ‘Tevitina aginagomoa ma mopale kano maine?’ huya haya kemona aepaa naane hae?
Anumaya Kotifena yagame kae-malenaya avona Tevitia mage huno humaineane

‘Anumaya Kotia Anumayanimofena mage huno humaine ‘Tamaga nayatega ala vaya mainalega siale mopale emainesanagena kame vayakaa kaiyafi amatesugeya kagaife ‘Ago tagasane.’ huya hugahae.’ huno kae-maleneane.’
Tevitia Kalaisife ‘Anumayania mainane.’ huno humainegi naa higeno Tevitia haenagama atesia aginagomofena ‘Anumayania mainane.’ huno humaineane?” huno hamavige.

Mukia veanea maineya havigeno Yisasia agaiene tokaeya nemaiya anagafe mage huno hie “Kahegi kema havilinaya anagafena kayeho. Ani anagamoya ayaaya kena failiya yafena ‘Nelagafi notagafi?’ huya nehaya anagale. Vaya atagu nefaya kumapi mo vaiyatete nehuya ‘Naa vaya mainae huya ali falu fala hulatesae.’ huya nehuya mono nopiene imuleene ‘Ala vayaage alitalu huya nemaiya yatekeya maigahune.’ huya nehae.

Ani anagamoya keto aneyagahena ‘Mono nopima atalesaya monea tamiho.’ huya nehuya noamifima hanea yayaga musufaya huya moneamia ali hano nehaya anagalagiya vayala ayemavataga huya ‘Kanale anaga mainae.’ huya hisae huya ayaaya nunamuna humainae. Aniama nehaya anagamoya havi miyana tusiya huno amaugafa amagata aisia yaene aligahae.” huno hie.
Yisasia agesaga huno ageana veamoya moneamimoma haimainea veamoya “Monetia Anumaya Kotina amigahune.” huya pokisifi atalenae.
Atalageno ageana nagola monea omale keto amoa tole osi haesa monea anifi me vaimaine.
Me vaigeno Yisasia ageteno mage huno hie “Tamagelafa huna tamahanepauve ma ma monea omale keto amoa mukia hagoteyama metalaya veamogamina amakaseno ala mone metale.
Metaleanagi moneami-moma haimainea veamoya aliyamaa omalenea monegiya, afaa malenaya mone metalageno ani amoa mukia kavema alino nesia monea mukia metale.” huno humaine.
Nagoa vayamoya ala mono nofena mage huya hae “Anumaya Koti agi alisaga hugahe vayamoya kanale yafana aliya ma nona ali hilato huya kimalenae.” huya hae.

Hageno Yisasia mage huno hie “Ma ma neagaya nona nago kanama falote hinagenoa ani yafayaga mukia alino lagape aitalesigeno aposi-lavino tole yafamoa nago yafamo agupile aikalo huno omaigahie.” huno humaine.
“Hulave nelina kanomogae na kanafi ani kavala hugahie? Hanaa tokiya avameya ani kanama falotema hisia kanafina taveligahie?” huya havigae.

Hageno Yisasia mage huno hie “Nagoa veamoya havigema tamahapaisagetama havisao? Ohavisaya yafe kaye ho. Kasagoya vayala nagai nagi ayeya ‘Tamaugafa aligatisuna yafe Anumaya Kotia hulategeta neone.’ huya hisaya vayala evayi huya ‘Yisasima eteno esia kanamoa ago falote nehie.’ huya hisagetama amakavela oviho.
‘Nagoa kotega kame nehae. Nagoa kotegaenema tu hugahe nehae.’ huyama tamahapaisagetama kolia ohiho. Ani yayaga hagoteya hugahayanagi ma mopama hano hisia yayaga aupaa vayi ohugahie.
Nago nofi vayamoya nagoa nofi vayaene kamea hugahae. Ala kotega vayaene nago ala kotega vayaene kamea hugahae.
Tusia imila aligahie. Alu kotega alu kotega tusia kafu nehuya amakatesia kanaene tusia kali alisaya kanaene falote hugahie. Ikapinagatila tusia lamamayo aisia tokiya avame yayaga falote hugahie.

Ma ma tamahapauva kemoa falote ohunesigeya tamakaya nagai nakavema nehayafe vayamoya tamatafa huya ali haviya hulamateteya mono nopi kava vayateene Kamani kava vayateene kaiyekea hulamatesayafe tamavaleya kina nopi tamategahae.
Tamatesagetama ani kanafina nagai kea hamapaigahae.
Hamapaigahagi kaiyekema hulamatesaya yupa ‘Naane hugahune?’ hutama tamakesa ohaviho.
Nagi nagaya nagainia ani kanafina kanale ke hisaya kea tamahapaisugetama hisageya kame vayatamimoya ‘Havige hae.’ huya ketamia hefala okigahae.

Hefala okigahagi ani kanafina itatamimogamiene nelamafaene neputamimoyaene tamasatamimoyaene tamakaitami afamoene nelamafuyaene tamakaifena ‘Ma mainae.’ huya kaiyekema hulamatesaya yafena kame vayatamimogami amayapi tamavaleya tamatesageya nagoamogatamina tamahaesagetama faligahae.
Tamakaya nagai nakavema nehayafe mukia veamoya amaipa kafa helamategahae.
Ania hulama-tegahayanagi kanaleya hutama maigahae. Tamayolegefafina nagola haviya ohugahigi tokiyaage hutama hetitama maisayafe agola maige maige hisaya tamahaimula aligahae.”
“Kasagoya kame ati vayamoya Yelusalemu kumama kove kove hisagetama agesayana ani kumala ‘Ali hagagi-talegahae.’ hutama tamakesa havigahae.
Havisayana Yutia mainesaya veamogatama tamaiya-yetama agoyalega viho. Yelusalemu mainesaya veamogatama tamaiya-yetama ani kumala ataletama viho. Hoyafinaga mainesaya veamoya eteya kumaamilega omesae.
Ani kanafina mukia Anumaya Koti kema kae-malenaya kemoa falote huno tamage hisiafe Anumaya Kotia ani veala kefo yama humainaya anonaa ali haviya humategahie.

Ani kanafina amaipaene anene nute ani-linesia nafanemogami itaamimoyaenefe tusia nahau nehie. Ani kanafina Isaleli kumala tusiya huno haviya hugahie. Isaleli veamoya kefo yama humainaya anonatamia Anumaya Kotia havi kavala hulamatesigetama tusia tamaugafa lamakata yana aligahae.

Kame vayamoya nagoa veala ayaaya naepeleti hataga hamaesageya faligahae. Nagoa veala nofi humateteya amavaleya alu kotega Yuta veane omainaya veamogami kotega momategahae. Yuta vea omainaya veamoya eya Yelusalemu kumala mukia amaiyaleti ayelata-pesageno aposi-lavigahie. Aposi-lavisigeya ani Yuta vea omainaya veala anile emaige maige huya maisageno Yuta vea omainaya veamoya kava yagaisaya kanaamia hano hugahie.”

Yisasia nagoene mage huno hie “Yagene kanefiene ikamoene kugava kava huno alu kava humaveligahie. Nagi hage limoa ayepafa hulino ute ete hisia yafena mukia kotega ma mopafi veala tusia amamayo aigahie.

Ikatema hanea yamoya kanage kanage huya alu kate kate visaya yafena mukia ma mopafima mainaya veamoya ‘Na ya falote hugahe nehie?’ huya nehisageno amaipamoa kanaage nehinageno amaulagamoa kagi kagi hinageya asaga hulavigahae.
Mukia ani yamaa falotema hutesigena ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomona siate elavisugeya nagegahae. Tusia himamu yaniaene tusia hale yaniaene esugetama nagegahae.
Ani kugava yayaga aepama heno esigetamahena ‘Taugafa aligatisia kanamoa ago aupaa falote hugahe nehie.’ hutama hetitama tamanuna alisaka hutama ageho.” huno humaine.
Yisasia nago avame kea mage huno hamapaiye “Fiki yosaleene afa yosaleene ageho.
Ani yosamoa haegafa haisama falote higetamahena ‘Anuna nevalea kana falote hugahie.’ hutama nehae.
Ania hugahianagi anima tamahapauva kugava yama agenutamahena ‘Anumaya Kotia kava yagaisia kanamoa ago falote hugahie.’ hutama havigahae.
Nagaya tamage huna tamahanepauve meni kanafima mainaya veanea ofalinesageno ani yayaga falote hugahie.
Ikaene ma mopaene ago fanane hugahianagi nagai kemoa fanane ohugahie.

Tamakaitamile yagaiho. Havigu havili nelitetama nehutama havigu kave nesaya yafeene tamaugafale yaenefe tamakesa havi havi hisageno ani yamoma aiso hulamatesiana ala kanomo kalifumoma aupaa hatea kava huno esigetamahena talo tala ohunesageno esigi kava yagaitama maiho. Yisasia mukia ma mopafi veamogami amaulagale evayi hinageya atali-talu hugahae.

Ani yafena tamakaitami nagoke nagokemogatama kava yagaiho. Mukia kanale tokiyama alisayafena nunamuna higeno ani tokiya tamamisigeno ani havi yama falote hisia kanafina Anumaya Kotia tamaugafa aligatisigetama ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomoni naule hetigahae.” huno hamapai-maine.
Yisasia mukia kanafina ala mono nopi haino maineno humavenelino mukia kegela Olivi yosa hanea agoyafi haino nemaiyane.
Haino mainegeno koma neleana mukia veala “Agai kema havigahune.” huya mono nopina etele nehayane.

Ala imu negiya kanamoa meupa higeya ani imule hale oki kaihamena nenayane. Ani imua kafuahe kafuahe Anumaya Kotima Yuta veamogami amakinago-mogamima amaugafa aligatimainea kanahe amakesa havi havi hisaya imu alitalu huya negiyane.
Ani kanafina mono note hagote kava vayaene kahegi kema havilinaya anagaene Yisasina haesaya kafe atiyayanagi vaya amaulagahe koli humainae.

Koli nehageno aupaa Satania Yutasi aipafi hai fale-maine. Yutasi Isakaliotia Yisasina tuelufua (12) anagaene nemaiya kanogino neamataleno viaamo mono note kava vayaene mono note ati kava vayaene kea kea huno mage hie “Nagaya hanaa kateti agesila huna tamahapaisugetama Yisasina atafa hugahae?” huno higeya muse huteya “Aniama hisanageta mone hageta kamigahune.” huya hapaimainae.
Hapaigeno Yutasia “E, kanalele” huno huteno vaya kulata oaiya yate kesi kateti Yisasina movalesigeya atafa hisaya kafe ati ayemaine.
Hale oki kaihamema nenaya kanamoa hagote yupa falote hie. Ani yupa amaugafama aligatimainea yafe amakesa ali hao hisayafe nagola sipi sipi nafanea hemainae.
Yisasia Pitaene Yoniene hunateno mage hie “Utana Anumaya Kotima taginagomogami amaugafa aligatimainea yafe tagesa ali hao hisuna kavela utana talo tala hiageta monamano.” huno hie.
Higeana “Hana nopi mo lalo tala hisue huageka nehane?” huana havigae.

Haageno Yisasia mage huno hanapaiye “Havio ala kumate utana nago kanomoa ti kema hefilino visia kanoene mo fotu hutetana akave utana haisia nopi haitana ani nomona nefafe mage hutana havigeo ‘Hulavenelia kanomoa kagaife mage huno kahavige ‘Hana nopi nagaiene tokaeya nemaiya anagamoyaene Anumaya Kotima taginagomogami amaugafama aligatimainea yafe tagesa ali hao hisuna kavela nesune?’ huno hie.’ hutana havigeo.
Havigesaageno folamo huno anayapi kimalenea nona ago alino hilato humalenea nona, ala nokefa, tanavelisigetana ani nopi kavetia talo tala hio.” huno hanapaiye.
Hanapaigeana vaana hia kemoa mukia falote higeana Anumaya Kotia amaugafa aligatimainea kanahe amakesa havi havi hisaya kavela mo lalo tala humainae.
Kave ne kanamoa aupa higeya Yisasiene agaiaene tokaeya nemaiya anagamoyaene kave negahe folamole mainae.

Mainageno Yisasia mage huno hamapaiye “Anumaya Kotima taginagomogami amaugafama aligatimainea yafe tagesa ali hao hisuna kavela tamakaiene tokaeta nesuna yafe tusiya huno nenahaiye. Netena tusia nagata aisigena faligahue.
Tamahapauve ma kavela nagoene ma mopafi mainena onegahue. Anumaya Kotia agola tamaku tamamena aligatisigena ikapinaga etena negahue.” huno hamapaiye.
Nagola nofi alagamo timo agia vainie. Yisasia ani lima hanea keayola alino Anumayamotega muse huno havigeteno mage huno hamapaiye “Ma keayola alitama nete nete hiho.
Tamahanepauve menia ma vaini nofi alagamo tina nagoene onegahue. Anumaya Kotima kava yagaisia kanamoma falote hinagena etena negahue.” huno hamapaiye.

Naa huteno kaihamena alino nunamu huno muse huno havigeteno kolite kolite huno neamamino mage huno hie “Mamona nagaini naugafae. Tamakaife huna naugafa atalesugetama mukia kanafina ania hutama nete nete nehutama nagaifena tamakesa havi havi hutama maiho.” huno hamapaiye.

Higeya ani kavela netageno vaini nofi alagamo tima hanea keayola alino ania huno Anumayamotega muse huno havigeteno alino amamite amamite nehuno mage huno hamapaiye “Ma lina nagai kolaniae. Nahaesagena falisuana kolaniamoa tamakaifene huno take take hulavisiafe haegafa kea, Anumaya Kotiene hage-lafitama maisaya kea alino fatago hugahie.
Haviho vayamoya havisagi huno nagaila nagesi huno kame hunatesia kanomoa nagaiene tokaeno mainegetaa nagokepiti kavela alitaa nenoe.

Ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomona Anumaya Kotima hunatenea kate ugahuanagi vayamoya havisagi huno nagesi hunatesia kanomofena ‘Avonio nahau hanagi kagaya maigayo huna nehue.’ huno humaine.”
