Higeya amakaiami huge havige nehuya mage hae “Ani kavala tagaipitila ta hugahie?” huya mo havige me havige hae.
Yisasienema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya mage huya hae “Ta tagaipina tagaseno ala kanoa maine?” huya ani yateti ke vaimainae.
Ke nevaigeno Yisasia mage huno hie “Ma mopale ala kava vayamoya kemamakiya aliya ke huneamateya ‘Tagaifela kayone huka kanale kava kanoe huya hunatesae.’ huya nehae.
Nehayanagi tamakaya ania kavala ohiho. Tamakaipima agima hanesia kanomoa osi nafanemoma maiya avamete maisia kanomoa kava kanotami maineno kayo kayo kano maisie.
Ta ala kava kanoa maine? Mopale maineno kavela nenea kanofi? Kavela hatino neamamia kanofi? Afaa mopale maineno kavema nenea kanoa ala kano mainegi nagaya tamakaiene mainena kayo kayo hunelamatoe.
Nagaitema havi kanama falote higetamahena tamakaya onataletama nagaiene mainayane.
Ani yafena Nenafaa nagaife ‘Kava yagaigane.’ huno hunatenea kava huna tamakaila ‘Kava yagaigahae.’ huna nelamamue.
Naa hisugetama kavama yagaisua kumanilela umainetama nagaiene kavela nenetama kava vayamogami siale mainetama tenia (10) Isaleli nofi veamogamite kava yagaigahae.” huno humaine.

Saimonifena mage huno hie “Saimonigae, Saimonigae havio Satania tamakayama nagaila natalesaya yafe tamakaila tamatafa huno ayelamavataga hisia yafe ‘Ani vayala namio.’ huno Anumaya Kotifena havigeanagi nagaya kagaifena Saimoniga nagaifema ‘Tusia tokiyaa hane.’ huka kagupi maleka kametiti humainana kea oatalesanafe Anumaya Kotitega ago havigogi kagua aiyahae huka vayakamoya nagaifema amakupi maleya amametiti hisayafe amaya huo.” huno hie.
Higeno Saimonia kenonaa mage huno hie “Alaniamogae nagaya kagaiene kina hulaateteya taahaesagetaa faligahue huna nagu nagesa talo tala nehue.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia kenonaa mage huno hie “Pitaga kahanepauve meni kegela kokolemoa agea oainesigeka tagufa (3) kanale ‘Nagaya oagenoa kanoe.’ huka avane hunategane.” huno humaine.

Huteno nagoene mage huno hamapaiye “Monetamiene kutamiene tamaiya noene oalitama viho huna hulamatogetama vayana nagoa yafena aupa humainao?” huno higeya “Aao mukia yana kanaleya huta alimainone.” huya hae.

Hageno nagoene mage huno hie “Hagotena mani kea tamahapai-mainoanagi menia monetamima hanesimogatama alitama viho. Kutamima hanesi-mogatama alitama viho. Ayaaya naepetamima omalesi-mogatama kenatamia alu kanomona amisageno anonaa ayaaya naepea tamamisie.
Naafene nagaya tamahanepauve nayona Anumaya Koti kefima kae-malenaya kemoa mage huno kae-maleneane
‘Vayayagamoya agaifena mage hae ‘Havi kavakeya nehia kano maine.’ huya hae.’ huya kae-malenayanagi
nagaima hunatesaya kavama hisagenoa ani kemoa falote hisigeya ‘Tamage humaineane.’ huya hugahae.” huno nehie.
Higeya mage hae “Alatimogae ago tole ayaaya naepea ma hane.” huya hageno kenonaamia mage hie “Haile.” huno humaine.
Yisasia kumala ataleno mukia kanafi nehia kava huno Olivi yosa hanea agoyafi haigeya agaienema tokaeya nemaiya anagaamoya akave haimainae.
Ago anilega uvayi huteya mage huno hamapaiye “Anumaya Kotitega nunamu hutama havigeho ‘Satanima ayelavataga hisia yapina tavaleka ovuo.’ hutama havigeho.” huno hie.

Ani kea huteno neamataleno viaamo vayamoya yafama hagayu hutalageno nevia avamete viaamo aleya moye maineno Anumayamotega mage huno havige “Nenafagae falisua kava nehugi kahaisigekahena ani havi kanamoa satuage hia ti kana ti hanea keayola nahafalo. Afaa nagai nagu nagesa akave ohuka kahaisia kavala huo.” huno havige-maine.
Nehigeno ikapinagati nago ensole kanomoa tokiya memine.
Memigeno Yisasia augafafinaga malageno ageana tusia kanaage haiya yafe Anumayamotega nagoene tusiya huno havinegegeno amunamoa kolamoma hia kava huno mopafina take take hulavimaine.
Take take nehigeno Anumayamotega havigeteno hetino mogeana agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya hamauma haya yafe ago fae-mainageno momake-maine.
Momaketeno mage huno hie “Ae faetamage mainao? Hetitama Satania ayelama-vataga hisigetama asaga hu otavisaya yafena Anumayamotega nunamuna hutama havigeho.” huno hie.
Ani kea nehigeya kasagoya vaya evayi hageno Yutasia tuelufua (12) anagapi tokaeno nemaiya kanomoa amavaleno Yisasina me tako hugahe emaine.
Neegeno Yisasia mage huno hie “Yutasigae natako hisana yateti nagaila ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomonia nagesi huka kame vaya amayapi nategahe nehano?” huno hie.
Nehigeya agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya haya kavala ageteya mage hae “Alamogae ayaaya naepeleti hamaesuno?” huya hae.
Nehageno amakaipiti nago kanoa ala mono nopima hagote kava kanomona aliya kanoamona ayaaya naepeleti tamaga kaiyaga agesa aifakali-talegeno asaga hulavimaine.
Aifakaligeno Yisasia mage hie “Tu hisaya kavala ohiho.” huno nehuno ayana ani agesamo aepale maleno agesa alino kanale hutene.

Alino kanale huteteno mono note kava vayafeene ala mono note ati kava vayafeene Yuta vayatamaene agaima atafa hugahe aya vayamogamifeene Yisasia mage huno hamapaiye “Tamakaya nagaifena ‘Vaya nehamaeno musufaya nehia kano maine.’ hutama ayaaya naepene muki kayoene alitama neao?

Nagaya mukia kanafina efi efi huna tamakaiene ala mono nopina nemauvanagi natafa ohunayane. Anumaya Kotia meni kana tamayapi malegetama Satania hani yamo nefaa aliya alisia kanamoa ago falote humaine.” huno hie.
Atafa huya mono note hagote kava kanomo kumate avaleya vageno Pitaa akave anatino vianagi avatela ounegi ago aluale umaine.
Umainegeya ani no kegiya kovefi ata kae-maleteya mopale mainageno Pitaa amakaiene mopale umaine.
Ata anefete mopale mainegeno nagola aliya munamoa Pitana ageke huno ageteno mage hie “Ma kanoa Yisasiene vaiyatete nehia kanoe.” huno hie.
Higeno Pitaa avane huno mage hie “Aao ma munamoga nagaya oagenoa kanohe nehane.” huno humaine.
Osia maigeya nago kanomoa Pitana ageteno mage huno hie “Kagaya Yisasiene tokaetana nemaia kano mainane.” huno higeno Pitaa mage hie “Aao ma nemoga nagaya oagenoa kanohe nehane.” huno humaine.
Osia maigeya nago kanomoa tokiyaage kefiti mage huno hie “Tamage huna tamahanepauve ma kanoa Kalili kanoe. Yisasiene vaiyatete nehia kano maine.” huno hie.
Higeno Pitaa mage huno hie “Ma nemoga nagaya ohavinoa kehe nehane.” huno nehigeno anile aupaa kokolemoa agea aimaine.

Age aigeno Anumayamoa maiyahae huno Pitana ageke huno agegeno Pitana agesamoa aikalo higeno Yisasima hapaigeno havimainea kea mage huno humaineane “Meni kegela kokolemoa agea oainesigeka kagaya tagufa (3) kanale avane huka nagaila ali falakigane.” huno humainea kehe Pitana agesamoa aikalo higeno haviteno hatilavino viayamo tusia avi motemaine.
Yisasima atafa humainaya vayamoya kigi huneateya akaya ateya kayo aikoneliya aulagafina kenaleti nofi kisalu kiteneya mage huya hae “Kaune laga nehana kanogi tahapaiyo taya negahayae?” huya havigae.
Nagoene alu ke alu ke huya kigi huneateya akaya atenae.
Kotigeya Yuta vayamogami vayatamaene mono note kava vayaene kahegi kema havilinaya anagaene kanisolefi melitalu huteya Yisasina avaleya anile umaineya Yisasifena mage huya havigae.

“Tahapaiyo kagaya Anumaya Kotia taugafa aligatigahie huno hugatenea kano mainano?” huya hageno Yisasia kenonaamia mage hie “Nagayama tamahapaisugetamahena ‘Tamage nehane.’ hutama ani kea havitama tamakupina omalegahae.
Nagaya nago kema tamahavigesugetamahena kenonaania nahaopaigahae.
Meni aepa heno ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomona tusia himamua hanea Anumaya Kotina aya tamaga kaiyaga hanea siale umainena agola maige maige huna maigahue.” huno humaine.

Higeya mukia anile melitalu huya mainaya vayamoya mage huya hae “Kagaya ani kea nehananagi Anumaya Kotina nafaneamoga mainano?” huya havigageno “Tamakaya nagaifena tamage nehae. ‘Ani kano mainane.’ hutama nehae.” huno humaine.
Higeya mage hae “Agaia avayafiti ago haesuna kea hufalote higeta havune. Havigu nagoa vayamoya nagoa kea agaifena tahapaiyafenagita alu vayamogamifena ke ohisune.” huya humainae
Mukia kanisolefi metalu huya mainaya vayamoya hetiya Yisasina avaleya ala kava kanoa, Pailatite umainae.

Avaleya umaineya aepa heya “Ma kava huno kefo kavala humaine. Tagaya agonana mani kanomoa tagai nofi vayafena mage hie ‘Kamani vayamogami kea neataletama havi kava hiho.’ huno nehuno tagaifena ‘Takisi neamamiya yana Sisana oamiho.’ huno nehuno ‘Nagaya nagainia Kalaisina, Sauve kano mainoe.’ huno humaine.” huya hae.
Hageno Pailatia Yisasifena mage huno havige “Kagaya Yuta nofi vayamogami Sauveami mainano?” huno havigegeno Yisasia mage hie “Kagaikaa mani kea hai nehane.” huno hie.
Higeno Pailatia mono note kava vayafeene mukia alitalu huya mainaya vayafeene mage huno hamapaiye “Kefo kavama hu-mainesiafene huna atiyoana nago yamaa omale.” huno hamapaiye.

Higeya tokiyaage kefiti mage huya hae “Mukia Yutia kotega ute ete nehuno veafena mage humaine ‘Kamani vayamogami kea neataletama ma kava hiho.’ huno humaveligeya veamoya ‘Ani kava humategahune.’ huya hae. Kaliliti ani kavala aepa heno hulino hulino menia male nee.” huya hae.
Pailatia ani kea haviteno mage huno hamavige “Ani kanoa Kalili kano maineo?” huno hamavige.
Hamavigegeya “E, ani kumateti kanoe.” huya hageno “Heloti kava yagaimainea kotegati kanoe.” huya hageno haviteno hutegeno Helotite umaine. Ani kanafina Helotia Yelusalemu nemaiyane.
Helotia Yisasina ageteno tusia muse hie. Avagema haviana “Tokiyaage avameya yana nagoa hinagena agesue.” huno nehuno ayaaya kanale Yisasina agesia agesa havianagi noageane.
Yisasina ageteno mukia kehena havige havige hugeteana Yisasia nagola osi ke kanoa ohune.
Ke ohuno maigeya mono note kava vayaene kahegi kema havilinaya anagaene anile hetiya maineya tusia ke nehuya “Na kava ma kava huno kefo kavala humaine.” huya hae.

Hageno Helotiene ati vayaamoyaene Yisasina huhaviya huteteya kigi huteya kamuge hatageya vaineateya nagola kanale kena aliya me faitetageno Helotia Yisasifena “Pailatite etetama avaletama viho.” huno humatene.
Helotiene Pailatiene kame kanolata mainaaleti ani yupa anakaya ali konaga ayemainae.

Pailatia mono note kava vayafeene Yuta vayamogami kava vayafeene vayayagamogamifeene ke higeya melitalu hageno mage huno hamapaiye “Tamakaya ma kanomofena ‘Kefo kava huno veafena ‘Kamani vayamogami kea neataletama havi kava hiho.’ huno hamapai-maine.’ hutama nehutama nagaifena kaiyeke hutesane hutama avaletama ayanagi nagaya tamakai tamaulagafima havigoana ‘Kefo kavama humaine.’ hutama haya kavala tamage huno kefo kavala ohune huna nehue.

Aguafina agoanagino Helotia ania huno ageana tagaitefe ‘Eteka vuo.’ huno hutegeno eanagi ageho mani kanoa falisia augafa kefo kavala ohuneafe afaa kayo amina aumono maletena atalesugeno visie.” huno hie.
Hianagi mukia alitalu humainaya veamoya ailulupeya mage hae “Yisasina haegeno falino. Tagaya Palapasife nofipiti hano hisie huta nehune.” huya hae.
Ani Palapasia ala kumate vayayagamofe mage hie “Kava vayaene tu higetao.” huno huteno nago kanoa haegeno falimainea yateti avaleya kina hutenaya kanogiya agaife ani kea hae.
Hageno Pailatia “Yisasina atalesugeno afaa visie.” huno agesa havia yafe nagoene ke huno hamavige.
Hamavigegeya ala kefiti mage hae “Yafaga yosale nili hetama asaigeno falino. Yafaga yosale nili hetama asaigeno falino.” huya humainae.

Hageno Pailatia nagoene eteno mage hie “Naa higetama ani kea nehae? Hanaa kefo ya humaine? Nagaya atiyoana falisia kefo augafa kavala ohuneafe afaa kayo amina aumono maletena atalesugeno visie.” huno hie.
Ani kea hianagi amakaya tusi tokiyaage kefiti mage huya hae “Yafaga yosale nili hetama asaigeno falino.” huya tokiyaage kegeya hageno Pailatima hia kemona amakai kemoa hefalaki-maine.
Keamona hefalakigeno Pailatia haya ke haviteno Yisasifena “Yafaga yosale nili hetama asaigeno falino.” huno ati vayala hamapaimaine.

Palapasia vayafe “Kava vayaene tu higetao.” huteno nago kanoa haegeno falimainea yateti avaleya kina hutenaya kanoa tutu haya yafe Pailatia “Hano hanagi vuo.” huno huteanagi mukia vayamoya Yisasifena “Yafaga yosale nili hetama asaigeno falino.” huya haya kemo akave malene.

Yisasina avaleya katega neuya Sailini Saimoniene mo fotu humainae. Saimonia hoyafinagati kate enevigeya ati vayamoya motafa huya yafaga yosa aliya ayonale kofiteteya “Yisasi akave kofika vuo.” huya hutenae.
Mukia veamoya akave nevageno anemoya avi neateya hamau hume hume akave umainae.
Nevageno Yisasia maiyahae huno amaketeno mage hie “Yelusalemu mainaya anemogatama nagaifene hutama avia oateho. Avima ategahena tamakaitamihe neatetama nafaneyagatamimofeene avia atemateho.
Haviho haenagaa nago kana falote hisigeya mage huya hugahae ‘Namo anemogatama nafane oatetama numa noamisaya yafena tusia muse hutama maiho.’ huya hugahae.
Ani kanafina aepa heya ala agoyamofena mage huya hugahae ‘Kolilavika aiso hulato.’ huya hugahae. Osi agoyahena ‘Mehi alika aiso hulato.’ huya hugahae.

Nagaya haegafa ata kana huna mainoa kanoe. Kefo yana tamage huna ohunoa kano mainogeya mani kavala hunenatayanagi tamakaya avaifa ata kana hutama kefo kava nehaya veane mainayafe na kava hulamategahae?” huno humaine.
Yisasina haegahe avaleya neuya tolea kefo yama humainaa kanolataene hanaegahe anavaleya umainae.

Anu ayamufae huya nehaya kumate avaleya uteya yafaga yosale nili haeya asaimainae. Tole kefo yama humainaa kanolatane nago kanoa Yisasina tamaga kaiyagaa haeya asaimaleya nago kanoa haoga kaiyagaa haeya asaimaleya humainae.

Yisasia Anumayamotega ke huno mage huno hie “Nenafagae mani vayamoya kefo yama haya kavala ‘Naa kava nehune.’ huya havilama ohaya yafe aigeamateka kefo yaamia atalemato.” huno humaine. Higeya ati vayamoya kenaa aligahe musufayama nehaya yokalo lageno amakaseno haiya kanomo alimaine.

Aligeya veala alitalu huya hetiya aulu heya mainageya kava vayamoya kamuge hatageya vaineateya mage hae “Nagoa veala amaugafa aligatimainea kanogi Anumaya Kotima hau ayamopafi nehaiya kanoa taugafa aligatigahie huno hutenea kanoma mainesiana agaia augafa aligatino.” huya hae.

Anutema kaeya malaya avomoa mage huno hie “Mani kanoa Yuta veate ala Sauve kanoe.” huya kaeya malenae. Malenageya ati vayamoya ania huya kamuge hatageya vaineateya atuage nofi alagafiti tina neamiya mage hae “Kagaya Yuta vayate sauve kanoamima mainesanana kagaikaa kaugafa aligatio.” huya hae.

Nagola kefo yama humainea kanoa yafaga yosale nili heya asaimalaya kanomoa Yisasifena hu-haviya huteno mage huno hie “Anumaya Kotima taugafa aligatigane huno hugatenesia kanoma mainenuka kagaikaene taagaiene yosaleti ali hakao hugeta tavimano.” huno hie.

Higeno nagola kefo yama higeya yafaga yosale nili heya asaimalaya kanomoa ani kea haviteno kemakino mage huno hie “Vae kagaya Anumaya Kotifena kolia nohuka ani kea nehano? Kefo yama humainoa anonaa nagopi taagaila nilia laahaeya asailaa-tenayanagitaa faligahue.
Taagaya kefo yatiamo anonaa fatago kava hayanagi ma kanoa nagola osi kefo yamaa omalene.” huno hie.
Nehuno ani kanomoa Yisasifena mage huno hie “Yisasiga kava yagaigahema esana kanafina nagaifena kagesa havi namio.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia kenonaa mage huno hie “Tamagelafa huna kahanepauve meni kanoa nagaiene kanale maige maige hisaya kumatela tokaetaa umaigahue.” huno hapaiye.
Anile yagemoa euno amunokano higeno halemainea yamoa hano higeno mukia kotega tusia hanikino viayamo une kanalega eteno ali halemaine.
Ani hanimo aguafinaga ala mono nopima asaimalenaya kenagefamoa amunopiti aipa hulole humaine.
Aipa hulole higeno Yisasia ala kefiti mage huno hie “Nenafagae nagu nafanea kagai kayapi nemaloe” huno nehuno haimula atalegeno vigeno falimaine.
Faligeno ati vayate kava kanomoa anile maineleti mukia yama hia kavala ageteno Anumaya Koti agi alisaga nehuno mage huno hie “Tamage mani kanoa kefo yana nohia kanoe.” huno humaine.
“Na kava hutesafi agetetae.” huya melitalu humainaya veamoya mukia humainea kavala ageteya tusia hamau huneateya havi kafa yogime yogime noamilega ataleya umainae.
Vayanagi mukia veamoyaene Kaliliti akave emainaya aneyagaene aluale hetiya maineya hutaya kavala agemainae.

Nagola fatago kanoa Yosefee, Yuta vayamogami Kanisolefi maineanagi “Yisasina haegahune.” huya haya kehena “E, kanalele.” huno ohunea kanoa Yuta veamogami kotega Alimatiyae huya nehaya kumate nemaiya kanogino Anumaya Kotima kava yagaisia kanahe muse huno agava nemaiya kanoe.
Ani kanomoa Pailatite viayamo mage huno havige “Yisasina augafaa aligahe nehue.” huno havige.

Havigegeno Pailatia “E” higeno yafaga yosaleti haino ali hakao hulino elavino memaleneno kenaleti augafalela aigalaki kalaki huno haya kiteno alino viayamo he falageya kafimalenaya yafa kane, anifina vayala hevai oamatenaya yafakapima alino mo hevaitene.
Ani yupa Sapatihe haviya talo tala hisaya kanagino Sapatia ago evayi hugahe higeno Yosefea ani kavala humaine.
Higeya Kaliliti Yisasiene tokaeya emainaya aneyaga Yosefe akave uya yafakapima hevaitea yana mogemainae.
Mogeteya ayaamoya augafalema faletesaya yana manaage tiene masaveene talo tala nehageno Sapati kanamoa evayi higeya kahegi kemo akave maleya maifalu huya mainae.
Sota yupa kola otinegeya ani aneyaga ago talo tala humalenaleti manaage masavena aliya Yisasina hevaitenaya komulega umainae.
Uya mogayana komumo avayalema aiso humalaya yafana ago alikeli-talenageno avayalela omalegeya ani yafakapi hai faleya mogayana Yisasi augafa omalegeya mogemainae.
Omalea yafe “Hanate hane?” huya tusia amakesa nehavigeno anile tole kanolatana efeage huno alave alave hia kena failiana evayi hae.

Evayi haageya aneyagamoya ageteya tusi koli huya ape hageana ani tole kanolatamogania mage huana hae “Naa higetama afaa mainea kanohena falimainaya vayamogami matimatipina ati neayae? Mafina omaigi fali-mainefitila ago hetino umaine.
Kalili mainenoma tamahapai-mainea kea tamakesa hinagetama haviho.

Mage huno humaineane ‘Ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomonia kefo kava nehaya vayamoya natafa huteya yafaga yosale nili nahaeya nasaisagena faligahue. Falisugeya komufi hevainatesagena tole kana maitena fali-mainesufiti etena hetigahue.’ huno humaineane. Ani kehena tamakesa havitama havilama hutama haviho.” huana hae.
Haageya Yisasima humainea kehe amakesa haviteya matimatila ataleya vayaamoya agaya yaene haviya kene Yisasina alevenia (11) anagaamoyaene nagoa veaene hamapai-mainae.
Magatala kumate Maliaene Yohanaene Yemesina itaamoa Maliaene nagoa aneyagaene Yisasienema tokaeya nemaiya anagala hamapai-mainae.
Hamapaiyanagi amakesa haviteya “Afa ke nehae.” huya nehuya amakupi maleya amametitia ohunae.
Amametitia ohayanagi Pitaa hetino aiyayeno hevaitenaya yafakapi mope humaineno ageana Yisasina aye-gasagitenaya kenaage mogeteno agesa havi havi huno nomaalega eteno umaine.
Ani kanafina Yisasienema tokaeana nemaia kanolatana Emeasi kumate ugahe katega vaana anima vaa kamoa Yelusamuti Emeasi umainea kamoa osia ayaayaa alevenia (11) kilomita hane.
Ani tole kanolatana katega neuana ani kanafima humainaya kavafe kea kea hume hume umainae.
Neuana ani yafe kea kea hume hume neuana agaila havigegeno agaila havigegeno hume nevaageno Yisasia evayi huno anakave eno anakaiene tokaeya umainae.
Neuya anakaya agaanagi anaulaga alino aiso higeana Yisasina agelama huana oagenae.
Agelama ohaageno Yisasia mage huno hanavige “Naafe kea kea hume hume nevae?” huno hanavigegeana anile hetiana maineana anaugosa ayegatule-taleana mainae.

Nago kanomo agia Kaliopasia mage huno hie “Kagaya Yelusalemu kumate natu kano mainano? Mukia natu umainaya veamoya ani kanafima falote humainea kavala ago agemainayanagi kagaikage oagenano?” huno hie.

Higeno Yisasia mage huno hanavige “Na kavafe nehae?” huno hanavi-gegeana mage huana hae “Nasaleti Yisasi kehena ohavino? Ani kanoa aune kano maineanagino Anumaya Koti aulagafiene veamogami amaulagafiene tusiya huno tokiyaage yana talo nehuno tusia hetofa ke tahanepaiya kanoe.
Tahanepaiya kanogi tagai mono note kava vayaene kava vayatiene atafa huya kaiyeke huteteya ‘Faligane.’ huya yafaga yosale nili haeya asaigeno falimaine.

Fali-maineanagi tagaya agaifena Anumaya Kotia taugafa aligatigahe hutegeno emainea kanoe huta tametiti nehune. Nago yana olaga kanoa hae-mainayanagi menia tagaiene nemaiya anemoya natekefa hatilaviya Yisasina hevaitenaya komulega mogayana Yisasina augafa omalegeya mogeteya eteya eya mage huya me lahapaiye ‘Tagaya ensole kanolata agonageana mage huana tahapaie ‘Yisasia ago hetimaine.’ huana haa kea tahapaigeta neone.’ huya me hageta tagaya tusiya huta atalitalu humainone.
Atalitalu hunanagi nagoa tagaiene nemaiya vayamoya ani komulega uya mogayana aneyagamoyama haya kemoa mukia tamage hae. Ani kavala humaineanagi Yisasina oagenae.” huana hapaie.
Hapaigeno Yisasia mage huno hie “Tanakaya tanakesa nohavie. Mukia kema Anumaya Koti amaune vayamoyama kae-malenaya kea havilama hutana tanakupina omalenae.

Anima amaune vayamoya mage huya kae-malenayane ‘Anumaya Kotia taugafa aligatigahema hutesia kanomoa tusia augafa agata aisia yana aliteno tokiya hale yamaaene kumaalega eteno ugahie.’ huya kae-malenaya kea ohavinao?” huno hanavige.
Nehuno Mosesema kae-malenea kemona aepa heno mukia Anumaya Koti amaune vayamoya agaifema kae-malenaya kemo aepaa hugafino hanapaiye.

Hanapaigeana ugahema vaa kumatela ago uvayi haageno Yisasia nagoene hume hume ugahe hianagi anakaya atafa huana mage hae “Taagaiene faegane. Yagemoa ago tavifalesigeno aupaa hani kigahie.” huana haageno anakaiene faigahe noanifinaga haifalemaine.

Haifaleno mopale maineno anakaiene kave negahe kaihame kana maya alino nunamu huno muse huteno aposino neanamigeno anile anaulagamoa aigali higeana Yisasina agelama nehuana “Agayamagae.” huana nehaamaa anile fanane higeana nagoene Yisasina noagae.

Ani yafena anakaiani mohu mehu huana mage hae “Vaeha taagaya katega neoageno agaya kanale kea taahapaino Anumaya Koti ke kae-malenaya autamafi hanea kemona aepaa hugafino taahapaigeno taaipamoa hetigeno taaguamoa tusia muse hie.” huana hae.
Huteana aupaa hetiana eteana Yelusalemu vaana Yisasina alevenia (11) anagaamoyaene nagoa veayagaene alitalu huya mainageana momake-mainae.
Momakaageya mage huya hanapaiye “Tamage Anumayatimoa fali-mainefitila ago hetigeno Saimonia agemaine.” huya hanapaiye.
Hageana anakaya kategama humainea kavamo avagea hamapaiana mage hae “Kaihame maya alino aponesigeno anile taaulagamoa aigali higetaa Yisasina agelama hutaa agoe.” huana hamapaie.
Ani kea maiana nehaageno amunoamifi mo hetimaineno mage huno nehie “Tamaipamoa yasi nehinagetama maiho.” huno hamapaiye.
Hamapaigeya amakaya tusia koli nehuya atalitalu haya yafe Yisasifena “Hakalo emaine.” huya tusia koli hae.
Koli hageno Yisasia mage hie “Naa higeno tamaipamoa kanaage nehie? Naa higeno tamakesamoa tole-lole nehae?

Tamakaya nayaene naiyaleene ageho. Nagayamagae nagainia emainoe. Naugafalela navate hutama ageho. Hakalomona augafa ameene ayamufaene omalenegi nagaila naugafa nameene nayamufaene hanegi neagao.” huno hamapaiye.
Ani kea nehuno aiya ayana amavelie.
Amaveligeya ageteya tusia muse nehuya “Tamage nehifi havige nehie?” huya tole amakesa haviya amakesa havi havi nehageno mage hie “Nesua kavela haneo?” huno hamavige.
Hamavi-gegeya atafi kaemale noyame aliya amigeno alino amaulagafi mata mata huno nemaine.

Yisasia mage hie “Tamakaienema tokaena mainoa kanafina mage huna tamahapai-mainoe ‘Mukia nagaifema Mosesema kae-malenea kene Anumaya Koti amaune vayamoya kaemalenaya kene Yagame Avopi kaemalenaya kene mukia anima kae-malenaya kemoa falote huno tamage hugahie.’ huna tamahapai-mainoane.” huno hie.
Huteno anima kae-malenaya kemoa amakesa halenegeya havilinae.

Havilinageno “Mage huya kae-malenayane ‘Anumaya Kotia tamaugafa aligatigahema hutesia kanomoa tusiya huno agata aisigeno falisigeya hevaitetesageno tole kana augafamoa komufinaga haneteno fali-mainesifitila eteno hetigahie.’

Hetisigetama tamakaya Yelusalemu aepa hetama mukia mopale kumayagalega ute ete hutama mage hutama hamapaiho ‘Yisasia tamaku tamamena ago aligatiafe tamakesa havitama kefo yatamihena tamakua aiyahae hisagenoa Anumaya Kotia aigetamateteno kefo yatamia atalelamategahie.’ hutama hamapaisayafe kae-malenayane.
Mukia tamaulagafiti agemainaya kavafena hamapaiho.

Haviho nagaya Nenafama ‘Tamamigahue.’ huno humainea kanomona Alu Aotage Avamula tamakaite hutesugeno egahie. Egahianagi tamakaya mani ala kumate mainegeno eno anafinagati tokiya tamamisigetama alitetama nagaifena mo hamapaiho.” huno humaine.
Ani kea huteno amavaleno Petani kumate umaineno ayana alisaga huno mage huno hie “Anumaya Kotia tokiyaaleti tamaya hisie.” huno nehigeno Anumaya Kotia avalegeno ikapinaga haimaine.
Haigeya Yisasi agia alisaga nehuya tusia muse hume hume Yelusalemu eteya umaineya muki kanafina efi efi huya ala mono nopi maineya Anumaya Koti agia alisaga humainae.
Ehema Anumaya Kotima ma mopama taloma ohunea kanafina Yisasina nago agia Kemoe huno maineane. Anumaya Kotiene tokaeana mainaane. Ani Kemoa, Yisasie, Anumaya Kotiene nagoya hu-mainaane.
Mainaageno ehe kanafina ani kanoa Anumaya Kotiene tokaeana mainaane.
Anumaya Kotia hapaigeno Yisasia mukia yana talo hu-maleneane. Yisasia nago yana talo ohunea yana omalene.
Ani Yisasia mukia veala hamaimu neamamia kano maineanagino ani haimuamoa veala aye hale-ma-te yamaa hane.
Ani hale yamoa haniki mainea yapina aye hale-mainegeno hani-ki-mainea yamoa alino asu ohune.
Anumaya Kotia nago kanoa hu-tegeno emaine. Ani kanomo agia Yonie.
Ani kanoa hale yamo ke hama-paigahe emainegeya agai keleti mukia veamoya hale yafe “Tamage hane.” huya agaife amakupi maleya ametiti hisaya yafe emaine.
Yonia hale yamona aepaa omainegi afaa hale yamona aepaa hanea kanomofe hama-paigahe emaine.
Ani tamage hale yamaa ma mopale eno mukia veane aye hale-ma-tegahe emaine.
Ani Yisasia ma mopama talo hu-malenea kano emaineanagi ma mopafi veamoya ageteya aepaa havilama huya ohavinae.
Agaia talo hu-malenea mopale emaineamagi agaia veamoya avaleya falu fala huya oavalenae.
Avaleya oatageya nagoke nagokemoya falu fala huya Yisasina avale-mainaya veamoya Yisasife amakupi maleya amametiti nehaya veamogamina Yisasia tokiyaaleti “Anumaya Koti nafaneyagae.” huno hu-neama-te.

Ani veamoya vayamo kolateti oama-temagi Anumaya Kotiteti ama-tene. Vemo augafa ageno haye hu yateti oamatenegi Anumaya Kotiteti amatene. Veamoya nafane atesaya amakesa haviya yateti oamatemagi Anumaya Kotiteti amatene.

Yisasina nago agia Kemona atetegeno ve maineno tagaiene mainegeta agaila alu aotage tokiya hale yamaa neagone. Ani kanoa Anumaya Kotina aiya nagoke nafanea maineamagino nefaa agaia alu aotage tokiya hale yamaa amigeno ali falu huno kayoneage yaene tamageage hu yaene agai aguafina hiya hu-maine.

Yonia keha keha nehuno agaife mage hie “Ma kanomofe nayona mage huna tamaha-pai-mainoe haenagaa nago kanoa nagaila onatenele mainea yafe nagaila ago nagase-mainea kanoa egahiema huna tamaha-pai-mainoane.”
Ali falu huno kayone yamaa hiya hu-mainefiti tagaila mukiamogatina taya huno kanale manu tamiteno nagoa kanale manuene nelamie.
Tamage Anumaya Kotia kahegi kema malenea kea Mosesena ayapi maleteno hapaigeno hama-pai-mainiamagi ali falu huno kayone yaene tamage hu yaene Yisasi Kalaisiteti nealune.

Nagoke kanomoa Anumaya Kotina oagene. Tamage mukia veala oagenae. Aiya nagoke nafaneamoa Anumaya Kotiene nagoya huana mainaamagino ani kanomoa Nefa avate maineleti Nefana agaiage tave-nelino aepaa hu-gafino taha-pai-maine.

Isaleli vayamoya Yelusalemu mainaleti Livae nofi vayaene mono note kava vayaene hu-ma-tageya Yonife “Kagaya tagae?” hutama havigeho huya hama-pai-mainae. Hama-paigeya mo havigageno Yonia ma ke huno hama-nepaiye.
Yonia ani ke fala-kino ohunegi ani kea hu falote huno mage huno hie “Nagaya Kalaisi, Anumaya Kotima taugafa ali-gatigahe hu-tenea kanoa nagaya omainoe.” huno hie.
Higeya “Ani kanoa omaimagi kagaya tagae? Ilaiyaga mainapi?” huya havigageno “Aao nagaya ani kanoa omainoe.” Yonia make huno higeya “Nagi Anumaya Koti aune kano mainapi?” huya hageno “Aao.” huno hie.
Higeya “Taha-paiyo kagaya tagae? Hu-la-tenaya vayamogamina kenonaamima hama-paisuna kea kagesafiti kagaika aliyafe naane ke nehane?” huya havi-negae.
Nehageno Yonia kenonaamilela mage huno hama-nepaiye “Nagaya ma kano mainoe. Nage aina kame kotegati keha keha hisua kano mainoe. Aisaiyaa Anumaya Koti aune kanomoa nayo hu-malenea kea mage huna nehue
‘Anumaya visia kana alitama hilato hutama ali fatago hiho.’
huno hu-maineane.” huno hie.
Anima havigesia kema aliya vaya vayala Falasia vayamoya hu-ma-tenae.
Ani vayamoya Yonife mage huya havi-negae “Kalaisigaene Ilaiyagaene Anumaya Koti aune kanoenema omaineka naa higeka tina fale neamatane?” huya havi-ge-mainae.
Havigageno Yonia kenonaamilela mage hie “Ma nagaya titeti fale nelama-toamagi tamakaipina nagola oagenaya kanoa he-ti-maine.
Heti-maineamagino ani kanomoa haenagaa egahie. Nagaya afa kano mainoamagina agai aiyalela ayesuana onategahie.” huno hu-maine.
Yonia Petani kumate Yotani timona atu kaiyaga maineno veane ti fale neama-teno mani kea hu-mainea kehe mehavi-ge-mainae.

Faeteya kotigeya Yisasia Yonitega eneegeno Yonia ageteno mage huno nehie “Ageho mani kanoa Anumaya Kotina Sipi sipi nafaneae. Haenagaa haesageno falisia yateti ma mopale veamogamina kefo yaamia ali-talesia yafe emaine.
Ani kanomofe nayona mage huna tamaha-pai-mainoe ‘Haenagaa esia kanomoa nagaila onatenele mainea yafe nagaila ago nagase-mainea kano egahie.’ huna tamaha-pai-mainoane.
Nagaya agaila aepaa oagenoanagi Isaleli veamogamina Yisasina amave-ligahe tina mo fale-ma-tesoe huna emainoane.” huno hie.
Yonia mage huno hama-pai-maine “Anumaya Kotina Alu Aotage Avamuamoa nama kana huno ikapinagati elavino eayamo augafalela emainegena age-mainoe.

Nagaya agaila oagenoanagi Anumaya Kotia ti fale-ma-to yate hu-natenea kanogino mage hie ‘Kagaya agegane nagaini Alu Aotage Avamumoa elavino nago vemo augafalema emaisigekama agesana vemoa veamogamina Alu Aotage Avamualeti fale-ma-tegahie huka havigane.’ huno higena havi-mainoane.
Nagaya ani kema hia yana ago age-mainoleti tamaha-nepauve ma kanoa Anumaya Kotina neamo maine huna nehue.” huno hie.
Faeteya kotigeya Yoniene agaiaene tokaeana nemaia kanolataene eteya he-tiya mainae.
Yisasia nevigeno Yonia ageke huno ageteno mage hie “Anumaya Koti Sipi sipi nafanea atu maine.” huno higeana Yoniene tokaeana nemaia kanolatana ani kea haviteana Yisasina akave nevae.
Akave nevaageno Yisasia mai-yahae huno anaketeno ke huno hana-vige “Naafe neae?” huno higeana anakaya mage hae “Lapaiga hanate nemaine?” huana nehae. Lapai tagai kefina hu-mave-lina kanoe huno hie.
Yisasia mage huno hie “Etana megeo.” huno hana-paigeana agaiene nevaageno une kigeana nomaa mogeteana ani kanalela agaiene mainae.
Yoni kema haviteana Yisasi akavema umainaa kanolatapitila nago kanomo agia Etalue ani kanoa Saimoni Pitana aganaamoe.
Etalua hagoteno nepuamona Saimonife mo atiyeno mogefalote huteno mage huno hapaiye “Anumaya Kotima taugafa ali-gatigahema hu-tegeno emainea kanoa Kalaisina nagaya ago agoe.” huno hie.

Huteno Saimonina avaleno Yisasite nevaageno Yisasia ageke huno ageteno mage hie “Kagaya Saimoniga Yonina nemofogae kagai kagia mage huna nemaloe Sifasigae Pitagae.” huno nehie. Ani agilatamogania nagoya hu-mainae. Tagai kefina yafamogae huno malene.
Faeteya kotigeno Yisasia Kalili visia agesa havino vilegati Filipina mogeteno mage huno hapaiye “Kagaya nakave eno.” huno hapaiye.
Filipia Petesaita kumate kanoe. Ani kumala Etalugani Pitagani kumale.

Filipia Nataniolona moge-falote huteno mage huno hapaiye “Nago kanomofe Anumaya Koti amaune vayaene Moseseene mono autamafi kae-malenaya kanoa tagaya ago age-falote hunana agaya Nasaleti Yisasie Yosefena nafaneamo maine.” huno hie.
Higeno Natanioloa mage huno hie “Nasaleti kanale yana falote hisifi? Falote ohugahie.” huno higeno Filipia mage huno hie “Eka mego.” huno hapaiye.
Hapaigeana neaageno Yisasia Nataniolona ageteno mage hie “Ageho Isaleliti tama kanolafane. Mani kanoa nagola havigea omalenea kano maine.” huno hie.

Higeno Natanioloa mage huno havinege “Nagai aepaa na yu havimainanane?” huno havigegeno Yisasia mage hie “Filipia kagaila moge ohunegeka kagaya fiki yosamo aepale mainanagena nagaya ago kage-mainoe.” huno hie.
Higeno Natanioloa mage hie “Hulaveli kanomoga Anumaya Koti nafane mainane. Kagaya Isaleli kotega ala sauve kano mainane.” huno hie.

Higeno Yisasia Nataniolofe mage hie “Fiki yosamo aepale mainanagena nagaya kage-mainoafe tamage nehane huka kagupi maleka kametiti nehano? Haenagaa tusia ala kavayaga efalote hinageka agegane.” huno hapai-maine.

Yisasia amakaife mage hie “Tamagelafa huna tamaha-nepauve tamakaya ikamoma ai-halenagetama neagetama ikapinagati emainoa kano vayamo natenea kanomonilela Anumaya Kotina ensole anagaamoya naugafalela haiteya laviteya nehisagetama agegahae.” huno hama-nepaiye.
Tole kana maiteya Kalili hanea kumala Kenae nehaya kumate nago kanomoa a aligahe higeno Yisasina itaamoa anima ama aligahema hia nopi umaine.
Umainegeya “Yisasiga kagaienema tokaeya nemaiya anagakaene eho.” huya ke hageya umainae.
Umaineya nenageno nofi alagamo tina hano higeno Yisasina itaamoa Yisasina mage huno hapaiye “Nofi alagamo tina hano hie.” huno hanepaiye.
Higeno Yisasia mage hie “Aoko ‘Naa maa huo.’ huka nahaopaiyo kagai yana omalene. nagaya tokiyania amavelisua kanaa falote ohune.” huno nehie.
Nehigeno Yisasina itaamoa kavema talo talama huya amamiya veanehe mage huno hama-paiye “Nago kema hinagetama agai ke akave maleho.” huno hama-nepaiye.
Yuta vayamogami mono kemoa mage humaine “Mukia kanalela mukia yana sese hutama ti faleho.” huno humaineane. Ani yafe sikisia (6) yafa ti keayola vani hataletia (100) lita hanea keayola anilela hane.
Hanegeno Yisasia kavema talo talama huya neamamiya veanehe mage huno hama-paiye “Mani li keayoyakafina hefitama havateho.” huno hama-paigeya hefi havate-mainae.
Havatageno “Kavetema kava yagai-mainea kanole osia hefitama alitama momiho.” huno higeya hefiliya umainae.

Hefiliya momigeno ani kavetema kava yagai-mainea kanomoa ani lina hagotenoa titafa haniamagi haenagaa eteno nofi alagamo ti hapaegeno neno akekeana higeno ani lina ea kamaa oageneamagi hefiyama aliyama aya veanemoyage havimainae. Kavetema kava kanomoa ama alia kanohe ke huno mage huno hapaiye.
“Mukia vayayaga hagote kanalela hagaage tina amamigeya mageno amamu higeya haviyama hia tina neamamiya yamagi kagaya hagote kanalela afa li tamiteka haenaga hagaage tina nelamine.” huno nehie.

Manima taloma hia tokiya avame yana Yisasia hagote kanale Kalili hanea kumala Kenae huya nehaya kumate ani kavala talo nehuno tusia ala tokiya hale yamaaene amaveligeya agaienema tokaeya nemaiya anagaamoya ageteya aliya amakupi maleya amametiti hu-mainae.
Naa hu-maletegeya Yisasiene itaamoene aganaamoyaene agaienema tokaeya nemaiya anagaamoyaene Kapaneamu laviya osi kanaa anile mainae.
Nago ala imua Anumaya Kotima Yuta veayamogami amakinagomogami amaugafama aligatimainea kanahe amakesa havi havi nehaya imu negiya kana evayi hugahe higeno Yisasia Yelusalemu haimaine.

Yisasia ala mono nopi haino mogeana vayayagamoya pulumaka afuma sipi sipi afuma namama malenageya veamoya miya hisaya yafe malenageno Yisasia mokemaine. magi nagoa vayamoya alu kotega nehanea monea nealiya ani kumatema nehanea monea anonaa amamisaya yafe folomole maleya mopale mainageno momakemaine.
Momaketeno nofiteti alifagagi maleneno mukia vayama sipi sipima pulumaka afuyakaene mono nopiti ali helafi neataleno monema ayeyahaema nehaya vayamogami folomoamiene moneamiene ali helafi-talene.
Namayagama miya nehaya vayafe mage huno hamapaiye “Alitama eviho. Mafina nenafa nona tamakaya alitama maketi kumala talo ohiho.” huno nehie.

Nehigeya agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagaamoya avopima hanea kehe amakesa nehaviye. Ani kea mage huno haneane “Anumaya Koti nofena mukia kanale magesa havi havi huna nokaa kanaleya huno hanesia yafe aluya huna muse nehue.” huno kaemalenegeya havimainayane.
Havimainayamagiya Yuta vayamoya eteya havinegae “Aniama hana kavala ta tokiyaleti nehane? Tokiyakaa hane huta havisuna yafe nagola oagenona tokiya avame yana hugeta agamano.” huya nehae.
Nehageno Yisasia kenonaamia mage huno hama-paiye “Ma ala mono nona alitama lagape aitaletesagena talia (3) kanale etena ani nona alina hetigahue.” huno nehie.

Higeya Yuta vayamoya mage huya hapaiye “Kekamoa kanale ohia ke nehane talia (3) kanale ani nona alina hetigahue huka nehanamagi vayayagamoya foti sikisia (46) kafufi mani nona kimalenaya none.” huya nehae.
Huya hageno Yisasia ani avame kea hiamagi ani mono nofema hiana agaia augafahe nehie.

Yisasima falitenoma he-ti-mainea kanafina agaienema tokaeya nemaiya anagaamoya ani kema humainea kehena amakesa havimainae. Avopima hanea kene Yisasima humainea kene “Tamage humaineane.” huya amakupi maleya amametiti humainae.
Imuma negiya kanale Yisasia Yelusalemu maineno oagenaya tokiya avame yana higeya ageteya mukia veanemoya “Tamage nehie.” huya amakupi maleya amametiti humainae.
Hayamagi Yisasia mukia veanemogami amakua ago amakea yafe agua noamamie.
Naafene amakupima hanea yana ago age-mainea yafe Yisasia mukia veamogamife “Tamakupima hanea yana naha-paiyo.” huno ohune.
Nago Falasia kanoa Yuta vayate ala kava kanoamimo agia Nikotimasie.

Nago kegela ani kanomoa Yisasite eno mage huno hie “Humave-nelina kanomoga tagaya ago havimainone kagaya humaveli hama-veli nehana kanomoga Anumaya Kotia hu-gategeka emainane. Kagaya oagenaya tokiya avame yana nehane. Anumaya Kotia kagaiene omaineleasina ania kavala ohateasine. Ani yafe tagaya ago havimainone Anumaya Kotia hu-gategeka emainane.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia mage huno hie “Tamage-lafa huna kaha-nepauve anafinaga kanomoma nago kanoma haegafa huno oatesiana Anumaya Kotima kava yagai-mainea kumala oagegahie.” huno hie.
Higeno Nikotimasia mage huno hie “Alopa kanomona hanaa huno ateleasine? Itaamo aipafinaga eteno hai falesigeno nagoene eteno atesie huka nehapio?” huno havinege.
Havigegeno Yisasia mage huno hie “Tamage-lafa huna kaha-nepauve titetiene Anumaya Koti Alu Aotage Avamumotetiene oatesiana Anumaya Kotima kava yagai-mainea kumatela ougahie.
Amaugafama hanea veamoya augafa hanesia nafane amategahayanagi Anumaya Kotina Alu Aotake Avamumoteti atesia kanomona Alu Aotage Avamumoa haimula amigahie.
Nagaya mani kema hua kea ‘Nagoene eteka nato huka huo.’ huna hua kehena havika kamayoa aika atali ohuo.

Yasimoa agaia hau yate alino visia yana kaulagamoa oagene. Afaa uhuhu uhuhu hia kea haviteka hanategatima aepa heno falote hia kaene vaiyea kaene oagenane. Yasimoma hia avamete huno Anumaya Kotina Alu Aotake Avamumoa nago kanomona neateana noagone.” huno hie.
Higeno Nikotimasia mage huno havige “Ani yana hanaa huno falote hugahie?” huno havinege.
Havigegeno Yisasia mage huno hie “Kagaya Isaleli veane hu-maveli hamaveli nehana kano mainanagi naa higeka ohavinane?
Tamage-lafa huna kaha-nepauve age-mainona yafe kaha-nepauve havilinona yafe kaha-nepauvanagi mani kea tamakaveno hu-neatae.
Nagayama ma mopale yafe ago kaha-nepauvanagi ‘Tamage nehane.’ huka havika kagupi maleka kametiti nohanagi ikapinaga yafema kaha-paisugeka hanaa huka havika kagupina maleka kametitia hugane?
Nago kanomoa ikapinaga ohainegi nagaya ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomona nagainiage ikapinagatila ma mopafina elavi-mainoe.
Mosesea kame kotega maineno osifavea talo huteno yosale malegamaeno alisaga hu-mainea kavala menia ania huya ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomonina navaleya alisaga hugahae.
Alisaga hisageno mukia veamoya ‘Tamage nehie.’ huya amakupi maleya amametiti hisaya veamoya agola maige maige hisaya hamaimula aligahae.”

Anumaya Kotia aiya nagoke nafanea maineanagi ma mopafi veanehe tusiya huno hau ayamopafi haigeno ani aiya nagoke nafanea hu-tegeno elavino emaine. Emainegeta tagaya nagoke nagokemogata agaife tagupi maleta tametiti hisunana haniki-mai yapi tegelege nehia atafina ougahunanagita agola maige maige hisuna tahaimula aliteta maigahune.
Anumaya Kotia nafaneamona mopale veane kaiyeke hu-mateno nofi hu-matesia yatela hu-tegeno omenegi mopafi veane amaku amamemaa ali-gatisiafene huno hu-tegeno emaine.

Emaineanagi nagoa veamoya Yesasifena amakupi maleya amametiti haya veala Anumaya Kotia kaiyeke huno nofila hu oama-tegahianagi nagoa veamoya Anumaya Kotina aiya nagoke nafanehe haviya amakupi omaleya amametiti nohaya yafe Anumaya Kotia ago kaiyeke hu-ma-teteno ago nofi hu-ma-tene.

Kaiyekema hu-mate yamo aepaamoa maa hu-maine, aye hale-ma-te kanoa ma mopafina ago emainegeya veamoya kefo yana nehuya hani yapi maisaya yafe muse huya hale yafena nohamaiya yafe Anumaya Kotia ago kaiyeke hu-ma-tene.
Mukia kefo kava huge huge nehaya veamoya hale yafena nohamaigeya “Hale yapima visunageya kefo yatia age-falote hugahae.” huya hale yapina nomae.
Tama kava nehaya veamoya hale yapima neeya mage nehae “Anumaya Kotia taya higeta kanale yana hu-mainonafe mukia veamoya agesae.” huya nehae.
Naa hu-maleteno Yisasiene agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagaene Yutia umaineya nagoa kana umaiteya veanea mono tina fale-ma-tenae.

Fale-ma-tegeno Yonia Ainonie nehaya kumate maineno ania huno veanea fale-ma-tene. Ainoni kumala Salimie nehaya kumamo aupate hane. Kasagoya tiyaga anilega haneanagiya veamoya ete ete hageno tina fale-ma-tene.
Yonina avaleya nofipina oatenageno ani lina fale-ma-tene.
Yonienema tokaeya nemaiya anagaene nago Yuta kanoene mono tima fale yamo auava yafe mohu mehu huya ke vai-mainae.

Ke vai-maleya Yonitega mage huya mo hane-paiye “Hulave nelina kanomoga Yotani limona ame haupalega kagaienema mainegeka agaifema taha-pai-mainana kanomoa menia agaia tina fale nea-ma-tegeya mukia veamoya agaitega utele nehae.” huya hae.
Hageno Yonia mage huno hie “Anumaya Kotia nagoa veamogamina nago yana oamamineleasina oalileasine.
Tamakaya agoma hu-mainoa kea havilinae. Mage huna hu-mainoe ‘Nagaya Anumaya Kotima taugafa ali-gatigahe hu-tenea kanoa omainogi nagaya uhagotena nevisugeno agaya haenaga egahie.’ huna hu-mainoe.

Nago vemoa ama aliana agaia a maineanagi ayama hu-mainea kanomoa agava huno ama ali-mainea kea haviteno tusia muse nehie. Aniama hia avamete huna Yisasitega veama nevaya yafena nagaya tusia muse nehue.
Yisasi agimoa nagaila nagaseno ala huno haigahianagi nagai nagimoa afete tavigahie.” huno hie.

Yonia mage huno hie “Anafinagati elavi-mainea kanomoa mukia yana amakase-maineanagi ma mopaletima efalote hu-mainea kanomoa ma mopale kano maineno mopale yafeke kea nehie. Ikapinagati elavi-mainea kanomoa mukia yana amakase-maine.
Ikapinagati elavi-mainea kanomoa age-mainea yafeene havimainea yafeene hama-nepaiyanagi nagoa veamoya ani kea haviya amakupina nomalae.
Nomalagi nagoke nagoke veamoya hu-mainea kea haviya amakupima malaya yafe ‘Anumaya Kotia tamageage kano maine.’ huya hu-lokiya nevaiye.
Anumaya Kotia hu-tenea kanomona Anumaya Kotia Alu Aotage Avamula nago haupa nago haupa huno oaminegi mukia hiya huno aminegeno Anumaya Koti kea nehie.
Higeno nefaa nafaneamofena tusia muse nehuno mukia kava yagaisia yana ayapi malene.

Nagoa veanemoya nafaneamofema ‘Tamage nehie.’ huya amakupi maleya amametitima hayana agola maige maige hisaya hamaimula ago ali-mainayanagi nagoa veamoya nafaneamoma hia kema akavema omalesayana ani hamaimula oaligahae. Anumaya Kotia ani veamogamina aipa haviya hu-mateno kaiyekea ago hu-neamate.”

“Yisasia Yonina agaseno mukia veamogamina tina fale-ma-teno hai-maine.” huya haya ke Falasia vayamoya havimainae. Yisasia agaia tina fale oama-tenegi agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagaamoya fale-ma-tenae.
Falasia vayamoya ago ani kea haviya yafe Yisasia haviteno Yutia neataleno Kalili eteno ugahe amuno kola mogaseno via kotega Samelia mo vaiyatete hu-maine.
Nago Samelia kumamo agia Sika. Ani kumala Yekopua Yuta vayamogami amakinagomoa nafaneamona Yosefe aminea hoya hanelega hane. Yisasia ani kumate evayi hu-maine.
Yekopua ti he-nefia kagemuyola hanegeno yagemoa amuno-kano higeno Yisasia kama vaiye-mainea yafe kasalo haegeno ani kagemuyo ti avayale eno mopale maine.
Mopale emainegeno nago Samelia amoa ti he-figahe neegeno Yisasia mage hie “Tina namigena nano.” huno hie.
(Yisasienema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya anile omainagi kave miya hugahe ala kumatega umainae.)

Yuta vayaene Samelia vayaene amakoya huya amahaote amahaote huya nemaiya yafe ani Samelia amoa mage huno hie “Kagaya Yuta kano mainanagi nagaya Samelia a mainogi naa higeka nagaifena tina namigena nano huka nehane?” huno havinege

Higeno Yisasia mage huno hie “Kagaya Anumaya Kotima amuse yama kamisia yafema havimainateasina tifena nagaila nahavi-gateasine. Tima namio hia kanoma nagemainateasina tifena nahaviganagena maige maige hisana tina kamuleasine.” huno hie.
Higeno ani amoa mage huno hie “Ala kanomoga ani li komua afe yapi hanegi tima he-fisana keayola omalegi hanateti ani maige maige hisua tina he-fika namigane?
Yekopua, taginagomo ani kagemuyola tamineane. Yekopua nafaneyagaaene agaia afuyagaene ani komufitila ne-mainae. ‘Agaila agase-mainoe.’ huka nehapio?” huno hie.

Higeno Yisasia mage huno hie “Mukia veala ma lipiti nesayana eteya lifena amakegahianagi nagoke nagoke veamogamima amamisua timoa amakusafinaga kapae nehagea ti kana huno lavige lavige hisigeya maige maige hisaya hamaimula amamigahie.” huno hie.
Higeno ani amoa mage huno hie “Ala kanomogae ani lina namigena nano. Namisanagena nagoene onahaugahianagina malela tima he-figahena etena omano.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia mage huno hie “Negavena mo ke hu-lika male eno.” huno hie.
Higeno ani amoa mage hie “Nenavea omaiye.” huno higeno Yisasia “Nenavema omaiyema hanana tamage nehane.”
“Kagaya faefua (5) negaveya mainayane meni kanafina nago vene mainananagi miya hu-ga-tenaya negavea omaine. Mani kea tamage huka naha-nepaine.” huno hie.
Higeno ani amoa mage huno hie “Ala kanomogae nagaya ago havimainoe kagaya Anumaya Kotina aune kanoa mainane.
Taginagomoya ma agoyale Anumaya Koti agia alisaga nehayanagi tamakaya Yuta vayamogatama ‘Yelusalemu Anumaya Koti agia alisaga nehaya kumala hane.’ hutama nehae.” huno hie.

Higeno Yisasia mage huno hie “Ma amoga nagayama tamage huna kaha-paisua ke havika kagupi ai-maleteka kametiti huo. Nago kana falote hinageno ma agoyaleene Yelusalemuene Anumaya Koti agia alisaga ohugahagi alu kumateti kumateti agia alisaga hugahae.

Tamakaya Samelia veamogatama agima alisaga nehaya kanomona age-lama hutama oagenae. Tagaya Yuta veamogata agima alisaga nehuna kanomofe havilama hu-mainona yafe agia alisaga nehune. Tamaugafa ali-gatisia kanoa Yuta vayapiti falote nehie.

Nago kana falote hugahie. Ani kana ago falote hu-maine. Nenafa agima alisaga hisaya veamoya tamage huya amaku amamemaafiti Nenafa agi alisaga hisaya kanamoa ago falote hu-maine. Nenafana amaku amamemaafiti agima alisaga hisaya veanehe ati neaye.
Anumaya Kotia augafa omalenea avamula mainea yafe agai agima alisaga hugahena veamoya amaku amamemaaleti tamage huya agia alisaga hiho.” huno hie.
Higeno ani amoa kenonaa mage huno hie “Kalaisia, Anumaya Kotima taugafa ali-gatigahie huno hu-tesia kanoma esia kea nagaya ago havimainoe. Esiana mukia yafena taha-paigahie.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia kenonaa mage hie “Nagaya nevayana kakaienema mainena kema nehua kanoa mani kano mainoe.” huno hie.

Mani kea nehigeya agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagala eteya neeya Yisasima amoenema kea kea haayafe ageteya tusi amakesa havi havi hayanagi nagoamoya “Naafe nehane?” huya amofena haviokenae. “Naa higeka ma aene kea kea nehane?” huya Yisasina haviokenae.

Ani amoa ti kena neataleno ala kumatega uno anifima mainaya veanehe mage huno hama-paiye “Mukia nayoma hu-mainoa yama naha-paiya kanoa etama megeho. Ani kanoa Anumaya Kotima taugafa ali-gatigahema hu-tenea kanofi?” huno hie.
Higeya kumala neataleya Yisasitega emainae.
Yaufa neageya Yisasienema tokaeya nemaiya anagaamoya Yisasifena mage hae “Hulave-nelina kanomoga nesana yana hanegi no.” huya nehae.
Nehageno Yisasia mage huno hie “Nagaya oagenaya kavenia hane.” huno hie.
Higeya ani anagaamoya amakaiami huge havige huya mage hu-mainae “Nago kanomo nesia kavela ago alino me mainefi?” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia mage huno hie “Nesua kavela ma hane hu-na-tenea kanomoma haisia kavama huna naminea aliyana alivaya ayesua yana kavenia hane.

Veamoya nehaya ke mage hutama nehae ‘Foa (4) ika maitesunageno afuma nelea kana falote hugahie.’ hutama nehafi? Nagaya tamaha-nepauve tamakaya hoyafina age-lama hutama ageho. Ani hoyafina ago afu-le-maine. Anima hia kava huya veamoya nagai kema haviyama amakupi maleya anametiti hisaya yafe ago afu-le-mainae.

Afuma leana Anumaya Koti kema havisaya yafe ayama hisia kanomoa anonaa aligahianagi aya hu-mainaya vayala amakupi maleya amametiti hisayana agola maige maige hisaya hamaimula aligahae. Aligahayanagi ani hoyafima avina yama negalia kanomoene afumalegeno ayama huno nealia kanomoene nagoya huana musena hugae.
Manima agoma hu-mainaya kea ‘Nago kanomoa kali-malegeno nago kanomoa nenaa nealie.’ huya haya kea tamage nehae.

Nehagi nagoa veamoya kasageke huya anima nagai kema ohavinaya veamogamina Anumaya Koti ke ago hama-pai-mainagi tamakaya ayama hugahena ani vayate ago hu-lama-togetama hama-pai-mainayanagiya amakupi malesagetama afaa nenaage aligahae.” huno hie.

Ani amoma hu-mainea kehe mukia Samelia veamoya Yisasife haviya amakupi maleya amametiti nehae. Ani amoa mage huno hu-maine “Mukia hu-mainoa yana ago naha-pai-maine.” huno hu-mainea kehe haviya amakupi maleya amametiti hu-mainae.
Yisasite evayi huya mage huya hae “Tagaiene maisane.” huya havigageno Yisasia amakaiene tole kana maine.
Mainegeya kasagoya veamoya agai kema haviya yafe amakupi maleya amametiti nehae.

Amametiti nehuya ani amofe mage huya hapaiye “Menima kagai kema havuna yafe Yisasina tagua amita tametiti nohunagi tagayama agai kema tagaiti haviteta tagupi maleta tametitia nehune. Menia nehavune mani kanoa ma mopale veamogati taugafa ali-gatigahe emaine.” huya nehae.
Anile tole kana maiteno Yisasia ataleno Kalili umaine.
Yisasia agaia nayona mage huno hu-maineane “Nago mono ke hama-nepaiya kanomoa agaia vayaamogamipi maineana vayaamoya ‘Ala kanomo kegi havigetao.’ huya nohae.” huno hu-maineane.

Hu-maineanagi Kalili evayi higeya ani kumate veamoya hu falu fala huteya muse-kase hu-mainae. Naafene ani veamoya Yelusalemu ala imu ki-mainaya kanale Yisasima mukia yama hu-mainea yama moge-mainaya yafe hu falu fala huteya musena hu-tenae.

Musena hutetageno Yisasia eteno Kalili hanea kumala Kena kumate uvayi hu-maine. Ani kumatela Yisasia tifena higeno nofi alagamo ti hapae-mainea kumale. Yisasia anile umainegeno nago kamani kava kanoa, Kapaneamu kumate kanogino, neamoa kali ali-maine.
Kali nealigeno nefaa “Yisasima Yutiati ago Kalili emaine.” huya haya kea haviteno aupaa nafanea neataleno Yisasite eno mage huno hie “Nafanenia falisia kava nehigi melika kanale huto.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia mage huno hie “Tamakaya tokiya avame yama oagenutamahena nagaifena tamakua havi onamitama tamametitia ohugahae.” huno hie.
Higeno ani kamani kava kanomoa mage huno hie “Ala kanomogae nafanenia ago faligahe nehigi afaa kaiyayeka nagaiene eno.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia mage hie “Kagaya afaa vuo. Nafanekamoa ofaligahigi afaa maigahie.” huno higeno Yisasima hia kea havino akuafi maleteno ametiti nehuno umaine.
Emainea kate eteno maitagifeno nevigeno aliya nafaneamoya me fotu huteya mage huya hae “Kagaila nafanekamoa ago kanale hu-tegeno maine.” huya me-hae.
Me hageno “Na kanale aepa heno kanale hu-tene?” huno hamavi-gegeya “Ega yagemoa ali tagifeno nagokete evigeno ani amuko-nakoma haiya kalimoa kanale hu-tene.” huya hae.

Hageno nefaa agesa haviteno mage hie “Tamage yagemoa ani kanaale enevigeno Yisasia ‘Nafaneka ago kanale maine.’ huno naha-pai-maine.” huno nehuno agaiaene mukia anagaaene Yisasife haviya amakupi maleya amametiti hu-mainae.
Yisasia Yutiati eteno Kalili emaineno aniama hia kavala napa tu (2) kanale tokiya avame yana hu-maine.
Haenagaa Yuta veamoya ala imu Yelusalemu negiya kana falote higeno Yisasia anilega hai-maine.

Yelusalemu kegiyafi nago fiana sipi sipi afuyagamo fiana hane. Ani fiama hanelela ti kotuna male-maine. Ani li kotumo agia Yuta vayamogami kefina Petesaitae. Ani kotutela faefua (5) fugagieta nona hane.
Mukia kali veala aulaga asu hu-mai anagaene aiya avayu hu-mainea anagaene aiyaaya api hu-mai anagaene ani fugagieta noyagafi alitalu huya fae-mainae.
Nago anile nemaiya kanomona kaliamoa teti eitia (38) kafu hu-maine.
Yisasia anima faeno mainea kanoa mogeteno “Mani kanoa ayaaya kana kalia alino maine.” huno huteno mage hie “Kalikamoma hanoma hisia yafena muse nehapio?” huno havige-maine.

Havigegeno kali kanomoa Yisasife mage hie “Humave-nelina kanomoga tima aikalafuma nehia kanalema naya huno navaleno tipi natesia vayala omaiya yafe nagainige oanagi nagaila ago nagaseya tipi aupaa nevae.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia mage hie “Hetika fae omanakaa nealika ka vuo.” huno hu-maine.
Higeno aupaa kaliamoa kanale hu-tegeno hetino fae omanaa nealino ka umaine. Kanalema hu-tenea kana Sapati kanalele.

Ani yafe Yuta vayamoya kaliama hano hutea kanomofe mage hae “Meni kana Sapati kanalele. Naa higeka faesana omanaka alika nevane? Tagaima kahegi kemoa Sapati kanalela ani kavala ohuo huno hu-maineane.” huya hae.
Hageno kenonaamia mage hie “Kalinia alino kanalema hu-na-tea kanomoa mage huno naha-pai-maine ‘Fae omanakaa nealika vuo.’ huno hu-na-tene.” huno hie
Higeya mage huya havigae “Mani kanoa hana kanomo kaha-paigeka faesana omanaka alika nevane?” huya hae.
Hayanagi mukia veama anile alitaluma hagenofena Yisasia aluale ago umainegeno anima kaliama hanoma hutea kanomoa mage hie “Oagoa kanomo ani kea hu-natene.” huno ha-mapaiye.

Haenagaa Yisasia kanale hu-tenea kanomona mono nopi mainegeno mogeteno mage hie “Kagaya ago menia kalikaa hano hu-ga-tegeka kanale huka mainanagi kefo kavala nagoene ohuo. Kefo kavama hisanana nagoa kana ya aligane.” huno hie.
Higeno mani kanomoa viayamo Yuta vayafena mage huno hama-paiye “Yisasia alino kanale hu-natenea kanoe.” huno nehie.
Hianagi Yisasima Sapati kanalema kaliama alino kanalema hu-tenea yafena Yuta vayamoya aepa heya amaipa kafa heteya Yisasina aliya haviya hu-neatae.
Yisasia mage huno hama-nepaiye “Nenafaa mukia kanalela aliyana nealigena nagaienena ania huna aliyana nealue.” huno hie.

Mani kehena Yisasia “Anumaya Kotia nagai Nenafae.” huno nehuno “Nagaya Anumaya Kotiene nago kana kana hutaa mainoe.” hunoma nehia kene Sapati kanale kahegi kema atagae-mainea yafeene Yuta vayamoya nagoene ke vaiteya “Haegahune.” huya hu-mainae.

Yisasia mage huno hie “Tamage-lafa huna tamaha-nepauve Nafaneamoa agaiage nagoke kavala nohianagi Nenafama nehia kavala age-maineafe ani kavala nehie. Nenafama nehia kavala Nafaneamoa ani kavala nehie.

Nenafaa Nafaneamofena aguafina nehaigeno agaima mukia nehia kavala ave-nelie. Ave-ligeno ala kavama ago hu-mainea kavala agaseno haenagaa tusia ala kavakefa ave-linegetama agetama atali atalu hugahae.
Nenafaa fali-mainea vayala ali he-ti-mateno hamaimua neamamianagino Nafaneamoa ania huno haiya veamogamina hamaimula neamamie.
Nenafaa nago kanomona fako hu noateanagi mukia veala fako hu-ma-tesia tokiya yana Nafaneamona ago amine.
Aminea yafe Nenafafema mukia veamoya agima alisaga hayana ania huya Nafaneamo agia alisaga hisae. Nagoa veamoya Nafaneamo agima alisaga ohisayana ania huya hu-tenea Nenafa agiene alisaga nohae.

Magi nagaya tamage-lafa huna tamaha-pauve nagoa veamoya kenia haviya hu-natenea kanomofe ‘Tamage nehie.’ huya amakupi maleya amametiti hisayana ani veamogamina agola maige maige hisaya hamaimula ago ali-mainae. Ani veala hagoteya fali-mai vaya kana huya mainafiti hetiya hamaimuamia ali-mainae. Haenagaa Anumaya Kotia kaiyekea hu oama-tegahie.

Tamage-lafa huna tamaha-nepauve nago kanamoma agoma falote hisiana amaku amamemaamoa fali-mainaya veamoya Anumaya Koti nafanemo ke haviteya akave malesayana he-tiya agola maigahae. Ani kana ago falote hu-maine.
Nenafana agaiafi haimumo aepa haneanagi ania huno Nafaneamofena ‘Hamaimumona aepaa maiyo.’ huno hu-tene.
Nafaneamofena ikapinagati emainea kanoa vayamo atenea kanoginofe kaiyekema hu-ma-teno fako hu-ma-tesia tokiyaa amine.
Mani kehena atali ohiho. Nago kana falote hisiana mukia agoma faligeyama komufi he-vai-matenaya veamoya Yisasini nagea havigahae.

Haviteya ani komufinagati he-tiya hati-lavisageya kanale kava hu-mainesaya veanea hetiya agola maigahayanagi kefo kava hu-mainesaya veanea he-tisageno Anumaya Kotia kaiyekea hu-ma-teteno kina hu-ma-tenageya haviya hugahae.

Nagainige nago kavala nohuanagi Anumaya Kotia nahapai-mainea keleti kea fako hu-neama-toe. Ani yafe fatago hulama huna kea fako hu-neama-toe. Nagainia nagesafiti ani kavala nohuanagi hu-na-tenea kanomoa agaia huo hea kavaage nehua yafe fatago hu-lama huna kea fako hu-neama-toe.” huno hie.
“Nagainigema hu-halena aepaanima tamaha-paisugenoa kenimoa haviya hugahianagi nago kanomoma nagaifema hu-haleno tamaha-nepaiyana nagaya ago havimainoe agayama nagaifema hia kea tamage nehie.
Tamakaya vayala hu-matageya Yonitega vageno Yonia nagaifena ke tamage tamaha-pai-maine.
Nagayama vayamoya nagaifema hu-mainaya kea ‘Afa ke nehae.’ huna huanagi tamakaya ani kea havisageno tamaugafa ali-gatisia yafe tamaha-nepauve.
Yonia kani kana huno maineno hanagaligenoma leana osi kanafi tamakaya agai kanimoma lea yafena musena hu-mainae.

Muse hu-mainayanagi nago tusia kanale yaaene nagai aepaene tamave-li-maine. Ani yana ali-mainoa aliyaniae. Nenafa naminea aliyama alina avaya-yesua yana Yonia nagaife hu-mainea kemo agase-mainegetama agetetama nagaifena havimainae. Ani aliyania Nenafa hu-na-tenea yafe tamave-li-maine.
Hu-na-tenea Nenafaa nagaifena ago tamaha-pai-maineanagi tamakaya agaila agea ohavitama agai aufina oagetama hu-mainae.
Hu-tenea kanomofena ‘Tamage nehane.’ hutama tamakupina maletama tamametiti nohaya yafe Anumaya Koti kea tamakupina alitama nomalae.

Anumaya Koti kea nayo kae-malenaya avopi hapalitama ati-yetama ago age-mainae. ‘Ani avopitila agola maige maige hisuna tahaimula aligahune.’ hutama tamakesa havimainae. Ani avona nagaife huya tamaha-pai-mainayanagi nagaitega esaya tamakesa nohaviye. Agola maige maige hisaya tamahaimula tamamisua yafena nagaitega nomae.
Veala muse hu-na-teyafene huna nohuanagi tamakaifena nagaya ago havimainoe. Tamakaya tamakuafina Anumaya Kotifena notama-haikena neagoe.
Nagaya Nenafa agile emainoanagi navaletama falu fala hutama nonatayanagi alu kanomoa agaia agile esigetama afaa avaletama ali falu fala hutegahae.

Tamakaya ‘Alu vayatimo alu vayatimoya muse hu-lateya ala tagi lamisae.’ hutama nehayanagi Anumaya Kotia agaiage mainegi alu Anumaya Kotia omaineanagitama Anumaya Kotia muse hu-lama-tesia yafena notamahaiye. Naa nehayanagi hanaa hutama nagaifena tamakupina maletama tamametitia hugahae?

Tamakaya nagaife ma ke hutama ohaviho ‘Nefate kaiyekea hu-la-tegahie.’ hutama tamakesa ohaviho. Aao, nagaya kaiyekea hu otama-tegahuanagino tamakayama taya hugahiema hutama nehaya kanomo, Mosesema tamaha-paiya kemoa kaiyekea hu-lama-tegahie.
Mosese kema havitama tamakupi maletama tamametitima haleasina nagai kene ania hutama tamametitia haleasine. Mosesea nagaife huno kae-maleneafe ania haleasine.
Tamakaya Mosesema kae-malenea kema havitama tamakupi maletama tamametitia ohunayanagitama hanaa hutama nagai ke havitama tamakupi maletama tamametiti hugahae?” huno hamavi-nege.
Haenagaa Yisasia tipi kalefi uno Kalili li kotuna takaeno umaine. Ani li kotumona nago agia Taipiliasie.
Mukia veamoya kaliamima alino kanale hu-ma-teno tokiya avame yama higeyama agaya yafe akave umainae.
Vageno Yisasiene agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagaaene agoyale haiya mopale mainae.
Yuta vayamoya Anumaya Kotima amakinagomogami amaugafama ali-gati-mainea yafe amakesa havisaya imu kisaya kanaa ago aupa hu-maine.
Yisasia ageno ataleno ageana mukia veamoya agaitega neageno amaketeno Filipife mage hie “Hanateti ani veamoyama nesaya kavela miya hugahune?” huno hie.
Yisasia Filipina ayevataga huno mani kea nehuno agayama hugahema hia yana ago havimaineno hu-maine.
Filipia mage hie “Nago kanomoa tu hataletia (200) kanale aliyana aliteno miya alino ani monea ataleno kavema miya hisiana ma mukia veakefafina osi osi huya kavela alite alite hugahae.” huno hie.

Higeno nago kanoa agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagaamogamipitila, Saimoni Pitana aganaamoa Etalua, mage huno hie “Nago nafanemoa faefua (5) mayagi tole noyamegi huno ali-lino maine. Veakefamo alino ala higeno mani kavela osi kanoa haneanagi hanaa huno taya hisie?” huno hie.

Higeno Yisasia agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagaamofe mage hie “Mukia veakefa ‘Mopale maiho.’ hutama hama-paiho.” huno hama-paiye. Ani kumala mukia apeage hanea kumalagiya mukia veakefa mopale mainae. Ani veala faefu tausenia (5,000) venene mainae.

Yisasia ani maya alino Anumaya Kotitega muse huno havigeteno mukia mopale mainaya veamogamina fako huno amamite amamite hu-maine. Noyamene ani kava higeno mukia veamoya ani kavela nageno amamu hu-maine.
Nemamu hu-male-tageno Yisasia agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagaamofena mage hie “Mukia atupa-tapa kavela alitalu hu-tama maleho. Nagoa osi osi atupa vitali vitali ohiho.”
Amakaya mukia veala faefua (5) maya kanoafiti neteya atalaya atupayaga alitalu huya tuelufua (12) kula ai-havate-mainae.

Anifima mainaya veakefamoya Yisasima hu-mainea tokiya avame yana ageteya mage hae “Tamage huno Anumaya Kotina aune kanoa hu-tesigeno ma mopafima egahiema huno hu-mainea kanoa mama ago emaine.” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia vayamoyama hisaya kavala aguafinaga mage huno havimaine “Mani vayamoya nagaila sauveami maisua yafe navalegahe nehae.” huno nehuno neamataleno agaiage agoyafi hai-maine.

Yagemoa lavi-falegeno une avamemaa agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagaamoya ala ti agegayalega uteya tipi kalefi asaga hu-maiya Kapaneamu vayana Yisasia amakaienena oune. Ovigeya yaufa uge uge huya nevageno hani ki-ma-tene.
Ala yasigefamoa eno tina melino mo ai-yahae me ai-yahae huno tusiya hu-maine.

Tusiya higeya tipi kalefima mainaya vayamoya yosaleti vailagai-liya vayana nagoa ayaayaa sikisia (6) kilomita ti kotumona amunopi neuya agayana Yisasia ti avoyale aiya ayeme ayeme tipi kalema hanelega neegeya ageteya tusiya huya kolia hu-mainae.
Koli nehageno Yisasia mage huno hama-paiye “Kolia ohiho mamona nagayae.” huno hama-nepaiye.
Hama-paigeya vayamoya Yisasina tipi kalefi haisaga hu-maisia yafe muse nehuya tipiti avalesaga nehae. Ani tipi kalemoa visaya kumatela aupaa uvayi hu-maine.

Faeteya kotigeya tikotumona atu kaiyaga mainaya veamoya ageteya mage hae “Nagoke tipi kaleage hanegeta age-mainone. Yisasienema tokaeya nemaiya anagaage ani lipi kalefi vayanagi Yisasia ounegi ani vayala amakaiamige umainae.” huya hae.
Ani kumala Yisasia Anumayamotega nunamu huno muse huteno kavela amamigeya ne-mainaya kumate nagoa lipi kaleyaga Taipiliasi kumateti anile neae.
Neeya mukia veamoya megayana Yisasienema tokaeya nemaiya anagaene omainageya megeteya tipi kalefi asaga hu-maiya Kapaneamu Yisasife mo atiye-mainae.
Atiyeme valegati atu kaiyaga umaineya Yisasina mogeteya mage hae “Hulave-nelina kanomoga na yu ma kumala meli-mainane?” huya havinegae.

Havigageno Yisasia mage hie “Nagaya tamagelafa huna tamaha-nepauve tamakaya kavema tamamugetama nageno tamamuma hu-mainea yafe natia neayayanagi nagaila tokiya avame yama hugetama age-mainaya yafena natia noayae.

Tamakaya kasalisia kavefena maitama ati oayeho. Maige maigema hisaya kavefeke maitama atiyeho. Nagaya Nenafaa, Anumaya Koti hu-na-tenea kanomona ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomona mani kavela tamamigahue.” huno hie.
Higeya mage huya havinegae “Tagaya hanaa huta Anumaya Koti aliyana alisune?” huya havinegae.
Hageno Yisasia mage hie “Mani aliyana Anumaya Kotia muse nehia aliyane. Agayama hu-tegeno emainea nafanemofe tamakupi maletama tamametiti hisaya yafe muse nehie.” huno hie.
Higeya mukia veamoya mage hae “Hana augafa tokiya avame yana tave-lisanageta ageteta tagupina maleta tametiti hisune?
Nayona taginagomoya vaya omai kotega maineya nago kavela agia manae nehaya kave ne-mainayane huno kae-maleneane
‘Ikapinagati maya amamigeya ne-mainae.’
huno kaemaleneane.” huya nehae.
Hageno Yisasia mage hie “Nagaya tamage-lafa huna tamaha-nepauve ikapinagati elavi-mainea maya Mosesea agaia oamaminegi Nenafaa ikapinagati tama maya menia nelamamie.
Anumaya Kotima tamamia mayamoa maa hu-maine nago kanoa ikapinagati ea maya mainea yafe ma mopale mainaya veala hamaimula amamine.” huno hie.
Higeya mage huya hae “Ala kanomogae mukia kanalela ani maya tamige lamige huo.” huya hae.

Hageno Yisasia mage huno hama-nepaiye “Nagaya hamaimu amamisua maya mainoe. Nagaitegama esia veamoya nagoene amakala otegahae. Nagayama hu-lama-tesua yafe amakuafi maleya amametiti hisaya veamoya tifena oamakegahae.
Nagaya ago tamaha-paugetama nagaila ago nagemainayanagi nagaya hu-lama-tesua yafena tamakupina maletama tamametitia nohae.
Mukia Nenafama naminea veamoya nagaitega egahae. Nago kanomoma nagaitegama esigenahena ‘Eteka vuo.’ huna hu oategahue.
Hu-na-tenea kanomoma haisia kavama hisua yafe ikapinagatila hu-nategena emainoe. Nagainia nagesafiti kavala hugahe omenoe.

Hu-na-tenea kanomoma haisia kavama hisuana maa hu-maine naminea veanefitila nagoke kanoa fanane ohisagena ma mopama hanoma hisia kanafina mukia fali-mainesafiti ali he-ti-matesugeya agola maige maige hugahae.

Nenafaa maa yafe musena nehie mukia veamoya nafaneamona neageya agayama hu-matesia yafe havilama huya amakupi maleya amametiti hisayana agola maige maige yana aligahae. Alitesagena ma mopama hano hisia kanafina nagaya fali-mainesafitila ali he-ti-ma-tesugeya agola maige maige huya maigahae.” huno hu-maine.
Yisasima “Nagaya ikapinagati elavi-mainoa maya mainoe.” huno hu-mainea kehe Yuta veamoya Yisasifena ke vaiya kasagoya ke hu-tenae.
Mage huya nehae “Ma kanoa Yisasia, Yosefe nafanefi? Nefaene itaamoene ago age-mainone. Naa higeno menia ‘Ikapinagati elavi-mainoa kano mainoe.’ huno nehie.” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia kenonaamia mage huno hie “Tamakaya tamakaitamifima kasagoya kema hatagaya kea ataleho.
Nago kanomoa nagaitega agaia nomegi hu-na-tenea Nenafa avayu hinageno nagaitega enagena nagaya ma mopama hano hisia kanafina fali-mainesifiti ali he-ti-tesugeno haimula aligahie.
Anumaya Koti aune vayamoya mage huya kae-malenayane
Mukia veamogamina Anumaya Kotia hu-maveli hamaveli hugahie huya kae-malenayane.
Mukia veamoya Nenafama hu-mavelia kea haviteya akave malenaya veamoya nagaitega neae.
Nago kanomoa Nenafana oageneanagi Anumaya Kotitegati emainea kanomoa agaiage Nefana age-maine.
Tamage-lafa huna tamaha-nepauve nagaifema haviya amakupi maleya amametiti hu-mainaya veamoya agola maige maige hisaya hamaimula ago ali-mainae.
Nagaya nagainia hamaimu amamisua maya mainoe.
Ani tamakinagomoya vaya omai kotega maineya nago kavemo agia manae huya nahaya kave ne-mainayanagi ago fali-mainae.
Fali-mainayanagi maa augafa ikapinagati elavia maya nesaya veamoya ofaligahae.

Nagaya Ikapinagati elavi-mainea maya mainoe. Ani mayamona haimua hane. Nagoa veamoya mani mayama nesayana agola maige maige hugahae. Ani maya nagainia naugafae. Ma mopalema mainaya veala agola maige maige hisaya yafe naugafa ataletena faligahue.” huno hie.
Higeya Yuta vayamoya mani kehena ke vaiya mage huya hae “Mani kanomoa hanaa huno augafaa taminegeta nesuna yafe nehie?” huya hu-mainae.

Nageno Yisasia mage hie “Nagaya tamage-lafa huna tamaha-nepauve tamakayama ikapinagati emainoa kano vayamo na-tenea nafanemoni naugafaene kolaniaenema onesayana maige maige hisaya tamahaimula tamakupina omalegahie.
Nagoa veamoya naugafaene kolaniaenema nesayana agola maige maige hisaya hamaimula ago ali-mainayanagina ma mopama hano hisia kanafina fali-mainesafitila ali he-ti-ma-tegahue.
Nagai naugafa, kave tama hane. Kolaniaenena tama li hane.
Nagoa veamoya naugafaene kolaniaenema nesayana nagai nagupi mainagena nagaya ania huna amakai amakupina mainoe.
Nenafaa haimuaene kanomoa hu-nateneanagino nahaimula namigena mainoe. Nagoa veamoya nagai naugafama nesayana nagai tokiyafiti hamaimula aliteya maigahae.

Ikapinagati elavi-mainea maya maa augafa maya hane. Yuta vayamogami amakinagomoya ne-mainaya maya kana ohune. Ani maya neteya ago fali-mainayanagi nagoa veamoya ikapinagati elavi-mainea mayama nesayana agola maige maige hugahae.” huno hie.
Yisasia mani kea Kapaneamu mono nopi huno hama-pai-mainea ke.
Mukia akavema nevaya veamoya ani kea haviteya mage huya hae “Manima hu-mave-lia kemoa tusia kana nelahaiye. Hana kanomo mani kea haviteno akave malesia amukoa hane?” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia ani kehena akavema nevaya veamoya kasagoya kema haya kea ago aguafinaga haviteno mage huno hie “Mani kemoa otamahaifi? Natalesaya tamakesa nehavifio?” huno hamavi-nege.
Nagayama, ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomona, etenama hagotena nemauva kumatema visugetama nagesayana hanaa hugahae?

Anumaya Koti Avamumoa maige maige hisaya tamahaimula nelamianagi tamakai tamaugafamoa nagola kanale yana notamamie. Nagaya Anumaya Koti Avamumoa naminea ke tamaha-pai-mainoe. Ani kemoa maige maige hisaya tamahaimula nelamamie.

Mani kea tamaha-pai-mainoanagi “Nagoamogatama ani kehena tamakupina alitama nomalae.” huno nehuno nayoma aepa he-mainea kanafina Yisasia amakupi maleya amametiti ohisaya veaene agaiama agesi huno kame ya hu-tesia kanoene ago haviline.
Yisasia nagoene mage hie “Ani yafe mage huna tamaha-pai-mainoane nagoke veala amakaiamia nagaitega omegahagi Nenafa esaya amaku amakesa amamisigeya nagaitega egahae.” huno hie.
Mani kema higeya kasagoya akavema umainaya veala eteya mai-yahae huya ataleya umaineya nagoene agaienena me vai-oayenae.
Yisasia tuelufua (12) anagaamogamife mage huno hamavi-nege “Tamakaya ania hutama nagaila natalegahao?” huno hamavi-nege.
Hamavi-gegeno Saimoni Pitaa kenonaa mage hie “Anumayamoga hana kanomote visune? Kagai kemoa maige maige hisuna tahaimula nelamie.
Tagaya ago havilinone kagaya alu aotage kavaage kanoa Anumaya Kotia hu-gategeka emainananagita kagaifena tagaya tagupi maleta tametitia ago hu-mainone.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia mage hie “Tamakaya tuelufua (12) anaganimogatamina nagaya ago hapali-lama-tenoamagi tamakaipina nago kanomoga Kefo Avamuene mainane.” huno hie.
Mani kema hiana Yutasife hu-maine. Yutasia Saimoni Isakaliotina nafaneamoe. Tuelufua (12) anagapiti Yisasina agesi huno kame ya hu-tesia kanohe hu-maine.
Ani kanafina Yutia kotega vayamoya haesaya amakesa haviya yafe Yisasia Yutia vai-oayeno Kalili kotega ute ete huno maine.
Ala kana, fugagieta nopi maineya imu negiya kana aupa nehie.
Aupa higeya Yisasina aganaamoya mage huya hapaiye “Ma kumala neataleka Yutia kotega ugeya kakavema nehaya veala kagayama tokiyakaletima alina aliyana ageho.
Nago kanomoa ‘Mukia veamoya nagesae.’ huno kesi aliyana noalia yane. Kagaya ani tokiya aliyana mukia ma mopale veamogami amaufi aligeya ani aliyakaa ageho.” huya hae.
Hayanagi ani aganaamoya agaifena haviya amakupi maleya amametitia ohunaya yafe ani kea hu-mainae.
Yisasia mage hie “Aliyania amave-lisua kanania falote ohunegi tamakaya mukia kanalela tamakaima tamahaisia kavala hisaya kanatamilelagi afaa haiho.
Nagai ke nohaviya veamoya tamakaifena musetami nehagi nagaya ‘Ase ohu kava nehae.’ huna hama-pauva yateti nagaila amaipa kafa he-nenatae.
Tamakaya Yelusalemu imulega viho. Nagaya aliya kanania falote ohuneanagina ani yafe menia imulega ougahue.” huno hie.
Ani kea hama-paiteno ouno afaa Kalili kotega maine.
Aganaamoya imulega ago utageno Yisasia haenaga anilega hai-maine. Vaya amaulela ounegi kesi fala-kino umaine.

Falakino umainegeya Yuta vayamoya agayama imulema esiafene huya moge mege hugetayana higeya mage huya hae “Ani kanoa hanate maine?” huya hamavi-gageya anifima alitalu hu-mainaya veamoya Yisasifena sumi sumi huya nagoamoya “Kanale kanoe.” huya nehageya nagoamoya “Vaya aye-mavataga hugeno omai kanoe.” nehageya huya hae.
Hayanagi Yuta vayamogamife koli haya yafe ani kea ala kea ohunagi osi kefiti sumi sumi huya hu-mainae.
Ani imu kanamo amunopinaga Yisasia ala mono nopi haino hu-mave-li-maine.
Hu-mave-neligeya Yuta veamoya tusia amamayo neaiya mage huya hae “Mani kanoa hana avo nopi uno age-mainea kanomo avopitila taha-nepaiye? Avo nopina ounea kanomoa hanateti ani kea haviline?” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia kenonaamia mage huno hama-paiye “Hu-mave-nelua yana nagesafiti tamaha-nopaugi nevayama hu-na-tegena emainoa kanomo naha-pai-mainea ke tamaha-nepauve.
Nagoa veamoya ‘Anumaya Kotina haisia kava hugahune.’ huyama hisaya veamoya ma ma hu-lamave-nelua kea nagesafiti tamaha-nepaufi Anumaya Kotia naha-pai-mainea ke tamaha-nepaufi havigahae.

Havigahayanagi nago kanomoa agaia agesafiti kema hisia kanomoa ‘Nagai nagi alisaga hisae.’ huno nehianagi nago kanomoma ‘Nevayama hu-na-tenea kanomo agi alisaga hisae.’ huno hisia kanoa kanale agu agesaene kano mainea yafe havigea ohugahie.
Mosesea kahegi kea ago tamaha-pai-mainea ke tamakaitamifina nago kanomoga ani kemona akavela nomalane. Naa higetama menia nagaila nahaegahena nehae?” huno hie.
Higeya melitalu hu-mainaya veamoya mage huya hae “Kefo avamumo kagaila kagusafina maineno kavale-liteno nehie. Taya kahaegahena nehageka nehane?” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia mage huno hama-paiye “Nagaya nago tokiya aliyama Sapati kanalema alua aliyafe tamamayoa neaiye.

Mosesea nayona ‘Nafanetamimona agoya amega augafaa taga hu-taleho.’ huno hama-pai-maine. Ani kavala agaia alino aepa ohenegi Mosesena aginagomoya ani yana aliya aepa he-mainae. Nemoma agoya anoyaa tagama hayana Sapati kanale taga hu-mainae.

Tamakaya Mosesema kahegi kema oatagaesaya yafe Sapati kanalela nemo agoya anoyaa taga nehayanagi naa higetama nagayama Sapati kanalema nago kanoma mukia augafama alina hilatoma hua yafena tamahaiya vai-nena-tae?
Havigu ke nehae. Afaa amega yate agetetama ‘Kefo kava nehane.’ hutama nehagi tama kava hisigetama agetetama kaiyekea hu-teho.” huno nehie.
Nagoa Yelusalemu mainaya veamoya Yisasima hia ya ageteya mage hae “Ma kanoa ala vayamoyama haegahunema haya kanofi?
Ageho vaya amaulagafina kea nehianagi nago yana hu noatae. Kava vayamoya ma kanomofe Anumaya Kotia veamogati taugafa ali-gatigahie huno hu-tegeno emainea kanoa mainea yafe havimainafi?
Anumaya Kotia taugafama ali-gatigahema hu-tegeno emainea kanomofena ‘Hana kumateti emaine?’ huya hugahayanagi ma kanoma ea kumala ago age-mainone.” huya hae.

Hageno Yisasia ala mono nopi haino maineno hu-mave-nelino ala kefiti mage huno hie “Tamakaya nagaifena ago havilama hutama nage-mainafi? Nagayama emainoa kumaenefe havimainafi? Nagaya nagaini nagesafiti omenogi nagaima hu-natenea kanomoa tokiyaage kano maineanagitama tamakaya agaila oagenae.
Oagenayanagi nagaya agaiene mainoleti hu-nategena emainoafenagina ago age-mainoe.” huno hie.
Higeya agaila atafa hugahe hayanagi falisia kanaa yaufa falote ohunea yafe augafalela nago kanomoa atafa ohune.

Ohunayanagi mukia anifima mainaya veamoya agaifena haviya amakupi maleya mage hae “Anumaya Kotima taugafa ali-gatigahema hu-tenea kanoma esiana ma mainea kanomoma tokiya avame yama hu-mainea kavala agasesifi? Aao oagasegahie. Ma kanoa Anumaya Kotima taugafa ali-gatigahema hu-tegeno emainea kano maine.” huya hae.
Nehageya Falasia vayamoya agaifema sumi sumima haya kea haviteya mono note kava vayaene Falasia vayaene ati vayamogamina hu-ma-tageya Yisasina me haesaya malesaya kava huya avalegahe neae.
Neageno Yisasia mage huno hie “Osi kana kanoa tamakaienena maitena hu-nategena emainoa kanolega ugahue.
Tamakaya nagaifena natiyegahayanagi nagaila onagegahae. Visua kumatela tamakaya ougahae.” huno hie.

Higeya Yuta vayamoya amakaiamifi huge havige huya mage hae “Agayama ‘Nagaila onagegahaema.’ hia kumala hanamaalegafiga hanegeno nehie? Agaya Kaliki kotega Yuta vayamogatina tataleya umainaya kotega umaineno Kaliki vea hu-mave-li hamaveli hugahe nehifi?
Agayama hia kea ‘Tamakaya nagaila natiyegetesayana onagegahae. Visua kumatela ougahae.’ hunoma hia kemo aepaa naane huno nehie?” huya hae.
Imu kime haiya mogi hanoma haya kana tusia ala kanae. Ani kanale Yisasia he-tino ala kefiti mage hu-maine “Nagoa veama tifema amakesia veala nagaite eya tina me neho.
Nagoa veamoya nagaife haviya amakupi maleya amametitia hisayana Anumaya Koti autamafina ani veamofe mage hu-maineane
‘Ofali tina kasagoya timo aguafina hava-te-maineno vali-lavino tavigahie.’ huno hu-maineane.” huno nehie.

Yisasia anima hia kea “Alu Aotage Avamuamofe hu-maine.” Ani Alu Aotage Avamula Yisasifema haviya amakupi malesaya vaya amamite amamite hugahe nehie. Ani kema hia kanafina Yisasia yaufa ikapinaga ohainea yafe Alu Aotage Avamuamoa yaufa omenegeno hu-maine.
Nagoa alitalu hu-mainaya veamoya ani kea haviteya mage hae “Tamage-lafa huno mani kanoa Anumaya Koti aune kano emaine.” huya hae.
Hageya nagoa veamoya “Anumaya Kotia taugafa ali-gatigahe hu-tenea kano maine.” nehageya nagoa veamoya “Anumaya Kotia taugafa ali-gatigahe hu-tenea kanomoa Kalilitila falote ohugahie.
Anumaya Koti autamafina mage huno kae-maleneane
‘Anumaya Kotia taugafa ali-gatigahema hu-tenea kanoa Tevitina aginagomo egahie. Tevitima Petelehemu nemaiya kumate ategahie.’ huno kae-maleneane.” huya nehae.
Ani veamoya agaifena tolefi ali fako huya alu ke alu ke nehae.
Hageya nagoamoya “Agaila atafa hiho.” huya hayanagi nago kanomoa augafalela atafa ohune.
Ati vayala eteya mono note kava vayateene Falasia vayateene vageya mage huya hamavigae “Naa higetama avaletama nomae?” huya hae.
Hageya ati vayamoya mage huya hae “Yisasima hia kea nayona nago kanomoa ania augafa kea ohigeta ohavinona yafe avaleta nomone.” huya hae.
Hageya Falasia vayamoya mage hae “Tamakaienena ago aye-lamavataga hu-mainefi?
Ifi nagoa kava vayapi Falasia vayapi ‘Yisasifena haviya amakupi maleya amameti hu-mainae.’ huya haya kea havimainafi?
Aao kava vayala ania ohunagi kahegi kema ohaviyama alitaluma hu nemaiya veamogamina Anumaya Kotia hai vai-ma-teno haniki-mainesia yapina hu-mategahie.” huya hae.

Hageno Nikotimasia nayoma Yisasitema emainea kanomoa amakaipi maineanagino mage hie “Tagai mono kemoa mage huno hie ‘Hagotetama nofima hu-tesaya kanomona ‘Naa maa humainoe.’ huno hisia kea havitetama kefo kavama hu-mainesia kanomona nofila huteho.’ huno hu-maineane.” huno nehie.
Nehigeya “Kagaya kagaienena Kaliliti kano mainapi? Anumaya Koti ke kae-malenaya kefina hapalika havilama huteka kagaienena havio Kaliliti nagola aune kano omegahie.” huno hu-maineane huya nehae.
Nehageya mukia veamoya atagu-feya ataleya kumaamilega ute ete hu-mainae.
Mukia veamoya kumaamilega ute ete hageno Yisasia Olivi yosa hanea agoyafi hai-maine.
Kegeafiti Yisasia he-tino ala mono nopi umainegeya veamoya melitalu hageno Yisasia mopale maineno mono kea hama-nepaiye.
Hama-nepaigeya kahegi kema havilinaya anagaene Falasia vayaene nago ala alu vene moli nehigeya ageteya avaleya alitalu hu-mainaya veamogami amaufi me he-ti-tenae.
Me he-ti-teteya Yisasife mage huya nehae “Hu-maveli kanomoga ma amoa alu vene moli nehigeta ageteta avaleta neone.
Mosesema kahegi kema taminea kemoa maa hu-maine ‘Ani kavama hisia amona yafateti haetama he-vai-teho.’ huno hu-mainegi ‘Kagaya naane huka nehane?’ huya nehae.
Agaifema mani kema hayana aye-vataga huya nagoa havige hisigeta atafa huta kaiyeke hu-tegahune.” huya hayanagi Yisasia ape huno mopafi maineno aginagoleti avo negae.

Avo negaegeya anilema he-tiya maineya mani kema havige havigema haya vayafe Yisasia he-tino mage hie “Tamakaipitima nago osi kefo yakaa omalenesia kanomoga hagoteka yafana hagayu huka mani amo augafalela aiko-lio.” huno hie.
Mage huteno eteno ape huno mopafi avo negae.
Mani kema higeya mukia atagu-feya ute ete hageya hagoteya vayatamamoya ataleya vageya haenaga mukiamoya ataleya ute ete hageno Yisasia ape huno mainegeno ani amoa aule he-tino maine.
Mainegeno Yisasia he-tino ani amofena mage huno hie “Ma amogae mani vayala hanatega vae? Nago kanomoa kagaila kaiyekema hu-gatesia kanoa omainefio?” huno hie.
Higeno mani amoa mage hie “Aao, ala kanomogae, nago kanoa omaine.” huno higeno Yisasia mage hie “Nagaya nagaienena kaiyekea hu okategahugi afaa ugananagi eteka nagoene kefo yana ohuo.” huno nehie.

Haenagaa Yisasia mono nopi alitalu hu-mainaya vayayagahe mage hu-maine “Nagaya ma mopafi veala aye hale-ma-tesua kano mainoe. Nagai nakavema malesaya veamogatama maige maige tamahaimula hanea hale yana alitetama haniki yapina ute ete ohugahae.” huno hie.
Higeya Falasia vayamoya Yisasifena mage huya hae “Kagaya kagaikaa kehe hu-falote nehananagi kekahena havita tametiti ohugahune.” huya hae.

Hageno Yisasia mage huno hie “Tamage nagaya nagainiahe kea nehuanagi hua kehena havitama tamameti hiho. Naafene nagaya aepama henama emainoa kumaene visua kaene age-mainoanagitama tamakaya nagayama emainoa kumaene visua kaene oagenae.
Tamakaya ma mopafi veamogamina no maiyateti fako nehayanagi nagaya nago kanomo no maiyana fako nohue.
