Fako nohuanagi nagaya nago kanomoma fako hu nea-tesugenofena kema hua kelela havitama tamameti hiho. Nagaya nagainige fako nohuanagi hu-natenea Nenafaa nagaiene tole huno aliyana nealino fako nehie.
Tamakai mono kemoa mage huno nehie ‘Tole kanolatamoganima keanimoma nagoke katema visiana keanimoa tamage hugae.’ hutama nehayane.
Nagaya nagainiahena kea hu-falote huna nehugeno nagaima hu-nategena emainoa Nenafaa nagaifena ania huno hu-falote nehie.” huno nehie.

Higeya haviteya Falasia vayamoya mage huya havigae “Negafaema hana kanoa hanate maine?” huya havigageno Yisasia mage hie “Tamakaya nagaima onagenayana Nenafana ania hutama oagenae. Nagaima nage-mainaleasipa Nenafana ania hutama age-mainaleasine.”
Yisasia mani kea ala mono nopina muse yama nemalaya kaiyaga maineno mani kea hu-mave-lianagi agayama falisia kanaamoa aupa ohunea yafe nago kanomoa agaila atafa ohune.
Yisasia eteno nagoene mage hu-maine “Nagaya ago visugetama nagaifena natiyegahayanagi tamakaitami kefo yatamia oataletama hanesigetama faligahae. Nagayama visua katela tamakaya ougahae.” huno hie.
Higeya Yuta vayamoya amakaiamifina mage huya hae “Nagayama visua katela tamakaya ougahae hunoma hia kemona aepaa agaia augafa hae-faligahe nehifi?” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia mage huno hie “Tamakaya afetegati emainayanagi nagaya anafinagati emainoe. Tamakaya ma mopafiti emainayanagi nagaya ma mopafiti omenoe.

Naafene nagaya tamakaila ago tamaha-pai-mainoe ‘Tamakaitami kefo yatamia oatalesageno hanesigetama faligahae.’ huna hu-mainoane. Tamakaifema nagaya ‘Maa kano mainoe.’ huna hu-mainoa kehe havitama tamakupi maletama tamametitima ohisayana kefo yatamia oataletama hanesigetama faligahae.” huno hie.
Higeya “Kagaya tagae?” huya havigageno Yisasia mage hie “Nagaya lanae huna tamakaila hagotena tamaha-pai-mainoane.

Tamakaifema kasagoya kema, hu-lamatena fako hisua kea hane. Nagaima hu-na-tegenama emainoa kanomoa tamage keage kano mainegena agaitegati nagaya havimainoa ke ma mopafi veamogatamina tamaha-nepauve.” huno nehie.
Ani kea Nefafema nehigeyagi amakaya haviya aepaliya ohavinae.

Ohavinaya yafe Yisasia mage hie “Tamakayama ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomonina yafaga yosale alisagama hisaya kanafina tamakaya nagayama ‘Ani kano mainoe.’ huna hu-mainoa yafe havilama hutama havigahae. Nagaya nagaini nagesafitila nago yana nohue. Aao nagaila Nenafama hu-mainea keage nehugetama nehavie.
Nagaima hu-natenegena emainoa Nenafaa nagaiene maineno mukia kanalela agayama musema hia kavama huafenagino nagaila nonatale.” huno hie.
Higeya kasagoya veamoya Yisasima hia ke haviteya amakupi maleya amametiti nehae.
Yisasia amakupima maleya amametitima haya Yuta vayafena mage hie “Tamakaya nagai kema mukia kanafima akavema malesayana nagai ke havisaya anagania maigahae.
Nagayama tamagema hua kema havilama hutama havisagenoa ani ke-lamagemoa tamakaila kanama lamahaiya yamoa nofi hu-lama-tenaya yana hano hisigetama afa vea maigahae.” huno hie.

Higeya kenonaa mage hae “Tagaya Apalahamu nofi vaya mainona yafe nagoa vayamoya nofila hu-la-tageta miya oali aliyana oalinone. Naa higeka tagaifena nofila hu-lama-tagetama miya oali aliyapi mainaya vea ali hano hisugetama afa vaya kana hutama maigahae huka nehane?” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia kenonaamia mage hie “Tamage-lafa huna tamaha-nepauve mukia veama kefo kavama taloma hisayana kefo yaamimoa nofi hu-ma-tegeya miya oali aliya veane kana huya mainae.
Nagi miya oali aliya veala nagoa afamopina agola omaigahayanagi atenea nafaneamoa agola ani afamopi maigahie.
Anumaya Koti Nafanemoa kefo yatamimoma tamatafa hu-mainea nofila alino lagama hu-taleana tamage huno ago alino laga hu-talegetama kanale hutama mainae.
Nagaya ago havimainoe tamakaya Apalahamu nofi vaya mainayanagi nagai kemoa tamakupina omalenea yafe nagaila nahaegahena nehae.
Nagayama nehuana Nenafama nave-li-mainea yayagahe nehuanagi tamakaya tamakaitami nelamafa tamaha-pai-mainea kava nehae.” huno nehie.
Yisasia higeya Yuta vayamoya haviteya mage hae “Nelafaa Apalahamu maine.” huya hageno Yisasia mage hie “Tamagema tamakaya Apalahamu nafaneyagama mainaleasina agayama nehia kavala talo haleasine.
Talo haleasinagi menia nagaya tamage kema Nenafategati havimainoa ke tamaha-pauva kanomonia naa higetama nagaila nahaegahena nehae. Apalahamua naa kavala ohunea yane.
Tamakaya nelamafa nehia kava nehae.” huno higeya “Itatimoa moli hu-liteno huno otateneane. Tagaila Anumaya Kotia agaiage nagoke nelafa maine.” huya hae.

Hageno Yisasia mage hie “Tamagema Anumaya Kotia nelamafama maineleasina nagaya Anumaya Kotitegati emainoa yafe nagaifena tamahaileasine. Nagainia nagesafitila omenogi Anumaya Kotia agaia hu-na-tegena emainoe.
Naa higetama kema hua kea havilama hutama nohaviye? Mani kemona aepaamoa maa hu-maine tamakaya havisaya tokiyatamia omaleanegitama nagai kea ohavigahae.

Tamakaila Satania lama-tenea nelamafa agu agesa tokiyaage hutama nelamafa akave nemalae. Aepama he-mainelegati vaya hamaeno fali-ma-tegeno omai kanoe. Ani kanomo agupina tamage kemoa omalenegeno havigema hiana mukia kanale nehia kava nehie. Ani kanoa havigeage kanoe. Mukia havigema hu yana Satania agaiafiti havigeage kemona aepaa maine.
Nagaya lamakaifena tamageage ke nehua yafe havilama hutama tamakupi maletama tamametitia nohae.

Hana veamoga nageteka nagaifena ‘Kefo yakaa hane.’ huka fako hu-nena-teka hu-falote hunategane? Aao, ania ohugahae. Nagaya lamageage kea huna tamaha-nepauvanagi naa higetama nagaifena tamakupina havi nomalae?
Nagoa veala Anumaya Koti nafaneyaga maineya Anumaya Koti kea nehaviyanagi tamakaya Anumaya Koti nafaneyaga omainaya yafe nagai kea nohaviye.”
Yuta vayamoya kenonaa Yisasifena mage huya hae “Tagaya kagaifena tamage nehune ‘Samelia kano mainane. Kefo Avamumoa kagupina tamage maine.’ huta nehune.” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia mage hie “Nagaipina Kefo Avamula omaine. Aao nagaya Nenafa agi alisaga nehugetama lamakaya nagai nagia alitama afepinaga nemalae.
Nagaya nagia alisaga nohuanagi nagoke kanomoa nagai nagia alisaga hisia kano maine. Ani kanoa, Anumaya Kotie, kaiyekea hu-ma-tesia kano maine.
Tamage-lafa huna lamaha-pauve nagai kema akavema malesamoya ofaligahae.” huno hie.

Higeya Yuta vayamoya mage hae “Ani kema hana yafena tagayama havunana kagaikaa kagupi Kefo Avamula maine. Apalahamuene nayona mainaya Anumaya Koti amaune vayamoya fali-mainagi kagaya ‘Nagai ke akave malesamoya ofaligahae.’ huka nehano?
Apalahamua taginagomona ‘Agase-mainoa kano mainoe.’ huka nehano? Apalahamua faligeya Anumaya Koti aune vayala ago fali-mainae. Kagaya hanaa augafa kano mainoe huka nehane?” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia mage hie “Nagaya nagima alisaga hisuana afa ya kana hugahianagi Nenafa tamakaya ‘Anumaya Kotitimo maine.’ hutama nehaya kanomoa nagai nagia alisaga nehie.

Alisaga nehianagi tamakaya agaila oagetafa hu-mainae. Nagaya agaila ago age-mainogi ‘Agaima oagenoe.’ huleasina tamakai kana huna havigeage kano mauleasinagi nagaya ago agaila age-mainoanagina agai kea akave nemaloe.
Apalahamua tamakinagomoe nagayama ma mopalema falote hisua kanahe agesia yafena musena hu-maineanagi agetenoa tusia muse hu-maine.” huno hie.
Higeya Yuta vayamoya kenonaa mage hae “Kagaya fifitia (50) kafua ohunanagi kagaya vayatama omainane. Apalahamuna age-mainano?” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia mage hie “Tamage-lafa huna tamaha-nepauve Apalahamuna oatenele nagaya hagotena monafinaga mainoane.” huno nehie.
Ani kema hia yafe yafa kayoteti aliya aiko-ligahe nehageno Yisasia fala-kino amataleno ala mono no kategati hati-lavino umaine.
Yisasia katega neuno nago kanoa atenea kanalegati aulaga asu humai kano moge-maine.

Mo neagegeya agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya mage huya havige-mainae “Hula-ve-nelina kanomoga ta hia kefo yamo alino aulaga asu hu-maine akaiafi itaafoamoa kefo ya haa yamo aulagamoa asu hu-mainefi?” huya havigae.

Havigageno Yisasia mage hie “Mani kanomo itaafoamoa akaiaene kefo yama hia yamo alino aulaga asu ohunegi Anumaya Kotia tokiya yamaa alino kanale hu-tesigeya mukia veamoya agesaya yafe aulagamoa asu hu-maine.
Menima yagema hanesiamaaene hu-natenea kanomo aliyana alige alige huta maisune. Hanima kisiana nago kanomoa aliyana oaligahie.
Menima ma mopalema mainoa-maahena nagaya ma mopafina kani aye-halesua kano mainoe.” huno hu-maine.
Mani kea huno nehuno avetuna mopafi heteno mopaene ayegakalifeno aulagama asu hu-mainea kanomo aulagale malegamaetene.

Malegamaeteteno mage huno hapaiye “Kagaya Siloamu ti kotute mo sese huo. Ani li kotumo agia tagai kefina ‘Hu-tene.’ huya nehae. Ani li kotute kaugosa mo sese huteka eteka eno.” huno higeno mo sesema hiana aulagamoa kanale higeno neageno nomaalega emaine.

Nomaalega egeya agaia kumate vayaene nayoma mani kanomoa monehema aukaya nehigeya neagaya veamoyaene mage huya hu-mainae “Ma kanoa nayoma felu maineno monehema aukaya nehia kanofi alu kanoe?” huya nehae.
Nehageya nagoa veamoya “Ani kanoe.” nehageya nagoa veamoya “Alu kanogi vuohe ani augafa kanomo nehigi.” huya hageno agaia nehuno “Nagaya mani kano mainoe.” huno hu-maine.
Nehigeya mukia veamoya havige-mainae “Hanaa hanageno kaulagamoa kanale hu-maine?” huya havigae.

Havigageno mage hie “Nago kanoa, Yisasie kanomoa, hapa talo huteno alino naulagale maleteno ‘Siloamu ti kotutega kaugosa mo sese huo.’ huno higena naugosa mo sese hutena agoana aupaa naulaga age-mainoe.” huno nehie.
Higeya veamoya “Ani kanoa hanate maine?” huya hageno “Nagaya oagenoe.” huno hu-maine.
Aulagama asu hu-mainea kanomona Falasia vayatega avaleya umainae.
Yisasia hapama ali gakalifeteno ani kanomo aulagama alino kanalema hu-teneana Sapati kanae.

Falasia vayamoya nagoene mage huya havigae “Hanaa hanageno kaulagamoa kanale hu-maine?” huya hageno “Hapa ali gamaeno naulagale malegena mo sese hugeno naulagamoa kanale higena age-mainoe.” huno nehie.

Higeya nagoa Falasia vayamoya mage hae “Ani kavama hia kanoa Sapati kanamona akave omalea yafe Anumaya Kotia ani kanoa hu-tegeno omene.” huya nehageya nagoa vayamoya mage hae “Kefo yamaa hanesia kanomoa ani tokiya avame yana talo ohileasine.” huya nehageya huteya tolefi ali fako hu-mainae.
Naa huteya aulagama asu hu-mainea kanoa eteya havige-mainae “Ani kanoma kaulagama alino lamama hu-gatea kanohena naane hu-mainane?” huya hageno mage hie “Anumaya Koti aune kanoe.” nehie.

Higeya Yuta vayamoya “Mani kanoa aulagamoa asu hu-maineanagi menia aulaga ago agegali hu-maine.” huyama haya kehena “Havige nehae.” huya haviya amakupina maleya amametitia ohuya aulagama asu hu-mainea kanomona itaafoamoganifeene ke hageya emainae.
Aageya itaafoamoganife mage huya hana-vigae “Mani kanoa atenaa kanafi aulagamoa asu hu-mainea nafanetani maineano? Naa higeno menia aulaga neage?” huya hana-vigae.

Hanavi-gageana itaafoamogania mage hae “Taagai nafane maineanagitaa taagaya ago age-mainoe. Aulagama asu hu-mainea nafanema atenoamaa ago age-mainoanagi aulagama age-maineamaa oagenoe. Tapiga aulaga alino kali hu-teneafe tamakaya agai havigeho. Alopa ve maineanagino agaia tamaha-paigahie.” huana nehae.

Itaafoamogania Yuta vayafe koli huana mani kea hu-mainae. Yuta vayamoya kea hu-lokiya vaiya mage hu-mainae “Nagoa veamoya ‘Yisasina Anumaya Kotia taugafa ali-gatigahema hu-tenea kanoa ma maine.’ huya hisaya veamogamina agola mono nopitila amati-talegahune.” huya hu-mainaya kehe koli nehuana “Agaya alopa ve mainegi agai havigeho.” huana hu-mainae.
Nagoene eteya aulagama asu hu-mainea kanohe ke hageno egeya mage hu-mainae “Kagaya Anumaya Koti aufi tamage-lafa huka kea huo. Tagaya agonana ani kanoa kefo kavaage nehia kanoe.” huya hae.
Hageno kenonaamia mage huno hie “Nagaya oagenogi agaya kefo kava nehia nepi nohia nepi oagenogi nagokeya kanoama agoana hagotenoa naulagamoa asu humaineanagi menia naulaga agegali nehue.” huno hie.
Higeya mage huya havigae “Naa hu-ga-tene? Hanaa huno kaulaga alino kali hu-ga-tene?” huya havige-mainae.
Havigageno “Nagaya agoma tamaha-nepauvana tamakaya kenia nohaviye. Naa higetama etetama nahavi-negae? Tamakaienena agaiaene tokaeya nemaiya anagamogamipi maigahe nehao?” huno havige-maine.
Higeya amakaya huya akaya ateya mage hae “Kagaikage Yisasienema tokaeka nemaina kanoa mainanagi tagaya Mosese kema nehavuna vayala anale haita mainone.
Tagaya ago havimainone Anumaya Kotia Mosesena kea hapai-maineanagi ma kanomoa hanategati emainenoe tagaya agaila noagonane.” huya hae.

Hageno aulagama asu hu-mainea kanomoa mage hie “Avo namayo neaiye. Tamakaya alu kegefa nehae. Tamakaya hanategatipiga emainea ke ohavinayanagi naulagama alino kali hu-na-tenea kano afa kanoa omaine. Anumaya Kotitegati emaine.
Tagaya ago havimainone Anumaya Kotia kefo kava nehaya veamogami kea nohavie. Nagoa veamoya Anumaya Koti agi alisaga nehuya agaima haiya kavama hisaya veamogami kea Anumaya Kotia havigahie.
Ehema fusa kanafima ma mopama taloma hu-malenelegatima emaineana nago atenea kanalegati aulaga asu hu-mainea kanoa alino kali hu-tene huya haya kea ohavinonane.
Anumaya Kotima mani kanoma hu-tegenoma omeneleasina nago yana agaya ohisine.” huno hie.
Higeya kenonaa mage hu-mainae “Kagaya kefo yapiti falote huka emainananagika tagaila menia hu-lave-ligahe nehano?” huya nehuya mono nopitila avaleya kumatega hagayu hu-talenae.
Yisasia mono nopitima anati-talaya kea haviteno ani kanoa atiyeno mogeteno mage hie “Kagaya ikapinagati emainea kanoa vayamo atenea kanomofena havika kagupi maleka kametitia nehano?” huno havige.
Havigegeno ani kanomoa mage hie “Ani kanoa tae? huka nehapi? Nagaila naha-paigena havina nagupi malena nametiti hano.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia kenonaa mage hie “Kagaya agaila ago neagane. Ani kanoa menima kagaienema maineno kea kea nehaane.” huno hie.
Higeno ani kanomoa mage huno hie “Ayenio Alamogae menia kagaifena havina nagupi malena nametiti nehue.” huno muse nehuno aiyafi aleya aye-maineno Yisasi aiyale ali-soso nehuno agi alisaga nehie.
Yisasia mage hie “Nagaya ma mopale veamogami fako hu-ma-tesua yafe emainoe. Ali fako hisugeya amaulaga asu humai veamoya amaulaga agesageno amaulagama hanea veamoya amaulagama asu hugahie.” huno hie.
Higeya nagoa avate maiya Falasia vayamoya anima hia kea nehaviya agaifena mage huya havigae “Tagaifena tamaulaga asu hu-maine huka nehano?” huya havigae.
Havigageno Yisasia mage huno hie “Tamaulagamoa asuma hu-mainesina kefo yatamia omalesinagi tamakaya ‘Taulagamoa kali kali hu-maine.’ hutama haya yafe kefo yatamimoa hane.” huno hu-maine.
Yisasia mage huno hie “Nagaya tamage-lafa huna tamaha-nepauve nagoa vayamoya sipi sipi kegiyamo fiatetima hai ofaleya afalegatima asaga hu-maiya hai falesaya vayala musufa vaya mainae.
Nago kanomoma fiatetima hai nefalea kanoa sipi sipilema kava neyagaiya kano maine.

Fiatema yagai-mainea kanomoa ani kanoa ageteno yaki-tegeno fiateti hai falegeya sipi sipiyagamoya alenaga agea havimainaya yafe agaia sipi sipimogamina amakia hanete hanete hu-maineanagino amakia ayete ayete huno amavaleno kumatega nevie.
Amavalenoma kumatega neunofena uhagoteno nevigeya ani kanomona alenaga agema havimainaleti lagiya ani sipi sipimoya akave nevae.
Nagi oagenaya vayamogami amakavela ougahae. Nagi ani kanomona alenaga agema ohavinaya yafe faleya alulega ugahae.” huno hie.
Yisasia mani avame kea hama-paiyanagi amakaya havilama huya ohavinae.
Ohaviyanagi Yisasia nagoene eteno mage hu-maine “Tamage-lafa huna tamaha-nepauve nagaya sipi sipimoyama hai falesaya fiana nagainige mainoe.
Mainoanagi hagoteyama emainaya vayala vayama nehamaeya musufa yama nehaya vayalagiya sipi sipiyagamoya kema haya kea ohavinae.
Ma nagaya fia mainoe. Mainoanagitama nagoa veamogatama etama nagaipi ehai falesagena tamaku tamamena ali-gatisugetama hai faletama mainetama elavitetama haitetama nehutama nesaya yana aligahae.
Musufa kanomoa musufa yana nehuno veala nehamaeno ali haviya hu-ma-tegahe neeanagi nagaya kanalenale tamahaimu tamamigahe emainoe. Agola hano ohu tamahaimula tamamigahe emainoe.
Nagaya kanalenale sipi sipi kava kano mainena sipi sipiniamogamina amaku amamemaa ali-gatisua yafe faligahue.

Nago kanomoa yagaiteno mone nealia kanoa sipi sipimona nefaa omaine. Omaigeno afela kalamoma egenoa ani kanomoa ataleno falegeno ani afela kalamoa sipi sipimogamina akafu amanino mo hamae me hamae higeya faleya atagufeya alulega ute ete nehae.
Ani sipi sipilema yagaino maineno monema nealia kanomoa sipi sipiyagahena agesa ohavino amataleno faleno umaine.

Nagaya kanale sipi sipi kava kano mainoe. Nenafaa agua namigena nagaya nagua amugetaa nehue. Naa hu-mainoa kava huna sipi sipiyaganimoya amakua namigena nagaya nagua neamamue. Nagaya sipi sipiniamogami amaku amamemaa ali-gatisua yafe faligahue.

Nagoa sipi sipiyagania amahaote mainae. Mani sipi sipi kegiyanifina omainayanagi ani afuyaga amavalenama esuana alenaga nage nehaviya nagokeage afuyakama maisayana nagokemona ani sipi sipiyagalela kava kano maigahue.
Nagaya ‘Afaa faligahue.’ huna hua kehena Nenafaa tusiya huno hau ayamopafi nehaiye. Naafene? Nahaimula atalesugeno eteno namisigena he-tisuayafe nahaimula afaa atalegahue.

Nagoa vayamoya nahaimula naha-ofalegahae. Nagaya nagainiage nahaimula atalegahue. Nahaimuma atalesua tokiyaniaene ataletena etena alisua tokiyaniaene hane. Aniama hisua kavamo kea Nenafaa ago naha-pai-maine.” huno hie.
Mani kema hia kea Yuta vayamoya haviteya tolefi ali fako hu-mainae.
Kasagoyamoya mage hae “Kefo Avamumo agupi hai-mainegeno aifonafo nehigi naa higetama kea maitama havimainae?” huya hae.
Hageya nagoamoya mage hae “Kefo Avamumoa agupima maineleasina mania augafa kea ohileasine. Kefo Avamumoa aulagama asu hu-mainea kanomo aulaga aligali hu-oateleasine.” huya hae.

Nayona mono no kimaleteya fita yaki-mainaya kanahe muse nehaya imu Yelusalemu ki-mainae. Ani imua yasi nealia kanale negiyanagino ani kanalela Yisasia Anumaya Koti nopi umaineno Solomoni yasi nealea nona aye-nagali-malenea kaiyaga nevie.

Mukia Yuta veamoya meliya amuno huteya maineya mage hae “Tagu tagesamoa tole-lole nehuno taipamoa kanaage nehigi. Menia hu-falote huka taha-paiyo kagaya Anumaya Koti hu-ga-tegeka emainana kano mainano?” huya hae.

Havigageno Yisasia mage huno hie “Nagaya agoma tamaha-pai-mainogi nagaifena havitama tamakupi maletama tamametiti nohae. Nenafa naminea tokiya yateti aliyana alugetama agayana ani yana nagaya Anumaya Koti hu-na-tegena emainoa kano mainoa yafe tama-ve-lianagi nagai sipi sipima omaiya yafe havitama tamakupina nomalae.
Nomalayanagi nagai sipi sipiyagamoya nagaila alenaga mage haviteya nakave malagena nagaya amakaila ago amake-mainoe.
Amaketena maige maige hisaya hamaimula ago amaminoanagiya ofaligahae. Nagaila ago nayapi mainayanagino nago kanomoa memavayu ohugahie.
Nenafaa ani sipi sipiyaga naminea kanogino mukia yana amakase-mainea kano mainea yafe alu kanomoa Nenafa ayapitila haofalegahie.
Nenafaene nagainiene nagoke mainoe.” huno hie.
Higeya Yuta vayamoya nagoene yafa kayo aliya haesaya kava nehae.

Nehageno Yisasia mage huno hama-paiye “Nagaya mukia Nenafa naminea tokiya avame yana tamakai tamaulagafina ago hu-mainogi nagoke avameyana hana avameya hua yamo notamahaigetama nagaila yafatetila nahaegahena nehae?” huno hama-vige.

Hama-vi-gegeya “Tokiya avame yama hu-mainana yafene huta yafatetila okahaegahunagi kagaya ma mopafi afa kano mainekagi ‘Anumaya Kotiene nagoke mainoe.’ hukama hanana Anumaya Kotina kalana ategana kema hana yateti kagaila yafa kayotetila kahaegahena nehune.” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia mage hie tamakaitami mono kema kae-malenaya kemoa mage hu-maineane
“Anumaya Kotia mage hie ‘Tamakaitami Anumaya Kotigatama mainae.’ huno hie.” huya kae-malenayane.

Ani Anumaya Koti kea kae-malenaya ke hanege hanege huno tamageage hugahie. Anumaya Koti kema agoma hama-paiya vayafena “Anumaya Kotigatama mainae.” huno hu-maineana nagaya Nenafafena “Nenahaiya kano mainane huno hu-na-tegena ma mopafina emainoema.” huna nehuana naa higetama “Nagaya Anumaya Kotina neamonae.” hunama hua kehena “Anumaya Kotina hu-haviya hu-neatane.” hutama hu-nena-tae?

“Nagaya Nenafa aliyama oaluleasina nagaifena havitama tamakupi maletama tamametiti ohaleasinagi kanale kava haleasine. Nagaya kema hu-mainoa kehema havitama tamakupima omalenutamahena aliyama ali-mainoa aliyafena havitama tamakupi maletama tamametiti hiho. Naa hisayana Nenafaa nagaiene maigena nagaya ania huna agaiene mainoema huna hua kea havilama hutama havigahae.” huno nehie.
Higeya nagoene atafa huya nofi hu-tegahe hayanagi amakaseno ago umaine.
Uteno Yisasia eteno Yotani lina mo lakaeno Yonima lima fale-ma-tenea kumate mo maine.
Mo mainegeya mukia veamoya melitalu huya maineya mage hae “Yonia keama alino lokiya vaisia yana nagola malegeta oagenonagi ma kanomofena mukia kema hu-mainea kemoa tamage-lafa hu-maine.” huya hae.
Mukia ani kumate veamoya Yisasifena haviya amakupi maleya amametiti hu-mainae.
Nago kanomo agia Lasalusie kali ali-maine. Ani kanoa Petani kumate kanoe. Mataene aganaamoa Maliagani kumale.
Ani Maliaa nago yupa manaage masavena Yisasina aiyale takino fale-teneno ayolagefaleti ali hau hu-teneane. Ani munamona asaamoa Lasalusi kali ali-maine.
Kali alino mainegeana ani tole nanukana-latamogania Yisasitega nago kano hu-taageno mage mo hie “Alatimogae kagaikama kahau kayamopafima negahaiya kanoa kali nealie.” huno hapaiye.

Hapaigeno Yisasia ani kema nehavinoa mage hie “Lasalusia kali alino fae-maineanagi falisia yafe oalinegi mani kalimoa Anumaya Koti agi alisaga hisayafene huno ali-maine. Ani kalia Anumaya Koti nafanemo agi alisaga hisaya yafe falote hu-maine.” huno hie.
Yisasia Mataene aganaamoene Lasalusiene ani anagafena tusiya huno hau ayamopafi nehaiya anagale.
Yisasia Lasalusima kalima alia kea havianagi ouno tole yupa afaa nemaiya kumate maiteno agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagaahe mage huno hama-paiye “Yutia kotega eteta visune.” huno hu-maine.
Higeya agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya mage hae “Hu-lave-nelina kanomoga menia Yuta vayamoya yafateti aliya kahaegahema haya kotega kagaya ani kotega nagoene ugahe nehano?” huya havinegae.

Havigageno Yisasia mopafi mainea kanaamoa hano ohunea yafe kenonaamia avame kea mage huno hie “Tuelufua (12) auva nagoke yagefina omalenefi? Veamoyama yagefima vai-yesayana ma mopafi yagemoa ai vasa humainea yafe asaga hu otavigahayanagi veamoya kegema vaiyatete hisayana aye-vasa hu yamaa amakupina omaleanagino vailino hamaegahie.”
Yisasia mani kea huteno nago kea mage huno hu-maine “Tagaila kanapatia Lasalusia faeno maineanagina nagaya visuaamona mogafa huna avale he-ti-tegahue.” huno hama-paiye.
Higeya agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya mage hae “Alatimogae agayama kalima alino fae-mainesiana afaa kanale hu-tegahie.” huya hu-mainae.
Hageno Yisasia mani avame kema hiana Lasalusia ago fali-maine huno nehianagi agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya ohavinaya yafe “Afaa faeno mainegeno nehie.” huya hu-mainae.
Hageno Yisasia ani avame kea neataleno hu-falote huno hama-paiye “Lasalusia ago fali-maine.
Tamakaya nagaifena havilama hutama ‘Tamage nehie.’ hutama tamakupi maletama tamametiti hisaya yafe omainogeno fali-maineanagina nagaya muse nehugi menia aligeta mogamano.” huno hie.
Higeno Tomasina, nago agia Titimasie, tagai kefina kuyave nafane, Yisasienema tokaeya nemaiya anagafe mage hie “Mukiamogata vigetao. Nagopi nevisunageya tahaesageta faligahune.” huno hie.
Lasalusina foa (4) yupa komufi he-vai-tenageno Yisasia uvayi higeya he-vai-tenaya kanahe hapaimainae.
Petaniti Yelusalemua tagufa (3) kilomita aupate hanea yafe mukia Yuta veamoya Yelusalemutila etele huya Matagani Maliaganina anasaanimoma fali-mainea yafe hamau hu-nateya emainae.
Emainageno Mataa Yisasife “Nee.” huya haya kea haviteno katega viayamo mo fotu hu-mainegi Maliaa nomaafi maine.
Mainegeno Mataa Yisasife mage hie “Alanimoga kagayama malema mainateasina nasanimoa ofalileasine.
Ago havimainoe menia kagayama Anumaya Kotitega nago yafema havigesanana afaa kamigahie.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia mage huno hapaiye “Kasakamoa fali-maineanagi eteno haimula alino he-tigahie.” huno hie.
Higeno ani munamoa mage hie “E, nagaya ago havimainoe ma mopama hanoma hisia kanafina mukia fali-mainaya veama he-tisaya kanafina eteno he-tino haimula aligahie.” huno hie.

Higeno Yisasia kenonaa mage hie “Nagaya fali-mainaya veala amavale he-tina hamaimula amamisua kano mainoe. Nagaya maige maige hisaya hamaimu amami yamona aepaa mainoe. Nagoa veamoya nagaife haviya amakupi maleya amametiti hisayana faliteya hetiya agola maige maige hisaya hamaimula aligahae.

Nagoa veamoya afaa maineya nagaifena haviya amakupi maleya amametiti hu-mainaya veala maige maige hugahayanagiya ofaligahae. Kagaya mani kea ago havilama huka kagupi maleka kametiti nehapi nohane?” huno havige.

Havigegeno ani munamoa mage hie “E, Alanimoga nagaya nehavina ago nagupi malena nametiti hu-mainoe. Tamage nehae kagaya Kalaisigae Anumaya Kotia hu-ga-tegeka taugafa ali-gatigahe ma mopafi elavisana kano emainane. Anumaya Koti nafane mainane.” huno hie.
Mataa mani kea huteno eteno viayamo aganaamona Maliana sumi sumi huno mage huno hapaiye “Hu-mave-nelia kanoa ago emaineno kagaife ke nehie.” huno hapaiye.
Hapaigeno Maliaa ani kea haviteno aupaa he-tino Yisasi mogegahe umaine.
Nevigeno Yisasia kumatela omenegi Mataene fotuma huana kea keama haalega maine.

Mainegeya Yuta veamoya Maliaene nopi maineya hanauma hu-nateyama emainaya veamoya Maliaa aupaa he-tino kumatega via yafe agayana higeya “Vae Maliaa asaamo komulega avitegahe nevie.” huya akave umainae.
Akave vageno Maliaa Yisasi mainelega mogeteno aiyafi mope hu-maineno mage hie “Alanimogae kagayama malema mainateasina nasanimoa ofalileasine.” huno hapaiye.
Hapaiteno avi neategeno agaienema emainaya Yuta veamoya ania huya neatageno Yisasia Maliana neagegeno aipamoa tusiya huno haviya hu-maine.
Aipamoa haviya hu-mainefiti hama-vigeno mage hie “Hanate he-vai-tenae?” huno higeya “Alatimoga eka mego.” huya hae.
Nehageno Yisasia avi-te-maine.
Neategeya Yuta veamoya mage hae “Ageho Lasalusifena tusiya huno hau ayamopafi nehaiye.” huya hae.
Hageya nagoa veamoya mage hae “Ma kanoa amaulagama asu hu-mainea veama aligali hu-neamatea kanogi naa higeno Lasalusina kalia alino kanale hu-tegeno ofalino afaa maiyanagi fali-maine.” huya hae.
Yisasina aipamoa nagoene haviya higeno he-vai-tenaya komulega umaine. Ani komua yafa kapi he-vai-teteya komumo avayalela ala yafateti aliya ai-lile-malenae.

Ai-lile-malenageno Yisasia mogeteno mage hie “Mani komumo avayaleti yafana ali-taleho.” huno higeno fali-mainea kanomo asaamoa, Mataa, mage huno hie “Alaniamogae mani kanoa ago he-vai-tageno foa (4) yupa komufinaga haneanagino tusia himana hugahie.” huno hie.

Higeno Yisasia mage hie “Nagaya ago kaha-pai-mainofi? ‘Kagayama nagaifema tamage nehane huka kagupi maleka kametitima hisanana Anumaya Koti agi alisaga hisaya tokiya yana agegane huna kaha-pai-mainofi?’ huno havinege.”
Ani yafana ali-taletageno Yisasia anafinaga agesaga huno age-maineno mage hie “Nenafaga nunamunia ago havimainana yafe musekaa nehue.

Havimainanagina nagaya mukia kanalema kahavi-goa kea nehavinagi afaa menia manilema mainaya veamoya kagayama hu-na-tanagena emainoa yafema ‘Tamage nehane.’ huya amakupi maleya ametiti hisaya yafe kahavi-negoe.” huno hie.
Mani kea huteno ala kegefafiti mage hie “Lasalusiga he-tika elavio.” huno hie.

Higeno Lasalusia, fali-mainea kanoa, eteno he-tino elavigeya aiyafima ayapima augosafima kenaletima aye-gasagi-malea kanoa elavigeno Yisasia mage huno hama-paiye “Kalu hetama atalegeno vino.” huno hama-paiye.
Mukia Maliaenema emainaya Yuta veamoya Yisasima hia kavala ageteya amakupi maleya amametiti hu-mainae.
Amakua amiyanagi nagoa vayamoya ataleya Falasia vaya mainalega uya Yisasima hia kavafena mo hama-pai-mainae.
Hama-paigeya Falasia vayaene ala mono note kava vayaene Kanisole vayafe ke hageya ageya mage huya hae “Ma kanoa kasagoya tokiya avame yayaga nehigi naa hisune?

Afaama atalesunagenoa mukia kanalela aniageyama hisigeya mukia veamoya ‘Tamage nehie.’ nehuya haviya amakupi maleya amametiti hisageya kava vayatia, Lomu vayamoya eya mukia veanene ala mono notiene ali haviya hugahae.” huya hae.
Hageno Kaiyafasia ani kafufina ala mono note hagote kava kano maineanagino ani vayapiti he-tino mage hie “Tamakaya tamaku tamakesa nomale.
Tamakaya ohavinafi na ya kanale tamaya hisia yana hane? Mukia veati ali haviya hisafi nagoke kanomoa mukia veaamogami anonaa falisie?” huno hama-vige.

Ani kafufina Kaiyafasia ala mono note hagote kava kanogino mani kea Anumaya Kotia hapaigeno aune laga huno hu-maine. Agaia agesafiti ohune. Ani aunema laga hia aepaamoa mage hu-maine “Yisasia Yuta veamogamife huno faligahie.
Amakaiamigetefena huno ofaligahigi alu kumate kumate mainaya Anumaya Koti nafaneyaga amavaleno nagoke anaga hu-ma-tesigeya maisaya yafe Yisasia faligahie.”
Ani kanaleti aepa heya Yuta vayamogami kava vayamoya Yisasina haesaya kea huya haviteya huge havige hu-mainae.
Ani yafe Yisasia nagoene Yuta veamogami amaulagafina vai oayenegi nago kumala Efalaimie huya nehaya kumala vaya omai kola aupa hu-mainegeya agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagaene anilega uya mo mainae.

Yuta veamoya kafuahe kafuahena Anumaya Kotima amakinagomogami amaugafama ali-gati-mainea yafe haviya alitalu huya imu negiyane. Ani imuma kisaya kanamoa aupa higeya mukia veamoya mukia kumateti haiya kahegi kemo hama-paiya kava huya amaugafaene amakuaene sese hugahe Yelusalemu umainae. Ago mo sese huteya ani imuamia nenae.

Ala mono nopi molitalu huya maineya Yisasife moge mege huya ati-yegetayana higeya amakaiamifi mo hama-vige me hamavige huya mage hae “Naane tamakesa nehaviye? Kavema nesutela egahifi omegahie?” huya hae.
Hageya ala mono note kava vayaene Falasia vayaene Yisasina atafa hugahe mage hu-mainae “Maa hiho. Yisasima faesia kumama agenutamahena aupaa ani kea alitama me laha-paiho.” huya hu-mainae.

Yisasia Petani kumate, Lasalusia faligeya he-vai-tenageno Yisasia molino he-ti-tenea kanomo kumate, uvayi hu-maine. Uvayi hiana ani kanafina Anumaya Kotima amakinagomogami amaugafama ali-gati-mainea yafe amakesa haviya imuma kisaya kana sikisia (6) yupa maiteya kigahe nehae.
Hageno Yisasina musekase kave talo tala hu-teteno Mataa alino amamite amamite nehigeno Lasalusia Yisasiene siale mainae.

Mainageno Maliaa nago kilo manaage masave hanea keayola, tusia mone hanea masavemo agia natie nehaya masavena alino Yisasina aiyale taki hano hu-teteno ayolagefaleti ali hau hu-nea-tegeno ani masavemo manamoa ani nopi haino hiya higeya manaa havimainae.

Nago kanoa, Yisasienema tokaeya nemaiya anagapiti kanomo, agia Yutasi Isakaliotie. Ani kanomoa haenagaa Yisasina agesi huno kame ya hu-tesia kanomoa mage hie “Naa higeno mani manaage masavena afaa neatale? Atalegeno nago kanomoma miya hileasipa tali hataleti (K300) kina aliteta mani masaveteti monea afenoamima omalenea veane amamuteasine.” huno hie.
Mani kea moneamima omalenea veafena hauma hu-nea-matea yafena nohigi mukia kanalela monema hanea kutela agaia yagai-maineno musufa yama nehia yafe mani kea hu-maine.
Yisasia mage hie “Ma munala afaa atalegeno ma masavena afaa ali-lineno nagayama falisugeya he-vai-natesaya kanalela mani masaveteti fale-na-tegahie.
Moneamima omalenea veamoya mukia yupa tamakaiene maigahayanagi nagaya tamaikaienena mukia yupa omaigahue.” huno hie.
Mukia Yuta veamoya “Yisasia Petani kumatema emaine.” huya haya kea haviteya ani kumate umainae. Yisasina agaiage agegahe ounagi Lasalusia fali-mainegeno ali he-ti-tenea kanoene anakegahe umainae.

Lasalusia fali-mainefiti he-ti-mainea yafe mukia Yuta veamoya nayoma nehaya monola neataleya Yisasina amakua amitafa huya amametitima haya yafe ala mono note kava vayamoya Lasalusiene haesaya kea hu-mainae.
Faeteya kotigeya mukia veamoya Anumaya Kotima amakinagomogami amaugafama ali-gati-mainea yafe imuma ki-malenale emaineya “Yisasima Yelusalemu kumate egahie.” huya haya kea havi-mainae.

Haviteya Yisasiene katega mo fotu hugahe tofe yosamona haisaa kofa-nafa huya aliya umaineya ala kefiti mage huya hae “Tusia yate taugafa ali-gatisana kanoa kanaleya huka neane. Anumayamo aliya alisana yafe hu-ga-tegeka emainana kanomoga Anumaya Kotia kanale manu kamiteno kaya hu-maine. Isaleli kotega yagai-ma-tenana sauve kanomoga Anumaya Kotia kaya hu-maine.” huya hae.
Yisasia nago hosi kana afumo agia tokie nehaya afua age falote huteno agupifi haino maine. Aniama hia kavala nayona Anumaya Koti kefina mage huya kae-malenayane.
“Yelusalemu veamogatama kolia ohutama ageho. Menia tamakaila sauve kanotamia yaufa tokimo agupifi haino maiteno egahie.” huno kae-maleneane.

Yisasima aniama hu-mainea yupa agaienema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya anima kae-malenea kea ohavianagi haenagaage Yisasima faliteno he-tino tokiya hale yamaama hanea kumate haitegeya amakesamoa ai-kalo higeya anima kae-malenea kene veamoya ani yupama hu-tenaya kavafeene havi-mainae.

Yisasia Lasalusifema “Komufitila he-tio.” huno higeno fali-mainefitima he-ti-mainea yupa anilema mainaya veamoya ani kanafina “Yisasia naa maa kavala hu-maine.” huya kea aliya ute ete huya hama-pai-mainae.
Hama-paigeya haviteya anima tokiya avame yama hu-mainea kema haviya yafe mukia veamoya katega Yisasiene mo fotu hu-mainae.
Hageya Falasia vayamoya amakaiami amunoamifina ani kehena mohu mehu huya mage hu-mainae “Ageho mukia mopafi veamoya Yisasina akave nevayanagita atafa ohugahune.” huya hu-mainae.
Nagoa Kaliki veamoya, Anumaya Koti agi alisaga hugahe, ani imu kavema nalega Yelusalemu hai-mainae.
Ani Kaliki veamoya Filipite umainae. Filipia Kalili hanea kumala Petesaita kumateti kano mainelega uya mage hae “Musekaa nehunagi tagaya Yisasina agegahe neone.” huya hu-mainae.
Hageno Filipia viayamo Etaluna hapaiteana ani lolemogani Yisasina mo hapai-mainae.
Hapaiageno Yisasia mage huno hana-paiye “Menia Ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomonia tusiya huya nagai nagia ali-saga hisaya kanamoa ago evayi hu-maine.

Tamage huna tanaha-nepauve nagoke viti avinamoma asaga hu-lavino mopafima ofalinunofena nagoke viti avinaage hanegahigi nagi falinunofena ai-falo huno hageteno kasagoya viti alagayaga aye helafigahie.

Naa hugahianagi nagoa veamoyama mukia ma mopafi yafema amaugafama aliya haiteya hamaimuamima atafa hisaya veamoya faligahae. Faligahayanagi nagoa veamoyama ma mopale mainaya amaugafama aliya haisaya yafema ‘Afa yanema.’ huya hisaya veamogami hamaimumoa hano ohugahianagiya maige maige huya maigahae.
Nagoa veamoyama nagaifema huya aliya alisayana nakave ege ege hisae. Nakavema esaya veamoya maisua yate nagaiene mainesageno Nenafaa nagai aliyama nealiya veamogamina ala amaki amamigahie.”

Yisasia mage huno nehie “Nagai naguamoa tusiya huno kanaage nehigena kasagoya nagesa nehavugi naane huna hisue? ‘Nenafaga menia nagai naugafalema falotema hugahema nehia yana ali-talo.’ hisufi? Aao nagaya ani nagata aisia yapi maigahe emainoe.
Nenafaga kagaika kagi alisaga huo.” huno nehigeno anile ikapinagati age aino mage huno hie “Nagia ago alis-aga hu-mainoane etena nagoene nagia ali-saga hugahue.” huno hie.

Higeya melitalu hu-mainaya veamoya agema aiya kea haviteya nagoamoya mage huya hae “Ikapinagati akali kalu nehie.” huya hageya nagoa veamoya mage huya hae “Nago ensole kanomoa ke me hanepaiye.” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia mage huno hie “Ani agema aiya agea nagai naya hisia yafe nohigi mani kea tamakai tamaya hisia yafe nehie.
Menia ma kanafina Anumaya Kotia ma mopale veamogamina kaiyeke hu-ma-tegahie. Meni kanafima ma mopalema kava yagai-mainea kanoa, Satanina ago anati-talegahie.
Anati-talegahigi ma mopaleti navalesaga huya nahaesageya mukia veamoya amakua namisaya yafe amavayu huna nagainilega amategahue.” huno hie.
Ani avame kema huno hia kemoa mage hu-maine “Ma yateti, yafaga yosale nahaesagena faligahue.” huno hama-pai-maine.

Hama-paigeya veamoya kenonaa mage huya hapai-mainae “Tagai monomoa mage huno taha-pai-maine ‘Anumaya Kotima taugafa ali-gatigahema hu-tesia kanoa mukia kanafina maige maige hugahie.’ huno taha-pai-maineanagi naa higeka ‘Ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomonia yafaga yosale navalesaga hugahae.’ huka nehane? Anima ikapinagati emainea kanoa vayamo atenea nafanea ta maine?” huya havigae.

Havigageno Yisasia kenonaamia mage huno hie “Hale yamaaene kanomoa tamakaipina osi kana kanoa maine. Hani kisia yana vayi huno aiso hu-lama-tesia yafe hale yama hanea kanale vaiyatete hiho. Hani-ki-mainea yapima mainaya veamoya visaya kana oagenae.
Hale yamaama hanea kanafina hale yamaaene kanohe ‘Tamage nehane.’ hutama havitama tamakupi maletama tamametiti hiho. Aniama hisayana hale yamo nafaneyaga maigahae.” huno hama-pai-maine.
Yisasia mani kea huteno neamataleno mo fala-ki-maine.
Mukia tokiya avameyamo amaulagafi alianagi agaifena haviya amakupina maleya amametitia nohae.
Ani yafe Anumaya Kotina aune kanoa, Aisaiyaa, hu-mainea kea falote huno tamage nehie. Mage huno hu-maineane
“Anumayamoga manima hu-mainona kea taya haviya amakuafina maleya amametitia nehae? Anumayamoa tokiya avame yamaa amave-ligeya hana veamoya havilama nehae?” huno kae-maleneane.
Higeno amuha ohunayanagiya Yisasifena haviya amakupina maleya amametitia ohunaya yafe Aisaiyaa nagoene mage huno humaineane

“Amaulaga oagesaya yafe Anumaya Kotia amaulaga ago alino asu hu-ma-tene. Amaku amakesa havilama ohisaya yafe ‘Yafa kana amanuene veane maiho.’ hu-ma-tene. Havigu amakua ai-yahae huya nagaitega eyafenagina ali hilato hu oama-tegahue.” huno hu-maineane.
Aisaiyaa Yisasina tokiya hale yamaa ageteno Yisasife mani kea hu-maineane.

Hu-maineanagi Yuta kava vayayagafitila kasagoya vayamoya Yisasife haviya amakupi maleya amametitia hayanagi Falasia vayamoya mage hae “Mani kavama hisayana mono nopina omegahae huta nagalu hu-lama-tegahune.” huya hu-mainaya yafe “Yisasina tagua neamune.” huya hu-falote ohunae.
Ani veamoya Anumaya Kotia “Kanale kava nehae.” huno amakima alisaga hisia yafena nohamaigi veamoya “Kanale kava nehae.” huya amaki alisaga hisaya yafeke nehamaiye.

Yisasia tokiyaage ke hu-haleno mage hu-maine “Nagoa veamogatama nagaifema tamage nehie hutama tamakupi maletama tamametitima hisayana nagainigefena tamakupina maletama tamametitia hu-nona-tagi hu-na-tenea kanomofeene hu-nea-tae.
Nagoa veamoyama nagaima nenagayana Nenafaa hu-na-tenea kanoene age-mainae.
Nagayama ma mopalema emainoana hale ya kana huna emainoe. Nagoke nagoke veamoya nagaifema haviya amakupima maleya amametitima hisayana haniki-mainea yapina omaigahae.

Nagoa veamogatama nagai kema havitetama nakavema omalesayana nagaya tamakaila kaiyekea hu otama-tegahue. Ma mopale veamogamina kaiyekea hu-ma-tegahue huna omenogi ma mopale veamogamina amaugafa ali-gatigahue huna emainoe.
Nagoa veamoya nagaifema amakavenoma huya nagai kema amakupima aliya omalesayana hu-mainoa kenimoa fako hu-ma-tegahie. Ma mopama hano hisia kanama evayima hisiana hu-mainoa kenimoa fako hu-ma-tegahie.
Mani kea nagesafitila ali falote huna tamaha-nopaugi hu-na-tenea Nenafa ‘Nage mage huka huo.’ huno naha-paiya keage tamaha-nepauve.

Nagaya ago havilinoe agai kema havitama tamakupima maletama tamametitima hisayana ofalitama agola maige maige hisaya tamahaimula aligahae. Nani yafe Nenafaa naha-pai-mainea kea tamaha-nepauve.” huno nehie.

Anumaya Kotima amakinagomogami amaugafama ali-gati-mainea yafe ala imu kigahe nehae. Ani imu kisaya kanaamimoa aupa hugahe nehigeno Yisasia ma agesa havimaine “Ma mopa atalena Nenafatega visua kanamoa ago evayi nehie.” huno nehuno mukia kanalema ma mopale maineyama agai kema nehaviya veamogamifena tusiya huno hau ayamopafi nehaino agola haume haume haino mo fali-maine.

Yisasienema tokaeya nemaiya tuelufua (12) anagaaene unena kavela nenageno Satania Yutasifena “Havisigi huka agesi huka hama-pai-sanageya Yisasina haesae.” huno agu agesa amine. Ani Yutasia nago agia Isakaliotia Saimonina nemofoe.
Satania aniama hisia agu agesa amigeno Yisasia ma agesa havimaine “Nenafaa mukia tokiya ago nayapi maleneanagina Anumaya Kotia hu-na-tegena emainoafe etena Anumaya Kotitega haigahue.” huno hu-maine.
Nehuno kavema neneletila neataleno he-tino ayaaya kenaa hateno nemaleno taulia alino amupi ai-gagino fai-line.
Fai-lineno tina alino yopafi taki-maleneno aepa heno agaia tuelufua (12) anagaamogami amaiya agupia sese hu neama-teno ai-gagi-linea taulileti alino hau hu-neamate.
Ali hau hu-ma-teme Saimoni Pitate vigeno Saimoni Pitaa Yisasife mage hie “Alaniamoga naigai naiya sese hu-na-tegahe nehano? Sese hu ona-tegane.” huno hu-maine.
Higeno Yisasia mage hie “Kagaya nagayama nehua kavala menia ohavinanagi haenagaa havilama huka havigane.” huno hapaiye.
Ha-paigeno Pitaa Yisasifena mage hie “Kagaya naiya sese ohutafa huka sese ohugane.” huno higeno Yisasia kenonaa mage hie “Kaiyama sesema ohisuana nagaienena omaitafa huka omaigane.” huno hapaiye.
Hapaigeno Saimoni Pitaa mage hie “Alaniamoga naama hinageka naiyaagela sese hu ona-teka nayaene nanuene sese hu-nato.” huno hapaiye.

Ha-paigeno Yisasia kenonaa mage huno hapaiye “Nagoa veamoya mukia amaugafama sese hu-malenaya veala amaugafalela oniyaamia omaleno haigafaage hamau-maineanagiya amaiyaage sese hugahae. Tamakaila kefo yama haya oniyatamia omaleno haigafananamaage hu-mainagi nagoke kanomona oniyaage hau-maine.” huno hama-paiye.
Hama-paiteno Yisasia agaima agesima huno haegahema hia kanoa ago age-mainea yafe “Tamakaya mukiamogatamina oniyatamia omalene huna nohue.” huno nehie.
Amaiya sese hu-ma-teteno kenaa alino vai-lino mopale maineno mage huno hama-vige “Nagayama hu-lama-toa kavala ago havilama nehafio?
Tamakaya nagaifema ‘Hulave-nelina kanomogae.’ nehutama ‘Alatimogae.’ hutamama nehayana tamage hutama nehae. Nagaya ani kanoema hutama haya kano mainoe.
Nagaya Alatamimona hu-lama-ve-neloa kanotamimona tamaiya sese hu-nelama-toe. Tamakaya ania hutama nelamafugami amaiya sese hu-ma-teho.
Nagaya hisaya kavala ago tamave-neluafe tamakaya nagayama hu-lama-toa kavala ania hu-ma-teho.
Nagaya tamagelafa huna tamaha-nepauve aliya kanoamoa kava kanoamona agaseno omainegi kayo kayo kanoamoa hu-tenea kanomona agaseno omaine.
Tamakaya mani kema havilamama hutetama mani kavama hisayana kanaleya hutama maigahae.

Nagaya ‘Kanaleya hutama maigahaema.’ hunama hua kea mukiamogatamifena nohugi nagayama nahaigena huyo-gi-malenoa-maamogamife nehavina mani kea nehue. Anumaya Koti kema nayoma kae-malenaya kemoa mage hu-maineane
‘Nagaienema maineno kavema nenea kanomoa aiya alisaga huno nagaila aye-nalata-pegahie.’ huno kae-maleneane.
Kae-maleneanagi meni kanafina mani kemoa efalote huno tamage hugahe nehie.

Haenagaa mani kemoma efalote hisigetama nagaifena mage hugahae ‘Agaya Anumaya Koti nafane maine.’ hutama havitetama tamakupima maletama tamametitima hisaya yafe menia ani kana yaufa falote ohunea kanafi tamaha-nepauve.

Tamage-lafa huna tamaha-nepauve nagoa veamoya nagayama hu-ma-tesua veama amavaleya falu falama hu-ma-tesayana nagaila ania huya navaleya falu fala hu-nena-tae. Nagaima navaleyama falu fala hu-natesayana hu-na-tenea kanomona ania huya avaleya falu fala hu-neatae.”

Yisasia mani kea hama-paitegeno aipamoa kanaage higeno agu agesama havia agesamoa hivi huno talavate oategeno mani kea hu-falote nehie “Lamage huna tamaha-nepauve tamakaipitila nago kanomoga vayamo havisigi huka nagesi huka kame ya hu-na-tegane.” huno hie.
Higeya agaia tuelufua (12) anagaamoya oaufi aaufi hugetayana higeya “Tafepiga nehie?” huya mani kanomofena ohavinae.
Ohavigena nagaya Yonina agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagapi nemauvanagino hau ayamopafi nagaifena hau-mainea kanogina avate tokaetaa mainoe.
Mainogeno Saimoni Pitaa anuteti avamename huno “Havigo.” huno naha-paino “Tafe nehane huka havigo.” huno nehie.
Higena nagaya Yisasina avaale mime una mainena mage huna havigoe “Alaniamogae tafe nehane?” huna havigoe.

Havigogeno Yisasia mage huno hie “Nagayama kavema alinama supufi ayetenama alina amisua kanoa nagesima hisia kano maine.” huno nehuno ani kavela alino supufi ayeteno Yutasia, Saimoni Isakaliotina nemofo amine.
Ani kavela amigeno alitegeno Satania aguafinaga mo hai-faleno mainegeno Yisasia mage huno hapaiye “Kagaya aupaa hisuema hisana kavala ago huo.” huno hie.
Higeya anilema mopale mainaya vayamoya Yisasia Yutasife hianagi ani kemona aepaa nohaviye.

Ohavinagi Yutasia mone pokisiamile yagaino nemaiya kanogiya nagoa vayamoya mage huya amakesa nehaviye “Yisasia agaifena ‘Ala imule mo nesuna yana molika eno.’ huno nehifi ifi ‘Moneamima omalenea vaya nagoa mone molika amamio.’ huno nehifi?” huya amakesa havimainae.
Havigeno Yutasia ani kavela aliteno aupaa kumatega hati-laviana tusia hani ki-mainea yapi umaine.
Yutasia ago utegeno Yisasia mage huno hie “Menia ikapinagati emainoa kanoa vayamo natenea kanomoni nagia ali-saga hugahae. Nagaima nahaesagena falisugenoa Anumaya Kotia ala agi aligahie.
Nagaya falisua yafe Anumaya Koti agima ali-saga hisayana Anumaya Kotia navalesigena agaiene maigahue. Aupaa navaleno tokiya hale yapi ala nagi namigahie.

Nafaneyagania tamakaienena nagaya osi kana kanoa maitena visugetama nagaifena natiyegahayanagi amuha ohunayanagitama visua kumatela ougahae. Mani kea Yuta veamogami hama-pai-mainoanagina menia tamakaila tamaha-nepauve.

Menia nagola ohavinaya kahegi kea tamaha-paigahugi haviho. Nelama-fugamifena tamahau tamayamopafi tamahaino. Amakaya ania huya tamakaifena hamaisie. Nagayama tamakaifema nahau nayamopafima nahaiya kava hutama nelama-fugamifena tamahau tamayamopafi tamahaino. Amakaya ania huya tamakaifena hamaisie.

Nagi tamakaya mukia nelama-fugamifena tamahau tamayamopafima lamahaisiana muki veamoya tamakaila lamaketeya tamakaifena mage huya hugahae ‘Yisasienema tokaeya nemaiya anaga mainae.’ huya hugahae.” huno hie.
Saimoni Pitaa mage huno havige “Alaniamogae hanatega ugane?” huno havigegeno Yisasia mage huno hie “Visua kumatela menia nakavela ouganagi haenagaage nakavela ugane.” huno hie.
Higeno Pitaa mage huno hie “Alaniamogae nagaya na ya hinagena menia kakavela ougahe hugeka nehane? Nagaya kagaifene huna nahaimula atalegahue.” huno hie.

Higeno Yisasia mage huno havige “Kagaya nagaifene huka kahaimula atalegano? Tamagelafa huna kaha-nepauve hagoteno kokolemoa agea oainesigeka kagaya tagufa (3) kanale avane huka nagia alika fala-kigane.” huno hie.

Yisasia mage huno hu-maine “Mukia veamogatama tamaipamoa kanaage huno tamakesa kumoa ohino. Anumaya Kotife havitama tamakupi maletama tamametiti haya kava nehutama nagaifena havitama tamakupi maletama tametiti hiho.
Nenafa nopina veala maisaya nona kasagoya hane. Ani yama omalesina nagaya mani kea ohuleasine. Nagaya kumatamia molina talo tala hu-lama-tegahe ugahue.
Nagaya kumatamia mo lalo tala hu-maletena etena me lamavalesugetama visua kumatela visageta nagaiene mo lokaeta maigahune.
Tamakaya nagayama visua kumamo kana ago age-mainae.” huno hie.
Higeno Tomasia mage huno hie “Alatimogae tagaya visana kumala oagenone. Hanaa huta ani kana agesune?” huno hie.

Higeno Yisasia mage huno hapaiye “Nagaya ikapinaga visaya kamona Nefanae. Nagaya ke-lamage kemona aepaa mainoe. Nagaya agola maige maige yamo hamaimula aepaa mainoafe nagoa veamoya Nenafatega visayana alu katetila ougahagi nagaiteke esae.
Tamakaya nagaima havimainaleasipa Nenafafena ania hutama havileasine. Tamakaya menia aepa hetama Nenafana ago havitetama age-mainae.” huno hie.
Higeno Filipia mage huno hapaiye “Alanimogae negafana taveligeta agesunageno tagu tamemoa tamu hisie.” huno hie.

Higeno Yisasia mage huno hapaiye “Filipigae ayaaya kanale tamakaienena maime emainoana kagaya nagaila onagenano? Nagoa veamoya nagaima nage-mainayana ania huya Nenafana age-mainae. Naa higeka ‘Negafana lave-lio huka nehane?’

Nagaya Nenafa aguafina maugeno Nenafaa ania huno nagai naguafina mainea yafena havika kagupina nomalano? Tamaha-pai-mainoa kea nagesafiti kea tamaha-opainoe. Aao. Nenafaa nagai nagupi maineno agaia aliyamaa nealie.

Nagaya Nenafa aguafi maugeno ania huno Nenafaa nagaila naguafina maigetaa hu-mainoema hunama hua kea havitama tamakupina maletama tamametiti hiho. Mani kema ohavinutama tamakaya mukia aliyama ali-mainoa aliyama age-mainesayana nagaifena havitama tamakuafi ali maletama tamametiti hiho.

Tamage-lafa huna tamaha-nepauve nagoa veamoya nagaifema haviya amakupi nemalaya veamoya mukiama ali-mainoa aliyana ania huya aligahae. Nagaya Nenafatega visua yafe anima alisaya aliyamoa ali-mainoa aliyana agaseya aligahae.
Nafaneamonife huya Nenafaa agima ali-saga hisaya yafe tamakaya nagai kema havitetama nagai nagi ayetama mukia yafena naha-vi-gesagena ania hu-lama-tegahue.
Mukia yafema nagai nagima ayetama naha-vi-gesayana afaa ani yana hu-lama-tegahue.” huno hu-maine.
Mani kea huteno mage hie “Tamakaya nagaifema tamahau tamayamopafima tama-haisigetamahena tamaha-pai-mainoa kemona akave malegahae.
Akave malesagena Nenafatega havigesugeno tamaya hisia Avamula hu-tesigeno tamakaite eno agola tamakaiene emaige maige huno maigahie.

Ani Alu Aotage Avamula tamageage kemona aepaa maineno hulama-ve-ligahie. Mukia ma mopale yafema amaugafama aliya nehaiya veamoya Alu Aotage Avamula ageya havilama ohunaya yafe oavalegahagi tamakaya ago age-lama hutama age-mainaya yafe tamakaienena emaineno tamakupi haino maigahie.
Na yafe tama-talesugetama megusa nafane kana hutama omaigahayanagina tamakaitela etena egahue.

Okasi kanaa ma mopale yafema amaugafama aliya nehaiya veamoya nagoene onagegahayanagitama tamakaya nagegahae. Agola maige maige yamona aepaa mainoafe tamakaya ania hutama maige maige hisaya tamahaimula alitama maigahae.
Mainesageno Alu Aotage Avamumoma esia kanafina nagaya Nenafaene mainoanagitama tamakaya ania hutama nagaienena maisagena nagaya ania huna tamakaienema mainoa yafena havilama hutama havigahae.

Nagoa veamoya nagai kema haviya akave malenuya nagaifena hamau amayamopafifna hamau-maine. Nagaifema hamau amayamopafima hamau-mainesia veamoya Nenafaa ania huno amakaifena hau ayamopafina nehaiye. Nehaigena nagaienena ania huna nahau nayamopafina nenahaigena nagua amamisugeya nagaila nage-lama huya nagegahae.” huno hie.

Higeno nago kanoa, Yutasi Isakalioti omagi, hamoamoa mage huno Yisasina havige “Alanimogae naa higeka kagaya tagaila taulagafina kagaika aepakaa tave-nelinagi mukia ma mopale yafema amaugafama aliya nehaiya veamogami amaulagafina hu-falote huka ohunanane?” huno havinege.

Havigegeno Yisasia mage huno hie “Nagoa veamoyama nagaifema hamau amayamopafima hamaisigeyahena nagai kemona akave malesagenofena Nenafaa amakaifena ania huno hau ayamopafina haugahie. Nenafaene nagainienena amakaiene emaigahue.
Nagoa veamoya nagaifema hamau amayamopafima ohamaisiana nagai kemona akavela nomalae. Manima tamaha-nepauva kea nagainige kea omalegi hu-na-tenea Nenafa ke hane.
Tamakaienema mainena mani kea ago tamaha-pai-mainoe.

Tamaha-pai-mainoanagino Nenafaa nagai nagilema hu-tesia kanomoa, tamayama hisia Alu Aotage Avamulagino emaineno mukia yana hulamave-liteno mukia tamaha-pai-mainoa kea alino tamakesa hao hinagetama havigahae.

Tama-talena ugahe tamaipa falu hutama maisaya tamaku tamakesa nelamamue. Nagayama naipa falu huna nemauva nagu nagesa nelamamue. Anima tamaipa falu hutama maisaya yama tamamua yana ma mopale veamoya amaipa falu nehaya ya kana ohunegi kanaage tamaku tamakesa havitama kolia ohiho.

‘Tamatalena utena etena tamakaitega egahuema.’ huna tamaha-pauva kea ago havilinae. Nagaifema tamahau tamayamopafima nelamahaisigetamahena Nenafa mainelega visua yafena muse haleasine. Nenafaa nagaseno ala kano mainea yafe Nenafa mainelega visua yafena muse haleasine.
Tamatalena visua kanafina nagaife havitama tamakupi maletama tamametitima hisaya yafe yaufa ani kana falote ohunea kanafi menia mani kea tamaha-nepauve.
Satania, ma mopalema kava hu-mainea kanoa ago neeanagina nagaya nagoene kea ohugahue. Satanina tokiyaamoa nagaila onagaseneanagi Nenafa nahapai-mainea kava huna faligahue.
Nagayama Nenafafema nahau nayamopafi nenagea kavala ma mopale veamoya havisaya yafe Nenafa naha-pai-mainea kava nehue. Hai nehugi vigetao.” huno nehie.
Yisasia mage huno hie “Nagaya tamage huna vaini alagamo nofi maugeno Nenafaa ani vaini alagamo nofi hoyalela yagai-maine.
Agaya mukia nagai vaini nofi akopamoa alagama oayea akopayaga atagi neataleno alagama ayea akopayaga ‘Nagoene alaga ayesie.’ huno aia alino hagalo nehie.
Tamaha-pai-mainoa kemoa tamakaila ago alino hagalo higeno oniyatamia omalenegi kanale tamahau-maine.

Tamakaya nagaienema ai-gamaesayana nagaya tamakaienena ai-gamaena maigahue. Nago vaini alagamo nofimo akopamoma nofitema ai-okamaesiana alaga oayegahie. Naa hu-maineafe tamakaya nagaila navaalema ai-okamaesayana tamakaya alaga oayegahae.

Nagaya vaini alagamo nofi maugetama tamakaya ani vaini alaga nofimo akopaa mainae. Tamakaya nagaienema ai okamaesayana nagoa kanale kavala ohugahae. Kanale kavama hinutamahena nagaiene ai-kamaetama maiho. Nagoa veamoyama nagaienema ai-gamaeya maisagena nagayama amakaienema ai-kamaena maisuana kasagoya nofi alagamo kavea ayegahae.
Nagoa veamoya nagaienema ai-okamaesayana oayea vaini nofimo akopama atagiya hagayu hu-talagenoma hagage nehia kava nehae. Ani akopayaga alitalu huya atafi kae-talenae.
Tamakaya nagaienema aigamaetama maisayana nagai kemoa tamakupina hanesigetama nagoa yafema naha-vi-gesayana naha-vi-gesaya yana hu-lama-tegahue.
Tamakayama kasagoya nofi alagamo kavema aye-gasagoma hisaya yateti Nenafaa ala agia aligahie. Alinagetama-nagitama tamakaya nagaienema tokaeya nemaiya anaga maigahae.
Nenafaa nagaifena hau ayamopafi hau-mainea kava huna tamakaifena ania huna nahau nayamopafi nenahaiye. Nahau nayamopafima nenahaiya yamo aguafinaga faletama maiho.

Nagaya Nenafama hu-mainea kahegi kema havinama akave maloa yafe Nenafaa nagaifena hau ayamopafina nehaiye. Tamakaya ania hutama hu-mainoa kahegi kea havitama akave malesayana tamakaifema nahau nayamopafi nenahaiya yamo aguafinaga faletama maigahae.
Nagai naguafima muse yama hanea yana tamakai tamakupi male hava-telama-tesua yafe mani kea tamaha-pai-mainoane.

Nahau-mainea kavala mage huna nehue ‘Nagaya tamakaifema nahau nayamopafima nahaiya kava hutama nelama-fugamifena tamahau tamayamopafi tamahainageno ania huya amakaya tamakaifena hamau amayamopafina hamaino.’ huna tamaumonola nemaloe.
Nago kanomoma nefufema ‘Kagai kaugafama ali-gatisua yafene huna nagaya faligahue.’ hunoma hisiana mukia veamogami hamau amayamopafima nehamaiya kavala amakasegahie.
Nagayama nehua kema akave malenutamahena nagaini nenafugatama maigahae.

Nagaya tamakaifena ‘Aliya vayanimogatama mainae.’ huna nagoene ohugahue. Nago aliya kanomoa kava kanoamoma aliyama alia aepaa oagenegi nagaya mukia yama Nenafama naha-pai-mainea kea ago tamaha-pai-mainoa yafe ‘Aliya vayanimogatama mainae.’ huna ohugahugi agoma tamaha-nepauva yafe ‘Tamakaya nagai kanapa mainae.’ huna nehue.

Tamakaya nagaila nagetama hu-yookinagi nagaya hagotena tamakaila tamakena hu-yogitena tamakaitami utama Anumaya Koti haisia kava hisaya yafe hu-yogilama-tenoe. Aniama hisaya yapiti alagaa falote huteya agola mainesagetama nagai nagilema Nenafatega havigesayana mukia havigesaya yana tamamigahie.
Kahegi kea mage huna tamaumonola nemaloe nelama-fugamifena tamahau tamayamopafi tamahainageya ania huya tamakaifena hamau amayamopafi hamaino.”
“Ma mopale yafema amaugafama aliya nehaiya veamoya tamakaila kamema hu-lama-tesagetamahena tamakesa hao hinagetama haviho. Hagoteya nagaila ania huya kamea hu-na-tenayane.

Tamakaya ma mopale veamoya nehaya kavama hutama mainaleasipa mani mopale veanemoya hamau amayamopafi tamakaifena hamaileasinagi nagaya ma mopafi vayapiti tamakena hu-yogi-malenoafe tamakaya mani mopale vea kana veane omainae. Na yafe ma mopale yafema amaugafama aliya nehaiya veanemoya amakesa nehaviya kamea hu-nelama-tae.

Nagaya mage huna ago tamaha-pai-mainoe ‘Aliya kanoamoa kava kanoamona oagasene.’ huna hu-mainoane. Ani kehe tamakesa havitama maiho. Nagoa veamoya nagaima, tamakai kava kanotamimonima, aliya haviyama hu-na-taya kava huya ania huya tamakaila aliya haviya hu-lama-tegahayanagi nagoa veamoya nagai kema haviya akave nemalesaya veamoya tamakai kea ania huya haviya akave malegahae.
Hu-na-tenea kanomona havilama huya ohavinaya yafe ani kavala hu-lama-tegahae. Tamakaya nagai veanema mainaya yafenagiya ani kavala hu-lama-tegahae.
Nagaya enama kema hama-opauleasina ‘Kefo katia hane.’ huya ohaleasine. Afaa ago me hama-pauvanagi kefo yama hu-mainaya yafena kalagi aiteya agasesaya katamia omalene.
Nagaima kamema hu-na-tesaya veanemoya Nenafaene kamea hu-neatae.
Nagaya amakaipima mainenama nagoa veamoyama tokiya kavama ohuleasina ‘Kefo yatia hane.’ huya ohaleasinagi ago alugeya ageteya nagaiene Nenafaenena kamea hu-nelaa-tae.

Amakai kahegi kema kae-malenaya kemoa nagaifena mage hu-mainayane ‘Havi kavala ohunegeya kamea afaa hu-nea-tae.’ huya kae-malenayane. Mani kemoa ago falote huno tamage hisia yafe nagaila kamea hu-nena-tae.
Nenafategati tamaya hisia vekaa hu-tesugenoma esiana tamageage ke huno tamaha-paisia vekaa, Alu Aotage Avamula Nenafategatima esiana nagaifena tamaha-paigahie.
Tamaha-paigahianagitama nagaya aliyama aepa hena ali-mainoa kanaleti tamakayama nagaienema mainaya yafe nagaifena veamogamina hama-paigahae.”
Yisasia mage huno hie “Nagaifema tamakupima ago malenaletima neataletama alu kate ovisaya yafe mani kea tamaha-pai-mainoe.

Amakaya tamakaila mono nopitila tamavaleya tamanati-talegahae. Ani kanama esia kanafina nagoa veamoya tamakaila nelamahaeya ma amakesa havigahae ‘Mani kavama nehunana Anumaya Kotina akave nemalone.’ huya hugahae.
Nenafaene nagaienema amakua otaaminaya yafe ani kavala hu-lama-tegahae.

Ani kanama falote hisia kanafina tamaha-pai-mainoa kemoa tamakesa ai-hagalo hinagetama havilama hisaya yafe menia mani kea tamaha-nepauve. Ehe kanafina tamakaienema mainoa yafe nayona ani kea tamaha-opainoane.
Nagaima hu-na-tegena emainoa kanolega menia etena ugahuanagitama nago vekamoga nagaifena ‘Hanatega nevane?’ huka nahavi-nokane.
Nahavi-nokayanagi nagayama tamaha-pai-mainoa kehe tamakesa havitama tamahau nehae.

Tamahau nehayanagi tamage-lafa huna tamaha-nepauve nagayama ovisuana tamaya hisia kanoa omegahigi nagayake utena tamaya hisia kanoa hu-tesugeno tamakaitegama esiana kanale kanaa falote hu-lama-tegahie.

Efalotema hisiana tamaya hisia kanomoa mukia ma mopale veamogami kefo yama nehaya aepaamiene kanale kavama nehaya aepaamiene Anumaya Kotia kaiyekema hu-ma-tesia yamo aepaaene hu-falote hisigeya haviteya agegahae.
Kefo yamo aepamofena tamaya hisia kanomoa mage huno hugahie ‘Yisasifena havitama tamakupi maletama tamametiti nohaya yafe kefo yatamia hane.’ huno hugahie.
Nagaya Nenafa mainelega etena ugahuanagitama nagoene nagaila onagesayafe tamaya hisia vekamoa kanale kavama hisaya yamo aepaa hu-falote hinagetama havitetama agegahae.
Anumaya Kotia ma mopale kava kanoa, Satanina, ago kaiyekea hu-tenea yafe tamaya hisia vekaa Anumaya Kotima kaiyekema hu-ma-tesia yamo aepamoa hu-falote hinagetama havitetama agegahae.
Nagaya kasagoya kea tamaha-paigahe nehuanagi kanaage hu-mainea yafe tamakaya havilama hutama ohavigahae.

Ohavigahayanagi Anumaya Kotina tamageage nehia Avamuamoma esiana agaialegati mukia Anumaya Koti tamageage kea tamaha-paigahie. Agesafiti kea tamaha-opaigahianagino nehavia keageene haenagama esia kanafima falote hisia yamo kene tamaha-paigahie.
Tamaha-painageno ani kanomoa nagayama hu-mainoa kea tamakaila tamaha-paisia yafe nagai nagia tusiya huno ali-saga hugahie.
Hugahianagi mukia Nenafama malenea yana nagainia yamaage fatago huno hanea yafe mage hu-mainoe ‘Alu Aotage Avamumoa amisua kea alino tamakaila me lamaha-paigahie.’ huna hu-mainoe.”
“Osi kana kanoa nagoene onagegahagi osi kana kanoa maitetama etetama nagegahae.” huno hie.

Higeya nagoa agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagaamoya amakaiamifina mage hae “Osi kana kanoa onagegahae huno nehuno etetama osi kana kanoa nagegahae huno nehunoma nehia kemona aepaamoa hanaa hu-maine? ‘Nenafatega visua yafe nehue.’ huno nehia kemona aepaa nohavune.
Osi kanaaema hia kemona aepaa naane huno nehie? Tagaya agayama hia kea nohavune.” huya nehae.

Nehuya havigegahema haya kea Yisasia ago aguafinaga haviteno mage huno hie “Hua kemoa ‘Osi kana kanoa nagaila onagegahagi etetama osi kanaa maitetama nagegahaema.’ hua kehena tamakaya lamakaya tamakaitamifina mani kemona aepaahe huge havige nehao?
Tamage-lafa huna lamaha-pauve tamakaya tamatalenama visua yafena avia ategahayanagi ma mopale veamoya muse hugahae. Tamakaila hagoteno tamahau hu-tesigetama haenagaa ai-yahae hutama muse hugahae.
Amoma nafanema ategahema nehuno agatama aisia kana falote hisia yafe hauna hianagi nafanema ago atetenoa ‘Nafanea ago atoe.’ huno muse nehuno agatama ai-mainea yafena age-kani-maine.
Ani kanamoa tamakaipina hane. Menia tamakaya tamahau nehayanagi etena tamakesugenoa tamakupina muse yamoa hiya hinageno nago kanomoa ani muse yana tamaha-ofalegahie.

Ani kanama evayima hisiana tamakaya nagaila nago yafena nahavi-okegahae. Tamage-lafa huna tamaha-pauve nagaifema hutama nagai nagima ayetama nago yafema Nenafama havigesayana mukia havigesaya yana afaa tamamigahie.
Nayoene meniene nagaifena nehutama nagia ayetama nagoke yafena Nenafana haviokenayane. Nagi menia muse yatamimoma tamakupina hiya huno hanesia yafena nahavigegena tamamino.”
“Mani kea tamakaila avame kefi hu-malena tamaha-nepauvanagi haenagaa mani avame kea nagoene ohugahuanagina hu-falote huna Nenafafena tamaha-paigahue.

Hu-falote hisugetama ani kanafina nagai nagile havigegahagi nagaya ‘Tamakaifena Nenafana havigegahue.’ huna ohunogi tamakaya nagaifena tamahau tamayamopafi nelamahaiya yafe Nenafaa tamakaifena hau ayamopafi nehainageno havigesaya yana agaia tamamigahie. Nagayama Anumaya Kotitegati emainoa kema tamakupi malenaya yafe Nenafaa tamakaifena hau ayamopafi nehaiye.
Nagaya Nenafaene mainoleti ma mopafina emainoe. Menia nagaya mani mopa atalena Nenafatega ugahue.” huno hie.
Higeya agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagamoya mage hae “E, avame kefiti menia nohanagi hu-falote huka nehane.

Menia tagaya havunana kagaya mukia yana havimalenane. Mukia veamoya amakupima haviya yana ago havimainana yafe nago kanomoa nago yafena kahavi-okesie. Mukia yana havimainana yafe tagaya kagaifena Anumaya Kotitegati emainane huta tagupi malenone.” huya hae.
Yisasia kenonaamilela mage huno hie “Meni tamakaya havitama tamakupina nemaletama tamametiti nehafio?

Haviho nago kanamoa aupaa egahema hia kanamoa ago efalote hu-maine. Ani kanafina nagoke nagokemogatama nataletama kumatamile ute ete hugahae. Nataletama visagena nagainige maigahuanagi Nenafaa nagaienena maine.

Tamakua namitetama tamaipa falu hutama hilato hutama maisaya yafe mani kea tamaha-pai-mainoe. Ma mopale mainesageno nago kanaage yamoa falote hugahianagi kolia ohiho. Nagaya ma mopafi auava yana ago agasena kava yagai-mainoe.” huno hu-maine.

Yisasia mani kea huteno ikapinaga age-saga hu-maineno Anumayamotega mage huno hie “Nenafagae falisua kanania ago efalote hie. Nekamona kagi ali-saga hisua yafe falitena he-tina kagaitega haisua yafe lokiya hale yania nekamonina namio.
Nekamonia mukiama naminana veamogamina agola maige maige hisaya hamaimuamima amamisua yafe mukia veamote kava yagaisua tokiyania ago naminane.

Anumaya Kotiga kagaikage ala tokiya kanoa tamagemona tamaa nagokeage Anumaya mainanagi veamoya kagaifema havilama huya maisayana hu-tenana kanoa ‘Yisasia veamogami amaku amamemaa ali-gatisia kanoa ikapinagati emainea kano maine.’ huya havilama hisayana maige maige hisaya hamaimula aligahae.

Naminana tokiya hale yatetia ma mopalela kagia alisaga hu-mainoe. Naminana aliyana ago alina avaya aye-mainoa yafe Nenafagae meni kanafina kagai kavate mainesugeka tokiya hale yania namio. Ma mopama talo ohunana kanafina kagaiene mainoanagina tokiya hale yania haneanagi menia eteka ani yana namio.
Ma mopafi veapitima naminana veamogamina ago aepakaa hu-falote huna hama-pai-mainoe. Ani veala kagaikaa veanegika nagaila ago naminane. Naminanageya ani veamoya kagai kea atafa hu-linae.
Atafa hu-lineya mukia naminana yana kagaikaalegati emaine huya menia ago havilinae.

Naminana kea ago amamugeya ago atafa huya havilama hulineya nagayama kagaitegatima emainoa yafena tamage nehie huya havilama hu-lineya kagayama hu-na-tanagena emainoa yafena amakupi maleya amametiti nehae.

Amakaifena Nenafagale ke huna kahavi-negoe. Ma mopale yafema amaugafa aliya nehaiya veafe Nenafagale menia kahavi-nokogi kagaikaama naminana veanea kagai veane mainaya yafe naminana veafe kahavi-negoe.
Nagai veala kagai veale. Kagai veala nagai vea mainageya ani veanimoyama nagai tokiyaleti haya kavala nehageya mopale veamoya ageteya nagai nagia alisaga nehae.

Ali-saga nehagena menia ma mopaletila atalena kagaitega ugahuanagi nagaifema amakupi nemalaya veala ma mopafi maigahagi alu aotage Nenafaga kagaika kagileti naminana nagilema hanea tokiyaleti auvai-ma-tesanana taagaya nagoke kanolatama mainoa ya huya amakaya nagoke kate maleya nagoke veane maisae.

Nagaya amakaiene mainena kagayama naminana nagilema hanea tokiyaleti auvai-ma-togeno nagomoa hani-ki-mainea yapima tegelege nehia atafina ougahagi Anumaya Koti kema kae-malenaya kemoma efalote huno tamagema hisia yafe anima hani-ki-mainea yapima tegelege nehia atafima visia kanoa Yutasia agaiage ugahie.
Menia etena kagaitega egahugi nagayama nehua muse yaniamoa amakai amakupina hava-tesia yafe ma mopale mainena mani kea hama-nepauve.

Hama-nepaina kagai kea ago amaminogi nagaya ma mopafi kanoa omainoe. Alu nagu nameene kano mainogeya amakaya nagayama hua kava huya ma mopale veane kana vea omainae. Alu amaku amameene veane mainaya yafe ma mopale veamoya amakaife amaipa kafa he-ma-teya kamea hu-neama-tae.

Kamea hu-neama-tayanagi nagaya veanimogamifena ‘Ma mopaleti amavalesaga huo.’ huna kahavi-nokogi ‘Satanima aye-mavataga hu yafe auvai-mateka amaugafa ali-gatisanageya kayeya maisae.’ huna kaha-vi-negoe.
Nagaya ma mopale kanoa omainoe. Alu nagu nameene kano mainogeya amakaya nagai kana huya ma mopale veanea omainae. Alu amaku amameene veane mainae.
Mainayafe kagaika ke-lamage kekaleti alu aotage veane maisaya amaku amakesa amamio. Kagayama hu-mainana kemoa tamageage nehie.
Kagaya ma mopafima nagaima hu-natanagena emainoa kava huna naminana veanea nagaya mopale veamogami amunopi ago hu-ma-tenoe.
Nagi tamage huya amaku amamemaamona kagaila kamisaya yafe nagaya nagu namemaamona kagaila negamue.
Nagaienema mainaya veaneagefena kahavi-nokogi amakayama hisaya keleti nagaifema haviya amakupi maleya amametitima hisaya veafeene kahavi-negoe.

Nenafagae mage huna kahavi-negoe kagaya nagaienema mainagena nagaya kagaienema maugetaama hua kava huya nagaifema amakupi malenaya veala nagoke vea kanoa taagaiene maisageya mukia mopale veamoya kagayama hu-na-tanagenama emainoa yafema haviya amakupi maleya amametiti hisae.
Taagayama nagoke taaipalema maua kava huya nagoke amaipale maisaya yafe naminana tokiya hale yania ago amaminoe.

Amakaya nagoke vea kanoa mai-lama huya maisaya yafe nagaya amakaienena maugeka kagaya nagaienena mainane. Kagaya hu-na-tanagena emainoa yafema mukia mopale veamoya havisaya yafeene nagaifena kahau kayamopafi negahaigeka ania huka ma mopale veafeene kahau kayamopafi kahau-mainea yama havisaya yafe kagai kema havimalenaya veamoya nagoke vea kanoa maisae.
Nenafagae ma mopama taloma ohunana kanafina nagaifena kahau kayamopafi kahaigekama naminana tokiya hale yania nagaima naminana veamoya agesaya yafe nagaya maisua kumate maisae huna nehue.

Kanaleya huka fatago hu-mainana Nenafagae ma mopale yafema amaugafa aliya nehaiya veamoya kagaila okagenagi nagaya ago kagaila kage-mainoafe ma ma mainaya veamoya nagaima hu-na-tanagena emainoa yafena ago haviya ageya hu-mainae.

Nagaifema kahau kayamopafi kahau-mainea yana amakai amakupi malesana yafe aepakaa hu-falote huna hama-pai-mainoanagi nagoene hama-paigahue. Nagaya amakupi maisua yafe aepakaa ago hama-pai-mainoe.” huno hu-maine.

Yisasia ani kea Anumayamotega havigeteno tuelufua (12) anagaaene hati-laviya Kitaloni lina mo lakaeya umainae. Atu kaiyaga nago olivi yosa kali-malenaya hoya hanegeya Yisasia agaiaenema tokaeya nemaiya anagaamoyaene ani hoyafinaga umainae.
Umainayanagi mukia yupa Yisasia tuelufua (12) anagaamoyaenena ani hoyafinaga molitalu huya nemaiya yafe Yutasia, agesima huno Yisasina kamema hu-tesia kanomoa, ani hoya ago age-maineane.

Age-maineanagino Yutasia viayamo ala mono note kava vayateene Falasia vayateene vigeya mono note ati vayaene Lomu ati vayaene amigeno amavaleno ani hoyafinaga kaniene lamu kaniene tu hisaya yaene aliya emainae.
Ayanagi Yisasia mukia augafalema falote hugahema hia yana ago haviteno amakaite viayamo mo hama-vige “Tamakaya tafe atineayae?” huno hie.

Higeya kenonaa mage huya hae “Nasaleti Yisasife ati-yeta neone.” huya hageno Yisasia mage hie “Nagaya ma mainoe.” huno higeno agesima huno Yisasina kamema hu-tea kanoa, Yutasia, ani vayaene tokaeno maine.
Mainegeno Yisasia “Nagaya ma mainoe.” hunoma hia yafe amakavelegati eteya valega mo fae-laka-ti-mainae.
Fae-laka-ti-tageno Yisasia nagoene eteno hama-vige “Tafe ati neayae.” huno higeya amakaya nehuya “Nasaleti Yisasife ati neayone.” huya hae.
Hageno Yisasia kenonaamia mage hie “Nagaya ago tamaha-nepauve nagaya ma mainoe huna nehue. Tamakaya nagaifema nati neayenutamahena ma ma nagaienema mainaya vayala amatalegeya afaa viho.” huno hie.

Yisasia agoma hu-mainea kea mage huno hu-maineane “Naminana veala nagoke kanoa ata-oayegahie.” huno hu-maineane. Anima hu-mainea kemoa falote huno tamagema hisia yafe Yisasia “Amatalegeya viho.” huno hu-maine.
Higeno Saimoni Pitaa ayaaya naepea ali-lianagino alisagino ala mono note hagote kava kanomo aliya kanoa, Malakusina, ai-koligeno tamaga kaiyaga agesa aifa-kali-talegeno asaga hu-lavi-maine.

Ai-fakaligeno Yisasia Pitafena hapaino “Ayaaya naepekaa tafugepi vaiyo. Naugafaene nagu name nagata aisia yania satuage hia tima hanea masu keayola Nenafaa naminegi nagaife onesie huka nehano?” huno hie.
Lomu ati vayaene ala kava kanoamiene mono note ati vayaene Yisasina atafa huya nofi ki-mainae.
Nofi k-iteteya hagoteya Anasite avaleya umainae. Anasia Kaiyafasina aamona nefa maineanagino Kaiyafasia ani kafufina ala mono note hagote kava kano maineane.
Kaiyafasia Yuta vayafe mage huno hama-pai-maineane “Kanalele nagoke kanomo mukia veamogamitefe huno falisie.” huno hu-maineane.

Saimoni Pitaene nagola Yisasienema tokaeno nemaiya kanoene Yisasina akave anatiana umainae. Nevaageno mono note kava kanomoa ani Yisasienema tokaeno nemaiya kanomona ago age-mainea yafe agaya Yisasiene ala mono note kava kanomo no kegiya kovefinaga hai-fale-maine.
Haigeno Pitaa fiate he-tino mainegeno anima Yisasienema tokaeno nemaiya kanomoa fiatema yagai-mainea munamofena mo hanepaino Pitana avaleno emaine.
Neegeno fiatema yagai-mainea munamoa Pitafena mage huno havige “Kagaya mani kanomona tuelufua (12) vayapiti kano mainano?” huno havigegeno “Aao nagaya ani vayapiti kanoa omainoe.” huno hapaiye.
Tusia yasimo higeya aliya vayaene ati vayaene ata kae-taleya he-tiya tota huya mainageno Pitaa amakaiene atale he-tino augafa tota huno maine.
Ala mono notema hagote kava kanomoa Yisasifena “Kagaienema tokaeya nemaiya anagakaheene kagayama hu-ma-veli mainana keheene naha-paiyo.” huno havinege.
Havigegeno Yisasia mage hie “Nagaya mukia veamogamina fufute hama-nepauvane. Mukia yupa Yuta veanea melitaluma haya mono nopiene ala mono nopiene hama-nepauvane. Fala-kina hama-opainoe.
Naa higeka nagaila nahavi-negane? Nagai kema nehaviya vayafena hama-nepauva kehena hama-vigo. Nagayama hama-pai-mainoa kea ago havilinae.” huno hie.
Higeno nago ati kanomoa he-tino maineleti Yisasima mani kema nehiana augosafi ai-ko-nelino mage hie “Naa higeka kagaya ala mono note hagote kava kanomo aulagafina mani kea nehane?” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia kenonaa mage hie “Kefo kema hu-mainesugekahena nagaya kefo kema hua kea hu-falote huka naha-paiyo. Nagayama kanale kema hu-mainesugekahena naa higeka nai-ko-neline?” huno hie.
Higeya nofima kitaya nofila kalu he-oa-teneya Anasia ala mono note hagote kava kanoa, Kaiyafasitega hu-tegeya avaleya umainae.

Nevageno Saimoni Pitaa atale maineno ata lota huno mainegeya agaife mage huya hae “Kagaienena mani kanomona tuelufua (12) vayaamopiti kano mainano?” huya hageno Pitaa avane huno mage hie “Aao nagaya ani kanoa omainoe.” huno hie.

Higeno ala mono notema hagote kava kanomo aliya kanoamona, Pitama agesama ai-fakali-talegeno asaga hu-lavi-mainea kanomo anagapiti kanomoa mage huno hie “Kagaya Yisasiene hoyafina mainaagena kage-mainoe.” huno hie.
Higeno Pitaa nagoene avane huno “Aao nagaila onagenane.” huno higeno aupaa kokolemoa age ai-maine.

Yisasina Kaiyafasi nopinagati Lomu kamanile ala kava kanomoa kaiyekema hu-neamatea note kegeafiti avaleya umainae. Yuta vayamogamina mono keamimoa mage huno hu-maine “Afa vayaene tokaetama maisayana amakai kava hutama kefo vaya mainaya yafe ala imu kavela onegahae.” huno hu-mainea yafe Yuta vayamoya ala imu kavema mo nesaya yafenagiya ani nopina ohainae.
Kumatega mainageno Pailatia, Lomu kamanile ala kava kanomoa, amakaite eno mage huno hama-vige “Tamakaya naane keleti mani kanoa kaiyekea hu-tegahae?” huno hie.
Higeya kenonaa mage huya hapaiye “Mani kanomoma kefo kavama ohuneleasipa avaleta kagaitela omoteasine.” huya hae.

Hageno Pailatia eteno mage huno hama-paiye “Tamakaya avaletama tamakaitami mono keleti kaiyekea hu-teho tamakaitami yane.” huno hie. Higeya Yuta vayamoya mage huya hu-mainae “Kagaya kamanimoga huka taumono malenana kemoa nago kanoa haegeno ofalino.” huka hu-mainane huya hae.

Nayona Yisasia mage huno hu-maine “Nagayama falisua yana yafaga yosale nahaeya nasaesagena faligahue.” huno hu-maineane. Lomu kamani vayamoyage vayala yafaga yosalela hamaeya asaigeya fali-mainae. Yisasia agoma hu-mainea kemoa falote huno tamage hisia yafe Yuta vayamoya mani kea hu-mainae.
Hageno Pailatia ataleno kaiyekema hu-neama-tea nopinaga haino maineno Yisasife ke higeno vigeno mage huno havige “Kagaya Yuta veanogami sauve kano mainano?” huno havige.
Havigegeno Yisasia kenonaa mage hie “Kagaya kagu kagesafiti mani kea nehapi ifi nagoa vayamoya nagaifena kaha-paigekahe nehano?” huno eteno havige.

Havigegeno Pailatia kenonaa mage huno havige “Nagaya Yuta kano mainogeka nehano? Kagai nofi vayaene ala mono note kava vayaene kavaleya nagaite neaya yafena kagaya na havi kava hu-mainane huna kahavi-negoe.” huno hie.

Higeno Yisasia kenonaa mage hie “Nagaya kava yagaisua kumala ma mopafina omalene. Inagi ma mopafima kava yagaisua kumaniama haneleasipa aliya vayanimoya kamea hageya nagaila navaleya Yuta vayamogami amayapina onataleasine. Inagi nagaya kava yagaisua kumania ma mopafina omalene.” huno hie.

Higeno Pailatia mage huno hie “Ala sauve kano mainoe huka nehano?” huno higeno Yisasia kenonaa mage hie “Kagaya nagaife ala sauve kano mainane hukama hana kea tamage nehane. Nagaya itanimoma natenelegatima emaineana ke-lamaage hu-falote hisua yafe ma mopafina emainogi ke-lamama haviya amakupi malenaya veamoya nagayama hua kea nehaviye.” huno hie.
Higeno Pailatia Yisasife mage hie “Ani ke-lamage kea naane ke?” huno nehuno Pailatia hati-lavino kumatega viayamo Yuta vayate mage huno mo hama-paiye “Kefo kavama hia yana ati ayegetoana omalene.

Tamakaya mukia yupa ala imuma kigahena naha-vigagena nago kanoa kina nopitila afaa avalena nelamamuanagi na yafe nelamahaiye Yuta veamogatamina sauve kanotamia afaa atalesugeno visio?” huno hama-vige.
Hama-vigegeya ala kefiti mage huya hae “Agaila neataleka Palapasina tamisane.” huya hu-mainae. Palapasia vaya nehamaeno musufa yamaage hume hume nehaiya kano mainea kanohe hu-mainae.
Pailatia Yisasina avaleno “Nofi kayoteti haifu amiho.” huno hama-paigeya haifu aminae.

Amiteya ati vayamoya avetanafa nofiteti tumano kula talo huteya anute vai-teteya ala kava kanomo fai-nealia augafa haesa kena vai-teneya Yisasima he-tino mainele eya Yisasifena “Felugae. Yuta vayamogami ala sauve kanomogae.” huya nehuya augosafi amayateti ainagolapeya nehaeya hu-mainae.

Hageno Pailatia kumatega hati-lavino eayamo alitaluma hu-mainaya Yuta vayafe mage huno hie “Atiyena agoana nagoke kefo ya kanoa omalegena tamakaya mani kea havisae huna avalena tamakaite hati-lavina neoe.” huno hie.

Higeno Yisasia kumategama hati-lavino eana avetanafa nofitetima talo hu-malaya tumano kula anute vai-teteya haesa kena fai-tetageno hati-lavino elavigeno Pailatia mage huno hie “Ageho mani kanoa ma maine.” huno hama-pai-maine.

Hama-paigeya mono note kava vayamoyaene ati vayaene Yisasina ageteya ala kegefafiti mage huya hae “Yafaga yosale nili hetama asaigeno falino. Yafaga yosale nili hetama asaigeno falino.” huya hae. Hageno Pailatia kenonaamia mage huno hama-paiye “Tamakaitami avaletama yafaga yosalela nilia hetama asaiho. Nagaya nago kefo yamaahena ati-yoana omaleanagina ohaegahue.” huno hie.

Higeya Yuta vayamoya kenonaa mage huya hapaiye “Yisasia agaiahena mage huno hu-maine ‘Nagaya Anumaya Koti nafane mainoe.’ hunoma hiana tagaipina kahegi kemoa mage hu-maine ‘Mania augafa kema hisia kanomoa falisie.’ huno hu-maineafe menia Yisasia mani kema hu-mainea yafe falisie.” huya hae.
Hageno Pailatia ani kea haviteno tusiya huno amayoa neaiye.
Amayo aigeno Pailatia eteno kaiyekema nehavia nopinaga hai-faleno maineno Yisasifena mage huno havige “Kagaya hanategati emainane?” huno havigeanagi Yisasia kenonaa ohune.

Ohigeno Pailatia mage huno hapaiye “Kagaya naa higeka nagelela noaline? Nagaya tokiyaniene kanogina ‘Kina nopitila atalegahae.’ hunama hisuana afaa katalegahae. ‘Yafaga yosale nili hetama asaigeno falino.’ hunama hisuana ania hu-ga-tegahae. Kagaya mani kea nohavino?” huno havige.

Havigegeno Yisasia kenonaa mage huno hapaiye “Anafinaga mainea Anumaya Kotia kagaima tokiyama okamineleasipa nagaila natafa ohateasinagi amakayama navaleya kagai kayapima natenaya vayamogamina kefo yaamimoa kagai kefo yakamona agaseno kasagoya kefo yaami hane.” huno hie.

Higeno Pailatia anima hia kea haviteno “Hanaa huna atalesugeno visie?” huno kafe ati-neayegeya Yuta vayamoya ala kegefafiti mage huya hu-mainae “Nagoke kanomoa Yisasima hia kava huno agaiahe ‘Nagaya ala sauve kanoma mainoe.’ hunoma hisia kanomoa Sisana kamea maine. Kagaya mani kanoma atalesanageno visiana kagaya tagaila ala sauve kanotia, Sisana, kanapaa omainane.” huya hae.

Hageno Pailatia ani kema haya kea haviteno Yisasina avaleno hati-lavino kumatega elavino eayamo ala kaiyekema havi kanomo siale emaine. Ani siama malenaya aupaligahena Yuta vayamogami kefina Kapatae huya nehae. Ani aupaligahena tagai kefina amalagu aiya yafa malenaya aupaligae huta hugahune.

Ani kanafina Anumaya Kotia amakinagomogami amaugafama ali-gati-mainea yafe Yuta veamoya amakesa hao hinageya havisaya yafe imu ki kanaamimoa aupa higeya talo tala hisaya yafe yagemoa euno amanutule evigeno Pailatia Yuta veamogamina mage huno hama-paiye “Ala sauve kanotamimona ageho.” huno hie.

Higeya amakaya ala kegefafiti mage huya hae “Aoteyamaae. Aoteyamaae. Yafaga yosale nili hetama asaigeno falino.” huya hageno Pailatia mage huno hama-paiye “Nagaya tamakai sauve kanotamia yafaga yosale nili hena asaisue hugetama nehao?” huno higeya mono note kava vayamoya mage hae “Tagaila nago ala sauve kanotia omaine. Sisaa agaiage nagoke maine.” huya hae.
Hageno Pailatia “Yisasina yafaga yosale nili hetama asaiho.” huno avaleno amayapi amamine.
Yisasina avaleya vageno haeya asaisaya yafaga yosa agaia ko-fino anu ayamufae huya nehaya agoyalega umaine. Ani agoyamo agia Yuta vayamogami kefina Kologotae huya nehae.
Ani agoyafi avaleya vayaamoya yafaga yosale nilia heya asai-malenae. Tole kanolataene hanaote yafaga yosale aluga aluga atupale hanaeya asai-maleneya Yisasina amunoanifi nilia heya asai-malenae.
Asai-maletageno Pailatia nago avona kaeno Yisasina nilima he-malaya yafaga yosale asai-malene. Ani avomoa mage hie “Nasaleti Yisasie, Yuta vayamogami sauve kanoa ma maine.” huno kae-malene.

Kae-malenegeya Yisasima yafaga yosale asai-malenaya kaiyaga ala kumamo aupaale haeya asai-malayanagiya mukia Yuta veamoya ani avona hapaliya havimainae. Pailatia tagufa (3) kefiti kae-malene. Yuta vayamogami kefitiene Lomu vayamogami kefitiene Kaliki vayamogami kefitiene kae-malenegeya hapaliya havimainae.

Haviya yafe Yuta vayamogami mono note kava vayamoya Pailatifena mage hae “Kagaya ‘Yuta vayamogamina ala sauve kanoami ma maine.’ huka okaeka ma ke huka kao ‘Nagaya Yuta vayamogami ala sauve kanoami mainoe hunoma hia kanoa ma maine.’ huka kao.” huya hae.
Hageno Pailatia mage hie “Kae-malenoa kea hai kae-malenoe.” huno hie.
Ati vayamoya Yisasina yafaga yosale nili heya asai-maleteya kenaa foa (4) hetama vaiya ali-mainae. Ayaaya siotaaene aligahe agayana mukia analegati afetegama lavi-maineana aye ohati siota hane.
