Ohati siota hanea yafe ani ati vayamoya kea mohu mehu huya mage hae “Hatata ohuta afaa musufa yama nehaya yokaloa kasi nelesunageno tagasesimoa alisie.” huya amakaiami hu-mainae. Aniama haya kavala Anumaya Koti kefima nayoma kae-malenaya kemoa ago efalote huno tamage nehie. Anima nayoma kae-malenaya kemoa mage humaineane
“Kenania fako huya nealiya nago kenania kasi yokalo-leya amakasesimoa aligahie.” huya kae-malenayane.
Kae-malenayanagiya ati vayamoya mani kavala hu-mainae.
Hageya Yisasima asai-malenaya yafaga yosamo avatela Yisasina itaamoene nunaamoene he-ti-mainae. Anakaiene Kalopasina aamoa Maliaene hamoamoa Magatala kumate Maliaene he-ti-mainae.

He-ti-mainageno Yisasia itaamona ageteno agaienema tokaeya nemaiya anagapiti hau ayamopafima hau-mainea kanomona, Yoninae, itaamo avate he-titaa mainoageno taageteno itaamofena “Amogae namona kagaikaa nafanekaae.” huno hie.
Huteno nagaifena “Namona itakamoe.” huno higena nagaya ani yupa Maliana yagaigahe nonialega avalena umainoe.

Ani kea huteno Yisasia “Mukia aliyania ago alina hano hue.” huno agesafinaga havimaine. Nayoma Anumaya Koti kema kae-malenaya kemoa efalote huno tamagema hisia yafe mage hie “Life nenage.” huno hu-maine.
Higeya nofi alagafiti falote hia tina nagola havate-mai keayola aliya havagoyafa kana yana ani lipi ayeteya kayote vaiya ali-saga huya Yisasina avayale malenae.
Malageno Yisasia mayu mayu huno neteno mage hie “Nenafagae naha-pai-mainana aliyana ago alina hano hue.” huno nehuno ageya ainamagino agu nafaneamo atalegeno vigeno fali-maine.

Sapati yupahe talo tala hisaya yupagino ega ala Sapati kana falote hisia yafe Yuta vayamoya anima yafaga yosalema hamae-malaya vayamogami amaugafamoma Sapatilema yafaga yosale hanesia yafena ohamaigeya Pailatife mage huya mo havigae “Ati vayamoya amaiya ali kofa hisageya aupaa falisageya hipoya huya aliya visae.” huya mo havigae.
Hageno Pailatia ati vaya hama-paigeya mogayana Yisasienema yafaga yosale asai-malaya kanolatamogani anaiya meli kofa hu-mainae.
Ali kofa huteya Yisasina megayana ago fali-mainegeya megeteya aiya ali kofa ohunae.
Ali kofa ohageno nago ati kanomoa kevealeti Yisasina haohipafi meyegeno aupaa ani keve kapitila kolamoene timoene taki-lavi-maine.

Taki-lavigenoma age-mainea kanomoa tamaha-nepaiye. Tamaha-nepaiya kea tamageage ke hanea yafe agaia havilama hu-lineno tamaha-nepaiyafe tamakayaenena Yisasifena havitama tamakupi maletama tamametiti hisaya yafe tamageage ke tamaha-nepaiye.
Nayona Anumaya Koti kema kae-malenaya kemoa mage hu-maineane
“Amakaya nago ayamufaa ali kofa ohugahae.” huya kae-malenayane.
Nagi nagola Anumaya Koti kema kae-malenaya kemoa mage huno hu-maineane
“Haohipafina keveletima aye-mainea kanomona agegahae.” huya kae-malenayane.
Kae-malenaya kemoa falote huno tamagema hia yafe mani kavala hu-mainae.

Yosefea Alimatiyae huya nehaya kumate nemaiya kanogino Yisasi ke havino akave nemalea kanogi Yuta vayafe koli huno Yisasifema ametiti nehia yana fala-ki-lineno mage huno Pailatina mo havige “Yisasina augafaa aligahe nehue.” huno mo havige. Havigegeno Pailatia “E.” huno higeno Yosefea viayamo Yisasina augafaa mo hipoya huno alino emaine.

Nikotimasia hagoteno Yisasite hanipinaga emainea kanomoa Yosefena mo ha-maegahe kule fuki kana manaage tina tole yosafiti he-fino ali havigu higeno manaage tina falote higeno sigelile mo malegeno tetia (30) kilo falote higeno alino emaine. Ani tole yosalatamogani anakia meaene aloene alino emaine

Ani tole kanolatamogania vaayamogani Yisasina augafaa mo hipoya huana mopale maleneana manaage tina fale-teteana kefe kana kenaleti augafalela ai-galaki galaki huana haya kiteana aye-gasagi-malenae. Mukia yupa Yuta vayamoya vayaamima faligeya ania huya neamataya kava hu-tenae.

Ani kaiyaga Yisasina yafaga yosale nilima heya asai-malenaya kaiyaga nago hoya hane. Ani hoyafina nagola vayama he-vai-ma-tesaya yafa kana, yaufa kafi-malenayane. Anifina nago vayala he-vai-oama-tenaya yafa kapi aliya mo he-vai-tenae.
Ani yupa Sapatihe haviya talo tala hisaya kanafinagiana ani matimatila aupatema hanea yafe ani tole kanolatamogania Yisasina augafaa aliana anifi mo malenae.

Sota yupa kola otinegeno Magatala kumate Maliaa natemaa Yisasina he-vai-tenaya komulega umaine. Uno mogeana komumo avayalema aiso hu-malenaya yafana ago alike-li-talenageno avayalela omalegeno moge-maine.
Mogeteno eteno aiya-yeno Yisasima nehaiya kanoene Saimoni Pitaene mainaale eno mage huno hana-paiye “Alatimona komufitila ago aliya hanatepi atenae.” huno hana-paiye.
Hana-paigeana haviteana Pitaene Yisasima nehaiya kanoene Yisasi komulega umainae.
Anaiya-yeana ani komulega vaaleti Yisasima nehaiya kanomoa Pitana agaseno aupaa komule hagoteno umaine.
Uteno mope hu-maineno ageana Yisasina aye-gasagi-tenaya kenaage hanegeno ageanagi anifinaga hai-ofalene.

Hai-ofaleno mainegeno Saimoni Pitaa akave eayamo ani komufinaga aupaa hai-fale-maine. Haino mogeana nagoa aye-gasagi-tenaya kena neageno anutema ki-tenaya kenaene Yisasina augafalema aye-gasagi-tenaya kenaene nagopi tokaeno omalenegi aote kaiyaga aye-gafage-kino malenegeno haino moge-maine.
Neagegeno Yisasima nehaiya kanomoa komulema hagoteno umainea kanoa anifinaga hai-faleno mo neageno komufitima he-ti-mainea yafe “Tamage nehie.” huno havino agupi maleno ametiti nehie.
Ani kanafina mukia anagaamoya Anumaya Koti kema kae-malenaya kea havilama ohunae. Ani kemoa mage huno hu-maine “Yisasia fali-mainesifiti he-tigahie.” huya kae-malenaya kemona havilama ohunae.
Anakaya Yisasienema tokaeana nemaia kanolatana anifinagati hati-laviana noanilega eteana umainae.
Maliaa ani yafakamo avayale he-tino maineno avi neateno ape huno ani komufinaga aulu heno neage.
Ageana tole ensole kanolatana efeage kenaani failiana Yisasi augafama malenaya yate mopale mainae. Nago kanoa anuma malenalega maigeno nago kanoa aiyama malenalega maigeno hu-mainaageno anake-maine.
Neanakegeana Maliafe mage hae “Amogae naa higeka avia neatane?” huana havigaageno Maliaa mage huno hie “Alaniamona aliyama mo malaya kumala oagenoa yafe avi neatoe.” huno hie.
Nehuno mai-yahae huno ageana Yisasia he-ti-mainegeno ageanagi augosafina agelama ohune.

Agelama ohigeno Yisasia mage hie “Amogae naa higeka avia neatane? Tafe ati neayane?” huno havigegeno Maliaa agesafinaga mage huno hie “Ma kanoa hoyalema yagai-mainea kano maine.” huno agesafinaga nehavino mage huno hie “Musekaa nehugi kagayama alika umainenukahena malenesana kumafena naha-paigena molino.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia mage huno hie “Maliao.” huno higeno ani amoa maiyahae huno Yuta vayamogami kefiti mage huno hie “Laponae.” huno hie. Ani kemoa takai kefina “Hu-lave-nelina kanomogae.” huno hie.

Higeno Yisasia mage hie “Nenafa mainelega ohainogi natafa ohuka nagananimogamina mage huka mo hama-paiyo ‘Nagaiene tamakaiene Nelafatega haigahe nehue. Nagai Anumaya Kotitegaene tamakai Anumaya Kotitegaene haigahe nehue.’ huka mo hama-paiyo.” huno hie.

Higeno Magatala Maliaa viayamo Yisasienema tokaeya nemaiya anagaamogamina mage huno hama-paiye “Nagaya Alaniamona ago agoe.” huno nehuno “Nage mage huka hama-paiyo.” hunoma hapaiya kea hama-pai-maine.

Yisasia fali-mainefitima he-ti-mainea Sotamona hanipinaga Yisasina alevenia (11) anagaamoya Yuta vayafena koliami huya fita kiya tokiyaage hu-maleteya nopinaga alitalu huya mainae. Mainageno Yisasia evayi huno amunoamifi me he-ti-maineno mage hie “Tamaipamoa falu nehinagetama maiho.” huno hama-paiye.
Hama-paiteno akaima ayapima nilima he-malenaya afuguene haopafina kevema aye-mainaya afuguene amave-neliye. Amave-ligeya alevenia (11) anagaamoya Alaamimona ageteya amakuamoa tusia muse hia kava hae.
Hageno Yisasia nagoene mage hie “Tamaipamoa falu nehinagetama maiho. Nenafaa hu-na-tenea augafa kava huna nagaya tamakaila hu-nela-matoe.” huno hie.
Mani kema nehunoa haimula fu huno neamamino mage huno hie “Tamakaila Alu Aotage Avamula nelamamugi avaleho.

Nagoa veamogamina ai-geama-tetama kefo yaamima atale-ma-tesayana Anumaya Kotia ania huno ani kefo yaamia ai-geama-teno atale-ma-tegahie. Kefo yaamima ai-geama-tetama atale oamatesaya veamogamina Anumaya Kotia kefo yaamia ai-geama-teno atale oama-tegahie.” huno hama-paiye.
Yisasima amakaite evayima hu-mainea yupa alevenia (11) anagaafitila nago kanoa amakaienena omaine. Ani kanoa, Tomasie, nago agia Titimasie, tagai kefina kuyave nafane, ani kanoa omaine.

Omainegeya amakaya “Tagaya Alatimona age-mainone.” huya hane-paigenoa Tomasia mage hie “Yisasina nilima he-malenaya afuguma oagena, naginagoma nilimo kapima omalena haopafima keve honomuma aye-malenaya afugupima nayama ovainunahena mani kea alina nagupina malena nametitia ohugahue.” huno hie.

Sevenia (7) kana maiteya Yisasina alevenia (11) anagaamoya eteya ani nopi mainageno Tomasia amakaiene maine. Fita kiya tokiyaage hu-malayanagi Yisasia evayi huno amunoamifi me he-ti-maineno mage hie “Tamaipamoa falu nehinagetama maiho.” huno hie.

Tomasifena mage hie “Kaginagoa male me maleka nayapi nafugula ago. Kayana nahaopalema hanea nafugupina vaika ago. Ageteka tole kagesama havina kagesa neataleka nagaifena havika kagupi maleka kametiti huo.” huno hie.
Higeno Tomasia mage hie “Kagaya Alaniamogae Anumaya Kotinimoga mainane.” huno hie.
Higeno Yisasia mage hie “Kagaya agoma nagana yafe kagupina maleka kametitia nehananagi onagenesaya veanemoyama haviya amakupi maleya amametitima hisaya veamoya tusia muse hugahae.” huno hie.
Yisasia alevenia (11) anagaamogami amaulagafina alua alua tokiya avameyayaga hu-maineanagi ani yana mukia mani autamafina okaenoe.

Okaenoanagi manima kae-maloa kea tamakaife huno Yisasia, Anumaya Kotina nafaneamoa, tagu tamema ali-gatisia kano maine hutamama havitama tamakupi maletama tamametitima hisaya yafe kae-malenoane. Ani yafe havitama tamakupi maletama tamametiti hisayana Yisasi agileti agola maige maige hisaya tamahaimula aligahae huna kae-malenoe.
Haenagaa Yisasia eteno agaienema tokaeya nemaiya anagaamogami amaule ma kava huno Taipiliasi tikotumo agegayalega evayi hu-maine.

Saimoni Pitaene, Tomasina nago agia Titimasie, tagai kefina kuyave nafane, Natanioloa, Kalili hanea kumala Kena kumate kanoene, tole Sepeti nafanelataa Yoniene, aganaamoene, tole Yisasina alevenia (11) anagaaene mainae.

Mainageno Saimoni Pitaa mage huno hama-pai-maine “Nagaya noyame kuya hugahe neue.” huno higeya mage hae “Kagaiene ugahune.” huya hapaiteya tipi kalefi hai-saga humaiya ani kegela vayanagi nagoke noyamea oalinae.
Oaligeno yagea hai vayi hugahe nehigeno Yisasia ti agegayalega he-ti-maiyanagi agaienema tokaeya nemaiya anagaamoya Yisasie huya agelama ohunae.
Agelama ohageno Yisasia mage huno hama-vige “Vae nafanenimogatama nagoa noyamea nealifi noaliye?” huno hamavi-gegeya “Aao noalune.” huya hapai-mainae.

Hapaigeno Yisasia mage huno hama-paiye “Tamakaya kukonagona tipi kalemona tamaga kaiyagamo haikanagati hagayu hutama malesayana noyamea aligahae.” huno hama-paigeya kukonagona ania huya hagayu hayana tusia noyame aligeno kanaage higeya alisaga hisaya yafena tusia ya hu-mainae.

Yisasienema tokaeya nemaiya anagapiti nehaiya kanoamoa Pitana mage huno hapaiye “Agaya Alatimoe.” huno hapaiye. Hapaigeno Saimoni Pitaa anima hia kea nehavino aupaa augafale anoya asagi-taleno aliyana nealileti eteno aupaa alino vai-lino tipina asaga hu-lavino Yisasitega nevie.
Vigeya ani tipi kalea alualelomagi vani hataleti (100) mita aupaale maineya nagoa Yisasienema tokaeya nemaiya anagaamoya kukonagona avayu huya ti agegayalega emainae.
Ti agegayalega me maleteya agayana ata nelegeno nago noyamene hame mayaene ani atafina hanegeya age-mainae.
Neagageno Yisasia mage huno hama-paiye “Menima aliya noyamefitila nagoa alitama eho.” huno hama-pai-maine.

Hama-paigeno Saimoni Pitaa tipi kalefi hai-saga hu-maino kukonagona avayu huno ti agegayalegama eana kasagoya noyame, vani hataleti fifiti talia (153) noyameyaga ani kukonagopina hiya hu-maiyanagi ani kukonagomoa ailagatoa ohune.

Yisasia mage huno hama-paiye “Tamakaya etama kavela me neho.” huno hama-paigeya agaienema tokaeya nemaiya anaga amamayoma aiya yafe “Kagaya lagae.” huya haviokenagi “Alatimo maine.” huyama amakesafinaga haviya yafe haviokenae.
Yisasia atale eayamo hame mayaene noyamene melino amamine.

Yisasina komufima he-vai-tageno etenoma he-ti-maineana tole yupa age-mainaleti eteno mani kavama hiana napa tali (3) kanale evayi higeya agaienema tokaeya nemaiya anagaamogata taulagafiti age-mainone.

Kavela netageno Yisasia Saimoni Pitana mage huno havige “Saimonigae Yoni nafanemoga kagaya ma vayala amakaseka nagoene kagua nenamino?” huno havige. Havigegeno Pitaa mage huno hie “E, Alaniamogae kagaya ago nehavine kagaifena nenahaiye.” huno higeno Yisasia mage huno hapaiye “Kagaya nagai sipi sipi nafaneyaga kavela amamio.” huno hapai-maine.

Hanepaino nagoene mage huno hie “Saimonigae Yoni nafanemoga kagua havika ago nenamino?” huno havigegeno Pitaa mage huno hapaiye “Kagaya ago nehavine nagaya kagaifena nenahaiye.” huno higeno Yisasia mage huno hapaiye “Kagaya sipi sipiyaganilela kava yagaiyo.” huno hapaiye.

Hapaiteno nagoene napa tali (3) kanale mage huno havige “Saimonigae Yoni nafanemoga nagaifena negahaiyo?” huno higeno napa tali (3) kanalema “Kagaya nagaifena negahaiyo?” hunoma havigea yafe Pita aipamoa kanaage higeno mage huno hie “Alaniamogae mukia yana ago havi-mainane. Nagaya kagaifema nenahaiya yafena ago nehavine.” huno hapaigeno Yisasia mage huno hie “Kagaya sipi sipiyagania kavela amamio.” huno hapai-maine.

Hapaiteno mage hie “Tamage-lafa huna kaha-pauve kagaya neyama maineka kamu nofila ki-takalo hu-maleteka ‘Visue.’ hukama hana kumatela nevananagi haenagaa kosunama lesanana kayana alisaga hu-linesanageya nagoa vayamoya kenaka fai-ga-teteya ‘Ougahuema.’ hukama nehisana kumatela afaa kavaleya ugahae.” huno hie.

Anima hia kemona aepaamoa mage huno hu-maine “Haenagaa kefo vayamoya katafa huya kahaesagekama falisana yateti Anumaya Kotina ala agi amigane.” huno aepaa huteno Yisasia Pitafena “Nakave eno.” huno hu-maine.

Yisasiene tokaeya nemaiya anagapiti hau ayamopafima hau-mainea kanoa kavema ne-mainaya yupa Yisasina avaale maineno mage huno havige-maineane “Alaniamogae kagaila kagesima huno kamema hu-ga-tesia kanoa hana kanomoe?” huno havigea kanomoa Yisasiene Pitagani anakave nevigeno Pitaa maiyahae huno age-maine.
Ageteno Pitaa Yisasina mage huno havige “Alaniamogae ani kanoa haenagaa hana augafa kava hugahie?” huno havige.
Havigegeno Yisasia mage huno hapaiye “Nakaima nahaisigenama ma mopafima etena esua yupa afaa mainesigenama esuana kagai yano? Kagaya nakave eno.” huno hapaiye.

Hapaiya kemoa anagaamogamipina mani kema hia kemoa ute ete higeya mage hae “Yonia ofaligahie.” huya hayanagi Yisasia “Ofaligahie.” huno hu-oa-tenegi “Nagaima nahaisigena ma mopafima etena esua yupa afaa mainesigenama esuana kagai yano?” huno hu-maine.
Ani kema hayana Yoninihe hu-maine. Nagaya mukia Yisasima hu-mainea kavafena tamaha-nepaina avona kae-malenoe. Nagayama nehua kea tamage-lafa huna havilinoa ke tamaha-nepauve.

Yisasia mukia alu ya alu yana hu-maineanagi nagoa vayamoya mani kema mukia nagoke nagoke avopima kayaleasina mani avoyagamoa kasago higeya malesaya kumamoa mukia ma kotega nagesa havuana hiya hileasine huna nehue.

Tiofilasigae hagotena kaemalenoa autamafina Yisasima aepa heno ali-mainea aliyaene humaveli-mainea kene Anumaya Kotina Alu Aotage Avamumo tokiyaleti “Naa maa kava hiho.” huno Aposolo vayala (agai kema nehavigeno humatenea vayala) hamapaiteno ikapinaga haimainea yafeene ago kaena kahapai-mainoe.

Yisasia tusia augafa agataiya alino faliteno hetino Aposolo vayamogami amaulagale efalote huno fali-mainefitima hetino mainea yafena havise huno kasagoya tokiya kavaage humaine. Fotia (40) yupa mopafina maineno efalote huno amaveliteno amataleno uteno eteno efalote huno Anumaya Kotima kava yagaisia yafena hamapai-maine.

Amakaienema mainea kanafina mage huno hamapai-maine “Tamakaya Yelusalemu kumala ataletama oviho. Nenafama ‘Nago kanoa tamamigahue.’ hunoma humainea kanoa avaletetama viho. Nagaya ani kanohena ago tamahapai-mainoane. Yonia titeti falelamateneanagi tamakaya aupa kana kanoa maisayana Nenafana Alu Aotage Avamuamoteti falelamategahie.” huno humaine.

Ani yupa Aposolo anagamoya alitalu huya maineya Yisasifena mage huya havinegae “Alatimogae menia ma kanafina Lomu kamani vayamogami amayapitila Isaleli vayamogati hafaleka kagaikaa kava yagailatesanageno tokiyaage hisifi?” huya havinegae.
Havigageno Yisasia mage huno hie “Nenafaa agaia tokiyaleti ‘Ma kanaene mukia kanafiene maa kava hugahue.’ huno huteno yagai-mainegi agayama hisia yana tamakaya havisaya yana omalene.

Omalenegi Anumaya Kotina Alu Aotage Avamuamoma tamakaitema esiana tokiyaa tamamisigetama nagai kea Yelusalemuene mukia Yutia kotegaene Samelia kotegaene mukia ma mopamo atupale mainaya veanenena nagaifena hamapaigahae.” huno humaine. Yisasia ikapinaga haimaine.
Mani kea huno hano huteno ageya mainageno mopaleti haino haino haigeno nako siamoa melino aiso hulino avaleno haimaine.
Haigeya amakaya ikapinaga agesaga huya ageya maiya anayufi tole kanolatana efeage kena failiana efalote huana amakaiene anile heti-mainae.

Hetiana mage huana hae “Kalili kumate veamogatama naa higetama heti-mainetama ikatela aulula maitama nehae? Yisasia tamataleno ikapinaga ago haiyanagi manima ikapinaga haiya avamete huno eteno elavisigetama agegahae.” huana hamapai-mainae.
Amakaya Olivi yosa hanea agoyaleti taviteya aupaale lagiya vani kilomita vayaamoya Yelusalemua uvayi humainae.

Uvayi huteya nemaiya nona folamo huya ana yapi kimale nopi haiya mainae. Haiya mainaya vayamogami amakia Pitae Yonie Yemesie Etalue Filipie Tomasie Patolomiue Matiue Alafiusi nafanea Yemesie Saimonie kanomona nako agia Selotie Yutasia Yemesi nafanene haiya mainae.
Ani vayaene aneyagaene Maliaa Yisasina itaamoene Yisasina aganaamoyaene nagoke amaku amakesale maineya mukia yupa Anumayamotega muse huya nunamu humainae.
Ani kanafina Yisasifema haviya amakupi maleya amametiti humainaya veala, vani hataleti tuetia (120) veane, mainageno Pitaa amakai amunopi heti-maineno mage huno humaine.

“Nafunaganagatama Anumaya Kotina Alu Aotage Avamuamoa Teviti avayafiti hufalote huno nayona Yutasife humaine. Yisasima atafa hisaya kama amavelisia kanohe, aune laga humaine. Ani kemoa ago falote huno tamage humaine.
Ani kanoa, Yutasie, Yisasienema tokaeta nemauna anagapi maineno Yisasi kea nehavigeno aliyatela hutenea kano maine.
Ani kanoa, Yutasie, kefo yama hia yamo anonaa mone aliteno mopa miya humaleteno ani mopafi agoya faigeno aipamoa aitalaga higeno mukia aipamoa helafi lavi-maine.
Helafi lavigeya mukia Yelusalemuma mainaya veamoya ani kea haviteya ani mopamo agia amakaiami kefina ‘Akelatama.’ huya humainae. Tagai kefina ani agia ‘Kolama lavi-mainea kumale.’ huya humainae.
Tevitima yagamema humainea autamafina, Samupina, mage huno kae-maleneane
‘Agaiama nemaiya kumala vaya omaino yu kuma hapaesie.’
huno kae-maleneane. Ani kemoa nago kaiyaga mage huno humaineane
‘Alu kanomoa agai aliyatela alisie.’ huno humaineane.

Ani yafe nago kanomoma Yonia tima falematenea kanaleti aepa heno Anumayatia Yisasiene tagaienema vaiyatete huno huno egenoma Yisasia ikapinaga haimainea yupa tagaienema nemaiya vayapiti nago kanoa Yisasima fali-mainefitima heti-mainea kema hamapaisiafe ani aliyatela alita hetitesune.” huno Pitaa humaine.
Higeya amakaya tole kanolafe “Anakayae.” huya hageana nago kanoa, Yosefe Pasapasie kanomona, nago agia Yasatusie, nago kanoa Matiasie huya anakia ayemainae.

Ayeteya Anumayamotega mage huya havinegae “Anumayamoga kagaya mukia vayamogami amakuafina ago age-mainane. Yutasima haiya kavama huteno tataleno havi kapi umainea yafe anonaale alu kanomoa hetino Aposolo kano maisie huta nehune. Kagaya ani kanolatapitila hana kano ago hapalika huneatane? Huneatana kanoa tavelio.” huya havinegae.
Nunamuna huteya anakia aote yate kaeteya yopafi maleneya nagoke avayu huya agayana Matiasi agi avayu huteya ani kanoa avaleya hetitageno Aposolo vayapi maine.
Yisasia ago falitegeya sevenia (7) sota maiteya vitimo afulea kanahe muse haya imu kiya kanafina mukia Yisasi veala nago nopi alitalu huya mainae.
Mainageno aupaa ikapinagati ala age neaino ala yasimoma huhu huhu nehia kava huno age neaino anima mainaya nopina me hiya humaine.
Hiya higeya agayana atamo anefe kana yamoa hamaote hamaote amaugafale mo kamaemaine.
Mo kamae-mainegeno Alu Aotage Avamumoa eno mukiamogami amakupina me hiya higeya amakaya aepa heya Alu Aotage Avamumo hamapaigeya amaku amakesafiti nohaviya kea alu ke alu ke humainae.
Nehageya ani yupa kasagoya Anumaya Koti kema nehaviya Yuta vayayaga mukia kotegati eya Yelusalemu melitalu humainae.

Ani vayamoya ikapinagatima ala agegefa aigeya haviteya melitalu huya haviyana ani nopima mainaya veamoya alu ke alu ke maiya nehageya alu kotegatima emainaya veamoya mage hae “Nagai ke nehie. Nagai ke nehie.” huya tusia amamayo aimainae.
Amamayo neaiya amakesa havi havi huya mage hae “Mani kema nehaya vayamoya Kalili vaya mainayanagi hanaa huya tagaiti itatimoya nelafaya nehageta nehavuna kefitila hageta nehavune.

Tagaya ma kumayagaleti emainone Patiaene Mitiaene Elamiene Mesopotemiaene Yutiaene Kapatosiene Potusiene Esiaene Filigiaene Pamafiliaene Isipiene Sailinia aupaale Lipia kotegatiene Lomuene Kalitiene Alepiaene naa kotegati emainonagi Yuta vayaene Yuta vayamogami Anumaya Kotiamimo ke havilinaya vayaene emainonagi tahaote tahaote ketifiti Anumaya Koti tokiyaleti humainea kavafe tahapai-mainae.” huya hae.

Hageya mukia veamoya tusia amamayo neaiya tusia amakesa nehaviya nagoa veamoya mage huya hae “Ani kavamona aepaa naane?” huya hayanagi nagoa veamoya havigu ke nehuya mage hae “Amakaya havilina vaini nofi alagamo timaa neteya aneginagi nehae.” huya humainae.
Pitaa alevenia (11) Aposolo vayaene heti-maineno ala kefiti mage huno humaine Yuta nafunaganagatamaene Yelusalemuma mainaya veanene nago ke tamahapaigahugi haviho.
Tamakaya tamakesa haviyana mani veamoya havilina vaini li neya aneginagi nehae hutama nehafi? Aao menia natekefa naeni kiloki nehigi havilina onenae.
Onenagi menima agaya yafena nayona Anumaya Koti aune kanomoa Yoelima humainea kemoa mage huno humaineane.

Anumaya Kotia mage huno humaine “Mani kanamoa aupaama hano hugahema hisia kanafina nagaya Alu Aotage Avamunimona mukia veanemogamina amamigahue. Amamisugeya tamakai nafanemoene munanemoene Anumayamo avayafiti hamapai-mainea kea hisageya neyavetamimoya himona kana yayaga feluga neagesageya kosunatamimoya himona agegahae.
He, nagaya Alu Aotage Avamula aliya veanimogamina vene anene amamisugeya Anumayamo avayafitima hamapai-mainea kea tamahapaigahae.
Nagaya ikateene ma mopafiene tokiya avameyama hisua yana kolaene ataene halinaene tamaveligahue.
Tamavelitesugeno yagemoa ayesu hinageno ikamoa kolamaage hisigeno Anumayamoma esia kanafina tusia tokiyaaene hale yamaaene efalote hugahie.
Efalotema hinageya mukia veamoya Anumayamo agi neayeya ‘Kalagi ailato.’ huya nehisageno Anumaya Kotia amaku amamena aligatigahie.” huno kae-maleneane.

Isaleli vayamogatama nago kea tamahapaigahugi haviho “Nasaleti Yisasie, Anumaya Kotitegati emainea kano maine.” hutama havisaya yafe Anumaya Kotia aya higeno tusia tokiya avame yana tamakaipina ago ali falote higetama age-mainae.

Agayanagi Anumaya Kotia nayona havino “Naa maa hugahue.” huno haya kimaleteno tamayapi ategetama Anumaya Kotia hutenea kava hutama ani kanoa, Yisasina, kefo vayaene yafaga yosalela nilia hetama asaitetama hayageno fali-maine.
Falimaineanagi falimainea yamoa atafa huno atakalo ohune. Anumaya Kotia anima agata yama alino falimainea yapitila kalu heno ali hetitene.
Nayona Tevitia Yisasima falimainesifitima alino heti-tesia yafena mage huno humaineane
“Mukia kanafina Anumayaniamoa nagaiene maineno tamaga nayategama mainea yafena kolia ohugahue.
Nagaienema nemaiya yafena nagu nafanemoa tusia muse nehigena agia alisaga nehue. Yoka falitena hetigahue huna nametitia nehue.
Anumaya Kotigae ‘Alu aotage kanoe.’ huka hunatenana kanomonia naugafa kasalisia yafe fali-mainaya veane mainaya kumatela natalesanagena ovisua yafe nametitia nehue.
Kagaya agola maige maige hisua kana ago navelinagena age-mainoafe kagaienema maisua yafena aluya huna musena hugahue.” Teviti mani kea humaineane.
Pitaa nagoene mage hie “Nenafugatama hufalote huna tamahapaisue taginagomoa Tevitia ago faligeya hevaitenae. Hevaitenaya komua tagai amunopi hanegi akaiahe mani kea ohuneane.

Ohunegi Anumaya Kotia agaife mage huno hulokiya vaino kea humaineane ‘Kagai kaginagomopiti nago kanomoa hetino eteno kagai kumate veanea kava yagaimategahie.’ huno humaineane. Humaineanagi Tevitia Anumaya Koti aune kano maineanagino Kalaisia, Anumaya Kotima taugafa aligatigahe hutenea kanoa, fali-mainefiti hetigahie huno aune laga huno mage huno humaine. Kalaisife ‘Augafaa kasalisia yafe fali-mainaya veane nemaiya kumatela oategane.’ huno humaineane.
Ani kanoa, Yisasina, Anumaya Kotia fali-mainefiti eteno ago alino hetitegeta age-mainona yafe tamahanepaune.

Anumaya Kotia ali hetiteno avalesaga huno agaia tamaga aya kaiyagaa uhagote mainaya vaya mainalega ateteno ‘Tamamigahue.’ hunoma humainea kanoa, Alu Aotage Avamua, amigeno aliteno Yisasia ani Alu Aotage Avamula eteno lamigeta mani kavala hunagetama neagae.

Tevitia mage huno humaineane Anumaya Kotia Anumayaniamofena mage huno humaine ‘Tamaga nayatega uhagote mainaya vaya mainalega mopale emainesanagena kame vayakaa kaiyafi amatesugeya ani kame vayamoya kagaifena ago tagasane.’ huya hugahae.” huno humaineane.

“Ani yafe Isaleli vayamogata havilama huta havisune. Ani Yisasina tamakayama yafaga yosalela nilia hetama asai-malenaya kanomofe Anumaya Kotia mage huno humaine ‘Ani kanomoa Anumaya maineanagi nagaya hutogeno emainea kano maine.’ huno humaine.” huno nehie. Kasagoya ve amoya amakua aiyahae hageya tina falematenae.
Pitama hia kemoa amakupi ayegeya haviteya Pitaene nagoa Aposolo vayaenefe mage huya hae “Nelafugatama menia hanaa hisune?” huya hae.

Hageno Pitaa mage huno hie “Tamakaya mukiamogatama tamakua aiyahae hutama egeta Yisasi Kalaisi agile tina falelamatano. Aniama hisagenoa Anumaya Kotia aigetamateno kefo yatamia atalelamateno Alu Aotage Avamula tamamigahie.

‘Tamamigahue.’ huno humainea kea tamakaife nehigi tamakayaene nafanetamiene Yuta vea omainaya veanenefe mani kea huno mukia Anumaya Kotia kema humatesia veamogamife ‘Tamamigahue.’ humaineane.” huno Pita mani kea humaine.

Pitaa mani kea nehuno alu ke alu ke huno kanaye kanaye huno mage huno hie “Meni kanafima mainaya veamoya tusia kefo kava maiya nehagi havigu tamakaya kefo kava huyafenagi atalegeno Anumaya Kotia tamaku tamamena aligatino.” huno humaine.
Higeya nagoa veamoya tali tausenia (3,000) veamoya mani kea haviteya aliya amakupi maleya amametiti hageya ani yupa lina falematenae. Yisasife amakupi nemalaya veamoya tokaeya kanale kava nehae.
Lina falematageya amakaya mukia yupa nago amaku amakesa haviya Aposolo vayamogami kea haviya hameya maya kofa huya nete nete nehuya Anumayamotega muse huya nunamuna nehae.
Nehageya mukia veamoya tusia amamayo neaigeya Aposolo vayamoya kasagoya tokiya avame yana nehae.
Mukia Yisasi kema haviya amakupi maleya amametitima humainaya veamoya nagoke amaku amakesa haviya mukia yayagaamihena “Nagainige yane.” huya ohunagi “Mukia yana lagaiti ya hane.” huya nehae.
Mopaene afenoyaamienema hanea veamoya atalageno alu kanomoa miya higeya monea aliteya fako hute hute huya kaveamima omalenea veala amaminae.

Mukia kanafina nagoke amaku amakesa haviya ala mono nopina neuya alu nopina alu nopina uya hameya maya kofa huya kaveene nete nete nehuya muse huya Anumaya Koti agia alisaga nehageya mukia veanemoya ageteya “Kanale kava nehae.” huya nehageno Anumayamoa nago kanafina nago kanafina nagoa veanea amaku amamena aligatiteno “Nagai ke nehaviya veaene maiho.” huno humatene.
Nago yupa une kanalega tali (3) kiloki Pitaene Yoniene nunamu hisaya kanamoa aupa higeana ala mono notega umainae.

Nevaageya vayamoya nagola kali kanoa, atenelegati aiyamoa haviya humainea kanoa, avaleya emainae. Mukia kanafina anima aiyama haviya humainea kanomoa ala mono nomo fiate mopale nemaiyane. Ani fiamo agia koganali fiane huya agia neayaya fiate maineno ala mono nopima vaya veafena “Monea namiho.” huno ayana haya hulineno aukaya nehia kanoe.
Ani kanomoa ageana Pitaene Yoniene ala mono nopi haigahe nehaageno “Monea namitetanao.” huno aukaya hunatene.
Hunategeana Pitaene Yoniene tokiyaage aulu hemaineana Pitaa mage hie “Taagaila taago.” huno humaine.

Higeno ani kanomoa “Nago ya namigahe nehae.” huno anakaila anakeke huno anake-mainegeno Pitaa mage huno hie “Monenia omalegi nagaipima hanea yana kamigahue Nasaleti Yisasi Kalaisi agile kahanepauve hetika ute ete huo.” huno nehuno tamaga ayate alino hetitegeno aupaa aiyamoene aleyamoene kanale hutegeno tokiya hau-maine.
Tokiyaage hautegeno hetino ute ete nehuno anakaiene ala mono nopinaga nehaino haite asaga hulavite nehuno Anumaya Koti agia alisaga hume hume nehaiye.

Anumaya Koti agia alisaga huno haigeya mukia veamoya agayana higeya “Vae mani kanoa mukia yupa ala mono nomona koganali fiate maineno aukaya nehia kanogi.” huya nehuya alino kanalema hutenea yafena tusia amamayo aimainae.

Veamoya amamayo neaigeno ani kanomoa Pitaene Yoniene anatafa huno ananukigeya mukia veamoya ala mono nomo haupale yasi alisia ya ayekalo humalenea nomo, agia Solomoni none huya nehaya yate, amakaitega umainae.

Vageno Pitaa ageteno mage huno humaine “Isaleli kumate vayamogatama naa higetama atali talua nehae? Taagaya taagaitia tokiyaletiene fatago humainoa auava yatetiene ani kanoa alitaa kanale hutoageno ute ete nehie hutama taagaila taageneasagalifi?

Aao. Taginagomogami Anumaya Kotia, Apalahamuene Aisakiene Yekopuene Anumaya Kotiamimoa, agaia aliya kanoamona, Yisasi, tokiya hale ya amigahe ani kanomona alino kanale hutenegi tamakaya ani Yisasina avaletama kame vayamogami amayapi atageno Pailatia Yisasife ‘Afaa atalegahue.’ huno nehiana tamakaya Pailati aulagafi ‘Tagai kava kanoa omaigi agaya falisie.’ hutama tamakaveno hutenae.

Alu aotage kanoa fatago kavaage nehia kanomona tamakaveno huneatetama vayama hamaeno fali neamatea kanohe ‘Atalegeno eno.’ hutetama mukia veamogami hamaimumona aepaa mainea kanomona hayageno falianagi Anumaya Kotia fali-mainefiti alino hetitegetaa ago agetetaa mani kea tamahanepaue.

‘Yisasia kanale hulaatesia tokiya hane.’ hutaa taagupi malenoa yafe manima neagaya kanomona ago kanale hutetegeno aiyamoa tokiya vaimaine. ‘Yisasia kanale hutesia tokiyaa hane.’ hutaa taagupi malenoa yateti tamakai tamaulagafi ago kanale hutegeno kanale huno maine.
Tamage nenafugatama nagaya havuana tamakai kava vayatamimoyaene Yisasima emainea aepaaene havilama ohunetama Yisasina hae-mainae.

Hae-mainaya yafe Anumaya Koti aune vayamogami amavayafitima humainaya kea mage humainayane ‘Nagaya tamaugafa aligatigahe hutenoa kanomoa tusia agataya aliteno faligahie.’ huya humainaya kemoa efalote huno tamage humaine.
Ani yafe kefo yatamia neataletama tamakua aiyahae hisageno Anumaya Kotia kefo yatamia aye hami-talegahie.
Aye hamiteno agaialegati kanalema humatesia yana nelamamino Yisasina tamakaifema tamaugafa aligatigahie huno hutenea kanoa eteno tamakaitega hutenageno egahie.

Hutegahianagi meni kanafina Yisasia ikapinaga maineno Anumaya Kotima mukia yana eteno haegafa yamaage talo hisia yafe agava-maine. Mukia Anumaya Kotima nayoma mainaya amaune vayamoya humainaya kemoa efalote huno tamage humaineafe Yisasia eteno egahie.
Mosesea mage huno kaemaleneane ‘Anumaya Kotia tamakaipiti nagola aune laga hisia kanoa nagayama huaya huno hisia kanoa ali hetitegahie. Hetitetenagenoma agayama hisia kea haviho.
Ani aune kanomo kema ohavisaya veamogamina Anumaya Kotia hamaeno fali hano hinageya Isaleli veapina omaigahae.’ huno humaineane.
Mukia Anumaya Koti amaune vayamoya Samueliene agai akavelegatima falote humainaya amaune vayayagaene menima mainona kanahe haviya kae-malenayane.

Tamakaya Anumaya Koti amaune laga nehaya vayamogami amakinagomogatama mainae. Anumaya Kotima Apalahamufe hulokiya vaino alino hagelafi lamatenea kea huno tamakaienefe mani kea humaine. Anima hulokiya vaimalenea kemoa mage huno humaineane ‘Nago tamakinagomoa esiana mukia ma mopafi veamogamina kanale manua amamigahie.’ huno humaineane.

Mukia manima humainaya kemoa falote huno tamage hisia yafe Anumaya Kotia agaia aliya nafaneamona alino hetitegetama tamakaya kefo yatamihe tamakua aiyahae hisageno tamaya huno kanale manua tamamisia yafe hagoteno tamakaitela hutegeno emaine.” Pitaa mage huno humaine.

Pitagani Yonigani yaufa mani kea hama-nepaiageya mono note kava vayaene mono note ati kava kanoene nagoa Satiusi vayaene eya menakayana anakayama “Yisasima fali-mainefitila ago ali hetiteneanagino mukia veanea ania huya fali-mainesafitila eteya hetigahae.” huana hamapaia yafe amaipa haviya nehae.
Amaipa haviya huteya anatafa hagi “Ago une kianagita ega kaiyekea hunategahune.” huya kina nopi anavaleya monatenae.
Monatayanagi kasagoya veanemoya anakai kea haviteya amakupi maleya amametiti nehae. Faefu tausenia (5,000) veamoya Yisasima hulatenea yafena haviya amakupi maleya amametitia nehae.

Faeteya koma neliana kava vayaene vayatamaene kahegi kema havilinaya anagaene Anasia ala mono note hagote kava kanomoene agaia anagaene Kaiyafasiene Yoniene Alekasataene mukiamoya Yelusalemu alitalu humainae.
Alitalu huteya ani kanolatana anavaleya amaufi hetinateneya mage huya hanavigae “Tanakaya hanaa agimo tokiyaleti mani kavala humainae?” huya hanavigae.
Hana-vigageno Alu Aotage Avamumoa Pitana agupina hiya higeno mage huno humaine Kava vayamogatamaene vayatamaene haviho.
Mani aiyamoa haviya humainea kanomona ali falu hutetana alitana kanale hutenae kea havisune hutama kaiyekea hulaatetama na yateti mani kava nehae hutama taahavi-negapi?

Taa-havigayanagi mukiamogatamaene mukia Isaleli veamoyaene haviho. Nasaleti Yisasi Kalaisi agimoa manima tamaufima heti-mainea kanomona alino kanale hutene. Ani Yisasina tamakaya yafaga yosale nilia hetama asaigeno fali-maineanagi Anumaya Kotia fali-mainefiti ago ali hetitene.
Anumaya Koti kemoa autamafina mage huno humaine
“Tamakaya yafa noma kiyana nago yafafena ‘Haviya hie.’ hutama atalayanagi menia ani yafamoa tusia kanale yafane nomo ayetagenale ago malenae.” huno humaineane.
Ani yafana Yisasife humaine.
Ani kanomoa agaiage tagu tamena aligatigahie. Mukia mopafi veapitila nago kanomo agileti tagu tamena aliokatigahigi Yisasina agaiage agileti tagu tamena aligatigahie huno humaine.

Pitagani Yonigania tokiyaage ke haageya haviteya mage hae “Vae mani kanolatana afa kanolata maineana avo nopina ounaa kanolanagi hanaa huana tusia kanale kea nehae?” huya amakesa havi havi nehuya “Vae mani kanolatana Yisasiene nemaia kanolatane.” huya humainae.
Hayanagi aliana kanalema hutenaa kanoa anakaiene heti-mainegeya agaya yafe nagoa havige havagea huoanatenae.
“Kanisole vaya nopitila ataletana vio.” huya hunateteya amakaiamifi kea huge havige humainae.
Mage huya hae “Ani tole kanolatana hanaa hunatesune? Mama tokiya avame yana haageya mukia Yelusalemu nemaiya veamoya ago age-mainagi hanaa huta ali fala-kisune?
Havigu mani kemoa alu kote kotega ute ete huyafenagi aluya huta ‘Nagoene mani agia oayeo.’ huta kahegi-natesune.” huya humainae.
Anakaife ke hageana aageya mage huya anaumonola malenae “Yisasifena nagoene veamogamina hamapaitana humaveotio.” huya hae.

Hageana Pitaene Yoniene kenonaamia mage hae “Na tamakesa nehaviye Anumaya Koti aulagafi mainoagi ta kele akavela malesue? Tamakai kelepi Anumaya Koti kelele hutama nehafi na tamakesa nehaviye? Tamakaitami fako hutama haviho.
Taagaya Yisasima humainea kavala agetaa havimainoa kavayaga fala okigahue.” huana nehae.

Haageya anaikolisaya amakesa haviyanagi mukia veamoya humainaa kavala ageteya Anumaya Koti agi alisaga nehageya mage hae “Anaiko-lisunana veamoya kelama-kigahae.” huya nagoene anaumonola maleteya anatalageana umainae.

Anima aiyama haviya humainea kanoma aliana kanale hutenaa kanomona kafua fotia (40) kafu humainea kanogiya Anumaya Koti agi alisaga humainae. Yisasife amakupi malenaya veamoya tokiya vaiya Yisasi kema hufalote hisaya yafe Anumayamotega havige-mainae.
Anatalageana anagaanimoya mainalega uteana mukia ala mono note ala kava vayayagaene vayatamaene hanapaiya kea mo hamapai-mainae.

Mo hamapaiageya haviteya nagoke amakesa haviya Anumayamotega ke huya mage huya havige-mainae “Kava yagai Anumayatimogae mopaene ikaene hage liene mukia anifima hanea yayagaene talo humalenana kanomogae.
Kagaya kagai aliya kanoa, tototimoa Tevitima avayafiti Alu Aotage Avamukaletila mage huka humainanane

‘Naa higeya Isaleli nofima omainaya veamoya ‘Anumaya Kotiene tu hugahune.’ huya havigu ke huya amaipa kafa hemainae? Ma mopafi kava vayaene vayatamaene Anumayamofeene agaia tagu tamemaa aligatigahe hutenea kanomofeene amaipa haviya nehuya kea nevaiye?’ huno humaineane.

Mamona kelamage. Mani kumate alu aotage aliya kanokaa kagaikaa taugafa aligatigahema hutenana kanomona kame hutesaya yafe Helotiene Potiasi Pailatiene Yuta vea omainaya vayayagaene Isaleli vayaene alitalu huya mainae.
Kagayama nayoma huka ‘Naa maa hugahae.’ hukama havimainana kagesa ania hugahe alitalu humainae.

Menia Anumayatimoga manima tagaifema hamae vainelateya hu kolima latesaya kema haya kea nehavika tahamao. Tagaya kagai aliya vaya mainonagi kagaya tahamaegeta kolia ohuta kagai kea tokiyaage huta hamapaisune huta kahavinegone.
Kayana maleka kali veala alika kanale huneamateka kagaikaa alu aotage nafanekamo agile tokiya avame yama hisuna tokiyakaa lamio.” huya Anumayamotega havinegae.

Havigageno Anumaya Kotia amakayama mainaya nona alino kosi kosi hutegeno Alu Aotage Avamumoa amakupina me hiya humainegeya Anumaya Koti kema tokiyaage huya hamapaisaya yafena kolia ohunae. Mukia Yisasina amakuama aminaya veamoya nagoke amaipale maineya amaipa oami aami huya mainae.
Mukia Yisasi kema haviya amakuama aminaya veamoya nagoke amaku amakesale maineya nago kanomoa agaiage yafena ageteno “Nagainige yane.” huno ohunegi “Mukia yana tagaiti yamaage hane.” huya humainae.
Hageno tusia tokiyaa amamigeya Aposolo vayamoya “Yisasia fali-mainefitila ago heti-maine.” huya hamanepaigeno Anumaya Kotia kayone hisaya yana neamamino amaya humaine.

Amaya higeya amakai amunoamifina kavefena kafua ohu veane maineya mopaamia hanea veanene noamia hanea veanene “Alu kanomo miya hisie.” huya hageya monea amamigeya aliya Aposolo vayamogamina momamigeya kaveamima omalenea veamogamina amaya huya amamite amamite humainae.

Nago kanoa Yosefee, nago agia Aposolo vayamoya mage huya malenae Panapasie huya malenae. Ani agimoa tagai kefina mage hie “Amaipa falu hisia ke nehia kanoe.” Ani kanomoa Livai nofi kano maine. Saipalusi kumateti kanomoa agaia mopa alu kano amigeno monea eteno amigeno ani monea alino Aposolo vaya me neamamiane.
Nago kanoa Ananaiyasie aamo agia Safailae ani alavelatamogania nago mopaania alu kano neamiana mone ali-mainae.
Aliteana Ananaiyasia kesi nagoa monea agaia alino fala-kigeno aamoa anima alia monea ago age-maine. Ananaiyasia nagoa monea alino Aposolo vaya momamine.

Amamianagi Pitaa agaifena mage hie “Ananaiyasigae Satania kefo kagu kagesa kamigeka kagaya ‘Mukia monea mama hane.’ huka nehanagi nagoa monea ali fala-negika Alu Aotage Avamumofena havige huka ayevataga nehane.

Mani mopa kagaika mopagika ‘Alu kanomo alisie.’ huka monea nealika ania huka kagaika monegi naa higeka ‘Havigea huna ayevataga hugahue.’ huka kagu kagesafinaga nehane? Vayamona ayevataga ohunanagi Anumaya Koti ayevataga humainane.” huno nehie.

Higeno Ananaiyasia ani kea haviteno ailakatino fali-maine. Faligeya neyavemoya nago kena moliya haya kiteteya aliya komufi mo hevaitenae. Hevaitetageya ani kanoma fali-mainea kea mukia veamoya haviteya tusia lagi tagiya amake-mainae.

Haenagaa talia (3) aova hanoma nehiana aamoa ani fali-mainea kea ohavino egeno Pitaa agaife mage hie “Manima hanea monea mopaletila hai ani kanoa ali-mainao?” huno higeno “Tamage ani kanoa al-imainoe.” huno humaine.

Higeno Pitaa mage huno hie “Naa higetana tanakaya tokaetana kea hutetana ‘Alu Aotage Avamumona ayevataga hugahue.’ hutana haane? Agego anaukamoma agoma aliya mo hevaitaya vayala eteya fiate me heti-maineya kagaienena falisanageya aliya mo hevaigategahae.” huno humaine.
Nehigeno aupaa ani amoa Pita aiyafi ailakatino agoya faiteno faligeya neyaveyagamoya haiya mogayana ani ala ago fali-mainegeya moliya anauamoma hevaitale mo lokaeya hevainatenae.
Hevainatageya Yisasina amakuama aminaya veaene mukia ani kema haviya veamoyaene tusia lagitagiya amake-maine.

Aposolo vayamoya mukia vea amunopi kasagoya tokiya avame yayaga hageya age-mainae. Ageteya Yisasina amakuama aminaya veamoya nagoke amaku amakesale maineya ala mono nomo haupale yasi alisia ya ayekalo humalenea nomo agia Solomoni none ani nopi mukia kanafina molitalu humai humai nehayane.
Nehageya nagoa veamoya kolima haya yafe amakaienena mo lokaeya uomainagi ani veamogami amaki alisaga humainae. Mukia veamoya Yisasi kema haviya amakupi maleya amametitia huteya amakaiene mainae.
Tokiya avameyama humainea yafe mukia kalima hamaeya veala amavaleya kate amateya hagifanale maineya mage hae “Pitama esiana agai amemo me halatu hamaesigeno kanale humategahie.” huya kate momatenae.
Amatageya mukia veamoya Yelusalemu aupatema hanea kumayagaleti kalima hamaeya veanene Satani avamumoma amakupi fale-mainea veanene amavaleya ageno mukia ago alino kanale humatene.
Mono notema hagote kava kanomoene agaienema lokaeya mainaya vayaene Satiusi vayamoyaene amaipa haviya humateteya Aposolo vayala amatafa huya amavaleya kina nopi momatenae.

Amatenageno ani kegela Anumayamo ensole kanomoa eno fita me yakino anifiti amavaleno kumatega neuno mage huno hie “Tamakaya utama ala mono nopi hetitama veamoyama haegafa huya agola maige maige hisaya hamaimula alisaya kea hamapaiho” huno humaine.

Higeya haviteya natekefafi hetiya uya ala mono nopi veamogamina mo hamanepaiye. Hamanepaigeno ala mono note hagote kava kanomoene agaienema lokaeya nemaiya vayaene ani kea ohaviya neataleya Kanisole vayafeene Isaleli nofi vayatamaenefe moge hageya ageno ati vayafe “Kinama humatenona vayala momavaletama eho.” huya hamapaimainae.

Me hageya ati vayala kina nopi mogayana omaigeya neataleya eteya mage mo hae “Tagaya mogonana fita tokiyaage alokileti hemaleneya vayala kava yagaiya kumate hetimainageta fita mo yakiteta kina nopima mogonana omainae.” huya me humainae.

Mehageya ala mono note kava vayayagaene mono note ati kava kanoene mani kea haviteya tusia amakesa havi havi huya mage hae “Hanaa huya kina nopitila fanane humainae? Hanaa humainea ya falote hugahie.” huya hae.
Hageno nago kanomoa mage huno me hamapaiye “Haviho kina nopima amataya vayala ala mono nopi hetiya maineya veamogamina humave-neliye.” huno me hie.
Me higeya mono note ati kava kanomoene ati vayaaene uya “Havigu amakai kema havimainesaya veamoya yafateti tahaesageta falisunagi.” huya amaikootiya ako huya amavaleya emainae.
Amavaleya ayaamoya Kanisole vaya amunopi me hetimatetageno ala mono note hagote kava kanomoa mage huno hie.

“Tagaya Yisasife nagoene veamogamina hamapaitama humaveotiho” huta tamakaila tamaumonola ago malonanagi tamakaya mukia Yelusalemu nemaiya veamogamina mani kea hamapaitama tagaifena ‘Ago Yisasina hae-malenaya vaya mainae.’ hutama hamapai-mainae.” huno hie.
Hianagi Pitaa nagoa Aposolo vayaene mage huya nehae “Ma mopafi vayamogami kemona akave omalegahunagi tagaya Anumaya Koti kemo akave malegahune.
Tamakaya Yisasina nagoke yafaga yosale asai-malageno fali-maineanagi Tototimo Anumaya Kotia fali-mainefiti ago ali hetitene.

Ali hetiteteno avalesaga huno tamaga ayatega ategeno hagote kava kanoa tagu tamema aligatimainea kanoene mainea yafe tagaya Isaleli veamogata tagua aiyahae hisuna tagesa tamisigeta tagua aiyahae hisunageno aigetateno kefo yatia atalelategahie.

Tagaya mani kea hisuna vaya mainonageno Alu Aotage Avamumoa ania huno mani kea humaine. Mukia Anumaya Koti kema akave malenaya veamogamina Anumaya Kotia Alu Aotage Avamula ago amamine.” huno hie. Kamalielia kanisole vayamofe mage huno hie “Aposolo vayamogamina ako hutama amateho.” huno humaine.
Hageyama mani kema haviya yafe amaipa amakata aiya Aposolo vayala hamaesageya falisaya amakesa nehaviye.

Hamaegahayanagi nagola Falasia kanomo agia Kamalielie mono humave-nelia kanogino Yuta vayamogami Kanisolefi mainegeya mukia veamoya agima alisaga nehaya kanogino ani kanomoa hetino mage huno hie “Tahaote kea hugahunagi Aposolo vayala humategeya kumatega hati-lavisageta kea hisune.” huno hie.
Higeya hati-laviya vageno mage huno Kanisole vayamogamife hie “Isaleli vayanimogatama mani vayamogamina nago yama humategahunema hinutama tamakesa havilama hutetama ania hiho.

Nayona nago kanomo agia Teutasie evayi huno ‘Nagaya tokiyania hanea kano mainoe.’ huno higeya fo hataletia (400) vayamoya akavela vayanagi kamani kava vayatimoya ago hayageno faligeya akavema nevaya vayala atagufeya ute ete hageno aliyamaamoa afa ya kana humaine.

Agai akavelega amakima negayaya kanafina Yutasie Kalili kanomoa evayi huno kea hamapaigeya nagoa vayala akave nevageno kava vayatimoya Yutasina ago hayageno faligeya akavema nevaya vayala atagufeya ute ete humainae.

Naa humainaya yafe menia tamahapauve mani vayala amatalegeya viho. Anima nehaya kea amakaiami mopale vayamogami kema hanesigenoa afaa hano hugahianagi Anumaya Koti kema hanesigetama tamakayama ali haviyama hisaya amukotamia omalene. Havigu lamakaya Anumaya Kotina kame hutetama agaiene tu hutesagi.” huno humaine.

Higeya Kamalieli ke haviya “Tamage hane.” huteya Aposolo vayafe ke hageya ageya nofi kayoteti haifu amamiteya amaumono nemaleya mage hae “Yisasifena nagoene veamogamina hamaopaiho.” huya humateteya amatalageya umainae.

Ani Kanisole vayala amataleya neuya “Anumaya Kotia ago tamatea kava nehae.” huno tagaifena nehuno “Yisasi agima neayaya yafe tamakaye hisifa kavala hisagetama amukotamia hanegahie.” huno humainea yafe tusia muse hume hume umainae.
Mukia yupa ala mono nopiene veamogami nopiene mukia veamogamina Yisasifena hamapai-mainae. “Yisasina Anumaya Kotia taugafa aligatigahema hutenea kanoe.” huya hamapai-mainae.

Kasagoya veamoya Yisasi kea haviya amakupi maleneya amaku aminaya kanafina nagoa ani veamoya Kaliki ke havilinaya vea mainagi nagoa veamoya Hipalu ke havilinae. Kaliki kema havilinaya veamoya mage hae “Tagai megusa aneyaga havi kava hutama osi kanoa kavela neamamiyanagi Hipalu amakema neaiya megusa aneyaga kasagoya kave neamamiye.” huya amaipa haviya huya ke vai-mainae.

Kema vaiya yafe Yisasina tuelufua (12) Aposolo anagaamoya mukia Yisasina amakuama aminaya veafe ke hageya ageya mage huya hae “Havigu tagaya Yisasi ke hamanepauna aliyatia ataleta kavema fako faka hisunana haviya huyafenagi nafunaganagatama tamakaitami amunotamifi atiyetama sevenia (7) kanale amaku amakesaene vayama, mainesigenoma Alu Aotage Avamumoa amakupima hiya humainenageya veaamimogami amaulagafima kanale kavama nehisaya vayafe atiyetama ani aliyatela humatesune.
Humategahunanagi tagaya mukia yupa nunamu huta havige havige nehuta Yisasi kea hamapaige hamapaige huta maigahune.” huya humainae.

Hageya mukia veamoya mani kea haviteya muse nehuya ani vayala hapaliya humataya vayala Sitivenia, Yisasi kea aguafi tokiyaage huno malegeno Alu Aotage Avamumoa agupina hiya humainea kanoene Filipiene Polokolasiene Nikanaene Timoniene Pamenasiene Nikolasie. Nikolasia Atioku kanoa nayona Yuta nofi kanoa omaineanagi eayamo “Yuta vayamogami Anumaya Kotiamimo ke alina nagupi malegahue.” huno Isaleli nofi vayapi maineane.
Ani vayala amavalageya Aposolo vayatega ageya ani vayamogami amanute amaya maleya nunamuna humatenae.

Anumaya Koti kemoa mukia kotega ute ete higeya kasagoya Yelusalemu nemaiya veamoya Yisasi kea haviya amakupina malenae. Kasagoya mono note kava vayayagaene ania huya Yisasi kea aliya amakupi maleya amametiti humainae.
Sitivenia tusia kanale kanogino kayone hisia yaene tokiyaaene agupina hiya humainegeno tusiya huno ani vayapina tokiya avame yana humaine.

Ania nehianagi nagoa vayamoya hetiya Sitiveniene ke nevaiye. Ani vayala miya oali vaya maiteya eteya afaa maineya nago mono nopi nevaya vayale. Sailinia vayaene Alekasatalia vayaene nagoa vayala Silisia vayaene Esia vayaene Sitivenina ke vaitenae.
Kea vaitayanagi Alu Aotage Avamumoa hamaegeno kanale agu agesaene kanomo kea amigeno humaine. Higeno amakai kemoa Sitiveni kemona oagasene.

Oagasegeya nagoa vayafe “Sitivenifena havige hutesageta mone lamamigahune.” huya hageya ani vayala mage mo hae “Mani kanomoa Mosesefeene Anumaya Kotifeene tusiya huno hu-haviya hunategeta havimainone.” huya mo humainae.
Mani kema haya yafe mukia vayamoyaene vayatamaene kahegi kema havilinaya anagamogamina amakuamoa haviya higeya Sitivenina motafa huya Kanisole vayate avaleya umainae.
Uteya nagoa havigema nehaya vayala amavaleya hetimatageya ani vayamoya mage hae “Mani kanomoa mukia yupa tagaila alu aotage mono notiene kahegi kene huno haviya hie.
Higeta havunana Yisasia Nasaleti kanomoa ma ala mono nona alina lagaya vaineatalena ‘Mosesema tahapai-mainea kahegi kea ataletama alu kava hiho.’ huno higeta havimainone.” huya hae.
Nehageya mukia Kanisolefi mainaya vayamoya Sitivenina aulu hayana augosamoa alave alave nehuno ensole vayamogami amaugosamoma nehia kava higeya age-mainae.
Ala mono note hagote kava kanomoa Sitivenifena mage huno havige “Mani kema hugataya kea tamage nehao?” huno havige.

Higeno Sitivenia mage huno humaine nenafagatamaene naganani-mogatamaene haviho. Taginagomoa Apalahamue yaufa Halani kotega ouno Mesopotemia kotega mainegeno tokiya hale yamaaene Anumaya Kotia Apalahamute efalote humaineane.
Efalote huteno mage huno hapaiye “Kagaika mopakaaene vayakamogamienena neamataleka kavelisua mopalega vuo.” huno humaineane.
Higeno Apalahamua anile Kalatia vayamogami mopa neataleno Halani kotega umaineno anilega nefaa falitegeno Anumaya Kotia eteno hutegeno tamakayama menima mainaya mopalela emaineane.

Emaineanagi Anumaya Kotia agaia atafa hisia mopa nago atupa kanoa ani mopa nagoke aiya malesia mopa oaminegi “Haenagaa kamigahue. Ani mopa atafa hulinesanageya kagaipiti falote hisaya nafaneyagamoya aligahae.” huno hianagi ani kanafina Apalahamua namo kano maineane.

Maineanagino Anumaya Kotia agaifena mage humaineane “Kagaikaa kaginagomoya Isaleli nofima omainaya vayamogami mopale visageya ani vayamoya amatafa huya ‘Aliyatia aliho.’ huya tusi yate ali haviya humatesageya ani mopalela fo hataletia (400) kafu maigahae.

Maigahayanagi amatafama huyama ‘Aliyatima aliho.’ huya humainaya vayamogamina nagaya kaiyeke humatetena alina haviya humatesugeya kagai kaginagomoya ani kotegatila eteya ma mopale emaineya nagai nagia alisaga hugahae.” huno humaineane.

Anumaya Kotia mage huno humaine “Nagai anagama maisaya yafe hagelafita maisuna kavala nafanekamogamina amakoya anoya taga huo.” huno higeno Apalahamua Aisakina nafanea ateteno napa eitia (8) kana maiteno agoya anoya taga humaineane. Haenagaa Aisakia nafanea Yekopuna ategeno Yekopua haenagaa tuelufua (12) nafaneyaga tagai taginagomogamina amatene.

Ani Yosefena nepuamoya Yosefefe tusia amaipa kafa heteteya avaleya alu vayamogami neamamiya mone aligeya Isipi kotega avaleya vayanagi Anumaya Kotia agaiene maineno kanama haiya yana alitaleno kanale agu agesa amigeno Isipi sauve kanoa, Felona, aulagale hetigeno Feloa muse huno “Hagote kava kano maineka nagai noyagaene mukia Isipi kotega kava yagaigane.” huno hutene.
Hutetegeno mainegeno Isipi kotegaene Kenani kotegaene nagola tusia kafu haya kana efalote higeya tototimogamina kaveamia omalegeya tusiya huno amakala lemainae.
Amakala legeno Yekopua “Isipi kotema kavela hanema.” huya haya kea haviteno nafaneyagaa hagoteno humategeya kavema hanelega umainae.
Haenagaa eteya anile vageno Yosefea “Nagayae tamakanatamimona mainoe.” huno higeno Feloa Yosefe afamofena havimaine.
Havitegeno Yosefea nefafena Yekopufeene mukia anagaa seveti faefua (75) anagaaene ke higeya Isipi kotega umainageno Yekopua anile faligeya nafaneyagaaene tototimoya fali-mainayane.
Faligeya eteya aliya Sekemu kumala, Apalahamua moneleti Hamolo nafaneyagamogami mopa miya higeno amigeno ali-mainea mopafi mo hevaitenae.

Anumaya Kotia Apalahamufema hulokiya vai-malenea kemoa fatago huno efalote hisia kanamoa aupa higeya tagai taginagomoya Isipi kumatela falote huya kasago humainageno alu sauve kanoa, Yosefefena oagenea kanomo, eteno sauvea alino humaineane.
Falote huno maineno tagai nofi vayala ayemavataga huno huhaviya huneamateno “Nafaneya-gatamia hamaesunageya faligahae.” huno tokiyaage ke humaineane.
Higeno ani kanafina Mosesena itaamoa atetegeno Anumaya Kotia hau-mainea nafanegino itaamogani nefagania talia (3) ikana noanifinaga kava huana ataageno mainae.
Kava huteteana kumate atenaageno Felo munamoa ani nafanea avaleno agaia nafane kana huno yagai-maine.
Yagaiteno avo nopi ategeno Isipi vayamoyama havilinaya yana Mosesena huve-ligeno aliteno tusiya huno tokiyaa haneteno kanale kea nehuno nehia kano maine.
Maineanagino fotia (40) kafu huteno mage hie “Isaleli vayanimogamina momakegahue.” huno agesa havimaine.
Haviteno mogeana nago Isipi kote kanomoa Isaleli kanomona aiko-neligeno Mosesea moli-neataleno anonaa ani Isipi kote kanoa haegeno fali-maine.
Faligeno Mosesea ma agesa havimaine “Vayanimoya mage huya hugahae ‘Anumaya Kotia Mosese ayapiti taugafa aligatigahie.’ huya hugahae.” huno agesa havianagi vayaamoya ani amakesa ohavinae.
Ohavigeno Mosesea faeteno mogeana tole Isaleli kanolatana tu nehaageno monaketeno moli-neanataleno mage huno hie “Nenafugatanae tanakaya nagoke konagalata mainaagi naa higetana tua nehae?” huno hie.
Higeno anima tuma aepa henoma aganaamoma aiko-lia kanomoa Mosesena ayetu-nefeno mage huno hie “Kagaila tagaite kava kano maika kaiyeke fatago hu kano maiyo kea ta kahapaigeka ania nehane?
Kagayama egama Isipi kanoma hayana kava huka nahaegahe nehano?” huno hie.
Higeno ani kema hia kehe Mosesea faleno Mitiani kotega mo maineno ala aliteteno maineno haenagaa tole ne nafanelata anatene.
Anilegama maiyana fotia (40) kafu maiteno Mosesea kame kotega Sainai agoyafi haino mainegeno nago osi yosalela ala ata anefela nelea yapiti nago ensole kanomoa evayi higeno age-maine.

Ageteno amayo neaino agelama hisue huno nehuno avate neegeno Anumayamoa anileti age aino mage huno hie “Nagaya kaginagomogamina Anumaya Kotiami mainoe. Apalahamuagi Aisakiagi Yekopugami Anumaya Kotiami mainoe.” huno higeno Mosesea atali talu huteno ani yama nagoene agesia yafena tusi koli huno oagene.
Koli nehigeno Anumayamoa mage huno hie “Mamona alu aotage mopa nagainia mopagika kaiya anona asagika maletekao.

Nagayama nagai nofi vayama Isipi nemaiya veanimoga-mina ali haviyama humataya kavala ago age-mainoe. Avima atayana ago havimainena amaugafa aligatigahe emainogi. Kagaya eno Isipi kotega hugategahue.” huno Mosesefena hapai-mainea ke huno Sitivenia hamapai-maine.

Mani Mosesefena nayona mage huya humainae “Kagaila kava kano maineka kaiyekea ali fatago hugane huya kea ta kahapaigeka ania nehane?” huya amakaveno hutenae. Anima amakaveno hutaya kanomona osi yosalema vayima humainea ensole kanomoa aya higeno Anumaya Kotia kava humateno amaugafama aligatisia yafe huteneane.
Hutegeno Mosesea Isipi kotega umaineno ani kotegati amavaleno fotia (40) kafu Isipi kumateene haesa titeene kame kotegaene kasagoya tokiya avame yayaga humaineane.
Ani Mosesea Isaleli veamogamife mage huno hamapai-maine “Anumaya Kotia tamakai vayapiti nagayama huaya huno aune laga hisia kanoa avaleno hetitegahie.” huno hamapai-maineane.

Ani Mosesea kame kotega maineno mono kema havigahema melitalu humainaya taginagomoyaene maiteno Sainai agoyafi haitegeno nago ensole kanomoa evayi huno Anumaya Kotina tahaimuma lamisia mono kea Mosesena hapaigeno Mosesea taginagomogamina hamapai-maineane.

Hamapai-mainegi taginagomoya “Mosese kea akave omalegahune.” huya amakaveno huteteya Isipi kotega eteya visaya amakesa nehaviya Elonife mage huya humainae “Kategama lavaleno visia yana Anumaya Kotitima maisia yana talo hulato. Mosesea, Isipi kotegatima lavalenoma emainea kanoa hanatepi vigeta noagone.” huya humainae.
Mani kea huteya nagola pulamakamo nafanea amayateti talo humaleteya “Anumaya Kotitia ma maine.” huya anima amayatetima talo humalaya yafena tusia muse huya afua heya kaeteya aliya mominae.

Ani kavama haya yafena Anumaya Kotia akaveno humateteno amatalegeya yagema kanefima ikama naa yama hanea yate “Anumayati mainae.” huya muse nehuya amakua amitafa huya ani yaayagamogami amaki alisaga humainaya yafe Anumaya Kotina aune vayamoya kae-malenaya autamafina mage huya humainae “Tamakaya Isaleli nofi veamogatama fotia (40) kafu kame kotega umainetama pulamakaene sipi sipiene hetama kae salamana humainayanagi nagaifena muse hutama mani kavala nehafi alu kanomofe musena nehae?

Tamaa omalenea Anumayamona agia Molekifena tusia muse hutama agai agi alisaga hisaya nona kitetama alitama utama tamaa omalenea Anumayamona agia Lefanifena tusia muse hutama kanefi kana yana talo hutama ani augafa yayagale musena hutama tamakula amitafa hutama amakia alisaga nehae. Naama haya yafe kame vayamoya humatesugetama kotamilegatila tamavaleya Papiloni kola agasetama ame kaiyaga umaigahae.” huno humaineane.

Taginagomoya kame kotegama mainagenoa Anumaya Kotia “Ma kava huka talo huo.” hunoma Mosesena huveli-mainea kavala huno mono nona kenaleti talo humaleteno kimalenegeno Anumaya Kotia ani nopi eno amakaiene me lokaeno kelamage kea hamapai-maineane.

Haenagaa Mosesea falitegeya taginagomoya ani yuguletima kimalenaya mono nona aliya Yosuaene Yuta vea omainaya veanene tua huteya mopaamia ali-mainae. Anumaya Kotia taginagomogami amaulagafima Isaleli nofima omainaya veamoya ani mopaletila amanatigeya ani yuguletima kimalenaya mono nona aliya ani mopafi eya me malageno anile hanegeno Tevitia falote humaineane.
Anumaya Kotia Tevitina kanaleya huno hamaegeno Tevitia mage humainene “Yekopu Anumaya Kotiga kanale nona kigatesue.” huno hianagi ani nona okinegi haenagaa nafaneamoa Solomoni ani nona kimaleneane.
Kianagi analema mainea Anumaya Kotia veamoya amayatetima kimalenaya nopina nomaiye. Naama humainea yafena nagola Anumaya Koti aune kanomoa mage huno humaineane

“Anumaya Kotia mage hie ‘Ikapinaga nagainia kava yagaisua siania hanegi maifaluma hisua yafe naiya malena maisua yana mopa hanegi hana augafa no kinategahae? Hana kumate maisue? Nagaya mukia yana ikapinagama hanea yaene ma mopalema hanea yaene talo humalenoe.’ huno humaine.” huno humaineane.
Tamakaya kea ohavi veane mainetama tamaku tamakesafinaga “Anumaya Koti kea ohavigahune.” hutama Alu Aotage Avamumona tamakaveno hutetetama tamakinagomoya nehaya kavaage nehae.

Tamakinagomoya mukia Anumaya Kotina amaune vayaamogamina ali haviya humatenae. “Kanale Fatago Kanoa egahie.” huya amaune vayamogamina tamakinagomoya ago hamayageya falimainayanagi tamakaya ani Kanale Fatago Kanomona ago agesi hutama hayageno fali-maine.
Ensole vayamoya ayaamoya kahegi kea ago tamahapaiyanagi tamakaya tamage hutama akavela nomalae. Mani kea Sitivenia huno humaine.
Higeya anilema mainaya veamoya Sitivenima hia kemona haviteya amaipamoa tusi amakata aiteno hamai-vaigeya amavaya mumu mama humainae.
Naa nehageno Sitiveni agupina Alu Aotage Avamumoa hiya higeno ikapinaga aulu heno ageana Anumaya Kotina tokiya hale yamaaene Yisasia Kotina tamaga ayatega heti-mainegeno age-maine.
Ageteno mage huno hie “Agegeho nagaya agoana ikamoa ago aihalegeno ikapinagati emainea kanoa vayamo atenea kanomoa Anumaya Kotina tamaga ayatega heti-mainegena nagaya neagoe.” huno hie.
Huno hianagi melitaluma humainaya veamoya agai kea ohavisaya yafe amayateti amakesa ailineleya ala kenake nehuya tusia ke nevaiya aiko-ligahe motafa humainae.
Motafa huya avayu huya kumategati malaga hagayu hutaleneya yafa kayoteti hagayu huya aiko-neliya “Fatago kava nehune” huya hisaya yafe siotaamia asagiya kava kanoa, Solo aiyafi mo-malenae.
Maleteya yafa kayoteti aiko-neligeno Sitivenia Anumayamotega havigeno mage huno hie “Anumayaniamoga Yisasigae nagu namemaa kagai kayapi nemaloe.” huno hu-maine.
Mani kea nehuno aleya ayeno ala kegefafiti Anumayamotega mage huno hie “Anumayamogae mama kefo kavama nehaya yaamimona anonaamia hu-oama-to.” huno nehuno anile fali-maine.

Sitivenima hayageno falia yafena Soloa “Kanale kava hae.” huno tusia muse humaineanagi nagoa veamoya Anumaya Koti kema nehaviya veamoya Sitivenifena tusia avi ateteya aliya mo hevaitetageya ani kanaleti aepa heya Yisasi kema haviya amakuama aminaya vayamogamina Yelusalemuma nemaiya veamogamina aliya haviya humatageya ani veamoya faleya Yutia kotegaene Samelia kotegaene ute ete hageya Aposolo vayala amakaiamige Yelusalemua mainae.
Mainageno Soloa Yisasi kema haviya amakupi malenaya veamogamina alino haviya humateno amakaiami noyagafi haino mukia veala amavaleno kina mo humatene.
Kinama humatageya nagoa umainaya veamoya alu kote kote faleya ute ete huya Yisasina kanale mono kea hamapai-mainae.
Filipia nagola Samelia hanea kumate tavino mage huno mo hamapaiye “Yisasina Anumaya Kotia taugafa aligatigahema hutenea kano emaine.” huno hamanepaiye.

Hamapaigeya mukia veamoya agai kea haviteya agaiama humainea tokiya avame yamoa Satani Avamuyaga veamogami amakupitila ala amake neaiya hatilaviya nevageno amaiya amaya avayu hulavi-mainea veanene amaiya haviya humainea veanene alino kanale humategeya ageteya nagoke amaku amakesa haviya kea aliya amakupi malenae.
Amakupi maleteya ani kumate veamoya tusia muse humainae.
Muse hayanagi ani kumatela nago kanomo agia Saimonie “Nagaya tusia ala kano mainoe.” huno tokiya avame yana higeya mukia Samelia veamoya ageteya tusia amamayo neaiyane.
Amamayoa aiteya ala amakima hanea veanene osi amakima hanea veanene agai kea haviteya mage huya humainae “Ma kanoa Anumaya Kotia ala tokiyaa aminea kanoe.” huya humainae.
Kasagoya yupa tokiya avame yama higeya agaya yafe tusia amamayo aigeya agai ke havimainae.

Haviyanagi Filipia anile evayi huno Anumaya Kotima kava yagaisia kanale kene “Yisasina Anumaya Kotia taugafa aligatigahema hutenea kano emaine.” hunoma hia kanale kene haviteya Yisasina amakua amitafa hageno veala tina falematene.
Saimonienena Yisasina agua amitafa higeno tina faletetegeno Filipiene vaineayegeno Filipia tokiya avame yana higeno ageteno tusia amayo aimaine.
“Samelia nemaiya veamoya Anumaya Koti kea haviya amakupi aliya malenae.” huya haya kea Yelusalemuma nemaiya Aposolo vayamoya haviteya Pitaene Yoniene hunatageana ani kumatela elavi-mainae.
Elaviteana Anumaya Kotima ani veamogamima Alu Aotage Avamuama amamisia yafe Anumayamotega havige-mainae.
Amakaya Yisasi agile ago tina falematayanagi Alu Aotage Avamumoa amakaitela eotavine. Eotavinea yafe Pitaene Yoniene anaya amaugafale avate hulinaageya Alu Aotage Avamula avale-mainae.

Aposolo kanolatamogania anayama nemalaageya Alu Aotage Avamula avalageno Saimonia ageteno mage huno hie “Mone lanamisugetana tokiya yana nagaila namisaagena naya malesugeno veamoya Alu Aotage Avamula avalesae.” huno hanavige.
Higeno Pitaa mage huno hapaiye “Kagaya Anumaya Kotia afaama neamamia yafema miya hugahue hukama kagesa havina yamoa monikaaene kagaikaaene Anumaya Kotia alino haviya hugatesie.
Anumaya Koti aulagafina kagai kagupina kanale ohunea yafe ani aliyana kagai yana omaletafa huno omalene.
Menima kefo kavama hana yafena kagua aiyahae huka Anumayamotega havigesanageno ani kagu kagesafima havi kagesama havina yakaa aigekateno kefo yakaa atalegatesie.
Nagaya kagupima agoana kaipamoa haviya humainea yafe atuage nehigeno kefo yakamoa nofi hugatene.” huno kenonaa hapaiye.
Higeno Saimonia mage huno hapaiye “Nehana yamoa nagai naugafalela falote ohisia yafe tanakaya nagaila nunamuna hunateo.” huno hanapai-maine.

Pitaene Yoniene Anumayamo ke hamapaiana mage huana hae “Taagaya Yisasina agetetaa agaifena taagupi malenoe.” huana hamapaiteana eteana Yelusalemu ugahe kategama vaana Samelia kola alu kumate kumate uana Yisasifena kanale mono kea hamapai-mainae.
Nago ensole kanomoa Filipifena mage huno me hapaiye “Hetika Yelusalemuti Kasa kumatema nevaya katega vuo.” huno hapaiyana ani kana kame kotega umainea kane.

Higeno Filipia hetino ani katega viayamo mogeana nagola anupa kanoa Itiopia kotega kava kanoe mukia ala sauve aala, Kanatesie huya agia neayaya amo, mone afenoyate kava neyagaiyane. Ani kanoa Anumaya Koti agi alisaga hugahe Yelusalemu uteno ani yupa eteno nomaalega ugahe hosi afumoma avayu huno nevia kalefi haino maineno Anumaya Kotina aune kanoamoa, Aisaiya, kae-malenea autamafi hapalime hapalime umaine.
Nevigeno Alu Aotage Avamumoa Filipife mage huno hapaiye “Kagaya ani kalefi mo haisaga humaika agaiene tokaeka vuo.” huno hapaiye.
Hapaigeno Filipia aiyayeno avate neuno mo haviana Aisaiyama kae-malenea autamafima hapalimema via kea mo haviteno mage huno hapaiye “Kagaya mani kemona aepaa havilama nehano?” huno havige.
Havigegeno ani kanomoa mage hie “Nago kanomoma naveotisiana hanaa huna havigahue?” huno huteno Filipifena “Nagaya mainole ehaika nagaiene emaiyo.” huno hapaiye.
Anima Anumaya Koti kema kae-malenea kema hapalia kemoa mage huno humaine

“Sipi sipi haegahema avaleya nevagenoma avovoma ohuno ako huno nemaiya avameteene sipi sipi nafaneyagama ayolagefama laga hugahema hia kanomote mo hetiya maineya avovoma ohunaya avamete kava huno ke ohuno ako huno maine.

Ani kanomofena ‘Afa kano mainane.’ huya agaye hisifa kava huteteya fatagoma hia kaiyekea huoatenagi afaa hayageno fali-mainegeno agaia nafanema omainea yafe nagoa veamoya avagea ohugahae. Ma mopalema mainea kanaamoa ago hano humaine.” huno kaemalenea ke hapalime umaine.
Hapaliteno ani kava kanomoa Filipife mage huno havige “Ani aune kanomoa tafe mani kea huno humaine? Agaiahe humainefi nago kanomofe mani kea humaine?” huno havige.
Havigegeno Filipia aepa heno mani kemo aepaa hapaiteno Yisasina kanale mono kea hapaimaine.
Hapaime hapaime katega neuana nago tite uvayi huteana ani kava kanomoa mage huno hapaiye “Tina ma hanegi ago kanale mani lina falenategano?” huno havige.

Havigegeno Filipia mage huno hapaiye “Mani kema havika kagupi malekama kametiti hisanana kanalelagina lina falegategahue.” huno higeno ani kanomoa mage hie “Nagaya Yisasi Kalaisia Anumaya Koti nafane maine. Tagai taugafa aligatigahe hutenea kano maine huna alina nagupi malena nametiti nehue.” huno humaine.
Nehuno hosi afumoma avayu nehia kalemo talaiva kanomofe “Male atafa huo.” huno higeana Filipiene ani kava kanoene tipi taviteana Filipia tina faletene.
Faletetegeana tipitima ehaiagenoa Alu Aotage Avamumoa aupaa Filipina avaleno vigeno ani kava kanomoa nagoene Filipina oageanagi katega tusia muse hume hume umaine.
Utegeno Filipia Asotasi evayi huteno Yisasina kanale mono kea mukia kumate veamogamina hamapaime hamapaime uno Sisalia uvayi humaine.

Ani kanafina Soloa aipafinaga tusia hai-vaiteno tokiyaage ke huno “Anumayamo anagaamogamina hamaesugeya falisae.” huno huteno ala mono note hagote kava kanomote uno mage huno havige “Musekaa nehugi nagaya Tamasigusi kumate una Yisasi anagaamogamima amakenunahena amatafa huna kina humatetena Yelusalemu amavalena egahue. Ani kumate mono note kava vayamoya nayama hisaya yafe avona kaeka namio.” huno humaine.
Ani kotega Soloa viayamo Tamasigusi evayi hugahema nehiana aupaa ikapinagatila tokiyaage hale yamoa tusiya huno agaite meyevasa humaine.
Meyevasa higeno Soloa mopafi asaga hulavino fae-maineno havigeno nagola ala kemoa mage huno hie “Sologae Sologae naa higeka nagaila ali haviya nehane?” huno humaine.

Higeno Soloa mage hie “Alamogae kagaya lagae?” huno higeno mage hie “Nagaya Yisasinae kagayama nagaima ali haviya hunenatana kanomonagi hetika ala kumate ugenoo. Nago kanomoa ‘Naa maa hugane.’ huno kahapaigahie.” huno hapai-maine.
Hapaigeya Soloenema vaiyaya vayamoya hetiya maineya anima agema aiya agea haviyanagi vayama oagaya yafena tusia amamayo aiteya nagokela kea ohunae.
Solona mopafiti avaleya hetitageno aulagama agegali hiana aulagamoa haniali koali higeya ayate aliya Tamasigusi avaleya umainae.
Vageno Soloa talia (3) kanama maiyana aulagamoa ania huno asu humaigeno kaveene tiene mosino afaa oneno maine.

Ani Tamasigusia nagola Yisasi anagapiti kanoa, Ananaiyasie nehaya kanoa maineanagino Anumayamoa himonafi mage huno hapaiye “Ananaiyasigae mainano?” huno higeno “E, ma mainoe Anumaya niamogae.” huno humaine.

Higeno Anumayamoa mage huno hapaiye “Hetika fatago kane huyama nehaya katega uteka Yutasi nopi ufalekama agesanana nagola Tasusi kanomona agia Soloe nehaya kanoa anifi maineno Anumayamotega nunamu maino nehianagika mogegane.

Ani kanomoa himonafima ageana nago kanomoa eno aulagama agegali hisia yafe anute aya me-malene. Anima himonafima agea kanoa kagayae. Kagaikaa Ananaiyasigae huno himonafina age-maine.” huno hapai-maine.

Hapaiyanagi Ananaiyasia mage huno humaine “Anumayaniamogae ani kanomofena mukia veamoya mage huya hagena nehavuane Yelusalemuma kagai anagama mainaya veamogamina tusiya huno ali haviya huneamate huya hagena havi-mainoe.
Ala mono note ala kava vayamoya avona amigeno malema kagai kagilema nunamu huta kahavinegona veanea kina hulategahe emaine.” huno hie.

Nage hianagi Anumayamoa mage huno hie “Afaa agaitega vuo. Ani kanoa nagaya ago hapalina hutenoa kanoe. Nagai kea alino visiayamo Yuta vea omainaya veamogamiene sauve vayaamiene Isaleli veamogamiene nagai kea hamapaigahie.
Nagaifena huhaleno hamanepainageya agata aisia yaene kanama haisia yaene evayi hutesia yafe aveligahue.” huno hapai-maine.

Hapaigeno Ananaiyasia viaamo ani nopi haino Solo anute aya maleno mage huno hie “Nagananimoga Sologae Yisasia Anumayatiamoa emainana katema evayima hu-mainea kanomoa kaulagama agegali hisana yafeene Alu Aotage Avamumoa kagupima hiya kahaisia yafeene hunategena neoe.” huno hie.
Higeno aupaa aulagaletila haletina kana yamoa asaga hulavigeno aulaga agetegeno mono tina faletene.
Kavela netegeno augafamoa tokiya vaigeno Tamasigusi Yisasi anagama mainaya veapi uno nagoa kanafina amakaiene maine.
Tamasigusi maineno aupaa mukia mono noyagafi ute ete hia yamo mage huno hamapaiye “Yisasia agaiage Anumaya Koti nafanea maine.” huno humaine.

Mani kema haviya veamoya tusia amamayo neaiya mage huya hae “Mani kanomoa Yelusalemu maineno Yisasi agilema nehaviya veala ago hamaeteno ma kumate eno aniama nehaya veane kina humateno ala mono note kava vayate kaiyeke humatesia yafe amavalegahe emainea kanofi?” huya hae.

Hayanagi Solona hamapaisia tokiyaamoa melino ala higeno “Yisasina Anumaya Kotia tagai taugafa aligatigahema hutenea kano emaine.” huno tusiya huno humavelia yafena anima Tamasagusi nemaiya Yuta veamoya alu amakesa alu amakesa havimainae.

Amaipamoa haviya higeya ayaaya kana maiteya Yuta vayamoya “Hanaa huta Solona haesunageno falisie?” huya huteya haesaya yafe nateene kegeene ani kumamona fiatega yagaiya maiyanagi Soloa mani kea ago havimaine.
Haviteno mainegeya nagoa Yisasi anagamoya nago kegela Solona avaleya yafateti humalenaya tafile haiteya ala kamagupi Solona asaga huya aiteya ani kegiyafiti malaga atalageno tavimaine.
Soloa Yelusalemu umaineno Yisasi anagapi umaigahe hianagi agaifena kolia nehuya Solofena “Yisasi kea nohavia kanoe.” huya amametiti humainae.

Hayanagi Panapasia aya huno Aposolo anagate Solona avaleno viaamo kategama Anumayamona agegeno kema hapai-mainea yafeene Soloa Tamasigusia kolima ohuno tokiyaagema huno Yisasi kema hamapai-mainea yafeene Panapasia hamapai-maine.
Hamapaigeya haviteya Solona avalageno amakaiene Yelusalemu kumate vaiyatete huno maineno kolia ohuno Yisasi kea tokiyaage huno hamapai-maine.
Soloa nagoa Kaliki kema nehaya Yuta vayaenema tokiyaage kema vaiya yafe ke nevaiya haesagenoma falisia kafe atiye-mainae.
Neayageno Yisasina amakuama aminaya veamoya ani kema haya kea haviteya Solona Sisalia kumate avaleya taviteya anileti hutageno kuma aepaalega Tasusi umaine.

Yutiaene Kaliliene Sameliaenema Yisasifena haviya amakupi malenaya veamogamina amaipamoa falu hinageya maineya kanaleya huya alitalu huge huge huya amakua ali lokiya vaiya nemaiye. Anumaya Kotima haiya katema vaiyaya yafe Alu Aotage Avamumoa amaya higeya kanaleya huya nemaigeya kasagoya veamoya ete ete huya amakaiene melitalu humainae.
Pitaenena alu kumate kumate vaiyatete nehuno Lita kumatela Yisasifena haviya amakupi malenaya veanene maine.
Maineno ageana nago kanoa aiya ayamoa avayu hulavigeno nemaiya kanoa eitia (8) kafufina kaana vaioayeno sipale faeno nemaiya kanoa mogemaine. Ani kanomo agia Ainiasie.
Pitaa mogeteno mage huno hapaiye “Ainiasiga Yisasie, Anumayatimoa, ago alino kanale hugategi hetika fae-nemaina sipakaa alika hilato huo.” huno higeno aupaa heneligeno kanale hutene.
Kanalema hutegeno maiya yafe Lita veanene Saloni veanene ani kanomona ageteya Yisasite amakua aiyahae humainae.

Yopa kumatega Yisasifena haviya amakupi malenaya veapiti nago aala maine. Ani amo agia Tapitae. Kaliki kefina mage huya ani amo agia neayayane Tokasie huya neayaya amoa tusiya huno kayoneage a maineno mukia kanafina kaveamiene afenoamienema omalenea veala amaya huno neamamia ale.
Pitaa Lita mainegeno ani amoa kali alino faligeya ani amona augafa sese huteteya aliya hunalagi-malenaya note anale malenae.

Maleteya Yisasifema haviya amakupi malenaya anagamoya Pitaa Litama mainea kea haviteya Lita kumala Yopa kumamona aupaale hanea yafe tole kanolatana hunatageana uana mage huana mo-hapaie “Musekaa nehuagi aupaa taagaiene kumatialega eno.” huana hapaie.

Hapaiageno Pitaa anakaiene viaamo uvayi higeya anima hunalagi-malenaya nopima avaleya haiyana kasagoya megusa aneyaga anile hetiya maineya avi neateya amakaiamima fai-linaya kenaamia Tokasia amakaienema afaa mainea kanafi talo humalenea kenaamia Pitana aveli-mainae.

Aveligeno Pitaa ageteno mukiama mainaya veamogamifena “Ma nopinagatila hati-lavitama viho.” huno higeya hati-laviya vageno aleya aye-maineno nunamuna huteno ani ama malenalega augosa humaineno mage huno hie “Tapitagae hetio.” huno higeno ani amoa fali-mainefitila aulaga agegali huno Pitana neageno hetino sipale maine.
Sipale mainegeno Pitaa ayana amiteno avale hetiteteno Pitaa Yisasima amakuama aminaya veafeene megusa aneyagaenefe ke higeya aageno fali-mainefitila hetino haegafa higeno avaleno amamine.
Aniama hia kemoa mukia Yopa kumatela ute ete higeya kasagoya veamoya haviteya Yisasifena haviya amakupi maleya amametiti humainae.
Pitaa mukia yupa Yopa kumatela maineno nagola pulamakamo augafa taga huno talo nehia kanoene nemaiyane. Ani kanomo agia Saimonie.
Nago kanoa Koniliasie ati kava kanoa Sisalia maineno Itali kumateti vani hataletia (100) ati vayate kava yagai-maineane.

Ani kanoene anagaaene Anumaya Koti kema nehaviya nemaiya yafe “Agayama haiya kava hugahune.” huteya afenoamima omalenea veala monea amamite amamite nehuya mukia kanafina nunamuna huya muse huya havinegayane.

Nago unena ani kanomoa heti-maineno himona kana yana ageana nagola Anumaya Koti ensole kanomoa agaite evayi huno mage huno humaine “Koniliasigae mainapio?” huno higeno Koniliasia aulu neheno tusia amayo neaino mage huno hie “Ala kanomogae naa higeka nehane?” huno higeno ensole kanomoa mage huno hie “Kagayama Anumayamotega havinegana yaene afenoamima omalenea veala hamamaeka amamite amamite hana yaene Anumaya Kotia ageteno kagaifena agesa nehavie.
Kagaya menia nagoa vayala humategeya Yopa kumateti Saimoni Pitana movaleya eho.
Ani kanomoa nago pulamakamo augafa laga huno talo nehia kanoene nemaiye. Ani kanomo agia Saimonie. Nomaa hagelimo agegayalega hane.” huno hapaiye.

Ani kea hapaiteno ataleno vigeno Koniliasia tole aliya kanolatamaaene nagola Anumaya Koti kema nehavia ati kanoamoenefe ke higeya ageno ani ensole kanomoma evayi huno humainea kea hamapaiteno humategeya Yopa umainae.
Katega mo-faeteya kotigeya hetiya Yopa evayi hugahe hageno yagemoa amuno-kano higeno Pitaa nunamu hugahe nomona amega agotofulega haino maine.
Mainegeno tusia agateanagi kavela yaufa talo tala nehageno nagola himona kana yana age-maine.
Ageana ikamoa aihagalo higeno nagola tusia kena kana yana aluga aluga atupale nofi aye-maleteya atalageno mopafi enelavigeno age-maine.
Ageana ani yapina mukia yaka kafa afua osifavea nama vayupala yagaene mainageno elavi-maine.
Elavigeno Pitaa neagegeno nagola age aino mage huno hapaiye “Pitagae hetika ani memeyana heka no.” huno hie.
Higeno Pitaa mage huno hapaiye “Aao, Alanimogae ma ma yaga kafa kagai kaufina oniyaage humainegena nagaluma humalenana yamofe tamage huna onenoa yayaga hane.” huno humaine.

Higeno nagoene agea aino mage huno humaine “Anumaya Kotia ago alino sese humalenea yafena ‘Oniyaagela ohunegi afaa alika no.’ huno humainea kavefena nagoene ‘Oniyaage humaineanagina onegahue.’ huka ohuo.”
Ani kavala talia (3) yupa huteno aupaa ani kenamoa ikapinaga eteno haimaine.

Haigeno Pitaa maineno anima agea himonamo aepaahe agesa havige havige huno nehavigeya Koniliasima humategeya aya vayamoya Saimoni nofe hamavige hamavige hume hume uya ani nona ageteya fiate mehetiya mainae.
Hetiya maineya ke huya mage huya hae “Saimonia nago agia Pitae kanoa mani nopina mainefi omaiye?” huya hae.
Hageno Pitaa himonahe agesa havige havige huno mainegeno Avamumoa mage huno hapaiye “Havio talia (3) vayamoya kagaife megatineayae.
Mekatineayagi hetika afepinaga lavika mogo. Nagaya humatogeya emainagi tole kagesa ohavika afaa amakaienena vuo.” huno humaine.
Higeno Pitaa tavino mage huno hamapaiye “Atimaayaya kanoa nagayae. Naa higetama neae?” huno hama-vige.

Hamavigegeya mage huya hae “Nago kanoa Koniliasie ati vayate kava kanogino fatago kano maineanagino ‘Anumaya Kotina haiya kava hugahue.’ huno humainea kanomoa hulategeta neonageno ani kanomoa Yuta vea omainea kano maineanagi Yuta veamoya ‘Kanale kano maine.’ huya hageno nemaiyane. Nago yupa nagola alu aotage ensole kanomoa evayi huno mage huno hapaiye ‘Saimoni Pitafe ke hugeno kagai nopina eno nagola kea kahapaisigeka havigane.’ huno higeno hulategeta neone” huya hapai-mainae.

Hageno Pitaa kenonaamia mage huno hie “Nopi ehaitama emaiho.” huno higeya haiya mo faeteya kotigeno Pitaa hetino amakaiene vigeya nagoa Yopa kumateti Yisasife haviya amakupi malenaya vayamoya amakaiene tokaeya umainae.
Katega nagoke no mo faeteya ega Sisalia kumate evayi hageno Koniliasia esayafene huno amakava maineno agaia nofi vayaene anagaamoyaenefe ke higeya melitalu huya mainae.
Mainageno Pitaa ani nopi hai-falegeno Koniliasia avate eno aiyafi ape humaineno muse hutene.
Musena hutetegeno Pitaa ali hetiteteno mage huno hie “Hetio nagaienena afa kano mainoe.” huno hie.
Pitaa mani kea nehuno Koniliasiene kea kea hume nopinaga haino mogeana kasagoya veane melitalu huya mainae.

Mainageno Pitaa mage huno hie tamakaitamia ago havimainae Yuta veamoya Isaleli vea omainaya veanene maineya kea kea huyafena ago nagalu humalenaya kea ago havimainae. Anumaya Kotia nagaila navelino mage hie “Nago kanohena ‘Oniyaage kano mainane.’ huka ohuo.” huno naveligena agetena nagaifema ke hanagena tole nagesa ohavina aupaa emainogi naa higeka nagaifena kea hanagena emainoe? huno havige.

Havigegeno Koniliasia mage huno hapaiye “Talia (3) kana ago euno nagasegena une kanalega tali (3) kiloki noniafi mainena Anumayamotega nunamu huna havinegogeno aupaa nago kanomona kenaamoa efeage nehuno alave alave nehigeno naule mehetigena agoe.
Agogeno ani kanomoa nagaifena mage huno nahapaiye ‘Anumaya Kotia haavigana kea ago haviteno kagayama afenoamima omalenea veala hamamaeka amamite amamite hana yana ageteno kagaifena agesa nehavie.

Nehaviafe kagaya Saimoni Pitatega vayala humatesanageya Yopa visae. Ani kanomona hamoamoa Saimonie pulamakamo augafa taga huno talo nehia kanomo nona hageli agegayale hanegeno yoka unemaiye.’ huno humaine.

Higena nagaya aupaa kagaitega vayala alimatalogeya vageka kanaleya huka emainanageta Anumayamoa ‘Hamapaiyo.’ hunoma kahapai-mainea kea havigahune huta Anumaya Koti aulagafi melitalu humainone.” huno humaine.

Pitaa hetino aepa heno mage huno hie “Tamage, havuana Anumaya Kotia vayamo agiahepi nofiahepi agesa havino notamianagi mukia nofi vayayagafitila nagoa veamoya Anumaya Kotina amakua amiteya ‘Agaila haiya kavala kanale kava humainaya veamoya Anumaya Kotia ani veafe nahaiya veane mainae.’ huno hie.”

Huteno Anumaya Kotia Yisasi Kalaisina hutegeno kanale kea huno Anumaya Kotiene alino nagoke taipa falu huta maisuna kea Isaleli veamogatina tahapaiya kea havimainae. Ani Yisasi Kalaisia mukia veamogatina Anumayatimo maine.
