Yonia “Kefo yatamihena tamakua aiyahae hisagena tina falelamategahue.” huno hamapaitegeno Yisasia Kaliliti aepa heno mukia Yutia kotega kema humainea kavafena tamakaya ago havimainae.

Anumaya Kotina Alu Aotage Avamuamoene tokiyaaene Nasaleti Yisasina amigeno Anumaya Kotia agaiaene tokaeno maineafene huno alu kumate kumate ute ete hiaamo kanale kava huno Satanima amatafa higeya kalima ali-mainaya veamogamina alino kanale humatene.
Kanale humategeta tagaya mukia Yuta veama mainalegaene Yelusalemuene humainea kavala taulagafiti age-mainona ke tamahanepaune. Ani kava higeya yafaga yosale asaimalageno fali-maine.
Falianagi tole yupa maiteno nago kanalela Anumaya Kotia fali-mainefiti alino hetitegeno veamogati taule mo laveli-maine.

Mo lavelianagi mukia veamoya agaila oagenagi tagaya veama hamapaisunafene huno Anumaya Kotia tagaila ago hapalilategeta mainonafe tagaya fali-mainefiti ali hetitenea kanafina Yisasiene tokaeta maineta tiene kaveene nemainone.

Nemainonanagino Yisasia veamogamina mage hutama hamapaiho huno humaine “Nagaya fali-mainesaya veanene afaa mainesaya veanene kaiyeke humatesuafene huno Anumaya Kotia Yisasinia hunategena emainoe.” hutama hamapaiho. huno humaine.

Yisasifena mukia Anumaya Koti amaune vayamoya mage huya humainayane “Mukia veamoya agaife haviya amakupi maleya amametiti hisageno agaia agileti kefo yaamia aigeamateno alitalemategahie. huya humainayane.” huno hie.
Pitaa mani kea yaufa hamanepaigeno Alu Aotage Avamumoa elavino mukia mani kema maiya nehaviya veamogami amakupina efalemaine.

Amakupi efalegeya amaku amakesafiti nohaviya kea alu ke alu kefiti Anumaya Koti agia alisaga nehae. Ani kavama haya yafe Pitaene emainaya veamoya Yisasi kema havimainaya Isaleli veamoya haviteya Anumaya Kotia ago alu veamogamina Alu Aotage Avamuama amamia yafena tusia amamayo aigeno Pitaa mage huno humaine.
“Anumaya Kotia tagaila Alu Aotage Avamuamona taminea kava huno mani veanene ago amamine. Tima falematesuna kaana ta nagalua hulategahie? Tina afaa falemategahune.” huno humaine.
Huteno amakaife mage hie “Yisasi Kalaisi agile tina falelamatesue.” huno hamapaiteno tina falematetegeya mage huya hapaiye “Tagaiene nagoa kana tagaya maigane.” huya humainae.
Aposolo vayaene Yutia maineya Yisasife haviya amakupi malenaya vayaene nagoa Isaleli vaya omainaya veamoya Anumaya Koti kea haviya amakupi malenae huya haya kea havimainae.

Havigeno Pitaa Yelusalemu haino mainegeya “Amakoya anoyaa taga hisaya yana tusia tokiya yane.” huya haya Yuta vayamoya Pitafena “Kagaya havi kava nehane.” huya mage huya humainae “Naa higeka amakoya anoya lagama ohunaya vayayagaenena kavela mo nenane.” huya humainae.

Hageno Pitaa aepa heno mukia yama falotema humainea yafena hufalote huno mage huno hie nagaya Yopa kumate mainena nunamuna nehugeno nagu nagesamoa aiyahae higena himonafi agoana nagola tusia kena kana yana aluga aluga atupale nofi aye-maleteya atalageno nagaite mopafi elavigena age-mainoe.
Agoana ani yapina mukia yaga kafa afua osifavea nama vayupala yapavena anifi mainageno elavi-maine.
Elavigena neagogeno nagola age aino mage huno nahapaiye “Pitagae hetika ani memeyana heka no.” huno hie.
Higena mage huna hue “Aao, Alanimogae ma ma yaga kafa kagai kaufina oniyaage humainegena nagaluma humalenana yamofe tamage huna onenoa yayaga hane.” huna hue.

Hugeno nagoene agea aino mage huno humaine “Anumaya Kotia ago alino sese humalenea yafena ‘Oniyaagela humaine.’ huka ohuka afaa alika no.” huno humainea kavefena nagoene “Oniyaage humaineanagina onegahue huka ohuo.”
Ani kavala tagufa (3) yupa huteno aupaa ani kenamoa ikapinaga eteno hai-maine.
Haitegeya ani kana kanoale tagufa (3) vayala tagaya mainona note evayi humainae. Ani vayayaga Sisaliagati nagaitega humategeya emainae.

Emainageno Alu Aotage Avamumoa nagaifena mage huno hie “Tole kagesa ohavika amakaiene tokaeka vuo.” huno higena uanagi manile mainaya sikisia (6) nafunagaya nakaiene umainae. Uteta ani kanomo note uvayi huta nomaafi hai-mainone.

Haunageno agaya mage huno tahapaiye noniafima ensole kanomoma heti-mainegena agoana ensole kanomoa mage huno nahapaiye “Kagaya menia nagoa vayala humategeya Yopa kumateti Saimoni Pitana movaleya eho. Ani kanoma esiana kagaiene mukia anagakaene Yisasia taaugafa aligatisia kea tamahapaigahie.” huno higena havue huno tahapaiye.
Tahapaitegena nagaya aepa hena kea nehugeno Alu Aotage Avamumoa hagoteno tagaima hulatenea kava huno elavino amakai amakupina fale-maine.

Nefalegeno nagesamoa hao higena Anumayatimoa humainea kele nagesa havimainoe. Ani kea mage huno humaine “Yonia titafateti falemateneanagi haenagaa Alu Aotage Avamuteti falelamatesigeno tamakupina faleno maigahie.” huno humaineane.

Tagayama Yisasi Kalaisife havita tagupi maleta tametiti humainona yupa Anumaya Kotia Alu Aotage Avamula tamineanagino ania huno amakaienena Alu Aotage Avamula amamianagina nagaya tana Anumaya Kotima aliyama alia aliyana tilesue? Nagaya maleli-otegahue huno hu-maine.

Higeya haviteya kea ohuya maineya Anumaya Koti agia alisaga nehuya mage huya humainae “Tamage Anumaya Kotia Isaleli vea omainaya veanenefe ‘Tamaipa aiyahae hisagena agola maige maige hisaya tamahaimula tamamino.’ huno humaine.” huya nehae.

Sitivenina hayageno falitegeya Yisasife haviya amakupi malenaya veamogamina ali-haviya humatageya faleya alu kote kote ute ete humainae. Nagoa veala faleya Fonisia umaigeya nagoa veala faleya Saipalusi umaigeya nagoa veala faleya Atioku kumate umaineya Anumayamo kea Yuta veamogamike hamapai-mainagi alu veamogamina hamaopainae.
Hamaopaiyanagi amakai amunopitila nagoa vayala Saipalusitiene Sailinitiene euya Atioku maineya Kaliki veamogamina Yisasia Anumayatimofena kanale kea mohamapai-mainae.
Hamanepaigeno Anumayamoa tokiyaaleti amaya higeya kasagoya veamoya amakua aiyahae huya Anumayamo ke haviya amakupi maleya amametitia humainae.
Amametitia hageya Yelusalemu maineya Yisasife haviya amakupi malenaya veamoya ani kea haviteya Panapasina hutageno Atioku umaine.

Anile umaineno ageana Anumaya Kotia kayone humatea yana ageteno muse huno mage huno hamapaiye “Tamaku tamakesamoa tokiyaage hinagetama efi efi hutama Anumayatimoene tokaetama vaiyatete hiho.” huno hamapaige hamapaige huno maine.

Anima hamapaiya kanoa Panapasie. Ani kanoa kanale kanogino Yisasi kema havino agupi maleno ametiti higeno Alu Aotage Avamumoa agupina hiya humainea kanogino Yisasifema hamanepaigeya kasagoya veamoya amakua Yisasina amitafa humainae.
Amitafa hageno Panapasia Solofe atiyegahe Tasusi umaine.

Uno atiyeno ali-falote huteno Atioku avaleno haigeana nago kafua Yisasi anagaene mo lokaeana maineana kasagoya veamogamina Yisasi kea hamapaiageya Atioku mainaya veamoya hagote kanafi Yisasi anagafe “Kalisiteni veamogatamae.” huya amakia malenae. Tagai kefitila ani amakimoa Kalaisi akave malaya veamogatamae huya humainae.
Ani kanafina nagoa Anumaya Koti amaune vayala Yelusalemuti ataleya Atiyoku hai-mainae.

Haigeno amakai amunopitila nago kanomo agia Agapusie heti-mainegeno Alu Aotage Avamumoa hapaigeno aune laga huno mage huno humaine “Tusia kafu hisaya kana mukia mopale evayi hugahie.” huno humainea kemoa ani kafuma efalotema hia kanafina Kolotiusia sauve kano maine.

Ani aunema Agapusia laga hia kea haviteya Yisasife haviya amakupi malenaya veamoya mage hae “Yutia mainaya tafu-taganagamina amaya hisune. Mukiamogata moneti hanesimogata monea alitalu hisune.” huya huteya alitalu huteya ani monea aliya Yisasi anagamogamite kava vayamogamina amamigahe Panapasigani Sologani hunatageana ani monea aliana umainae.
Ani kanafina Helotia ala sauve kanogino nagoa Yisasife haviya amakupi malenaya veala alino haviya humatene.
Humateteno Yemesia Yonina nepuamona ayaaya naepeleti ageya fakaligeno fali-maine.
Falitegeno Helotia ageana aniama hia kavafena Yuta veamoya amaipa haviya kanale haya yafe Pitana haegahe atafa humaine. Hale oki kaihame maya imu kiya kanafi ani kavala humaine.

Helotia Pitana atafa huno kina huteteno sikisitinia (16) ati vayamogamifena mage huno humaine “Foa (4) maite maite hutama tokiyaage hutama yagaiho.” huno humaine. Ala imua Anumaya Kotima amakinagomo amaugafama aligati-mainea yafe amakesa hao hisaya imu kitesageno vaya amaufi avaleno kaiyekea huteteno haegahe humaine.
Pitaa kina nopi mainegeya Yisasife haviya amakupi malenaya veamoya tusiya huya Anumaya Kotima aya hisiafene huya nunamupitila havigemainae.

Havinegageno Helotia “Ega avalena kaiyekea hutegahue.” huno nehigeno ani kegela Pitana tole ati kanolatamogani amunopi tole seni nofiteti aluga aluga ayatalapi ayeteya tole ati kanolatamogani anayapiene aye-maletageno faeno mainegeya nagoa ati vayamoya hetiya ani kina nomo fiate yagaiya mainae.

Yagai-mainageno nagola Anumayamo ensole kanomoa evayi higeno ani kina nomo agupinaga tusiya huno aivasa higeno ani ensole kanomoa Pitana haopale kayo neaino aligafa nehuno mage huno hapaiye “Aupaa hetio.” huno higeno hetigeno ayapiti seni nofimoa atumaelavi-maine.
Atumae-lavigeno ani ensole kanomoa mage huno hapaiye “Kenakaa nefaika kaiya noene vaiyo.” huno higeno Pitaa ania hutegeno mage huno hapaiye “Siotaka nevaika nakave eno.” huno hie.
Higeno ani kina nopitila Pitaa hati-lavino akave neuno tole agesa haviteno aneginagi huno mage hie “Ensole kanomoma hia kavala himona neagofi afaa falotega neagoe?” huno humaine.

Anakaya vaana hagotenoma yagai-mainea ati kanoa agaseana uana nago ati kanomona mogaseana uana ala kumatema nevaya fiate uvayi haana tokiyaage aenileti talo humalenaya fitagino kitalako humalenaya fitamoa agaia aiyaki-lavigeana nago nona agaseana osi kate vaafiti ensole kanomoa motaleno fanane humaine.

Fanane higeno Pitana agu agesamoa aikalo higeno mage huno hie “Menia nagaya havilama huna nehavue Anumayamoa agaia ensole kanoa hutegeno Heloti ayapitila melinatale. Yuta vayamoya nagaila nagoa kava hunategahe amakesa havi havi haya yapitilagi naugafa meligatie.” huno humaine.
Ani agesa havime havime Malia notega umaine. Ani Maliaa Yoni Makina itaamoe. Ani nopi mukia veala melitalu huya Anumayamotega havinegeya mainae.
Mainageno Pitaa kumategati ani nomo fitale mekalu kalu nehuno ke higeno nagola aliya munamona agia Lotae yakigahe emaine.
Emaineno haviana Pitana alenaga agele haviteno aipamoa havino muse huteno ani fita oyakino ataleno aiyayeno nopinaga haino mage huno veamogamina hamapaiye “Pitaa ago fiate me heti-maine.” huno hie.
Higeya “Aifonafo ke nehane.” huya hageno “Aao, tamage nehue.” huno higeya “Agaya omaigi ensole kanoa emainegi mogeho.” huya humainae.
Nehageno Pitaa fitale akalu kalu maino huge huge nehigeya fita yakiya agayana higeya ageteya tusiya huya atali talua humainae.

Amamayoa neaigeno Pitaa “Kea ohutama maiho.” huno hamapaisia yafe ayateti aigo-sigosi huteno Anumayamoma nofi nopiti avaleno emainea yafena hamapaiteno mage huno hamapaiye “Ani kea Yemesiene nagoa tafu-taganagamina hamapaiho.” huno hamapaiteno hati-lavino alualega umaine.
Utegeno kola otinegeno yagea vayima nehiana ati vayamoya atali talu huteya “Pitaa hanaa huno hanate tataleno vie?” huya ala ke nehuya amamayoa tusiya huno aimaine.
Helotia haviteno “Pitafe atiyeho.” huno higeya ati ayayana ali falote ohageno ati vayamogamina kaiyeke huneamateno “Hamaegeya faliho.” huno humaine. Huteno Yutiati tavino Sisalia mo maine.

Helotia kava yagai-mainea mopafiti kaveamia nealiya yafe Helotia Taiya nemaiya veanene Saitoni veanenefe tusiya huno aipa haviya humategeya nago amaku amakesa haviteya alitalu huya Helotina hagote aliya kanoamote Palasatusite mage huya me hae “Falu huta maisuna yafe kagaya Helotina hapaiyo.” huya hageno agaya nago aipa ani veanene huteno Helotite emainae.
Ageno Helotia nago kanaa amamiteno ani yupa sauve konagali kenaa faiteno sauve kanomo siale maineno ayaaya ke hamapaiye.
Hamanepaigeya melitalu humainaya veamoya mage huya nehae “Mopale kanomo hia augafa kea nohanagi Anumaya Kotia kema nehia kava huka nehane.” huya humainae.
Nehageno “Havige nehae.” huno ohuno Anumaya Koti agima alisaga ohia yateti aupaa Anumayamo ensole kanomoa me aikolino kalia amigeno hagifayagamoya aipa laga hageno fali-maine.
Falitegeno Anumaya Koti kemoa tokiyaage huteno mukia kumate ute ete humainegeya kasagoya veamoya haviteya Yisasina amakua amitafa humainae.
Panapasiene Soloene ani monea Yelusalemu kumate aliana momamiteana Yoni Makina avaleana Yelusalemuti Atioku kumate emainae.

Ani Atiokua Yisasi anagapiti nagoa maineya amaune laga huya Yisasi ke hamanepaiya vayala mainae. Ani vayamogami amakia Panapasiene Simionie kanomona nago agia Naisae. Tagai kefina ani agimoa “Anupa kanoe.” huya neaya agie. Ani kanoene Lusiasia Sailini kanoene Soloenena Manainie. Ani kanoa Helotia Kalili kava kanomona afaluamoe.

Nago yupa Yisasi anagamoya kavela mosiya maineya Anumayamo agia alisaga nehuya muse huya havinegae. Havinegageno Alu Aotage Avamumoa amakaifena mage huno humaine “Panapasigani Sologania anahaote aliyate hunateho. Nagaya nago aliyate ago hunatenoe.” huno humaine.
Higeya kave mosiya maineya Anumayamotega havinegeya ananute amaya maleya hunatageana umainae.
Alu Aotage Avamumoa hunategeana Selusia taviana tipi kalefi haisaga humaiana Saipalusi kotega umainae.
Salamisi vayi huana Yuta vayamogami mono nopi haiana Anumaya Koti kea hamapai-mainae. Anakaiene Yoni Makia monaya humaine.

Ani Saipalusia ti amulagoyafi hanea kumayagale ute ete huya Pafosi evayi humainae. Ani kumatela nago Yuta kanomoa havige huno “Anumaya Koti aune kano mainoe.” huno nehia kanomo agia Payisasie nehaya kanoa maine. Ani kanomoa tokiyaage kavayaga talo huno veanea ayemavataga nehiane.
Ani kanomoa mukia kanafina kava kanomo agia Sesiusi Polusiene nemaiyane. Sesiusi Polusia kanale agu agesaene kanogino Anumaya Koti ke havigahe Panapasigani Sologanife ke higeana eana hapai-mainae.
Hapaiageno ani havigeage aune kanoma Payisasia tokiyaage kavama nehia kanomona nago agia Kaliki kefiti Elimasie mage huno nehie “Mani kea havika kagupi omalo.” huno hefalaki-maine.

Hefalakeanagi Soloa nago agia Poloe agaia agupina Alu Aotage Avamumoa hiya higeno Elimasina aulagafi age-maineno mage huno hapaiye “Kagaya Satani nafanemogae fatago humainea yamona kame kanoa mainane. Savale savala keage kano mainananagino kagai kagupina havi keage yamoa hiya humaine. Naama hana kanomoga Anumaya Koti kamoa fatago humainea kama haneanagi kagaya ‘Kayagimainea ka hanegi oviho.’ huka hamanepaine. Na yu ani havi kavakaa atalegane?

Oatalenana anonaa menia havio Anumayamona tokiyaage ayatetila kahaesigeno kaulagamoa osi kanaganoa asu hisigeka yagea oagegane.” huno nehigeno aupaa aulagamoa anile asu higeno ayate aliya kama avelisaya kanohe atiye-maine.
Kava kanomoa Sesiasi Polasia naama hia kavala ageteno Yisasife hia kene tokiyaaenefe ageteno tusia amayo aigeno ani kea alino aguafi maleno ametiti humaine.
Poloenema vaa kanolatana Pafosi kumala ataleya tipi kalefi haisaga humaiya nagola Pamafilia hanea kumala Pega kumate evayi huteya Yoni Makia neanataleno Yelusalemu eteno lavi-maine.
Lavigeana anakaya Pega kumala ataleana nago Pisitia kotega kumamo agia Atioku kumate evayi huana Sapati yupa Yuta vayamogami mono nopi haiana mopale mainae.

Mopale mainaageya ani mono note soka vayamoya Mosese kae-malenea kene Anumaya Koti amaune vayamoyama kae-malenaya kene hapaliteya nago kanoa hutageno uno ani kanolatafe mage huno humaine “Nelafugatana taguamoma tokiya vaisia kea tanakuafima hanesigetanahena huhaleageta havimano.” huno humaine.

Higeno Poloa hetino ayana alisaga huno ke ohutama maiho huno amaveliteno mage huno humaine ‘Isaleli vayamogatamaene nagoa Isaleli omainaya vayala Anumaya Kotina haiya kava haya vayamogatamaene haviho.

Isaleli veamogamina Anumaya Kotiamimoa taginagomogamife agaia veane maisayafene huno hapalimategeya Isipi kotega yokala umaiyana Anumaya Kotia amaya higeya tokiyaage veane aitagufeya kasago hageno agaia tokiyaaleti Isipi kotegatila amavalegeya ataleya umainae.
Amavaleno vigeya fotia (40) kafu amakaiene kame kotega umaineno veganokano kavama haya kavaamihe mailama huno maineno yagaino maine.
Anumaya Kotia sevenia (7) nofi veamoya Kenani nemaiya veamogamina hamae hano higeya faligeno amakai mopa Isaleli veamoya maisaya yafene huno alino amamine.

Amamigeya fo hataleti fifitia (450) kafu ani kumatela mainageno anile Anumaya Kotia kasagoya uhagotematesaya vayala amamigeya amakaya maime maime nehaigeno haenagaa nagola Anumaya Kotina aune kanoa Samuelia evayi humaineane.
Evayi higeya “Ala sauve kanotia lamio.” huya hageno Anumaya Kotia Solona amamine. Ani kanomona nefa agia Kisie. Penisamini nofi kano maineanagino Soloa fotia (40) kafu kava yagaimateneane.
Kava yagaimateno maineanagino Anumaya Kotia neataleno Tevitina hutegeno ala sauve kanoamia maineane. Anumaya Kotia Tevitifena mage huno humaineane
“Yesi nafanea Tevitifena nagaiene nagoke taagu taagesa haneanagino Tevitia mukia nagaima nahaiya kavala hugahie.” huno humaineane.
Anumaya Kotia nayona hulokiya vaino mage huno humaine “Tevitina aginagomopiti tamaugafa aligatisia kanoa falote hugahie.” huno humaineanagino ani kanoa Yisasie taugafa aligatisia kano emaine.
Yisasia falote ohunea kanafina Yonia Isaleli veamogamina “Kefo yatamihe tamakua aiyahae hutama tina faleho.” huno hamapai-maine.

Yonia aliyamaa alino avaya ayegahe nehuno mage huno humaine “Tamakaya nagaifena ‘Anumaya Kotia taugafa aligatigahe hutenea kano emaine.’ hutama nehayanagi nagaya ani kanoa omainogi ani kanoa aupaa egahianagina nagaya afa kanogina agai aiyale ayesuana onategahie.” huno humaine.

Nafu-naganagatama Apalahamupiti anagamogatamaene nagoa Isaleli omainaya vayala Anumaya Kotina haiya kava haya vayamogatamaene Anumaya Kotia tamaugafa aligatigahe humainea kea mukiamogatile evayi humaine.

Yelusalemu mainaya veamoya kava vayaamiene Yisasina agelama ohunae. Mukia sapati kanafina amaune vayamoya Yisasina kaiyeke huteteya haesaya yafema kae-malenaya kea hapaliyanagi aepaa havilama huya ohavinae. Yisasina kaiyekema hutenaya yafe humainaya kemoa ago falote huno tamage humaine.
Kaiyekea huteteya haesageno falisia augafa kefo kavala ohuneanagi Pailatife “Afaa haegeno falino.” huya humainae.
Mukia amaune vayamoya agaifema humalenaya kemoa falote huno ago tamage higeya yafaga yosaleti augafaa aliya yafakapi mo-hevaitenae.
Mo hevaitayanagi Anumaya Kotia fali-mainefiti alino hetitene.
Hetitegeno Yisasia agaiaenema Kaliliti Yelusalemu hai-mainaya anagaamoya amaulagafiti kasagoya yupa evayi higeya age-mainayanagiya menia agaifena mukia Yuta veamogamina hamanepaiye.
Hamapai-mainaya yafe tagayaene Anumaya Kotia tamakinago-mogamina hulokiya vaino hamapai-mainea kemona kanale ke tamakaila tamahapaigahe emainone.
Ani kemoa falote huno tamagema hisiafene huno Anumaya Kotia tagaila amakinagomogati taulagafi Yisasina ago alino hetitene. Mani kea Yagame Avopi tu (2) molia sapta mage huya kae-malenae
“Kagaya menia nafanenimoga mainane. Meni kanoa nagaya Negafana mainoe.” huno kae-maleneane.
Yisasia fali-mainefiti ago ali hetiteneafe eteno falino komufinaga mo okasalisiafene huno nayona Anumaya Kotia mage huno humaineane
“Tevitina ‘Hano ohu manua kanale manu kamigahue.’ huna humainoa manua tamakaila tamamigahue” huno humaineane.
Ani yafe nago kemoa nago autamafina mage huno hu-maineane
“Kagaya kanaleya huka huyogi-malenana aliya kanokamona Anumayamoga atalesanageno augafamoa komufinaga okasaligahie.” huno humaineane.

Mani kea Tevitifena ohune. Tevitia ma mopale mainea kanafina Anumaya Kotina haiya kava humaineanagino faligeya totoamogami hevaimatenaya matimatipi augafamoa kasali-maineanagi Anumaya Kotia Yisasina fali-mainefiti ali hetitenea kanomo augafamoa okasaline.
Ani yafe nafunaganagatama havilama hutama haviho ani kanomoma hulatenea kavafe Anumaya Kotia kefo yatamia aigetamateno atalelamatene huta tamahanepaune.

Mosesema kahegi malenea kemona akave malesunageno Anumaya Kotia kefo yatia aigetateno atalelategahie hutama tamametiti hisayana aigetamateno ataleotamategahigi Yisasife havitama tamakupi maletama tamametiti hisageno Yisasima fali-mainea yateti Anumaya Kotia mukia kefo yatamia aigetamateno atale-lamategahie.
Amaune vayamoya mage huya kae-malenae

“Tamakaya kamuge hatagetama vaineamataya veamogatama tamakaya mainaya kanafina nagaya Anumaya Kotina tusiya huna tokiyaage avame yana hugahue. Ani yafe veamoya tamahapaisagetama ‘Tamage nehae.’ hutama ohugahae ani yafe tamamayoa ainagetama faligahae.” huya kae-malenayane. Mani amaune vayama kae-malenaya kea tamakaite evayi hugahigi kaye ho. huno humaine.
Poloa mani kea huteno Panapasiene hati-laviana ugahe nehaageya alitalu humainaya veamoya mage hae “Nago Sapati yupa ani monola nagoene me lahapaio.” huya humainae.

Nehuya monola hano higeya hati-laviya mukia Yuta vayaene Anumaya Koti kema nehaviya anagala Yuta vea omainaya veanene Pologani Panapasigania anakave nevageana mage huana hamapaie “Tokiyaage hutama Anumaya Kotia kayone hulamatesia yama tamaminea yapi maiho.” huana humainae.
Nago Sapati yupa mukia ani kumate veamoya Anumayamo ke havigahe melitalu humainae.
Melitalu huya mainageya Yuta vayamoya ageteya amaipamoa haviya higeya Poloma hia kehena “Havige nehie.” huya hu-haviya hutenae.

Hu-haviya hunatayanagi Pologani Panapasigania tokiyaage kea mage huana hae “Tamakaya Yuta veamogatamina hagotetaa Anumaya Koti kea tamahapaigahe huanagi mani kemona tamakaveno hutetama ‘Agola maige maige hisuna tahaimu alisuna yafena notahaiyanagita oaligahune.’ hutama haya yafe tamakaila tamataletaa Isaleli vea omainaya veamogamina mo-hama-paigahue.
Naa hisuafene huno Anumayamoa mage huno lahapai-maineane

‘Isaleli vea omainaya veamogamina aye-halematesayafene huna ago hulamatenoe. Mukia mopaene mopaene mainaya veamogamina amaku amamena aligatisuafene hutama hamapaigahae.’ huno humaineane.” huana humainae.

Nehaageya Isaleli vea omainaya veamoya mani kea haviteya tusia muse huya Anumayamo kea alisaga humainae. Naa nehuya Anumaya Kotina haigenoma “Agola maige maige hisaya tamahaimula aligahae.” huno hapali-malenea veamoya mani kea haviteya aliya amakupi maleya amametiti humainae.
Amametiti hageno Anumayamo kemoa mukia kotega ute ete humaine.

Ute ete humaineanagi Yuta vayamoya ala amakima hanea aneyaga mono kema nehaviya aneyagamogami amaipaene kava vayamogami amaipaene huya ali hetigeya aepa heya Pologani Panapasiganina ali haviya-hunateteya ani kumategati ananati-talenae.
Ananati-talageana anakaya “Mani kavala havi kava nehae.” huana ani kumapiti kugukege yana anaiyafitila aifopo huneataleteana Aikoniamu umainae.
Vaanagi Yisasi kema haviya amakupi malenaya veamoya tusia muse hageno Alu Aotage Avamumoa amakupina hiya humaine.
Pologani Panapasigania Aikoniamu elavi-vayi huana Yuta veamogami mono nopi haiana kanale mono ke hamapaiageya kasagoya Yuta veamoyaene Kaliki veamoyaene haviya amakupi maleya amametiti humainae.

Naa haanagi nagoa Yuta veamoya “Yisasi kelefena tametiti ohugahune.” huya nehaya Yuta veamoya havige huya Isaleli vea omainaya veamogamina Yisasi anagafe “Kefo kava nehae.” huya hu-atile-male huya amaipa kafa hematenae.

Naa hayanagi Pologani Panapasigania ayaaya kana anile maineana tokiyaage huana Anumayamo kea huhalaageno Anumayamoa anaya huno agaia kayone humatesia kea havisayafene huno tokiyaa anamigeana tokiyaage avame yayaga humainae.

Ani kava haageya ani kumate veamoya tolefi aliya fako huya nagoa veamoya mage hae “Yuta vayamoya tamage nehae.” huya hayanagi nagoa veamoya mage hae “Aao, Aposolo vayamoya tamagea nehae.” huya humainae.
Huteya Yuta vayaene Isaleli vea omainaya vayaene kava vayaamiene mage hae “Pologani Panapasiganina ali haviya hunateteta yafa kayoteti hanaesunageana faligae.” huya humainae.
Hageana mani kea haviteana faleana Likonia kotega hanea kumatalate Lisitala kumateene Tepe kumateene uana anilega hanea kumayagalega umaineana Yisasifena kanale mono kea hamapai-mainae.
Lisitala kumatela nago kanoa maine. Ani kanoa atenelegati aiya avayu humai kanoa vaiyatete nohia kanoa anile mopale maine.

Mopale maineno Poloma hia kea maino nehavigeno Poloa aulu heno ageana ani kanomoa Yisasifema havino agupi maleno ametiti hia tokiyaa hanegeno Poloa agupinaga havia kea ago haviteno ala kegefafiti mage huno hie “Kaiya ayepi huka hetika maiyo.” huno higeno aupaa halelako humaino hetino ute ete humaine.

Ute ete higeya alitalu humainaya veamoya Poloma hutea kavala ageteya ala kefiti ailalupeya Likonia veamogami kefiti mage huya hae “Tagai anumayatia vaya kana huya tagaitela elavi-mainae.” huya humainae.
Nehuya Panapasife “Nago anumayati maine. Agia Susi maine.” huya nehuya Poloa kasagoya kema hia yafe “Nago anumayati maine. Agia Hemesi emaine.” huya humainae.

Susi agima alisaga nehaya nona ani kumamo agegayalega hanegeno ani note kava kanomoa ve pulumakaene tamu vailinea auseaene ani kumamo hionale alino mukia veanene ani tole kanomofe pulamaka heya kae-salamana hunategahe humainae.

Hunategahe nehageana Aposolo kanolatamogania Pologani Panapasigania mani kea haviteana “Havi kava hugahe nehae.” huana kenaania ali hatata hutaleana anima alitalu humainaya veamogami amunopi anaiyayeana vaayamogani ala kefiti mage hae “Nelaafugatamae naa higetama mani kavala nehae? Taagaya vayatafa mainoagi tamakai kana hutaa mopale vaya mainoe. Kanale mono kea tamahapaigahe taagaya emainoe. Afa kava hutama haimula omale manimo agi alisaga nehagi ani kavala neataletama tamakua aiyahae hutama Anumaya Kotina tamakua amitafa hiho. Ani Anumaya Kotia ofalisia kano maine. Ikaene mopaene hageliene talo humalene. Mukia ani lipi mainaya kafayagaene ikatega mainaya namaene mopale mainaya afuene veanene talo humaleneane.
Nayo kanafina alu nofi alu nofi veanemoya amakaiami hamaiya kate vaiyatete maiya hageno Anumaya Kotia kahegi oamatene

Kahegi oamateneanagi ‘Nagaya ma mainoe.’ huno amaveligahe huno kanale kavala humateno ikapinagatila kola lamamino hoyafina kanale kavela lamamino tamaku tamamemoa muse hisia yana male hiya hulamatene.” huana nehae.
Mani kea haanagi ani veamoya anakaila afu heya kae-salamana henategahe nehageana “Aao.” huana tokiyaage ke haa yafe atalenae.

Nagoa Yuta vayamoya Atiokutiene Aikoniamutiene anile evayi huya alitalu humainaya vayamogami amaipamona huya ali hetimatageya yafa kayoteti Polona haeteya agayana higeya “Ago fali-maine.” huya amakesa haviteya kumamona malaga avayu huya mo talenae.
Mo talayanagi Yisasife haviya amakupi malenaya vayamoya ayaamoya me maigagitageno anileti hetino kumatega mo faeteno kotigeno Panapasiene Tepe kumala neataleana umainae.

Vaayamogani ani kumate vayamogamina Yisasi mono kea hamapaiageya kasagoya veamoya Yisasife haviya amakupi maleya amametiti hageana eteana Lisitala kumate haiteana Aikoniamu haiana Atioku kumate evaana anile maineya Yisasife haviya amakupi maleya amametiti humainaya veamogami amaku amamema ali lokiya vaisaya kea mage huana hamapaie “Tokiyaage hutama tamakua Yisasina amitafa haya yana mukia kanafina ani katekeya vaiyatete hiho. Anumaya Kotife ‘Kava yagailato.’ huya nehaya veamoya ma mopale mainageno kana yayagamoa amaugafale falote hisianagi haenagaa kanale kumatela ugahae.” huana hamapaie.

Alu mono note alu mono note ute ete huana kave mosiya Anumayamotega havigeya Yisasina amakuama aminaya vayapiti kava yagaisaya soka vayala hapaliana “Kagayae kagayae.” huana humateteana mage hae “Tamakuama amitafa haya Anumayamo ayapi tamaya hisia yafe nelamatoe.” humateteana amateteana umainae.
Elaviana Pisitia kola mogaseana nago Pamafilia hanea kumala Pega kumate evayi humainae.
Pega kumate veamogamina Yisasi mono kea hamapaiteana anileti neamataleana Atalia kumate tavi-mainae.

Anileti tipi kalefi haisaga humaiageno anavaleno vigeana Atioku kumate eteana hai-mainae. Nayona ani kumate maineya Yisasina amakua aminaya veamoya “Anumaya Kotia tanaya hisigetana agai kea mohamapaio.” huya hunatenaya kumatelagiana ani aliyana ali-vayayeteana eteana umainae.

Ago evayi huana Yisasi anagafe “Melitalu hiho.” haageya ageana Anumaya Kotia anakaiene tokaeno mainegeana mukiama humainaa kavafena hamapaiteana Isaleli omainaya veanene Yisasife haviya amakupi maleya amametiti haya yafe Anumaya Kotia fita ago yakimatene huana hamapaie.
Ani Atioku kumatela Yisasi kema nehaviya veanenena ayaaya kanagefa anilega mainae.

Poloene Panapasiene Atioku kumate Yisasi anagaene mainaageya nagoa vayamoya Yutiati elaviya mage huya hamapaiye “Mosesema ‘Tamakoya anoya taga hiho.’ huno humainea kea akave omalesayana Anumaya Kotia tamaku tamamena aliokatigahie.” huya humainae.

Hageana Poloene Panapasiene “Aao, tamakaya havige nehae.” huana amakaiene tusia ke vaiteya ani kema fatago hisaya yafe Poloene Panapasiene nagoa vayaene mo hamavigegahe Aposolo vayategaene mono note kava vayategaene humatageya Yelusalemu haimainae.

Yisasi anagamoya humatageya katega vayana Fonisia kotegaene Samelia kotegaene alu kumate kumate ute ete huya Isaleli veane omainaya veamoya amakua aiyahae huya Yisasina amakua aminaya kea amafuamakanagamina hamapaigeya haviteya tusia muse humainae.

Muse hageya Yelusalemu uvayi hageya alitaluma humainaya Yisasi anagamoyaene Aposolo vayaene soka vayayagaene falu fala humatageya mukia Anumaya Kotia anakaiene tokaeno humainea kavafena hamapai-mainae.

Hamapaiageya nagoa Falasia vayala Yisasina amakua aminaya vayamoya mage huya humainae “Isaleli veane omainaya veamoya Yisasina amakuama aminesayana ania hutama amakoya anoya taga hiho. Mosese kahegi kemo akave maleho huta kahegi malesune.” huya humainae.
Hageya ani kema humainaya ke fako hugahe Aposolo vayaene soka vayamoyaene melitalu humainae.

Melitalu humaleteya kasagoya ke-yeso maiya hutageno Pitaa hetino mage huno humaine nafunaganagatama tamakaya havimainae nayona Anumaya Kotia tamakaipiti nagaifena “Kagayae.” huno “Isaleli veane omainaya veamogamina Yisasi kanale mono kea hamapaisanageya haviteya aliya amakupi maleya amametiti hugahae.” huno humaineane.
Anumaya Kotia taguafina ago agelama huno agemainea kanogino ageana “Ani veamoya amakua ago namitafa hageno tagaima Alu Aotage Avamumoma taminea kava huno ani veala amamine.
Nagoke avamete huno Alu Aotage Avamula amamine. Yisasifenema huya haviya amakupi malenayafene huno amakupima hanea kefo yaamia ago aye hami-talene.

Ago aye hami-talenegi naa higetama Anumaya Kotima humainea kavafena ‘Afa ya kana yane.’ hutama tusia kanaage yana alitama Yisasina amakua aminaya veatela malegahe nehae. Nayona taginagomoya Mosesema taminea kea akavela omalenayane tagayaenena menia akave malesuna tagamula omalene.

Omaleneanagi ‘Anumayatimoa Yisasi ali kayone hulateno kefo yatihe huno faliteno tagu tamena aligatimaine.’ huta tametiti nehunanagi ani yateti Isaleli veane omainaya veamogami amaku amamena ago aligatimaine.” huno humaine.

Pitaa mani kea hianagi mukiama alitalu humainaya vayamoya nago ke kanoa ohunae. Ohageana Panapasiene Poloene Isaleli veane omainaya veamogami amunopi Anumaya Kotima anakai anayapima tokiyaage avame yama humainea yafena hamapaiaageya havimainae.
Nehavigeno Yemesia hetino mage huno humaine “Nafunaganagatama nagai kea haviho.

Anumaya Kotia ehe kanafima Isaleli veane omainaya veala amaya hugahe viayamo ani veapitila agaia veane maisaya yafene huno amavale-maine. Saimoni Pitaa ago tahapaigeta havimainonagi ani kea Anumaya Koti amaune vayamoya mage huya nayona kae-malenayane
‘Mani kanamoa hano hisigena nagaya Anumaya Kotina Teviti nofi anagala nago no kana hu-mainayanagiya tagapema ailavisayana nagaya etena alina hetigahue. Ali-haviya hutalenaya nona etena kigahue.

Alisaga hugahuanagi mukia veanemoya nagaifena natiyegahae. Isaleli veane omainaya veanemogamina nagaya ago hapali-malenoa veamoya nagaife haviya nati-yegahae. Nagaya Anumaya Kotina ago nayona tamahapaugetama havimainaya kavafe mani kea nehue.’ huno aune kanoamoa kae-maleneane.
Ani yafe nagayama havua nagesamoa mage nehie Isaleli veane omainaya vayapiti Yisasina amakua amitafa humainaya veamogamina kana yana oamamisune.

Avo kaeta ‘Mage hutama hiho.’ huta hamapaisune ‘Fali-mainaya veafe ‘Anumayati mainae.’ huya amakisana nevaiya malenesaya kavela onesae. Ane munane amavayu nehisaya kavala ataleho. Kolamoa agusafinaga hanesia afuene kolaenena oneho.’ huta hamapaisune.
Nayona aepa heya mukia kotega Yuta vayamogami mono nopina mukia Sapati yupa Mosese kea hapaliya nehaviyane. Nehaviyanagi haviteya akavema malenuyahena akave malegahae.” huno humaineane.

Aposolo vayaene soka vayaene Yisasi anagaaene mukia alitalu humaineya kea haviteya “Kanalele.” huya amakaipiti tole kanolatana hesaga huteya hunatageana Poloene Panapasiene Atioku kumate umainae. Anima hunataya kanolatana kava kanolataami mainae. Anakia Yutasi Pasapasiene Sailasiene hunatageana umainae.
Avona kaeteya ani kanolatamogani anayapina maleteya mage huya kae-malenae.

Tagaya Aposolo vayaene soka vayaene mani avona kaeta Isaleli veane omainaya vayapitima Yisasife havitama tamakupi maletama tamametiti nehaya tafu-taganagatama Atioku kotegaene Silia kotegaene Silisia kotegaene mainaya veamogatama “Felugae.” huta avona kaeta nelamamune.
Tagayama havunana nagoa vayamoya tagaipitila nagoa tamakesa kumo hutama tole lamakesa havisaya augafa kea mo lamahapaiyanagi tagaya “Ani kea hiho.” huta hu-oama-tenone.

Hu-oamatenonafene huta melitalu hageta kea huta haya kiteta tole kanolatana tagaipitila tahau tayamopafi nelahaiya kanolata hunatonageana Anumayatimoa, Yisasi Kalaisina agai ke hamanepaia yateti hanaesageana falisaa yafena anamayoa oai kanolatane, Panapasiene Poloene tamakaitega ugahe nehae.
Yutasiene Sailasiene hunatesunageana tamakaitega humainona kea anavayafiti mo lamahapaigae.

Alu Aotage Avamumoa tagaiene mainegeta kea kea huteta “Kanalele nagoa kana yana amayonalela omalegahunagi ma yamaage akave malesae. Fali-mainaya veafe amakisana vaiya atupa kave alisaga huya malesaya kavela oneho. Kolamoa agusafinaga hanesia afuene kolaenena onesae. Ane munane amavayu nehisaya kavala ohisae. Ani kavama ohisayana kanaleya huya maigahae. Ketia male me hano hie.” huya kae-malenae.
Kae-maleteya humatageya Atioku laviya Yisasi anagamogamina molitalu humateteya mani avona amamigeya hapaliya haviteya humainaya kehena tusia muse humainae.
Muse hageana Yutasiene Sailasiene Anumayamo aune kanolata maineana ayaaya kea amaku amamema alilokiya vaisaya kea hamapai-mainae.
Ani kea huteana ayaaya kanagefa amakaienena maiteana eteana vaageya ali falu fala hunatetageana hunatenaya vayatega eteana umainae.
Vageana Poloene Panapasiene Atioku maineana nagoa veanene ailokaeana Yisasi kea hamanepaiana mainae.

Nagoa kana maiteana Poloa Panapasifena mage huno humaine “Etetaa mukia kumate Yisasi mono ke hamapai-mainoa kumate ute ete hutaa tafu-taganaya kanaleya huya mainafi haviya huya mainafi utaa mogesue.” huno humaine.
Higeno Panapasia “Yoni Maki avale-linetaa ugahue.” huno hianagi Poloa mage hie “Aao, ani kanomoa hagoteno taagaienema viana Pamafilia kumate mo nelaataleno aliyana oalino umaineane.” huno humaine.
Higeana ani yateti tolefi aliana fako huana anahaote anahaote umainae. Panapasia Makina neavaleno tipi kalefi haisaga humaiageno Saipalusi anavaleno umaine.
Vaageno Poloa anonaa Sailasina avalegeya afuaganaya Anumayamotega havigeya mage hae “Kategama visaana Anumayamoa kayone hulanateteno tanaya hisie.” huya hageana umainae.
Silia kotegaene Silisia kotegaene ute ete huana Yisasi anagamogamina amaku amamena ali lokiya vaimateana amaya humainae.

Poloa Tepi kumate uno Lisitala kumate umaine. Ani kumatela nagola Yisasife havino agupi malenea kanoa maine. Agia Timotie. Ani kanomoa Yuta amo nafane mainegi nefaa Isaleli kanoa omainegi, Kaliki kano mainegeno, itaamoa Yisasina agua amitafa humainea alagino maine.
Ani Lisatalaene Aikoniamuenema maineya Yisasi anagamoya Timotifena “Kanale kano maine.” huya humainae.

Hageno Poloa Timotifena mage hie “Taagaiene tokaeta vaiyesune.” Visuna kotega mainaya Isaleli veamoya kagaila negafaa Isaleli kanoa omainegi, Kaliki kano maine, huya ago havimainagi havigu ani yafe amaipa haviya huyafene huno nehuno Timotina avaleno Mosese kemo akave maleno agoya anoya laga humaine.
Naa huteya alu kumate kumate neuya Yelusalemu mainaya Aposolo vayaene soka vayaene humalenaya kema akave malesaya yafe hamapai-mainae.
Hamapaigeya Yisasi anagamogamina amametiti humainaya yamona tokiyaage higeya mukia yupa nagoa veanea ete ete huya egasago hageya amakaienena tokaeya mainae.
Alu Aotage Avamumoa “Esia kotega nagai ke hamaopaigahae.” huno nagalu humateneanagiya Poloagi Sailasiagi Timotigamina Faligia kotegaene Kalesia kotegaene umainae.
Misia kotega uvayi huya Pitinia haigahe hayanagi Yisasi Avamumoa “Oviho.” huno nagalu humatene.
Nagalu humategeya Misia kola agaseya Taloasi kumate elavi-mainae.

Ani kegela Poloa nagola himona kana ya ageana nagola Masetonia kotega kanomoa hetino maineno ke huno mage huno humaine “Kagaya hagelina lakaeka Masetonia me lahamao.” huno higeno Poloa agetegeta Anumaya Kotia tagaife “Ani kotega utama veamogamina Yisasife kanale mono ke mo hamapaiho.” huno humaineanagita tagaya aupaa Masetonia visuna kafe atineayone.

Taloasiti tipi kalefi haisaga humaunageno tavaleteno aiyayeno fatago huno Samotalesia ti amunopi hanea kumate euvayi higeta mo faeteta natena ufatago huno haigeta Neapolisi hai vayi huteta mopafi euta Filipai kumate euvayi humainone. Filipai kumala Masetonia veamogamina ala kumaamie. Nayona Lomu veanea eya mainaya kumale. Tagaya ani kumate euvayi huta nagoa kana mainone.
Maineta Sapati yupa ani kumamona kegiyamo hiyenale uteta titega lavita anilega Anumayamotega havinegaya kumala hane huta lavunanagi nagoa aneyaga alitalu huya mainageta Yisasi kea mo hamapai-mainone.

Hamanepaunageno nagola ani kema maino havia amo agia Litiae. Tayataila kumateti alagino haesate oko kena talo huno mone aliya nealia alagi Isaleli veane omainaya veapiti a maineanagi aluya huno Anumaya Koti agia alisaga nehia alagino ani amoa Poloma hia ke maino nehavigeno Anumaya Kotia agua alino aiyahae huteno havisia agu agesa amine.

Amigeno haviteno haenagaa mukia agaia anagaaene tina fale-matenae. Tina fale-matetageno tagaila mage huno lahapaiye “Musetami nehue nagaifema ‘Yisasina agua amitafa hia a maine.’ hutama hinutamahena nagaila noniafi emaiho.” huno tokiyaage ke higeta agayama hia kea akave malenone.

Nago yupa Anumayamotega havinegona kumate ugahe katega neunageno nago nofipi maineno miya noalia aliya nealia munala katega fotu hunanagi Kefo Avamumoa aguafi mainegeno aune laga huno haenagama vayi hisia yafema havigagenoa hufalote huno hamanepaiya munalagiya kava vayaamoya humainea keletila tusia mone nealiyane.

Ani munamoa Poloene tagaiene takave neeno keha keha huno mage hie “Ma vayala anafinaga mainea Anumaya Kotina aliya vayaamoyae. Anumaya Kotima tamaku tamamema aligatisiafe kanale kate kea tamahanepaiye.” huno humaine.

Nehuno mukia yupa ani kegeya maino higeno Polona aipamoa haviya higeno maiyahae huno ani Kefo Avamumofe mage huno humaine “Yisasi Kalaisina agai agileti kahanepauve ani munamo agupitila hati-lavika vuo.” huno higeno aupaa ani Kefo Avamumoa ataleno umaine.

Vigeya ani munamo kava vayaamoya agayana higeya monema nealiya kamoa tilegeya aepaa ageteya Pologani Sailasiganina anatafa huteya anavayu huya vea atagu nefaya kumapi kaiyeke hunatesaya vayate anavaleya umainae.
Yasi vayate anavaleya mage huya mo hamapaiye “Ma kanolatana Yuta kanolatanagiana tagai kuma alihaviya nehae.
Veane amavaya huana ‘Maa hiho.’ huana hulaveli-neliageta tagaya Lomu veamogata ani kavama hisunana tusiya huno haviya hugahie.” huya humainae.
Hageya melitalu humainaya veamoya “Tamage nehae.” huya hageya Yasi vayamoya mage hae “Kenaania ali hatata hutalenetama hegi kayoteti hanaeho.” huya hageya hanae-mainae.
Hegi kayoteti tusiya huya anamulo-nalo huya hanaeteya kina nopi nofi hunateteya ani kina nopi kava kanomofe mage huya hapaiye “Ma kanolatatela tokiyaage huka yagaiyo.” huya humainae.
Na ke hageno haviteno kava neyagaiya kanomoa anavaleno tole ayenalagi-male nopinaga anateteno anaiya nago yosa amunopi vaiteno aitalako hunatene.
Hunatayanagi anakaya ani kege amunona yagame nehuana Anumayamotega nunamu huana havinegaageya kina nopi mainaya vayamoya haviya mainae.

Mainageno anile aupaa tusia imi nealino ani kina note ayevasaga huya kimalenaya yosa ali kanage kanagu higeno mukia fitayagamoa aiyaki-lavigeya mukia kina nopi mainaya vayamogami amayakopitila nofiyagamoa kaluhelavi-maine.

Aikalu-helavigeno kina vayate kava kanomoa faeno maineleti hetino mogeteno mukia fitayagamoa ago yaki-mainegeno mage huno agesa havimaine “Mukia kina vayamoya ago falae.” huno ayaaya naepe kayona alisagino agaia ageya fakaligahe humaine.
Nehigeno Poloa ala kefiti mage huno humaine “Kagaikaa kaugafa ali haviya ohuo. Tagaya mukiamogata afaa mainone.” huno humaine.

Higeno ani kava kanomoa vayafe “Kanila alitama eho.” huno hunemaleno aiyayeno ani nopinaga hai-faleno monaketeno kolia huno atali nehuno Pologani Sailasiganina anavate eno anaiyafi mesaga hulavi-maine.
Hu-laviteno ani nofipiti anavaleno kumatega viayamo anakaife mage huno hanavige “Musetani nehugi naa hisugeno Anumaya Kotia nagu namena aligatigahie?” huno hanavige-maine.

Higeana mage huana hapaie “Anumayati Yisasife havika kagupi maleka kametiti hisanageno Anumaya Kotia kagu kamena ali-negatino anagakamogamiene ali-gatisigetama agai anaga maigahae.” huana hapai-mainae.

Huteana ani kanoene mukia agaia anagaaene Yisasi mono kea huhaleana hamapai-mainae. Hamapaitaageno ani kegekeya anavaleno amuna sese hunateteya anile aupaa ani kanoene agaia anagaaene tina fale-matenae.
Tina falematetaageno anavaleno nomaafinaga umaineno kavela anamiteno tusiya huno agaiaene agaia anagaaene Anumaya Kotina amakua amiteya amametiti haya yafe tusia muse humainae.
Muse hayanagi kotigeno Yasi kanomoa ati vaya humategeya eya mage me hae “Ani kanolatana afaa anatalegeana vio.” huya humainae.

Hageno kina vayate kava kanomoa ani kea mage huno Polona hapaiye “Yasi vayamoya nagoa vaya humatageya eya tanakaife mage hae tanakaya kina nopitila neataletana tanaipamoa kanale nehinagetana afaa vio.” huya me hanapaiye.

Higeno Poloa ati vayafe mage huno hamapaiye. “Taagaya Lomu kanolata mainoagi haviya hulaateya taagai kaiyekea haviteya fatago huya kaiyekea huotaateya vea amaulagafina hegi kayoteti tusiya huya taamulonalo huteya nofila hulaatenagi menia naa higeya falakiya taatalegahe nehae? Tamagelafa hutaa kesila ougahuagi amakaya amakaiami male eya ‘Kina nopitila ataletana vio.’ huya hulaatesae.” huno humaine.
Hageya ati vayamoya ani kea aliya Yasi vayamogami mo hamapageya “Lomu kanolata mainoe.” huana haa ke haviteya tusia koli humainae.
Koli huteya kina nopi uya amahau ke mo hunateteya “Havi kava hunagetana hae.” huya kina nopitila anavale neanataleya mage hae “Musetani nehune mani no kumala neataletana vio.” huya humainae.
Hageana kina nopitila ataleana Litia nopi mogaana anafuanakanagamina amaketeana amaku amamena ali lokiya vaisaya kea hamapaiteana ani kumala ataletana umainae.
Poloene anagaamoyaene Amifipolisi kumala mogaseya Apolonia kumala mogaseya Tesalonaika kumate uvayi humainae. Ani kumatela nagola Yuta vayamogami mono nona hane.

Haneanagino Poloa mukia kanafima nehia kava huno tagufa (3) Sapati yupa ani mono nopina haino Anumaya Koti kema kae-malenaya autamafitila aepaa hugafino mage huno hamapaiye “Anumaya Kotima taugafa aligatigahema hutenea kanomoa tusia agata aigeno fali-maine. Fali-mainefitila eteno heti-maine. Ani Yisasina Anumaya Kotia taugafa aligatigahema hutenea kanomofe tamahanepauve.” huno humaine.

Higeya nagoa Yuta vayamoyaene kasagoya Anumaya Koti agima alisaga nehaya Kaliki vayaene amakima hanea aneyagaene Yisasife haviya amakupi maleya amametiti huteya Poloene Sailasigani anakave tokaeya umainae.

Tokaeya umainaya yateti Yuta vayamogami amaipamoa haviya nehae. Higeya kefo kava nehuya felu mailiteya nehaya vayalagiya vaya atagu nefaya kumapi mainae. Maineya vayayaga amavaleya melitalu humaleteya ani kumate vayamogamina amaku amakesa huya ali hetigeya Yesoni note uya nomaa moyenafa huya Pologani Sailasiganina anavaleya alitalu humainaya veamogami amayapi anategahe haimainae.

Haiteya atiyegetayana higeya oanakeya Yesoniene nagoa Yisasi anagaene amavayu huya ani kumate kava vayate amavaleya uvayi huya mage huya hae “Mani vayamoya mukia kotega ute ete huya veamogamina mono kea ali haviya hume hume menia tagai kumate emainae.

Emainageno Yesonia nomaafi amavaleno amategeya maineya ala sauve kanotimoa, Sisama humainea kea ali haviya nehuya mage hae ‘Alu sauve kanoti maine. Ani kanomo agia Yisasie.’ huya humainae.” huya humainae.

Hageya melitaluma humainaya veamoyaene ani kumate kava vayamoyaene ani kea haviteya amakesa kumo huteya “Kina nopima ovisayafena monea tamitetama ugahae.” huya hageya Yesoniene nagoa vayaene monea hageya amamitageya amatalageya umainae.
Aupaa ani kege kanoa Yisasi anagamoya Pologani Sailasiganina hunatageana Pelia kumate vaayamogani Yuta vayamogami mono nopi mo haifale-mainae.

Pelia mainaya veamoya Tesalonaika kumate mainaya veala amakaseya kanale amaku amakesaene veane mainageno Poloa Yisasi kea hamapaigeya haviteya aluya huno nehamaiye. Haviya amakupi maleteya mukia kanafina “Tamage nehifi havige nehie?” huya Anumaya Koti kema kae-malenaya kefina hapaliya ati ayemainae.
Naa nehuya kasagoya Yuta vayamoyaene kasagoya Kaliki aneyaga amakima hanea aneyagaene kasagoya Kaliki vayayagaene Yisasifena haviya amakupi maleya amametiti humainae.

Amametiti hayanagi Tesalonaika mainaya Yuta veamoya haviyana “Poloma Anumaya Koti kema Pelia kumate veama hamapaiye.” huya haya kea haviteya anile evayi huya alitalu humainaya veamogami amaku amakesa meli haviya humainae.
Ali haviya hageya Yisasi anagamoya aupaa Polona hutageno hageli kahaepatega tavigeana Sailasigani Timotigania anile Pelia mainae.

Mainaageya avagi huya umainaya vayamoya Polona Atenisi avaleya umainageno Poloa mage huno hamapaiye “Sailasigani Timotiganife ‘Tanakaya aupaa hutana nagaitega eo.’ hutama hanapaiho.” huno hamapaigeya ataleya umainae.
Vageno Poloa anakava maineno ageana Atenisi kumatela kasagoya yafateti talo humalenaya afa anumayayaga malenageno mogeteno aipamoa tusia haviya humaine.

Aipamoa haviya higeno Yuta vayamogami mono nopi haino Yuta veanene Anumaya Koti agi alisaga nehaya Yuta vea omainaya veanene Anumaya Koti kea huhaleno amakaiene huge havige humaine. Mukia kanafina veane atagu nefaya kumapi maineno anifima mainaya veamogamina Anumaya Koti mono kea hamanepaino huge havige humainae.

Hamanepaigeya nagoa Epikuliaene Sitoikiene ala havi haviya alilinaya vayaamimoyaene ke ovai ovai nehageya alitalu humainaya veamoya haviteya nagoamoya Polofe mage huya hae “Ma kanomoa na ke huliteno nehie?” huya nehageya nagoamoya Poloma Yisasifeene fali-mainefiti hetimainea kanale mono kema hamapaiya kehe mage huya humainae “Alu kumate anumayahe nehifi?” huya humainae.
Huteya agai ke havigahe Aleopagusi Kanisole vayate avaleya uteya Polofe mage huya havigae “Kagayama haegafa kema hamapaina kea havigahe nehunagi tahapaiyo.
Kekaama havunana alua augafa kema hanageta havuna kemo aepaa havisune huta nehune.” huya humainae.
Mukia Atenisi mainaya vayaene yoka emainaya vayaene mukia kanafina haegafa kema hisaya ke havisaya yafena tusiya huno nehamaiya vayalagiya alu kavala ohisaya amakesa nehae.

Hageno Poloa Aleopagusi kanisole vayamogami amunopi hetino mage huno humaine Atenisi mainaya vayamogatama nagaya agoana tamakaya aluya hutama afa anumayamo mono kea tokiyaage hutama nehaya vaya mainae.

Mainagena nagaya vaiyatete nehuna agoana yafateti talo humalenaya afa anumayamogami amakima alisaga nehaya afa anumayatamimona agetena nago yafa folamole mogoana ani yafatela mage hutama kae-malenae “Oagenona anumayamogae.” hutama kae-malenagena agoa kanomofe “Oagenona kanomo agima alisaga nehune.” hutama kae-malenaya kanomofe aepaa hugafina tamahapaigahugi haviho.
Anumaya Kotia ma mopaene mukia mopafima hanea yaene talo humalenea kanogino mukia ikapinaga yaene mopafi yaene kava yagai-mainea kanogino veamoya amayateti kimalenaya nopina nomaiyane.
Tagaya tayapitila nago yana haomaegahune. Agaia mukia veamogami hamaimuene mukia yama amaminea kanogita hanaa huno nago yamaa omaleneanagita aya hugahune?

Anumaya Kotia nagoke tototimona hagoteno talo humaleteno ani kanofiti mukia ma mopale mainaya nofi veala ali falote humatene. Humateteno “Ma kote kote maiho.” huno amateteno kasagoya vaya maisaya kanaamiene agaia humatene.
Amakaya Anumaya Kotina amaku amigahena ati yege yege huya Anumaya Koti aepaa havisae huno ani kavala humaineane. Tamage agaya alulega omaigi tagaiene nagoke nagokemogatiene tokaeno maine.
Maineanagita agaiage tahaimula tamigeta vaiyatete huta mainone. Ani kehe nagoa tamakai avoma agelinaya vayamoya mage huya humainae “Tagaienena agaia lategeta nafaneyagaa mainone.” huya humainayane.

Higeta tagaya agaia latenea nafaneyaga mainone. Havigu lagaya ma lagesa havisunagi “Anumaya Koti aepaa tagesafitila yafatetiene kapaletiene kanileta yafatetiene kanaleya huta talo humalenaya augafa kanoe.” huta ohisune.

Nayona Anumaya Koti aepaa mukia veamoya ohavinayanagino Anumaya Kotia kasagoya kea ohuneane. Nagi menia mukia ma mopale veafena tokiyaage ke huno mage hie “Tamakua aiyahae hutama nagaitega eho.” huno humaine.

Anumaya Kotia mukia ma mopale veamogamina fatago huno kaiyekema humatesia kanafina ago hapalino ani kaiyekelema yagaisia vemona ago ali hetitene. Ani vemofe “Veamoya havilama huya havisae.” huno fali-mainefitila ali hetitene huno humaine.
Higeya “Fali-mainefiti ago ali hetitenema.” hia kea haviteya nagoa veamoya kigi huya akaya atageya nagoa veamoya mage hae “Nagoene mani kea hugeta havimano.” huya humainae.

Nehageno Poloa neamataleno umaineanagi nagoa veamoya agai akave neuya Yisasife haviya amakupi maleya amametiti hu-mainae. Amametiti humainaya veapitila nago kanomo agia Tionisiusie Aleopagusi kanisole kano maineane. Nago amo agia Tamalisiene nagoa veanene amametitia humainae.
Haenagaa Poloa Atenisi kumala ataleno Kolini kumate umaine.

Anile maineno nago Yuta kanoa age-maine. Ani kanomo agia Akuilae. Kuma aepaa Potusi hanegi ani kanafina Palisilaa aamoene Itali kumateti emainae. Itali kumate kava kanomoa Kolotiusia mage huno kahegi malene “Mukia Yuta veamogatama Itali veamogami ala kumaamia, Lomua, neataletama viho.” huno humainea kehe Akuilaagi Palisilaagia ataleana Kolini umainaageno Poloa anakaitega umaine.
Uno monakeana nagoke aliyake hanegeno kena noma fakaniya mone nealiya aliya nealiageno monaketeno anakaiene tokaeno maineno ani aliyana ali-mainae.
Poloa mukia Sapati yupa Yuta vayamogami mono nopi haino tokiyaage kea huno Yuta vayaene Kaliki vayaene Yisasife amakupi malesayafe hamapai-maine.
Haenagaa Sailasiene Timotiene Masetoniati evayi nehaana Poloa alu aliya oalino mukia yupa Yuta veafena “Yisasie Anumaya Kotia lamaugafa aligatigahe hutenea kano maine.” huno hamapai-maine.

Hamanepaigeya agai kea hefalakiya hu-haviya havaya hutageno Poloa “Kefo kava nehae.” huno kenaale hanea kugukege yayaga aifopo huneataleno mage huno hamapaiye “Tamakaya Anumaya Kotitegati fananema hisayana tamakaitami yanagi nagai yana omalene. Menia nagaya tamatalena Isaleli veane omainaya veapi mo hamapaigahue.” huno humaine.
Huteno amataleno nago kanoa Anumaya Koti agi alisaga nehia kanomo nopi uno maine. Ani kanomo agia Titiusi Yasatusie. Ani kanomo nona Yuta vaya mono nomo avate hane.

Ani mono note soka kanomoa Kalisipusiene mukia agaia anagaaene Anumayamofe haviya amakupi malageya kasagoya Kolini mainaya veamogamina Poloa hamapaigeya Yisasife haviya amakupi maleya amametiti hutageno tina fale-matene.

Nago kegela Anumayamoa himonafi evayi huno Polofena mage huno hapaimaine “Kolia ohuka tokiyaage huka kea hamanepaika oatalo. Nagaya kagaiene mainoe. Maigahuanagino nago kanomoa hetino ali haviya huokategahayanagiya nagaini veala kasagoya mani kumatela mainae.” huno humaine.
Higeno Poloa ani kumatela nago kafugi sikisia (6) ikanagi huno ani vayapi maineno Anumaya Koti kea hamapai-maine

Hamapaiyanagi Kalioa “Kaliki kumate kava yagaiyo.” huya Lomu kava vayamoya hutageno kava yagaino mainea kanafina Yuta vayamoya alitalu huya Polona atafa huya Yasi kanomote avaleya mage huya mo hae “Ma kanomoa tagaila Lomu vayamogami kahegi kea atagaeno veafe mage huno nehie ‘Maa hutama Anumaya Koti agia alisaga hiho.’ huno humave-nelie.” huya hae.

Hageno Poloa kenonaamia hamapaigahe hianagi Kalioa mage huno hamapaiye “Yuta vayamogatama ani kanomoa tusia kefo kava hileasina kanale huna namena mailava huna mainena havuleasinagi tamakaya havige havage nehatagetama agilefe nehagi tamakaitami kahegi kehe nahavinegayanagi ani kea ohavigahue tamakaitami fako hiho. Nagaya naa augafa kema haviyafena nonahaiye” huno humaine.
Ani kea huteno kaiyeke havi nopitila hemanati-talene.
Hemanati-talegeya Yuta vayamogami mono note soka kanomona Sosetenesina atafa huya kaiyeke havi kumamo avate aiko-neliyana Kalioa “Aoteyamaae.” nehuno oagene.

Naama nehayana Poloa mukia kanafima nemaiya afuaganagamina amataleno Palisilaene Akuilaene anavaleno tipi kalefi haisaga humaiya Senikalia uteya Silia eneuya Poloa Anumaya Koti aufima hulokiya vaino kema humainea yafe aiyolagefa laga humaine.

Huteno Efesusi uvayi huteya Poloa Yuta vayamogami mono nopi hai-faleno Yuta vayaene huge havige nehigeya mage hae “Mani kumatela ayaaya kana maisane.” huya hayanagi “Aao.” nehuno amataleno ugahe mage huno hie “Anumaya Kotia haisigenahena haenagaa etena tamakaitega egahue.” huno humateteno Palisilaene Akuilaene neanataleno Efesusiti tipi kalefi asaga humaino elavi-maine.
Sisalia elavi-vayi huteno Yelusalemu haino Yisasi veane moli falu fala huneamateno Atioku lavi-maine.
Anile ayaaya kana maiteno neamataleno Yisasi veane ali lokiya vaimatetele huno alu kumate kumate vaiyatete huno mukia Kalesia kumateene Faligia kumateene ute ete humaine.

Nagola Yuta kanomo agia Apolosie kuma aepaa Alekasatalia kanogino Efesusi uvayi humaine. Ani kanoa kanaleya huno kea nehavia kanogino maineno Anumaya Koti autamafi hanea kea havilama huno havilinea kanoe.
Apolosia Anumayamo kea havilama hulineno aya mukiki huno kanale kavaage nehuno Yisasifena hamapaiyanagi Yonia tima falematenea yafeke havilinegi Yisasi agile ti falemate kavafena ohavine.
Yuta vayamogami mono nopi haino tokiyaage kea hamapaigeana Palisilaene Akuilaene haviteana avaleana vaayamogani Anumaya Koti auava yafena moli fatago huana aveli-mainae.

Aveliageno Apolosia Akaiya ugahe Yisasi anagaamoya aya huya Akaiya maineya Yisasi kema nehaviya veate avona kaeya mage hae “Apolosina avaletama falu fala huteho.” huya kae-malageno anile alino uvayi higeya Anumaya Koti kayone yamaaleti Yisasife haviya amakupi maleya amametiti humainaya veamogamina amaya humaine.

Mukia vea amaufina tokiyaage kea huno Yuta veamoya havilama ohunayafene huno Anumaya Koti autamafiti kea hapalino hamapaino “Yisasia Anumaya Kotima taugafa aligatigahe hutenea kano maine.” huno avopitila hapalino hamapaimaine.
Apolosia Kolini mainegeno Poloa agoyalega hanea kumayagale vaiyatete huno Efesusi uvayi huno nagoa Yisasina amakua amitafa humainaya veanea amake-maine.

Amaketeno mage huno hamavike “Yisasife havitama tamakupi maletama tamametiti nehaya kanafina Alu Aotage Avamula ali-mainafi oalinae?” huno hamavigegeya “Aao, ‘Alu Aotage Avamula maine.’ huya haya kea ohavinone.” huya hae.
Hageno Poloa mage huno hamavige “Hanaa li falelamatenae?” huno hamavigegeya mage hae “Yoni ti falelatenae.” huya humainae.

Hageno Poloa mage huno hie “Yonia mage nehuno tina falematene ‘Kefo yatamihena tamakua aiyahae hisagena tina fale-lamategahue.’ huno nehuno veala mage huno hamapai-maine ‘Nagai nakavelaga esia kanomofe, havitama tamakupi maletama tametiti hiho.’ huno humaineana Yisasife huno humaineane.”
Huno higeya ani kea haviyanagino Efesusi veamogamina Anumayatimoa Yisasi agile tina falematene.
Fale-mateteno Poloa ayana amanute malegeno Alu Aotage Avamula amakaite elavino egeya amaku amakesafiti nohaviya kea, alu amake alu amake aiya Anumayamo avayafiti hamapaiya kea hufalote humainae.
Ani vayala tuelufua (12) vaya mainae.
Poloa tagufa (3) ikana Yuta veamogami mono nopi ute ete huno tokiyaage kea huno Anumaya Koti kava yagaisia yafe amakua ali hetino hamapai-maine.

Hamanepaiyanagi nagoa vayamoya amaku amakesa ailineleya tokiyaage ke huya “Havige nehananagita tagupina ali omalegahune.” huya mukia vea amaufi Yisasi kea hu-haviya hutageno Poloa neamataleno Yisasife haviya amakupi malenaya veala amavaleno mukia kanafina efi efi huno Tilanusi humavenelia nopi mo huhaleno hamapai-maine.
Tole kafu ania huno hamanepaigeya mukia Esia mainaya veanea Yuta veanene Kaliki veanene Anumayamo kea havimainae.
Anumaya Kotia Polo ayapi tokiya avame yana humaine.
Nehigeya veamoya akasipiene kenaene Polo augafale akasaseteya kali vayate aliya vageno kaliamimoa kanale humategeno amakusafiti Kefo Avamuyaga hati-laviya umainae.

Nagoa Yuta vayamoya Kefo Avamula veamogami amakusafinagati amanati neatalaya vayamoya Kefo Avamula amakusafima mainea veate Yisasi agi neayeya mage huya humainae “Poloma tahanepaiya kanoa, Yisasi, agile Kefo Avamumoga amakusafinagatila hati-lavika evuo huna kahanepauve.” huya humainae.
Ani kavama nehaya vayala sevenia (7) ne nafaneyaga ala mono nopi kava yagai-mainea kanomo nafaneyaga Sikeva nafaneyagamoya ani kavala humainae.
Nago yupa ani kava nehageno Kefo Avamumoa mage huno kenonaamia humaine “Yisasina ago agetena Polona age-mainogi tamakaya tagatamae?” huno humaine.

Higeno Kefo Avamuma agusafinaga mainea kanomoa ani sevenia (7) vayamogamite haiteno asaga hunelavino amakaseno nehamaeno amaugafa tusiya huno alihaviya humateteno kenaamiene ali hatata hutalegeya amaugafa alapaage ani nopitila hati-laviya falemainae.
Mani kea Efesusi mainaya veala Yuta veanene Kaliki veanene haviteya koli nehuya Anumayatimona Yisasi agia tusiya huya alisaga humainae.
Hageya kasagoyamoya Yisasifena haviya amakupi maleya amametiti nehuya kefo kavama haya kavafena hufalote humainae.

Hufalote huteya sesefe yaamiene tusa huneamataya yaamiene analisa yaamiene ani yayagahema kae-malenaya avoyaga mukia vea amaufi atafi kaesagali-talenae. Kae-mainaya avoma miya humainaya monema hapaliyana fifiti tausenia (50,000) kina hapali-mainae.
Anima tokiyaage kavama humainea kavafena mukia kotega mo hamanepaiya Anumayamofena haviya amakupi malageno tokiyaage humaine.
Ani yayagamoa hano hutegeno Alu Aotage Avamumoa Polona visia agu agesa amigeno mage huno hie “Masetonia umaigena Akaiya etena Yelusalemu uvayi hisuaamona Lomu visua nagesa nehavue.” huno humaine.
Huteno tole hanemayaa kanolatana Timotiene Elasatusiene hunategeana Masetonia vaageno Poloa agaiage anile nagoene Esia kotega maine.
Ani kanafina Yisasi kea nohaviya veamoya Yisasi akave nemalaya kehena tusiya huya hetiya ke vaiya amakoya ke humainae.

Ani kotega vayamoya yafateti nago akefa amayateti talo huya “Anumayati maine.” huteya agia Atemisie huya nehae. Huya hageno nago kanomo agia Temitiliusie efe mone atafi kaeteno ani moneleti ani akefamo agima alisaga nehaya nona, osi osi nona talo higeya veamoya miya hageya taloma nehaya vayamoya tusia mone nealiyane.

Nealiyanagino Temitiliusia mukia agaia aliya vayaene mukia osi osi Atemisina nomaa taloma nehaya vayaene ke higeya melitalu hageno mage huno hama-paiye “Vemogatama tamakaya havimainae ani aliyateti kanale monetia nealune.

Nealunanagi ani kanoa, Poloe, mukia Efesusi nemaiya veanene mukia Esia kotega nemaiya veanenefe ‘Amayateti taloma haya anumaya afa yatafa hanegi Anumaya omainae.’ huno higeya mukia veamoya ‘Tamage nehane.’ huya akave malaya kea ago havitama age-mainae.

Poloma hia kemoa tagai aliyatimo agia alino haviya havaya hutegeya Esia nemaiya veanene alu mopalega veanene agima alisaga nehaya Atemisina atalesageno lavisigeya veamoya ‘Anumayati maine.’ huya agia alisaga ohisageno Atemisi agima alisaga nehaya nofena ‘Afa yatafa hane.’ huya hugahae.” huno humaine.
Higeya alitalu humainaya veamoya ani kea havigeno amaipamoa tusiya huno ata legeya mage huya hae “Atemisia Efesusi mainona vayamogatina tusia ala anumayati maine.” huya humainae.

Hageya mukia ani kumate veamoya ala kenake nehuya Poloenema vaiyatete nehaa kanolatana tolea Masetoniati kanolatane Kaiyusiene Alisatakusiene anavayu huya alitaluma nehaya kumapi anavaleya amaiyayeya umainae.
Vageno Poloa “Amunoamifi kaiyeke mo hisue.” huno hianagi afuaganaya “Ougane.” huya atafa humainae.
Atafa hageya nagoa Polona kanapaamoya ani Esia kumate Lomu kava vayamoya ania huya agaitega kea atalageno egeya mage huya tokiyaage kea hae “Kagaya veama alitalu haya kumapina ovuo.” huya humainae.

Hageya alitalu humainaya veamoya amaku amakesamoa yagalegeya nagoa veamoya nago kea hageya nagoa veamoya alu kea hageya tusiya huya ala kenakea hageya kasagoya veanema alitalu humainaya yamona aepaa ohavinae.
Ohavigeya nagoa Yuta veamoya “Mage huka huo.” huya Alekasatana ayetufageno amunoamifi mo hetino ani kemo aepaa hamapaigahe “Afaa maiho.” huno ayana aligosi-gosi humaine.

Aligosi-gosi hianagi Yuta kanoma mainea yafe agelama huteya nagoke amavayage ailalupeya mage hae “Atemisia Efesusi mainona vayamogatina tusia ala anumayati maine.” huyama maiya hayana tole yagemo kanafi ani keageyana maiya humainae.

Nehageno haenagaa ani kumate avo kae aliyate kanomoa alitalu humainaya vayamogamina ali hakayufeno mage hie “Efesusi vayamogatama Atemisina anumayatimo agima alisaga nehaya nona Efesusi kumatema kanaleya huno kava neyagaiya yafena hana veamoya ohavinae? Ikapinagati elavi-mainea yafana nagaluma humalenaya yafafena kanaleya huta kava yagai-mainonagi hana veamoya ohavinae? Mukiamoya ago havimainae.
Havimainayanagiya mani kea hefala okigahagi tamakaya afaa maiho. Nagola aifonafo kavala ohiho.
Anavaletama aya kanolatamogania Atemisi agima alisaga nehuna nopitila nagaluma humalenona yana musufa yana ohunae. Tagaiti anumayatimona Atemisife huhaviyana hu-oatenae.
Ala kaiyeke havisia kanomoa nagoa kanafi kaiyeke havi nopi maineno kaiyekea havigahigi Timitiliasiene agaiene aliya nealiya vayamoya ‘Kema hane.’ hinuyahena ani kanomote visae.
Ugahagi alu yafema hinutamahena kamani vayamoyama alitalu hisagetamahena ani kea fatago hiho.
Ma yagefima hu-mainona yafena kamani vayamoya ‘Tu nehae.’ huya tahavigesagetahena hana kanomo hetino anima keha keha nehaya yamona aepaa hamapaigahie?” huno humaine.
Avo kae aliyate kanomoa mani kea huteno “Notamilega ataletama viho.” huno hemanatigeya umainae.

Kema ayeso haya kemoa hano hutegeno Poloa Yisasina amakua amitafa humainaya veafe ke higeya agaite ageno tokiyaage huya maisaya amaku amakesa alino hapaiteno hu falu fala humateteno amataleno Masetonia haigahe haimaine.
Ani kotega vai neayeno mukia kanafina tokiyaage huya maisaya kea hamapaiteno Kaliki kotega elavi-maine.

Elavino tagufa (3) ika emaiteno Silia eugahe “Tipi kale alisue.” huno hiana Yuta vayamoya agaila haesaya kema haya kea hageno haviteno agesa aiyahae huno tipi kalea neataleno “Etena mopafi Masetonia kotega agasena haigahue.” huno humaine.

Agaienema tokaeya haiya vayala Pilusi nafanemo agia Sopatae Pelia kumate kanoene Tesalonaikati Alisatakusiagi Sekutasigani Tepi kumateti kanoa Kaiyusiene Timotiene Esia kanolatana Tikikusigani Talofimusiganie naa vayayaga Poloene hai-mainae.
Ani vayayaga euhagoteya Taloasi kumate tagava maigahe eumainae.

Euya mainageta tagaya Filipai maineta hale oki kaihame nenaya imu kiya naya kanamoa hano hutegeta tipi kalefi haisaga humaita faefua (5) tau faeta tina lakaeta amakaitega Taloasi euvayi huta sevenia (7) yupa ani kumatela mainone.
Sota yupa Anumayamo agile kave negahe alitalu humainonageno Poloa egama visia yafe huhaleno mono kea tahapaino hume hume nevigeno kege amunokefa maino humaine.
Mainoma hiana anafi kikalo humalenaya nopi maunanagino kasagoya kaniyaga ayevasa humalageta mainone.

Mainonageno nago neyana Yutikusie akalogate mopale mainegeno Poloa mono kea ayaayate maino hume hume vigeno Yutikusina aukalo kalo higeno aula faeno fae latapalino fae-mainefiti anale tagufa (3) ayekalo huya kimalenaya nopitilagino ani akalogapiti asaga hulavino mopafi tavino haegeno faligeya molisaga huya agayana ago fali-maine.
Fali-mainegeno Poloenena lavino mo anu-kilineno mage hie “Atali talua ohiho. Ago fali-maineanagi eteno haimula nealie.” huno humaine.
Huteno ani nopinaga eteno haino maineno kaihame maya kolino higeya nenageno ani kavela neteno ayaaya mono ke amakaiene huge huge nehigeno kola ali halegeno neamataleno umaine.
Vigeno ani neyana eteno haegafa huno maigeya avaleya notega neuya tusia muse nehuya amaipamoa kanale humaine.
Tagaya uhagoteta tipi kale alitonageno Poloa “Mopafi Asosi utesugetama anileti tipi kalefina navalegahae.” huno higeta tipi kalefi Asosi mogava mainone.
Asosi agava maineta Polona avaleta tipi kalefi asaga humaita Mitilini kumate umainone.
Uteta anileti tipi kalefi mo faeteta Kiosi kumate uvayi huta ani lipi kalefi faeteta Samosi mo faeteta Miletusi evayi humainone.
Poloa “Afulea kanahe muse hisaya imu kisaya kana Yelusalemu evayi hisuafene.” huno ayaaya kana Esia kotega omaisia agesa haviteno “Efesusia ago agasena ugahue.” huno humaine.

Poloa Miletusiti vaya humateno “Efesusi utama soka vayafe nagaitega esaya ke hamapaiho.” huno higeya uya mo hamapaigeya agaitega ageno mage huno hamapaiye tamakaya ago agemainae nagaya hagotena Esia kotega evayima humainoa kanafina aepa hena humainoa kavala ago agemainae.
Naugafa alina ohainogi Anumayamo aliya nealugeya Yuta vayamoya mukia kanafina hu-haviya hunatagena tusia avite-mainoe.
Avia atoanagi atalia ohuna mukia lamaku tamamema ali lokiya vaisaya kea atalutamifiene notamifi notamifiene Anumaya Koti kea huhalena tamahapai-mainoe.
Tamahapaina Yuta veanene Kaliki vayanenefe “Kefo yatamihe tamakua aiyahae hutama Anumayatimona Yisasife havitama lamakupi maletama tametiti hiho.” huna huhalena tamaha-pai-mainoe.
Tamahapai-mainogi menia agegeho Alu Aotage Avamumoa “Yelusalemu haiyo.” huno nahapaiyanagina anilega visugeyama vayamoya hunatesaya kavala nagaya ohavinoe.
Ohavinogi mukiama umainoa kumatela Alu Aotage Avamumoa mage huno nahapai-maine “Tusia kanaage yama hugatesaya yana falote hugateno nofipina kategahae.” huno nahapai-maine.

Nahapai-maineanagi nagaya falisufi afaa maisufi afa yatafa hane huna nagesa nehavugi Anumayatimoa Yisasi naminea aliyama, veafe Anumaya Kotia tusia kayone hulatenea kanale mono kea huhalena hamapaisua aliyana ali hano hisua nagesa nehavue.
Tamakai amunopina vaiyatete huna Anumaya Koti kava yagai-lamatesia kea tamahanepauvanagina menia lamahanepaugi haviho nagaya havimainoe haenagaa nagaila naukipalela nagoene onagegahae.

Ani yafe menia tamagelafa huna tamahanepauve nagaya kolia ohuna mukia Anumaya Koti agu agesafima hanea kea ago tamahapai-mainoafe nago kanomoga Anumaya Kotitegati fananema hisanana tamakaitami yane. Ani kemoa nagaipina omegahie.
Omegahigi tamakaya tamaugafa kayetama maiho. Alu Aotage Avamumoa “Kava yagai-mateho.” huno lamaminea vayala, Anumayamoa agaia kolamaaleti miya humalenea sipi sipilelela kava yagaiho.
Nagaya nehavue tamatalenama visuana nagoa vayala, kaveage afela kalamo nehia kava huya tamakai amunopi esayaamoya Yisasife haviya amakupi malenaya sipi sipiyaga ali haviya hugahae.
Ali haviya hugahagi tamakai amunopitila nagoa vayamoya hetiya havigea mohu haviya mehu haviya nehuya Yisasife haviya amakupi malenaya veala “Tagai takave eho.” huya amavayu hugahae.

Ani kavama hisaya yafena kayeho. Nagaya tagufa (3) kafufina felugaene kegeene kasalonahae huna maifalua ohunoe. Avia neatena mukiamogatamina tamaku tamakesa nagoke nagokemogatamina tamaumonola malogetama havimainagi ani yafe tamakesa ali hao hutama haviho.
Menia Anumaya Koti ayapi tamatogeno agaia kayone hulamatesia keamoa tamakaila alino tokiyaage hulamateteno mukia agaia alu aotage veaneamogamima neamatea kanale yana tamamigahie.
Nagaya nagoa vayamogatama mone afenotamileene kukenatamileene agena nahayea nohuane.
Tamakaitamia agayana nayapiti aliyana alina nesua yaene nagaienema lokaeya nemaiya vayamoya nesaya yaene ali falote hugetama age-mainae.

Naa nehuna mukia yana tamavelina mage huna humainoe “Aliya alitetama kalima nealiya vayala amaya hiho.” Anumayatimoa Yisasi humainea kea mage humaine “Veamoya nago yama alisayana muse hugahagi afuaganana nago yana amisiana tusiya huno musena hugahie. Aminea yamo muse yamoa ali-mainea muse yana agase-maine.” huno humainea kea tamakesa havi havi hutama maiho huno humaine.
Mani kea huteno soka vayaene Poloa aleya ayeno Anumayamotega ke huno havige-maine.

Havigetegeya mukia soka vayamoya tusia avi neateya Polona anukiya atako ataka nehuya haenagaama agai aukipalema nagoene oagesaya yafe hamaumana halegeya avia ateteya tipi kale hanelega avaleya umainae.
Amataleta tipi kalefi unaamogata Kosi kumate mo faeteta lina takaeta Lotesi uvayi huta mo faeteta lina lakaeta Patala uvayi humainone.
Uvayi huta nagola hagelipi kalea agonana Fonisia kotega ugahe nehigeta ani lipi kalefi haisaga humaita umainone.
Neuta Saipalusi mogonana haoga laya kaiyaga hanegeta neataleta Silia uta tipi kalemoa afenoyaga atalegahe higeta Taiya limo agegayalega lavi-mainone.

Anile tatalegeta Yisasife haviya amakupi malenaya anagafe momatiyeta ali falote huteta amakaiene sevenia (7) kana mainonageno Alu Aotage Avamumoa hamapaigeya haviteya Polofena “Yelusalemua ovuo.” huya hapai-mainae.

Hapaitageta amakaienema mauna kanamoa hanoma nehiana katega ugahe nehunageya mukiamoya aneamiene nafaneamiene tavaleya kumala ataleya vageta ti agegayalega hanea kahaepate mo latalegahe hageta taleya moyeta nunamu humainone.
Nunamuna huteta hufalu fala humateta “Maiho.” humateteta tipi kalefi haisaga humaunageya eteya noamilega emainae.
Taili kumala ataleta Tolemesi uvayi huta Yisasife haviya amakupi malenaya anagala hu falu fala huneamateta amakaienena nagoke kana kanoa mainone.

Maita faeteta amataleta Sisalia uvayi huta Filipi nopi umainone. Ani Filipie kanomoa Yisasi ke hamanepaiya kanogino Yelusalemu kave amamite amamite hisaya yafe hapaliya humatenaya sevenia (7) vayapiti kanogita ani kanoene umainone.
Umainonageno ani kanomoa foa (4) vele omainaya munanea mainayanagino Anumaya Kotia avayafiti hamapaiya kea huya amaune laga nehaya munaneyaga mainae.
Mainageta lagaya anile tole lagufa kana mainonageno nagola Anumaya Koti aune kanoa Agapusie nehaya kanoa Yutiati elavi-vayi humaine.

Takaite evayi huno Polo amunofila melino agaia aiya ayate kisalu negino mage huno hie “Alu Aotage Avamumoa mage huno nahapaiye ‘Yelusalemu mainaya Yuta vayamoya ma kava huya mani amunofimona nefana aiya ayate kisalu kiteya vayamoya haesageno falisiafe Yuta veane omainaya vayamogami amayapi ategahae.’ huno hikena havitena mani kavala me nehue.” huno humaine.
Higeta anima hia kea haviteta tagaiene ani kumate veanene mage huta hapaune “Pologa museka nehunagi Yelusalemua ohaiyo.” huta hutenone.

Nehunana Poloa mage huno humaine “Naa higetama avia neatetama nagu nagesa ali haviya nehae? Nagaya Anumayanimona Yisasi nagua amitafa humainoafe nagaya nagesa talo tala huna Yelusalemu haisugeya natafa huya nofipi nateteya nahaesagenama falisuana kanalele huna nehue.” huno humaine.
Higeta haviteta kenonaa haopaita mage huta humainone “Anumayatimoa havimaineanagino haisia kavala hisie.” huta humainone.
Ani kea huteta lagaya ali lalo tala nehuta Yelusalemu haimainone.
Haunana nagoa Sisalia lafu-taganaya tagaiene haigeta Yelusalemua hai vayi hunageya nagola Saipalusi kanomo agia Nasonie agai notega tavaleya vageta umainone. Nasonia nayona Yisasi anagapi maineane.
Yelusalemua hai vayi hunageya tafu-taganaya tusi muse huya ali falu fala hulateya lavale-mainae.
Lavaleya vageta mo faeteta Poloa tagaiene Yemesi agegahe neunageya mukia soka vayayaga anile emainae.
Ageno Poloa “Mainafio.” huno hu falu fala huneamateno Anumaya Kotima aya higeno Yuta vea omainaya veamogami amunopi ali-mainea aliyafe hamapailama huno hamapaiye.

Poloma hia kea haviteya Anumaya Koti agia alisaga huya Polofe mage huya hae “Kasagoya tausenia veamoya Yisasife haviya amakupi maleya amametiti nehaya Yuta veapiti Yelusalemu mainaya veamoya Mosese kahegi kema akave malesaya amaku amakesa humainae.

Nehuya kagayama mukia Yuta vea omainaya veapi mainaya Yuta vayamogamife ‘Mosese kahegi kea neataletama nafanetamimogami amakoya anoya laga ohutama nayoma Yuta vayamoya mainaya auava yana atale ho.’ huka humainana kehena hamapaigeya ago havimainae.
Havimainagi kagayama evayi humainana kema havinuya hisageta na kava hugahune?
Nago yafe kahapaigahe hunagi kahapaisuna kavala akave huo. Foa (4) vayala Anumaya Koti aulagafina hulokiya vaiya kea humalenaya vayala manile mainae.

Mainayanagika mukia vayamoya kagaifema agoma havimainaya kehema ‘Havige nehae.’ huya hisayafena kagaife ‘Anumaya Koti kahegi kemo akave nemale.’ huya hu-gatesayafena ani foa (4) vayala amavaleka amakaienena Anumaya Koti aulagafina oniyaage yama omalesia kavala huka kagaikaa monea miya hisanageya amayolagefa laga humatesae.

Yuta vea omainaya veama Yisasife haviya amakupi maleya amametiti nehaya veamogamife tagaya nayona avona kaeta huhaya gi-malenona kea mage huta humainone ‘Fali-mainaya veafe amakisana vaiya atupa kave alisaga huya malesaya kavela oneho. Kolamoa agusafinaga hanesia afuene kolaenena oneho. Ane munane amavayu nehisaya yana ataleho.’ huta ago avona kaeta hamapai-mainone.” huya humainae.

Hageno Poloa faeteno ani foa (4) vayala amavaleteya amaugafaene amakuaene sese nehaya kava huteya ala mono nopi haigeno Poloa mono nopi mainaya kava vayafe mage huno humaine “Laugafaene taguaene Anumaya Koti aulagafina oniyaage otahaisia kava huta sese huteta maineta ma yupa eta tahaote tahaote Anumaya Kotina sipi sipia heta amigahune.” huno humaine.

Ani sevenia (7) kanamoa hano hugahe nehigeya nagoa Esiati Yuta vayala elaviyaamoya Poloa ala mono nopi mainegeya megeteya mukia alitalu humainaya veamogami amaipa ali haviya huya ali hetimateteya Polona atafa humainae.

Atafa huteya mage hae “Isaleli vayamogata laya hiho. Ma kanomoa mukia kumate vayamogamina mage huno humave-nelie ‘Isaleli vayaene Mosese kahegi kene mono noamiene afa yayaga hane.’ huno nehuno nagoa Yuta vea omainaya vayala Kaliki kotegati vayala ma ma nagalu humalenea nopina amavaleno egeya mani nona ali haviya nehageno oniyaage nehie.” huya humainae.

Naafene nago yupa Poloa Talofimusiene ala kumapi vaiyateti nehaageya age-mainayanagiya Talofimusia Efesusiti kano maineanagiya amakesafinaga havige nehuya “Poloa ani Yuta vea omainea kanoa tagaila ala mono notifi avaleno haimaine.” huya havige humainae.

Hageya mukia ani kumate veamoya ani kema haviya kemoa amaipa ali hetigeya amaiyayeya molitalu huteya Polona atafa huya mono nopinagatila avayu vaye nehageya ani mono nomo fitayaga mukia aliya kimainae.
Polona ago maiya nehayageno Lomu ati vayate kava kanomoa mukia Yelusalemu veamoya ke vaiya tusia lu maiya nehae huya haya kea havimaine.
Haviteno ati kava vayaaene ati vayayagaene amavalegeya amaiyayeya amakaite elaviya ageya ani vayamoya ala kava kanoene ati vayaaene ageya ageteya Polona nagoene ohaeya ataleya mainae.

Ataleya mainageno ati vayate kava kanomoa Polona metafa huno “Tole seni nofiteti aiya ayate kisalu kiho.” huno nehuno alitalu humainaya vayafe mage huno hamavige “Mani kanoa tae? Hana augafa havi kava higetama ani kavala nehae?” huno hamavige-maine.

Hamavigegeya nagoa vayamoya nagoa kea nehageya nagoa vayamoya alu kea nehageya maiya tusia keyeso haya kemona aepaa havilama ohuno ati vayamogamife mage hie “Lagaiti lokiyaage nopinaga avaletama viho.” huno humaine.

Higeya mukia veamoya amakave keyeso hume hume neuya mage hae “Haesageno falisie.” huya hume hume nevageya ani nomo fiate avaleya vageya mukia vayamoya tusiya huya tu hisaya kava hayakehe ati vayamoya Polona avalesaga huya anale avaleliya umainae.

Ati vayamoya tokiyaage nopinaga avaleya haigahe nehageno Poloa ati vayate kava kanomofe mage huno humaine “Nago kea kahapaigahe nehuana kanalepio?” huno havigegeno ati vayate kava kanomoa mage hie “Kagaya Kaliki kea havilinano?

Kagaya Isipiti kanogika mukia vayafena ‘Kamani vayaene tu hugahune.’ huka huteka tu huge huge nehaya vayala fo tausenia (4,000) vayala kame kotega amavaleka umainana kano mainane huna nagesa nehavugi kagaya ani kano mainapio?” huno havige.

Higeno Poloa mage huno humaine “Nagaya Yuta kano mainoe. Silisia kotega agi hanea kumala Tasusie kuma aepania hane. Museka nehugi nagaya alitalu humainaya veamogamina nago kea hamapaisufio?” huno havige-maine.

Havigegeno “Kanalelagi hamapaiyo.” huno higeno Poloa ani nomo fiate heti-maineno kema aepa hegahena “Afaa maiho.” huno ayana alisaga higeya alitalu humainaya vayamoya kea ohuya mainageno Poloa amakaiami kea Hipalu kefiti Yuta vayamogamina hamapai-maine.
Poloa ati vayamogami tokiya nomo fiate heti-maineno mage huno hamapaiye “Nafunaganagatamaene nenafagatamaene haviho nagaya havi kavala ohunoa ke lamahapaigahe hugi haviho.” huno hie.
Higeya Yuta vayamoya amakaiami kea Hipalu kefiti hia kea haviteya ke ohuya mainageno hamapaiye.

Nagaya Yuta kano mainoe. Itanimoa natenea kumala ala kola Silisiae osi kumania Tasusie nateneanagina manima mainona kumate Yelusalemu emainena ala huna Kamalielia mukia taginago-vanagomogami kahegi kemo aepaa hu-naveligena havimainoanagitama tamakaya meni kanafima Anumaya Koti kema akave malaya kava huna tusiya huna nagula amitafa humainoane.
Nagaya nayona Yisasi akave nehaya veala tusiya huna ali haviya humatetena hamaena fali-mategahe venenene anene amatafa huna nofiteti kisalu kimatetena nofipi amavalena amatenoane.

Ani kavama humainoa kea ala mono nopi uhagote mainea kava kanoene Kanisole vayaene age-mainayanagiya tamahapaigahae. Ani vayamoya nago autama kaeya namiteya “Tamasigusi mainaya tafu-taganagamitega alika vuo.” huya hagena alina mage huna hue “Yisasi akave nevaya vayala Tamasigusi momatafa huna nofiteti kisalu kimatetena amakata aisia ya alisaya yafe Yelusalemu amavalena egahue.” huna humainoane.
Yagemoa amunokano higena Tamasigusi uvayi hugahe hugeno aupaa ikapinagatila tusia hale yamo nagaitela meyevasa humaine.
Meyevasa higena mopafi asaga hu-lavitena havugeno nagola ala kefiti mage huno hie “Sologae Sologae naa higeka nagaila ali haviya hunenatane?” huno humaine.
Higena kenonaa mage huna hue “Alamogae kagaya tagae?” huna hugeno nagaifena mage hie “Nagaya Nasaleti Yisasinae. Nagaila maika ali haviya hunenatane.” huno humaine.
Higeya nagaienema mainaya vayamoya hale yamaa agayanagi nagaila kema nahapaiya agea ohavinae.
Ohavinagi nagaya mage hue “Alamogae naa hisue?” huna havigogeno mage huno hie “Hetika Tamasigusi ugenoo. Visanagenoa mukia aliyama alisana kea nago kanomoa kahapaigahie.” huno nahapaiye.
Nahapaigena nehavugeno hale yamaamoa tusiya huno aye vasa higenoagino naulaga oagogeya nagaienema umainona vayamoya nayate aligeta Tamasigusia umainone.

Unana nago kanomo agia Ananaiyasie anile nemaiyanagino tusiya huno Anumaya Koti kahegi kea akave nemalea kanogiya mukia ani kumatema mainaya Yuta veamoya “Kanale kano maine.” huya agia alisaga nehaiya kanoe.
Ani kanoa Ananaiyasie nagaila navate me heti-maineno mage huno humaine “Pologa nenafugae kaulagamoa eteno aigali hisie.” huno higeno naulagamoa aigali higena anile aupaa ani kanoa age-mainoe.

Neagogeno Ananaiyasia nagaifena mage huno nahapaiye “Taginagomoya agima alisaga humainaya Anumaya Kotia agaia haiya yafema havisana yafeene Fatagoma Humainea Kanomoma ageteka agai avayafiti kema havisanafene huno kagaila hapali-maine.
Hapali-maineanagika agaifena huhaleka hamanepaika age-mainana yafeene havimainana yafeene mukia vayamogamina hamapaigane.
Naa higeka agava mainane? Hetika ugeya Yisasi agile tina falegatesageno Anumaya Kotia kefo yakaa aye hami-taleno.” huno humaine.
Higena nagaya etena Yelusalemu emainena ala mono nopi haina Anumayamotega havinegena nagola himona kana yana age-mainoe.
Agoana Yisasina agogeno nagaifena mage huno humaine “Male mainaya veamoya nagaifema hisana kehena ‘Tamage nehane.’ huya ohavigahagi Yelusalemua neataleka kaiyayeka alu kumate vuo.” huno humaine.

Higena nagaya mage hue “Anumayanimogae nagaya mukia Yuta veamogami mono nopi falege falege huna kagaifema haviya amakupi malenaya veala amavalena kina nopi mo humatetena kayona neamamina humainoa kea mani vayamoya ago havilinae.

Havilinagi Sitivenia kagaifema hamanepaiya kanoma hayagenoma faligena nagaya avate heti-mainena ‘Kanale kava nehae.’ huna hayaya vayamogamina kenaamile yagaina mainogeya hayageno fali-maine.” huno hamapaiye.
Higeya Anumayamoa nagaifena mage huno humaine “Hetika vuo. Nagaya hugatesugeka ayaaya kotega Yuta veane omainaya veapi hugategahue.” huno higena havimainoe huno humaine.
