“Yuta vea omainaya veapi ugahuema.” hia keleti amaipa haviya nehuya ala kegefafiti Polofena mage huya hae “Haegeno falino. Naa augafa kanomoa afaa omaigahigi ago haegeno falino.” huya humainae.

Ala kenake nehuya siotaamia asagi neataleya kugukegeya kateya hagayu hu neatageno ati vayate ala kava kanomoa mage hie “Hailagi ataleho.” nehuno ati vayamogamife “Tokiya notifi Polona avaletama haiho. Vayayagamoya ala kefitima Polona ‘Haegeno falino.’ huya haya kemona aepaama havisuafe hegi kayoteti Polona aikolisageno ani kemona aepaa tahapaisie.” huno humaine.

Higeya avaleya hegi kayoteti haegahe nofiteti kineatageno Poloa ani aliyate kava neyagaiya ati kanomofena mage huno havige “Lomu kahegi kemoa ‘Kanalelagi Lomu nofi kanomona kaiyekea havitama fatago hutama kaiyekea huoatenetama hegi kayotetila haeho.’ huno humainefi?” huno hamavige-maine.
Higeno ati vayatema kava neyagaiya kanomoa anima hia kea haviteno anile ataleneno ala kava kanomote mage huno mo hie “Kagaya hanaa hugane? Mani kanoa fatago huno Lomu nofi kano maine.” huno hapaiye.
Higeno ati vayate ala kava kanomoa Polote eno mage huno havige “Kagaya Lomu nofi kano mainano?” huno havigegeno Poloa “E.” huno humaine.

Higeno ati vayate ala kava kanomoa mage hie “Nagaya kamani vayala kasagoya monenia miyana amamitena Lomu nofi kano hapae-mainoe.” huno higeno Poloa mage hie “Kagaya ania humainanagi nagaya itanimoa nategena Lomu nofi kano fatago huna mainoe.” huno humaine.

Higeya hegi kayoteti amigahema haya vayamoya ani kea haviteya anile aupaa neataleya vageno ati vayate ala kava kanomoa havigeno “Poloa Lomu nofi kano fatago huno mainegena nofila hutenoe.” huno tusi yate kolia humaine.

Kolia nehuno mo faeteno egamaga Yuta vayamoyama Polofe “Ma kava humaine.” huya humainaya kemona aepaa havigahe ayapiti nofila kalu heneateno ala mono note kava vayaene mukia Yuta vayamogami Kanisole vayaenefe “Melitalu hiho.” huno higeya melitalu humaletageno Polona avaleno elavino amunoamifi me hetitene.

Poloa Kanisole vaya amaulagafi agesagali-maineno mage huno humaine “Nafunaganagatamae nagaya kanale ka vai neayena mukia kanafiene meni kanafiene Anumaya Koti aulagafina naguamoa nagola havi kavala ohune huna nehue.” huno humaine.
Higeno mono notema uhagote mainea kava kanomo agia Ananaiyasie avatema hetiya maiya vayafena mage hie “Avayale kayo aikoliho.” huno humaine.

Higeno Poloa agaifena mage huno hapaiye “Kagaya nagaifena ‘Haeho.’ huka nehananagi Anumaya Kotia kagaila kahaegahie. Kagaya haviya hia kegiyamo agupile efe peni fale-malenea kana augafa kava nehuka kaguafina havi omaleka amegati savale kanomogae. Kagaya kahegi kefiti kaiyeke hunategahe nehuka ‘Haeho huka nehananagi ani kea ali neatagayane.” huno humaine.
Huno higeya Polo avate hetiya mainaya vayamoya mage hae “Kagaya Anumaya Koti mono note uhagote mainea kava kanomofena kanale ohunea kea nehano?” huya humainae.

Hageno Poloa mage hie “Nafunaganagatama musetami nehugi nagaya havi kava hue. Agayama mono note hagote kava kano maine kema havimainoleasina mani kea ohuleasinagi. Anumaya Koti autamafina mage huno kae-maleneane ‘Kava kanotamimofena kanale ohunesia kea ohiho.’ huya kae-malenagena age-mainoane.” huno nehie.

Huteno Poloa haviana nagoa Kanisole vayala Satiusi vayalagi nagoa Kanisole vayala Falasia vayalagi huya mainageno haviafene huno mage huno hamapaiye “Nagaya Falasia kanogina nenafaa Falasia kanomo nateneanagina nagaya ‘Fali-mainaya vayala hetigahae.’ huna nametiti nehua yateti kaiyekea hunategahe nehae.” huno humaine.
Mani kema higeya haviteya Falasia vayaene Satiusi vayaene amunoamifi tusia ke vaiteya ani Kanisolefitila tolefi ali fako faka humainae.

Naafene? Satiusi vayamoya mage huya nehae “Vayayagama fali-mainesafitila heotigahae.” huya nehuya “Ensole vayaene avamuene omainae.” huya nehayangiya Falasia vayamoya ani yayagahena “Lamage mainae.” huya nehayane.

Anileti ala kefiti tusia ke nevaiya nagoa Falasia vayapiti nagoa kahegi kema havilinaya vayamoya hetiya mage hae “Ma kanoma agonana havi kavama nehia yana omalene. Ensole kanofi avamumoafi hapai-mainesia kea havigu Anumaya Kotiene tu huyafenagita afaa atalesune.” huya humainae.

Nehageya kasagoya kema vaiya yateti ati vayate ala kava kanomoa Polona aluga alugati avayu hisalega amunopiti aiya aya ali akalupeyafene huno ati vayamogamife “Lavitama amunoamifiti Polona avalesaga hutama tokiyaage notifinaga avaletama moteho.” huno higeya movaleya umainae.

Ani kegela Anumayamoa Polo avate me heti-maineno Polofe mage huno hapaiye “Kolia ohuka kagu kamena ali lokiya vaika maiyo. Kagaya Yelusalemuma maineka nagaifema hamapai-mainana kava huka Lomua mo huhaleka hamapaigane.” huno humaine.

Faeteya koma neliana nagoa Yuta vayamoya alitalu huya mage hae “Polona haesunageno falisie. Anumaya Koti aulagafina tamagelafa nehune menia tiene kaveene mosita maineta falisia yupa hataka huta negahune. Haesunagenoma ofalisiana Anumaya Kotia ali-haviya hulatesie huya hulokiya vai-mainae.”
Ani kema hulokiya vai-mainaya vayala fotia (40) vayamoya humainae.

Ani vayayagamoya mono note kava vayateene soka vayateene uya mage huya mo hamapaiye “Lagaya Polona haesunageno falisie huta menia tiene kaveene mosita maineta falisia yupa hataka huta negahune huta Anumaya Koti aufina hulokiya nevaune.

Nevaunafe menia tamakayaene Kanisole vayaene ati vayate kava kanomofe ke hutama mage hutama hiho ‘Kaiyeke hutegahunagi Polona tagaite avaletama eho.’ hutama higeya yaufa tamakaitega evayi ohuneya katega avaleya neesageta hayamano.” huya humainae.
Hageno Polona asaamo nafanemoa ani kea haviteno ati vayamogami nopinaga haino Polona hapai-maine.
Hapaigeno Poloa nagoa ati vayate kava kanomofena ke higeno egeno mage huno hapaiye “Ma nafanea mukia ati vayate kava kanomotega avaleka visanageno nago ke hapaisie huna nehue.” huno humaine.

Hapaigeno mukia ati vayate kava kanomote avaleno vigeno mage huno mo hie “Nofipi kanoa, Poloa, ke higena ugeno ‘Ma nafanehe nago ke kahapaigahigi kagaitefe avaleka vuo.’ huno higena avalena eneoe.” huno hapai-maine.
Hapaigeno mukia ati vayate kava kanomoa ani nafanea ayate alilino avaleno agegayalega anakaianige umaineana mage huno havige “Naane ke nahapaigahe emainane?” huno havige.

Havigegeno ani nafanemoa mage huno hapaiye “Yuta vayamoya ke huya haya kiteya kagaifena mage huya kahavi-gegahe nehae ‘Ega Polona Kanisolete avaleka esanageta nagoene kemo aepaa havisune.’ huya kahavi-gegahe nehae.

Huya hugahagi amakai kea havika akave omalo. Ani vayapiti fotia (40) vayaene nagoa vayaene Polona haekahe kafo maleneya mage huya hae ‘Menia tiene kaveene mosita maineta falisia yupa hataka huta negahune. Haesunageno ofalisigenoa Anumaya Kotia ali-haviya hulatesie.’ huya Anumaya Koti aulagafina hulokiya vaiteya menima kagaya avalekama visanafene huya kagava mainae.” huno humaine.
Higeno mukia ati vayate kava kanomoa ani nafanemofena mage huno hapaiye “Manima nagaima hufalote huka nahapaina kea nagoa vayala hamaopaiyo. Nagi kagaya nagaitegatila ago vuo.” huno hutegeno umaine.

Tole kanolatana ati vayate kava yagai-mainaa kanolatafe ke higeana aageno mage huno hanapaiye “Talo tala hutana meni kegela naeni (9) kiloki tu hataletia (200) ati vayaene sevetia (70) hosi agupifi nevaya ati vayaene tu hataletia (200) keve nehaya ati vayaene Sisalia ugahae.
Poloma maino visia hosi afuene talo tala hutetana aluya hutana kava yagaitana Polona fatago hutana avaletana ala Kamani kava kanomo ayapi moteo. Ani kanomo agia Filikisie.” huno humaine.
Huteno avona kaeno mage huno humaine “Nagaila nagia Kolotiusi Lisiasinae tusi kanale Kamani kava kanomoga Filikisigale mani avona kaena hu falu fala hunegatoe.
Yuta vayamoya mani kanomona atafa huya hae falisaya kava hayanagi agaya Lomu kanoma mainea ke havitena ati vayaniene ani vayamogami amayapitila mo-vale-mainoe.
Kaiyeke hutesaya kemo aepaa havigahe Kanisole vayaamile avalena lavimainoe.
Avalena lavi-mainena havuana amakaiami ‘Kahegi kea atagae-maine.’ huya hayanagi falisia augafa havi kavala ohune. Nofi hutesua augafa kefo yaenena tamage huno ohune.

Ohunegi nago kema havuana nagoa vayamoya ‘Kesi falakita haesunageno falisie.’ huya haya ke me nahapaigena havitena aupaa kagaitega hutogeno vie. Vigi kaiyekema hutesaya vayamoya kagaitega mo hufalote huya hu fatago hisageka havisane huna hamapaugeya nevae. Kenia male hano hie nagaini nagia Kolotiusi Lisiasinae.” huno avopina kae-malene.
Ati vayamoya kava kanomo ke akave maleya kege Polona avaleya Atipatalisi kumate umainae.
Mo faeteya nagoa ati vayamoya eteya ageya hosimo agupifi nemaiya ati vayamoya Polona avaleya umainae.
Sisalia uvayi huya ani avona ala Kamani kava kanomona mo-miteya Polona agai aule avaleya mo hetitenae.
Mo heti-mainegeno ala Kamani kava kanomoa ani autama alino hapalino haviteno Polona mage huno havige “Kagaya hana kotega kano mainane?” huno higeno “Silisia kano mainoe.” huno humaine.

Higeno haviteno mage huno hie “Kaiyekema hugatesaya vayama evayi hisagena kaiyekekaa havigahue.” huno nehuno ati vayafe “Helotima kimalenea Kamani nopi avaletama kava mo yagaitegeno maino.” huno humaine.

Faefua (5) kanamoa hano higeya mono nopi hagote kava kanomoa Ananaiyasiene nagoa vayatamaene nagola ke havino fatago nehia kanoa Tetulusiene Sisalia elaviya emaineya Polona kaiyekema hutegahe haya kea ala Kamani kava kanomona hapaimainae.

Hapaigeno haviteno Polofe ke higeno egeno Tetulusia aepa heno Polona kaiyekea huneateno mage huno hie “Kanale Kamani kava kanomoga Filikisigae kagayama kava yagai-mainanafena tagaya kanaleya huta yuna heta mainonageka kasagoya kanale kavakeya huka kasagoya kumatema laya hisana kea hanageta aluya huta musekaa humainonane.
Nagoa kene hugahe huanagi amusekaa nehunagi menima kahapaisuna kea osi kea havio.
Tagayama agonana ma kanoa Poloe tusia havi kavayaga nehuno mukia kumate Yuta veamogami amunoamifina hetino ke vaino tu hisaya ke hamanepaino Nasaleti Yisasi kema nehaviya veamogami ala kanoami maine.

Maineno tagaiti ala mono nopi hilato ohunea kava hugahe hianagi mo-tafa huta tagaiti kahegi keleti kaiyekea hutegahe hunanagi ati vayate ala kava kanoa Lisiasia eno tokiyaaleti tayapiti mevaleno umaine.
Avaleno emainegi kagaya havigeteka kaiyekema hutesanana mukiama humainona kea agaia avayafiti aepaa hinageka havigane.” huno humaine.
Higeya Yuta vayamoyaenena “Tamage nehie.” huya nagoene Polona kaiyekea hutenae.

Ala Kamani kava kanomoa Polofe “Kaiyeke huo.” huno ayateti avamename higeno Poloa mage huno humaine kagaya ayaaya kafufima ani nofi vayatela kaiyekema humatenana yafena havina kolia nohue. Naipa kanale yapiti kenonakalela kahapaisue.
Hama-vigesanana kahapaisageka havigane nagaya ayaaya kanagefa Yelusalemua haina omainogi tuelufua (12) kana kanoa Anumaya Koti agi alisaga hugahe Yelusalemua haina mainoe.
Hainama mauvana nagaya ala mono nopi mainena nagoa vayaenena kea ovainoe. “Nagaitela veala melitalu hiho.” huna ohunoe. Mono noyagafiene ala kumapienena ani kavala hugeya onagenae.
Onagenagi menia kaiyekema hunenataya kemona ma vayamoya “Tamage nehune. Age-mainonanagita aepaa kahapaigahune.” huya hisaya keamia omalegeya nehae.

Nehagi nago yafe kea hu-falote huna kahapaisue. Amakayama “Alu kategae.” huya nehaya kama, Yisasi kema nehaviya veamoya akave nehaya kana, taginagomoya nevaya kate neuna Anumaya Koti agia alisaga nehuna mukia kahegi kene Anumaya Koti amaune vayamogami kene havina nagupi malenoe.
Nagupi malenogi amakayama haya kea “Anumaya Kotia fatago huya maineya fali-mainesaya veanene kefo kava huteya fali-mainesaya veanene ali hetimategahie.” huna nametitia nehue.
Ani yafe Anumaya Koti aulagaleene veamogami amaulagaleene hilato ohunea kavala ohuna fatago huna maisua yafe kava yagaina nemauvane.
Mainoanagina ayaaya kafua alule mainoanagi menia Yuta nafunaganagamina nagoa mone amamisuafene huna Anumaya Koti muse yaene amigahe Yelusalemua hai-mainoe.
Naugafaene naguaene sese hutena ala mono nopi haina amitena mainogeya nage-mainae. Nagaienena nagoa vayala me-litalu huya keyesoa ohagena mainoe.
Mauvanagi nagoa Esiati Yuta vayamoya eya me nage-mainae. Amakayake nagaifena “Havi kava nehie.” huya humainaya ke kagai kaulagale me hunateho.
Omesageyahena ma ma mainaya vayamoya nagayama Kanisole vaya amaulema heti-mainoa yupa “Havi kava humaine.” huya humainesaya yafena me kahapaiho.
Kahapaigahagi nagaya ma yamaage amakai amunoamifina hetina humainoe “Veama fali-mainesafitila hetigahae.” huna humainoa keleti meni kanafina kaiyekea hu-nenatae huno humaine.
Higeno Filikisia Yisasi kema nehaviya veamoya haya kea havimaineanagino mage huno hie “Haile. Ati vayate ala kava kanoa Lisiasia elavino esigena kaiyeketamia fatago hulamategahue.” huno humaine.

Huteno ati vayate kava neyagaiya kanomofe ke higeno egeno mage hie “Polona avaleka nofi nopina mo hutegananagi tokiyaage huka nofila hu oateka atalenegeya nefuya kavela afaa memiya aya hisae.” huno humaine.
Nagoa kanamoa hano hutegeno Filikisiene aamoa Yuta ale agia Talusilaene aageno Filikisia Polofe ke higeno eno Yisasi Kalaisife haviya amakupima maleya amametiti nehaya kea mehanapai-maine.

Mage huno hanapaiye “Fatago hutana mainetana tanaku tanakesale kava yagai hetofa hutana maio.” Anumaya Kotia haenagama kaiyeke humatesia ke nehigeno Filikisia koli nehuno mage huno humaine “Haile. Menia nenataleka eteka vuo. Haenaga aliyania omalesigena nagoene kekaa havigahue.” huno humaine.
Nehuno agesa mage huno havie “Poloma atalesugenoa nagoa mone namisifi?” huno agesa nehavino mukia yupa agaifena ke higeno egeana kaiyekea huana mainae.

Hume neaageno tole kafumoa hano hutegeno Filikisi aliyatema anonaa alimainea kava kanomo agia Polisiusi Fesatusie. Filikisia masave ageaino “Yuta vayamogamina hamaisia kava hugahue.” huno Polona nagoene nofi nopina atalegeno maine.
Fesatusia yagaisia kotega ago evayi huno tagufa (3) kana maiteno Sisaliati Yelusalemu haimaine.

Haigeya mono note kava vayaene Yuta kava vayaene Polofena “Havi kava humaine.” huya hapaiteya mage hae “Musekaa nehunagi taya huka Polona hutegeno Yelusalemu eno.” huya humainae. Amakaya katega kafo maleneya haesageno falisia amakesaleti humainae.

Hageno Fesatusia mage huno humaine “Poloa Sisalia nofi nopi mainegena nagaya osi kana kanoa maitena anilega ugahe nehugi tamakaitami kava vayamogatama nagaiene tavi-mainetama agaya havi kavama humainesiana kaiyekea mo hutegahae.” huno humaine.
Fesatusia eitia (8) kanao tenia (10) kanafiga Yelusalemua maiteno eteno Sisalia lavino faeteno koma neliana kaiyekema havi nopi umaineno mage hie “Polona avaletama eho.” huno humaine.
Kema higeno egeya Yelusalemuti emainaya Yuta vayamoya avaale maigagi maineya “Tusia havi kava humaine.” huya kaiyekea hutayanagi nagoa aepaa tamage huya hu falote huya haopainae.

Haopaigeno Poloa mage huno hie “Nagaya nagoa Yuta veamogami kahegi kene ala mono nopienena Lomu ala kava kanoa Sisaene ali-haviyana huoatenoe. Tamage huna nago kanomona havi kavala huoatenoe.” huno humaine.

Hianagi Fesatusia masave age aino “Yuta vayamogamina hamaisifa kava hugahue.” huno Polofena mage huno havige-maine “Kagaya kanale Yelusalemu haisanagena anilega haina kaiyekekaa havina fatago hugatesufio?” huno havige-maine.
Higeno Poloa mage huno hie “Menima Sisaa kaiyeke nehavia nopi heti-mainesugeka anile kaiyekenia haviteasine huna nehue. Kagaya ago havilinane nagaya Yuta vayapina nago kanomona havi kavala huoatenoe.

Nahaesagena falisua kefo kavama humainoleasina kanalelagina faluleasinagi manima hunataya kaiyekemoa tamage huno aepaama omalesigekahena amayapina onateganagi ala kanoa Sisa ayapi natesanageno ani kaiyekea hunatesie huna nehue.” huno humaine.
Higeno Fesatusia agaia Kanisole vayaene kea kea huteno mage hie “Sisaa kaiyekea hunatesie huka hanafe Sisatega ugane.” huno humaine.
Nagoa kanamoa hano hutegeno ala sauve kanoa Agalipaene asaamoa Peniasiene Fesatusina hu falu fala hutegahe Sisalia evayi humainae.

Evayi huteana ayaaya kanagefa mainaageno Fesatusia Polo kaiyekea sauve kanoa Agalipana hanepaino mage huno hie “Filikisima mainea kanafina nago kanoa nofi nopi mainegeno Filikisia anifi ataleno umaine.
Umaineanagina Yelusalemu haina mainogeya mono note kava vayaene Yuta kava vayaene agaifena nahapaiya ‘Kaiyekea huteteka hanageke yana amio.’ huya humainae.

Hagena mage humainoe ‘Tagaya Lomu vayamogata ma auava kava nehunane. Nago kanomoa kaiyeke hutesia vayala amaule mainesageya kaiyekea hutetesageno anonaamile ‘Kagaya kaiyekema hugataya kea huo.’ huta hagoteta hisunageno hinageta haviteta fatago hugahune huta humainonane.’ huna hamapai-mainoe.
Hugeya male melitalu huya mainagena faetena aupaa kaiyeke humate nopi una ‘Polona avaletama eho.’ huna humainoe.
Hugeya kaiyekema hutaya vayala hetiya aepa heya agaila kaiyekea hutayanagi ‘Naa kefo kavala humaine.’ huna nagesama havua kefo kavafena ohunae.
Ohunagi amakaiami monoamihekeya agaienena ke nevaiya nagola fali-mainea kanoa, Yisasie, kanomofe, Poloa ‘Ani kanoa afaa hetino maine.’ huno higeya ke vai-mainae.
Higena ‘Hanaa huna ani kemo aepaa havina fatago hisue?’ huna hutena mage huna havige-mainoe ‘Kanale Yelusalemua haisanagena kaiyekekaa havitena fatago hugatesufio?’ huna havige-mainoe.
Havigogeno Poloa ‘Mainesugeno ala kava kanomoa kaiyekenia havisie.’ huno higena ‘Kanalelagi nofi nopi atesugeno mainesigena Sisate hutegahue.’ huna humainoe.” huno hie.
Higeno Agalipaa Fesatusife mage huno humaine “Nagaya ani kanomo kea havigahue.” huno higeno “Kanalelagi egamaga kea havigane.” huno humaine.

Higeya mo faeteya kotigeya Agalipagani Penaisigania kanale konagali kena faiteana kaiyeke havi nopi vaageya ati vayate kava vayamoyaene ani kumate kava vayamoyaene tokaeya ani nopi hai-mainageno Fesatusia Polofe ke higeya avaleya emainae.

Ageno Fesatusia mage huno humaine “Ala Sauve kanomoga, Agalipagaene mukia melitalu humainaya vayaene haviho. Ma ma agaya kanomofe mukia Yuta vayamoya Yelusalemuene ma kumateene maineya tokiyaage kefiti mage huya nahapaiye ‘Mani kanoa kaiyeke huteka haegeno falino.’ huya ala kefiti humainae.
Hagena nagayama agoana mani kanomoa nagola falisia kefo kavala ohune huna hugeno Poloa ‘Lomu ala Sauve kanomo kaiyekenia havigahie.’ huno higena ‘Kanalelagika ugane.’ huna humainoe.

Huanagi ani kanomoa falisia kefo kavama humainea kemoa omalegena ‘Na keleti kaiyekea huto.’ huna ala Sauve kanomotega autama kaesugeno visia kenia omalegena tamakaite avalena neogi ala kava kanomoga Agalipaga mani kanomo kaiyekea havilama huka havisanagena avona kaena atalesue huna tanakaite avalena neoe.
Nagaya havuana nofi kanoa hutesugeno vinagena kaiyekema hutesaya kema kaena oamisuana haviya hugahie huna nehue.” huno humaine.
Agalipaa Polofe mage huno hapaiye “Kagaya kekaa huo.” huno higeno Poloa ayana haya huno kaiyeke hutea kenonaa mage huno humaine.
Agalipaga, ala sauve kanomogae, menia kagai kaule hufalote huna Yuta vayamoyama kaiyeke hunatenaya kemo anonaa hisua yafena muse nehue.
Yuta vayamogatama nehuna kavaene ke nevauna aepaa kagaya ago age-mainanafene huna tusia muse nehue. Naa humainanafe musekaa nehugi kagaitema hisua kehena kasalola okahaenageka ako huka maineka havio.
Nafanema mainolegati Silisia mainoanagina haenagaa Yelusalemuma elavi-mainoana ani nofi veamoya kama vai-neayoa yana Yuta veamoya nage-mainae.
Nayona nagaya Falasia vayamogami kahegi kema akave malogeya nage-mainaya yafema kahapaisugeyahena ani kea kahapaigahae.
Kahapaigahagi nayoma taginagomogamifema Anumaya Kotia “Nago yana hulamategahue.” huno hulokiya vai-malenea kelema nametiti hua yateti menia kaiyekea hunatagena heti-mainoe.

Anima hulokiya vai-malenea kelefena mukia tuelufua (12) Yuta nofi veamoya amametitia nateene kegeene ani yama hulatesiafene huya Anumaya Koti agia ayeme ayeme nevae. Nevagena Agalipaga, ala sauve kanomogae, nagaya ania huna nametiti hua yateti Yuta vayamoya kaiyekea maiya hunenatae.
Naa higetama nagaya “Anumaya Kotia fali-mainaya veala ali hetimatene.” hunama hua kehena “Havige nehie.” hutama nehae?
Nayona nagaya “Nasaleti Yisasi agia alina mopafi atalesugeno lavisie.” huna alu kava alu kavala humatenoe.

Mono note kava vayamoya “Naama huo.” huya hunatagena Yelusalemu maineya Yisasina amakua amitafa humainaya veamogamina amavalena nofi mo humatenogeya kaiyekema humataya yupa “Hamaegeya faliho.” huna humainoane.
Yisasi veamogamina “Kalaisifena kamuge hatagetama vaimateho.” huna nehuna kasagoya mono nopi kayona mo neamamina nahai-vaina Yuta veane omainaya vayamogami kumapina moli-haviya huneamatoane.
Ani kava hisuafe ala mono note kava vayamoya hunatagena Tamasigusi ugahe umainoe.

Ala Sauve kanomogae, yagemoa amunokano higena katega nehaugeno ikapinagati tusia vasa yamoa, yagemona agaseno ala yakefa, huno aivasa higena age-mainogeya nagaima navagi hageta hauna vayaene aivasa lahau-maine.

Higeta lagaya mopafi asaga hu-lavita tagoya aye-maineta havugeno Yuta vayamogami kefiti mage hie “Sologae Sologae naa higeka nagaila ali haviya nehane? Aniama hanana avela hanegeno kagaikaa kagata neaiye.” huno humaine.

Higena mage huna hue “Ala kanomogae kagaya lagae?” huna hugeno mage hie “Nagaya Yisasinae ali-haviya maikama hunatana kanomonagi hetio. Kagaila hugatesugeka nagai aliyana alika nagaima nagana yafeene haenagama kavelisua yafeene hamapaisanafene huna kagaitela evayi nehue.
Nehuafe Yuta veane omainaya veamogamitega hugategahugi haenagama ali haviya hugatesaya Yuta vayapitiene Yuta veane omainaya vayamogami amayapitiene kavalena kaugafa aligatigahue.

Yuta veane omainaya veamogamina asuma humainea amaulaga alika kaligali humatesanageya haniki-mainea yapima mainaya yana neataleya amakua aiyahae huya vasa yapi maisaya yafe hunegatoe. Satani kava yagai-mainea yapina neataleya amakua aiyahae huya Anumaya Koti kava yagai-mainea yapi maisaya yafe hunegatoe. Nagaife haviya amakupi maleya amametiti hisagena kefo yaamia aigeamatena atalematetena alu aotage anaganiene amavalena amatesugeya maisae huna hunegatoe.” huno humaine.
Agalipaga, ala Sauve kanomogae ani kema higena ikate age-mainoa yafenagina akave malenoe.

Hagotena Tamasigusi utena anileti Yelusalemua uayamona anileti mukia Yutia kotega ute ete huna Yuta veane omainaya veateene mage huna hamapai-mainoe “Kefo yatamia neataletama tamakua aiyahae hutama Anumaya Kotitega etama kanale auava yana hisageya tamakuama aiyahae hisaya yana agesae.” huna hamapai-mainoe.
Mani kema hamapai-mainoa keleti ala mono nopi mainogeya Yuta vayamoya natafa huya nahaesagena falisua kavala hunatenae.

Hunatenagi Anumaya Kotia mukia yupa naya higena menia hetina mainena ala kava vayaene osi vayaenena tamahanepauve. Moseseene Anumaya Koti aune vayaene “Naa yana maa yana falote hugahie.” huya humainaya keage hamapai-mainoe.

Mage huya humainayane “Anumaya Kotima taugafa aligatigahema hutenea kanomoa augafa agata aisigeno faligahie. Fali-mainesifiti mukia veala amakaseno uhagote-lamateno hetiteno hale yamaa hanesia kea Yuta veanene Yuta veane omainaya veanene hamapaigahie.” huya humainayane huno humaine.
Poloa na ke higeno Fesatusia ala kefiti mage huno hie “Pologae aifonafo ke maika nehanagi alu avo alu avoma maika nehapalina yayagamo aifonafo kavala hugatene.” huno humaine.
Higeno Poloa mage huno hie “Fesatusigae, ala kava kanomogae, aifonafo kea nohugi kelamage nehue.
Nehugi nagayama hua kemoa ala Sauve kanomoga Agalipagae havilinanagena hufalote huna nehue. Nagaya havuana mukia ani kavala falakiya ohunagi ani kavala ago age-mainane.
Ala Sauve kanomoga, Agalipagae, kagaya Anumaya Koti amaune vayamogami kea ago havika kagupi maleka kametiti nehano? E, kagupina ago alika malana yana nagaya ago havilinoe.” huno hapaiye.
Higeno Agalipaa mage huno hie “Menima hana keleti aupaa nagaya Yisasife havina nagupi malegahue huka nehano?” huno humaine.

Higeno Poloa mage huno hie “Aupa kana kanoafi ayaaya kana mainesanano nagaya hua augafa kava huka Yisasife havika kagupi malesanafe Anumayamotega ke huna havi-negoe. Kagaifekeya mani kea nohugi mukia ma kanalema maineya nagai kema nehaviya veanenefe nagaya mainoa augafa kava huya maisae huna Anumayamotega havinegogi nofipi maisaya yafena nonahaiye.” huno humaine.

Higeya ala Sauve kanoa Agalipaene nago kava kanoa Fesatusiene Penaisiene amakaienema mainaya veanemoya hetiya alule umaineya kea kea mohu mehu huteya mage hae “Mani kanomoa nofila huteteya haesageno falisia augafa kefo kavala ohune.” huya humainae.
Hayanagi Agalipaa Fesatusina mage huno hapaiye “Mani kanoa, Poloe, ‘Sisaa kaiyekenia havisie.’ hunoma ohuneleasina ‘Nofipitila atalegeno vino.’ huna huleasine.” huno humaine.

Polofe “Lomu kumate tipi kalefi ugane.” huya huteya avaleya nagoa nofipi mainaya vayaene amavaleya ati vayate kava kanomo ayapi amatenae. Ani ati kanomo agia Yuliusie. Ani kanoa Sisaa, Sauve kanomo, ati kanoa maineane.

Nagaya Lukunae Alisatakusiene Poloene umainone. Alisatakusia Masetoniati kanoe. Osi kumaamo agia Tesalonaika kanogino tagaiene vigeta nago Atalamitiumu kumate tipi kalefi haisaga humaunageno tipi kalemoa Esia komo haopalega haigahe higeta hai-mainone.
Nehaunageno kotigeta ega Saitoni kumate hai vayi hunageno Yuliusia Polona ali kayone huneateno “Kanalelagika vayakamogamitega visanageya ali kanale hulamatesae.” huno tatalegeta umainone.
Umaigeta Saitoni kumala neataleta yasimoa tusiya huno alino halage higeta yasimoa osima hisiafe nago hagelimo amunopi hanea kumamo aupate eumainone. Ani kumamo agia Saipalusie.
Hagelipi Silisiaene Pamafilia kumaene mogaseta Maila euvayima hunana ani kumamona ala agia Lisia eumainone.
Maila mainonageno kava humainea ati kanomoa nago Alekasatalia tipi kalea ageteno ani tipi kalemoa Lomu ugahe higeno tavalegeta ani tipi kalefi haisaga humaita eumainone.

Tipi kalefima unana aiyayeno ounegi kasagoya kanagefa hako hako huno vigeno osi yasi kanoa aligeta Nitusi umainone. Yasimoa osi higeno nagola timo amunopi hanea kotega Kaliti komo aupate unana Salamone kumala aupaale hane.
Kaliti limo agegayalega hako hako huta unana nago kumamo agia Kanale Ti kahaepatele huya nehaya ti agegayalega euvayi humainone. Ani agegayalega ala kumamo aupate Lasie huno hane.
Hako huta una yafe ayaaya kanagefa katega neunageno Yuta vayamoya kave monesiya kanamoa ago falote hianagi timoa ayamufa aigeno Poloa ani vayafe mage huno hamapaiye,
“Nagaya nagesa havuana tipi kalefina kasageke huta nevisunageno afenoyatiene tipi kalene tagaitiene tusiya huno alihaviya tahaugahie.” huno hamapaiye.
Hamapaiyanagi ati vayate kava kanomoa ani kea havino agupina omaleanagi tipi kalemo kayomaalema nealia kanomo kene tipi kalemo nefa kene havino akave malenegi Poloma hia kea havino akave omalene.

Akave omalegeya ani kumala tusia yasima alia kanafinagiya kanale huya maisaya kumala omalegeya tipi kalema nealiya vayamoya ke huge havige huteya “Ani kumala neataleta Finikisia, Kaliti kumamo haupalega nagola tipi kalema malesuna kumafe avame huta visune. Ani kumatela yasima alisia kanalela mo maigahune.” huya humainae.
Amuko yasimoa ako huno aligeya “Kanalelagita ugahunagi afaa vigetao.” nehuya tipi kalema atafa hulino nemaiya yana alisaga huteya ani lipi kalea Kaliti limo agegayalega eumainae.
Enevageno Kaliti kumateti tusia yasimoa alino egeta “Eteta ani kumate ugahune.” huta hunanagi ani yasimoa tipi kalea melino haviya huno aiyahae huno atalegeno ani yasimoa ayetufegeta emainone.

Onana nagola hage limo amunopi hanea kumala osi kumamo avate eumainone. Ani kumamo agia Kautae. Neonageno yasimoa osia alino laga higeta tusi aliya aliyaamoya hevayu huya osi tipi kalea alisaga huya ala tipi kalefi maleneya ani ala tipi kalemoma kofa-nafa ohiseafene huya nomo aiyafi nofila kitafa humalenae. “Yasimoa ayetufesigeta Afelika komo ti kahaepatega mo haviya hugahune.” huteya anale asai-malenaya kena yasimoma ayetu-nefea kena kalu heya afepi maletageno yasimoa ayetu-fegeta emainone.
Neeta mo faonageno koma neliana timoa ayamufaage higeya ani lipi kalefima hanea afenoyayaga aliya kalemoa yoyo huno visiafene huya hage lipi hagayu hagayu hu-talenae.
Tagufa (3) kanale tipi kalemo aliya yamaa amakaiami amayapiti aliya tipi hagayu hagayu hutalenae.
Kasagoya kanagefa yagene kanefienena oagogeno limoa tusiya huno ayamufa aigeta taugafa aligatisia yafema tametiti nehuna yana ago ataleta “Ani lipi fanane hugahune.” huta maita humainone.

Nehuya vayayaga ayaaya kanagefa kavela oneya maigeno Poloa amunoamifi hetino mage huno hie “Nafunaganagatama tamakaya havi kava hutama hagotenama tamahapauva kea ‘Kaliti kumala oatalesune.’ huna hua kea ohavinae. Tamakayama havileasina ma ma ali haviyama hulatea yana falote ohigeno afenoyatienena ovayagileasine.
Nagi menia tamahanepauve kolia ohutama tokiya vaitama maiho. Tagaipitila nago kanoa ofaligahigi tipi kaleage haviyana hugahie.
Nagaya Anumaya Koti nafane mainoanagina mukia kanafina agia alisaga hume hume neogeno meni kegela agaia ensole kanomoa navate me heti-maine.
Heti-maineno mage huno nahapaiye ‘Pologae kolia ohuo. Kagaya Sisa aulela mo hetigananagino Anumaya Kotia mukia mani lipi kalefi kagaienema nevaya vayamogamina amaugafa aligatigahie.’ huno nahapaiye.
Nahapaiyafe tamakaya mukiamogatama kolia ohiho. Anumaya Kotia nahapaiya avamete huno ani kate hugahie huna nagupi malena nametiti nehue.
Nehuanagi yasimoa ali haviya hisigeta nagola ti amunopi hanea kumate vailagailita ugahune.” huno humaine.
Ani tipi kalefina tole sota onageno timoa ayamufaage higeta Metiteleniani hage li amunopi onageno kege amuno higeya tipi kalefi aliya vayamoya “Kumate uvayi hugahe aupa nehune.” huya humainae.

Huteya augelifipi amegafi huya nofimo atupale tumo tumo yana kanaage ya ayeteya atalageno tipinaga lavitegeya alisaga huya agayana augelimoa ayaayaamoa fotia (40) mita humaine. Nagoene osia utonageya ania huya tipinaga ani nofila ataleteya agayana ti augelimoa tetia (30) mita humaine.

Higeya “Havigu yafa agupifi visunageno yafamoa tahaiyafene.” huya koli huteya foa (4) tipi kalema atafa hulino maisia yana tipi kalemo aia kapiti tipi atalageno lavi-mainegeno yagemoa aupaa evayi hisiafene huya nunamuna humainae.

Nehuya tipi kalefi aliya vayamoya koli huya “Faleta ugahune.” nehuya osi tipi kalea ali-talageno lipi lavigeya mage huya vayala ayemavataga hae “Tagaya kalema atafa hulino maisia yana agosisinapalega atalenone.” huya ayemavataga humainae.
Hageno Poloa ati vayafeene amakaiami kava kanomofeene mage huno hamapaiye “Mani vayayagama ala tipi kalefima omaisayana tamakaila tamaugosamoa fanane hugahie.” huno humaine.
Nage higeya ati vayamoya osi tipi kalema atafa hulinea nofila taga hutalageno osi tipi kalea tipina umaine.
Yagemoa evayi hugahe aupa higeno Poloa mukia vayamogamife mage huno hie “Tole sotana koli hutama kavela mositama onenagi menia kavela neho.

Lokiyaage ke nagaya tamahanepauve ‘Kavela neho.’ huna nehue. Kavela netetama tokiya aligahae. Tamage lamahanepauve mukiamogatama kanale hutama uvayi hugahae. Nagoke kanoa fanane ohugahae.” huno humaine.
Mani kea nehuno maya alino amaulagale Anumayamotega muse nunamu huno havigeteno kolino nemaine.
Negeya ageteya amaipamoa kanale higeya amakaienena ania huya kavela ne-mainae.
Tagaya lipi kalefima mainona vayala tu hataleti seveti sikisia (276) vaya mainone.
Kavela nemamu huteya tipi kalemoa kanaagela ohisie huya viti avinayaga tipi aliya atalenae.
Yagema vayi higeya agayana noagaya kotega uvayi huteya agayana nagola timoa moyetagena humainea yatela kanale ti kahaepa hanegeya ageteya “Lipi kalemoa anile aupaa visie.” huya humainae.

Huteya tipi kalema atafa hulino nemaiya nofila hekano hutaleteya aliya moli kagi meli kagi nehaya kayote kimalaya nofila aliya kaleyo humaleteya yasi alisia kena anale maleya atafa humalageno tipi kalemoa aiyayeno ti agegayalega ugahe nehie.
Vianagi tipina kahaepamoa agoyagefa hai-mainea kahaepate haino anifi mo vailino agoyamona atafa huno tokiyaage huligeno kanagela ohuno hanegeno timoa tokiyaage huno aia katega aino kofanafa humaine.

Kofanafa higeya ati vayamoya nofima humatenaya vayafena “Hamaesunageya falisae. Havigu nago kanomoa tipiti faleno visigi.” huya hayanagi ati vayate kava kanomoa Poloa ofalisia agesa nehavino “Naa ohiho.” huno huneama-teno mukia tipi nagosa neaiya vayafe “Nagosa aitama ti agegayalega viho.” huno humaine.
Higeta mukiamogata tipi kalemoma haviya hia yosamo ayamufa alita agupile maiteta ayetufeta ti agegayalega umainone.
Tagaya kanale huta evayi hune. Evayi huna komo agia Malata kumale huya tahapaigeta havimainone.
Ani kumate vayayagamoya kanaleya huya ali kayone hulatageta mainonageno kola aiteno yasiage higeya ata kae-maleteya me lavaleya ata mo lota hulatenae.
Poloa ata haefusa haya alino ata kaeyana nagola vayama nehaeya osifavemoa ata haefusa hayafiti augafa leno amuko higeno hati-lavino Polo ayapi menilage-lage humaine.

Menilage-lage hulinegeya anile maiya vayamoya ageteya mage hae “Mani kanoa vaya hamaeno hevai-neamatea kanogino hage tipina ofalianagino fatago Anumayamoa anonaa alisiafe haeyanagino ago faligahie.” huya hae.
Hayanagi Poloa ani osifavea alino aye-tafaino atafi ataleteno agaila augafa alino haviya ohigeno afaa maine.

Afaa maigeya anile maiya vayamoya augafa halegino asaga hulavino falisiafene huya ayaayate agava maiyanagi nagola havi yamoa agaitela falote ohigeya eteya alu amakesa haviya mage hae “Agaya nago Anumaya maine.” huya havimainae.

Vayima huna mopamona aupaale hanea kumatela ti amunopi kotega kava kanomo mopae. Ani kava kanomo agia Pupiliusie. Ani kanomoa lavaleno nomaalega mo lateneno tagufa (3) kanafi kave yagita huno nelamino yagai-latene.
Yagai-lateneno Pupiliusina nefaa amuko kaliene aiamoa tolo ya agea kaliene alino mainegeno Poloa mo-geteno Anumaya Kotitega havigeno augafale aya malegeno ani kaliamoa falu hu-tene.
Falu hutegeya nagoa ani kumate kali vayamoya ageno Poloa kaliamia alino kanale humatene.
Alino kanale humategeya tagaila kanale kava hulatageta maineta haenagaa ugahema hunageya tagaila nesuna yama aupa huna yana tamiteya tipi kalefi aliya latenae.

Tagaya tagufa (3) ika ani kotega maiteta nago tipi kalea, ala yasima alia kanafinagiya Malata kumate maiya tipi kalea, Alekasatalia kumateti emaiya tipi kalefi asaga humaita umainone. Ani tipi kalemo agoyalela tole kuyave netalamogani anamena talo humalenae.
Ani tipi kalefima onana Sailakiusi kumate evayi huta tagufa (3) kana mainone.
Sailakiusi kumala ataleta kagita kagita Legiumi evayi huta faenonageno yasimoa alino aepa hegeta nagoke taula mo faeteta Puteoli evayi huteta hati-lavita lipi kalea agola neataleta mopafi emainone.
Puteoli nagoa mainaya tafu-taganagamina amakonageya mage hae “Tagaiene nagoke sota maigahae.” huya hageta anile maigeta Lomu kumatela umainone.

Katega neonageya Lomu kumate mainaya tafu-taganaya “Katega neae.” huya haya kea haviteya eya nagola Apiusi maketie nehaya kumate me fotu hageya nagoa vayamoya “Talia (3) Natu Vayamoya Nefayaya Noyaga Hane.” huya haya kumate fotu hunageno Poloa ani vayala amaketeno Anumayamotega muse nehigeno aguamoa tokiyaage humaine.
Lomu kumatema unana ala kava kanomoa Polofe “Kanalelagika kagaikaa nopi mainesanageno nago ati kanomoa kava yagaigategahie.” huno humaine.

Poloa tagufa (3) kana maiteno ani kumate mainaya Yuta soka vayayagahe ke higeya melitalu hageno mage huno hamapaiye “Nafunaganagatama nagaya tagaiti nofi vayamogamiene taginagomoya humainaya kavaene alina haviyana ohunoanagi Yelusalemu nofila hunateteya Lomu vaya amayapi natenae.

Lomu vayamoya kenima haviyana nagaipina nagoa nahaesagena falisua kenia omalegeya natalegahe hayanagi Yuta vayamoya ani kehena ‘Aao huya haya yafe nagoma visua kania omalegena ‘Sisa kaiyekenia havisie.’ huna humainoanagi nagaini nofi vayala kaiyeke humatesua yana omalene.
Mani kema tamahapaisuafene huna ke hugetama agena tamahanepauve Isaleli vayamoya amametiti huya agava mainaya kanomofe havina nagupi malenoa yateti nofila hunatenae.” huno humaine.
Higeya ani soka vayamoya Polofe mage hae “Nagoa Yutia vayamoya kagaifena avona kaeya tamigeta ohavinone. Nagoa vayatimoya tagaite eya ke hageta nagola havi kavama humainana kea me lahaopainae.
Tahaopainagi mukia kotegati vayamoya Yisasina amakua aminaya veamogamifena ‘Havi kava maiya nehae.’ huya hageta ago havimainonagi menia kagaikaa kaguafiti hisana ke havigahune.” huya humainae.

“Na kanale havigahune.” huya hapali-maleteya ani kanalela mukia vayayaga Poloma mainea nopi me-litalu hageno Poloa natema aepa heno Anumaya Kotia kava yagai-matesia kea hamanepaino Anumaya Kotima Yisasina hutegeno emainea kanomo kea Mosese kae-malenea kefitiene Anumaya Koti amaune vayamoya kae-malenaya kefitiene amakaila amakua alino hetisigeya Yisasife haviya amakupi maleya amametiti hisayafene huno huge huge nehigeno yagemoa lavi fale-maine.
Polo kea nagoa vayamoya haga neya amakupi malenagi nagoa vayamoya amakupina ali omalenae.

Alu amaku amakesa haviya mohu mehu huteya ugahe nehageno Poloa mage huno hamapai-maine “Alu Aotage Avamumoa tamage huno Aisaiyana hapaigeno Aisaiyaa, aune kanogino, taginagomogamina mage huno tamage hamapai-maineane.

Kagaya mage huka veamogamina mo hamapaiyo ‘Tamakaila tamakesamoa havime havime haigahayanagi ani kemona aepaa havilama hutama ohavigahae. Tamaulagamoa kasagoya yupa ageme ageme haigahayanagi nago yana agelama hutama oagegahae.

Mani kemona aepaama havisaya amaku amakesa omale veane mainae. Mani kema ohavisayafene huno amakesamoa ago tile-maine. Amaulagamoa ania huno ‘Oagesae.’ huno ago asu humaine. Mani kea amakesamoa havisigeno amaulagamoa agesigeno amakua aiyahae huya nagaitega esagena ali hilato humateyafene.’ huno higeya.” kae-malenayane.

“Anumaya Kotia mani kea tamakinagomogamiene tamakayaenefe lamaha-pai-maineanagi tamakaya lamakaveno hutenagi haviho Anumaya Kotia anima lamaku tamamema aligatisia kea Yuta veane omainaya veafe ago humateneanagiya ani veamoya havigahae.” huno humaine.
Poloa nago nona miya huteno ani nopi tole kafu maineno agaitegama aya veala kanaleya humatene.

Huneamateno Anumaya Koti kava yagaimatesia kea huhaleno hamanepaino Anumayati Yisasi Kalaisi kanale mono kea huge amavelige huno kea hulokiya vaino higeya nagoa veamoya “Na kea ohuo.” huya kahegi oatenae.
Nagaya Polonae Yisasi Kalaisi aliya kanoa mainena Aposolo mainogeno Anumaya Kotia mukia vayapiti “Alu aotage kano maineka nagaila kanale mono kenia huhaleka hamapaiyo.” huno hunatene.
Ani kanale mono kea Anumaya Kotia nayona “Kamigahue.” huno hulokiya vaigeya agai aune vayamoya huhaleya Anumaya Kotina alu aotage autamaafi kae-malenayane.
Ani kanale kea agaia Nafanemofe humaine. Ani Nafanemoa velafa maisiafe Teviti nofi vayapiti falote humaine.
Falote huteno fali-mainefiti Anumaya Kotia tokiyaaleti aliheti-maineafe Alu Aotage Avamumoa “Ma kanoa tokiyaa hanegeno Anumaya Kotina Nafanea maine. Yisasi Kalaisia Anumayatimo maine.”

Mainegeya agai agima alisaga hisayafe mukia kotega veamoya Yisasife haviya amakupi maleya amametiti huya agai kema ali hipoya hisayafe Anumaya Kotia Yisasi ayapitila kayone yana namiteno “Aposolo kano maiyo.” huno hunatene.
Hunatenegi mukia kumate veanene tamakaiene Lomu mainaya veanene Yisasi Kalaisi anaga maisayafe ago hapali-lamatene.

Anumaya Kotia hau ayamopafi haigeno hapali-lamategetama alu aotage veanea Lomua mainae. Anumaya Kotia, Nelafaene Yisasi Kalaisia, Anumayatimoene kayone hisaya yaene tamaipa falu lamahaisia yaene tamamisae.

Hagotena ma yafe tamahapaigahue. Mukia ma mopale veamoya tamakaifena “Yisasife haviya amakupi maleya amametiti humainaya veane mainae.” huya lamakaifena hagena havimainoa yafena aluya huna lamakaifena Yisasi Kalaisi hulatenea yateti Anumaya Kotinimotega musena nehue.
Anumaya Koti aliyama aluana naya mukiki huna agaia Nafanemo hulatenea yafe kanale mono kea hamanepaugeno Anumaya Kotia nage-maineanagina mukia kanafina nunamu huna tamakai tamakia ayena havinegoe.
Notamakoafe menima tamakaitega visuafene huna havinegoe “Kagaika visua yafema kahainageka kana valinato.” huna havinegoe.
Tamakuamoa tokiyaage huno maisia tokiya, Alu Aotage Avamumoa tamaminegi nagoa tokiyaene alisayafe tamaya hisue huna tamakaima tamakesua yafena tusiya huno nenahaiye.
Mage nehue “Yisasife havitama lamakupi maletama tamametiti nehaya yatamimoa nagaila naya hisigena nagaya ania huna nagupima malenoa yanimoa tamakaila tamaya hisie.” huna nehue.

Nafunaganagatama ma yafe haviho nagayama Yuta veane omainaya veapina Yisasifena kanale mono kea hamapaugeya aliya amakupi malageno alagaa ayeno falote humainea kavala tamakaipi “Ania hisue.” huna mukia kanalela tamakaitega ugahe nehuanagi nagoa yamo kania maleno tilegena ounoe.

Anumaya Kotia aliya aligena mukia veamogamina kanale huya nemaiya veanene, afa veanene, avoma nehapaliya veanene, avoma nohapaliya veanene “Yisasifena kanale mono kea hamapaiyo.” huno hunateneafene huna tamakaitega, Lomu mainaya veate, me lamahapaisuafe naguamoa henelie.

Yisasi kanale mono kehena nagayea nohue. Ani kefi Anumaya Kotina kasagoya tokiya yamaa hanegeya mukia ani kema haviya amakupi maleya amametiti humainaya veamogamina Anumaya Kotia amaku amamena aligatigahie. Yuta anagala hagoteno amaku amamena aligatiteno haenaga Yuta veane omainaya veamogamina aligatigahie.

Ani kemoa mage huno tavenelie Yisasife haviya amakupi maleya amametiti humainaya veamoya kefo yana humainayanagi Anumaya Koti aulagafina fatago veane mainae. Ani yafena Anumaya Koti autamafina mage huno humaineane
“Fatago veane mainae huno humatenea veamoya Anumaya Kotife haviya amakupi maleya amametiti humainaya yateti mai kanale huya maigahae.” huya kae-malenayane
Mukia veamoya Anumaya Kotina amakaveno hutaya kava huya kefo yama hayafe kelamage kemona falaki-malenageno Anumaya Kotia ikapinagati haima vaiya yamaa lavenelie.
Anumaya Kotia mukia veamogami amakusafinaga agaifema havisaya yana ago amaveli-maine.

Anumaya Kotia ma mopama talo humalenea kanaleti aepa heno talo humalenea yateti agaila oagesuna alu aotage auava yamaaene agola maige maige hisuna tokiyaaene amaveligeya agelama huya age-mainayanagi “Noagona yafe nehane.” huya hisaya kanaamia omaleneafe Anumaya Kotia anonaamia amamigahie.
Amakaya Anumaya Kotina agemaineyagi agia alisaga nehuya “Kanale yana tamine.” huya agaila musena hu oateya afa amaku amakesale maineya aneginagi haya amaku amakesamoa hani yapi mainae.
Maineya “Kanale tagu tagesaene veane mainone.” huya nehayanagi aneginagi huya mainae.

Maineya agola maige maige tokiya hale yamaa hanea Anumaya Koti agia alisaga ohuya amakaveno huteteya aiyahae huya faligahe humainaya vefi, namafi, kala yagafi, osifavefi, amamena amayateti talo huya maleneya ani yate “Anumayati maine.” huya amakia alisaga humainae.
Naa kava maiya haya yafe Anumaya Kotia amatalegeya amaku amakesafinaga age hamaye huya havigu havagu amakesamo amavayu higeya kefo yamaage tokaeya nehuya amakaiami amaugafa ali haviya humainae.

Anumaya Koti kelamage kea amakaveno huteteya havigeage ke nehaviya Anumaya Kotima talo humalenea yate “Anumayati maine.” huya muse-kase nehuya amakia alisaga humainagi ani yayagama talo humalenea Anumaya Kotina amakaveno hutenae. Mukia yupa agola Anumaya Koti agia alisaga hisuna kano maine. Tamage.

Anumayamona amakaveno hutaya yafe Anumaya Kotia amatalegeya tusi amakaye hisifa kava huya age hamaye haya kavala humainae. Aneamimoya anauamimoyaene humo kavala neataleya amafaluyaene havi kavayaga humainae.

Nehageya vemoyaenena aamienama humo kavala neamataleya amaipafiti atamoa hetigeya nagoa ve amafaluyaene amaugafa age hamaye huya amakaye hisifa kavala humainayafe anonaamia amakaiami amaugafale alimainae.
“Anumaya Kotia afa kano maineanagita agaifena ohavigahune.” huya haya yateti Anumaya Kotia amatalegeya kefo amaku amakesa haviya ase ohu kavala humainae.

Mukia kefo yana alu kava alu kavala humainae. Moli huliteya nehuya kumai he yane. Alu vayamogami yate age hamaye hu yane. Vayaamihe hu-haviya humate yane. Alu kanomo hia kavafe age hamaye nehaya yane. Vaya hamaeya falimate yane. Vayaamimoyaene tusi ke nevaiya yane. Havigeage savale kavale. Vayaamimofe “Naa kava nehae.” huya huatifi mafi nehae.

Vaya amakia alihaviya nehae. Anumaya Kotina kame huneatae. Veganokano huya halakae halakau ke nehuya amakaiami amaugafa aliya haiteya amakaiami amaki alisaga humainae. Haegafa kefo kavala aliya falote nehuya itaafoamimo kea hefalanegiye.
Aneginagi nehuya “Naa hugahune.” huya haya kea neatalae. Nagoamogamifena amahau amayamopafina ohamaigeya hamauna hu noamatae.

Anumaya Kotia “Naa yama nehaya veala anonaamia amamisugeya aliteya agola faligahae.” huno humainea kea ani veamoya havilineyagi ani kefo yana maiya nehuya naa yamaagelomagi kefo yama haya veamogami amakia alisaga nehuya kefo yama haya yafena muse hu neamatae.

Kefo yama nehaya yafena nagoa veafena “Lamakaya naa kava nehae.” hutama nehutama amakaila fako hu neamatagi tamakaienena ania kefo kavala nehageno tamakaienena tamakaya nehie. Tamakaya kaiyeke humataya veamogatama ania kefo yana ago humainayafe kenonama hisaya kea omalene.
Tagaya ago havimainone Anumaya Kotia kelamage keleti kefo yama humainaya veamogamina kaiyekea fako humateteno anonaamia alitagifeno neamamie.

Neamamianagi hanaa tamakesa nehaviye tamakaya ania kefo yana nehaya veamogamife “Tamakaya naa kava nehae.” hutama nehutama ani kefo yana nehayanagi “Anumaya Kotia kaiyeke hulamateteno anonaa alitagifeno otamigahie.” hutama nehao? Aao kefo yana ago humainaya anonaa tamamigahie.

Ifi Anumaya Kotia tusiya huno kayone yamaa tamamiteno aupaa kaiyekea hu notamategi ayaayate tamakava maime neuno kefo yama haya yafena anonaa aupaa alitagifeno notamamigetama “Ani kefo yana afa ya kana yane.” hutama tamakesa nehaviyo? Havige nehagi kefo yatamihena tamakua aiyahae hutama “Nagoene ohugahune.” hutama hisayafene huno Anumaya Kotia kayone hulamateno kaiyekema huotamatea yafena nohaviyo?

Kaguamoa tusiya huno tokiyaage humainegeka “Kefo yaniahena nagua aiyahae ohugahue.” hukama nehana yafena Anumaya Kotia kagaila haima vai negatea yana halaya humaleneanagino kaiyekema humatesia yupa agaia fatago huno fako hulamateteno tamaveligahie.
Anumaya Kotia mukia veamoyama humainaya yateti anonaamia alitagifeno amamigahie.
Nagoa veamoya “Anumaya Kotia muse huno tagia alisaga hisigeta tokiyaaene hale yapi maisune.” huya kanale kava huge huge nehaya veamogamina Anumaya Kotia agola maige maige hisaya hamaimula amamigahie.

Amamigahianagi nagoa veamoya amakaiami amaugafahekeya amakesa nehaviya kelamage kemona akave omaleya kefo yamo auava kava akave nemalageno Anumaya Kotia tusiya huno haiya vaimateteno amakata aisia yana amamigahie.

Nagoa veamoya kefo kava maiya huge huge nehaya yafe Anumaya Kotia tusi kana yaene amaugafa amagata aisia yamoene amakaila alino aiso humategahie. Hagoteno Yuta veamogami amamiteno anileti Yuta veane omainaya veanenena amamigahie.

Amamigahianagi fatago kavama nehaya veanea Anumaya Kotia halemainea tokiyaaene ala amakiene amaipamoa falu hisia yaene amamigahie. Hagoteno Yuta veamogami amamiteno anileti Yuta vea omainaya veanenena amamigahie.
Anumaya Kotia mukia veafena nagoke agu agesale maineno neamamie.

Mukia veanea kahegi kema hamaopaigeya ohavineya kefo yama maiya humainesayana Anumaya Kotia ani kahegi keletila kaiyekea hu oamategahigi fako hinageya hanimo aguafi agola amakata aisia no maigahae. Mukia veanea kahegi kema havilineya kefo yama nehaya veanea Anumaya Kotia agaia kahegi keleti kaiyekea alino aye fako humategahie.

Nagoa veamoya kahegi kema haviteya agoma atalenesaya veafena Anumaya Kotia “Fatago veane mainae.” huno hu noamategi kahegi kema akave nemalesaya veafe Anumaya Kotia “Fatago veane mainae.” huno humategahie.

Yuta veane omainaya veamoya Anumaya Koti kahegi kea amakaipina omaleneanagi amakaiami amaku amakesafima hanea kema akave malayana akave malenaya kemoa amakaiami amaku amakesafiti ani kahegi kea ali falote humainae.

Anumaya Kotia agaia kahegi kema amakuafima kae-malenea kea amave-ligeya amaku amakesamoa nagoma hia kanafina “Havi kava nehane.” huno kaiyekea hu neamateno nagoma hia kanafina “Kanale kava nehane.” huno humaineanagino taguafina ago kae-malegeno haneagino tavenelie.

Nagaya Yisasima hulatenea kanale mono kema nehua kefiti ma kea hane, ma mopama hano hisia yupa Anumaya Kotia Yisasi Kalaisi avayafitila mukia veamoya falakiya humainesaya yafena kaiyekea humateteno fako humategahie.
Kagaya “Yuta kano mainoe. Mosese kahegi kea havina akave nemaloanagino naya hugahie.” huka kagaikaa kagi alisaga nehuka “Anumaya Koti nafane mainoe.” huka nehano?
Kahegi kea ago huge kavelige hageka havilinanafe “Anumaya Kotima nehaiya kavafena havitena fatago auava yana ago havilinoa kano mainoe.” huka nehano?
Kagaya ma kagesa nehavine “Kahegi kemo aepaa havilinogi aulaga asu humai kanomo visia kana aveligahue. Hani yapi mainaya veala ayevasa humategahue.” huka nehano?
“Kahegi kemo aepaa havilinoafe nagoa kema ohavinaya veamogamiene osi osi nafaneyagaene humaveli hamaveli hugahue.” huka nehano?
Alu veanea humave-nelinanagi naa higeka kagaikaahena ave notine? “Musufa yana ohiho.” huka huhaleka veala hamanepainanagi kagaikaa musufa yana nehano?

“Kumai he yana ohiho.” huka veala hamanepainanagi kagaikaa ani kumaiya nehano? Ago falimainaya veafe “Anumayati maine.” huya amakisana nevaiya yafena “Onahautafa huno onahaiye.” huka nehananagi ani veamogami mono nopitila musufa yana nehano?
Kagia alisaga nehuka “Kahegi kea havimainoe.” huka nehananagi ani kea ago alitagae-mainanafe Anumaya Koti agia ali haviya nehano?

E, Anumaya Koti kema kae-malenaya autamafina Yuta veamogatihena mage huya humainayane “Tamakaitamia havi kavama nehaya yatamihena Yuta vea omainaya veamoya tamaketeya Anumaya Koti agihena kamuge hatageya vai neatae.” huno humaine.
Kahegi kema akave malesayana Yuta vayamoya humainaya kava huya amakoya anoya laga hu yamoa tamaya hugahianagi kahegi kema alitama atagaesayana tamaugafa taga nehaya yana afa ya kana yane.

Amakoya anoya taga ohunaya vayala Yuta vea omainaya veamoya kahegi kemo akave malesayana Anumaya Kotia ani veafena mage huno hugahie “Nagaini nafaneyaga maineya amaugafa laga humalenaya vaya kana humainae.” huno humategahie.

Kahegi kea akave maletama tamaugafa laga nehagi ani kahegi kema ali neatagaetama nagoa vayamoya, amaugafa laga ohunaya Yuta vea omainaya veamoya, kahegi kema haviya akave maleya tamakaila tamakaseya kanale kava nehaya yamoa “Havi kava nehae.” huno hulamategahie.

Tayafigae Anumaya Koti veanea, Yuta veala, tama veane mainae? Amegati amaugafaage taga humalenayafe Anumaya Koti veala omainagi Anumaya Kotina amakuama amitafa humainayafe Yuta veanelafa mainae. Ani veala kahegi kema akave malenayafe amakaiami amaugafa taga ohunagi Alu Aotage Avamumoa amakupi emaineno haegafa amaku amakesa amamigeya mainae. Veamoya naama humainesaya veamogami amakia alisaga ohugahagi Anumaya Kotia agaiage amakia alisaga hugahie.
Yuta veamoya hanaa huya Yuta vea omainaya veala amakase-mainaya veane mainae? Amaugafa laga hu yamoa na kanale ya amamine?
Tamage Yuta veamoya kanale yana kasagoya alimainae. Hagoteno Anumaya Kotia humainea kema kae-malenaya kea amayapi malene.
Maleneanagi nagoa veamoya haviya amakupi maleya amametiti ohunaya yateti Anumaya Kotia “Hulokiya vaimalenoa yana mukia veamogamina oamamigahue.” huno hugahifi?
Aao ania ohugahie. Mukia veamoya havigeage veane mainesayana Anumaya Kotia tamageage kano maine. Anumaya Koti avopina mage huya kae-malenayane
“Anumaya Kotiga humalenana kemoa ‘Fatago kano mainane.’ huno hugatene. Kaiyekema hugateleasina amakasateasine.” huya kae-malenayane.

Tagaiti kefo yatimoma Anumayamo fatago auava kavama avelisigeta naane hugahune? Anumaya Kotia kefo kava humainona yateti anonaa haima nevaiya yamaa lamiana “Fatago ohia kava nehie.” huta hisuno? Nani kea ohisune. Mukia veamoya nehaya ke nehue.
Fatago ohunea kavala nohie. Fatago kavama ohisiana hanaa huno ma mopale veamogatina kaiyekea hulategahie?
Nagaya havigema nehua yateti Anumaya Koti kelamagemo auava yana amave-lisigeya agima alisaga hisayana naa hinageno Anumaya Kotia nagaifena “Kefo kava nehana kano mainane.” huno hunenate?

Naama hisiana “Kanale yama falote hisia yafena kefo ya higetao.” huta hisuno. Aao, nagoa veamoya havige huya nagaife “Mani kea humaine.” huya haviya haviya-hunatenae. Mani kema humainaya veamogamina Anumaya Kotia kaiyeke humateteno haima nevaiya yana amamigahie.
Naane hisune? Tagaya Yuta veamogata nagoa veala ago amakase-mainono? Aao, tamage huna tamahapauve tagaya mukia veala Yuta veanene Yuta vea omainaya veanene kefo kava nehuna yamo alino aikagilatene.
Anumaya Koti autamafina mage huya kae-malenayane
“Fatago kanoa omaitafa huno omaine.
Nago kanomoa Anumaya Kotina aepaa ohavine. Nago kanomoa Anumaya Kotifena atia noaye.
Ago ataleya kefo kavakeya humainaya veakeya mainagi nagokela fatago kanoa omaitafa huno omaine.
Amavayafitila vaya komufitima hia kava huno himanaage nehie. Amavefunamoa havigeage nehuno ani amavaya aguafinaga osifavemoa vayama amahaegeya nefaliya augafa tina anifinaga hane.
Kamuge vai yaene atuage ke nevaiya yaene amavayafina havate-maine.
Amaiyayeya veala hamaesageya falisaya yategageya age nemalae.
Mukia vea aliya haviya nehuya havi no maisaya yamaage neamamiye.
Amaipa falu huya nagoke amaku amakesale akave malesaya yafena nohamaiye.
Anumaya Kotifena amamayoa aiya kolia nohae.” huya kae-malenayane.

Tagaya havunagenoa Anumaya Koti kahegi kemoa ani kahegi kemo aiyafi mainaya veamogamife humaine. Ani yafe nago kanomoa “Nagaya kanale huna fatago kano mainoe.” huno ohisie. Naafenomagi mukia ma mopale veamogata Anumaya Koti aulagafina kefo kavakeya nehuna veane mainonafe kaiyekea hulateno anonaa tamigahie.
Anumaya Koti kema akave malenea yateti Anumaya Kotia nago kanomofena “Fatago kano mainane.” huno hu oategahie. Kahegi kemoa nagoke yamaage tavenelie. “Kefo kava nehae.” huno tavenelie.

Menia Anumaya Koti aulagafina fatago veane maisuna yana ago tahapaigeta nehavune. Kahegi kema akave malenaya yateti ani yana falote ohunegi alu kateti falote humaineanagino Moseseene Anumaya Koti amaune vayamoyaene kae-malenaya kemoa anima kanale ya huta fatago kavama hisunafe tahapaimainae.

Anima fatago huta maisuna kavala maa humaine, nago kanomoa Yisasi Kalaisi hulatenea yafe havino agupi maleno ametiti humainesia yateti Anumaya Kotia “Fatago kano mainane.” huno hutene. Alu kana omalene.
Mukia veamogata kefo kavaageya nehunanagita Anumaya Kotina haisia kava hisuna tokiyatia kosa he-otateneanagita ikapinaga ohaigahune.

Ohaigahunagi kefo yatimoa tagaila aikagilateneanagi Yisasi Kalaisia tagaila lavayu hisia miyana atalesiafene huno me faligeno Anumaya Kotia agaia kayone yamaaleti “Fatago veane mainae.” huno hulatene.

Tagaya kefo yama huna yafena Anumaya Kotia aipa haviya hulateno vea amaulagafi “Yisasiga faligane.” huno hutegeno me falitegeno kolamaamoa elavi-mainea yafema havita tagupi maleta tametiti hunageno Anumaya Kotia aigetateno kefo yatia atalelatene. Anumaya Kotia nayona kefo yama humainaya veala amakata aisia yana anonaamia aupaa oamaminegi Yisasi Kalaisina hutegeno me falimainea yateti Anumaya Kotia agaia fatago kavama hia yana taveli-maine.

Menia ma mopafi mainona kanafina agaia fatago kavakeyama nehia yana tavelisiafe Yisasina hutegeno me fali-maineafe mukia Yisasima hulatenea yafema haviya amakupi maleya amametiti humainaya veamoya kefo kavala humainayanagi Anumaya Kotia “Fatago veane mainae.” huno huneamate.

Naa humainegi tagaiti lagima alisaga hisuna kaana hanate hane? Omaletafa huno omalene. Mukia kahegi kema akave nemalona yateti tagia alisaga hisuno? Aao, tagaiti kanale kava huna yateti Anumaya Kotia “Fatago veane mainae.” huno huotatenegi Yisasia hulatenea yafe havita tagupi maleta tametiti huna yateti hunelate. Ani lagima alisaga hisuna kaana omalene.

Tagaya mage nehune Yisasia hulatenea yafe havita lagupi maleta tametiti humainona yateti Anumaya Kotia “Fatago veane mainae.” huno hulategahie huta nehune. Kahegi kema akave malesuna yateti hu otategahigi Yisasia hulatenea yafema havita tagupi malona yatetikeya ani kea hulategahie.

Hanaa humaine? Anumaya Kotia Yuta veamogami Anumaya Kotikeya maineo? Ifi Yuta vea omainaya veamogamiene Anumaya Kotiami maineo? Aao, mukia veala Yuta veanene Yuta vea omainaya veanene Anumaya Kotia Anumayaami maine.

Anumaya Kotia nagoke agaiage maineafe Yuta veamoya Yisasima hulatenea yafema haviya amakupi maleya amametiti humainaya yateti Anumaya Kotia “Fatago veane mainae.” huno humateno Yuta vea omainaya veanene Yisasia hulatenea yafema haviya amakupi maleya amametiti humainaya yateti Anumaya Kotia “Fatago veane mainae.” huno humatene.
Ani kea ago humainonafe Yisasife havita lagupi malenona yateti “Anumaya Koti kahegi kemoa afa ya kana ke hane.” huta nehuno? Aao naa ohutafa humainonagi kahegi kemona ali hetita ali lokiya nevaune.
Apalahamua Yuta veamogati taginagomofena naane hisune?
Apalahamua agaia aliyateti mukia kahegi kemona akave maleneafe Anumaya Kotia “Fatago kano mainane.” huno hileasina Apalahamua agaia agia alisaga hileasinagi Anumaya Koti aufina naa kavala ohune.
Anumaya Koti autamafina mage huno kae-malenayane

“Anumaya Kotia Apalahamufena ‘Naa hugategahue.’ huno hulokiya vai-malenea kehena ‘Lamage hanafe ania hunategane.’ huno agupi maleno ametiti hiafe Anumaya Kotia mage huno hutene ‘Fatago kano mainane.’ huno huteneane.” huya kae-malenayane.
Veamoya aliya nealiya yateti miyama alinuyahena ani miyafena “Afaa muse ya nelamie.” huya nohagi “Aliya alimainona anonaa nealune.” huya nehae.

Nago kanomoma “Kahegi kema mukia kanalema akave malesuafe Anumaya Kotia ‘Fatago kano mainane.’ huno hunategahie.” hunoma ohisiana “Anumaya Kotia agaiage kefo kava nehia kanomofena ‘Fatago kano mainane.’ huno hutenea kanomoa nagaila ‘Fatago kano mainane.’ huno hunategahie.” huno ametiti humaineafe Anumaya Kotia anima agupi maleno ametiti humainea yana ageteno “Fatago kano mainane.” huno huneate.

Yuta veamogatina taginagomoa, Tevitia, mage humaine nagoa veamoya kahegi kea akave omaleya Anumaya Kotife haviya amakupi malesayana Anumaya Kotia amakaifena “Fatago veane mainae.” huno humatesia veamoya tusia muse hugahae.
Tevitia amakaifena mage huno Anumaya Koti avopina humaineane
“Veamogatama kefo kavama haya kavala Anumaya Kotia ago aigetamateno atalelamateneafe muse hiho. Kefo yama haya kavala ago ayehami-taleneafe muse hiho.
Anumayamoa nago kanomo humainea kefo yafena havino oamino age kanitesiana ani kanomoa muse hugahie.” huno humaineane.

Amaugafa laga humainaya Yuta vayafekeya ani musena hisae huno nehio? Aao, amaugafa laga ohunesaya veanene ania huya musena hugahae. Apalahamufe tagesa havisune. Anumaya Kotia Apalahamufena “Naa kavala hugategahue.” huno hulokiya vaimalenea kehena “Tamage hananagika ania hunategane.” huno agupi maleno ametiti humainea yateti Anumaya Kotia “Fatago kano mainane.” huno hutene.
Apalahamua hanaa huno mainegeno Anumaya Kotia “Fatago kano mainane.” huno hutene? Agoya anoya laga hutegeno huteneo? Aao, laga ohunea kanafi ani kea huteneane.

Hagoteno augafa laga ohuneno Anumaya Koti kea havino agupi maleno ametitia humainea yateti Anumaya Kotia “Fatago kanoa mainane.” hunoma hutenea yafema veamoya havisaya yafe augafa laga humaine. Ani yafe mukiamoya amaugafa laga ohuneya Apalahamuma humainea kava huya Anumaya Kotife haviya amakupi maleya amametiti humainaya yateti “Fatago veane mainae.” huno humatenesia veamoya Apalahamuna aginagomoya mainae.

Mainagi nagoa veamoya amaugafa laga humainayanagi ani kavakeyama ohayana Apalahamuma augafa laga ohunea kanafima humainea kava huya Anumaya Kotife haviya amakupi malenaya kavaene humainaya veamogami totoamimo maine.

Anumaya Kotia Apalahamuene aginagomoenefe mage huno humaineane “Mukia ma mopagefa kava yagaisayafe tamamigahue.” huno hulokiya vaimalene. “Kahegi kemona akave maletesagena tamamigahue.” huno ohunegi “Tamakaya Anumaya Kotife havitama lamakupi malagena ‘Fatago veani mainae.’ huna hulamatoafe tamamigahue.” huno humaineane.
Kahegi kema akave nemalaya veamoya alileasina haviya amakupi nemalaya yamoa afa ya kana higeno hulokiya vai-malenea kemoa falote ohileasine.
Kahegi kemoa Anumaya Kotina hai vaigeno anonaa nelamianagi kahegi kema omalesina “Ago ali neatagaune.” huya ohaleasine.

Anumaya Kotia hulokiya vai-malenea kemoa kayone nehia yamaaleti falote hisiafeene mukia Apalahamuna aginagomoya alisaya yafeene “Agaife haviya amakupi maleya amametiti humainaya yateti aligahae.” huno humaine. Kahegi kema akave nemalaya veamoyage oaligahagi taginagomoa, Apalahamuma, ametiti humainea kava hisuna veamogatina Apalahamua nealafa maine.
Mage huya Apalahamufena kae-malenayane
“Kagaya mukia kotega veamogamina totoamimoga maigane.” huya kae-malenayane.

Apalahamua Anumaya Kotife havino agupi maleno ametiti humaineafe Anumaya Koti aulagalela tototimo maine. Anumaya Kotia falimainaya veala eteno hamaimula neamamino falote ohunea yamofena “Falote huo.” huno higeno falote humainea kano maine.
Apalahamua ani kehena havino ametitia hianagi nafanema atesia kanaamoa ago hano humainea yafena agesa ohavinegi “Mukia kotega veamogamina totoamimoga maigane.” huno humainea kele ametiti humaine.

Ani kanafina Apalahamua vani hataletia (100) kafu ago hano hutegeno kolamoa ago hau higeno nafane atesia tokiyaa omalegeno aamoenena namo a mainea yafena tole agesa ohavinegi tokiyaage huno Anumaya Kotife havino agupi maleno ametitia humaine.
Anumaya Kotia “Hugategahue.” huno humainea kehena “Namisio onamisio?” huno tole agesa ohavinegi Anumaya Koti agia alisaga nehuno havino agupi maleno ametiti hia yamoa alakefa humaine.
“Hugategahue huno humainea yana namigahie.” huno agesa havilama humaine.
Naa humaineafe Anumaya Kotia “Fatago kanoa mainane.” huno hutene.

“Anumaya Kotia ‘Fatago kanoa mainane.’ huno hutene.” huno kae-malenea kea agaiagefekeyana ohunegi tagaienefe mani kea humaineane. Tagaya “Anumaya Kotia Yisasi Kalaisina falimainefiti alino hetitenea kano maine.” huta havita lagupi maleta tametiti hunageno “Fatago veanea mainae.” huno hulatene.

Anumaya Kotia Yisasina kefo yatia ayehami-talesiafe hutegeno me falimaine. Faliteno tagaifena “Fatago veaneniae.” huno hulatenea kemona tokiyaage huno hanesiafe Anumaya Kotia Yisasina fali-mainefitila ali hetitene.

Tagaya Yisasia hulatenea yafema havita tagupi maleta tametiti humainonafe Anumaya Kotia “Fatago veane mainae.” huno hulatene. Anumayatimoa, Yisasi Kalaisi, ani kavala hulateneafe Anumaya Koti tokiya hale yapi maigahune.
Yisasi Kalaisia agaia hulatenea yateti ka valilategeta Anumaya Kotina kayone yamaafi umaineta Anumaya Kotina tokiya hale yamaafi mo lokaeta maisunafe tametitia huta musena nehune.
Ani yafekela musena nohunagi kana yapiti tokiya vaisuna yatimoa falote hisiafene huta kana yama vayi hiana ani yafena muse nehune.
Tokiya vaisuna yatimoma hanesigenoa Anumaya Kotia muse hulatesia auava yatimoa falote hisigeno Anumaya Kotia tagu tamena aligatisiafe tametitia nehuta agava mainone.
Anumaya Kotia Alu Aotage Avamula ago tamigeno lagupi mainegeno ani Avamuteti aluya huno hau ayamopafi nehaiya yana tamineafe tametiti hisuna yana afa ya kana ohugahigi taya hugahie.
Nayona tagayama kanale kava hisuna amukotima omalenea kanafina, Anumaya Kotima malenea kanafina, Kalaisia tagayama kefo yama nehuna veamogatilefene huno me falimaine.
Nago kanomoa fatago kanomona aya hisuafene huno ofalileasine. Tamage nagoke kanomoa kayoneage kanomona aya hisuafene huno falileasino?
Ohavinonagi tagaya kefo kavakeya huta maunageno Kalaisia tagaifene huno me falimainea yateti Anumaya Kotia tagaifena hau ayamopafi nehaiya yana taveli-maine.

Agaia kolamaaleti kefo yama humainona anonatia aligeno Anumaya Kotia “Fatago veane mainae.” huno hulateteno nagoene taya huno kefo yama nehuna yana Anumaya Kotia hai vaino anonatia tamigahe hianagi Yisasima falimainea yateti tagai anona ago alimaineafe tagu tamena aligatigahie.

Tagaya Anumaya Kotina kame huteta mainona kanafina agaia nafanemo falimainea yateti Anumaya Kotia “Afaa maiho.” huno ali falu hulategeta nagoke taipale maineta Anumaya Kotiene taipamoa falu higeta mainonageno Yisasia fali-mainefiti heti-mainea haimuaene maineanagino nagoene taya huno tagu tamena aligatigahie.
Nagi nago yana Anumayatimoa, Yisasi Kalaisima hulatenea yafena Anumaya Kotife aluya huta musena nehune. Yisasi Kalaisia ago lavaleno Anumaya Kotiene nagopi ailokaelategeta nagoke taipale mainone.

Atamua, nagoke kanomo, kefo yana higeno ani kefo yama humainea yamoa ma mopafina falote hutegeno kefo yama humainea kumiamoa haneafe veama fali yana alifalote higeno mukia veamoya kefo yama hayafe anonaamia fali yamoa mukia veapina emaine.
Kahegi kemoa omenegeno kefo yana haneanagino kahegi kema omalesina Anumaya Kotia nagoke nagokemogati kefo yatihena ohavisine.

Atamu mainea kanaleti aepa heya veala falimainae. Falime falime uya Mosese mainea kanafina ania huya mukia falimainae. Nagoa veamoya Atamuma atagae-mainea kava huya oatagaenayanagi afaa falimainae. Haenagama esia kanoa Yisasi Kalaisi amemaa kana huno Atamua taveli-maine.

Atamuma humainea kefo yaene Anumaya Kotia kayone hulatenea yamoene nago avamete ohunegi alua lua humainae. Tamage nagoke kanomoa kefo yama humainea yateti mukia veala nefaliyanagi Anumaya Kotia tusi ya huno kayone yamaafiti nagoke kanoa, Yisasi Kalaisia, kanale yama hulatenea yana afaa lamigeno tusiya huno fali yamona agaseno kasagoya veala ali kayone humatene.

Anumaya Kotia kayone hulatenea yaene Atamua kefo yama humainea anonaaenena nago avamete ohunegi alua lua humainae. Nagoke kanomoa kefo kavama humaineafe Anumaya Kotia mukia veamogamina kaiyekea humateteno “Hanimo aguafi agola tamakata aisia no maigahae.” huno humateneanagi kasagoya veamoya kasagoya kefo yana humainayanagi kayone humatenea veamogamina “Fatago veane.” huno humatene.

Tamage nagoke kanomo kefo yana humainea yateti faliyamoa falote hu-maineanagiya mukia veamoya nefaliyanagi nagoke kanomoa, Yisasi Kalaisi, hulatenea yateti kasagoya veamoya Yisasia kanale ya huno kayone hulatenea yafema haviya amakupi malaya veamogamife Anumaya Kotia “Fatago veane mainae.” huno hu-matesigeya agola maige maige hisaya hamaimula aliteya Kalaisia hulatenea yateti tokiya vaiya maigahae.

Naa humaineafe nagoke kanomo kefo yana humainea yateti mukia veamogamina Anumaya Kotia kaiyekea humateteno “Hanimo aguafi agola tamakata aisia no maigahae.” huno hulateanagi nagoke kanomo fatago kava hu-maleneafe Anumaya Kotia agaife havino neamino kasagoya veamogamifena “Fatago veane mainae.” huno humatenea yateti agola maige maige hisaya hamaimula ago alimainae.

Nago kanoa, Atamue, Anumaya Koti kea akave omaleafe mukia veamoya kefo yamaagela nehaya veane mainagi nagoke kanomoa, Yisasia, Anumaya Koti kea akave maleneafe Anumaya Kotia kasagoya veamogamifena “Fatago veane mainae.” huno humategahie.
Hu-mategahianagi Anumaya Kotia kahegi kema amamiana tusiya huya alitagae-mainae. Kefo yama haya yamoa alakefa hianagi Anumaya Kotia kayone hulatenea yamoa ani kefo yamona agaseno tusia yakefa hane.

Kefo yama humainaya anonaa mukia veanea nefaliyanagi kayone hulatenea yamaa tusiya huno haneafe Anumayatimoa, Yisasi Kalaisi falimainea yateti Anumaya Kotia kayone hulateno “Fatago veanea mainae.” huno hulateteno agola maige maige hisuna tahaimula lamine.
Tagaya na ke hugahune? Tagaya kefo yama hisunagenoa Anumaya Kotia kayone hisuna yamaa tagaipina ala huno havatelatesie huta hisuno?
Na kea ohutafa huta ohisune. Kefo kava nehuna yana ago ataleta falimainea augafa veane mainone. Falimainaya veamoya kefo yana ohugahae.
Yisasi Kalaisiene alino tategeta aigamaeta agaiene falimainageya tima fale-latenaya kea ohavinao?

Tamage tima fale-latenaya yamoa Yisasi Kalaisiene aigamaeta agaiene falunageno komufina hevailategeno Nelafaa tokiya hale yamaaleti Kalaisina komufitila alino hetitenea kava huno tagaienena ali hetilateteno haegafa tahaimula tamigeta ali-mainonafe kanaleya huta haegafa auava yapi vaiyesune.
Tagaya agaiene aigamaeta agayama humainea kava huta faliteta ania huta agaiene aigamaeta fali-mainefiti hetimainea kava huta hetigahune.

Tagaya havimainone kefo yamo tokiya ago fali hano hisiafe nayoma nehavuna atafa lagu tagesa Yisasi Kalaisiene aigamaeno yafaga yosale ago fali-maineanagita tagaya kefo yamo aliya veane nagoene omaisune.
Fali-mainesia kanomona kefo yamoa nagoene atafa ohugahie. Hai falimaine.
Tagaya Kalaisiene aigamaeta fali-mainesunana ania huta agaiene fali-mainesupitila hetita maigahune huta tagupi havita malenone.
Tagaya ago nehavune Yisasi Kalaisia fali-mainefiti ago heti-maineafe nagoene eteno ofaligahie. Fali yamoa tokiyaa omaletafa huno omaleneafe kava yagai oategahie.
Nagoke yupa kanoa kefo yamo tokiya hegaseno fali-maineafe nagoene eteno ofaligahie. Haegafa haimu alino Anumaya Kotina haiya kava hisiafe maine.

Naa humaineafe tamakaienena ani lamakesa havi havi hutama maiho, “Kalaisi falimainea avamete nagaya ago fali-mainoanagino kefo yamo tokiyamoa nagoene kava huonategahie. Yisasi Kalaisiene aigamaena Anumaya Kotina haisia kava hisue.” hutama hiho.
Na yafe kefo yamoa “Ala kavatami mainoe.” huno falisia tamaugafamoa “Age haye hisia kava huo.” huno kava oyagaisie.

Kefo kava hisaya yafena tamaiya, tamayana, tamaulaga, kefo yamote aliyafena tamakua oamiho. Mukia Anumaya Kotina agaiage amiho. Tamakaya falimainafiti hetimainaya veane mainagi tamaugafamoa mukia kanale auava yama alisiafe Anumaya Kotina amiho.

Tamakaya kahegi kemoa tamaku tamamena aligatisiafe tamametitia nohagi “Anumaya Kotia kayone hulateteno ago aligati-maine.” hutama nehae. Ani yafe kefo yamoa tamakaila “Na kava hiho.” huno ala kavatamia omaitafa huno omaisie.
Tagaya naane hugahune? Kahegi kemo akave malesune huta tametitia nohunagi Anumaya Kotia kayone hulatenea yafe havita tametitia nehuta kefo yana kanalelagita hisuno? Ania ohutafa huta ohugahune.

Tamakaya ohavinao? Nago kanoma mukia lamaku tamakesa hakitama amitetama agai avaya ali hipoya hutama maisayana ani kanomo aliya veaa maigahae. Kefo yama hu yamo aliya veanema mainutamahena ani kefo yama nehaya anonaa alitetama falitama agola Anumaya Kotienena omaileasinagi tamakaya Anumaya Koti kea akave male yamo aliya veanema mainutamahena ani kema akave malaya anonaa alisageno Anumaya Kotia “Fatago veane mainae.” huno hulamategahie.
Tamage nayona tamakaya kefo yamo aliya veane mainageno Anumaya Koti kea huhalagetama havilama hutama ago akave malenae. Naa humainayafe Anumaya Kotina musena huneatone.
Kefo yamoma nofi hulamatenea yapitila Anumaya Kotia ago alino kalu helamategetama fatago yamo aliya veane mainae.

Kema havi yatamimoa yaufa akavi ohuneafene huna veamogata tagu tagesafiti nehuna kea tamahanepaugi haviho hagotetama tamaiya, tamayana, mukia yatamia “Kefo yamo aliya nafane maiho.” hutama hu-mainayanagi menia tamaiya, tamayana, mukia yatamia fatago hisia yamo aliyate aminutamahena Anumaya Kotina alu aotage veanea maigahae.
Hagotetama kefo yamo aliya veanea mainetama fatago kavala ohisaya tamakesa havimainayane.

Kefo yamo aliya veane mainetama ani kavala humainayafe anonatamia hana augafa kanale ya alimainae? Menia ani yafena tamakaye hisifa yamaage hanegi anonaa kanale yana oalinae. Ago falitetama Anumaya Kotienena omaisaya yamaage ali falote humainae.

Kefo yamoma nofi hulamatenea yapitila menia Anumaya Kotia ago alino kalu helamateteno “Aliya veanimogatama maiho.” huno higetama mainageno ani aliyamo anonaa “Tamakaya alu aotage veanenia agola maige maige hisaya tamahaimula aligahae.” huno humaine.

Kefo yamo aliya veamoya anonaamima alisaya yana fali yane. Faligahagi Anumaya Kotia nagola muse yana afaa nelamie. Anumayatimoa Yisasi Kalaisiene ailokaeta mainonafe agola maige maige hisuna tahaimula ago tamine.

Nafunaganagatama, kahegi kema havilama hulinaya veane, tamahanepauve veama ofaliya afaa mainaya kanafina kahegi kea akave maleya aiyaafinaga mainagi falisayana ani kemo aiyaafinaga omaigahae. Ani yafena lamakaya havimainafi ohavinae?

Nagola avame kea tamahapaigahugi haviho. Nago amoa vele mainesigenoa kahegi kemoa neveene kino anatafa hulisigeana mainesaanageno nevema falisigenoa kinoma anatafa huligeana nemaia kemoa nagoene atafa hulino omaigahianagi afaa alu velela maigahie.

Nevema ofalino afaa mainesigenoma alu vele visiana ani amofena “Kumai a mainane.” huya hugahagi nevema ago falisigenoa kahegi kemoa nofima kitenea yana ago kalu hemaineafe nago kanoma alisiana “Kumai he a mainane.” huya ohugahae.

Nafunaganagatama hagotetama kahegi kemote tamametitia humainagi Kalaisi augafaene ailokaetama Kalaisiene fali-mainayafe kahegi kemona ago ataletama Anumaya Kotite kanale auava ya alitama falote hisayafe alu kanomoene, faliteno komufiti ago eteno heti-mainea kanomoene, ailokaetama mainae.

Hagoteta tagaya atafa lagu tagesaene mainonageno kahegi kemoa “Naa kavala ohiho.” huno higeta ageta lahaye hisuna kefo tagu tagesa alino helafigeno mukia taugafamoa ania huno kefo yama hiafe fali yamaagela ali falote humaine.

Humaineanagi meni kanafina tagaya Kalaisiene falunageno tatafama hulinea kahegi kea ago alino kalu hetalegeta menia haegafa lagu tagesa Alu Aotage Avamuteti Anumayamo kea akave nemalone. Nayoma hanea avopima kae-malenaya kahegi kemo akavema malenona augafa kavala nohune.

Naane hisune? “Kahegi kemoa havi yane.” huta hisuno? Naa ohutafa huta ohugahune. Kahegi kemoa kefo yama naveotileasina “Kefo yana nehue.” huna ohavuleasine. Ani kemoa “Alu kanomo yatela ageka kahayea ohuo.” huno ohileasina nagaya alu kanomo yatela agena nahayema nehua yafena nagayea ohileasine.

Kahegi kemoa kefo kavala naveligeno kefo kavala falote huno mukia age nahayema hua yana naguafi falote nehie. Kahegi kema omaleleasina kefo yamoa fali-mainea augufa kava higena kefo yafena nagayea ohuleasine.

Hagotena kahegi kema ohavinoa kanafina afaa mainoanagi kahegi kema falote higena agetena “Kefo yana nehuafe faligahue.” huna humainoane. “Tamahaimu tamamigahue.” huno humainea kahegi kemoa eteno kefo yama humainoafe nahaegena fali-mainoe.
Kahegi kemoa “Naa kavala ohuo.” huno higena havuanagi ani kefo yamoa ayenavataga higena ani kefo yama humainoafe nahaegena fali-mainoe.
Kahegi kemoa alu aotage ke, tusiya huno fatago humainea keage hane.

Haneanagi ani kanale yamoa nagaila nahaegena falimainofi? Naa ohutafa huno ohunegi kefo yamoa ani kanale keleti nagaila nahaegena falimainoe. Kefo yamoa fufu yate efalote hutegeno kahegi kemoa “Tusia havi kefo ya hane.” huno aepaa naveligena agetena “Tamage ani kefo yana ase ohu yane.” huna nehue.
Tagaya ago nehavune Anumaya Kotia kahegi kea ago tamineanagi nagaya mopale kanoa atafa nagu nagesaene kano mainogeno kefo yamoa nofi hunategena agai aliya nealue.
Nagayama nehua yamo aepaa ohavinoe. “Nenahaiya yama hisue.” huna hua yana nohuanagi “Onahaiya yane.” huna hua yamaage mukia kanafina maina nehue.
“Onahaiye.” hunama hua kavala huge huge maina nehue “Kahegi kemoa fatago humainea ke hane.” huna nehue.
Menia ago havilinoe nagainia ani kavala maina nohugi kefo yamoa nagupi maineno ani kavala nehie.
Nagaya havuana atafa naipafina nago kanale yana omalegena “Kanale kava hisua yafena nenahaiye.” huna nehuanagi ani kanale kavala hisua tokiyania omalene.
“Nahaiya kanale kavala hugahue.” huna nehuanagi ani kavala nohugi kefo yafema “Onahaiye.” huna nehua yamaage maina nehue.
“Onahaiyema.” huna hua yafema hisuana ani kavala nakainia nohugi kefo yama nagupima hanea yamo ani kavala nehie.
Ania nehigena mania augafa kavama huana nagaya “Kanale kavakeya hisue.” huna huanagi kefo yamoa nagaipina hanegena maina nehue.
Naguamoa Anumaya Koti haiya kavafena nehaiye.

Nehaigenoagi naulaga, nagesa, nayamoa mukia naugafamoa kefo yama hisaya amakesa huteya nagupima haneno Anumaya Kotifema nehaiya nagu nagesaene tu nehuya naugafamona kefo yamoya avaleya nofipi hayagiya ateteya “Tagai ke havio.” huya nehae.
Avoneo kefo kava nehua kano mainoe. Falisua naugafale mainoanagino hana kanomo naugafa alino katigahie?

Anumayati Yisasi Kalaisia nagu namena ago aligati-maineafe Anumaya Kotifena aluya huna musena huneatoe. Nagainia nagu nagesafiti Anumaya Kotina haiya kavala akave nemaloanagi atafa naipamoa kefo yamo akave nemale.
Yisasi Kalaisiene ailokaeta mainona veamogata Anumaya Kotia nagola kaiyekea hulateno kefo yama humainona anonaa otamigahie.
Kefo yama huna falisua yamo nofipi mainogeno Yisasi Kalaisia falimainea yateti haimu hanea Alu Aotage Avamumo tokiyaleti ali kalu heno natalene.

Kahegi kemoa “Fatago veane mainae.” huno hulatesia tokiyaa atafa tagu tagesamoa ani kahegi kea akave malesia tokiyamoa omalegeno ani kahegi kemoa tagaila alino kanale kavala hu otategahigi Anumaya Kotia nafanea hutegeno tagaya kefo veamogata mauna augafa avamete augafa kalimai kano emainegeno tagayama kefo yama humainona yateti tagata aisia yana anonatia Yisasina amigeno alino faligeno Anumaya Kotia kefo yatimo tokiyaa alitalene.
Alitalegeta menia tagaya atafa lagu tagesalela tahanepaiya kavala huta vainoayonagi Alu Aotage Avamumo tahapaiya kava huta vaiyatete nehuta kahegi kemo fatago auava ya huta kaana vaineayone.

Veamoya atafa amaku amakesalema vaiyayana amaugafa age hamaye hisaya yate amakesa havi havi huya ani katega nevayanagi nagoa veamoya Alu Aotage Avamumoa “Vaiyeho.” huno hia kate vaiyatetema hayana Alu Aotage Avamumona haiya amakesa havi havi huya mainae.

Veamoya atafa amaku amakesale amaugafa age hamahaye hisayana faligahagi veamoya Alu Aotage Avamumo haisia yafema amakesa havi havi hisayana amaipamoa falu higeya agola maige maige hisaya hamaimula alimainae.
Atafa amaku amakesale amaugafa age hamaye hisaya veamoya Anumaya Kotina kame tagiya kaeneateya Anumaya Koti kahegi kemona akave omaleya ani kea akave malesaya tokiyaamia omaletafa huno omalene.

Veamoya atafa amaku amakesa akave malesayana Anumaya Kotima haiya kavala ohaleasinagi tamakaya atafa tamaku tamakesa akave nomalagi Alu Aotage Avamumoa tamakupi maineafe agai kea akave nemalae. Nagoa veamoya Kalaisina Alu Aotage Avamuamoma amakupinaga omainesiana Kalaisi nafanea omainae.
Kefo yama humainayafe tamaugafamoa ago falimainegi Kalaisia tamakupi mainenageno Anumaya Kotia “Fatago veane mainae.” huno hulamateneafe tamaku tamamemoa agola maige maige huno maine.

Anumaya Kotia, Yisasina fali-mainefiti ali hetitenea kanomo, Avamumoa tamakai tamakupima mainesiana Yisasi Kalaisina fali-mainefiti ali hetitenea kanomoa tamakupi mainea Avamuteti manima falisaya tamaugafa ali hetilamateno tamahaimula tamamigahie.

Nafunaganagatama Yisasia hulatenea yafena anonaa amisuna yana hane. Atafa lagu tagesamoa kanale yana huotateneanagino agaila amisuna anonaa omaleanagita atafa lagu tagesa akave maleta taugafamoa age haye hisia kavala ohisune.
Aao atafa lamaku tamakesalema vaiyesayana faligahagi Alu Aotage Avamumo tokiyaleti tamaugafa age haye hisia yama hae falisayana agola maige maige hisaya tamahaimuene maigahae.
Anumaya Koti Avamumo kema akave maleya vaiyayana Anumaya Koti nafaneyaga mainae.

Alu Aotage Avamumoa etetama koli hisaya nofipina hulamatesiafe tamakupina omenegi tamakaila “Anumaya Koti nafaneyaga maiho.” huno hulamatesiafe tamakupi emainegetama Anumaya Kotife “Tatao, Nelafao.” hutama nehae.
Nehageno Alu Aotage Avamumoa agaia “Tamakaya Anumaya Koti nafane mainae.” huno lagupina tahanepaiye.
Tahapaigeta tagaya Anumaya Koti nafanema mainonana Nelafa yana Kalaisiene tagai yatafa hapaegahie. He Kalaisiene kana yama alisunana ania huta agaiene tokiya haleyamaaene ala agiene aligahune.

Nagaya nagesa havuana haenagama Anumaya Kotia tokiya hale yamaa fufu yate ali falote hinageno tavelisigeta agesuna yafe tagesa haviteta “Meni kanafima tagata aiya yama nealuna yana afa ya kana humaine.” huta hugahune.
Mukia Anumaya Kotima talo humalenea yana agesaga huya Anumaya Koti nafanemoya falote hisigeya agesaya yafe ageke huya agava mainae.

Mukia Anumaya Koti talo humalenea yana kasaliya haviya nehae. Amakaya hamaiya yateti ani kavala nohagi Anumaya Kotia “Haenagaa kanale yama falote hugahie.” huno agaia anima kasalisaya nofipina humategeya mainae.

Mainagi haenagaa Anumaya Kotia kasalino haviya hisia nofipima mainaya yana ali-talesigeta tagaya, Anumaya Koti anagamogatina, nofipiti tavayu hinageta ali-mainona tokiya hale yapi tagima hanea yana aligahune.
Tagaya ago nehavune meni kanafina mukia Anumaya Koti talo humalenea yamoya amakatama aiyana anemoya nafanema ategahe hageno inamu yama alimatea augafa kava huya hume hume haiya meni kanafina neae.

Neagi amakaiamigela ani kavala nohagi Anumaya Kotia tagaifena “Haenagaa mukia yama tamamigahue.” huno hagoteno Alu Aotage Avamula ago tamigeta avale-mainonanagi ania huta tagupi “Avonio.” huta kasalisia taugafa aligatisigeno haegafa taugafa falote hisigeno Anumaya Kotia agaia “Nafaneyagani mainae.” huno hulatesiafe tametitia nehuta agava mainone.
