Anumaya Kotia tagu tamema aligati-mainea kanafina mage huno humaine “Tamaugafa aligatisuafe tamametiti hutama nagava maiho.” huno higeta agava mainone. Nagola veamoya agoma alimainaya yafena agava ohugahae.
Oagenona yama “Aligahune.” huta tametitilafama hisunana tamena malelava huta agava maigahune.
Maigahunanagi fulu fulu veane mainonafe “Naafe Anumayamotega nunamuna huta havigesune?” huta nehunanagi Alu Aotage Avamumoa “Vaeha.” huno ohavunamaa kea Anumayamotega taya huno havinege.

Nehigeno Anumaya Kotia veamogatina taguafima hanea yana agelama huno neageno Alu Aotage Avamumona agu agesafima hanea yaene agemaine. Ani Avamumoa Anumaya Kotima haiya yafena ago haviteno Yisasi anagala amaya hugahe nunamuna huno havinege.

Tagaya ago havimainone Anumaya Kotife hamau amayamopafi nehamaiya veamoya, Anumaya Kotina agaima haisia kava hisayafe ke huno agaialega amavaleno amatenea veamogamite, mukia falote hisia yana kanale yaene kana yaene Anumaya Kotia alino kanale huneamate.

Anumaya Kotia nayona ago amaketeno hapalimatenea veala agaia nafanemo avamete veane maisae huno amategeya mukia veala mainagi Kalaisina nafanea hagoteno ategeno “Ala nepuamimo maisiafene.” huno hutene.
Anima hapalimatenea veafena ke huno agaialega amateteno kefo yamaage nehaya veane mainagi Yisasi humatenea yateti “Fatago veane mainae.” huno humateteno tokiya hale yamaa amamine.
Naa humaineafe tagaya naane huta hisune? Anumaya Kotia tagaima laya hisiana ta tagaila kamea hulategahie?
Anumaya Kotia “Nafanenia otamamigahue.” ohutafa huno ohunegi afaa lagaife huno hutegeno emaineanagino mukia yama laya hisia yaene tamigahie.
Anumaya Kotima hapali-malenea veanea ta kaiyekea humategahie? Anumaya Kotia agaia “Ago fatago veane mainae.” huno hulatene.

Hana kanomo kaiyekea hulateno “Tagata aisia yana aligahae.” huno hulategahie? Yisasi Kalaisia faliteno hetino haino Anumaya Kotina tamaga ayatega maineno taya hisia yafena Nefatega ke huno nunamupiti havinegeafe nago kanomoa kaiyekea hulateno ali haviyana huotategahie.

Kalaisia tagaifena tusiya huno hau ayamopafi nehaiya yamaa ta tahafalegahie? Tagaya kana yapi maisunano tusi lagata aisia yapino, veamoya havi kavama hulatesaya yapino, kafu kana falote hisigeno tagatesia yapino, mukia yatima omalesia yapino, nagoa havi kavamo tagaila alino haviya hisia yapino, tahaesageta falisuna yama falote hisia yapino? Ani yayaga hau ayamopafi nehaiya yana alino tahaofalegahianagino Kalaisia tagaifema hau ayamopafi nehaiya yamaamoa hanege hanege huno hanegahie.
Anima havi yayagama falote hisia yafena Anumaya Koti autamafina mage huya kae-malenayane
“Kagai nafaneyaga mainonafe mukia yagefina tagaila tahaeya fali hano nehae. Tagaya sipi sipi afu kana huta mainonageya tagaifena ‘Hamaesuna veane mainae.’ huya nehae.” huya kae-malenayane.
Mukia mani havi yayagahema “Aoteyamaae.” huta hisune. Kalaisia tagaifema hau ayamopafi haumainea kanomo tokiyaleti mukia ani yayaga amakaseta mainone.

Nagaya ani yafena havilama huna nagupi malenoe. Anumaya Kotia tagaifena hau ayamopafi nehaiya yana nago yamoa tahaofalegahie. Falisunano, mainesunano, ensole vayalo, Satani Avamulo, menima hanea yano, haenagama falote hisia yano Anumaya Kotia tagaifema hau ayamopafi nehaiya yana tahaofaletafa hugahae.

Ikate yano mopamona afete hanea yano nagoa mukia Anumaya Koti talo humalenea yano Anumaya Kotina hau ayamopafima nehaiya yamaa tahaofaletafa hugahae. Anumayatimoa Yisasi Kalaisi hulatenea yateti agaiene ailokaeta mainonafe Anumaya Kotia lagaifena hau ayamopafi agola hauge hauge huno nehaiye.
Kalaisiene aigamaena mainoafe tamagelafa nehue. Havige nohue. Alu Aotage Avamumoa nagupi mainegena nagualeti tamage nehue.
Yuta anaganimoya Yisasi kea ohaviyayafe mukia kanafina naipamoa kanaage nehuno nagata neaiye.

Nagoke nofi anaganimoya amakua aiyahae huya Yisasi ke havisayafe Anumayamotega ke huna havigesugeno “Hai vainateno natalenegena hani yapi nagaila nenateka ani veala amavalesane.” huna havigesua nagesa nehavue.

Nagai nofi anagala Isaleli veanea Anumaya Kotina nafaneyagaa mainageno Anumaya Kotia agaia tokiya hale yamaa amaveliteno alino hagelafi-matenea kea humateteno kahegi kea amamino agai agima alisaga hisaya aliyana amamino “Maa yama hulamategahue.” huno hulokiya vaimalenea kea hamapai-maine.

Ani nofipiti tokiyaage taginagomoya falote humainayanagino Kalaisia Anumaya Kotima tamaugafa aligatigahie huno hutenea kanoa ani taginagomoyafiti velafa maisiafe falote humaine. Kalaisia mukia yana kava yagaino Anumaya Koti maineanagita mukia kanafina agola agia alisaga hisune. Tamage.
Anumaya Kotima hulokiya vaimalenea kemoa falote huno afa ya kana nehie huna nehuo? Aao na kea nohugi Isaleli veafe tamage nehue mukia ani veamoya Anumaya Kotina nafaneyagaa omainae.
Mukia Apalahamuna aginagomoya nafaneyagaa omaitafa huya omainagi nayona Anumaya Kotia Apalahamufena mage higeno autamafina kae-maleneane
“Kagaika nafanemoa Aisakima atesia nafaneyaga kagai kaginagomoya maitafa huya maigahae.” huno humaineane.

Ani kemo aepaa mage humaine mukia vealavemoya nehaya kavateti Apalahamuma atenea nafaneyaga Anumaya Koti nafaneyaga omainagi Anumaya Kotia hulokiya vai-malenea kelema amametiti humainaya veafe “Apalahamuna nafaneyagaa mainae.” huno humateneane.
Anima hulokiya vaimalenea kemoa mage huno humaine “Nagayama malenoa kanamoma efalote hisigenoa Selaa ne nafane ategahie.” huno humaineane.

Ani yamaagefeno-magi taginagomoa Aisakia ko huteno aama Lepekana alitenegeno aipa yama hiana kuyave nafanelata aipafina kanale yano havi yano huana ohunaa kanafinagino Anumaya Kotima humaineana agaia haiya yateti veala hapalilatenea kava huno Anumaya Kotia mage huno itaanimofena hapaiye “Yage nafanekamoa haenaga nafanekamo aliya kano maineno akave malegahie.” huno humaineane. Ani yamofena mage huno humaine Anumaya Kotia veala kanale kavama humainayafene huno ohapaligahianagino haisia kanomofe ke hinageno agaitega egahie.
Anumaya Koti autamafina mage huno humaineane “Yekopua nahau nayamopafi nahaiya kanogi Isoa onahaiya kano maine.” huno humaineane.
Naa hu-maineanagita naane huta hisune? “Anumaya Kotia fatago ohia kava humaine.” huta hisuno? Aao naa kea ohutafa huta ohugahune.
Mosesefena mage huno humaineane “Nago kanohema ‘Nahau hutena kalagi aitegahue.’ hunama hisua kanomona kalagila aitegahue.” huno humaineane.

Naa humaineafe Anumaya Kotia kalagi aisia yana veamoya “Namisie namisie.” huya nehuya veamoya “Nayamufa aina aliya alisuafe kalagila ainategahie.” huya hisaya yatetila kalagila aioamategahie. Anumaya Kotia “Ma kanomofe nenahaiyanagina kalagi aitegahue.” huno hisia kanomona hau huno kalagila aineate.
Anumaya Kotia Isipi sauve kanoa Felofe mage huno higeya kae-malenayane
“Alihetigatenoa yafe mukia veamoya tokiyania agesaya yafeene navagemoa mukia kumate ute ete hisia yafeene ‘Kagaya ala kano maiyo.’ huna ali hetigatenoe.” huno humaineane.
Anumaya Kotia haisia veamogamina hauna humateno kalagila aimatenegi agaia kema ohavisaya yafe nagoa veamogamina amaku amakesa alino aililematene.

Nagoamogatama nagaifena mage hutama nahavigegahae “Naa nehianagi naa higeno veamogamifena ‘Havi kava nehae.’ huno nehie? Agaiama haisia agu agesa havisia yana ta ani yafena ‘Ohugane.’ huno hutegahie?” hutama hugahae.

Hugahagi kagaya mopale kanomoga hanaa augafa kano maineka Anumaya Kotifena aka huka kea vaitegane? Mopaleti aye kakalifeno talo humalenaya yopamoa talo hutenea kanomofena “Naa higeka nagaila maa huka talo hunatenane?” huno hugahio?

Aao, naa augafa kea ohugahie. Mopaleti aye kakalifeno talo humalenesia kanomoa talo humalenesia yana agaia yane. Nagola mopamo alaga alino nagola kanale susufanea talo huteno ani alagaleti havi aliyate susufanenema talo hisiana agaia yane.

Anumaya Kotia ania humaine. Tagaya agaia talo humalenea susufane kana huta mainone. Nago susufane kana veamoya kefo yama humainayafe tusi hai vaimateno himamualeti “Amakata aisia yana amamigahue.” huno humaineanagi mailava huno amakava-maineno kaiyekea hu noamate.

Amakava-maineafe tagaya Yuta veamoyaene Yuta vea omainaya veamoyaene agaialega visunafe ke hulatenea susufane kana veamogatihena, tusiya huno kalagila ailatenea veamogatina “Haenagama tokiya hale yania tamamisugetama aligahae.” huno hulatene. Nayona tokiya hale yamaa alisunafene huno talo hulatene.
Ani yafena Hoseaa, Anumaya Koti aune kanomoa Anumaya Koti humainea kea mage huno kae-maleneane
“Yuta veapi omainaya veafena ‘Nagaini nofi anaga mainae.’ huna hugahue. Nagua oamaminesua anagafena ‘Nahau nayamopafi nenahaiya anaga mainae.’ huna hugahue.
Anumaya Kotia ‘Nagai anaga omainae.’ huno humainea kumatega Anumaya Kotia amakaifena mage huno hugahie ‘Tamakaya nahaimu hanea Anumaya Kotinina nafaneyagania mainae.’ huno hugahie.” huno humaineane.
Aisaiyaa Isaleli veafe mage huno kae-maleneane
“Isaleli veamoya nafaneamima ateya atagufeyama hage li kahaepa kana huya kasagoya veane maigahayanagi osi anaga kanoa amaku amamena aligatigahue.
Anumayamoa ma mopale mainaya veala kaiyekea humateteno ‘Naa yama aligahae.’ huno humainea kemona ani kavala fatago huno aupa kanoa humateteno ali hano hugahie.” huno humaineane.
Aisaiyaa hagoteno mage huno humaineane
“Mukia tokiyaa hanea Anumayamoa osia anaga kanoatihe kalagi aioamateleasina mukiamogatina Sotomu mainaya veanene Komola mainaya veanene faliya fanane humainaya kava huteasine.” huno humaineane.

Naa hu-maineanagita naane huta hisune? Yuta veapi omainaya veala fatago veane maisayafe kasageke vokela ohunaya veamoya afaa Yisasia hulatenea yafe haviya amakupi maleya amametiti humainaya yateti Anumaya Kotia ani veamogamifena “Fatago veane mainae.” huno humatene huta hisuno?
Humateneanagi Isaleli veamoya tusiya huya kahegi kemona akave malesaya yafe kasageke vokela hayanagi ani kemona akave malelama ohunaya yafe fatago veanea omainae huta hisuno?

E, ani ke hisune. Naa higeya fatago veala omainae? “Tagaiti kasageke hisuna aliyateti fatago veane maigahune.” huya hayanagi “Yisasia hulatenea yafema havita lagupi maleta tametiti humainonafe ‘Fatago veane mainae.’ huno hulategahie.” huya ohunayanagiya fatago veanea omainae. Yisasia yafa kana humaineanagi agaifena haviya amakupina omalenaya yafe ani haletona yafate ayalega amaiya aye-kayopeliya asaga hulavi-mainae.
Anumayamo autamafina mage huya kae-malenayane
“Agegeho nagola aye hataga huliya asaga hulavisaya yafana Saiyoni malogeno hane. Asaga hulavigahayanagi agaifema haviya amakupi malenaya veamoya amakayea ohugahae.” huya kae-malenayane.
Nafunaganagatama Anumaya Kotia Yuta veamogami amaku amamena aligatisiafe aluya huno nenahaigena mukia yupa ani yafena nunamuna nehue.
Amakayama nehaya kavala agetena mani kea nehue amakaya Anumaya Kotina haisia kavala aluya huya hisaya amaku amakesa nehaviyanagi anima haiya yafena havilama nohuya ani kavala nohae.

Anumaya Kotia veafema “Fatago veane mainae.” huno humatenea yafena nohaviya “Ani kavala hulato.” huya havinokagi amakaiamima maiya auava yaamia “Anumaya Kotia ageteno ‘Fatago kava nehae.’ huno hugahie.” huya nehayanagi amakaiami humainaya yafe ani kea huoamategahie.

Huoamategahigi Kalaisia hulatenea yafema haviya amakupi maleya amametiti humainaya veamogamifena Anumaya Kotia “Ago fatago veane mainae.” huno humateteno ani yafena Kalaisia Mosese kahegi kemona alifatago huno ali hano humaineane.
Kahegi kema akave malesayana Anumaya Kotia “Fatago veane mainae huno humategahie.” huno Mosesea mage huno kae-maleneane.
“Nagoa veamoya mukia kahegi kema akave malesayana ani keleti vaiyegahae.” huno hu-maineane.

Hu-maineanagi nagoa veamoya Yisasi hulatenea yafema haviya amakupi maleya amametiti humainayafe Anumaya Kotia “Fatago veane mainae.” huno humatenea yamofena mage huno hie tamakuafitila mage hutama haviokeho “Ta ikapinaga haiteno Kalaisina avaleno elavigahie?” hutama ohiho.
“Ta falimainaya veane nelaviya kapina Kalaisina fali-mainefiti avalegahe tavigahae” hutama havi okeho.
Naane hie? Ani kemoa tamahanile haneteno tamavayale haneno tamakupi hane. Anima hu falote nehuna kea Yisasima hulatenea yafema havita lagupi maleta lametiti hisuna yafe humaine.

Tamakaya tamavayafiti “Yisasia Anumayania maine.” hutama huhaneletama tamakuafitila “Anumaya Kotia Yisasina fali-mainefiti ali hetitene.” hutama tamakupi maletama tamametiti hisageno Anumaya Kotia tamaku tamamena aligatigahie.

Taguafina Yisasia hulatenea yafena havita tagupi maleta tametiti humainona yateti Anumaya Kotia “Fatago veane mainae.” huno hunelate. Tavayafiti “Yisasia hulatenea yafe havina nagupi malenoe.” huta hufalote nehuna yateti Anumaya Kotia tagu tamena alinegatie.
Anumaya Koti autamafina mage huno humaine
“Nagoa veamoya Yisasife haviya amakupi maleya amametiti hisayana amakayea ohugahae.” huno humaineane.

Anumaya Koti aulagafina Yuta veanene Yuta veapi omainaya veanene nago avamete huya mainageno Anumaya Kotia mukia veamogami Anumayaami maineanagiya mukia veamoya agaitega ke hisageno kanaleya huno amaya hisia yana kasagoya amamigahie.
Anumaya Koti autamafina mage huno humaineane
“Mukia veamoya Anumayamo agi ayeya ke hisagenoa amaku amamena aligatigahie.” huno humaineane.

Aligatigahianagi Yisasia hulatenea yafema haviya amakupi omalesayana hanaa huya agia ayegahae? Yisasia hulatenea yafema ohavisayana hanaa huya agaifena haviya amakupi maleya amametitia hugahae? Nago kanomoma Yisasia hulatenea yafema huhaleno hamaopaisiana hanaa huya ani kea havigahae?
Yisasia hulatenea yafema huhaleya hisaya veama hu oamatesayana hanaa huya ani kea huhaleya hugahae? Anumaya Koti autamafina mage huno humaineane
“Yisasife kanale mono kea, tamaipa falu hutama maisaya kema, alino esia kanoa kanale kano maineanagita muse hisune.” huno humaineane.
Mukia mani kema nehaviya veamoya haviya amakupina nomalae. Anumaya Koti autamafina Aisaiyaa mage huno humaineane
“Anumayamoga hana veamoya hamapauva kea haviya amakupi maleya amametiti humainae?” huno havige-maineane.
Amakupi maleya amametiti humainaya yamo havimainaya kefiti falote humaine. Anima havimainaya kea Kalaisife hamapaigeya havimainae.
Nagaya maa huna tamahavi-negoe mani kanale kea ohavinao? Aao tamagelafa huna tamahapauve mukiamoya ago havilinae. Anumaya Koti avopina mage huno humaineane
“Amake aiyama haya kemoa mukia kotega ute ete huno keamimoa mukia kumate umaine.” huno humaineane.
Nagoene tamahavi-negoe mani kanale kea Isaleli veamoya ohavinao? Tamage huya ago havilinae. Hagoteno Mosesea Anumaya Kotima humainea kea mage huno humaineane

“Nagaya havigu veala, nago nofipi omainaya anagapiti amavalesugetama ani yafena tamaipa havi haviya humategahae. Nago nofi veala, kanaleya huya havisaya amaku amakesa omalenesia veala amavalesugetama ani yafena ke vaigahae.” huno humaineane.
Aisaiyaa tokiyaage huno Anumaya Kotima humainea kea mage huno humaineane
“Nagoa veamoya nagaifena natia noayesaya veamoya ago nagemainae. Nagaifema nagoa veanema hamavi-okenaya veamogami amaulagale ago fufute efalote hugeya nagemainae.”
Isaleli veamogami-fena mage humaine “Ayaaya kanagefa nayateti ‘Eho eho huna kea huanagi nagai kea akave omaletama ke vaige vaige nehaya veamogatamae.” huno humaineane.
Tamahavigoe Anumaya Kotia agaia anagaa amanati-talenefi? Tamage naa ohune. Nagayaenena Isaleli kano mainoe. Nagaya Apalahamu kola mainena Penisamini nofi kano mainoe.

Mani anagala nayona Anumaya Kotia ehema hapali-malenea anagaa amanati-oatalene. Ilaiya avagea Anumaya Koti avopima hanea kea ohavinao? Ilaiyaa Isaleli anagafe nunamuna mage huno Anumayamotega havige-maineane.

“Anumayamogae veamoya kagai amaune veamogamina hamaeya falimateya kagaife afu heya kae-salamana hunegataya ata haluya helagaya vaineatalageya hagena nagainige nagoke mainogeya nahaegahe tusiya huya natineayae.” huno humaineane.
Higeno Anumaya Kotia anonaalema humainea kea havilinao? Agai avopina mage huno kae-maleneane
“Kagaikage omainanagi Seveni tausenia (7,000) veamoya onatalenae. Yafateti talo humalenaya Anumayamo agia Palie agia alisaga huya amakua oaminaya anagania mainae.” huno humaineane.
Anima humainea kate meni kanaene Anumaya Kotia agaia kayone yamaaleti osi anagaa agaia veane maisayafe ago hapali-malene.
Anumaya Kotia agaia kayone yamaaleti hapalimatenegi kanale auava yama nehaya yateti hapalimateleasina agaia kayone yamaamoa afa ya kana hileasinagi agaia kayone yamaaleti hapalimatene.

Naa humaineanagita naane hisune? Isaleli veamoya Anumaya Kotia “Fatago veane mainae.” huno humatesiafe kasageke huge hugetayana oalitafa huya oaligeno Anumaya Kotia osi vea kanoa hapalimatenea veafe ani kea humatenegi nagoa veamoya ohavisayafene huno amakua alino aitalako humalene.
Anumaya Koti avopina mage huno humaineane

“Anumaya Kotia amakuamona alino amaukalo kalo humateno amaulaga alino asu humateno amakesa alino aililemateno higeya kea ohaviya maime maime eya meni kanaene ani kavakeya huya mainae.” huno humaineane.
Tevitia ani avopina mage huno humaineane
“Ala imulema maisayana Anumaya Kotia kalifu hanagi-malesigeno amatafa hisigeya vailiya asaga hulaviya havi yaamimo anonaamia aligahae.
Amaulagamoa hanikomako hisigeya oagetafa hisae. Mukia kana yama alimainayafe amakaveyamoene agola fago-koko huya vaiyesae.” huno humaineane.

Isaleli veamoya Yisasi kea amakaveno hutenayafe vailiya asaga hulaviya agola amakoya faimainao? Aao tamage huya naa ohunae. Yisasi kea amakaveno hutenaya yateti Anumaya Kotia Yuta vea omainaya veamogami amaku amamena aligatisigeya Isaleli veamoya ageteya “Tagaienena tagu tamena alilatisie.” huya age hamaye hugahae.

Tamage Isaleli veamoya kefo kava huya yagalaya yafe nagoa ma mopafi veamoya kanale yana alimainae. Isaleli veamoya Yisasi kea amakaveno hutenayafe Yuta veapi omainaya veamoya kanale yana alimainae. Kasagoya Isaleli veamoya eteya Anumayamo kea haviya akave malesayana tusia kanale kanamoa falote humategahie.
Nagaifena “Yuta vea omainaya veamogamite Yisasi kea huhaleka hamapaiyo.” huno higena Aposolo kano mainoafe muse nehuna mani aliyana nealua yafe tamakaya Yuta vea omainaya veamogatama tamakaife nehue.
Manima nenahaiya aliyanialeti nagainia anagala, Isaleli anaga, nagoa alihetimatesugeya age hamaye hisageno Anumaya Kotia amaku amamena aligatisie huna nehue.

Anumaya Kotia Isaleli anagala amanati-taleneafe mukia ma mopafi veafena mage huno humaine “Aigetamatena yuna helamatena nagoke taipa kalisune.” huno humaineanagi Anumaya Kotia eteno Isaleli veanema amavalesiana fali-mainafiti hetiya augafa kava hugahae.
Hagoteya talo haya kai hamemo atupaa Anumaya Koti neamiyane mukia tamaaenena Anumaya Koti yane. Nagi yosamo hafuyama Anumaya Koti yama hanesiana mukia yosa akopayagae-nena Anumaya Koti yane.

Anumaya Kotia agaia hoyafi hanea Olivi yosamona akopaa aye sasaeneataleno tamakaila Yuta veane omainaya veamogatamina, afai Olivi yosamo akopa kana hutama mainageno tamavaleno fukiteti aye kamaelamateteno nofi kilamategetama mainetama ani yosafiti timaa aitama nenae.

Ani yafe tamakaya aye sasaetalenea akopaahena “Afa veane mainagi tagaya tamakaseta ala veane mainone.” hutama hu oamateho. Tamakaya akopamogatama timaa aitama tama yosamona amigeno nonegi hafuyafiti timaa aitama nenae.
Tamakaya mage hutama nehae “Tagaya kanale veane mainonafe tagai akopama aye gamae-malesia yafena Isaleli akopala ago aye sasaetalene.” hutama nehae.

Tamage Yisasife haviya amakupi omalaya yateti aye sasae-talegetama tamakaya Yisasife havitama tamakupi maletama tamametiti humainayafe aye gamae-malene. Tamakaila naa humaleneafe “Ala veane mainone.” hutama tamaugafa alitama ohaitama koli hutama tamakupi maletama tamametiti humainaya yama atalesayafe tamamayoa aino.
Anumaya Kotia agaia Isaleli veamogamina akopa-tafamaa alino asasae-taleneanagino tamakaila ani kavama hisagenoa tamayoa okigahianagino ani kava huno tamakaila alino asasae-talegahie.

Ani yafe Anumaya Kotia kayone hulate yamaaene kaiyeke hulateno haviyama anonaa tamisia yamaaene agelama hisune. Agaia kanale auava yamaa neatalaya veala kaiyeke humateno tusiya huno havi yana anonaa amamiyanagi tamakaila kayone hunelamate. Tamakaila kayone hulamateneafe tamametiti hisageno Anumaya Kotia nagoene kayone hulamategahigi naa ohisagenoa tamakaienena ago alino asasae-talegahie.
Nagi alinoma asasae-talenea Isaleli veala akopayagamoyama ke nohavia yaamima atalesagenoa Anumaya Kotia eteno alino aigamaematesia tokiyaa hanegeno eteno amavaleno me maleno aigamaemategahie.

Tamakaya Yuta veane omainaya veamogatama hagotetama afai Olivi yosafiti falote humainea akopa mainageno Anumaya Kotia vayamoya nohaya kava huno tamavaleno Isaleli veamogami Olivi yosale aigamaelamatene. Tamage mani akopayagamogamina tamaamoya Isaleli veamogamina amavaleno eteno hagote yosaamile maleno aigamaemategahie.

Mukia nafunaganagatama nagola falaki-mainea kema havilama hutetama aneginagi ohisae huna tamahanepauve. Nago kaiyagaa Isaleli anagamoya “Yisasi kea ohavigahune.” huya tokiya vaimainagi ani kavala agola ohugahagi Anumaya Kotia hapali-malenea Yuta vea omainaya veamogatama mukia Anumaya Kotina tamakua amisageno hiyama hinagenoa Isaleli veamoya eteya Yisasi kea havigahae. Havigu tamakaitamihe “Tagaya mukia ago havitafa huta havilinone.” hutama hisaya yafe mamona falaki-mainea ke tamahanepauve.
Anumaya Kotia mukia Isaleli veala amaku amamena aligatigahie. Anumaya Koti autamafina mage huya kae-malenayane
“Yelusalemuti nagola amaku amamema aligatisia kanamoa falote huteno veamogamina kefo auava yaamia alitalegahie.”
Anumaya Kotia mage huno humaine “Mani kea amakaiene alina nagokepi alina hagelafi nelamatoe. Mage huna hugahue mukia kefo yatamia alitaletena alina hagelafilamategahue.” huno humaine.

Isaleli veamoya Yisasia hulatenea yafena amakaveno hutenayafe Anumaya Kotina kame veaa mainae. Ania humainaya yateti tamakaila Yuta vea omainaya veamogatamina tamaya humainegi nayona Anumaya Kotia amakinagomogamife hamapaimaine. Isaleli veala hapalimateno amakaifena “Nahau nayamopafi nenagea veane mainae.” huno humaine.
Tamage Anumaya Kotia hagoteno nagoa veala hapali-maleteno “Kanale ya hulamategahue.” huno huteno haenagaa agu agesa eteno havino aiyahae ohugahie.
Hagotetama tamakaya Yuta vea omainaya veamogatama Anumaya Kotina tamakaveno hutenagi menia Isaleli veamoya ania huya Anumaya Koti kea akave omalayafe Anumaya Kotia tamakaila kalagi ailamatene.
Tamakaila kalagi ailamatenageya agesayafe menia Isaleli veamoya Anumaya Koti kea akave omalenaleti eteya kalagi ailamategetama alimainaya yana amakaiene aligahae.
Anumaya Kotia mukia veamogamina kalagi aimatesiafe hagoteno mukia veala agai kema akave omalaya yateti nofila humatene.
Namayo Anumaya Kotia ala agu agesaene kano maineno mukia yana haviline. Veamoya Anumaya Kotia “Naa maa hugahue.” huno hisia agu agesamo aepaamoa afe yapi tavimaineanagiya ohavigahae.
Anumaya Koti autamamoa mage huno humaineane
“Hana veamoya Anumayamo agu agesa havilinae? ‘Naa huo.’ huno agu agesa ta Anumaya Kotina amileasine?
Tae ‘Nagaya Anumaya Kotina nago yana amisugeno Anumaya Kotia eteno anonaa namigahie?’ huno humaine?”

Aao Anumaya Kotia mukia yama talo humalenea kanogino aepaa maine. Mukia yana agaia haumainea yamaage haneanagita tagaya agola mukia kanaaene kanaaene Anumaya Kotina agaiage agi alisaga hisune. Tamage.

Nafunaganagatama Anumaya Kotia kalagi ailatea yafena havina tokiyaage ke lamahanepauve. Anumaya Kotife muse yaamima sipi sipi heya aminaya kava hutama tamahaimula hanenagetama muse yana tamaugafa Anumaya Kotina amiho. Agaila alu aotage veaneagitama Anumaya Kotina haisia kava hisayana fatago lamaku tamakesafiti Anumaya Koti agia alisaga hugahae.

Tamakaya ma mopafi veamoya nehaya augafa kavala ohutama lamaku tamakesa aiyahae hageno Anumaya Kotia yaufa lamaku tamakesa tamamineafe agaima nehaiya kavafena havilama hutama havigahae. Ani kavala kanale yane. Mukia yamona ago agaseno kosa hetenea ya hane.

Anumaya Kotia agaia kayone yamaaleti aliyamaa namineafe nagoke nagokemogatamina tamahanepauve “Anumaya Kotia naa yama namine.” huka haviteka kagaika kaugafa alika ohaiyo. Anumaya Kotia agaialefe havitama tamakupi maletama tamametiti humainaya yana nagoke nagokemogatamina ala yano osi yano afaa tamamineafe fatago lamaku tamakesa havitetama lamakaitami fako hiho.
Nagoke taugafamoagi alagate alagate taugafa haneno alu aliya alu aliyana nealiye.
Tagaya mukia veamogata ani kava huta Kalaisiene aigamaeta agai augafa nagoke maineta afalu falu huta nagoke mainone.

Mainonageno Anumaya Kotia kayone hulateno muse yatia haote haote huno agaia aliya alisuna tokiyatia ago tamine. Nagoa veamogamina Anumaya Kotia avayafiti hamapai-mainea kea huhaleya hisaya tokiya muse hunoma amaminesiana Yisasife haviya amakupi maleya amametiti humainaya keage huhaleya hamapaisae.

Nagoa veamogamima muse yama amafu-amakanagami amaya hisaya tokiyama amaminesia aliyana aliya tokiya vaisae. Nagoa veamogamina veane humaveli hamaveli hisaya tokiyama amaminesiana ali lokiya vaiya humaveliho.

Nagoa veamogamina vea amaku amakesa ali hetimatesaya tokiyama amaminesiana ali tokiya vaiya ani amaku amakesa ali hetimatesae. “Nafunaganagamima nago yama amamigahue.” huno humainesia tokiyama amaminesiana kasagoya male kosa heya amamiho. Kava aliya alisaya tokiyama amaminesiana amakualeti ani kava aliyana aliya maiho. Hauma huteno afuaganama ayama hisia tokiyama amaminesiana amaipa falu yapiti amaya hiho.
Tamafu-tamakanagamima tamakua amamigahena tamagelafa hutama amamiho. Kefo kavala tamakaveno hutetama kanale kava hisaya yamaage atafa hutama tokiya vaiho.
Tamafu-tamakanafema aluya huno tamahaisigetama tamakua amamiho. Nagoke nagokemogatama tamafu-tamakanagami amakia alisaga hutama “Hagoteho.” hutama humateho.
Mukia kanafina aliyageya nealisagetama kasalo kasala kea ohiho. Tamakupina Alu Aotage Avamumo tokiyaaleti tamakaila ali hetinagetama Anumayamo aliyana aliho.
Muse nehutama Anumayamoma hulatesia yafena tamametiti hutama agava maiho. Kana yama falote hisigetama hetitama tokiya vaiho. Mukia kanafina Anumayamotega havige havige hutama maiho.
Anumaya Koti anagamogamima nagoa yaamimoma kosa heoamatesigetamahena amaya hiho. Natu veama esagetama ali kayone hutama amateho.
Nagoa veamoya ali haviya hulamatesagetama “Ani veala alika kanale humato.” hutama Anumaya Kotitega havigeho. “Alihaviya humato.” hutama haviokeho.
Nagoa veamoya kigi yokalo huya maisagetama tamakaienena ania hutama maiho. Nagoa veamoya avima atesagetama tamakaienena ania hutama avia ateho.
Tamafu-tamakanagamienena nagoke tamaku tamakesale maiho. “Ala vaya mainone.” hutama ohutama afa veanene vaiyatete hiho. “Nagainige kanale nagu nagesa hane.” hutama ohiho.
Nagoa veamoya havi kavama hulamatesagetama anonaa havi kavala hu oamateho. Mukia veamogami amaufina kanale kavakeya hiho.
Tamakaitamia tuma hisaya yafena tamakesa ohavitafa hutama mukia veanenena yuna hetama maiho.

Nahaumainea nafunaganagatama tamakaima havi yama hulamatesaya anonaa “Ani kavala humategahune.” hutama ohiho. Anumaya Kotia ani yama haya kavala agaia anonaa amamisiafe maitama haleho. Anumaya Koti avopina mage huya kae-malenayane
Anumayamoa mage huno humaine “Havi kavama humatesaya anonaa amakata aisia yana amamisua yana nagaini aliyane.” huno humaineane.
Havi yamo anonaa oamamigahagi Anumaya Koti avopina mage huya kae-malenayane
Kame vayatamimogamima amakatesigetama kavela afaa amamiho. Tifema amakesigetama tina afaa amamiho. Na kava hutama ali kayonema humatesageya amakaye hinageya atalegahae huno humaineane.
Atalesanageno havigu havi yamoa katafa huyafenagi kanale yamaage hugeno ani havi yamona agaseno.
Mukia veamogatama Kamani vayamogami kea akave maleho. Nago Kamani kanoa agaia falote huno omainegi mukia Kamani aliyana Anumaya Koti ayapiti alino falote humalegeya yagai-mainae.
Kamani vayamogami kehena “Kahaoteyakae.” huya hisayana Anumaya Kotienefe “Kahaoteyakae.” huya nehae. Ani kavama hisaya veamoya amakaiami amakata aisia anonaa aligahae.
Kanale kava nehisaya veamoya Kamani vayafena kolia ohugahagi havi kavama nehisaya veamoya koli hugahae. Kamani vayafe kolima ohinutama kanale kavakeya hiho.

Kamani vayamoya tamaya hisagetama kanaleya hutama maisayafe Anumaya Koti aliya vaya mainagi havi kavama hisayana tamahaesaya tokiyaamia haneafe koli hiho. Havi kavama hisaya veamogamina havi yana anonaa amakata aisia yama amamisayafe Anumaya Kotia humategeya agai aliyana nealiye.
Kamani vayamoya hamai vai yama tamisaya yafekela kolia huta amakai kea ohavisunagi tagaiti laguamo “Naa hiho.” huno hisia kavakeya huta akave malesunafe Kamani vayamogami kea akave malegahune.
Kamani vayamoya Anumaya Koti aliya nealiya mukia kanafina ani aliyatekeya kava yagai lokiyaage humainayafe tamakaya tamaugafale takesi monea neatalae.

Anonaa mukia kava vayala neamamitama tamaugafaletima kanisole takesiene Kamani takesiene amamiho. Kava vayatamimogamina amaiyaafinaga ako hutama mainetama amakia alisaga hisaya vayamogamina amakia alisaga hutama maiho.

Nago yana tamamitageya “Haenagaa tamamigahune.” hutama humainesaya yana aupaa amamiho. Tamafu-tamakanagamina tamakua amamitama amaya hiho. Nagoa veamoya amafu-amakanama amakuama amamisayana mukia kahegi kemona akave nemalae.

E, kahegi kemoa mage humaine, Kumai he kavala ohuo. Veala haegeno ofalino. Musufa yana ohuo. Alu kanomo kuafenotela ageka kahayea ohuo huno nagoa kene humainegi mukia kahegi kemona aepaamoa nagoke mage huno hane, kagaika kaugafahema kahaiya avamete mukia veamogami amaugafahena kahaino huno humaineane.
Mukia veamogami amakuama neamamiya veamoya alu veamogamina havi kavala huoamategahae. Ani yafe veamoya amakuama neamamiya veala mukia ani kahegi kemona akave nemalae.

Menima mainona kanafima nehaya kavala ago havilinayafe tamaula faetama omaitama hetitama maisaya kanamoa ago falote humaine. Tagayama hagoteta Yisasife havita lagupi maleta tametiti humainona kanafina Anumaya Kotia tagu tamema aligatisia kanamoa aluale haneanagino meni kanafina ago eno aupa nehie.

Hanima kimainea kanamoa ago hano hugahe nehigeno koma alino halesia kanamoa ago falote hugahe nehiafe mukia hani yapima nemaiya auava yana ataleteta tuma hisuna kenatia, hale yamo auava kenatia failisune.

Kama vaiyesunana fatago huta veamoya yagefima vaiyaya avamete huta vaiyesune. Alitalu huta havili neta hagifali kea ohatageta anegi-nagia ohisune. Ageta lahayea huta augafale maita yokalo oateta moli huliteta ohisune. Alu kanomo yatela ageta lahayea ohuta tua ohisune.
Anumayatimona Yisasi Kalaisina kenatami kana hutama avaletama taugafale aigamaetama age lamahaye hisaya yafena tamakesa havi havi hutama omaiho.

Nagoa tamafu-tamakanaya Yisasia hulatenea yafena haviya amakupi maleya amametiti nehayanagi Anumaya Kotia “Ago fatago veane mainae.” huno humatenea yafena havilama ohuya “Naa kava hisunageno Anumaya Kotia ‘Fatago veane mainae.’ huno huotategahie.” huya nehaya veala tamakaiene nagopi maisayafe amavaletama amateho. Amategahagi amakaya amakesafiti alu ke hisaya yafena kea vaitama ani keletila tua hu omateho.

Nagoa kafu-kaganaa “Mukia kavela negahue.” huno agesa nehavianagi nagoa kafu-kaganaa Yisasife havino agupi maleneanagino Anumaya Kotia “Ago fatago kano mainane.” huno hutenea yafena havilama ohuno “Anumayamoa fatago kano mainane huno hunatesiafe afumo amela onegahue.” huno humaine.

Mukia kavema nesia kafu-kaganaa afuma nonesia afu-agananafena “Afa kano mainane.” huno huoateno. Afumo ameama nonesia afu-aganaa mukia kavema nesia afu-aganafena “Naa kano mainane.” huno huoateno. Anumaya Kotia ani tole kanolatana ago anavale-maine.

Kagaya taga maineka nago kanomo aliya kanohena “Naa aliya kano mainane.” huka huneatane? Agayama ani kanomo aliyatema fatago huno alisiano havi aliya alino maisiano agaia kava kanoamo yane. Kagai yana omalene. Anumayamoa agaia ali lokiya vaitesia tokiyaa haneafe ali lokiya vaitesigeno maigahie.

Nagoa tamafu-tamakanaya ma amakesa nehaviye “Nagoke kanalema mauna yamoa alu kanamona agase-maineanagita ani kanalekeya alitalu huta Anumayamo agia alisaga hugahune.” nehageya nagoa tamafu-tamakanaya “Mukia kanamoa nagoke avamete humainea kanale nemaune.” huya nehayanagi nagoke nagoke veamoya amakaiami amaku amakesa havilama hisae.

Nago tamafu-tamakanaa agesa haviteno “Nagoke kanama mauna yamoa nagoa kanamona agase-maineanagita ani kanalekeya alitalu huta Anumayamo agia alisaga hugahune.” huno hisia kanomoa Anumaya Koti agia alisaga hisiafe ani kavala nehie. Nago tamafu-tamakanaa “Mukia kavela negahue.” huno hisiana Anumayamotega nunamu huno muse hutenea yafenagino Anumayamo agia alisaga humainegi nago tamafu-tamakanaa afumo amema monesia kanomoa “Anumaya Koti agia alisaga hugahue.” huno monesie. Agaienena Anumaya Kotitega nunamu huno muse huno havinege.
Nago kanoa haegafa huno maisiana agaialefekeya huno omaine. Nago kanoma falisiana agaialefekeya huno ofaline.

Tahaimuma hanesigeta maisunana Anumayamo agia alisaga hisunafe mainone. Falisunana ania huta Anumayamo agi alisaga hisunafe faligahune. Ania humaineafe tahaimuene maisunano falisunano Anumayamo anaga mainone.
Fali-mainaya veateene hamaimu hanegeya mainaya veateene Anumayaamimo maisiafe Kalaisia faliteno eteno haimu alino heti-maine.

Nagoa veamogatama naa higetama tamafu-tamakanagami no maiyana fako huneamatae? Nagoa veamogatama naa higetama tamafu-tamakanafena “Afa kano mainane.” hutama huneamatae? Tagaya mukiamogata Anumaya Kotia ala kaiyekema hulatesifina hetigahune.
Avopina mage huno kae-maleneane

Anumayamoa mage humaine “Tamagelafa huna tamahanepauve mukia veamoya nagaifena mage huya hugahae ‘Kagai veane mainonagi kava hulato.’ huya hugahae. Mukia veamoya ‘Kagaya Anumaya Kotiti mainane.’ huya nagia alisaga hugahae.” huno higeya kae-malenayane.
Kae-malenageta tagaya ageteta havilinone mukia nagoke nagokemogata nemauna auava yatimo aepatia Anumaya Kotina hapaigahune.
Tafu-taganagamifena “Naa nehane.” huta fakoa humateta nagoene havi tagesa havi oamamisune. Naa ohisunana tafu-taganaya tageteya asaga hulaviya kefo kava hisaya yafenagita havi kavala ohisune.
Anumayanimoa Yisasiene ailokaena mainena ago havilinoe nagoa kavemoa oniyaage ohune. Nago kanomoma agaia agu agesafima “Oniyaage humaine.” huno havisia kavemoa oniyaage haumaine.

Kagaya nagoa kavema nenana yafena kafu-kaganana agu agesa alihaviya hutesanana kahau kayamopafi negahaiya kavala nohane. Kalaisia ani kafu-kaganana agu amena aligatisiafene huno fali-maineanagika nesana kavetetifene huka alihaviya huoato.
Kanale kava hisaya yafena havigu veamoya “Havi kava nehae.” huya hulamateyafenagi kava yagaiho.
Kavema neneya tima neneya nehaya yamoa Anumaya Kotia kava yagailatesia yamona aepaa omaleneanagi Alu Aotage Avamumo taminea fatago kavaene taipa falu hisia yaene muse hisuna yaene aepaa hane.
Haneafene huya nagoa veamoya ani kava huya Kalaisi aliyama alisayana Anumaya Kotia “Kanale kava haya veane mainae.” huno hulamatesigeya nagoa veamoyaene “Kanale veane mainae.” huya hulamategahae.
Ani yafe tagaya nagoke tagu tagesalema maisuna kavaene tafu-taganagami amaya huta tokiyaage huya maisaya amaku amakesale maisaya kavala hisune.

Tamakaya kave nesaya yafekeya nehutama Anumaya Koti aliyana alihaviya ohiho. Mukia kave neyana kanale yanagi kagaya nana kavemoa kafu-kaganaya asaga hulavisaya kava humatesanana tusia havi kava nehane.
Afua nesano havilima nesano nagoa kavama hisana yamo kafu-kaganana asaga hulavisia kavama hutesanana aniama hisana kavala atalo.

Ani yafema havika kagupi malenana yana kagaikaene Anumaya Kotiene tanakaitanigeya hanesie. Nago kanomoma nagoa nesia yafeene hisia kavaenena agaia aguamoa kaiyekema huoatesiana ani kanomoa muse hugahie.

Muse hugahianagi nago kanomoma nesia yafema tole agesa haviteno nesiana Anumaya Kotia “Havi kava nehane.” huno hutegahie. Ani kanomoa “Kanale ya nenoe.” huno agupi omaleneafe havi kava nehie. Mukia yana “Maa kavala kanale kavale.” huta lagupi omalenona yana kefo yane.

Yisasife tamametiti huta tokiya nevauna veamogata amametiti yaamimoma tokiya ovainea veamogami kana yaamia “Tamakaitami aliho.” huta ohisunagi tagaya hamamaeta alita tagaiti lagu tagesamoma haisia kavala ohisune.
Ohisunagi mukiamogata tahaote tahaote tagaya tavatema mainesaya veala amaya hisunageya kanaleya huya Yisasife haviya amakupi malenesaya yaamimoa tokiya vaisie.
Tagaya ago havimainone Kalaisia agaia agu agesamoma haiya kavala akave omalenea yafena Anumaya Koti avopina agaife mage huya kae-malenayane
“Veamoya kagaima Anumaya Kotiga hu haviya hunegataya kemoa nagaila melino aiso hunenate.” huno humaineane.

Nayoma kae-malenaya kemoa meni kanafima tagesa alino akalo hisiafene huya kae-malenayane. Anumayamo kema kae-malenaya kefiti tokiya vaisuna yaene tagu tagesa ali heti-latesia yaene haneafe tametiti yatimoa tokiya vailategahie.

Anumaya Kotia veala tokiya vaisaya yaene amaku amakesa ali hetimatesia yaene aepaagino tamaya hisigetama Yisasi Kalaisi humainea auava yana akave maletafa hutama nagoke tamaku tamakesale maisae huna Anumayamotega havinegoe.
Naa hisayafe nagoke tamaipale maitama nagokete tamakua maletama Anumayatimona Yisasi Kalaisina Nefana Anumaya Koti agia alisaga hisae.
Veamoya Anumaya Koti agima alisaga hisayafe Kalaisia tamakaila ali falu fala hulamateno tamavale-mainea kava hutama tamafu-tamakanagamina ali falu fala humatetama amavaletama nagoke tamaipale maiho.

Tamahapauve Anumaya Kotia Yuta veamogati taginagomogamife hamapai-mainea kemoa falote huno fatago hinageya “Anumaya Kotia tamageage kano maine.” huya hisayafene huno Kalaisia Yuta veamogamina amaya humaine.
Amaya higeya Yuta vea omainaya anagamoya Anumaya Kotia kayone hulamatenea yafe agia alisaga hisaya yafena Anumaya Koti avopina mage huya kae-malenayane
“Naa hisigena Yuta veane omainaya veapina kagia alisaga huna musena hugategahue. Mono yagamefitiene kagia alisaga hugahue.” huno humaineane.
Ania huno nago kemoa maa humaine
“Tamakaya Yuta vea omainaya anagamogatama agaia nofi anagaaene ailalupetama muse hiho.” huno humaineane.
Ania huno nago kemoa mage humaineane
“Tamakaya Yuta vea omainaya anagala Anumaya Kotina agia alisaga nehigeya mukia veamoya ania huya agia alisaga hiho.” huno humaineane.
Ania huno nago kea Aisaiyaa Anumaya Koti aune kanomoa mage humaineane
“Yesi anagapiti aginagomoa falote huno Yuta vea omainaya veamogatamina kava yagai-lamatesigetama agaifena ‘Tagu tamena aligatigahie.’ hutama tamametiti hugahae.” huno Aisaiyaa humaineane.

Anumaya Kotia tametiti yatimo aepaagino agaifema tamakupi malenaya yateti tusia muse yaene tamaipa falu hisia yaene tamamino havatelamatesigetama Alu Aotage Avamumo tokiyaleti tusiya hutama Yisasima hulamatenea yafena tamametiti hisae huna nunamuna nehue.

Nafunaganagatama nagainia nametiti huana tamakaya kanale auava yana kasagoya nehae. Mukia ke havi yana tamakesaene veane mainae. Tamakaitami oaya aaya hutama hamapaisayana kanale amaku amakesa tamafu-tamakanagamina amamigahae.

Amamigahagi Anumaya Kotia kayone yamaa namiteno Yuta vea omainaya veamogami amunopi Yisasi Kalaisi aliya alisanafene huno hunateneafene huna nagoa kema kaemaloa kemoa tamaku tamakesa alina hao huna ali hagalo hugahe tokiya vaina negaove. Afaa nokaogi mono note kava vaya kana huna mainena Anumaya Kotia hulatenea kanale mono kea huhalena hisugeya Yuta vea omainaya anagamoya aliya amakupi malesageno Alu Aotage Avamumoa “Alu aotage veane mainae.” huno humatesigena amavalesugeya Anumayamo avate esagena amisugeno Anumaya Kotia musena hugahie.
Naa hisigena nagaya Yisasi Kalaisiene ailokaena mainena Anumaya Koti aliyama nealua yafena tusia muse nehue.

Kea nagoke yafeke huna falote nehue. Yuta vea omainaya veama Anumaya Koti kema akave malesayafe Kalaisina agaia tokiyaleti nehue. Nagaini kanale auava yatetiene humainoa keletiene tokiya avameyama hua yaene Alu Aotage Avamumo tokiyaletiene hamanepauve. Yisasima hulatenea yafema kanale mono kema hulama huna hamapauvana Yelusalemuti aepa hena mukia kotega ute ete huna Ililikumua uvayi humainoe.

Nagoa mopalega Kalaisi agima ohavinaya haigilega ani aliyana alina Kalaisima hulatenea yafena kanale mono kea hamapaisua yafekeya nenahaiye. Havigu alu kanomo hagoteno Yisasi kea hamapaiteno ani kanomoa posi ayemalenesia yosale no mo kisua yafena nonahaiye.
Anumaya Koti avopi kae-malenaya kate hugahe nehue. Mage huya kae-malenayane
“Agai avagema ohavinesaya veamoya agegahae. Keama ohavinesaya veamoya aepaa havigahae.” huno humaineane.
Mukia kanafina Lomu mainaya veamogatamalega ugahe huanagi visua kana ani aliyamo tilegena ounoe.

Ounogi meni kanafina malega hanea aliyania alivaya ayoanagina ayaaya kafugefa lamakaitega visue huna nagesa havi havi humainoafe menia Sipeni visua katelagina osi kanalega tamakaienena mo faena hu falu fala hulamatetena muse huna mainesugetama naya hisagena Sipenia ugahue.
Tamakaitega ugahuanagi hagotena Yisasina amakua aminaya veane amaya hisuafe Yelusalemu neue.

Nagoa yaamima omalenea veala Yelusalemu maineya Yisasife haviya amakua aminaya veamogamifena Masetonia vealagi Akaiya vealagi amakesa haviteya muse huya monea amamigahe nehayanagina alina momamigahue.

Hagoteno Yuta veala Anumaya Kotia amaku amamema aligati-mainea kanale mono kema Yuta vea omainaya veama hamapaimainaya yate ani veamoya anonaamia haneanagiya amaipamoa kanaleya higeya “Amamigahune.” huya Yuta veala amaugafale yana kanale humatesia yama amamisayana kanale yane.
Ani monea alitalu huya namisagena alina Yelusalemu mukia monea momamitena tamakaya mainalega utena Sipenia ugahue.
Tamakaitegama uvayi hisuana ago havuana Kalaisina kanale manuamoa havatenateneanagina tamakaitega egahue.

Mukia nafunaganagatama musetami nehugi Anumayatimoa Yisasi Kalaisi hulatenea yafeene Avamumoma tahau tayamopafi nelahaiya yama taminea yafeene lamahavi-negoe tokiya vaitama nagaifena ke hutama Anumayamotega havigegeno nagaila naya hino.

Mage hutama nunamuna hiho “Yutia mainaya veamoya Yisasi kea nohaviya vealagiya Polona atafa huya ali haviya hutegahe nehagi kagaya Anumaya Kotiga augafa aligatio. Yelusalemu maineya Yisasina amakua aminaya veala Poloa amaya hisigeya ma ma hamamaesia aliyama nealia yafena hamaisigeya musena hisae.” hutama havigeho.
Naa hutama havigesagenoa Anumaya Kotia hainagenofena lamakaitega evayi huna muse huna tamakayaenena maifalu hugahue.
Anumaya Kotia taipamoma falu hisia yamona aepaagino tamakaiene mukiamogatamaene maisie huna nehue. Tamage.
Fipia tusia kanaleya huno Yisasina agua aminea tasatimoe, Senikalia maineya Yisasina amakua aminaya veamogamina kanaleya huno amaya humaine.

Anumayatimoene ailokaetama mainayafe Fipina avaletama amunotamifi atesageno maisie. Anumaya Koti nafanemogatama naa hisunana kanale yane. Nagi nagoa yamoma kanama haisigetama kanaleya hutama aya hiho. Fipia ania huno hagotenoa nagayaene kasagoya veanene taya humaineane.
Yisasi Kalaisi aliyama nahamaeana nealia alavelafena Palisilagani Akuvilaganina hutama falu fala hunateho.
“Kagaima kahaesagetaa faligahune.” huana humainaafe nagayake musena hunoanatogi mukia Yuta vaya omainaya Yisasi anagamoyaene huya musena huneanatae.

Anakai nopima Yisasi kema havigahe melitaluma nehaya veanene nagaila hu falu fala kenia humateho. Epainetasina, Esia kotega mainaya veamogamina hagoteno amakaseno Kalaisi kea havino agupi malenea kanoa maineanagino nahau nayamopafi nenagea nenafuna nagaila hu falu fala kenia huteho.
Ania hutama Maliaa, tamakaienema mainenoa tamaya hugahena tusi aliya ali-mainea alagi hutama falu fala huteho.

Atalonikusigani Yuniasiganina ania hutama nagaila hu falu fala kenia hunateho. Nagaya Yisasi kema ohavinoa kanafina ani kanolatana Yisasife haviana anakupi maleteana Aposolo vayamogami amunoamifi anaki hanea kanolata maineana nagaiene Yuta nofi vaya mainonanagita nagaiene Yisasi kema humainona yateti nofila hulatenayane.
Ampiliatusina Anumayamoene ailokaeyaagena nagua aminoa nenafuagi nagaila hu falu fala kenia huteho.
Tamakaya Upanusia Anumayamo aliyana tokaetaa nealua kanoene Setakisina kanaleya huna nagua aminoa nenafuene nagaila hutama falu fala kenia huneanatetama hiho.
Apelesia Kalaisina akavema nemaliafe agia hanegi nagaila hu falu fala kenia huteho. Alisitopulusi afamomogamina nagaila hu falu fala kenia humateho.
Helotionia nagai nofi vayalagi nagaila hu falu fala kenia huteho. Anumayamoene ailokaeya mainaya tafu-taganagamina Nasisusi afamomogamina nagaila hu falu fala kenia humateho.

Talifinagani Talifosagania Anumayatimo aliya tusiya huana nealia kanolatanagi nagaila hu falu fala kenia hunateho. Pesisia nahau nayamopafi nenagea alagi Anumayatimo aliyana ali-maineafe nagaila hu falu fala kenia huteho.
Lufusia kanaleya huno Yisasina akave nemalea kanoene itaamoenena nagaila hu falu fala kenia hunateho. Lufusina itaamoa itanimo kana huno nahanemaeyane.
Asinakalitusima Falegonima Hemisima Patolopasima Hemasima amakaienema tokaeya mainaya nafunaganagamina nagaila hu falu fala kenia humateho.
Filologusiene Yuliaene Neleusiene asaamoa Olipasiene amakaiene mainaya Yisasi anagaene nagaila hu falu fala kenia humateho.

Anumaya Koti anagamogatama nehuna kava hutama tamahaote tamahaote mukia tafu-taganagamina tamayana amamitama ali falu fala humateho. Mukia kumate maineya Yisasi anagamoya “Mainafio?” huya hu falu fala hulamatae.

Mukia nafunaganagatama tamakesa alisua kea haviho. Nagoa vayamoya emaineya tamahapai-mainoa kemona amakaveno huteya neatagaeya tamakaya mono kema havigahe alitaluma nehaya yapi melifako hisaya kema nehaya vayamogamifena kayetama mainetama ani kema nehaya vayamogamina tamakaveno humateho.

Ani vayamoya Anumaya Kalaisi aliyafena amakesa ohaviya amakaiami age hamaye hisaya yafekeya akave malesaya amakesa nehae. Hagalama-haisifa ke huya masave amake neaiya amaipafi ayegesageya kanale amakesama nohaviya veanea ayemavataga huya alihaviya humategahae.

Tamakaya Yisasima hulatenea yafena havitama tamakupi maletama atafa hulinaya kea mukia veamoya ago havimainaya yafena havitena tusia muse nehue. Kanale auava yamo aepaa havilama hutama nagoa kefo yamofe tamakesa ohavisae hunahe nehue.
Anumaya Kotia, taipa falu hisia yamona aepaagino, aupa kanafi Satanina taiyafinaga ayeno tatapegahie. Yisasia Anumayatimona kayone yamaamoa tamakayaene hanesie huna nehue.
Nagaiene aliya nealia kanoa, Timotia, huno falu fala hulamate. Ania huya Lusiusima Yesonima Sosipatama nagaini Isaleli nofi nafunagaya “Mainafio?” huya hu falu fala hulamatae.
Nagaya Tetiusina Polo avayafiti ke alina mani avona kaena Anumayamo agile “Felugae.” huna hu falu fala hunelamatoe.

Kaiyusia “Felugae.” huno hu falu fala hunelamate. Nomaafina kanaleya huno yagainategena mainogeya Yisasi anagamoya Anumayamo kema havisaya yafena agai nopina melitalu humainae. Elasatusia ani kumaalate Kamanimo kusi kusi kanoene Kavotusia tafu-taganaene “Felugae.” huana hu falu fala hunelamatae.

Anumaya Koti agia tusiya huta alisaga higetao. Yisasima hulatenea kanale mono kema hu-halena nelamamua keleti Anumaya Kotia hetitama tokiya vaitama maisaya tokiya tamamigahie. Mani kea hagoteno ayaaya kanagefa falakino haneanagino menia Anumaya Kotia ago alino falote humalene. Anumaya Kotia maige maige nehia kanomoa mage huno humaine “Mani kea hufalote hiho.” huno humainea ke amaune vayamoya kae-malenaya kefiti “Mukia alu nofi veamogamina hamapaisageya haviteya amakupi maleya amametiti huya nagaila nahaisia kava hisae.” huno humaineane.
Anumaya Kotia nagokemo mukia kanale havi haviyaami hanea veala amakase-mainea kano maineafe Yisasi Kalaisia hulateneafene huta agola mukia kanafina agia alisaga hisune. Tamage.
Kenia male hano hie.
Nagaini nagia Polonae.

Nagaya Polonae. Anumaya Kotina haigeno nagaila hapalinateno “Yisasi Aposolo kano maiyo.” huno humaineafe nagayaene taganatimoa Sosetenesiene mani avona kaetaa Kolini mainetama Yisasi kea tamametiti hutama Yisasi Kalaisiene ailokaetama mainayafe alu aotage veane mainae. Mukia kotega veanene Anumayatimo Yisasi Kalaisi agile nunamu nehaya veanene tamakaifeenena agaia alu aotage veanea maisayafene huno hapalilamatene. Yisasia amakaiene tagaiene Anumayatimo maine.
Anumaya Kotia, Nelafaene Yisasi Kalaisi Anumayatimoene kayone hisaya yaene tamaipa falu hisia yaene tamamisae.
Yisasi Kalaisiene ailokaetama maigeno Anumaya Kotia agaia kayone yamaa tamamineafene huna nagaya mukia kanafina tamakaifena Anumayamotega muse huna nunamuna nehue.

Kalaisi kea ago tamahapaugetama havilama hulinetama ani keleti Anumaya Kotifema havitama tamakupi malayana Yisasiene ailokaetama maigeno Anumaya Kotia mukia tokiyaa ago tamamineanagitama nagoa veamogamina mani kea hamapaisaya tokiyatamia hane.

Haneanagi meni kanafina Anumayatimoa Yisasi Kalaisima ikapinagati elavino fufu yatema esiafe tamametitia hutama agava mainageno Alu Aotage Avamumoa tokiya yamaa kasagoya tamamineana-gitama nago yafena aupa nohae.

Yisasia tokiya vaitama maisaya yana tamamisigetama tokiya vaitama mainetama ma mopama hano hisia yupa kefo yatamia omalenageno Anumayatimoa Yisasi Kalaisima kaiyeke hulamatesia yupa kanaleya hutama hetigahae.
Anumaya Kotina nafaneamoa Yisasi Kalaisie Alatimoene nagoke tamaipale maisayafe tamakaila ke huno “Naa hugahue.” huno hulamatenea kea oatalegahianagino ani kavala hugahie.
Nafunagana-gatama Alatimoa Yisasi Kalaisi agile tokiyaage kea tamahanepauve. Nagoa tamakesa havitama alu ke alu kea ohutama apaohetama mainetama nagoke tamaku tamakesale maiho huna tamahanepauve.
Nafunagana-gatama Koloe anagamoya tamakaifena mage huya nahapaiye “Amakaya ke vaige vaige yate nemaiye.” huya nahapaiye.

Tamakaya ani kema nevaiya yana nagokemogatama “Tagaya Polo veane mainone.” hutama hageya nagoamogatama “Tagaya Apolosi veane mainone.” hutama hageya nagoamogatama “Tagaya Pita veane mainone.” hutama hageya nagoamogatama “Tagaya Kalaisi veane mainone.” hutama nehae.

Naa higetama ani kea nehae? Kalaisi augafamoa akalu kale-peno haote haote humaineo? Nagaila Polonina tamakaife huna yafaga yosale nahaeya asaigena fali-maino? Ifi nagaila Poloni nagile tina fale-lamatenao? Aao tamakaya “Ma kanomo mono ke nehavuna veane mainone.” hutama ohiho.
Tamakai amunopina Kalisipusiene Kaiyusiene tina falenatenoe. Nagoamogamina fale oamatenoa yafena muse nehue.
Havigu nagoa veamoya “Polo agile tina falelatenae.” huya hisagi.
Tamage nagaya Setefanasi nofi anagaene tina falematenoe. Nagoa veanenena falematenesuo fale oamatenesuo nagesa ohavinoe.

Kalaisia tina falelamatesuafene huno hunategena omenogi agaia hulatenea yafe kanale mono kema huhalena tamahapaisuafene huno hunatene. Mani kea ma mopafima kanalehaviyaami hanea vayamoya nehaya augafa kema hisuana Yisasi Kalaisia yafaga yosalema fali-mainea kemoa afa ya kana hu yafenagina naa augafa kea ohugahue.

Hani yapi, tegelege nehia atafi, visaya veamoya Yisasia yafaga yosalema fali-mainea kehena “Havigu-nagu ke nehae.” huya nehayanagi tagaya Anumaya Kotia tagu tamema ali negatea veamogata Yisasia yafaga yosalema fali-mainea kemoa “Anumaya Kotina tokiyaae.” huta nehune.
Anumaya Koti avopina mage huno kae-maleneane

“Nagaya mukia kanale haviyaami hanea veamogamina havilinaya yana alitalesugeno fanane hugahie. Kanale amaku amakesama hanesia veamogamina amaku amakesa ali hano hutalegahue.” huno Anumayamoa humaineane.

Kanale haviyaamima hanea veafena naane hisune? Kahegi kema havilinaya veafena naane hisune? Ma mopale yafema amakemoma nehaya veafena naane hisune? Anumaya Kotia ma mopale yafe kanale haviyaamima hanea veamogamifena “Havigu-nagu ke nehae.” huno humaine.

Anumaya Kotia tusia kanale haviyaa hanea kanogino agaia haiya kava huno “Ma mopafi veamoya amakaiami haviyaamima hanea yateti nagaila nagelama huya onagegahae.” huno huteno haiya agesa mage huno havimaine “Yisasia hulatenea yafena kanale mono kea, huhaletama hamapaiya kema haviya amakupi maleya amametiti humainaya veamogamina amaku amamena aligatigahue.” huno humaine.
Yuta veamoya “Tokiyaage avame yana hisanageta ageteta Kalaisife havita lagupina malegahune.” huya hageya Kaliki veamoya “Mukia yana havita kanale haviyatiene veane maisune.” huya hae.

Hayanagi tagaya Kalaisia yafaga yosalema fali-mainea kema huhaleta hamanepaunana Yuta veamoya tagaifena “Tayo hia ke nehae.” huya amakaveno hutageya Yuta vea omainaya veamoya “Ani kea havigu-nagu ke nehae.” huya humainae.
Hayanagi tagaila Anumaya Kotima hapalilatenea veamogata, Yuta veanene Yuta vea omainaya veanenena, ago havimainone Kalaisia Anumaya Kotina tokiyaagino kanale haviyaa hanea kano maine.

Anumaya Kotifena “Havigu-nagu agu agesa hane.” huya nehayanagi mukia mopale veamogamina haviyaami amakase-maine. Anumaya Kotifena “Nagoa fulu fulu yamaa hane.” huya nehayanagi ani fulu fulu yamaamoa ma mopafi veamogami tokiyaamimona amakase-maine.

Nafunagana-gatama Anumaya Kotia tamakaila hapalilamatenea yupahe tamakesa havi havi hutama haviho. Tamakai amunopina ma mopale kanale haviyaami hanea veanene mopale tokiyaamima hanea veanene amakima hanea veamogami nafaneyagaene kasagoya omainayane.

Omainagi haviyaami hanea veala amakaye hisiafe Anumaya Kotia ma mopale yafe haviyaami omalenea veanea hapalimatene. Tokiyaamima hanea veamogamina amakaye hisiafe ma mopale fulu fulu nehaya veanea hapalimatene.
Ma mopafina amaki hanea veamogami tokiyaamia heno fanane hugahe ma mopafina amaki omale veanene “Afa veane mainae.” huya haya veanene hapalimatene.
Nago kanomoa Anumaya Koti aufina augafa alino nehaino agaiahena “Nagaya nagi hanea kano mainoe.” huno ohisiafene huno Anumaya Kotia ania augafa veala hapalimatene.

Anumaya Kotia agaia “Yisasi Kalaisiene ailokaetama maiho.” huno nagopi alino ailokaelateneafe Yisasi Kalaisia tagaya havisuna tagu tagesamona aepaa maine. Yisasia hulatenea yateti Anumaya Kotia havi yapitila ago miya hulateneno tagaifena “Fatago veane mainae.” huno hulateteno alu aotage auava yama hisuna tokiyaa tamine.
Ani yama hulatenea yafena Anumaya Koti avopina mage huno kae-maleneane
“Nago kanomoa agaia agima alisaga hisia agesama havinunoa neataleno Anumayamo agi alisaga huno musena hino.” huno humaineane.
Nafunagana-gatama nagaya nayona tamakaite Anumaya Koti kema me lamahapauvana haviyaami hanea veamoya nehaya avamete huna tamaipafinaga tamahaisifa kea tamahaopainoe.
Nagainia naguafinaga mage huna havimainoe “Nagaya tamakai amunopima mainoana nagoa yafena tamahaopaigahue. Nagaya Yisasi Kalaisia yafaga yosalema falimainea yafekeya tamahapaigahue.” huna humainoe.
Hagotena tamakaienema mainoa kanafina foli foli huna koli nehuna atali huna mainoe.

Atali nehuna Anumaya Koti tokiyahe havitama tamakupi maletama tamametiti hisae huna ma mopafi haviyaami hanea veamoya nehaya augafa kea ohunogi Avamumo tokiyaleti kea huhalena tamahapai-mainoane. Haviyaami hanea veamoya nehaya kehena tamametitia ohisae huna Yisasifena kanale mono kea humainoe.

Anumaya Kotina amakua amitafa huya akave nemalaya veamogamifena tokiyaage kea nehuanagi ma mopafi haviyaami hanea veamogami augafa kene, ma mopafi kava yagai-mainaya veamoya nehaya augafa kene, fanane hisia kea nohue.

Aao, tagaya Anumaya Koti agu agesamoa falaki-mainea ke tamahanepaune. Anumaya Kotia ma mopama talo ohunenoa hagoteno nago kea humainegeno falakino haneanagino menia lagaya Anumaya Kotitegati tokiya hale yamaa alisunafe mani kemoa falote humainone.
Ma mopafi kava vayamoya mani kemona aepaa ohavinae. Mani kema havimainasina tokiya hale yamo aepaa hanea kanoa, Anumayamona, yafaga yosalela nilia heya oasaisine.
Anumaya Koti avopina mage huno kae-malenayane
“Taulagamoa oagenea yaene tagesamoa ohavinea yaene veamogami amaku amakesafiti omalenea yaenena Anumaya Kotina amakuama aminaya veamogamife talo tala humalene.” huya kae-malenayane.
Veamoya oagageno falakino hanea kea Anumaya Kotia agaia Avamualeti taveli-maine. E, Alu Aotage Avamumoa mukia yana atiyeno Anumaya Kotina falakino hanea agu agesaene agemaine.

Hana veamoya nago kanomoma agesama nehavia yana agemaine? Aao oagenagi agaia agupima mainea agu nafamokeya agemaine. Ani kava huno nagoa veamoya Anumaya Kotia agu agesafima havia yana ohavinagi agaia Avamumokeya agemaine.
Anumaya Kotia ma mopafi veamoya nehaviya amaku amakesa notamigi tagaima Anumaya Kotia taminea kema havilama huta havisunafe ani Alu Aotage Avamula tamigeta avale-mainone.

Tagaya mani kea huhaleta nehune. Ma mopale kanale haviyaami hanea veamogami ke kana huta nohunagi Avamumo tahapaiya kegeya tamahanepaunageno ani Avamuma amakupi mainea veafekeya sili huta hamanepaune.

Hamanepaunanagi Alu aotage Avamumoma amakupi omainesia veamoya ani Avamumo kea haviya akave malesaya amukoamia omaleneanagiya “Mani kea havigu-nagu ke nehae.” huya nehuya Avamula oavalenayanagiya aepaa havisaya amukoamia omalene.
Alu Aotage Avamuma amakupi mainea veamoya mukia aepaa haviya yamona fako hugahayanagi nagoa veamoya agaifena “Naa kano mainane.” huya fako hu oategahae.
Anumaya Koti avopina mage huno kae-maleneane
“Anumayamo nehavia agu agesa hanaa veamoya havilineya Anumayamo aliya alisia yafena hapaigahae?” huno humaineane.
Naa ohugahagi Kalaisia agai agu agesa ago tahapaino tamigeta agai kemo aepaa havilinone.

Nafunagana-gatama tamakaiene mainena, Avamumoma amakupi mainea veamoya havisaya avamete kea ohunogi tamakaya atafa lamaipale, osi nafane kana hutama mainagena Kalaisi humainea auava yafema nohavinaya veamogami avamete kea tamahapai-mainoe.
Tamakaya tokiyaage kema hisua kea ohavigahayanagina nu tamamisua avamete ke tamahapai-mainoe. Meni kanafienena ania huna nu tamamisua avamete ke tamahanepauve.
Naafene atafa lamaipamo akave maletama mainetama tamafu-tamakana-gamifena tamaipa haviya humatetama kema vaimatayana atafa lamaipa hanegetama ma mopafi veamoya nehaya kavakeya nehae.

Nagoamogatama “Polo tahapaiya kele akave nehune.” hutama hagetama nagoamogatama “Tagaila Apolosi tahapaiya kele akave nehune.” hutama nehae. Ani kavama nehayana ma mopafi veamoya nehaya avamete kava nehae.

Apolosia hanaa augafa kanoe? Nagaya Polona hanaa augafa kanoe? Taagaya aliya kanolatake mainoe. Anumaya Kotia alu aliya lu aliya taamigetaa nealue. Ani aliyateti tamakaya Yisasifena havitama tamakupina maletama lamametitia humainae.
Nagaya Yisasi kea tamakupina fai-maletogeno Apolosia timaa hefino taki-maleneanagi Anumaya Kotia agaiage alino aifalo higeno hagemaine.
Naa humainegi avina yama fai-malenea kanomo agiene tima taki falu hu-malenea kanomo agienena omalegi avina yama alino aifalo higeno hage-mainea kanoa, Anumaya Koti agigeya alisaga hisune.
Anumaya Koti kema faimalenea kanoene tima takino falu humalenea kanoene nago aliya alimainae. Ani aliyatetila tolemogania ali-mainaa avamete anonaania aligae.
Taagaya Anumaya Kotiene ailokaetaa aliya kanolatamaa mainoe. Tamakaya Anumaya Kotina hoyaa kana hutama mainae. Tamakaya Anumaya Kotina nomaa kana hutama mainae.

Tamakaya Anumaya Kotina nomaa mainagena Anumaya Kotia kayone yamaaleti nagaya no ki aliyate kava kano mainena yafateti tunagea ago ayemalenogeya nagoa veamoya nona negiye. Mukia veamoya amakesa havilama huteya kanaleya huya kiho.
Anumaya Kotia tokiyaage no yosamoma noma atafa nehia yosa Yisasi Kalaisina agaiage ategeno maineanagiya nagoa veamoya alu tokiya noma atafa hisia yosa oayegahae.
Nagoa veamoya haya keleti ani nona tokiyaage huno falu otesia yosaletiene u yosaletiene yafatetiene negiyanagi nagoa veamoya hofaletiene vitimo alapaletiene aupaa kasalisia yateti negiye.

Negiyanagino Anumaya Kotia kaiyekema hulatesia kanafina mukia veamogami aliyamo aepaa haote haote huno atamo anefemo avame humateno amakege amakege hutesigeya aliyama ali-mainesaya aliyamo aepaa fufu yate ali falote hugahie.
Nagoa veamoya tokiyaage u yosaleti kimalenaya avamete huya ki-malenesaya noamimoma atama otesigeno kanalema huno hanesiana ani veamoya kanale miyana anonaamia aligahae.

Aligahagi nagoa veamoya ki-malesaya noamimoma atama lesigenoa mukia aliyamaamimoa fanane hugahianagi atafiti veama ali vati huna avamete huno amakaiami amaku amamena aligatisigeya maigahayanagiya anonaamia oaligahae.
Tamakaya Anumaya Kotina alu aotage nomaa mainageno Anumaya Kotina Alu Aotake Avamuamoa tamakupina maine. Tamakaya ani yana havilama ohunao?
Nagoa veamoya Anumaya Kotima mainea nomaama ali haviya hisayana Anumaya Kotia amakaina ali haviya humategahie. Anumaya Koti nomaa alu aotage nona haneanagitama tamakaya ani nona mainae.

Havigu tamakaitamihe havige ayemavataga hisagi. Nagoamogatama “Mopafi veamogami haviyamiene veane mainone.” huya hisayana naa amaku amakesa ataleteya amakesa nohaviya vea kana huya maisayana kanale haviyamiene veane maigahae.
Ma mopafi haviyaami hanea veamoya Anumaya Koti aulagafina amakesa nohaviya veane kana humainae. Anumaya Koti avopina mage huno kae-maleneane
“Ma mopale haviyaamiene veamoya savaleage nehageno Anumaya Kotia veamoya kalifuma hanagi-maleneya nehayafiya avamete huno amatafa nehie.” huno humaineane.
Nagoene mage huno humaineane
“Anumayamoa haviana ma mopale haviyaamima hanea veamoya nehaviya amaku amakesamoa afa ya kana humaine.” huno humaineane.
Na yafe “Ma veala kanale veane mainae.” hutama amakia alisaga ohiho. Anumaya Kotia mukia yana tamamine.
Polonagi, Apolosiagi, Pitaagi, ma mopaene tamahaimuene, fali yaene, meni kanaene, haenagama falote hisia kanaene, mukia yana Anumaya Kotia tamamine.
Tamamigetama tamakaya Kalaisi ayapi maigeno Kalaisia Anumaya Koti ayapi maine.
Yisasi kema tamahanepauna vayamogatihena mage huya hisae “Yisasi Kalaisina aliya vayaamoya maineya Anumaya Kotia nayoma falaki-malenea kea yagai-maineya huhaleya nehae.” huya hisae.
Kavayagaisaya veafena “Efi efi hutama aliyana aliho.” huno humaine.

Tamakayaene nagoa veanene nagaima fako hutama nagaya kanaleya huna tamahanepauvo havi kava huna tamahanepauvo hutama hisaya yafena kolia nohue. Nagainia nehua yafena nagainia fakoa nohugi Anumayamoa agaia fako hunategahie.
Nagaya agoana “Fatago aliya kano mainoe.” huna nehuanagi Anumaya Koti aulagafina fatago aliya kano maino ifi omainoe huno Anumayamoa agaiage “Naa humainane.” huno nagaila fako hunenate.

Kaiyekema hulatesia kanamoa yaufa falote ohuneanagitama tamakaya veala alitama “Naa kavala havi kava nehae.” hutama hu oamateho. Anumayamo esia kanafina agava mainesageno mukia veamoya kefo yama, hani yapi falaki-mainea yana, Anumaya Kotia hale yate alino falote hugahie. Anumayamoa agaia amahaote amahaote amakua amaketeno “Kanale humainao kefo ya humainao.” huno agaia alino fako huteno veamogamina humainesaya avamete Anumaya Kotia agaia muse yana amamigahie.

Nafunagana-gatama tamakaya havisae huna nagaiene Apolosienema alitama fako ohisaya kea nehuna kaana tamave-nelue. Anumayamo avopifena mage hie “Okaenesaya kea ohiho.” huya humainaya kea havitama akave nehutama nagoa veamogami amakia alisaga nehutama nago veamogami amakia ali haviya nehaya kavala ohiho.

Tamakaya mukia veama mainaya avamete hutama mainagi alua avametela hutama oamakasenagi mukia yana Anumayamoa tamamineanagi naa higetama “Nagainia ani yana ali falote nehue.” hutama tamakesa havitama tamaugafa alitama nehaiye?

Tamakaya ma ke hutama nehao? “Tagaitigekeya Yisasi kema havuna kea hai havimainone. Poloene Apolosiene mani kea tahapaiageta ohavinonagi tagaitigeya hai havilineta sauve veane mainone.” hutama nehao? Ani kavama humaineleasina taagaienena ania hutaa sauve vaya kana hutaa mainoaleasine. Tamage tamakaya ani avamete veanea omainae.

Nagaya ma nagesa nehavue Anumaya Kotia tagaila Aposolo vayala haenagalafa maisunafe hulatene. Nayoma kame vayama hamaegahe amavaleya kumate emainageya amaketeya kigi hu neamataya avamete kava nehageta tagaya haenagalafa vaya kana huta mainonageya “Hamaesageya falisae.” huya hageya veamoyaene ensole vayaene tagaila nelageya kigi hunelatae.

Tagaya Yisasi Kalaisi aliya nealunanagita aifo vaya kana huta mainonagi tamakaya Kalaisiene ailokaetama mainetama kanale havi haviyatami hanea veane mainao? Tagaya tokiyatia omale vaya maunagetama tamakaya tokiyatami hanea veane mainao? Tamakai tamakia alisaga nehayanagi tagaifena “Otahaiya vaya mainae.” huya nehae.
Yisasi kema hamanepaunafe nayoene meni kanafiene neyafena lagala neleno tifena nelageno nehie. Kenatia haviya nehuno faesuna noenena omalegeta vaiyatete nehunageya kayo kevea nelamiye.

Kaveti ali falote hisuna yafena tayapitila tusia aliya nealune. Vayamoya tagaila hu-haviya hu nelatayanagi anonaa kanale manua neamamune. Tagaila tusiya huya ali haviyana hulatayanagi tagaya tokiya vaita mainone.
Hu-haviya hu nelatayanagi anonaamia ako huta falu hamaisifa ke huneamatone. Nayoene meniene vayamoya tagaifena “Kasali-mainea yama halafi hutalaya avamete vaya mainae.” huya nehae.
Mani kea havitama tamakaye hisie huna nokaogi nagaila nahaiya nafaneyagamo-gatama ali lamakafa hisue huna mani kea kae-malenoe.

Kalaisima akave visaya kea teni tausenia (10,000) vaya hulamave-lisayana nagaya nagainige nagoke nelamafana mainoe. Yisasi Kalaisi kanale mono kema tamahapaugetama havitama Anumaya Kotina tamakua amitafa hageno agaia nafaneyaga lamateneafe nagaya nelamafana mainoe.
Mainoa yafe nagayama nemauva auava kavala agetetama akave maletama maiho.

Ani yafe Timotina hutogeno tamakaite umaine. Timotia Anumayatimoene ailokaeno maineno kanale aliya nealianagino nagaila nahau nayamopafi nenahaiya nafanenia maineafe nagayama Yisasi Kalaisiene ailokaena mainena vai neayoa auava yafena tamahapaiteno ani kate visaya kea huno tamakesa hugahie. Mukia kumate uvana Yisasife haviya amakupi malenaya veamogamina mani kea hamanepauvane.
Nagoamogatama nagaifena “Omegahie.” hutama nehutama tamakaitami tamaugafa alitama nehaiye.
Nehaiyanagi Anumayamoa hainegenoma “Vuo.” huno hunatesigena iva aupaa ago egahue. Neena amakaiami amaugafa aliya nehaiya vayala mo neamakena nagaifema nehaya kea havitena tokiyaamiene agegahue.
Anumaya Kotima kava yagai-mainea yamo aepaa keagela omalenegi Anumaya Kotina tokiyaa alita maisuna yamoenena aepaa hane.

Tamakaila na kava hisuafe nelamahaiye? Kelama-kisua kema hisua yafe esuo? Ifi ako huna tamakaifena aluya huno nahau nayamopafi nenahaiya kava hugahe esuo? Ani yafena lamakesa nehavitama etetama fatago hutama maisayana tamakaifena nahau nayamopafi nahau-mainenagena evayi hano.
Nago kema falote higena havuana Yisasi kema nohaviya veamoya nohaya kefo yana tamakai veapitila nago veamoya maitama nehae. Nago kanomoa nefa aene kumai heno alitea tamavagea hagena havi-mainoe.
Havuanagi naa higetama tamaugafa alitama nehaiye? Naa higetama tamahauna hutama tamakayea nohigetama tamakaipitila ani kanoa anati noatalae.
Nagaya alule mainoanagi afaa nagu namemoa tamakaiene mainegena ani kefo yama humainea kanomofena “Kefo ya nehie.” huna Yisasi Kalaisi agile nehue.
Anumayatimoa Yisasi agile alitalu hutama mainageno nagaila nagu namemoene Yisasi Kalaisi tokiyamoene tamakaiena maigahie.

Maigahigi Anumayatimoa kaiyekema hulatesia kanafina ani kanomo agu amena aligatisiafene hutama menia Satani ayapi ateho. Satania augafaage haesigeno age hayema nehia yamaa hano hisigeno “Kefo ya nehue.” huno agua aiyahae huno eteno eno.

Tamakaya tamaugafama alitama nehaiya yana kanale ohunea kava nehae. Tamakaya ma yafena ohavinao? Tanefaleti kai hame maya talo hageno osi kanoamo halegisia yana maleteno alino havigu hinageno mukia tanefafi ute ete hinageno haenaga mukia tanefamoa halenegie. Anima hale negia avamete huno osi kefo ya kanoamoagi mukia veapinaga ute ete hisigeno ala kefo yana ali falote hugahie.

Hugahigi kaihamema hale negia atafa yana kai hamepitila alitama hagayu hu neatalaya avamete fatago kavakeya huta maisunafene hutama tamakaipitila kefo yana alitama hagayu hutaleho. Nayona veamoya kefo yaamihe haviya sipi sipi hemainaya avamete huno Yisasia tagayama fatago huta maisuna yafe fali-mainegeta kefo yana ohisuna veala maisune.

Ani yafe nayona veamoya sipi sipia heya muse humainaya avamete huta musena nehuta hale negia yana, vea ali haviya humatesuna kavaene kefo yaene neataleta fatago huta tole lagesa ohavita kelamage kegeya huta maisune.
Nagoma kae-malenoa avopina mage huna humainoe “Kumai nehesaya veanenena tokaetama omaiho.” huna kae-malenoe.

Yisasi kema nohaviya veamoya kumai nehaya veanene amakaiamiahekeya amakesa haviya “Nagainia mukia yana alisue.” huya nehaya veanene havige huya musufayama nehaya veanene ago fali-mainaya veafe “Anumayati mainae.” huya amakisana nevaiya veanene mukia mopale mainayafe ani veanene tokaetama omaiho huna hisugetama hanate haote yatela maisae? Yisasi kema nohaviya veafena mani kea ohunoe.

Ohunogi nagaya Yisasina amakua amitafa humainaya tamafu-tamakanaya kumai he kavaene agaiahe agesa havino “Mukia yana nagai ya hapaesie.” huno nehisia kavaene ago fali-mainaya veafe “Anumayati mainae.” huya amakisana nevaiya kavaene vayaamihe hu-haviya humate kavaene havili neya aneginagi nehaya kavaene musufayama nehaya kavaenema tamafu-tamakanayama hisagetama amakaienena ailokaetama maitama kavela oneho huna hulokiya vaina avona kae-malenoe.

Anumayamo akave nomalaya veala fako humatesia yana nagai aliyana omalegi Anumaya Kotia agaia aliyanagino kaiyekea humategahie. Tagaiene maineya Yisasina amakua amitafa humainesaya veala kanaleya hutama fako hutama “Kefo yana ohiho.” hutama amaya hisaya aliyatamia hanegeno Anumaya Koti avopina mage huno kae-maleneane
“Tamakaiene maineno kefo yama nehisia kanomona henati-taleho.” huno kae-maleneane.

Nagoa nelamafuyaene kema vaitetama agaima kaiyekema hutegahena naa higetama Anumayamo kema akave nomalaya kava vayatela amavaletama nevae? Ani kavala ohiho. Yisasina amakua amitafa humainesaya vayate vigeno ketamia alino kanale huno fatago hulamateno.
Yisasi anagamoya haenagaa ma mopale veamogamina kaiyekea humategahae huya humainaya kea ohavinao? Mukia veala kaiyekea humategahagi osi kea fako hisaya tokiyatamia hane huna nehue?
Tamakaya ohavinao? Haenagaa tagaya ensole vayamogami kaiyekea humategahunagi ma mopale yana osi yanagitama tamakaya afaa fako hugahae.
Nago yama falote hisia yupa kema fako hugahena naa higetama Anumayamo akave nomaleya mono nopi amaki omale vayatela kea alitama nevae? Ani kavama hayana havi kava nehae.
Tamakaipina tole nelamafugania kema vaisaagenoa tamakaipina nagola kanale havi haviyaa hanea kanoa amunoanifi hetino keanima fako hisia kanoa omaineo? Mainegahie. Tamakaye hisifa kea nehue.
Naa higetama ani kanomotela anavaletama outama nelamafuganina kaiyekema hunategahena Anumayamo akave nomalaya kanomotela anavaletama nevae?

Ke vai yatamima falote higetama kaiyekema humategahe vayana havi kava nehae. Nago kanomoa kagaila havi kavama hunegatesiana “Afa yane.” nehuka kaiyekea hu oateka yuna heka maiteasina kanale hileasine. Nago kanomoa kagaipiti musufayama higeka “Afa yane.” nehuka kaiyekea hu oateka maiteasina kanale hileasine.
Kanaleya hugahe hianagi ani kavala ohutama tamakaya havige hutama nelamafugamina havi kava huneamatae.

Kefo yama nehaya veala Anumaya Kotia kava yagai-mainea kumatela ohaigahae huno humainea kea ohavinao? Ani kehena havilama hutetama havige hisaya kea ohaviho. Ani kefo yama nehaya veala Anumaya Kotia kava yagai-mainea kumatela ohaigahae moli huliteya nehuya kumai nehaya veanene ago fali-mainaya vayafe “Anumayati maine.” huya amakisana nevaiya veanene alu kanomo anema amavayu nehaya vayaene ve amafaluyaene moli nehaya vayaene Anumaya Kotima kava yagai-mainea kumatela ougahae.

Musufa yama nehaya veanene alu kanomo yatema age hamaye nehaya veanene havili neya aneginagi nehaya veanene nagoa veafe hu-haviya nehaya veanene havige huya musufa yama nehaya veanene Anumaya Kotima kava yagai-mainea kumatela amaugosa tamage huno omalegahie.

Tamakaila nagoatamimoya nayona ani avamete kefo ya nehageno Anumayatimoa Yisasi Kalaisi agiletiene Anumaya Koti Avamutetiene kefo yatamia ago aye hami-talegetama alu aotage veane maigeno Anumaya Koti aufina “Fatago veane mainae.” huno alino kanale hulamatene.

“Mukia yama hisuna kavala kahe-okineanagita afaa hugahune.” huya nehayanagi nagaya mage huna nehue “Mukia yamoa laya ohutafa huno laya ohugahie. Mukia yana afaa hugahuanagi ani yamoa nofi hunate yafenagina nagaya ani kavala ohugahue.”

“Anumaya Kotia kave nesunafene huno taipa talo huno nesuna kavela talo humaleneanagita afaa negahune.” huya nehayanagi Anumaya Kotia haenagaa kaveene taipaene alino fanane hugahie. Moli huliteta huta kumai hesunafene huno Anumaya Kotia veamogati laugafa talo ohunegi Anumayamoene ailokaeta mainesunageno ani laugafa agaia kava yagaisiafene huno talo hulatenea yafe moli huliteta huta kumai he kavala ohisune.
Anumaya Kotia tokiyaaleti Yisasina fali-mainefitila alino hetiteneanagino tagayama falisunagenoa ania huno alino hetilategahie.

Nagi ohavinao Kalaisienema mai hapaita mainonageno tagai taugafamoa Kalaisi aiya, aya, aulaga, agesa, kana huta mainone. Kalaisi augafa mainonagi hanaa huta Kalaisi augafa kumai nehaya anenena alita mai hapaisune? Aao ania ohisune.
Anumaya Koti avopina mage huno kae-maleneane
“Alavema mainaana nagoke anaugafa hane.” huno kae-maleneane.
Naa humaineanagi nago kanomoa kumai nehea aene noma faeyana agaiene mai hapaiageno nagoke anaugafa kali-mainae. Ani yafena ohavinao?
Nago anaugafa kali mainaanagi Anumayamoene mai hapaino mainea kanomoa nagopi maineana nagoke anamete mainae.
Nagi kumai heyafena kolia hutama ohutafa hiho. Mukia kefo yamoa amega amaugafale yanagi kumai he yamoa alino vea amaugafafina haviya nehia yafena tusia koli hutama ani kavala ohutafa hiho.
Anumaya Kotia agaia Alu Aotage Avamua ago tamamigeno tamakupina maineafe tamaugafamoa Avamumona nomaa haneanagino tamaugafa tamakaitami yana omalene. Ani kea ohavinao?
Anumaya Kotia ala miyateti tamakaila ago miya hulamateneafe tamaugafa kava yagaitama kanale auava yakeya hutama Anumaya Koti agia alisaga hiho.
Avoma kaetama nahavigaya kea tamahapaigahugi haviho. Nago kanomoa anea ali oatesiana kanaleya huno maigahie.
Maigahianagi amaugafa age hamaye huya kumai he yamoa ala nehiafe mukia vemoya aneamia maitele hisigeya anemoya veamia maitele hisie.
Alavemoya nehaya yana vemoa aamona “Aao.” hu oateno amoa ania huno anauamona “Aao.” hu oatesie.
Amo augafa agaia augafa omalenegi anauamo yagai-mainea augafa hane. Ania huno vemo augafa agaia augafa omalenegi aamo yagai-mainea augafa hane.

Naa humaineafe vemoga akamoene humo kavafena “Aao.” hu oategeno amoga anaukamoene humo kavafena “Aao.” hu oato. Nagote tokaetana mainetana tanakesa havitana “Osi kana kanoa humo kavala ohutaa afaa mainetaa nunamuna hugahue.” hutana hisaana kanale hugahianagi mukia kanafina ve alave humo kavala oataleho. Atalesaana Satania ayelana-vataga hinagetana alu veleene alu ateene age lanahaye hu yafenagi osia maigetana hio.
Mage huna nehua kea nagainia mani kea nehugi Anumaya Koti kahegi kea nohue.
Nagi nagainige mainena ama oalinoa yama huya mukia vayala maisaya yafe nenahaiyanagi Anumaya Kotia agaia alua lua mai yana nagoke nagokemogatina tamigeta tahaote tahaote auavate nemaune.
Neyavene munanene keto anenefe mani kea nehue nagayama ama oalina mainoa avamete huya maisayana kanaleya hugahie.
Hugahigi age hamayema hisaya yatela yagaisaya tokiyaamima omalesiana ata lamale-yafenagi anea alitesageya vea alisageya hisae.
Alavemogatama kahegi kea, nagainia nagesafitila nohugi Anumayamo humainea kea tamahapaigahue. Anemogatama vetamia oamataletama kanaleya hutama maiho.
Maigahayanagi vetamima amataletama vinutamahena alu velela omaiho. Afaa omaisaya tamakesa hisigetama etetama vetamile etama nagoke tamaipale emaiho. Vemogatama atamimona tamakaitamia hu oamateho.

Nagoamogatamihena Anumayamoa ohunea kea nagainia mage nehue. Yisasite ametiti humainesia kanomoa Anumayamote ametiti nohisia amoa neveenema maisia agesama havisigenoa nevea “Nenataleka vuo.” huno oataleno.
Yisasite ametiti hu-mainesia amoa Anumayamote ametiti nohisia velema mainesigeno ani vemoa aamoene maisia agesama havisigenoa “Nenataleka vuo.” huno nevena hu oateno.

Nagi Yisasite ametiti hu-mainesia amoa Yisasite ametiti nohisia neveenema maisiana ailokaeana maisaa yamoa oniyaagela ohunegi ani vemoa Anumaya Koti kema havisia yafe alu aotage kano maine. Yisasite ametiti hu-mainesia vemoma Yisasite ametiti nohisia aenema maisiana ailokaeana maisaa yamoa oniyaagela ohunegi ani amoa Anumaya Koti kema havisia yafe alu aotage ane maine. Anumaya Koti aufima alu aotage veatalama omaisaana nafaneamimoya ania huya oniyaagela haleasinagi tamage huya Anumaya Koti kema havisaya yafe alu aotage nafaneyaga maigahae.

Mainageno Yisasite ametiti nohia api vefi atalesayana afaa atalegahae. Atalesayana Yisasite ametiti hunesia veanefi mainaa nofila ago aigalu hetalegeya afaa mainae. Anumaya Kotia falu huta maisunafe ke higeta agaitega emainone.

Yisasite kametiti hu-mainana amoga agaiene maineka aya hisanageno anaukamoa agua aiyahae hinageno Anumaya Kotia agu amena aligatisio? huka kagaya ohavinane. Yisasite kametiti hu-mainana kanomoga akamoene maineka aya hisanageno akamoa agua aiyahae hinageno Anumaya Kotia agu amena aligatisio? huka kagaya ohavinane.
Anumaya Kotia mukia veala noma maisaya yana fako huno amamineanagitama mukiamogatama Anumayamoa hapali-lamatenea yapi maiho. Mani kea Anumayamo anagala alule alule mo hamapai-mainogi haviho.

Anumayamoma hapalimatenea kanafina nagoa Yuta vayamoya amaugafa taga hu-malenaya amafugula hanegeya eteya ani amafugula aye hananeya fala okisae. Nagoa vayamoya Anumaya Kotia hapali-matenea kanaleti amaugafa taga ohunaya vayamoya menia laga ohisae.
Taugafa laga nehaya yano taga ohunaya yano ani tole yamoa afa ya hanegi Anumaya Koti kema havita akave malesuna yana kanale yanagino aepaa hane.
Nagi mukiamogatama Anumaya Kotia agoma hapali-lamatenea kanafina no maiyatamia oataletama nagoene anile maiho.

Anumayamoa hapali-lamatenea yupa nofipi mainetama miya oalisaya aliya nealitama mainageno ani aliyana afaa aliho. Aligahagi kava kanotamimoa “Menia nofila huotamategahugi afaa lamatalegahue.” huno hisigetama muse nehutama afaa ugahae.

Anumayamoa hapali-lamatenea yupa nofipi mainetama miya oalisaya aliya nealitama Anumayatimoene ailokaetama mainayafe Anumayamoa kefo yatamimoma alino nofi hulamatenefitila ago alino kalu he-taleneafe nofipina nagoene omainae. Omainagi nagoa veala afaa mainageno Anumayamoa hapali-lamateneafe Kalaisia miyana oalisia aliya veanea tamage hutama maigahae.
Anumaya Kotia ala miyateti miya hu-lamategetama agai veane mainagi ma mopafi veamogami aliya veanea omaisae huna nehue.
Nafunagana-gatama Anumayamoma hapali-lamatenea kanafina no maiyatamia oataletama nagoene Anumaya Kotia tamakaiene mainesigetama “Hai mainone.” hutama maiho.
Anumaya Kotia kalagi ainategena tamagegeya hisua kanogina nago kea hugahe hue. Anumayamoa mani kahegi kea ohunegi nagaya nagesafiti nehue. Vene ofaenesaya munanene anene ofaenesaya veyagahe nehue.
Meni kanafina tusia kana yana falote nehiafe nagesa mage huna nehavue neyavene munaneyagaene mainaya avamete hutama maiho.
Nagi ama ago alitenesana vemoga akamofena “Kataloe.” huka hu oato. Ama oalinesana vemoga anea oalio huna nehue.

Nehuanagi ama ali-tenukahena kefo yana omaleneanagika afaa aligane. Vene ofaenesaya munanemoya vele maisayana kefo yana omalenegi ma mopafi mainesaageno tanakaipina kasagoya kana yamo falote huyafenagina mani kea nehue.
Nafunagana-gatama ma mopamoa aupa kanafi hano hisia yafe meni kanaleti aepa hetama ama atenesia kanomoa aamofena agesa ohavino aama omai kano kana huno maisie huna nehue.
Nagoamoya avima neatesaya veamoya osi kanoa avia ateho. Musema nehisaya veamoya osi kanoa musena hiho. Afenoamima miya nehisaya veamoya oali vea kana huya maiho.
Mama mainona mopa aupa kanafi fanane hugahigi mopafi aliyama nealisaya veamoya mani mopale yafekeyana amakesa havi havi huya omaisae.
Ma mopale yafema tamakesa kumoma haya yafena nagaila nonahaiye.
Ama oalino mainea kanomoa Anumayamona haisia yafeene aliyamaaene agesa havi havi huno nemaiye.
Nemaiyanagi aama mainea kanomoa ma mopafi yafena, aamoa musema hisiafene agesa havi havi huno nemaiye.

Nago kaiyaga Anumayamofena agesa nehavino nago agesamoa aamofena agesa nehavianagi keto anene vele ounaya munanene Anumayamo aliyafekeya amakesa haviya “Mukia taugafaene taguaene Anumayamona alu aotage nomaa hane.” huya kava yagaiya mainayanagi vele mainaya anemoya anauamimoya musema humatesayafene huya mopafi yafe amakesa nehaviye.
Mani kemoa katilelamatesua kea nohugi tamaya hisuafe nehue. Kanaleya hutama Anumayamofena tamakesa havi havi hutama nago yamo tamavayu huno atifi mafi ohisie huna nehue.

Nago kanomoa hage-malenesia aamofena hagoteno “Afaa tokaetaa omaigahue.” huno huteno haenagaa tusi haye hisigeno “Kanale kavala hu noatoe.” huno haisia kava huno ani munala alitesie. Alitesiana kefo yana ohugahie.

Nago neyamoa agua amino hage-malenea aamofena “Anumayamo aliya alisuafe afaa aote maigahue.” huno agesa haviteno augafa age haye hisia agu agesa hinageno kanaleya huno kava yagaino “Afaa aote maigahue.” hisiana kanale kava hugahie.
Ani yafe nago kanomoa hage-malenesia aama alitesiana kanale kava nehianagi nago kanomoa hage-malenesia aama ali oatesiana tusia kanale kava hugahie.
