Aneyaga velema faitesageno anauamoma ofalino afaa mainesigenoa nagopi mai hapaino maineno amoa ataleno alu vele ovisie. Anauamoma falitesigenoma “Alu kanole maigahue.” huno hisiana kanale hugahianagi Anumayamoene mai-lokaeno mainesia vea alisie.
Aligahianagi nagaya nagesa havuana afaama maisiana tusia muse hugahie huna nehue. Manima hua kea Anumayamo Avamumo nahapaigena nehue.

Ago fali-mainaya vayafe “Anumayati maine.” huya amakisana vaiya afu neamamiya yamo kea nagaya hugahe nehue. Tagaya nagoa yafena havilinonanagi ani kanale haviyatimoa tamaugafa alita haisuna yanagi alu veafe tahau-tamayamopafi nelahaiya yana amaya huta ali tokiya vaimategahune.
“Mukia yana havilama hulinoe.” huno agesa havisia kanomoa mukia yafema havilama hisia himamua omaleneanagino ohavine.
Ohavinegi nagoa veamoya Anumaya Kotina amakua aminesaya veala Anumaya Kotia amakaila ago amakelama humaine.

Ago fali-mainaya veafe “Anumayati maine.” huya amakisana vaiyama neamiya afuma nesaya yafe nehugi haviho. Tagaya havunana ago fali-mainaya veamoya ma mopafina tokiyaamia omalene. Anumaya Kotia agaiage nagoke Anumaya maineanagiya kasagoya Anumaya omainae.

Omainagi mopaleene ikapinagaene afa anumaya kasagoyama mainaleasina tagaya tamage huteasinagi “Nelafaa agaiage Anumaya Kotia maineno mukia yana talo humalegeta mainone. Nagoke Anumayatimoa Yisasi Kalaisia maineno mukia yana talo huteno tagaienena talo hulateneanagita agaiteti tahaimula nealune.”

Nagoa veamoya mani kea ohavineya “Afa anumayayaga tamage huya mainae.” huya nehae. Nagoa veamoya Yisasife haviya amakupi malayanagi amakuamoa tokiyaagela ohuneafe ani afa anumayamoma aminaya afua neneya mage nehae “Afa anumayamo kave nenonageno ani kavemoa taguamona alino haviya higeno oniyaage nehie.” huya amakesa havimainae.
Nehaviyanagi kavemoa Anumaya Koti avatela tavaleno otategahie. Ani afuma onesunana Anumaya Koti aufina havi veala omaigahunagi nesunana Anumaya Koti aufina kanale veanea omaigahune.

“Afaa anumayamogami amamiya afua negahune.” hutama hisaya yafena kayeho. Havigu Yisasifena amakuamoa tokiya ovainesia veamoya ageteya nesayana “Kefo ya nehune.” huya havigu asaga hulaviyafenagi kayeho.

“Afaa anumayayaga tamage huya omainae.” hutama havimainaya veamogatama anima afa anumayamo amiya afuma malenesaya nopi mo nenesageno nagola Yisasifena aguamoa tokiya ovainesia kanomoa tamaketeno “Negahue.” huno hu yafenagi kaye ho.

Ani yafe tamakaya “Havilama humainone.” hutama nehaya yatamimoa, nagoma aguamoa tokiya ovainea nelamafufe huno Kalaisia fali-maineanagitama tamakaya avaletama havi kate atesageno ali haviya huyafenagi kaye ho.

Ani yafe aguamoa tokiya ovainesia nelamafuna kefo ya hutesageno tokiyaa omalesia agu nafanea agata aisia havi kava huteyafenagi kaye ho. Tamafu-tamakanana kefo yama hutesayana Kalaisiene kefo yana huneatae.
Ani yafe kavela nenoanagina nafunaganana havigu neteno havi kapi asaga hulavino visia yafenagina nagaienena nagoene afua onegahue. Havigu nafunaganaa kefo yapi uyafenagina ani kavala ohugahue.

Nago kanomoa “Naa ohuo.” huno natafa nehio? Aao natafa nohie. Aposolo kanoa maino? E, ani kano mainoe. Nagaya Anumayatimo Yisasina agemaino? E, tamage Anumayamoene ailokaena mainena agai aliya ali-mainoa aliyateti lamakaya tamakua aiyahae nehae.

Nagoa veamoya nagaifena mage nehae “Aposolo kanoa omaine.” huya nehayanagi Yisasi kema tamahapaugetama havitama tamakua aiyahae hageya veamoya nelamakeya nagaifena “Anumayamoene ailokaeno Aposolo kanoa maine.” huya nehae.
Nagoa veamoya auavaniama fako hisagena nagaya mage huna hugahue.
“Anumayamo aliyana nealuanagina kaveene tienena afaa alisuo?
Nagoa Aposolo vayaene Yisasi aganaamoyaene Pitaene nehaya kava huna Yisasima agua aminesia ama alitenena avalena vaiyesuana ani yamoa havi kava hugahio?
Panapasiene taagaitiage Anumayamo aliyana nealitaa taagaitia moneleti kavela miya hutaa nenoe. Naa higetama taaya nohae?

Nagi ati vayala kamele ugahena amakaiami moneamileti kaveamia kenaamia miya nehao? Aao. Hana kanomo hoya vai-maleteno ani hoyafitila kavela alino onene? Hana kanomo pulumaka kava yagaiteno haenagaa nutimaa onene? Ani kavala ohugahagi afaa aliya negahae.”
Veamoya nehaya kavakeya akave malena mani kea nehuo? Aao, Anumaya Koti avopiene ani kea huno kae-maleneane.
Mosese kahegi kefina mage huno kae-maleneane
“Pulumakamoa aliyamaa nealino vitimo avina ayeno hagage huno onesie hutama avayalela nofila okinegeno aliyana nealino kavela neno.” huno kae-maleneane.
Mani kea Anumaya Kotia pulumakamofe humaineo?

Aao, tagaife humaine. Nagi hoyama alino humalenea kanomoa kave nesia yafena agesa haviteno negafie. Hoyafitima nena humainesia kavema nealisia kanomoenena “Aliyatialeti kavela nagopi mainetaa negahue.” huana aliyana nealie.
Nagaya Anumayamo kea huhalena tamahapaitena Avamumo avina yana hoyafina kali-malenogi ani hoyamoma nena hisigenahena tamakaipitila kenaniene kaveniene kanalelagina alisuo ifi oalisue?

Nagoa vayamoya tamakaipitila nealigi nagaya amakase-mainoa yafena tamakaipitila alisuo oalisuana? Kanalelagina aligahuanagi havigu Yisasi Kalaisi kanale mono kema havisaya katamia kahea kiotamatesuafene huna kavela oalina mainena mukia kana yana aluanagi “Kavela namiho.” huna nohue.
Mono nopi aliya nealiya vayamoya ani nopiti kaveamia nealiye. Anumayamofe haviya sipi sipi heya kae-salamana nehaya aliya vayamoya ani sipi sipifiti kaveamia ali-mainae. Ani kea ohavinao?
Naama hayana Yisasi kanale mono kema hamanepaiya vayafena Anumayamoa mage humaineane “Mono ketamima havisaya veamoya anonaa kenatamia kavetamia tamamisae.” huno humaineane.

Humaineanagi nagaya “Namiho.” huna ohunananagi menia “Namiho.” huna mani avona nokaove. Yisasi kema tamahapauvana tamakaipitila kavela afaa oalinoa yafena muse nehua yania haneafe ago faligahema husina kavefena tamahavigesua nagesa ohavusine.

Yisasi kanale mono kema huhalena nehuafenagina nagaini naugafa alina ohaigahue. Anumaya Kotia “Naa huo.” huno tokiyaage ke huno hunategena huhalena nehue. Ohuleasina Anumaya Kotia muse ohigeno kana yana namileasine.
Nagaya nagesafiti ani aliyana noalugi Anumayamo hunategena mani aliyama alua yafena miya yania oaligahue.

Anumayamoa hunategena huhalena nehua aliyana afaa nealuanagina monema onamisaya yafena naipamoa kanale nehie. Huhalena nehua yatetila miyania alisua amukonia haneanagi oalisua yatetila muse yania hane.
Monema oalua yafena nagoa veamogami aliya kanoamia omainogi mukia veamoya amakua aiyahae hisayafene huna aliya kanoamia mainoe.

Yuta veamoya Yisasi akave hisaya yafe amakaiami nehaya kava huna mainena Yisasi kea hamanepauve. Kahegi kema havina akave malesugenoa Anumayamoa “Fatago kano mainane.” huno hunategahie huna nohugi ani kema akave nemalaya veala Yisasi akave hisae huna amakaiene mainena mani kemo akave malena Yisasi kea hamanepauve.

Kahegi kema ohavinaya veanene mainena Yisasi akave hisae huna amakaya haya avamete huna Yisasi kea hamanepauve. Anumaya Koti kahegi kea akave malena Kalaisi akave nehuna agai kea havina akave nemaloe.

Yisasife haviya tokiya vaisaya amakua omalenesia veanene mainena amakua ali lokiya vaimatesuafe tokiya nagu hanea kano omainoe. Nagoa veamogami amaku amamena aligatisua yafe aluya huna amakaiamima amahaote amahaote nehaya kava huna Yisasi kea hamanepauve.
Naa nehisugeya kasagoya veamoya Yisasi hulatenea kanale mono kea havitesagena amakaiene kanaleya huna mainena musena hisue huna nehue.
Ohavinao oagase aagase huya amakasaya veamoya nealiya yana nagoke kanomoa amakaseno agaiage muse yana aligahie. Ani kava hutama tamaiyage tamaiyage nehigeno Anumayamoa anonaa tamamino.

Ani yokaloma nelaya veamoya aluya huya amaku amakesalela tokiya vaiya kava neyagaiye. Muse hisaya yama anonaamia alisaya yafe kava yagaiya mainageno amakasesia kanomoa konagali yana aligahianagi ani yamoa fanane hugahie. Fanane hugahianagi tagaya fanane ohisia kanale yana anonatia alisunafene huta tagu tagesalela tokiya vaita neyagaune.

Ani yama alisua yafena naiyayege naiyayege nehuna amakasesuafene huna faitega moge mege nohue. Nayatetiene amakasesua yokaloa nelena nagaya faitega mo ai me ai nohugi nayatetila vaya amaugafale sili huna amaikonelue.

“Fatago kate viho.” huna veama hamanepaisuletila havigu nagaya havi kate visugeno Anumaya Kotia nagaila akaveno hunatesigena kanale anonania oalisuafene huna tusiya huna “Naugafamo age haye hia yana ohugahue.” huna nagu nagesale kava yagaina mainoe.

Nafunagana-gatama Yuta taginagomo-gamifena tamakesa havisae huna nehue. Mosese akavema umainayana nago siamoa mukia aiso humateneno kana amaveligeya kanaleya huya vayana mukiamoya Haesa tina lakae-mainayafe Moseseene ailokaeya maineya siatetiene hage litetiene tima fale neamataya avame kavala humaine.
Mukiamoya ti omale kotega umaineya nagoke ikapinagati kaveene yafapiti falote hia alu aotage tiene ne-mainae. Ne-mainagi ani yafana Kalaisie. Agaya maineno amakaiene vaiyatete humaine.
Mukiamoya nayanagi kasagoya veamoya Anumaya Koti kea akave omalageno Anumaya Kotia musena hu oamateno amatalegeya nagoa veala faligeya amaugafa kame kopi atalegeno mopagopi haneme umaine.
Naama humainaya kavala tagaiti hulamakesa hisunafe hu-mainayanagita amakaya humainaya avamete huta age lahaye nehuna kavala ohisune.
Nagoa veamoya afa anumaya, amayateti talo humaleteya amakua amiteya Anumaya Koti kea atalenayane. Tagaya ani kavala ohisunafe Anumayamo avopina mage huno kae-maleneane
“Afa anumayamofena muse huya kaveene tiene neteya amoa ayeya anene yokaloa lemainae.” huno avopina kae-maleneane.
Nagoa veamoya kumai haya yateti nagoke yupa tueti tali tausenia (23,000) veane fali hano humainae. Naa humainayafe tagaya kumai kavala ohisune.
Anumayamofe “Ma kava huo.” huya ayevataga hayafe osifavemoya hamae hano hageya fali-mainagi ania huta Anumayamona ayevataga ohisune.
Nagoa veamoya “Anumayamoa havi kava nehie.” huya kalu kalu ke hutageno ensole kanomoa nagoa veala me hamaegeya fali-mainayane. Tamakaya Anumayamofena kalu kalu kea vaioateho.

Mukia anima falote humainea yana ageteta fatago huta maisunafene huno Anumaya Kotia avopina kae-maleneane. Tagaya menima mainona kanafina mopamoa aupaa fanane hugahe nehiafe mani kea haviteta kefo yana ohisunafene huno kae-maleneane.
Naa humaineafe “Kanaleya huta heti-mainone.” hutama nehisaya veamogatama havigu asaga hu laviyafenagi yagaitama maiho.

Yagaitama mainesageno kana yano “Havi yama hiho.” hunoma ayelamavataga hisia yano falote hisiana ani yana tamakaitamige ayelamavataga nohigi mukia veala ania huno ayemavataga nehie. Naa nehianagi Anumaya Kotia huno tokiya vaino humalenea kele tole agesa ohavinegi ani kele akave maleno tamaya hugahie. Ayelamavataga hisigetama “Tokiyania omalene.” hutama hugahe hageno tokiya vaitama maisayafe Anumaya Kotia tusiya huno tamaya huno “Haegafa katela male viho.” huno tamave-ligahie.
Nahau-mainea nafunagana-gatama ago fali-mainaya veamogamife “Anumayati maine.” hutama amakisana nevaiya yana ohiho. Anumaya Kotifekeya muse huteho.
Tamakaya tamaku tamakesaene veane mainagi tamahapaisua kea havitama ali fako hiho.

“Kalaisia tagai kefo yafene huno fali-maine.” huta tagesa havi havi hisuna yafe nofi alagamo tina, Kalaisi kolanagita alita Anumayamotega muse hutama nonana Kalaisi kolana tokaeta nenone. “Kalaisia augafa agata aimainea yamo kefo yatia ago alitalene.” huta maya alita aposita nenona yamo Kalaisi augafa tokaeta nenone.
Nagoke maya haneanagi mukia veamogata nagoke mayafiti aposita nenonafe tagaya nagoke veane nagoke kanomo augafa kana huta mainone.
Tamakaya tamakesa haviho Yuta veamoya Anumaya Kotitega sipi sipi heya kae-salamana heteya tokaeya anifiti aliya neteya Anumayamoene nagopi ailokaeya mainayane.
Manima hua kemo aepaa haviho. Ago fali-mainaya veafe “Anumayati maine.” huya afu heya amakisana vaiya amamiya yamoa afa kava humainae. Anima fali-mainaya veamogamina tokiyaamia omalene.
Tokiyaamia omalenegi nagaya tamahanepauve Yisasi kema nohaviya veamoya Kefo Avamumo kavela malenagi Anumaya Koti kavela omalenayane. Kefo Avamuene ailokaetama omaisae huna nehue. Ani kavela oneho.

Havigu tamakaya “Kalaisia tagai kefo yafe huno fali-maine.” hutama Anumayamo kapufiti nenetama Kefo Avamumogami neamamiya tina mo neyafenagi ani kavala tamage hutama ohiho. Havigu tamakaya Anumayamo kave nenetama Kefo Avamumogami amamiya kaveene neyafenagi ani kavala ohiho.
“Ani kava nehisunageno Anumaya Koti aipamoa haviya hisie hutama nehao? Ifi tagai tokiyamoa agai tokiya agase-maine.” hutama nehao? Aao, naa kavala ohune.

Nagoa veamoya mage huya nehae “Mukia hisuna kavala kahe okineanagita afaa hugahune.” huya nehayanagi ani mukia yamoa taya ohugahie huna nehue. Mukia kavala kahe okineanagita afaa hugahunanagi mukia ani yamoa Yisasife havita tametiti humainona yamona alilokiya vai oategahie.
Tagaiti laugafa hamaesia yafekela tagesa ohavisune. Aao, alu veamogami yafe tagesa havita amaya hisune.
Maketifiti afumo amea miya hugahema vinutamahena “Kefo Avamuma amaminaya afuo? Nesunana haviya hulatesio?” hutama tamakuafinaga havio-ketama afaa miya hutama neho.
Anumayamo avopina mage huno kae-maleneane
“Ma mopaene mukia mopafi hanea yaenena Anumayamo yamaage hane.” huno humaineane.

Yisasi kema nohavisaya veamoya “Etama kavela me neho.” huya hisagetama vinutamahena tamakesa ohavitama tamamisaya kavela afaa neho. Havigu tamakuamoa “Havi kava nehae.” huno hisagetama havioketama afaa neho.

Negahayanagi nago kanomoa “Ma kavela Kefo Avamumo kae-salamana hutaya kavele.” huno hisigetamahena afaa onetama ataleho. Tamakai tamakuamoa “Havi ya nehae.” huno hisia yafeene kahanepaiya kanomo agua ali haviya huyafenagi ani kavela oneho.
Ani kave nesuana nago kanomo agua ali haviya hu-yafenagina nagaya ani kavela nesuo ifi onesue?
Nagaya ani kavela Anumayamotega muse hutena nesuana naa hinageno nago kanomoa nagaya anima muse hutena noa yafena “Havi kavala nehane.” huno kea nenamake?
Kave nesao aliya alisao mukia yama hinutamahena Anumayamo agia alisaga hisaya yafeke hiho.

Yuta vealo, Yuta vea omainaya vealo, Yisasife haviya amakupi malenaya vealo, mukia veamogami amaufina kanale kavakeya hiho. Havigu havi kava hisageno ani kefo yamoa amaiyafi akoya yamo ayea kava hinageya asaga hu-lavisagi.
Nagaya mukia kavama nehuana nagai nahaisia yafe nagesa ohavina mukia Anumaya Kotia veamogamina amaku amamena aligatisiafene huna hamaisifa kava nehue.
Nagaya Polonae Kalaisima humainea kava huna akave nehugi nagaila nenagetama nagayama nehua kavakeya nakave hutama maiho.
Kahegi malena tamahapaugetama tamakela okanitama kanale kava hutama akave nemalayafe “Kanale kava nehae.” huna musena hu nelamatoe.

Ma ma hisua kea havilama hiho. Anumaya Kotia Yisasina ala kanoa maiteno agenopa maigeno Yisasife haviya amakupi malenaya veamogamina ala kanoamia Yisasia maiteno amakenopaamia maigeya ania huya vemoya aneamimogamina ala kanoamia maiteya amakenopaamia mainae.
Nagoa vayamoya Anumaya Koti kema huhaleya nehuyao nunamuma nehuyao amanutela aiso ohisae. Aiso hisayana Yisasina, amakenopamona agaye hisifa kava huneatae.

Huneatagi nagoa anemoya Anumaya Koti kema huhaleya nehuyao nunamuma nehuyao hinuya amanutela nago yatetila aiso ohisayana amakenopamoa, anauamimona agaye hisifa kava huya amayolagefa mukia laga hu-talenaya anemoya nehaya augafa kava nehae.
Nagoa anemoya amanutema aiso ohisayana afaa amayolagefa mukia laga hu-talesae. Tagama huya aupa hisaya yamoa amakaye hisifa kavama hanesigeya neataleya amanutela aiso hisae.
Vemoya Anumaya Kotina amemaa “Anumayamo agi alisaga hisae.” huno vemogamina talo hu-maleneafe amanutela aiso ohisagi anemoya anauamimogami amaki alisaga hisayafe amanutela aiso hisae.
Anumaya Kotia anemogami amaugafaleti venenea talo ohunegi vemogami amaugafaleti anea talo humalene.
Anumaya Kotia anehe “Hamao.” huno venenea talo ohunegi vehe “Hamaesia yane.” huno anea talo hu-maleneane.
Talo hu-malenea yafeene ensole vayamoya neagaya yafeene anemoya “Anautimo amaiyaafi nemaune.” huya amanutela aiso hulisae huna nehue.
Nehuanagi Anumayamoene ailokaetama maisayana amoa haotela agaiagela omaisie. Vemoa ania huno haotela omaisie. Agaila aya nehisiana agaila aya nehisiana hutana maisae.
Hagoteno vefiti anea ali falote higeya mainayanagi menia anemoya venenea neamatayanagi Anumaya Kotipiti mukia yamoa falote hu-maineafe aepaa maine.
Tamakaya tamakaitami haya kavala fako hutama ageho. Anemoya amanutela aiso ohuneya nunamuma hisayana kanale nehio?
Tamakaitami haya yamoa tamaveli-maine vemoya amayolagefa kuma hanesiana amakaye hisaya yana hane.
Haneanagi “Anemogami amayolagefa kula muse hisaya konagali yaami hane.” hutama nehae. Anumaya Kotia amanute aiso hisaya yafe amayolagefa kula amamine.
Nagoa veamoya ani yafema kema vaisayana ani kenonaamihe mani kea nehue nagaiene mukia Yisasife havita tagupi malenona veanene alu auava kavala nohunagi nagoke kavakeya nehune huna nehue.

Menima tamahapaisua kea haviho tamakaya havi kava nehagena havina musena hu notamatoe. Yisasi agima alisaga hugahe melitalu hutama maifina kanale kavala nohagi havi kava nehagena nagainia onahaiye huna nehue.
Nagoa veamoya nahapaiyana tamakaya Yisasife havitama melitalu hutama maifina ke nevaitama tolefi ali fako nehae huya hayana tamage huya nehao? E, tamage nehae huna nagesa nehavue.
Tamakaiene mainaya veapina nagoa veala fatago huya Anumaya Kotina haiya kavala nehae. Ani veala agetama falote hisaya yafe tolefi ali fako nehae huna nehue.
Anumayamo kavema negahe melitalu hayanagi tolefima ali fako haya yatamia haneafe Anumayamo kave lama nonae.

Ani kavema negahema melitalu hayana nagoa veafena amakava nohagi tamahaote tamakaitami alitama aya kavela nenageya nagoa veala amakala nelegeya nagoa veamoya nofi alagamo tina ne hano huteya anegi vaya kana huya nemaiye. Naa havi kava nehutama Anumayamo kavemona aepaa havilama ohutama afaa nenae.

Naa higetama naa kavala nehae? Kavema lima nesaya notamia omaleo? Netetama eho. Anumaya Kotife haviya amakupi malenaya veafena “Afa vea kana nehae.” hutama nehutama kaveamima omalea veafena “Afa vea kana nehae.” hutama amakaye hisifa kavala nehao? Ani kavama hayana “Kanale kava nehae.” huna hisuo? Aao “Tusia havi kava nehae.” huna nehue.

Anumayamotegati ali-mainoa kegina ago tamahapai-mainoa kemoa maa humaine Yutasia Yisasina agesi huno avaleno kame vaya amayapi atenea kegela Alatimoa Yisasia kai hame kana maya alino Anumayamotega muse huno nunamu huteno aposino neamamino mage huno hie “Mamona nagaini naugafae. Tamakai tamaya hisiafene huna naugafa hakina nelamamugi nagaifena tamakesa havi havi nehutama nete nete hume hume haiho.” huno hamapaiye.

Higeya ani kavela netageno ania huno nofi alagamo keayola alino mage hie “Nagai kolama laki lavisia kanafina Anumaya Kotia haegafa alino hagelafi lamatesia kea ali fatago hisia yana havisaya yafe mukia kanafina mani keayopiti nofi alagamo tina nenetama nagaifena tamakesa havi havi hutama maiho.
Ani mayaene nofi alagamo tiene nenetamahena Anumayatimoa tagaife huno fali-mainea aepaa huhaletama hugahae. Ania hume nevisageno Anumayatimoa eteno esie.”
Nagoa veamoya kai hame kana mayaene nofi alagamo tifeenena amakua fakoa ohuya afaa nesayana Anumayamo augafaene kolamaaene alihaviya nehae. Anumayamo aufina kefo auava kava nehae.

Ani yafe mukia veamogatama Anumayamo mayaene nofi alagamo tiene nenutamahena hagotetama tamahaote tamahaote tamakua fako hutama agetetama “Kefo yana humaino?” hutama tamakesa havitetama tamakuamoma kanale hu-mainesigetamahena neho.

Nagoa veamoya kai hame mayaene nofi alagamo tiene neneya Yisasima tagaife huno augafa hakino fali-mainea aepaahema ohaviya afaa nenesaya veamogamina Anumaya Kotia kaiyekea humateno anonaamia amamigahie.
Naa kavama humainea yafenagiya tamakaipitila nagoa veala amaugafamoa fulu fulu higeya kalia aligeya nagoa veala ago fali-mainae.
Tagaya hagoteta tagua havita ali fako huteta noteasina Anumaya Kotia kaiyekea hulateno anonaa otamileasine.
Anumayamoa haenaga agai kema nohaviya veama kaiyekea humateno anonaa amamisia kavala tagaila otamisiafe menia tagaya kefo yama nehunagenoa fako hulateno mai fatago huta maisunafe kayona nelamie.
Nafunagana-gatama naa humaineafe Anumayamo kavema negahena melitalu hutetama kanaleya hutama nagoa veafena amakava mainegeya mukiamoya esagetama nagopi tamakoya aye-mainetama ani kavela neho.

Havigu kefo yama nehutama Anumayamo kavema nesayana Anumaya Kotia kaiyeke hulamateno fako hulamateyafenagi nagoa veamogamima tusia amakatesigeyahena noamifinagati neteya esae. Nagoa kea haneanagina tamakaitegama esua kanafina tamahapaigahue.
Nafunagana-gatama menia Alu Aotage Avamumoa tokiya neamamia ke havisae huna nehue.
Nayona Yisasi kema ohavinaya kanafina Satania tamavayu higetama agea oaino ago fali-mainaya veafena “Anumayati mainae.” hutama amakisana nevaitama havi kate umainaya yafena tamakaya ago havilinae.

Anumaya Koti Avamumoa nago kanomo aguafima mainesigenoa mani kea ohugahie “Anumaya Kotia Yisasife hai vaiteno hani yapi maiyo huno hutesie.” huno Yisasina hu-haviya hu oategahie. Nago kanomona Alu Aotage Avamuma agupi omainesia kanomoa “Yisasia Alaniamo maine.” huno ohugahie.
Anumayamo aliya aligahe alua lua muse yamo tokiya nelamianagi nagoke Alu Aotage Avamumo nelamie.
Anumayamo aliyana alua lua aliya hanegeta nealunanagi nagoke Anumaya maine.
Mainegi alua lua aliya alisuna tokiyatia hanegeta nealunagi nagoke Anumaya Kotia aliyamaa alisuna tokiya nelamianagino agaia aliyana nealie.
Mukia veane amaya hisunafe Avamumoa tokiyaa tave-nelino tahaote tahaote tamine.
Alu Aotage Avamumoa nagoa veamogamina Anumaya Kotina agu agesaene kea hamapaisia tokiya amamiteno nagoa veamogamina falaki-mainea kemo aepaa havisaya amaku amakesa amamine.
Ani Avamumokeya nagoa veamogamina Anumayamofe haviya tokiyaage amametiti hisaya amakua neamamino nagoa veamogamina kalima nealiya veane aliya kanale humatesaya tokiya nagoke Avamumokeya amamine.

Nagoa veamogamina tokiyaage avame yama hisaya tokiya neamamino nagoa veamogamina Anumayamo kea amakupinaga humainea kea huhaleya hisaya tokiya amamine. Nagoa veamogamina havilama huya fako hisaya tokiya amamigeya “Mani kavala Anumayamo Avamumo nehio? Veamoya amaku amakesafiti nehao? Kefo Avamumo nehio?” huya havisaya tokiya amamine. Nagoa veamogamina nohaviya kefiti alu amake alu amakefiti hisaya tokiya amamine. Ani kemona aepaa hu yahae huya hisaya tokiya nagoa veamogamina amamine.
Haote haote tokiya nagoke Avamumokeya tamine. Agaia haiya kava huno tahaote tahaote alu lokiya alu lokiya fako huno lamine.

Taugafafitila taiya, tayana, taulaga aote aote haneanagi taugafa nagoke yane. Ania huta Kalaisife havita lagupi malenona veala alu veane alu veane mainonanagi mukia veala Kalaisina nagoke augafa mainone.

Nagoke Avamumoa tina falelamatea kava huno nagoke augafale alino aikamaelategeta Yuta vea omainaya veanene, Yuta veanene, nofipi maineya mone oali aliya veanene, miyaamima alisaya aliya nealiya veanene alino aigamaelategeta nagoke taugafa mainonageno nagoke Avamumona timoma hia kava huno ani li nesunafe nelamie.
Taugafa nagoke yamaagela omalegi taugafafitila taiya, tayana, taulaga hane.
Aiyamoa “Nagaya ayana omainoafe mani augafafiti kanoa omainoe.” hunoma hisiana havige afaa ani augafafiti kano maine.
Agesamoa “Aulaga omainoafe mani augafafiti kanoa omainoe.” huno hisiana havige afaa ani augafafiti kano hane.
Mukia augafafima aulagaagema haneleasina hanaa huno agesa havileasine? Mukia augafafima agesama haneleasina hanaa huno mana havileasine?
Naa ohunegi Anumaya Kotia agesa haviteno agaia haiya kava huno taulaga, taiya, tayana talo hulateteno aote aote yana nagoke taugafafina alino malete malete higeno hane.
Nagoke yamaagema hanesina mukia laugafa omalesine.
Alu tupa-tapama alino talo higenoa taiya, tayana haneanagi nagoke taugafale hane.
Aulagamoa ayafena “Kagayama omaiteasina nagaya kanaleya huna mauleasine.” huno ohugahie. Anumoa aiyahena “Kagayama omaiteasina nagaya kanaleya huna mausine.” huno ohugahie.
Naa ohugahigi nago kaiyaga taugafamofema “Tokiyaa omalene.” huta nehunanagi ani kaiyaga taugafamoa tusia aliyamaa hane.
Nago kaiyaga taugafamofena “Afa ya kana humaine.” huta ali hilato huneatonanagi tagaye hisuna kaiyaga falakita kena fai nealune.

Fai nealunagi kanalema humainea kaiyagatia afaa kena nofaunagi Anumaya Kotia agaia agesa haviteno mukia laugafa talo humaleteno afa ya kana huno haviya humainea taugafamo kaiyaga kanaleya huno agia alisaga nehie.
Mukia laugafamoya ali fako ohisayafe ani kavala humalegeno “Nagoke taugafa hane.” nehuta nago avamete maineta kava yagai-mainone.
Nago kaiyaga taugafamoa tagatama aiyana mukia laugafamoa tagata neaiye. Nago kaiyaga taugafamoa ala agima aligenoa mukia taugafamoa muse nehie.
Lamakaya mukia Yisasina augafa aiya, aya, aulagaa mainae.

Yisasife havita lagupi malenona veamogatama nagopima maunana alu aliya alu aliyana Anumaya Kotia agaia huyogino lamine. Hagoteno Aposolo vayala humateteno anile Anumayamo amakupi humainea kema huhaleya hisaya veala humateteno anile Anumaya Koti ke huge amavelige hisaya veala humateteno anile tokiya avame yama hisaya veala humateteno anile kali vea ali hetimatesaya veala humateteno anile vea amaya hisaya veala humateteno anile kava veala humateteno anile amakesamoa nohavia kefiti hisaya veanene alino hetimatene.

Mukia vayamogata Aposolo vaya mainao? Ifi mukia veamogata Anumayamo amakupi humainea kea huhaletama hisaya vea mainao? Ifi mukia veamogata huge amavelige aliyana nealiyo? Ifi mukia veamogata tokiyaage avame yana nehao?
Ifi mukia veamogata kalima aliya veala ali kanale huneamatao? Ifi mukia veamogata tagesamoa ohavinea kefitila nehao? Ifi mukia veamogata ani amakema aiya kea hu yahae hutama nehao?
Aao naa nohunagi tamakaya Avamumo uhagote hanea muse yana alisayafe tokiyaage huno tamahaisie huna nehue.
Menia nagaya nago yamoa lamage huno uhagote hanea auavafe tamahapaigahe hugi haviho.

Nagaya nohavua kefiti huna mopale veamogami amakene Ensole vaya amakene aisuanagi veamogamife nahau nayamopafi onahaisigena yaveyaene veloene afaa aiko nelugeno kema ayeso nehia avamete huna afa kegefa nehue.

Anumayamoa avayafiti nahapaiya kea huhalena nehuna Anumaya Kotia falaki-malenea kemona aepaa mukia havilama humainoanagi veafe nahau nayamopafi onahaisiana afa ya kana huna mainoe. Anumayamofena havina nametitia hutena “Agoyamoga alule vuo.” hisugeno ani agoyamoa nagai ke havino visianagi veafena nahau nayamopafi onahaisiana afa ya kana huna mainoe.

Veafema nahau nayamopafi onahaisigena mone afenoami omalenesia veane mukia yania amamisuana ani yamoa naya ohugahie. Veafema nahau nayamopafi onahaisgena Anumayamo kema huhalena nehisugeya hamai vainateya navaleya atafi natalesageno naugafa leno asagalisia yamoa naya ohugahie.

Veafe hamau amayamopafi nehamaiya veamoya haviyama humatesageya mailava huya maineya anonaamia huoamateya kayoneage veane mainae. Alu kanomo yate age hamaye huya amaipamoa haviyana ohigeya amaugafa aliya ohai veane mainae.
Amakaiami amakia alisaga huya veganokanola nohae. Amakaiami yafekela amakesa havi havi nohae. Aupaa hamaiya novaiye. Havi kavama humataya veafena amakesa ohaviya afaa neatalae.
Veafe hamau amayamopafi nehamaiya veamoya nago kanomoa kefo yama hisia yafena muse ohugahagi tamage kelefe musena hugahae.
Veafe hamau amayamopafi nehamaiya veamoya haviya humatesaya veamogamina oamatalegahagi Anumayamo amaya hisiafe amametiti nehuya agava maineya mai lokiya vaiya nemaiye.

Ma ma hamau amayamopafima nehamaiya yana hanege hanege huno hanegahianagi Anumayamo amakupi humainea kema huhaleya hamapaiya kemoa hano hugahie. Amakesamoa nohaviya kema nehaya yamoa hano hugahie. Falaki-mainea kemo aepaama havilama nehaya yamoa fanane hugahianagi hamau amayamopafi nehamaiya yana agola hano ohugahie.
Hano ohugahigi havimainona yamoa nago kaiyagaa havilama ohunone. Anumayamoa lagupi humainea kea huhaleta nehunanagi nago kaiyagaa havilama ohunone.
Havilama ohunonagi fatago kavakeya nehisia kanomoa, Yisasia, mukia yafena havilama hulineanagino esigeta havilama ohuneta nehuna yamoa fanane hugahie.
Nagaya osi nafanema mainoa kanafina nafanemoma nehia kea nehuna nagesa havi havi humainoanagi ko hutena ala kanoma mauvana nafanemoya nehaya kavala ago atalenoe.

Meni kanafina tagaya hanikomako yapi maineta Anumaya Koti augosa galasifima tamema agona avamete kava nehuta agelama huta noagonanagi haenagaa Anumayamo augosa neageta agelama hugahune. Meni kanafina Anumayamo kea havilama nohunanagi Anumayamoa nagaila nagelama humainea kava huna haenagaa nagaya agaila agelama hugahue.

Anumayamofe havita lagupi maleta tametitima humainona yaene “Anumayamoa hulamategahue huno humainea yana hugahie.” huta lametiti nehuna yaene veafe tahau tayamopafi nelahaiya kavaene ani tagufa (3) yamoa hanege hanege huno hanegahianagi tahau tayamopafi nelahaiya yamoa uhagoteno mani tole yamona agaseno tama yatafa hane.

Hagotetama veafena tusiya huno tamahau tamayamopafi tamahaino. Anile Alu Aotage Avamumo lamamisia tokiya alisaya yafe musena nehutama tusiya huno tamahaino. Ani tokiya yapiti hagotetama Anumayamoa tamakupima humainea kema huhaletama hisaya tokiyahena tusiya huno tamahaino.
Amakesamoa nohavia kema hisia kanomoa veala hamanopaigi Anumaya Kotina agaiage hanepaiye. Veamoya ani kea nohavigi falaki-mainea kea Avamumo hapaigeno humaine.
Humainegi Anumaya Kotia amakupi humainea kema huhaleya nehaya veamoya nagoamogami amametitia ali lokiya vaimatesaya kene amaya hisaya kene huhaleya humatenae.

Nohaviya kefiti nehaya veamoya amakaiami amakuamo tokiya vaisia yana neamiyanagi Anumayamoa amakupi humainea kema huhaleya hisaya veamoya Yisasife haviya mono nopi melitalu nehaya veamogamina amaya nehae.

Mukia veala amakesamoa nohaviya kefiti hisagenahena muse hugahe huanagi mukia veala Anumaya Kotia tamakupi humainea kema huhaletama hisagena aluya huna musena hugahue. Anumayamo kema huhaleno nehisia kanomoa agesamoa nohavia kefiti nehisia kanomona agase-maineanagi ani kea hu yahae hisigeya Yisasife haviya melitalu humainesaya veamoya havisageno hamamaeno amametita ali lokiya vaigahie.

Ani yafe nafunagana-gatama tamakaya mainesalega uvayi huna ohavinesua kefitima tamahapaisugetama ohavisayana ani kemoa tamaya ohugahianagi Anumayamo aepaa havilama huna mani kene Anumayamoa falaki-malenea kene Anumayamoa nagupi humainea kene huge hamave-lige huna huhalena hisugeno ani kemoa tamaya hugahie.
Nagi veamoya kepitiene otofitiene yagamema hufatago huya ohisayana veamoya havilama huya ohavigahae.
Nago kumatema tuma hugahe keha kehama hisageya havilama ohisaya kema hisayana vayamoya hanaa huya haviteya kamea hugahae?
Tamakaya ania humainae tamakesamoma ohavinesia kema hisageya hanaa huya ani kea havigahae? Ani kemoa yasimoma hia kava huno fanane hugahie.
Ma mopafi veamoya alu amake alu amake neaiyanagi mukia ani kemoa afa yana omalegi ani kema nehaviya veamogami aepaaene ke hane.
Haneanagi nago kanomoa alu kefiti, nohavisua kema hisigena “Ohavua ke nehianagina ani kanoenena tokaena omaigahue.” huna hugahue.

Tamakaya Anumayamo aliyama aligahena Avamumoa tokiyaama tamamisia yafena aluya hunoma tamahaisiana Yisasife haviya amakupi malenaya veala amaya hutama ali lokiya vaimatesaya aliyamo tokiyahekeya aluya huno tamahaisie.
Ani yafema ohavinesia kefitima hisia kanomoa ani kea hu yahae hisia tokiya alisia yafena Anumayamotega havigesie.
Nagesamoa ohavinesia kefiti Anumayamotega havigesuana ani kea nagesamoa nohavianagi nagu nafanemoke ani kea huno havinege.

Ani yafena naane hisue? Nagesamoa nohavia kefiti nagu nafanemoa Anumayamotega havigegena nagainia havua nagesaene Anumayamotega havigegahue. Mono yagamea nagesamoa nohavia kefiti nagu nafanemoa hugahianagino nagainia nagesa havimainoa mono yagamene hugahue.

Ania ohisanana kagu nafanemoke kagesamoa nohavia kefitila Anumayamo agia alisaga hisigeya nagoa ani yafema ohavinesaya veamoya kema hana kea nohaviyafe hanaa huya “Tamage nehie.” huya Anumayamo agia alisaga hugahae?
Kagaya Anumayamofe muse huka kanaleya huka agia alisaga nehananagi amakaya ohavisayana amakua ali lokiya vai noamatane.
Nagaya mukia veala amakasena nohavua kefitila tusiya huna nehua yafena Anumayamofena muse nehue.

Muse nehuanagi Yisasife haviya mono nopi melitalu hisafina huhalena hisugetama havilama hisae huna tagaiti kefitila faefua (5) ke kanoa osia tamahapaisuana teni tausenia (10,000) kema nagesamoa nohavisia kefiti hisua kemona agasegahie huna nehavue.

Nafunagana-gatama kefo yama hisaya yafena nute nafanemoya nehaviya amakesamo avamete hu havitama maiho huna nehuanagi alopa veamoya nehaviya amaku amakesamo avamete havitama kanaleya hutama ma ma Alu Aotage Avamumoa tokiyama tamamisia kema tamahapauva kea fako hutama nafanemoya nehaviya avamete tamaku tamakesa ohaviho.
Anumayamoa mage higeya avopina kae-malenayane
“Yuta veafe nayona mage huna humainoane ‘Nagaini veafe alu veamogami kefiti hamapaisuanagi ania huya veganokano nehuya nagai kea haviya akave omalegahae.’ huno humainayane.”

Naa humaineafe ohavinesia kefiti nehisageya Yisasina amakaveno hutenaya veamoya haviya Anumaya Kotina tokiya avame yamaa neageya “Anumayamo kea tamage nehie.” huya hisayafe amave-lianagi Yisasife haviya amakupi malenaya veafe ani avame kea nohigi Anumaya Kotia avayafiti humainea kema huhaleya nehageno amaya nehie.

Yisasife haviya melitalu hisafina mukia veamoya nohavisaya kefiti kema hisageya ani kavama oagenesaya vealo Yisasina amakaveno hutenaya vealo me havisayana hinageya “Havigunagu kava nehae.” huya hugahae.

Hugahagi mukia veamoya Anumayamoa amakupi humainea kema huhaleya nehisageya ani kavama oagenesaya vealo Yisasina amakaveno hutenesaya vealo hainefaleya havinuya Yisasife huhaleya hisaya keleti amakaiami “Kefo ya nehune.” huya hisageno hisaya kemoa amakaila kaiyeke humateteno fako humategahie.
Fako hamaisigeya amakupima falaki-mainesia yana falote hisigeya ageteya Anumaya Kotite ape huya Anumaya Koti agia alisaga nehuya “Anumaya Kotia tamakaiene maine.” huya hugahae.

Nafunagana-gatama naa hisaya yafena naane hisune? Melitalu hisayana nago veamoya yagamea hisageya nago veamoya Anumaya Koti kea hisae. Nago veamoya Anumayamo falaki-malenea kea agupi hapaiya kea huhaleno hisayana nago veamoya Avamumo aminea kea agesamoa nohavia kefiti nehisageno nago veamoya ani kea huya aiyahae hisae. Ani kavakeya hutama veala amakua ali lokiya vaisaya kea hiho.
Nagoa veamoya amakesamoa nohaviya kefitima hinuyahena tolemoganio tagufa veamoyao amahaote amahaote hisageya nagoa veamoya ani kea aiyahae hiho.
Ani kema aiyahae hisia kanoma omainesigeya mono nopina ani kea ohuya amakupinaga Anumayamofena ani kea hisae.
Tolemoganio tagufa veamoyao Anumaya Kotia amakupi humainea kea huhaleya hisageya nagoa veamoya ani kehena amakesa havi havi huya fako huya haviho.
Nago kanomoa Anumaya Koti kea huhaleno nehisigeno Anumayamoa nago kanomona agupi kea nehisigenoa hagote kanomoa kea ohuno mainesigeno anile kanomoa kea hisie.
Mukia vea amaya hisageya haviya kanaleya huya mai-lokiya vaisayafe mukiamogatama tamahaote tamahaote Anumaya Kotia tamakupi kea higetama huhaletama hiho.
Anumayamoa amakupi humainea kema huhaleya hisaya veamoya mani kea hisaya yafeene ohisaya yafeene amakaiami amakuale kava yagaiya mainae.
Anumaya Kotia haviya havaya hisaya kavafena nohaigi ako hutama maisaya yafe nehaiye.
Mukia Yisasife haviya melitalu nehaya veamogami ani kava nehae.
Anemoya mono nopina kea ohuya ako huya maiho. Kahegi kema akave maleya anauamimo amaiyafinaga maineya mono nopina ke haviya nago kea ohuya maiho.
Nago kemoa kanama hamaisigeya noamifinaga umaineya anauamimona ani kehena hamavigesae. Anemoya mono nopina kea hisayana amakaye hisia kava hugahae.
Yisasi kanale mono kea hagoteno tamakaipiti falote humaineo? Aao ania ohune. “Tagaitige havimainone.” hutama nehao? Aao ani kemofena veganokanola ohiho.
Nago kanomoa “Anumayamoa nagupi kea higena huhalena hisua kano mainogeno Avamumo tokiya namigena mainoe.” huno hisia kanomoa ma ma kae-malenoa kemona “Anumayamo kahegi kehe humaine.” huno hise.
Manima hua kema amakaveno hutesaya veamogami kea ohaviho.
Nafunagana-gatama Anumayamo kea huhaletama hisaya tokiyahe aluya huno lamahaigahianagi amakesamoa nohavia kefitima hisaya veafena “Aao.” hu oamateho.
Mukia kavama mono nopima melitalu hutama nehaya kavala kaliso oatitama fatago hutama hisaya kavakeya hiho.

Nafunagana-gatama Yisasia hulatenea kanale mono kema huhalena tamahapai-mainoa kea nagoene huna tamakesa ali hao hugahe nehue. Mani kea havitama tamakupi maletama tamametiti hutetama ago hetitama mainae
Ani kanale kea atafa hulinesageno Anumayamoa tamaku tamamena aligatigahianagi afaa amega tamaugafaletima “Yisasifena nagua aminoe.” hutama hisayana tamaku tamamena aliokatigahie.
Anumayamoa nahapaigena havimainoa kemoa uhagoteno agase-mainea kea mage huna tamahapai-mainoe Anumayamo avopi kae-malenea kate Kalaisia kefo yama humainona yatefene huno fali-maine.
Faligeya hevaitageno tole yupa komufinaga hanetegeno tagufa (3) kanale avopima kae-malenea kate maleno Anumaya Kotia avale heti-maine.
Eteno hetiteno Pita aule evayi huteno haenagaa agaia alevenia (11) anagatela vayi humaine.
Vayi higeya faefu hataletia (500) alitalu humainaya tafu-taganate evayi humaine. Ani veala osia falitageno kasagoya veala ofaliya afaa mainae.
Anile Yemesi mainele evayi huteno haenagaa mukia Aposolo vayatela evayi higeya age-mainae.

Naa huteno haenagalafa nagaitela evayi humaine. Kalaisina akave nehaya veala nagaya tusiya huna ali haviya humatenoafe Aposolo kano maisua yafena onatenegi mukia Aposolo vayala nagaila nagasegena osi vaya kana huna maigena amoa kanaa omalegeno nafane atea kava huno Anumaya Kotia agaia nafane nategeno Kalaisia faliteno nagaitela evayi humaine.

Anumaya Kotia agaia kayone yamaa namineafe Aposolo kanoa mainoe. Kayone yamaa naya higena nagoa Aposolo vayamoya aliyama ali-mainaya aliyana amakasena nealuanagi nagaya omagi Anumaya Koti kayone yamaamo naya higeno nagaiene haneafe ali-mainoa aliyamoa amakase-maine.
Nagoa Aposolo vayamoyao nagayao tamahapauna kea lagaya mukiamogata nagoke kegeya huhaleta humainona kele havitama tamakupina malenae.
“Kalaisia ago fali-mainefiti heti-maine.” huta nehunagi naa higetama nagoa veamogatama “Fali-mainaya veala eteya heotigahae.” hutama nehae?

Fali-mainaya veama he-otinaleasine Anumayamoa Kalaisienena fali-mainefitila ali heti-oateleasine. Kalaisina fali-mainefitima ali heti-oateleasina nagayama nehua kea afa ke kana higetama tamakaya afa yafe tamakupina maletama tamametitia haleasine.

Anumaya Kotia Kalaisina alino heti-oatenesina tagaya “Anumaya Kotia Kalaisina alino hetitene.” huta nehuna kemoa Anumaya Kotife havige huteasine. Anumaya Kotia fali-mainaya veama alino heti-oamateleasina Kalaisienena alino heti-oateneleasine.
Tamage Anumaya Kotia veama fali-mainafiti ali heti-omateneleasina Kalaisienena ania huno alino heti-oateneleasine.
Nagi Anumayamoa Kalaisima ali heti-oatenesina tamakupi maletama tamameti nehaya yamoa afa ya kana higeno kefo yama nehaya yatamimoa aigagilamateno lamatafa hileasine.
Kalaisife haviya amakupi maleteya fali-mainaya veamoya hanimo aguafi agola amakata aiya no maileasine.

Kalaisife havita tagupi malona yana ma mopale mainona kanafikeya taya hileasina haenaga faliteta hetita ikapinaga ohauteasina Kalaisife havita lakupi malenona yamoa afa ya kana huleasinagi haenagama vayima hisia yafe tamage huta lametitia nehune.

Tamage Anumayamoa Kalaisina fali-mainefiti ago alino hetiteneane. Hoyafi kavemoma hagoteno nena hia avamete huno Kalaisina hagoteno ali hetiteneanagino haenagaa fali-mainaya veala alino hetimategahie.
Nagoke kanomoa, Atamu, kefo yama humainea yateti fali yana ali falote humaineanagi nagoke kanomoa, Kalaisia, fali-mainea yateti ania huno tagaya veamogata heti yana ali falote humaine.
Maa humaine Atamu mukia nelafa maineafe mukiamogata agayama humainea kava huta nefalunanagi Kalaisienema aigamaeta mainona veamogata agayama humainea kava huta eteta hetita haegafa veane maigahune.
Anumaya Kotia malenea kanaale Kalaisia hagoteno heti-maineafe agayama eteno esia yupa mukia Kalaisife haviya amakupi malenaya veamoya fali-mainesafiti hetigahae.

Hetitesageno ani kanafi mukia yana hano hisigeno Kalaisia mukia ma mopale kava vayaene Anumaya Koti kame vayaaene Kefo yamo tokiyama hanea Avamuyagaene Kalaisia amakaseno ani vayamogamina ali hano humaleteno Anumaya Kotina kava yagaisiafe Nefa ayapi mukia amategahie.
Kalaisia yagaime yagaime haino mukia kame vayaa amakaseno aiyafinaga alino amategahie.
Kalaisia kame yana ali hano humaleteno haenagalafa veama nefaluna yana heno fanane hutalegahie.

“Kava yagaisiafe mukia yana Anumaya Kotia Yisasi aiyafi malene.” huno kae-maleneane. Mani kea “Mukia yana malene.” huno humainea kea Anumaya Kotia, kava yagaisiafe mukia yana Yisasi aiyafi malenea kanomofe ohune.
Ani kavala humaleteno mukia yana agaseno kava yagai-mainea kano Kalaisina, Anumaya Kotia aiyaafi ateteno Anumaya Kotia mukiamoya hagote kava kano maigahie.

Yisasia fali-mainefitila heotineleasina nagoa veamoya fali-mainaya veafena amakesa haviya mono tima nefalayana na kanale ya falote hugahie? Fali-mainaya veala heotisayana naa hinageya fali-mainaya veafena haviya tina nefalae?
Tagaya Anumaya Koti kea huhaleta nehunageya mukia kanafina kayo kevea lamigeta falisuna kavala nehune. Veama heotisayana naa higeta ani hu nelataya kavala afaa nealune?

Nafunagana-gatama tamagelafa nehue mukia kanafina kayo keve namigena faligahe huanagi Yisasi Kalaisi Anumayatimoene ailokaena mainena agai kema tamahapaugetama havimainaya yafena aluya huna musena nehue.

Ma mopafi yafekeya nagesa nehavina Efesusi kumate mainaya vayala, kaveage afela afu kana nehaya vayaene keleti tua nehuanagiya fali-mainesaya veama heotisayana ani kavama hunenataya yamo anonaa hanaa huna alisue? Falimainesaya veala heotisayana veamoya nehaya kea “Ega falisupi afaa maineta tiene kaveene neta kanaleya huta maigahune.” huya nehaya kemona akave malegetao.
Havigema nehaya veamogami kea ohaviho. Fatago veamoya kefo yama nehaya veanene maisayana ali haviya hulamategahagi kayetama maiho.
Tamakesa hao hinagetama kefo yama nehaya yana ataleho. Nagoamogatama Anumaya Kotifema ohaviya yafena tamakaye hino huna nehue.
Nagoa veamogatama mage hutama nahavi-negae “Hanaa huya fali-mainesaya veala hetigahae? Fali-mainesaya veama hetisayana hana augafa amaugafa hanesigeya evayi hugahae?” hutama nahavi-negae.
Nahavi-negaya veamogatama havigu ke nehae. Avina yama mopafi fai-malenageno falino numayu ohisigenoa ohagegahie.
Hageno vayi higetamahena fai-malenaya avina kana ohunegi osi avina alaga kanoa viti avinafi alu avina yapi osi kanoa fai-nemalae

Fai-malenageno Anumaya Kotia agesa haviteno haiya kava huno avina yana alu augafa alu augafa amigeno nehage. Anima nehagea avamete huno Anumaya Kotia fali-mainesaya veala alu amaugafa amamiteno ali hetimategahie.
Mukia yamona nagoke augafa okaline. Veala alu laugafa kali-maigeno afu kalamogamina alu amaugafa kali-maigeno namayaga-mona alu amaugafa kali-maigeno noyameyaga alu amaugafa kali-maine.
Ikapinaga yana alu amaugafa kali-mainegi ma mopafi veala alu amaugafa kali-maine. Mopale veala konagali yaamia haneanagi ikapinaga veala alua konagali yaami hane.

Yagemoa alu konagali yamaa hanegeno ikamoa alu konagali yamaa hane. Kanefiyagamona alu konagali yamaa haneanagi nagoa kanefimona alu konagali yamaa haneanagi nagoa kanefimoya alu konagali yaamia hane.
Fali-mainaya veala faligeya hevaimataya amaugafa kasalisia amaugafa haneanagi eteya hetisaya amaugafa agola hanege hanege huno fanane ohisia amaugafa hanegahie.

Hevaimatesaya amaugafa amakaye hisia amaugafa haneanagi eteya fali-mainesafiti hetisayana tokiya hale yamaa hanesia amaugafaene hetigahae. Hevaimatesaya amaugafamona tokiyaa omalenea amaugafa haneanagi eteya hetisaya kanafina tokiyaa hanesia amaugafaene hetigahae.
Hevaimatesaya amaugafa mopa amaugafa hanegeno hetisaya amaugafa ikapinaga amaugafa falote hugahie. Mopale maisuna taugafama hanesiana ikapinaga maisuna taugafaene falote hugahie.
Naa humainea yafe Anumaya Koti avopina mage huno kae-maleneane
“Hagote kanoa, Atamue, haimula hanea kano falote humaine.” huno kae-maleneane.
Kae-maleneanagi haenagama falote humainea Atamua, Yisasie, ikapinaga maige maige hisaya hamaimula amamisia kano maine.
Hagoteno ikapinaga maisuna taugafa falote ohunegi mopale taugafa hagoteno falote huteno haenaga ikapinaga maisuna taugafa falote hugahie.
Hagote kanoa, Atamuna, mopaleti aye kakali-feno talo huteneanagino haenaga falote humainea kanoa, Yisasia ikapinagati emaine.
Mopale mainaya veala mopaleti talo humalenea kanomo avamete huya mainagi ikapinagama visaya veala ikapinagati emainea kanomo avamete huya maigahae.
Menia mopaleti talo humalenea kanomo augafa kali-mai veane mainonanagi haenagaa ikapinagati emainea kanomo augafa kali-mai taugafa hanegahie.
Nafunagana-gatama tamahanepauve mopafi taugafamoa Anumaya Koti kava yagai-mainea kumatela ougahianagino kasalino fanane hisia taugafamoa agola maige maige nehaya kumatela outafa huno ougahie.
Anumaya Koti kema falakino hanea kea tamahapaigahugi haviho. Mukia Yisasife haviya amakupi malenaya veamogata ofalita afaa mainesunageno aupaa mukia laugafamoa alino alua hu taugafa hapaegahie.

Aupaa aulumaya konelia auava kava huno haenagalafa kepiti ufe kalafa kemoa nehigeno Yisasia ikapinagatila efalote hisigeno agoma fali-mainaya veala hetiteya agola maige maige hisaya amaugafa alitesageta ofalita afaa mainesuna veala anile maige maige hisuna taugafa hapaegahie.
Mopafima mainona taugafamoa negasalianagi haenagaa okasalisia taugafa falote hugahie. Falisuna taugafa haneanagi haenagaa ofalita agola maige maige hisuna taugafa falote hugahie.

Negasalia taugafamoa fanane hutenageno okasalisia taugafa falote hugahie. Fali yamoa fanane hinageno ofalisuna yana falote hisigeno ma ma Anumaya Koti humainea kemoa falote huno tamage hugahie. Mage huno kae-maleneane

“Maige maige hisuna yamoa falisuna yamona agasetafa humaine. Nefaluna yamoga tagasesana tokiyakaa hanate hane? Fali yamoga veala amaugafa akafu anika henefalina tokiyakaa hanate hane?” huno kae-maleneane.
Kahegi kea akave omalonafe kefo yana nehune. Kefo yama nehuna yana akafu amanino veane hefalisia ya hane.
Haneanagi Anumayati Yisasi Kalaisia hulatenea yamo falisuna yana ago agase-maineafe Anumaya Koti agia alisaga huta muse hisune.

Nahau-mainea nafunagana-gatama Yisasifena tamakua ami hetofa hutama mai-lokiya vaitama etetama alu katela oviho. Anumaya Koti aliyamoa afa ya kana ohuno kanale anonaa alisaya aliya haneafenagitama mukia kanafina Anumayamo aliyana tokiyaage vaitama aliho.
Yisasi anagala Yelusalemua mainagena amaya hisaya mone amamisaya kea hugahe hue. Kalesia kotega mainaya veamogamina hamapaugeya humainaya kavala tamakaya ania hiho.
Nagaya esua kanafina ani monema alitalu hisaya yafena nonahaigi Sotamaahe Sotamaahe alisaya monea ali fako hutama alu vaya amamisaya monea alitalu hute hute hiho.
Ani kava nehagena esua yupa tamahaisia vayala hapalisagena avo kaena amamitena humatesugeya avoene monene aliya Yelusalemua ugahae.
Ugahagi nagaya visua nagesa hisugenofena amakaya nagaiene ugahae.
Masetonia kotega mainaya anagamogamina mogetena tamakaitega egahue.
Neena nago kanafina tamakaiene yasima alisia ikatela mainena alulegama ugahe hisugetama nagaila naya hutama ali kate nategahae.
Anumayamoa kanalene hisigena nagayama visuana tamaketena aupaa tamatalena visua yafe onahaigi nagoene ayaaya kanagefa tamakaienena maisua nagesa nehavue.
Efesusi kumate mainena kavema afulesia kanahe muse hisaya imu kisaya kanamoa falote hutesigena ugahue.
Meni kanafina Anumaya Kotia agai kea hamapaisuafe fita yakinateno tusia aliyana namigena nealugeya kasagoya veamoya ani kea nehaviyanagi ani kemona kame vayaa kasagoya vaya mainae.
Nagaya Anumaya Koti aliya nealua kava huno Timotia Anumaya Koti aliya nealianagino tamakaitema visiana tamakaife kolia ohuno aipamoa falu nehinageno kanaleya huno maino.
“Afa kano maine.” hutama hu-haviya hu-oateho. Falu yapi mainesigetama aya hutama hutesageno nagaya mainolega kanaleya huno eteno esie. Agayaene nagoa nafunaganayaene esayafe amakava mainoe.

Apolosia nenafufe nehue nagoa nafunaganayaene “Kolini kumate vuo” huna hamapaite hamapaite nehuanagi “Menia ovisua nagesa nehianagina ougahugi haenagama visua kananiama hanesigena ugahue.” huno humaine.
Kayetama mainetama Yisasife havitama lamakupi malenaya yana atafa hutama kolia ohutama lokiya vaitama maiho.
Nelama-fugamifena tamahau tamayamopafi nelahainage-tama mukia kavala hiho.
Tamakaya Setefanasifena havi-mainae. Kaliki kotega agaiene agaia afamoaene hagoteya amakua aiyahae huteya Yisasife haviya amakupi malenayapiti mukia kanafina Yisasi anagala amaya humainae.
Naa kava humaineya Anumaya Koti aliyana tusiya huya nealiya veamogami amaiyaafi maiho.
Tamakaya alulega mainetama nahaomaenayanagi menia Setefanasiene Fotunatusiene Akaikusiene nagaitega agena nahanemaeyafe tusia muse nehue.
Amakaya tamakaifema me nahapaigeno naipamoa kanaleya higena muse nehue. Muse nehuafe tamakai tamaipamoa ania huno kanaleya humaine. Naa kava nehaya vayafena tusia muse hutama amakia alisaga hiho.

Esia kotega alu kumate kumate maineya Yisasife haviya alitalu nehaya veala “Mainafio?” huya hu falu fala hunelamatae. Akuvilaene Palisilaene anakai nopima Yisasife haviya melitalu nehaya veala Anumayamoene ailokaeya maineya “Mainafio?” huya hu falu fala hu nelamatae.
Mukia mafi mainaya tafu-taganagaya “Mainafio.” huya hu falu fala hu nelamatae.
Tamakaya Anumaya Koti anaga mainayafe nagoke nagokemogatama tamayana oami aami hutama maiho.
Nagoa kea nago kanomona hapaugeno kae-maleneanagi nagaya Polona mamona atupa avona nagaini nayapiti kaena nelamamue.
Anumayamofe havino hau ayamopafi nomalea kanomona Anumaya Kotia ali haviya hutesie. “Anumayatimogae aupaa eno.” huna nehue.
Anumayati Yisasi kayone yamaa tamakaiene hanesie huna nehue.
Yisasi Kalaisiene aigamaena tamakaila naipa nelamamue. Tamage.
Kenia male hano hie.
Nagaini nagia Polonae.
Nagaila Polonia Anumaya Kotia hapalinateno Aposolo kano maiyo huno hunatene. Nelafua Timotiene mani avona negaoe.

Tamakaife nehue. Tamakaya Anumaya Koti anagala Kolini kumate mainetama agai kema havigahe melitalu hutama nemaiya veafeene Akaiya kotega maineya Yisasife haviya amakupi malenaya veanenefe hutaa mani avona negaoe.
Anumaya Kotia Nelafaene Yisasi Kalaisi Anumayatimoene kayone yamaaene tamaipa falu hisia yaene tamamisae huna Anumayamotega havigena mani avona negaove.

Musena huneateta Anumaya Koti agia alisaga nehuta maisune. Anumaya Kotia Yisasi Kalaisina Nefaagino kalagi aimate yamona aepaa maineafe mukia veamogatina taipamoa kanale hisia yamona aepaa nagoke maineanagino ani yana hunelate.

Tagaya mukia kana yama alunagenoa Anumaya Kotia taipa kanale hulatesia yana nelamie. Tamineafe tagaya ania huta nagoa veama kana yama falote humatesigeta Anumaya Kotia tayama hia kava huta veala amaipa alita kanale humatesunafe tagaitema falote humainea avamete kana yana falote humaine.
Yisasi Kalaisitema kasagoya kana yama falote humainea avamete huno tagaipina kana yana falote nehiafe Kalaisiene ailokaeta mainonanagino agaya tusiya huno taipamona alino kanale hunelate.

Tagaitema kana yama falote hisigeta tamakaifena, tagaya tamaipa ali kanale hulamatesuna yafe falote nehie. Tamakaila tamaku tamamema aligatisiafe falote nehie. Falotema hia kanafina Anumaya Kotia taipamona alino kanale hulatesigeta tagaya tamaya hisunafe taipa alino kanale hunelate. Tagaitema falote humainea avamete kana yana tamakaya aligeno Anumaya Kotia tamaya hinageno tamaipamoa kanale hisigetama mailava hutama mai lokiya vaitama maigahae.

“Tokiyaage huya maigahae.” huta tamakaifena tusiya huta tametitia nehune. Tagaiteenema kana yama folote hia kanafina Anumayamoa tagaila taipa alino kanale hulatenea avamete huno tamakai tamaipa alino kanale hulamategahie huta nehune.

Esia kotega kana yama alimainona yafena nafunaganatama huna lamakesa hugahe tamahapaigahue. Tusiya huno kana yana tagaipina falote higeta tokiya vaita maisuna tokiyatia omalegeta “Faligahune.” huta humainone.

Humainonanagi tagaya kanaleya huta maisuna tokiyatia omaleneanagita ani lokiyahena tametitia ohisunagi Anumaya Kotia fali vayama alino heti-neamatea kanomofe tametitia hisunafe ani avamete kana yana falote humaine.
Ani kotega tahaesageno tusi lagata aisigeta fali-mainesuna yapiti Anumaya Kotia taugafa aligatiteno haenagaa eteno nagoene taugafa aligatigahie huta tametitia nehune.

Tametitia nehunagi tamakaya laya hutama Anumayamotega ke hutama havigegeno laya hino. Taya hisigeya mukia veamoya anima tahamaesia yana ageteya mukia veamoya havigaya kema havisaya yafena Anumaya Kotina muse hutegahae.

Nagaya Yisasi kema nohaviya veanene tamakaiene ailokaena mainena alu aotage kano mainogeno Anumaya Kotia kayone yamaa namigena fatago huna mainena ma mopale haviyaami hanea vayamogami ke kana kea nohue. Ani yafena nagesa havuana naguamoa “Havi kava nehane.” huno ohia yafena muse nehue.

Nagi menia hapalitama havilama hisaya kegeya avopina negaove. Menia mukia aepania havilama nohayanagi haenagaa havilama hisae huna nametitia nehue. Yisasi Kalaisima eteno esia yupa aepania havilama hutetama tagaya tamakaifema muse nehuna avamete hutama tamakaya tagaifena musena hugahae.

Nagaifena muse hugahae huna nametitia nehuna Masetonia ugahe hagotena mainesalega mo lamavatagigena Masetoniatila etena egahe tole yupa tamaya hugahe me lamakeme evisuafe nagaila naya hisae huna nagesa nehavue.

Ani kema hutena ounama mainoa yafena “Havige huno ayelavataga hie.” hutama tamakesa havimainao? Nagaya nagesa havina “Naa maa huna aliyana aligahue.” hutena atafa naipamo haiya yafe “E.” hutena haenaga “Aao.” nehuo? Aao naa kavala nohue.
Anumaya Kotia agoma humainea kea fatago huno hugahie. Nagaienena fatago huna havigea ayelamavataga ohugahue. Tamahapai-mainoa kea nago yupa “E.” hutena haenaga “Aao.” huna ohunoane.

Yisasi Kalaisia Anumaya Koti nafanemoa havige huno ayelavataga hisia kanoa omaine. Nago yupa “E.” huteno haenaga “Aao.” huno ohuneane. Fatago kegeya huno “E.” nehia kano maine. Sailasiene Timotiene nagainiene tamakaipina Yisasi Kalaisi kea mo lamahapai-mainone.

Tamahapaunageno Anumaya Kotia “Hulamategahue.” huno hulokiya vai-malenea kemona aepaa Yisasia agaia maineanagino ani kehena “E, hulamategahue.” huno agaia humaineafe Anumaya Kotifena “Tamage nehie.” huta nehuta agia alisaga nehune.
Agia alisaga nehunageno Anumaya Kotia agaia tavaleno tagaiene tamakaiene Kalaisiene aigamaelateno “Tokiya vaitama maiho.” huno hunelate. Ani kema huhaleta hisunafe tagaila hapalilatene.

Hapalilateno “Tamakaya nagai anaga mainae.” huno humainea kema havisaya yafe agaia Avamula taguafina faetene. Faetegeno taguafina maineafe tagayama havunana “Haenagaa kanaleya huta maigahune.” huta nehune.
Nagaya kelamama-kisugeno tamaipamoa haviya huyafene huna Kolini kumatela nagoene uvayi ohunoe. Anumaya Kotia nagesa havua yana ago havimaineanagina agai aufina tamage nehue.

Tamakaya Anumayamofena havitama lamakupi maletama tamametiti humainaya kemona atafa hutama tokiyaage hulinayafe menia kahegi kea huta kava hu notamatonagi muse hutama tamaipa kanale yapi maisayafe mani kea nehune.
Tamakaitega etenama esuana kelamama-kisugetama tamaipa haviya huyafene huna nagoene ougahue huna humainoe.
Nagaya hisua kemo tamaipa ali haviya hisigeya taya nagaila muse yania namigahae? Tamakai tamaipa haviya hisia yama tamamisua veamogatamage muse yana namisaya veanea mainae.

Tamakaitegama visua yupa kea otamama-kisuafe mani avona ago kaena tamaminoe. Tamakaya muse yama namisaya veane mainagi havigu kelamama-kisua yamo tamaipa haviya hisigeno naipamoene haviya hu yafene huna aupaa omenoe. Tamahapai-mainoa kefo yana ago ali fatago hugahae huna nagaya musema hisua yana ailokaeta nagopi musena hugahune huna nehue.

Tusiya huna tamakaifena nagesa nehavugeno naipamoa kanaage nehigena avi neatena ani avona ago kaena tamaminoe. Tamaipa haviya hisie huna okaenogi “Tagaifena aluya huno haigeno mani avona lamie.” hutama hisayafene huna ani avona ago kaena lamaminoe.

Tokaetama mainaya vayapiti nago kanomoma kefo yama hia yafe naipa havina haviyama huana nagainigelomagi tamakaiene mukiamogatamina tamaipamoa tusiya huno haviya nehie. Haviya nehianagi ani yafena mukia kea ohisua nagesa nehie.
Tamaipamoa haviya higetama ani kanomona “Kefo ya nehane.” hutama havi anonaa hu neatayafe ani kefo yamo anonaa ago alimaine.
Ali-maineafe aigeatetama kefo yamaa ataletetama aipa alitama kanale huteho. Havigu agaye yamo kana ya amisigi kanale kava huteho.
Alitama kanale hu neatetama “Kagaifena aluya huno nelahaiye.” hutama huteho huna tokiyaage ke nehue.
“Kanaleya hutama mukia kenia havitama akave nemalao ifi nomalao?” huna nagaya tamakaila avame hulamatena ani avona ago kaena lamaminoe.

Nago kanomona aigeatetama kefo yamaama ataletesayana nagaya ania huna ani kanomona aigeatena kefo yamaa ataleneatoe. Nago kanomona aigeatenama kefo yamaa ataletoana tamakaifene huna Kalaisi aufina ania humainoe.
Naa ohisugenoa Satania ayelavataga huno tatafa hugahie. Agaia havige huno ayelavataga hisia yafena ago havilinone.
Kalaisifena kanale mono kema huhalena hugahema Taloasi kumate uvayima hugenoa Anumayamoa anile mainaya veamogamina amakua alino aikalo higena kanaleya huna ani kea huhalena humainoe.
Huhalena huanagi nenafua Taitasia omaigena agaife nagesa kumo higena amatalena atiyegahe Masetonia umainoe.

Kalaisia Satani ayapitila tavalegeta agaiene ailokaeta mainonanagita mukia kefo yana agaseta mainona yafe Anumaya Kotife muse huta agia alisaga hisune. Agaya tagaila laya higeta alule alule vaiyeta Yisasi kema nehuna yafena ani kemona havilama hageno kanale manaage yamo hia kava huno ute ete nehie.

Higeta lagaya Yisasi kema nehuna veamogata Kalaisiene ailokaeta mainonafe kanale manaage yamo hia avamete hunageno Anumaya Kotia muse nehie. Ani manaamoa ute ete huno mukia veapi vigeya ani manaage kea nehavigeno amaku amamema alinegatia veanene kefo yakeya huya hani yapima tegelege nehia atafi visaya veanene ani kea nehaviye.

Nehavigi nagoamoya ani kea haviya “Akave omalegahune.” huya nehaya veala hani yapi tegelege nehia atafi visaya veamogamife mani kemoa fali-mai veamogami manaamimo hia kava humaineanagi nagoamoya haviya amakupi maleteya “Maige maige hisuna yafe kanale manaage nehie.” huya nehae. Tusia aliya nealunanagi tagaitigela mani aliyana oaluteasine.

Kasagoya veamoya Anumaya Koti aliyateti “Miya alisune.” huya nehagi tagaila Anumaya Kotia hulategeta fatago huta kelamagema huhaleta hunana Kalaisiene ailokaeta maineta Anumaya Koti aufina mani kea huhaleta nehune.

Tagaya nagoene tagaiti laugafa alita haisuna yafe mani kea nehuno? Aao naa nohune. Tagaifema ohaviya yafe mani kea nehuno? Nago kanomofe avopina “Kanale kano mainegi agai kea haviho.” huya kae-malenaya kea aliya vaiyatete nehagi tagaifena ago havimainaya yafe tagaya ani avamete avona alita vai noayone. Tamatalena visuana “Ani avamete avona namiho.” huna ohugahue.

Ohugahugi tamakaya tagai kea havitetama tamakua ago aiyahae hageya mukia veamoya nelamakeya tagaifena “Anumaya Koti kea fatago ke nehae.” huya nehagetama tagai avo kana hutama mainageno tagupina hane.

Nagaya tamaya huna Kalaisifena tamahapaugeno Kalaisia ani avona tamakaife huno veamogami amakupina kae-malene. Oko titetila yafamona amega okaenegi haimua hanea Anumaya Kotia agaia Avamuteti veamogatami amakupina ani avona kae-malegetama Kalaisi avo kana hutama mainayafe mukia veamoya hapaliya nehaviye.
Kalaisia tayama hia yafe Anumaya Kotifena tametiti nehuta mani kea nehune.
Nehunanagi “Mani aliyana tagaitige alimainone” huta nohunagi Anumaya Kotia tokiya lamigeta mani aliyana nealune.

Anumaya Kotia kosa helatesia tokiyaa tamineafe Anumaya Kotia haegafama alino hagelafi-latenea kema hamapaisuna yafe hulatene. Anumaya Kotia hagoteno kahegi kea yafate kae-malenegeya veamoya akave malesaya amakesa haviyanagi tokiyaamia omalegeya ago alitagae-mainaya yafe fali-mainae. Fali-mainagi Avamumoa anima haegafama alino hagelafi-latenea kea tave-liteno haegafa yama alita maige maige hisuna tahaimula nelamie.

Nelamianagi hagote kahegi kema akave omalaya yafe ani kemoa hamaegeya fali-maine. Ani kahegi kea yafate kaeteno amaminea yupa Anumaya Kotitegati tokiya hale yamoa falote huno Mosese augosafina tusiya huno aihalea yamo Isaleli veamogami amaulaga ayeno haviya higeya Mosesena oagageno ani tokiyaage hale yamoa osia maigeno fanane humaine.
Meni kanafina Alu Aotage Avamumoma taya nehia aliyamoa nayo kahegi kemona agaseno tusiya huno tokiyaage hale yamoa falote humaine.

Hagote kahegi kema akave omalageno hefalimatenea kea tusia tokiyaage hale yamaaene kema hanesiana Anumaya Koti aufina fatago huta maisuna kea hagote kemo hale yamona ago agaseno tusia tokiya hale yamaaene kea hane.
Tamage tusia tokiya hale yamaama hanea kema falote humaineafe hagoteno falote humainea hale yamona agase-maineanagino menia hagote kahegi kemoa aye hale olatene.
Fananema humainea kahegi kemoa tokiya hale yamaaene hagoteno falote humaineanagi menima agola maige maige hisuna kemoa tusia tokiya hale yamaa hanea ke hane.
Ani kemoa “Agola hanege hanege hugahie.” huta tametitima nehuna yafe kolia huta fala okita ani kegeya huhaleta nehune.

Nehuta falanokunagi Mosesena augosafima tokiya hale yama fanane hisigeya Isaleli veamoya oagesayafene huno augosafina kenaletila alino fala kigeya oagenae. Oagenayanagi tagaya Mosesema humainea avamete huta Anumayamo kea fala nokune.

Fala nokunagi Mosesea kenaleti augosafina alino aiso humalenea avamete huno Anumaya Kotia Isaleli veamogami amakuamona alino hayagino atalako higeya havilama ohunae. Nagi nayoene meniene Anumaya Koti avopima hapaliyana kenaleti aiso humalenea avamete huno amaku amamemoa aiso humainegeya havilama nohagi nagoa veamoya Kalaisiene ailokaesayana ani amaku amamema aliya aiso humalenaya yana Kalaisia alitalegeya havilama huya nehaviye.
Tamage menienema Mosese kahegi kema hapaliyama haviyana amaku amamemoa kenama Mosesea alino augosafi aiso humainea avamete higeya havilama nohae.
Havilama nohagi nagoa veamoya amakua aiyahae huya Anumayamotega visayana aliyama aiso humalenaya yana Kalaisia alitalenageya havilama hugahae.

Nagi Anumayamoa Alu Aotage Avamu maine. Anumayamo Avamula tagaienema mainesiana taguama alino aiso hulateno aigagilatenea yana aligalu helateneafe nagoene kahegi kemo akavela omalegeta nofipi mainaya vaya kana huta nagoene omainone.

Taugosafi aiso humainea yana omalegeno Anumayamo tokiya hale yamoa lagai taugosafi aye halegeya veamoya nelageya Anumayamo tokiya hale yamaa neagae. Avamumoa agai avamete veane maisunafe tagaila alino hapae-lategeta agaia tokiya hale yana alime alime nehaune.
Anumaya Kotia kalagi ailateno “Nagai kea huhaletama hiho.” huno hulateneafe “Kasalotahae.” huta nohune.

Aao ani aliyama alunana falakita tagaye hisifa kavala huta veala aye-mavataga huta Anumaya Koti kea alita aiyahae huta “Mage nehie.” huta havigea nohunagi hulama huta huhaleta nehune. Anumaya Koti aufina veamogamina kelamagea hamapaunageya mukia veamoya amakualeti “Lamage nehae.” huya nehae.
Nehagi Yisasifena kanale mono kema huhaleta nehunageya nagoa veamoya havilamama nohayana ani veamoya hani yapima tegelege nehia atafi visaya veane mainae.

Satania, ma mopafi kava yagai-mainea kanomoa, Yisasi kema nohaviya veala Kalaisia kefo yaamia alino kanale humateno alino halematesia kea ohavisaya yafe Satania amaku amakesa alino aye-lileno amaulaga alino asu humainea vea kana humatene. Humategeno Kalaisia agaia tokiya hale yamaa hanea kano maineanagino Anumaya Kotienena nago avamete huana mainae.

Mainaageta lagaya tagaiti laugafa alita haisuna yafe mani kea huhaleta nohunagi Yisasina Anumaya Kotia taugafa aligatigahe hutenea kanoa “Anumayati maine.” huta tamaya hisunafe Yisasi aliya vaya mainone.

Anumaya Kotia ikaene mopaene talo humaleteno “Hani yapitila halo.” hunoma humainea kanomoa hani yama hanea taguafina aye hale-lategeta maineta Yisasi Kalaisi augosafina Anumaya Koti tokiya hale yamoa hanegeno tave-ligeta age-mainone.

Age-mainonanagi Anumaya Kotia agaiage ani ala tokiyamona aepaa maineafe “Veamogamina amave-lisue.” huno ani lokiya yamaa tagaila, fulu fulu veamogati tagupina malenegeta agai aliyana nealunageya veamoya nelageya “Amakaila tokiyaamia omalene.” huya Anumayamo agia alisaga nehae.
Mukia kanafina alu kana ya alu kana yana tagaitela falote nehigenoagi tagaila alino haviyatafana nohie. Tagesa kumo nehianagi tagesa alino haviyatafana nohie.
Yisasi kema huna yateti ali haviya hulatayanagi Anumayamoa otatalene. Mukia kanafina kayo kevema lamiyana ofalinone.
Nagi Yisasia fali-mainefiti heti-mainea haimumoa tagai taugafale hanenageya agesayafe “Yisasina haesunageno falisie.” huya hutenaya kavala menia ania huya tahaeya faligahe nehae.
Yisasia fanane hisia taugafale maineno tokiyaama nelamia yana amave-lisiafe tagaya ma mopafima mainona kanafina Yisasi kea huhaleta nehunageya hamaiya vai-lateya tahaegahena maiya nehae.
Higeya Anumaya Koti kema huhaleta huna yafe fali yamoa tagaipina haneanagi agola maige maige hisuna haimumoa tamakaipina aliyana nealiye.
Anumaya Koti avopina mage huno kae-maleneane
“Tamage nehie huna havina nagupi malena nametiti hu-mainoafe mani kea huhalena nehue.” huno higeya kae-malenayane.
Tagaya ania huta “Anumayamoa lamage nehie.” huta tagupi malenonafe mani kea huhaleta nehune.

Tagaya ago havimainone Yisasiene ailokaeta mainonafe Anumaya Kotia Anumayatimoa Yisasina fali-mainefiti alino hetitenea kanomoa tagaiene tamakaienena ania huno fali-mainesupitila ali hetilateno agaia mainelega tavaleno lategahie huta tagesa havimainone.

Tamakai tamaya hisunafe tagaitela kana yana falote nehianagi kasagoya veanele Anumayamo kayone yamaamoa falote higeya neagageno Anumayamoa kasagoya veala amaya nehianagia kasagoya veamoya Anumaya Kotifena muse huya agia alisaga hugahae.
Nagi amega taugafamoa haviya hugahe hianagi mukia kanafina Anumayamoa taipamona alino haegafa hulategeta Anumayamo aliyafena “Kasalo tahae.” huta noatalone.

Tamage menima falote nehia kana yana afa ya kana huno fanane hugahie. Ani kana yama nealuna yafe ikapinaga haita maisuna yamoa, tusia ala yane, ohavunamaa kanale tokiya hale yana falote huno hanege hanege hugahie.

Ikapinaga haita maineta alisuna yafena ago havimainonafe ma mopafi yafena tagesa havi havi nohunagi oagenona yana, haenagama falote hisia kanale yafe tagesa nehavune. Ma mopafi hanegeta neagona yana fanane hugahigi noagona yana, haenagama falote hisia kanale yana afaa agola hanege hanege huno hanegahie huta nehune.

Tagaya maa huta nehavune ma mopafi mainona taugafa yugu no kana hu-mainegi falisunagenoa ani nona fanane hisigeno Anumaya Kotia ikapinaga agola hanege hanege hisia no kana taugafa talo tala hulatene. Vayamoya ani nona amayatetila okinagi Anumaya Kotia agaia kimalene huta ago havimainone.
Havimainonanagi menia ma mopafi taugafale mainonafe “Kasalo tahae.” huta ikapinaga maisuna taugafa tamisia yafe tusiya huno nelahaiye.
Nelahaiyanagi ani laugafa aliteta hakalo kana huta omaigahunagi taugafaene veane maigahune.

Maigahunagi ma mopafi mainona taugafalela kana yamo higeta “Avovo.” huta kalagila neaita falisuna yafena notahaiyanagi maige maige hisuna taugafa alisuna yafena aluya huno nelahaiye. Maige maige hisuna tahaimumoa esiaamo haegafa kenama nefaiya avamete huno falino fananema hisia taugafa alino aiso hulatesigeta agola maige maige hisuna yafena aluya huno nelahaiye.
Anumaya Kotia tagaya agola maige maige hisunafene huno talo hu lateneanagita ani yafena “Tamage nehie.” huta havisuna yafe Alu Aotage Avamula lamine.
Tamineafe taguamoa kolia nohianagita havilama huta havilinone ma mopafi mainona kanafina ikapinaga Anumayamo avatela omainonane.

Omainonanagi Anumayamona oagenona kanafina agaife havita lagupi maleta lametiti hu-mainona yateti ma mopafina vaineayeta ma ma mainona taugafa neataleta Anumayamo avatela agola umaisuna yafena aluya huno nelahaiye.
“Ma mopafi mainonano falisunano Anumayamona haisia kavala hugahune.” huta huna yafena aluya huno nelahaiye.

Tagaya mukia veala nagoke nagokemogata Kalaisi aule mo hetisunageno mopalema havi auava yama humainesuna yafeene kanale auava yama hu-mainesuna yafeenena agelama huno fako hulateno tagayama maita nehisuna avamete anonatia tahaote tahaote tamisiafene huta Anumayamona haiya kavala nehune.

Tagaya Anumayamofena “Kolia hisuna kano maine.” huta havilineta veamoya fatago huya maisaya auava yana amave-nelune. Anumaya Kotia lagupina nelageno “Kanale kava nehae.” huno nehio? Ifi tamakaya tamakuafinaga tagaifena “Kanale kava nehae.” hutama nehao? huna nehue.

Mani kea tagaiti lagi alita ala hisuna yafe nohunagi nagoa veamoya amega amaugafahe haviya muse nehuya “Fatago kavakeya nehuna veane mainone.” huya nehayanagi amakupina oageneya ani veamoya tagaifema tamahavi-gesagetama tagaifena “Kanale kava nehae.” hutama muse nehutama kenonaamia hamapaisayafene huta mani kea nehune.

Anumaya Koti aliya nealunageya nagoa veamoya tagaifena “Aifo vaya mainae.” huya nehayanagi ani aifo-nafo kavama hisunana Anumayamo agi alisaga hisuna yafe ani kavala nehune. Tamakai tamaya hisunafene huta kanale tagu tagesa nehavita Anumaya Koti aliyana nealune.

Kalaisia lagaifena hau ayamopafima nehaiya yamofe huta agai aliyana nealune. Nealita nago yafema havunana nago kanomoa mukia veafene huno fali-maine. Kalaisia tagaife huno fali-maineafe mukia veala agaiene tokaeta ago fali-mainone.

Faliteta ago eteta hetita haegafa veane mainonafe tagaiti tahaisia kavala ohisunagi tagaifema huno faliteno heti-mainea kanomona tagua amiteta agaima haisia kavakeya hisunafene huno Yisasia fali-maine.

Nayona veamoya nehaya kavafena ageteta amegati fako humainonagi menia Kalaisia tagaifema huno fali-mainea kema havuna yafe ani kea nago kanomofena nohune. Nayona Kalaisima humainea kavala ageteta fako hu-mainonagi menia ago havilama huteta ani kavala nohune.
Ani yafe nagoa veamoya Kalaisiene ailokaeya maiyaamo haegafa veala hapaeya mainageno atafa auava amaipamoa fanane higeno haegafa amaipa alino hapaematene.

Anumaya Kotia agaia ani yamona aepaa maineanagino agaienena kame vayaa mainonageno Kalaisina hutegeno eaamo Anumaya Kotiene melino taipa falu hulategeta agaiene nago taipale mainone. Mainonageno Anumaya Kotia “Nagoa veamogamina ani kavala humategahue.” huno humaineafe tagaya amaipa alita agaiene falu humatesuna aliyamaa tagaila lamine.

Nelamino “Veala nagaiene alitama amaipa falu hisia kea mage hutama hamapaiho.” huno mage humaine “Kalaisia tamakaifene huno fali-mainea yafe Anumaya Kotia kefo yatimo anonaa otamisia agesa haviteno ma mopafi veamogami amaipa alino falu humateno agaiene nagopi maiho.” huno hulatene.

Hulategeta Anumaya Kotia Kalaisi agile huhaleno tahapaigeta agai avayafiti kea mage nehune “Musetami nehunagi Kalaisia tamakaifene huno fali-maineafe Anumaya Kotina tamakoya hute yana ataletama agaiene tamaipa alitama falu hutama nagopi maiho.” huta tamahapai-mainone.

Nagi tagaila taya hisiafene huno hulateneafe nagola osi kefo yamaa omalenea kanoa, Yisasie, tagayama kefo yama hu-mainona yana alino Yisasi agupile maleno kefo yatimo anonaa amigeno kefo yama nehaya vaya kana huno fali-maineafe Anumaya Kotia tagaifena “Nagainia fatago veania mainae.” huno hulatene.
Anumayamoene ailokaeta aliyana nealita mage huta ali lamakafa nehune. Anumaya Kotia kayone yamaa ago tamamigetama ali-mainagi afa kavala ohutama akave maleme maleme haiho.
Anumayamoa agaia avopina mage huno hu-maineane
“Naguamoa kanale nehigena nahavigaya kea havuanagi tamaugafama aligatisua kanale tamaya hugahue.” huno hu-maineane.
Hu-maineanagina tamahanepauve meni kanafina Anumaya Kotia aguamoa kanale nehigeno tamaku tamamena aligatisiafe nehaigi tamakua aiyahae hiho.
Aliyatihena “Haviya hie.” huya ohisaya yafe tagaya kefo yana nohune. Havigu kefo yama hisunana veamoya nelageya amakua aiyahae ohugahae huta lagaya tagu tametela kava neyagaune.

Anumaya Koti aliya vaya mainone huta mukia maa kavala nehune. Vayamoya aliya haviyama hulatayana tokiya vaita mailava huta mainone. Kana yama falote higeta mailava huta mainonafe tamakaya “Kanale aliya vayaa mainae.” hutama hisaya yafe tagutela kava neyagaune.
Neyagaunageno maa yana falote humaine kayoteti nelahaeya nofi hulatenae. Mukia veamoya alakenake huya tahaegahe humainae. Tusia aliya nealita taula ofaonageno tusia tagate-maine.

Naa hulatayanagi oniyaage kavala ohune. Anumayamo kea havilama hulineta mailava huta maineta veala ali kayone humateta amaya nehune. Alu Aotage Avamula taguafi maineno laya higeta lamage huta veafena tahau tayamopafi nelahaiye.

Nelahaigeta kelamage kea huta Anumaya Koti tokiyaleti aliyana nealita vayamoya ati kevema tamaga amayapina nealiya hauga amayapina halegula aye haiteya kamema nehaya avamete huta fatago kavakeya nehuta Satanienena tua nehuta Anumayamo aliyana nealune

Nagoa veamoya tagia alisaga nehayanagi nagoa veamoya tagia ali haviya hunelatae. Nagoa veamoya kamugea hatageya vainelayanagi nagoa veamoya huya kanale hunelatae. Tagaya tama kavakeya nehunanagi tagaifena “Havige huya ayelavataga nehae.” huya nehae.

Nagoa veamoya tagaifena “Afa vaya kana humainae.” huya nehayanagi Anumaya Kotiene nagoa veanene “Aao amaki hanea vaya mainae.” huya nehageya nagoa veamoya tatafa huya tahayayanagi ageho ofalinone. Anumaya Koti kema nehunafenagiya hamai vailateya tahayayanagi ofalinone.

Nagoa yafena tahauna hunanagi mukia kanafina taipamoa kanale nehigeta musena nehune. Afeno yatia omaleanagi Yisasi kema huhaleta nehunafenagita nagoa veamogamina tusia kanale yana neamamune. Nagoa yatia omaleanagi afeno yaamima hanea vaya kana huta mainone. Ani yamoa tagaipina falote higeya veamoya tagaila nelagae.
Kolini kumate mainaya nelafugatama tamakaifena aluya huno nelahaigeta nago kea fala okinonagi fatago huta tamahapai-mainone.
Tamahanepaunageno tamakaifena lahaiyanagi tamakaya tagaifena otamahaiye.
Nagaini nafane kana hutama mainayafe tamakaila taguama tamamuna avamete hutama anonatia tagaila tamakua tamiho.

Aliya aligaheno anemoya vema aligaheno vemoya anema aligaheno naama hinutamahena Anumaya Kotina amakaveno huneataya veanenena ailo okaeho. Ailokaetama maisayana hanaa huno fatago humainea yaene kefo yamoenena ailokaeana maigae? Hani yamoa hale yamoenena ailokaegao?

Ifi Yisasi Kalaisiene Satanienena ailokaeana nagoke anaipale maigao? Ifi Anumayamo akave nomalaya veanene Yisasife haviya amakupi malenaya veanene ailokaeya maisayana nagoke amaku amakesale omaigahae.

Ago fali-mainaya veafe “Anumayati maine.” huya amakisana nevaiya yaene Anumaya Kotima mainea noene aliya nagopi malesayana kanale hugahio? Anumaya Kotia haimuene kanoa tagai tagupi maineafe Anumaya Koti avopina mage huno hu-maineane
“Nagaya amakupi mainena amakaiene vaiyatete nehuna Anumaya Kotiami maisugeya nagai anaga maigahae.
Ani yafe kefo yana neataletama alule mainetama oniyaage kefo yana ohisagena nagainilega tamavalena tamategahue.
Lamatenena tamakaila nelamafana maisugetama nagai nafane munaneyaga maigahae. Nagaya mukia tokiyamona aepaagina mainoe. Anumayamona, mani kea nehue.” huno higeya kae-malenayane.

Ani kema hulokiya vaino hulateneafe nahau nayamopafi nenahaiya nenafu-gatama taugafaene tagu tameene ali haviya hisia kavala neataleteta Anumaya Kotifema koli hisuna tagesa havita fatago kavakeya huge huge nehuta alu aotage veane maisune.
Tagaifena tamaipa haviya ohutama tamakua lamiho. Nagoa veala ali haviya hu noamatone. Nagoa veala havi katela amavaleta noamatone. Nagoa veala ayemavataga huta moneamia noalune.
Noalunagi kelamama-kisuafene huna mani kea nohugi “Nahau nayamopafi nenahaiye.” huna ago tamahapai-mainoe. Afaa maisunano falisunano tamakaiene ailokaeta maigahune.
Tamakaya fatago hutama maigahae huna nametitia nehuna tamakia alisaga nehue. Mukia kana yana nagaipima falote higena ani yapima mauvanagi tamakaifena naipa havina tusia muse nehue.
Masetonia kotega uvayi hunanagi alu kumate kumatela kana yamoa falote higeya nagoa veamoya tagaiene ke vaiya tu hulatageno taguamoa koli hia kava higeta maifalua ohunone.
Ohunonagi Anumaya Kotia kana yama aliya veala amakua alino kanale huneamatea kano maineanagino Taitasina hutegeno eaamo tagua melino falu hulatene.

Taitasima ea yafekela musena nohunagi Taitasina hutageno mage huno me lahapaiye “Amakaya Kolini kumate mainaya veamoya kanale yama hunataya yafena nagua alino kanale humaine.” huno huteno “Kagesaya yafena hamaigeya kagayama hamapai-mainana kefo yaamihena amakua aiyahae hayanagi neataleya ‘Nagoa vayamoya kagai kagia ali haviya hugahe hayanagita tagaya kaya hugahune.’ huya hae.” huno hia yafena naipamoa kanale higena tusia muse nehue.

Nehugi avoma kaena lamamuana tamaipamoa haviya hie huna nagesa havuanagi “Haviya huna avona kaena amaminoe.” huna hu-mainoanagi menia osi kanafina tamaipamoa kana higetama etetama tamakua aiyahae haya yafena muse nehuna “Kanaleya huna avona kaena amaminoe.” huna nagesa havimainoe.

Havitena menia muse nehue. Tamaipa kanama haya yafena musena nohugi tamaipa kana hutetama etetama tamaipama aiyahae haya yafena muse nehue. Anumaya Kotia ania huno tamaipa kana hutetama etetama lamaipama aiyahae hutama agaitegama aya yafena muse nehigi tamaminoa avomoa tamakaila alino haviyana ohunegi kanaleya hulamatene huna nehue.

Tagua aiyahae hisunafe Anumaya Kotia kana yana taguafina nelamie. Tamisigeta aliteta tagua aiyahae hisunageno tagu tamena aligatisiafene huno nelamie. Ani yafe Anumaya Kotima tamia kana yafena “Otahaiye.” huta nohunagi ma mopafi yafema amakesa havi havi nehaya veamoya kana yama falote hinageya amakuama aiyahae ohisagenoa Anumaya Kotia amaya ohinageya faliteya hani yapi ugahae.

Tamakaipima mainea kanomoa kefo yama higena osi avona kaena tamamugetama agetageno tamaipamoa kana higeno Anumaya Kotima tamaminea kana yana tusia kanaleya hulamatenegi haviho. Ani kefo yafena “Tagaye nehinagetama aupaa alitalegahune.” hutama tamakua aiyahae humainagi koli hutama ani kefo yama humainea kanomofena tamaipamoa kana higetama anonaa aminayafe nagaima nagesaya yafena nelamahaiye. Anima mukia yama humainaya yafena tamakaya ani kefo yama ohunaya yana ago naveli-mainae.

Mani avoma kaovana ani kefo yama nehia kanomofeene kefo yama hutaya veanenefe huna okaenogi tamakaife huna kae-malogetama tamakaya hapalitama Anumaya Koti aufina ani avopiti kea akave maletama “Polofe lahaigeta agai veane mainone.” hutama hisayafene huna mani avona kaena tamaminoe.
Tamaminogi nagai kema haviya yafena naipamoa kanaleya nehie.
Naafenomagi ania hutama Taitasi aipama alitama kanale haya yafena nagoene naipamoa kanaleya nehie.

Tamakaifena muse huna tamakima alisaga huna Taitasina hapaugetama kanale kavama hutaya yafena nagayea nohie. Tamakaila kelamagema tamahapai-mainoa avamete huna Taitasina tamakaifema hapauva kea havigea huna haopainogi tamakaya hapauva avamete hutama kanaleya humainae.
Tamakaya koli hutama atali hutetama agai kema haviya yafena Taitasia agesa havi havi huno tamakaifena aipamoa aluya huno musena humaine.
Ani yafe tamakaya kefo yana ohiho. Fatago hutama maigahae huna nametitia nehuna tusia muse nehue.
Anumaya Kotia Masetonia maineya Yisasina amakua aminaya veamogamina kayone yamaa amamigeya kanale yama haya yafe tamahapaigahe hue.

Ani veapina tusia kana yamo falote hianagi Anumayamofena muse nehuya amakaipina osi kanoa afeno yaamia hanegeya afa veane maiyanagi tusiya huya alu veamogamima amaya hisaya yafena monea alitalu huya kanale kavakeya humatenae.

Tamahanepauve osi kanoa afeno yaamia hanegeya “Nagoa tagaitia malesune.” huya amakesa ohaviya havigu mainaya veamogamina monea amaminae. “Ani kava hiho.” huta hamaopaunanagi “Tatalageta Yutia maineya Yisasina amakua aminaya veamogamina amaya hamano.” huya huteya ani kavala humainae.

Hayanagita “Monea osia amamigahae.” huta hunanagi ala mone hageya amaminae. Ani yamaagelomagi Anumaya Kotifena hamaiya avamete huya hagoteya amakaiami amakua Anumayamona amitafa huteya ania huya amakua tagaila taminae.

Naa hayafe Taitasifena mage huta hapai-mainone “Hagoteka Kolini veanene umaineka ‘Nagoa veamogami amaya hisia monea alitalu hiho.’ huka hamapai-mainanagi menia anima kayone hisaya aliyana molivayayo.” huta hapai-mainone.

Tamakaya mukia yama haya yamoa aluya huno kanale ya higetama Anumayamofena havitama lamakupi maletama lamametitima haya yamo tokiyaagela hutama Yisasi kema hayana fatago kegeya nehae. Kanale tamaku tamakesaene veane mainayafe tagaifena tamahau tamayamopafi nelama-hainagetama menia kayone hutama veamogamina amaya hisaya monema neamamiya aliyana aluya hutama aliho.
