“Monea amamiho.” huna kahegi kea nohugi nagoa veamoya kanaleya huya monea malagena agetena fako hulamatogi hanaa hugahae? Nagoa veafe tamahau tamayamopafi nelahamaiya yana kanaleya huno haneo? huna nelamakoe.

Tamakaya Anumayati Yisasi Kalaisia kayonema hulatenea yafena ago havilinae. Tusia kanale yapi maineanagino tagaifene huno tagayama kanale noma maisunafene huno agaia kanale maiyamaa ataleteno ma mopafi eaamo tusia havi noma mainea yateti tamakaya mukia kanale yana ali-mainae.

Ali-mainagi ani kanale kavala hiho huna nagesa havua kea tamahapaigahugi haviho. Tamakaya ago hano humainea kafufina hagotetama “Ani monea alitalu hisune.” hutetama aepa hetama alitalu hu-mainagi menia ani aliyakeya alitama alivayayeho.
“Monea amamigahune.” hutama hayanagi menia ania hutama amamisaya tamakesama havinutamahena malenesaya yapitila ali hano hutama alitalu hutetama amamiho.
Nagi amakuamoa kanale higeya malenaya monefiti amaminaya yafena Anumayamoa muse humateanagi nagoa veamoya nago yaamima omalesayana Anumayamoa “Amamiho” huno ohugahie.

“Amakaya kanale no maisaya yafe ala monea amamitetama monetamia omaleafe tamakaya havi no maigahae.” huna nohugi menia monea tamakaipi haneafenagiya omalegeyama afaa mainaya veamogamina amaya nehutama haenagaa tamakaya omalesigetama afaa maisageyahena tamaya hugahae. Ani kavama hisayana mukiamogatama nago avamete hutama maigahae.
Nayona Anumaya Kotia Isaleli veamogamina ikapinagati kave amaminea kanafina Anumaya Koti avopina mage huno hu-maineane
“Kasagoya ali-mainea kanomoene osia ali-mainea kanomoenena amamu hia kave nemainae.” huno avona kae-maleneane.
Naa humaineafe amaya hiho huna nehue.
Tamaya hisua nagesa havua nagesa Anumaya Kotia Taitasina ago aminea yafena Anumayamofena muse nehue.
Muse nehugi “Kolini kumate vuo.” huta hutonana “E, muse nehue ani kumate visua nagesa nehavue.” huno agaia humaine.
Humainegi nago kanoa kanaleya huno Yisasi kanale mono kea huhaleno higeya mukia veamoya muse humainaya kanoa hutesugeana Taitasiene ugae.

Ani yamaagelomagi alu kumate kumate Yisasina amakua aminaya veapina tagaiene vaiyeno taminaya monea alita momisunafe ani kanomona aliya hetitenae. Hetitageta veafeke tahau higeta Anumayamo agima alisaga hisuna yafe “Monea alita momamisune.” huta nehune.
Ani tusia monema alitalu haya monehena havigu veamoya tagaifena “Havi kava hae.” huya hisaya yafenagita lagaya kava yagaita ani tafutaganaene nagopi vaiyegahune.
Kava yagaita Anumayamo auleene veamogami amauleene kanaleya huta aliyana alisuna yafe nelahaiye.

Nelahaigeta nago tafu-taganaa mukia kanafina alu aliya alu aliyana nealianagita fako huta agonana tokiyaage huno veamogamina amaya nehianagino menia aluya huno lamakaifena “Kanale kava hugahae.” huno hia yafe Taitasiganiene hunategahune.

Tamakaima tamaya hisia yafe Taitasia nagaiene tokaeno maineno aliyana nealigeya alu kumate kumate mono note veamoya humatageana agaiene vaa tafu-taganagania aliyama nealia yamoa Kalaisi agia alisaga nehae.

Naa nehaafe tamakaya tamahau tamayamopafima nelahamaiya yafena tamakia alisaga huta hamapai-mainona yana amave-lisaya yafe anima esaya vayala amaya nehisageya Yisasina amakua aminaya veamoyama agesayana “Poloa humainea kea tamage humaine.” huya hugahae.

“Yutia maineya Yisasina amakua aminaya veane amaya huta monea amamigahune.” hutama haya kea havitena Masetonia kotega mainaya veamogamina tamakaifena mage huna hamapauve “Akaiya kotega mainaya veamoya ago hano hia kafufina anima amamisaya monea ago talo tala humalenae.” huna hamapaugeya nagoa veamoya tamakaya tokiyaagema hutama haya yafena haviteya “Tagaya ania hugahune.” huya nehae. Ani monema amamisayafene huna nagoene avoma kaesuana afa ya kana hugahie.
Tamakaifena “Ago talo tala humalenae.” huna hamanepaugi havigu “Kagaya havige nehane.” huya huyafenagi ani monea menima alitalu hisaya yafe nagoa tafu-taganagamina humatesugeya tamakaitega ugahae.

Ani monema alisuafe nagaya amakave visuaamona Masetonia kotega mainaya veanenema visugeya havigu monema alitalu ohunesagena nagayaene tamakayaenena tagaye huyafene huna nagoa vayala hagotena humatesugeya ugahae.

Ani monehena “Kasagoya amamigahune.” hutama humainaya monea talo tala hisayafene huna nagoa tafu-taganagamina humatogeya ugahe nehagi uvayima huteya “Naama tamiho.” huya hisagetama amamiho. Oamamisaya tamakesa ohavitama tamaipa kanale yapiti ala monea afaa amamiho huna nehue.
Ani monema amamisaya yafena tamakesa haviho. Osi avina kanoa fai-malenesia kanomoa kosa ohesia kave kanoa aligahigi kasagoya hoya vai-malenesia kanomoa kasagoya kavea aligahie.

Naa hu-maineafe tamakaya tamahaote tamahaote tamaku tamakesa havitetama “Ma monea amamigahune.” higeno tamaipamoa kanaagela ohinagetama kanaleya hutama amamiho. Aipa kanale yapiti vaya kaikai hisia kanomofena Anumaya Kotia hau ayamopafi nehaiye.

Anumaya Kotia kosa helamatesia yana kayone yamaa tamamisia amukoa haneanagino mukia kanafina tamakaila tamaya hisia yaene mukia veamogamina amaya hisia yamaaene kosa helamatesia yana alu ya alu yana tamamigahie.
Naama hisia yafena Anumaya Koti avopina mage huno kae-maleneane
“Nagoa veamoya afeno yaamima omalenesia veamogamina amamite amamite hisageno fatago kavaamimoa hanege hanege huno agola hanegahie.” huno kae-maleneane.

Anumaya Kotia avina yana tamigeno anifiti nena hutegeno kavela falote higeno nelamino vayama kaitama amaya hisaya yana kasagoya tamamisigetama tamahau hutama vayama kaisayana fatago kavatamimoa ala hugahie.
Anumayamoa mukia yana tamamisigetama mukia kanafina veala amamigahae. Amamisayafene hutama tagai tayapi malenesageta ani veamogamina amamisuna yateti Anumaya Kotina musena hutegahae.
Yisasina amakua aminaya veamogamina kosa heoamatea yama amamiyanagi ani yamaagelomagi ani kavama haya yafena tusiya huya Anumaya Kotina musena hutegahae.

“Kalaisi kanale mono kea havita lagupi malenone.” hutetama ani kea kanaleya hutama akave maletama vaya kaikai nehutama amakaiene nagoa veanene amaya hutama amave-lisageya “Tamage Anumayamo akave nehae.” huya Anumaya Koti agia alisaga hugahae.
Alisaga hisageno Anumaya Kotia tusiya huno kayone hulamatesia yafe amakesa haviya tamakaifena aluya huno nehamainageya “Anumayamoa nagoene tamaya hisie.” huya nunamuna hugahae.
Anumaya Kotia tusiya huno kayone hulateno laminea kanohena hanaa huta musena hisune. Ani yafe Anumaya Kotifena tusiya huta musena hutesune huna nehue.

Nagoa vayamoya nagaifena mage huya nehae “Poloa alulema mainenoa tagaifena tokiyaage ke nehianagi tagai taulema emaiyana koli huno kea nohie.” huya nehayanagi nagaya Polona musetami nehugi Kalaisia ako huno kayone humainea avamete huna ako huna kayone kefiti mage huna tamahavi-negoe.

Tamakaya mainesalema uvayi hisuana tokiyaage ke huyafenagi menima omenesule ali fatago hiho. Ali fatago ohisayana nagoa veamoya nagaifena “Mopafi veamoya nehaya avamete kava nehie.” huya haya veamogamina nagayama vinunahena ani veafena tokiyaage ke hugahue huna nehue.
Tamage tagaya mopafi vaya mainonanagi Sataniene tuma hunana atafa laipa akave maleta tua nohune.
Mopafi mainaya veamoya kame hugahe nehaya avamete huta ati kevea alita kamea nohunagi Anumaya Kotia agaia tokiya ago tamineanagita Satani tokiya yamaa ali haviya huta neagasone.

Satanina agaseta Anumaya Kotifena havigema huneataya kemona ali haviya huteta veamoya amakaiami amaugafama aliya haiteya “Anumaya Koti kema ohavigahune.” huya nehaya kemona agaseta hu-mainona keleti amakaiami amaku amakesa Kalaisi aiyafinaga agai kema akave hisayafe amatenone.
Amatenonafe tamakaya tamakua aiyahae hutama mukia Kalaisi kea akave malesageta kema neatagaya veala anonaamia anamigahune.
Tamakaya amega yate neagae. Nagoa veamoya “Tagaya tamage huta Kalaisi veane mainone.” huya hisayana nagaienena ania huna Kalaisina agai kano mainoa yafena lamakesa havi havi hutama maiho.

Tagaya kavatami mainonafe tamakua ali lokiya vailama-tesunafene huno Anumayamoa tagaila hulatene. Tamakua ali haviya hisunafene huno huotatenegi Anumayamoma hulatenea yafe tusia muse huna veala hamanepauva yafena nagayea ohugahie.
Nagayama kae-maloa avona kolinia hisaya kea huna avopina okaenoe.
Nagoa veamoya nagaifena mage nehae “Poloa avoma kaeno lahapaiyana tokiyaage huno keanelama-kianagi tagai taulema neenoa fulu fulu kano emaineno koliti huno afa ke maino nehie.” huya nehae.
Naa kema nehaya veala mani kea haviho. Avopitima hua kene navayafitima hua kenena nagoke augafa avamete ke haneanagina ani kavala hugahue.

Hugahuanagi ani veamoya nagoamogamina maiya auavaami ageteya “Naa nehaya veane mainagi nagai auava yamoa amakaila amakasena mainoe.” huya nehayanagi kanale amaku amakesa omalene. Omaleneanagina nagaya “Amakaya maiya auava yamona ago amakasena kanaleya huna mainoe.” huna hisuo? “Ifi nagaila ago nagaseya kanaleya huna mainae.” huna hisue? Naa avamete kavala ohugahue.
Anumaya Kotia alisuna aliyana ago tamiteno ani aliyate tavalegeta tamakaitegama onana anima taminea aliyakeya nealita tagia alisaga hugahunanagi nagoa aliyafena tagia alisaga ohugahune.

Ohugahunagi nagoa veanea omenageta tagaya hagoteta Kalaisifena kanale mono kea tamakaila tamahapai-mainonafe menia ani aliyafena muse nehugi Anumaya Kotia otaminesia aliyafena tagia alisaga ohugahune.

Alu vayamoyama agoma ali-mainesaya aliyafena “Tagaiti ali-mainona aliyane.” huta tagia alisaga nohunagi Yisasife havitama tamakupi malenaya yamoa ala huno tokiyaage hisigetama tamakaipina nagoene Yisasi mono kea tamahapaisunageno aliyatimoa ala hisie huta tametitia nehune.
Naa hisigeta kotamia agaseta alu kote kote vaiyeta Anumayamo kema ohavinesaya veamogamina mo hamapaisuna yafe nelahaiye. Alu vayamogami aliyatela tagia alisaga hisuna yafena notahaiye.
Anumaya Koti avopina mage huya humainayane
“Nago kanomoa agima alisaga hugahena Anumayamo agigeya alisaga hino.” huya kae-malenayane.

Nago kanomoa “Kanale kavakeya nehua kano mainoe.” huno hisia kanomona Anumayamo aulela agia omalenegi Anumayamoa agaia nago kanomofena “Kanale kavakeya nehia kanoe.” hunoma hisigenoa tamagelafa huno Anumayamo aulela agimoa hanegahie.
Ako hutama natalenetama mani kea haviho. Afaa osia aifo ke kana ke hugahugi ako hutama maiya avamete nagoene maiho.

Anumayamoa tamakaifema agesa nehavia avamete huna havi kapi ovisaya yafe nagesa kumoa tusiya huno nehie. Nagi nagola hage-malenea munala alu vemoa avayu hia yafe amona nefaa tusia agaye nehia avamete huna nagaya Kalaisina alu aotage veanea maisae huna kava yagainelamatoe.

Osifavemoa savalema huno Ivina ayevataga humainea avamete huya nagoa vayamoya ayelama-vatagama hisagetamahena tamakesa ali fatago hutama Kalaisi akavema nevaletila agai katela neataletama tole lamakesa havitama Kalaisina tamakavenoma hutesaya yafena nagaila tusiya huno nagesa kumoa nehie.

Yisasifena ago tamahapai-mainoa kea nagoa vayamoya nohagi Yisasifena havigea alu kema me lamahanepaiyana tamakaya “Tamage nehae.” hutama aupaa amakave nemalae. Nemalayanagi tagaya “Alu Aotage Avamula tamakupi emaigahie.” huta nehunanagi amakaya haya kemoa mage hae “Alu kanomo avamula tamakupi emaine.” huya hagetama aupaa muse nehutama tusia havi kava nehae.
Anima havige huya ayemavataga haya vayamoya tamage huya nagaila onagasenae.
Aupa aupa kema hisua tokiyania omalegi aluya huna nagu nagesaene kano mainena mukia kanafina kanale kava huna mukia yana mukia veamogami amaufina kea huhalena nehugetama nehaviye.

Anumaya Koti kanale mono kema tamahapauvana “Nagoa monea namiho.” huna ohunoe. Tamavalesaga hisugetama tamakaya anale maisaya yafe nagainia ako huna mai kayone huna nayapiti aliyana ali-mainoe. Aniama huana kefo ya humaino?

Tamakai tamaya huna mono aliyana nealugeya alu kumate maineya Yisasina amakua aminaya veamoya nagaila naya huya monea naminae. Namigena ani monea alina musufayama nehia kanomo nehia auava kavala humaino?

Tamakaipina aliyama aluana nagoa yaniama omalegena “Monea namiho.” huna tamahaviokenogi Masetoniati aya vayamoya mukia yana naminae. Hagotenama havimainoa nagesa haenagaa ania huna tamakaifena “Monea namiho.” huna ohugahue.

Kalaisi kelamage kemoa nagupima haneafene huna tamagea nehue. Monema oalina afa aliyama nealua yafena tusia muse nehuafe nagola Akaiya kotega mainaya veamoya ani musema nehua yamoa kania tileonategahae.
Naa higena ani kavala nehue? Miya oalua yafe tamakaifena nonahaiyo? Aao tamakaifena nahau nayamopafima nenahaiya yana Anumaya Kotia ago age-maine.
Havigema tamahanepaiya vayamoya amakima aliya haigahena “Poloma nehia kava nehune.” huya hu-mainesaya kea ohavisaya yafe nagaya humainoa kavala huge huge huna tamakaipitila monea oaligahue.
Ani vayamoya havigegeya nehageya veamoya “Kalaisi Aposolo vaya mainae.” huya hulatesayafene huya Aposolo vaya kana nehuya veala ayemavataga nehae.
Naama hayana amakaiami-omagi Satania agaia hale yapima nemaiya ensole vaya kana huno ali hapaeteno veamogamina ayemavataga nehie.
Satani ani kavala nehigeya agaia aliya vayamoya ania huya fatago yamo aliya vaya kana huya aliya hapaesayana tamakaya atalia ohiho. Haenagaa ani kavama nehaya yamona kefo miyana anonaamia aligahae.
Nagoene tamahanepauve nagima alina hauva yafena nagoa veamogatama nagaifena “Agaya aifo kano maine.” hutama ohiho. Ani kema hinutamahena natalegena osi kanoa afaa nagima alina haisua kea haviho.
Ani nagima alina haisua kea Anumayamoa “Mage huka huo.” huno ohunea kea nagainia anegi nena aifo vaya kana huna mani kea nehue.
Mukia ma mopafi veamoya havigu kema nehuya amakaiami amakima alisaga nehaya kava huna nagaini nagia alisaga huna mani kea tamahapaigahue.
Tamakaila kelamama-kina mage huna nehue tamakaya kanale havi haviyatamima hanea veamogatama naa higetama aifonafo vayamogami kea nehaviye?

Ani vayamoya “Tagai aliya vaya maiho.” huya hagetama amakavela nemalae. Tamakaipitila monea nealiya tamakaila aliya haviya hu nelamateya amakaiami amaugafa aliya nehaiya tamakaifena “Afa vaya mainae.” huya haya kehena kea ohutama amatalageya ani kavala maiya nehae.

Ani kavama haya kavala nagaya naa nohuafe havi kava nehuo? Nagaifena “Tokiyaa omale.” hutama nehao? Ani kema haya yafena nagayea nehugi nagoa vayamoya amakaiami amaki alisaga hisaya kea nehayanagi nagayaenena ania augafa kea huna aifo vaya kana huna mani kea hugahue.

Ani vayala Hipalu vayama maisayana nagayaenena ania huna Hipalu kano mainoe. Amakaya Isaleli veamogami mono kema havisayana nagayaenena ania huna Isaleli veamogami mono kea nehavue. Amakaya Apalahamu aginagomoya mainesayana nagayaenena ania huna Apalahamu aginagomona mainoe.

Amakaya Kalaisina aliya vayaama mainesayana nagaya amakaila amakasena tusiya huna Kalaisi aliyana nealue. Avonio nagima alisaga hua kea aifo ke kana ke nehue. Amakasena nagaya tusiya huna Anumayamo aliyana nealue. Amakasena kasagoya kanafina kina nopina mainoane. Kasagoya kanafina kayo kevea naminayanagi amakaila osia amaminae. Nagaya kasagoya kanafi falisua kavala huanagi amakaya nagayama hua kavala ania huya ohunae.
Yuta vayamoya faefua (5) kanafi alu ikate alu ikate teti naenia (39) haifula naminae.

Tagufa (3) kanafi kayo kevea naminae. Nago kanafi yafa kayotetila nahae-mainae. Tagufa (3) kanafi tipi kalefina mainogeno timoa ai kalato kalato huno nahaesia kavala humaine. Ani tipi kalemoa kofa-nafa huno haviya higena nago yosa atupale atafa hulina nago kanaene kegeene felugaene tipina mainoane.

Mukia kanafina vaiyatete nehugeno nahaesia kavakeya falote hunatene. Timoa hogino nahaesia kavaene musufaya nehaya vayamoya nahaesaya kavaene nagai anagamoya, Yuta vayaene, Yuta vea omainaya vayaene nahaesaya kavakeyana hunatenae. Ala kumate mainogeyaene kame kotega mainogeyaenena ali haviyana hunatenae. Tipi kalefima umainoana nahae-mainae. “Negafugata mainone.” huya havige nehaya vayamoyaene nahaegahena humainae.
Tusia aliyama aluana nafia nelegena kasagoya kanafina naula ofaena nagala neleno tifeenena nage-maine. Kasagoya kanafina kavefeene kenanienefena omalegeno yasimoa nahaigena havi no mainoe.
Amega naugafamo kana yaene mukia kanafina Yisasife haviya elitaluma nehaya veamogamina kava yagaisua yafena nagesa havi havi nehugeno nagesa kumoa nehie.

Ani veapina nagoa veamogamina hamao otage fatage higena amakaifena nahauna humatenoe. Nagoa veamoya veamogamifena “Kefo yana hiho” huya hageya Anumayamo katela neataleya kefo yama hagena naipamoa ata lemaine.
Nagia alina haisua nagesama havisugenoa nago yafena fulu fulu kano mainoa yafe tamave-ligahue.
Anumayatia, Yisasina Nefaa, Anumaya Kotina, vayamoya agola agai agia alisaga huge huge hisaya kanomo aufina nagaya havigea huna nohue.

Nagaya Tamasigasi kumate mainogeno sauve kanomo agia Aletasae kava kanoamona hutegeno natafa hisaya yafe “Katela yagaiho.” huno higeya yagaiya maiyanagi vayanimoya kupi nasaga huya nateya ani kumamona tokiyaage kegiya akalogapiti nofi aliya ayeteya ali kaleyo nehagena falena ayenefe huna umainoe.
Nagaini nagima alisaga hisuana naya ohugahigi alu katela omaleneanagina nago kene tamahapaigahue. Anumayamoa himona kana yapi naveli-mainea kea tamahapaisue.

Navelia yamoa fotinia (14) kafu nagasetegena ani kavafena tamahapaigahe hue. Ani kanafina Kalaisiene ailokaena mainoanagino Anumaya Kotia ikapinaga navalegena hauvana nagu nameene haimainesuo naugafaene haimainesuo nagaya ohavinoe. Anumaya Kotia agaiage havimaine.
Havimainegi ikapinaga navalegenama hai-mainoa yafena havilinoe. Nagu nameke hai-mainesuo ifi naugafamoene hai-maineo ohavinogi Anumaya Kotike haviline.
Ikapinaga hai-vayi hutena alua augafa avamete kea havitena ani augafa kea ma mopafi veamoya ohaleasinagi nagalu hu-malenea kea humaine.
Kanale muse yamaa navelia yafena muse nehuna mani kea hugahuanagi nagainia nagia alina ohaigahue. Tokiyania omalegeno naya humaineafe muse nehuna tamahanepauve.

Tamage nagaya nagia alina haisua kema hisua nagesama havuleasina havigu-nagu kea ohugahuanagina tamage huna huleasinagi ani kea ohugahue. Veamoya ani kea haviteya “Naa augafa kano maine.” huya hisaya yafena nonahaigi nemauva auavaniene nagai kema havisaya yafeene musena hisae huna nehue.

Anumayamoa tusia kanale yakeyama naveligena agoa yafena Anumayamoa mage hie “Havigu kaugafa alika haiyafene.” huno nekaya akoya kana yamoa naugafafina malegeno nagata aiye. Ani kana yamoa Satanipiti falote higeno namineanagina naugafa alina ohaisuafene huno nagata yana namine.
Nagatama aiya yamoa fanane hisia yafe tagufa (3) yupa Anumayamotega havige-mainoe.

Havigogeno kenonania mage huno nahapaiye “Ani yamoa hano ohugahie. Nagaya kayone yanialeti kaya hisugeno kosa hegatesigeka aliyakaa afaa aligane. Kayamufa omaleneafe tusia tokiyania falote hugategahie.” huno higena ani kema havuafena nayamufa omalegeno Kalaisia tokiya namigena musena humainoe.

Kalaisifena nagesa havina aliyamaa nealuafe nayamufa omalegeya nagai nagia hu-haviya nehao kana yama falote hunateo ifi Yisasi kema nehua yafe nagaila ali haviya hunenatao havi no maisuo ani yamoma falote hia yafena naipamoa haviya ohugahianagina afaa muse hugahue. Nayamufa omalegeno Anumayamoa tokiyaama naminea yafena tusia muse nehue.

Tamakaya havi kava hutama nagai nagima alisaga ohayafene huna nagainia nagia alisaga nehuna aifo vaya kana nehue. Anima havigegeyama huya mono kema tamahanepaiya vayafena tamakaya “Kanale vaya mainae.” hutama nehayanagi nagaya afa ya kana kano mainoanagi ani vayamoya tamage huya nagaila onagasenae.
Onagasenagi tamage nagaya Aposolo kano mainoafe tamakaiene mainena ako huna tokiyaage avame yana hugetama “Tamage Aposolo kano maine.” hutama nage-mainae.

Nage-mainetamagi tamakaya mage hutama nehae “Alu Anumayamo anagama kava neyagaiya avamete huno tagaila kava nohie.” hutama nehao? Aao, nagoke avamete huna kava yagainelamatoe. Tamakaipina nagoke yana alu kavala humainoe “Monea namiho.” huna oalinoa yafena “Havi kava hie.” hutama nehao? Ifi hanageke yama hu-mainesuana afaa aigenatetama atalenateho.

Nagi tole kanale mo lamake-mainogi menia tagufa (3) molia kanale nagoene mo lamakesuafene huna nehuanagi tamakaipitila nagoa yana oaligahue. Tamakai monehena nonahaiye afaa tamakayama Yisasina tamakua amisaya yafe nenahaiye. Nafanemoya ita-afoamimogamife huya monea alitalu huteya kave amamisaya aliyana omalenegi ita-afoamimoyage nafaneamihena huya monea halaya huteya kavela neamamiya yane. Nagaya ania huna nelamafana mainoanagina “Nafanenimogatama monea namiho.” huna ohugahue.

Nagaya tamaya hisugetama Yisasina tamakua amisayafene huna mukia moneniene tokiyaniene atalegahue. Atalesuaamoma nafima lesiana kanalele. Tamakaifena tusiya huno nahau nayamopafina nenahaiyanagi tamakaya nagaifena tamahau tamayamopafina notamahaiyo? huna nehue.
Nagoa veamoya nagaifena mage nehae “Tamage Poloa fufu yatela tagai monea noaligi savalekeya huno havigegeya nehuno falakino kesi monetia nealie.” hutama nehae.
Nehayanagi nagaya hanaa huna ayelamavataga nehue? Nagoa vayala humatogeya ayelamavataga huya tamakai monea aliya me naminao? Aao ani kavala ohunae.

Tamakaya mainalega Taitasiene nago tafu-taganaene “Vio.” huna hunatogeana umainae. Taitasia mo ayelama-vataga huno tamakai monea ali-maineo? Aao Taitasiene nagaiene nago avamete hutaa kanale taagesale mainetaa aliyana nealue.

Tamakaya manima kae-maloa kehena mage hutama nehao? “Tagai taufina agi alisaga nehie.” hutama nehao? Aao Anumaya Koti aufina Kalaisiene ailokaena mainena mani kea nehue. Nahau nayamopafi nenahaiya nenafugatama Yisasife huna tamakua ali lokiya vailamatesua yafe mukia mani kea nehue.

Naafene koli nehuna ma nagesa nehavue havigu tamakaya mainesalega uvayi hisugetama onahaisia kavama hutama mainesayana naipa haviya hutena kelamama-kisugetama nagaifena tamaipa haviya hinagetama havigu ke vaitama tamaipa ali haviya hisaya yamoa tamahaivai yana falote hisigetama vaya okai yama hisagenoa tamakaitami tamaugafahekeya tamakesa havitetama alu kanomo agia ali haviya nehutama veafema havige nehaya kava hutama ala tamaki alitetama kefo yama hisaya yafenagina koli nehuna mani avona kaena nelamamue.

Havigu tamakaya mainesalega uvayi hisugeya oniyaage kefo kavaene moli huliteya nehuya kumai he kavaene age hamaye huya kumai nehaya kavaenema nayoma nehaya veamoya amakua aiyahae ohuya ani kavakeya nehisagena me neamakesugeno tamakai tamaufi Anumaya Kotia nagaye hisifa yana namisigeno naipamoa haviya hisia yafena tusiya huna koli nagesa nehavue.

Tole yupa tamakaya mainalega umainoanagi menia tagufa (3) molia kanale nagoene visue huna nehue. Nago kanomoa kefo yama hisigena kaiyekema hutesuana tole (2) vayalo tagufa (3) veamoyao humainesia yama ageteya hufalote hisayana kanalelagina kaiyekea hutegahue.

Agoma tamakaienema mainena humainoa kea menia alule mainena mani kea nagoene hulokiya vaina lamahanepauve. Haenagama tagufa (3) molia kanale tamakaya mainesalegama esua kanafina kefo yama humainaya veanene nagoa veamoya kefo yama nehaya veanenena kaiyekea humatetena anonaamia amamigahue.

Tamakaya nagaifena “Kalaisi hapaiya ke nehio ifi agesafiti ke nehie?” hutama nehayanagi nagaya kefo yama nehaya vayafena tokiyaage ke huna me kemama-kisugetama nenagetama “Tamage Kalaisiteti tokiyaage kea nehie.” hutama hugahae. Tamage Kalaisia tamakaipima aliyama ali-maineana fulu fulu kanoa omainegi tokiyaaleti aliyamaa ali-maineane.

Tamage Kalaisia fulu fulu veane mainaya avamete huno maigeya yafaga yosalela nili heya asaigeno fali-maineanagi menia Anumaya Koti tokiyaleti hetino maine. Tagayaenena fulu fulu veane mainonanagi Kalaisiene ailokaeta mainonageno Anumaya Kotia tokiyaa lamigeta agaiene maineta agai tokiyaleti tamaya nehune.

Tamakaya tamakaitami lamakua agelama hutama lamakupi malenaya kea atafa hulitama mainao? Yisasi Kalaisia tamakupima mainea yafena havilinao? Tamakupima omainesiana agaia veala tamagelafa hutama omainae.
Tamakua agelama hutetama ania hutama tagaila tagelama hutama lageho “Kanale kava nehae.” hutama hisaya yafe nenahaiye.

Nenahaiyafe “Kefo yana ohisae.” huna nunamuna nehue. Tamakaya kanale kava hisageya nagoa veamoya nelamakeya “Poloa kanale aliya nealie.” huya hisayafene huna nunamuna nohugi tamakaitamia kanale kava hutama maisae huna nunamuna nehue. Nagoa vayamoya tagaifena “Anumayamo kea nehuya havi aliya nealiye.” huya hisayana kanalele.
Anumaya Koti kelamage kemoa “Ohiho.” huno humainesia kea ohugahunagi agai kea akave malesuna vaya mainone.
Tayamufa omalenagetama tamakaya mai lokiya vaitama mainesaya yafena muse nehune. Fatago hutama tokiyaage hisae huta nunamuna nehune.

Tamakaya mainalega uvayima hisuana havigu Anumaya Kotima naminea tokiyaleti kelamama-kiyafene huna menia alule mainena mani avona kaena nelamamugi tamakua aiyahae hiho. Anumaya Kotima naminea tokiya tamakaila alino haviya hulamatesia yafe onaminegi tamakaila tamakua alina tokiya vailamatesuafe namine.

Nafunagana-gatama nagaya hua kemoa hano hugahe hue. Fatago hutama maisaya yafena tamakesa havi havi hutama nagayama nehua kea havilama hiho. Nagoke tamaku tamakesale kea ovaitama tamaipamo falu nehinagetama maiho. Naa nehisageno hau ayamopafi nehainageno kanale falu yamona aepaamoa Anumaya Kotia tamakaiene maigahie.
Tamakaya nagoke nagokemo-gatama tamayana oami aami hutama maiho. Mukia Anumaya Koti anagala nagaiene maineya tamakaifena “Felugae.” huya hu falu fala hunelamatae.

Anumayati Yisasi Kalaisia kayone hulamatesia yamaa tamaminageno Anumaya Kotia tamakaifena hau ayamopafi nehainageno Alu Aotage Avamumoa tamakaiene tokaeno maisigetama nagopi maisae huna nunamuna nehue.
Kenia male hano hie.
Nagaini nagia Polonae.

Nagaya Polonae Aposolo kanomona mani avona kae-malenoe. Yisasi aliya alisua yafe vayamoya hu onatenagi Yisasima fali-mainefiti ali hetitenea Anumaya Kotia, Nelafaene Yisasi Kalaisiene hunataagena Yisasi mono kea huhalena nehue.
Nagaienema tokaeya mainaya nafunaganayaene Kalesia kotega Anumaya Koti anagafe Felugae. huya hu falu fala hulamatagena mani avona negaove.
Anumaya Kotia, Nelafaene Yisasi Kalaisia, Anumayatimoene kayone yamaa tamamisaageno tamaipamoa falu hisie huna nehue.

Meni kanafina mukia veanemogata kefo kavama maita nehuna yamo nofila hulatenegeno ani kefo yapiti tagu tamena aligatisuafene huno Yisasia Anumaya Koti Nelafana haiya kava huno tagaya kefo yapi mainonageno Yisasia alino kalu helategahe agesa havino agaia augafa hakino falimaine.
Naama humaineafene huta Anumaya Koti agia alisaga hisunageno agaia tokiyaa hale yamaamoa hanege hanege huno haneme haisie. Tamage.
Kalaisia kayone yamaaleti agaitegama visaya yafene huno Anumaya Kotia ke higetama agaitega vayanagi aupaa agaila neataletama alu mono kema haviya yafena nagaila tusiya huno namayoa neaiye.

Tamage, mani kea alu Yisasife kanale mono kea omalegi nagoa vayamoya Yisasima hulatenea kanale mono kea aliya aiyahae huya huhaviya nehuya alu mono kema tamahanepaigeno tole tamaku tamakesama lamamiya ali haviya hunelamatae.

Huhaviya hunelamatagi Yisasia hulatenea kanale mono kema tamahanepauva kemoa tamageage nehigi haviho. Tagayafi ensole vayamoyafi tamahapaisaya kemoagi nago avamete ohisigeno alu mono kema tamahapaisayana Anumaya Kotia ani vayamogamina hai vaimateno haniki-mainea yapi amatesie huna nehue.

Nayoma tamahapai-mainoa kea etena nagoene menia tamahanepauve. Nagoa vayamoya Yisasima hulatenea kanale mono keama tamahapai-mainoa kanale mono kea ago alitama tamakupi malenaya kema tamahaopaiya alu mono kema tamahapaisaya vayala Anumaya Kotia hai vaimateno haniki-mainea yapi amatesie huna nehue.

Naane hutama tamakesa nehaviye mani kema nehua kea vayamoya haviya muse hunatesae huna mani kea nehufi? Ifi Anumaya Kotia havino Kanale ke nehane. huno muse hunatesiafene huna hugetama nehavifi? Nayoma humainoa kavala veamoya ageteya muse hisaya yafe nenahaigi menia Muse hugahae. huna nohue. Veamoya Kanale kava nehie. huya hunatesaya yafema nahaileasina nagaya Kalaisi aliya kanoa omauleasine.
Nafunagana-gatama tamahanepaugi haviho. Nayona Yisasima hulatenea kanale mono kema tamahapai-mainoana vayamogami amaku amakesafitila ali falote humainaya kea ohunoe.
Nagaya nagoa vayapitila mani mono kea oalinoe. Nagoa vayamoya hu naveligena mani mono kea oalinogi Yisasi Kalaisia agaia mani mono kea hu naveligena havitena tamahanepauve.
Nayona nagaya Yuta veamogami mono ke havitena akave malena Anumaya Koti anagala nahauna hu oamatena hamae hano hugahe aluya huna ali haviya hu neamatoa navagea ago havimainae.
Nagai aunale vayala ago amakasena Yuta veamogami monola ali hipoya huna tusia aliya nealina taginagomoyama humainaya auava kavala havilama hulinena akave malenoane.
Akave malenoanagi itanimoa onatenegeno Anumaya Kotia aliyamaa alisuafene huno agaia kayone yamaaleti nagaila ago hapali-nateneane.

Nagaila ago hapali-nateno Isaleli veane omainaya veamogamina Yisasi mono kema hamapaisanafene huno nafanea nagaini naulagale avaleno efalote higena aepaama agetena havitena hua yafe ma mopale veamogamina Naane ke havilinoe? huna mo hamavi-okenoe.
Hamavi-okenogi Yelusalemua hagoteya nagaseya Aposolo vaya mainaya vayatela mani kehena me hamavi-okenogi Alepia kotega umaigena etena Tamasigusia emainoe.
Emauvana tagufa (3) kafu mai hano hutena Yelusalemu haina Pitaene kea kea hugahe fifitinia (15) yupa agaienena mainoe.
Mainena Yisasina aganaamo agia Yemesie agaiage mainegena age-mainogi nagoa Aposolo vayala oamakenoe.
Nagaya mani kema negaova kea Anumaya Koti aulagafi tamage huna havigea nohue.
Yelusalemua neatalena alu kumate kumate faete faete hume vuaamona Silia kotegaene Silisia kotegaene haimainoe.
Ania huna neogeya Yutia kaiyaga Yisasi anaga mainaya anagamoya nagai naugosa onagenae.

Naugosa oageya nagaifena mage huya havimainae Nayona Yisasife havita tagupi maleta tametiti nehuna veamogatina kayo keve nelamia kanomoagi menia kanaleya huno Yisasima hulatenea kanale mono kea huhaleno nehie. huya hageya havimainae.
Ani kea haviteya Anumayamona naguama aminoa yafena Anumaya Koti agi alisaga humainae.
Fotinia (14) kafu maitena Yelusalemua Panapasiene etetaama elavuana nago kanomo agia Taitasie taavagi higetaa elavi-mainoe.

Anumayamoa nahapaigena elavina monote kava vayamoya kema hisua kehena havigu havige nehie huya hisagena kema hisua kemoa afa ya kana hu yafene huna Yisasima hulatenea kanale mono kea Isaleli vea omainaya veamogami hamanepauva yafena monote kava vayala amakaiamige mainalega mo hamapai-mainoe.

Nagayama avalena emainoa kanoa Taitasie kanomofe Yuta anagamo-gatama avame yatia huta tagoya anoya laga nehuna kava huta Taitasi augafa laga hiho. huya hayanagi Taitasia agaya Isaleli veane omainea kanoe Kaliki kanoma maineafene huya ani kea hayanagi mono kava vayamoya Ataleo huya hageta afaa mainone.

Nagoa vayamoya havige huya Tagaya Yisasi kea alita lagupi malenona vaya mainone. huya kesi ke huteya tagai amunopi hai faleya maineya Mosese kahegi kemo akave maleho. huya nehagi ani kahegi kemoa nofi hu nelataya kava huno haneanagi Yisasi Kalaisienema tokaeta mainona yafe ani nofima hulatenaya nofila ago alino kalu helategeta kanaleya huta mainonagi ani vayayagamoya Etetama ani nofipi maiho. huya hugahe emainae.
Hayanagi Yisasima hulatenea kanale mono kema havilama hutama akave malege malege hisayafene huta amakai kea tamage huta ohavitafa nehuta Taitasi augafa taga ohunone.

Ohunonagi ani kema hamapai-mainoa vayafena Kava vaya mainae. huya hayanagi anima haya kavala afa ya hane huna nagesa nehavue. Anumaya Kotia amega taugafahena agesa nohavigi taguahekeya agesa havi nelamie. Ani kava vayamoya kea nahapaiyanagi haegafa kea nahaopainae.

Naha-opainagi amakesa mage huya haviye Isaleli veane omainaya veapi Yisasima hulatenea kanale mono kea hamapaisie huno Anumayamoa Polona hutegeno umainegi Yuta veama Yisasia hulatenea kanale mono kea hamapaisiafene huno Anumayamoa Pitana hutegeno umaine. huya agemainae.

Anumaya Kotia tokiyaaleti Pitama Yuta vayapima Yisasi kema hamapaisiafene huno hamae-mainea kava huno Anumaya Kotia tokiyaaleti nagaila Isaleli vea omainaya veapi Yisasima hulatenea kanale mono kema hamapaisuafene huno nahanemaeye.

Monote ala kava vaya mainae. huya humatenaya vayala Yisasina aganaamoa Yemesiene Pitaene Yoniene mani kea haviteya Tamage nehane. Anumayamoa mani aliyana kamiteno kayone yamaaleti kaya nehie. huya hageta tagua ali nagopi maleneta Tanakaya Isaleli vea omainaya veapi aliyana molio. Tagaya Yuta vayapi aliyana aligahune. huya huteya amayana Panapasiene taaminae.

Naa huteya nago kea mage huya hae Yuta veamogami amunoamifima afenoamima omalenesia veala kanale kava hutana amaya hio. huya hayanagi nagaya mani yafena nagesa ago nehavina aluya huno nenahaigena tokiyaage aliya alimainoane.
Pitaa Atioku emaineno havi kavama humainea yafena vaya amaufi kea amaki-mainoe.

Yemesi anagala falote ohunageno hagoteno Pitaa Yisasina amakua aminaya veala, Isaleli vea omainaya veanene, kanaleya huno kavela neneno mainegeya Yemesi mainelegati nagoa vayala evayi hageno Pitaa ma agesa havie Aao humainaya yana neatalena Isaleli vea omainaya veanene, amakoya anoya taga ohunaya vayaene, kavela nenoa yafena ke namakisafi. huno Isaleli vea omainaya veala neamataleno aluale umaineno kavela nemaine.

Nenegeya mukia Yisasina amakuama aminaya Yuta veamoya ania huya amakuafina havi omaleya amegati nehaviya yafe amataleya amahaote mo nemainae. Naa nehageno Panapasia amegatima haya kavala ageteno agaienena ani kavakeya humaine.

Higena Yisasima hulatenea kanale mono kea, kelamage fatago huno hanea katela ovagena agetena ani yateti mukia veamogami amaufi Pitana hapauve Pitagae kagaya Yuta nofi kano mainananagi Isaleli vea omainaya veanemoya nehaya kava huka Isaleli vea omainaya veaenena kavela neneka Yuta vayamoya nehaya kavala nohane. Naa higeka menia kagaya Isaleli vea omainaya veafena Yuta vayamoya nehaya kavala hiho. huka kahegi nemalane?
Itatimoya Yuta anegiya latageta tagaya Yuta anaga mainone. Mainonagi Isaleli vea omainaya veala kefo kava nehaya veane omainone.

Omainonagi nagoa veamoya Mosese kahegi kemona akave malesaya yateti Anumaya Kotia neageno Fatago veane mainae. huno hu oamatenegi Yisasi Kalaisife haviya amakupi maleya amametiti nehisamogamife Anumaya Kotia Fatago veane mainae. huno hunelate. Tagayaenena Yuta anagamogata Yisasife havita lagupi maleta tametiti humainonafe Anumaya Kotia Fatago veane mainae. huno hulatene. Tagaya ago nehavune mani kavatetikeya Anumaya Kotia Fatago veane mainae. huno hulategahigi Mosese kahegi kemona akave malesaya yafe Anumaya Kotia nagoa veafe Fatago veane mainae. huno hu oamategahie.

Anumaya Kotia takaifena Fatago veane mainae. huno hulatesiafene huta Yisasi Kalaisiene ailokaeta maineta agaite tametitima hisunana nagoa veamoya tagaifena Kefo kava nehaya veane mainae. huya hisagenofena Yisasi Kalaisia alino Kefo kava hiho. huno hisifi? Aao ania augafa kavala ohutafa huno ohugahie.
Ohugahigi Mosese kahegi kema nayoma akave malenoa kavala ago neatalena menia Yisasife havina nagupi malenoe. huna nehuanagi nagaya etena maiyahae huna nayoma mainoa kate uleasina kefo kava huleasine.

Mosese kahegi kema ali hipoya hume hume nehauva yafena Fatago kanoe. huno hu onateleasine huna nehavugi fali-mainea kanomo augafa kava huna mani kehena nametitia nohue. Ani kahegi kemoa nahaegena falitogeno Anumaya Kotina haisia kava hisuafene huna kahema ki-malenea kehena nametitia nohue. Yisasia nagai kefo yamo anonaa aligahe higeya yafaga yosale heya asaigeno nagaifene huno fali-maineanagina nagaienena yafaga yosale nagaya asaina agaiene ago fali-mainoe.

Fali-mainoanagi nagoene nagainigela vaiyatete nohugi Yisasia nagupi mainegena ma mopale mainena Anumaya Kotina nafaneamoa nagaifena hau ayamopafi haigeno fali-maineafene huna havina nagupi malena nametiti nehuna haegafa huna vaiyatete nehue.

Mosese kahegi kemo akave malenona yafene huno Anumaya Kotia Fatago veala mainae. huno hulateleasina Yisasima fali-mainea yamoa afa ya kana hileasinagi Anumaya Kotia kayone hulatenea yateti Yisasia fali-maineanagina afa ya kana nehie huna nakavenona huoategahue.

Tamakaya aifonafo Kalesia veala tagaya Yisasina tamavelunagetama tamaulagafiti age-mainaya kava huno yafaga yosalela fali-mainea yafena tamakaila ago tamahapai-mainogi taya tamakaila aye lamavataga nehagetama Yisasi kea neatalae?

Nago yafe tamahavi-gegahugi nahapaiho Mosese kahegi kemo akave malaya yateti Alu Aotage Avamula tamakuafina emainefi ifi Yisasife havitama tamakupi maletama tamametiti haya yateti tamakuafina emaineo?

Ehema Yisasi kema havitama tamakupi malenaya kanafina Alu Aotage Avamumoa tamaya hianagi menia naa higetama anegi-nagia nehutama Tagaitigela Yuta veamoya nehaya kavaage nehuta fatago veane maigahune. hutama nehae?
Nayoma kana yama ali-mainayana afaa evayi humaine hutama nehafi? Aao afaa ali-mainae huna nagaya nagesa nohavue.

Mosese kahegi kemo akave malenaya yafe Anumaya Kotia agaia Alu Aotage Avamula lamamiteno tokiyaaleti avameyama humainea kavala alino falote humainefi? Ifi Yisasife havitama tamakupi maletama tamametiti haya yafe mani kavala hu-maineo? E, tamametiti hu-mainaya yafe humaine.
Anumaya Koti autamafina Apalahamufe mage huno humaine
Apalahamua Anumaya Kotife havino aguafi maleno ametiti higeno Anumaya Kotia Kagaya fatago kano mainane. huno huteneane. huno humaineane.
Ani yafe ageho Apalahamuma humainea kava huya Anumaya Kotife haviya amakupi maleya amametiti nehaya veala Apalahamu nafaneyaga mainae.

Anumaya Kotia nayona mage huno agesa havimaine Haenagaa Isaleli vea omainesaya veanemoya nagaifena haviya amakupi maleya amametiti hisayafe Fatago veane. huna humategahue. huno agesa haviteno kanale mono kea Apalahamuna hapai-maineanagino Anumaya Koti autamafina mage huya kae-maleneayane
Kagaitetifene huna mukia ma mopale veanea Anumaya Kotina muse yana amamitena ali kanale humategahue. huno higeya kae-malenayane.

Ani yafe Apalahamua Anumaya Kotife havino aguafi maleno ametiti higeno Anumaya Kotia ali kanale hutene. Nagoa veamoya Apalahamuma humainea kava huya Anumaya Kotife haviya amakupi malenaya veala Anumaya Kotia ali kanale hu neamate.
Anumaya Koti avopina mage huya kae-malenayane
Nagoa veamoya mukia kahegi kema akave omaleya nagoke ke kanoama aliya atagaesayana Anumaya Kotia hai vaimateno haniki-mainesia yapi amategahie. huya kae-malenayane.
Ani yafe nagoa veamoya mukiama Mosese kahegi kema akave omalesayana Anumaya Kotia havi kapi amavaleno amategahie.
Anumaya Koti avopina mage huya kae-malenayane
Fatago veane mainae huno humatenea veamoya Anumaya Kotife haviya amakupi maleya amametiti humainaya yateti mai kanale huya maigahae. huya kae-malenayane.
Ani kemoa maa huno fufute taveli-maine. Mosese kahegi kema akave malesagenofena Anumaya Kotia ageteno Fatago veane mainae. huno hu oamategahie.
Kahegi kemo akave malesuna yana Anumaya Kotife havita tametiti hisuna yana omalene. Aao, Anumaya Koti kefina mage huya kae-malenayane
Mosese kahegi kema mukia haviya akave malesaya veamoya ani keleti mai kanale huya maigahae. huya kae-malenayane.
Anumaya Koti avopina mage huya kae-malenae
Yafaga yosale asai-mainaya vayamoya Anumaya Kotia kayo keve amamisigeya faliteya haniki-mainea yapi ugahae. huya avona kae-malenae.

Mosese kahegi kema mukia akave nomalonafe nofipi maineta haniki-mainea yapi ugahunagi tagaiti ani kefo kava nehuna anonaa Yisasia alino yafaga yosale faliteno mani nofi ali kalu hetalesia yafe miya hutalene. Yafaga yosale asai-malenaya yafe Yisasife mage huya nehae Anumaya Kotia kayo keve amigeno faliteno haniki-mainea yapi ugahie. huya hu-mainae.

Humainagi Yisasia fali-mainea yateti Anumaya Kotia nayoma Apalahamuna muse yana aminea kavala Isaleli vea omainaya veane menia ani muse yana amamigeta tagaya Yisasife havita tagupi maleta tametiti nehuna yafe Anumaya Kotia Tamamigahue. huno humainea Alu Aotage Avamua taguafi tategeno maine.

Nafunagana-gatama Anumaya Kotima hulokiya vai-malenesia kemona nagoamogata nehuna augafa kava humainegi aepaa havisae. Nago kanomoa agesama havinofena Falisua yupa ma yana nafanenimoga aligane. huno aulaga age-maineno hulokiya vaino avopi kae-maleteno fali-mainesia kemona nagoa veamoya ali oatagaegahayanagiya nago kea moliya ohugahae. Anumaya Kotima hulokiya vai-malenea kemoa ani augafa kava humaine.

Anumaya Kotia Maa huna kamigahue. huno hulokiya vaino Apalahamuene aginagomoenefe humaine. Anima Anumaya Koti avopima kae-malenea kemoa Kaginagomogamifena nehunagi mukia veafeene nehue. huno ohunegi Nagoke kaginagomona amigahue. huno humaine. Anima humainea kanoa Kalaisife humaine.

Ani kemona aepaamoa maa humaine. Hagoteno Anumaya Kotia Apalahamufena Ma yana kamigahue. huno hulokiya vaiteno fo hataleti tetia (430) kafu eutegeno Mosese kahegi kemoa evayi higeya havimainayanagi mani kemoa hagoteno alino hagelafi-matenea kemona tamage huno ayehananeno oagasene.

Anumaya Kotia Apalahamufe Ma yana hugategahue. huno hulokiya vai-malenea kavala humaineanagi tagaya Mosese kahegi kema alita hipoya hisunana Anumaya Kotia Fatago veane mainae. huno hulategahie hutama hinutamahena havige nehae. Takaiti nehuna kavateti mani kea hulatene. huta nehunanagi Anumaya Kotia Nagainiage afaa hulamategahue. huno humaine.

Anima Kamigahue. huno hulokiya vai-malenea kema humaineana naa higeno nago kene, kahegi kea, huno falote huno tahapai-maine? Aepaa mage huno humaine tagayama kefo kavama nehuna yana taveligahe kahegi kea tamine. Apalahamuna aginagomofe huno hulokiya vaimalenea kema amisia kanoa Kalaisima evayi hisiana ani kahegi kemoa hano hugahie. Ani kahegi kea ensole vayamogamina hamapaigeya amakaya amunopi kanoa Mosesena hapaigeno veamogamina hamapai-maine.

Hamapaiyanagi amunoamifi mainea kanomoa aote aote mainaya vayamogami amunoamifi maineanagi nayona Anumaya Kotia hulokiya vaimalenea kema Apalahamuna hapaigahena nagoke kano hutegeno me haopainegi tusia ala kema hanea yafe Anumaya Kotia agaia nagoke kano maineanagino avate uno hapaimaine.

Anumaya Kotia Apalahamuna hulokiya vai kema hapaitegenoa haenaga Mosese kahegi kemoa efalote huteno hagote kea agaseno ali haviya humainefi? Aao, ani kavala ohune. Kahegi kema ali hipoya hisunafena Anumaya Kotia maige maige hisuna tahaimula tamileasinagi Fatago veane mainae. huno hulatesia kavala kahegi keletila falote hileasine ani keamoa maige maige hisuna tahaimula tamisia tokiyaa omalene.

Omaleneanagino Anumaya Koti avopina mage huno haneane mukia ma mopafi veamoya kefo kava maiya hageno amatafa huno nofila humatenegeno Yisasi Kalaisife haviya amakupi maleya amametiti hisayana Aligahae. huno hulokiya vaimalenea kema alisagenoa nofima humainaya nofila alikalu hetalegahie.

Yisasife havita tagupi maleta tametiti hisuna kema falote ohunea kanafina kahegi kemoa tusiya huno nofila hulateno kava yagai-lateneane. Anumaya Kotia Yisasife havita tagupi maleta tametiti hisuna kea fufute taveligeta ageteta nofi hulatenaya yana ago atalone.
Yisasi Kalaisia falote ohunea kanafina kahegi kemoa Kalaisife havita tagupi maleta tametiti hisunafe kava hulategeta tametiti nehuna yateti Anumaya Kotia Fatago veane mainae. huno hunelate.
Yisasife havita tagupi maleta tametiti nehuna kemoa ago efalote humaineafe menia kahegi kemoa kava yagai-nolate.
Tamakaya Yisasi Kalaisife havitama tamakupi maletama tamametiti haya yateti mukiamo-gatama Anumaya Koti nafaneyaga mainae.
Yisasi Kalaisiene alino ailokae-lamatesiafene huya tina fale-lamatenaya veamogatama taugafale kenama nefauna kava hutama Kalaisi auava yana alitama ano vailiho.

Kalaisiene tokaetama mainaya veala nagoke avamete hutama mainae. Yuta veanene Yuta vea omainaya veanene, nofipi maineya miya oali aliya veanene afa veanene, anene vene nagoke avamete hutama mainae. Menia Yisasi Kalaisiene ailokaetama mainayafe nagokepi ali konaga ayetama nagoke avamete mainae.
Mainayanagitama Kalaisi veane maisayana Apalahamuna agehoamogatama mainageno Anumaya Kotia Apalahamufema Hugategahue. huno hulokiya vaitenea yana aligahae.

Kenia mage huna nehue nefaa nemofofena Afeno yania kamigahue. huno hapali-teneanagino mukia nefa yana agaia yamaage hanegi osi nafanema mainea kanafina ani afeno yamaa oalinegi nefa aliya vaya kana huno maineane.
Osi nafanema mainea yafe kava vayamogami amayapi maineno afaa maime maime haino nefama humalenea kanale afeno yamaa aliteno agaia kava yagaigahie.
Tagayaenena ania huta hagoteta osi nafanema mainona kanafina ma mopafi kava nehaya Kefo Avamumogami auava yapi mainonageya nofi hulatenae.
Nofi hu-latenayanagi Anumaya Kotia humalenea kanamoa ago efalote higeno Anumaya Kotia nafanea hutegeno ma mopafi egeno nago amoa ategeno kahegi kea ali hipoya huno maineane.

Maineanagita tagayama, kahegi kemo nofipi mainona veanea nofipitila kalu helatesia miyama atalesiafene huno Kalaisia fali-maine. Anumaya Koti nafaneyaga maisunafene huno Yisasina hutegeno ma mopafina elavi-maine.
Tamakaya Anumaya Kotina nafaneyagaa mainayafene huno nafaneamona Alu Aotage Avamula hutegeno tagaila taguafina emaineno Anumaya Kotifena Nelahaiya Nelafaga mainane. huta hisuna tagesa nelamie.
Humaineafe kagaya nofipina nagoene omaigane. Aao. Menia Anumaya Kotia kavaleno agaia nafane kategeka mainane. Anumaya Koti nafane mainanafe Kamigahue. huno hulokiya vaimalenea yana aligane.
Hagotetama Anumaya Kotina oagenayanagitama afa yafe Anumayatimoe. hutama agisana vaimainaya yamoa nofi hu-lamategetama mainayane.

Mainayanagitama menia Anumaya Kotina ago age-mainae huna hisufi ifi Anumaya Kotia ago tamakelama humaine huna nehue. Vaeha namayo neaigi naa higetama maiyahae hutama etetama nayoma tamakinagomogami agisanama vai yamona tokiyaa omalenegi afa yamogamifena Amakia alisaga hisune. hutama nehae? Nagoene ani yamo nofipi maisaya tamakesa nehavifi?

Nehavitama Tagaya tagaiti kanale kava hisuna yafe Anumaya Kotia Fatago veane mainae. huno hulategahie hutama Yuta veamoya maifalu nehaya kanaene haegafa ikateene kafuhe kafahe imuma negiya mono nehaya kavala akavela nemalae.
Ani kavama haya yafena nagesa kumo nehigena tamakaipi aliyama ali-mainoa aliyamoa afa ya kana nehie. huna nehue.

Nafunagana-gatama afaa musetami nehugi nagayama kahegi kemofena nametiti ohua kava hutama maiho. Nagaya Yuta kano mainoanagina tamakai kana kano mainoafe kahegi kehena nametitia ohunoane nayona havi kavala hu onatenae.
Tamakaya ago havimainae nago kalima alimainoa kanafina hagotena tamakaienena mo mainena Yisasima hulatenea kanale mono kea tamahapaugetama havi-mainayane.

Haviyanagi nagaya kalima alugenoa naugafamoa haviya huno tokiyania omalegetama nahamaetama Kasalo nelahaegi. Otahaiya kano maine. hutama tamakavenona hu onatenagi Anumaya Koti ensole kanoene Yisasi Kalaisiene anavalaya kava hutama navaletama nagaila ali falu fala hunatenae.

Falu fala hunatetama tamaipamoa tusia musema humainaya yamoa hanatega umaine? Hagote kanafina tamaulaga alilagatitama nagaima naya hutama namigahe humainagi menia naa higetama tamaipa haviyana hunenatae?
Menia kelamage kema tamahapauva yateti kame kanotami kana nehugetama keanenamakiyo? Inio?

Haviho mani vayamoya ayelamavataga hugahe ma kea nehae Mosese kahegi kea alitama hipoya hiho. huya nehuya tamaya hisayafe mani kea nohagi ani kemo akave malesayafe nagaila nenataletama amakai amakia alisaga hisayafe tusiya huno nehamaiye.
Kanale kavama humatesayafene huya tusiya huno hamaisiana kanale kava nehagi tamakaienema mainoa kanafikeya ani kavala ohugahagi nagayama tamatalena alulegama umaisua kanafienena ani kavala hiho.

Nakaini nafanemogatama nagoene anemoya inamu yama alimategeno amakata neaiya augafa kava huno tamakaya Yisasi Kalaisi aepaa kana hutama maisaya yafe nagaila tusiya huno nenahaigeno naipamoa kanaage nehie.
Vaeha menia tamakaiene maisua nagesa nehavugeno tamakaifena nagesa kumo nehigi. Tamakaiene nagokepima umainoteasina nagaya aiyahae huna kea otamamakina kanale keage tamahapauleasine.
Tamakaya Mosese kahegi kema alitama hipoya nehisaya veamogatama menia nahapaiho. Mani kahegi kea havilama hutama havilinafi?
Ani kemoa maa humaine. Apalahamua tole ne nafanema anateneana nago nafanea nofipi maineno miya oali aliya nealia amo ateno amigeno afaa mainea agihena aamoa nago nafanea atene.

Nofipi mainea amo agia Hagae nafanema ateana ve alavemogami auava kavateti atenegi afaama mainea agihena aamo agia Selae namo a maineanagino ago alekano le-maineanagi Anumaya Kotia Kamigahue. huno hulokiya vaimalenea keleti ani nafanea atene.

Atenaa kemoa Anumayamoa alino tole hagelafi-latenea yafe mani tole atalamoganite avame kea humaine. Hagaa nofipi maineno miya oali aliya a maineanagino Sainai agoyafiti eno Mosese kahegi kea taveli-maine. Nafaneamoya nofipi mainaya vaya kana huya mainae.

Hagaa Alepia kotega hanea agoya, Sainai agoyahe humaleno Yelusalemu kumate avame ke huno humaine. Ani Yelusalemu nafaneyagaenena nofi vaya kana huya mainae. Yuta veamoya menia ania huya Mosese kahegi kea akave nemalayafe nofipi mainae.
Mainagi ikapinaga hanea Yelusalemu nafaneyagaenena nofipina omainagi ani kumala itatimoe.
Ani yafe Anumaya Koti avopina mage huno kae-maleneane

Inamu yana ali okateno kagata oai amoga nafane oateka, namo anema mainana yafena tusiya huka musena nehuka yagamea huo. Anaukamoa katalesigeka afaa mainesana amoga anauamoene maineno nafane neatesia anemogamina amakaseka kasagoya nafaneyakaa ateteka maigane. Ani yafe kaipamoa kanaleya nehisigeka muse nehuka maiyo. huno humaineane.
Ani yafe, nafunagana-gatama, Anumayamo hulokiya vaimalenea keleti Aisakina atenea augafa kava huno tagaila lategeta agaia nafaneyaga mainone.

Apalahamu aliya amoa ma mopafi veamoya neamataya augafa kava huno Isimelina ategeno Alu Aotage Avamumo humainea keleti agihena amoa Aisakina atene. Atetegeno nepuamoa Isimelia aganaamona Aisakina alino haviya hutene. Nagi menia ani augafa kavala maiya nehae.
Anumaya Koti avopina mani nafanehena mage huno humaineane

Afaa mainea agihena amo nafanemofena nefaa Kanale hulamategahue. huno humainea yana aligahianagi nofipi maineno miya oali aliya amo nafanemoa tokaeana mani yana oaligahie. Ani yafe aliya amoene nafaneaene hunategeana vio. huno humaineane.

Na ke humaineafe nafunagana-gatama nofipi mainea aliya amo nafaneyaga tagaya omainonagi afaa mainea agihena amo nafaneyaga mainone. Ani yafe kahegi kemona ali hipoya huta nofipi vaya kana huta omaisune.

Yisasi Kalaisia kanaleya huta maisuna yafe nofipitila ago alino kalu helatenegi fatago hutama hetitama maiho. Nagoa veanemoya Kahegi kema akave maleho. huya nagoene nofi hu-lamatesagi Aao. hutama tokiya vaitama maiho.
Nagaya Polona mani kea nehugi haviho. Yuta veamoya nehaya avame yama hugahe Taugafa laga hulato. hinutamahena Yisasi Kalaisima fali-mainea yamoa afa ya kana huno tamaya ohugahie.
Nagoene tamahanepauve nagoa vayamogatama Taugafa laga hulateho. hutama hinutamahena mukia Mosese kahegi kene akave malesaya aliyatamia hanegahie.

Mosese kahegi kea ali hipoya nehunageno Anumaya Kotia Fatago veane mainae. huno hulategahie. hutama ani kelema tamametiti nehaya veamogatama Yisasi Kalaisina tamakaveno hutetama alu kate neutama Anumaya Koti alino kayone hu-lamatesia yamaa ago tamakaveno hu neatayanagino ani yamoa tamaya ohugahie.

Tamaya ohugahigi tagaya ani kavala nohunagi Yisasife havita tagupi maleta tametiti hu-mainona yateti Alu Aotake Avamumoa tagaila taya hu-maineanagita Anumaya Kotia Fatago veane mainae. huno hu-latesiafe agava maineta tametitia nehune.

Yisasi Kalaisina tagua amiteta agaiene ailokaeta maineta Yuta vayamogami kava huta taugafa laga hisunapi taga ohisunapi ani augafa kavatalana afa ya haneanagino taya hutafa huno ohugahigi Yisasife havita lagupi maleta nelafugamife tahau tayamopafi nelahainageta amaya hisunana ani kavala tamage huno hagote yatafa hane.
Hagotetama kanaleya hutama Yisasi akave umainagi menia taya katamia tile-lamatagetama Yisasi kelamage kea ohavitama neataletama ani vayamogami kea ali hipoya nehae?
Ani kema akave malayana Anumayamoa agaia ke huno tamavale-mainea kanomoa ani kea ohunegi alu vayamoya tamakaila alihaviya nelamahayae.

Tamakesa haviho tanefa falauvateti kai hame maya talo nehuya osia halegisia yana aliya ali havigu hagenoa haenagaa mukia tanefamoa halegino alakefa humaine. Anima halegi-mainea augafa kava huya osi ke kanoa, havige hisaya kemoa mukiamogatamina ali haviya hu-lamateyafenagi kayetama maiho.

Nagaya Yisasi Kalaisiene ailokaena mainoanagina tamakaifena mage huna nagesa nehavue Nagai kea nehaviyanagitama alu kea ohavigahae. huna nagesa havine-lamamue. Tamakaima alino haviya tamahaisia kanoa hana augafa kano mainefi? Anumayamoa agaiage age-maineanagino ani vayamogamina haenagaa kayo kevea amamigahie.

Nafunaganagatama nagayama Tamaugafa laga hisageno Anumaya Kotia Fatago vaya mainae. huno hu-lamategahie. huna huleasina veamoya nagaila ali haviya hu onataleasinagi vayamoya nagaila ali haviya haya yana tagaila taveligeta age-mainone. Nagaya Yisasia yafaga yosale fali-mainea yateti Anumaya Kotia tagaifena Fatago veane mainae. huno hulatene. huna nehua yateti taveli-maine.
Tamakesa kumo hia kema tamahapaiya vayafena mage huna nehue Kanalelagi mukia amakayamoenema fayi-talesayana kanalele. huna nehue.

Nafunagana-gatama Mosese kahegi kefiti nofila humainageno Anumayamoa alino kalu he-lamateteno ago ke higetama agaialega emainagi tamakaya atafa lamaku tamakesamo nehaisia kavala hutama omaiho. Omaigahagi nelamafu-gamifena tamahau tamayamopafi nelama-haisigetama amaya hisaya kavakeya hiho.
Mukia Anumaya Koti kahegi kemo aepamoa maa humaine. Kagaika kaugafahema kahaiya avamete alu veamogami amaugafahena tama-hainagetama mai-hilato hutama maiho. huno humaine.
Hu-maineanagi havigu lamakaya afai afumoma hia kava hutama ke vaitama tuma hisayana apasetama mainesageno tamaugosamoene fanane hisigi kayetama maiho.
Nagaya mage huna tamahanepauve Alu Aotage Avamumofe Kava yagai-lato. hutama akave malesayana atafa lamaku tamakesale age lamahaye nehisia kavala ohutama kefo kavala ohugahae.

Alu Aotage Avamumoa Kanale kate eho. huno tamavaleno nevigeno atafa lamaku tamakesamoa age haye hisia yamoa tamakaifena Havi kapi eho. huno tamavaleno ugahe nehie. Naa kavamogania kame nehaagi tamahaisia kavala kanale kavaage hisaya yafena maitama ya nehae.
Ya nehayanagi Alu Aotage Avamumofema Kava yagai-lato. hutama akave malesayana Mosese kahegi kemo aiyafina omaigahae.
Mopale vayamogata atafa lamaku tamakesamo auava yamoa maa humainegi haviho. Moli huliteya nehuya kumai he yane. Amaugafafi oniyaage kefo kavale. Amaugafa haga neya kumai he kava akave male yane.

Ago fali-mainaya veafe Anumayati mainae. huya amakisana nevaiya kavale. Hanageke ya huya veane hamae-fali yane. Kame hu kavale. Amakaiami kemo tu huya hamai vai yane. Alu kanomo yate ageya hamaye hu yane. Ke vaiya amaipafinaga ata nelea yane. Amakaiami amakiake alisaga hisaya yafe amakesa havi havi yane. Vaya apase yane.

Alu kanomo hia kavafe ageya hamaye nehaya yane. Havili neya aneginagi huya hagi fali ke hatage yane. Tagaiti atafa lagu tagesamoa mani kavayaga alino nagoa yayagaene alifalote nehie. Nayona ago tamahapai-mainoanagi menia nagoene tamahanepauve ani kavama maiya nehaya veanea Anumaya Kotima kava yagai-mainea yapina tamage huya omaigahae.

Nagi Alu Aotage Avamumoa nago kanomo agupima mainesiana maa yayagamo falote hugahie. Veafe hau ayamopafi haisigeno amaya hisia yane. Muse hisaya yane. Kanaleya huno amaipamoa falu hamaisia yane. Tamamena male-lava hutama maisaya yane. Ali kayone hisaya yane. Veane amaya hisaya yane. Ke ali hipoya huya fatago huya maisaya yane.

Ako hutama tamakaitami lamaugafa alitama ohaitama mai kayone hisaya yane. Tamaku tamakesale yagai lokiya vaitama lamahaisia yana neataletama Anumaya Kotina haisia kavakeya hisaya yane. Alu Aotage Avamumoa veamogami amakupima mainesigeno mani kavama hisiana kahegi kemoa Kefo ya nehane. huno ohugahie.
Yisasi Kalaisiene ailokaeta mainona veanea Yisasia yafaga yosale fali-mainea kava huta atafa laku takesaene age lahaye hisuna yaene ago fali lavata humainone.
Fali lavata hu-mainonageno Alu Aotage Avamumoa tagupi emaineno haegafa huta maineta Alu Aotage Avamumo ke akave nemaleta fatago kate vaiyesune.
Tagaiti tagia alita ohaisune. Tafu-taganaya humainesaya kavafena ageta lahaye nehuta taipa haviya huta tua ohisune.

Nafunagana-gatama nago kanomoma kefo kava huno asaga hu-lavisigetama agegetama tamakaya Alu Aotage Avamumo kea akave nemalaya veane kea oamakitama ako hutama ali hetigeno kanaleya huno maino. Ali hetitegahagi tamakaienena Satania tamavayu huno havi kapi tamateyafe aluya hutama tamaugafa kayetama maiho.
Kana yama alisia kanomona aya hutama aliho. Ani kavama hisayana Yisasi Kalaisina haegafa kahegi kea ali hipoya hugahae.
Afaa havigu nemaisia kanomoa Nagaya ala kano mainoe. huno hisia kanomoa agaia agua ayevataga nehuno augafa alino haisiafe agaiahe havige nehie.
Alu veala neamaketama Amakaila ago amakase-mainone. hutama ohutama mukiamogatama aliyatamia fako hutama Kanale yapi havi yapi? hutama agetetama kanale yama hanesigetamahena ani yafekeya muse hiho.
Muse hugahagi tagaya mukiamogata tahaote tahaote kana yama hane-latesigeta tagaiti alita vaiyesune.
Yisasi mono kema tamahapaisia kanomona kanale yama tamamefe malenesaya yapiti aye fako hutama amiho.

Avina yama kalunagenoa ani augafa avinaage falote humaine. Tagaya mukia yupa nehuna kavamoa ania augafa kavea falote hu lamisigeta agegahune. Tamakaitami tamaugafa havige hutama Anumaya Kotina ayevataga hugahune. hutama ohiho. Anumaya Kotina ayevataga hisuna kanoa omaine.

Mukia kanafina atafa agu agesahekeya nehuno age haye hisia kavafekeya hoyaafima nehakalesia kanomoa agaia ali nena hisia kavemo avaleno haniki-mainesia yapi tegelege nehia atafi atenageno agola maigahianagi Alu Aotage Avamumo kema haviya akave malesaya veamoya ani avinama hakale-malesageno nenama hisia kavemoa alino falote hisigeya maige maige hisaya hamaimula aliteya agola maigahae.
Naama hisiafe nagoa kefo kavala ohuta kanale kavakeya kasalola otahaesigeta oataleta nago kanama vayi hisigeta kanaleya huta ali nena hisunageno ala hinageta anonaa aligahune.
Aligahunagi menia kanale auava kavala hisuna katia hanegeta Yisasife haviya amakupi maleya amametiti nehaya anagala hagoteta kanaleya huta amaya huteta mukia veanene amaya hisune.
Nagi ageho. Menia atupale kea nakainia nayapiti ala avopitila mani avopi kaena nelamamue.

Nagoa veamoya amakaiami amaugafa aliya nehaiya Yisasia yafaga yosale tagai kefo yamo anonatia aliteno fali-maine huta hisunana Yuta veamogami amaipamoa haviya hisigeya hu-haviya hu-lategahae. huya haviya yafe mage huya mono kea tamahanepaiye Tamakoya anoya laga hiho. huya nehae.

Mosese kahegi kea ali hipoya huya amaugafama laga nehaya vayala amakaienena mani kea mukiamoya ali hipoya ohunagi. Amakaiami amaugafa aliya haigahe tamakaifena Tagai kema ali hipoya hisayafene huya amakoya anoya laga humainae. huya hisayafene mani kea humainae.

Nagaya nago yafena naugafa alina nohauvanagi Anumayatimoa Yisasi Kalaisi nagaifene huno yafaga yosale fali-maineafene huna nagaya agai agigeya alisaga nehue. Yafaga yosale fali-maineafe nagaya agaiene ania huna yafaga yosale fali-mainoanagina ma mopale veamoya haya yafena nagesa havina nagoene akave ohugahue.
Yuta vayamoya amaugafa laga nehaya yana afa yane. Amaugafa laga ohunaya yana afa yakeya hanegi Anumaya Kotia haegafa lagu tagesa laminea yana tusia tokiyaage kanale ya hane.
Ani kema ali hipoya hisaya veala Isaleli veanelafa mainageno Anumaya Kotia amaipa falu hisia yaene kayone humatesia yaene amamisie huna nehue.
Nagaya Yisasi aliya nealugeya nagoa veamoya nagaima nahae-mainaya nafugula hanegi menia nago kanomoa kana yana onamisie huna nehue.
Nafunagana-gatama Anumayati Yisasi Kalaisia kayone yamaa tamaminageno tamaku nafanene maisie huna Anumayamotega nunamuna huna havinegoe. Tamage.
Kenia male hano hie.
Nagaini nagia Polonae.

Nagaya Polonia Anumaya Kotia agaia agu agesafiti haiya kava huno Yisasi Kalaisi Aposolo kano maiyo. huno hunategena mainoane. Anumaya Koti alu aotage veamogatama Efesusi mainaya veala Yisasi Kalaisife havitama tamakupi malenetama efi efi hutama Anumayamo aliya alike alike nehaya veamogatamahe mani avona kaena nelamamue.
Nelafaa, Anumaya Kotiene Anumayatimoa, Yisasi Kalaisiene kayone hisaya yaene tamaipa falu lamahaisia yaene tamamisae.
Tagaya Kalaisiene aigamaeta mainonageno Anumaya Kotia ikapinagati mukia tagu nafane aya hisia yana ago tamineanagita tusiya huta Anumayati, Yisasi Kalaisina Nefaa, Anumaya Koti agia alisaga hisune.

Anumaya Kotia ehema ma mopama talo ohuneno tagayama Kalaisiene aigamaeta agai aulagafina agaia alu aotage anaga maineta mukia veamogami amaufina nagola kefo kavala ohu veane mai-fatago huta maisunafe tagaifena haigeno hapalilatene.
Tagaifena hau ayamopafi haigeno tagaila hapali-lateneafe Yisasi Kalaisia kefo yatimo anonaa alino fali-mainea yateti agaia nafane alino hapae-latene.
Hapae-lateteno agaia hau ayamopafi haumainea Kanoene aigamae-mainonageno fali-mainea yateti tusiya huno kayonea hu-lateneanagita muse huta tokiya hale yamaa hanea kanomo agia alisaga hisune.
