Yisasi Kalaisi auava yana ago alina avaya-yetena tusiya huna kanale kavakeya nehua kano mainoe huna nohugi Yisasi Kalaisia navalegena agai nafane mainoafe nayamufa aina ani aliyana nealue.

Nafunagana-gatama ani auava yana ago ali-mainoe huna nohugi nagoke nagu nagesale mainoe. Nayoma humainoa yafena nagesa nohavugi haenagama Alime alime uka anile mo talo. huno humainele visuafene huna nayamufa aina naiyayena neue.
Anumaya Kotia Yisasi Kalaisi keleti Anale haiyo. huno humaineafe tusiya huna naiyayena Ani legana yate uka mo talo. huno humainele uvayi hutena muse yania alisue huna nehue.

Tametitima humainona yana tokiya vaita ani tametitilema alopa veama maisunana nagayama nehua kea alita tagu tagesale malesune. Nagoa veamogatama alu lamakesale mainesayana Anumaya Kotia ani lamaku tamakesa ali fatago huno tamave-ligahie.
Tamave-ligahigi kanale auava yama agoma atafa hutalako hulita mainona yamona akave maleta vaiyesune.
Nafunagana-gatama haviho mukia nagayama nehua auavanima ageteya akave nemalesaya veamogamina agelama hutama amakave maleho.
Mukia kanafina ago tamahapai-mainoa keagi menia nahaigena nagoene naunumoa nehigena tamahanepauve nagoa veamoya Kalaisia yafaga yosale fali-mainea kemona kame huteya mainae.

Ani veamoya amakaiami amaugafamo age haye hia yafena tusia muse nehuya Ani yamoa Anumaya Kotina agaseno kanale ya hane. huya amakaye hisifa kavafena musemaa hu neateya ma mopafi yafekeya amakesa havi havi huya nemaiye. Naama nehaya veamoya hani yapi tegelege nehia atafi ugahae.
Ugahayanagi tagaya ikapinaga anaga mainonanagino tagu tamema aligatisia kanomofena, Anumayati Yisasi Kalaisia, ikapinagatila ataleno elavisia yafe tametitia huta agava mainone.

Agava mainonanagino eteno esiana agaia tokiyaleti mukia yamoa agai akave malesaya yafe alino aiyafinaga nemaleno tagaima kana yama nelamia fulu fulu laugafa alino agaia augafamo tokiya hale yamaaene augafa kana huno talo hulatesigeta ani laugafale maigahune.

Nenahaiya nafunagana-gatama ania hutama Anumayatimote hetitama ailokaetama mai fatago hiho. Nagua lamamina tamakai tamaufima tamakesua yafena aluya huno nenahaiye. Aluya huna musetamia nehuna veamogamina tamakaifena hamanepaina tamakia alisaga nehue.
Yuotiagatana Sitikegatana Anumayatimote ailokaetana mainetana nagoke tanaku tanakesale maio huna nehue.

Nehuafe kagaya Anumaya Koti aliyama ailokaetaa nealua kanomoga ani atalana anaya huo. Ani atalamogania nagaiene Kalemeniene nagoa nagaienema aliya nealiya veanene ailokaeta Yisasima hulatenea kanale mono kema hamanepauna aliyana ali-mainae. Ani veamogami amakima agola maige maige hisaya hamaimuene veamogami amaki kae-malenea avopi amakia hanegi ani atalana anaya huo.
Mukia kanafina Anumayatimote ailokaetama mainetama muse hiho. Nagoene mani kea nehue musena hiho.
Anumayatimoa ago aupaa egahe nehiafe kayone humate veane mainegeya tamakeho.
Nago yafena tamakesa havi havi hutama kalagila oaiho. Muki yafena Anumaya Kotitega muse nehutama havigeho.
Havigesayana Yisasi Kalaisiene ailokaetama mainesageno tamaipa falu hisia yama tamamisiana mukia alu yamo amaipa falu yana agase-mainea falu yamaamoa tamaku tamakesalela yagailamategahie.

Nafunagana-gatama kenima hano hisia kea mage hugahe hue. Ma yafena tamakesa havi havi hutama haviho, tamageage kene, kanale agu agesafiti humainea yaene, fatago humainea kavaene, oniya ohunea kavafeene, tusia muse hisaya yafeene, nagoa kavama hisayana tamaki alisaga hisaya kavafeene, mukia fatago kavafeenena tamakesa havi havi hiho.

Nagaya mukia kavala huge tamave-ligema hugetama ali-mainaya auavafeene mukia tamahapaugetama havimainaya auavafeene, higetama age-mainaya auavafeenena mukia kanafina ani kavakeya hiho. Naama hisagenoa Anumaya Kotia taipa falu hisia yama taminea kanomoa tamakaiene ailokaeno maigahie.
Tamakaya etetama nagaifena tamakesa havi havi hutama ali heti-mainaya yafena Anumayamotega huna tusia muse nehue. Hagotetama nagaifena tamakesa havi havi hu-mainayanagi nayama hisaya katamia omalene.

Mani kema nehuana Mukia yania omalene. huna nohugi maa yafena havimainoe alu ya alu yamoa nagaitema falote higena mukia yafena naipa havina kanale huneamatoafe afenonia hanesiano omalesiano kanalele. Kavela nenamu hisuo nagatesiano kanalelagi. Mukia yama hanesiano omalesiano kanalele. Mukia kanafina naipa havina kanale huneamatoe.
Kalaisia nagaila nagu nagesa alino tokiya vainategena agaia tokiyaleti mukia kavala afaa huleasine.
Huleasinagi kana yamoa nagaitema falote higetama tamakaya kanaleya hutama ali kayone hunatetama naya humainae.

Tamakaya Filipai kumate veala ago havimainae ehema Yisasia hulatenea kanale mono kema tamahapai-mainoa kanafina Masetoniatima umainoa kanafina nagoa Yisasi anagamoya nahamaeya nagoa yana namigena oalinogi tamakaitamige naminae.
Tesalonaika mainogetama hagotetama naya hutetama haenagaenena ania hutama naya humainae.
Naya humainagi menia nagoa yana namisae huna nohugi naminaya yatetila Anumaya Kotia anonaa tamamisiafene huna nehue.

Kosa henatea yaene nagoa yaene ago namigena alugeno namu humaine. Tamakaya muse yama namiya yana Epafalotitusia ago alino me namigena ali-mainoe. Anima naminaya muse yana afu heya Anumaya Kotina muse yama neamiya avamete kava humainie. Nagaima namiya yana Anumaya Kotiene amigeno ageteno aipamoa tusia kanaleya humaine.
Anumayanimoa agaia tokiyaage hale yamaafina mukia kanale yakeya malenefiti tamakaya Yisasi Kalaisiene ailokaetama mainayanagino nagoa yamoma kosa he otamatesiana afaa tamamigahie.
Anumaya Kotina Nelafa agia tamagelafa huta alisaga nehisunageno mukia kanafina anale hanege hanege huno hanesie. Tamage.
Mukia veamoya, Yisasi Kalaisina amakuama neamiya veamogamifena huna falu fala hu neamatoe. Nagaiene mainaya tafu-taganaya ania huya hu falu fala hu nelamatae.
Sisa nopi aliya nealiya veanene nagoa Yisasina amakua aminaya veamoyaene tamakaila hu falu fala hu nelamatae.
Yisasi Kalaisia Anumayatimona kayone yamaamoa tamaku nafanene maisie.
Kenia male hano hie.
Nagaini nagia Polonae.

Nagaya Polonae Anumaya Kotia agaia haiya avamete huno Aposolo kanoa hunatenegena mainoafe nagaiene Timoti nenafuene Kolosi kumate mainetama Yisasife havitama tamakupi malenaya neafugatama mani avona kaetaa nelamamue. Anumaya Kotia Nelafa kayone hisia yamaaene tamaipa falu hisia yamaaene tamamisie.
Taagaya mukia kanafina Yisasi Kalaisina Nefaa, Anumaya Kotifena havinegeta tamakaifena tusia muse hutaa havinegoe.

Taagaya tamavagea ago havilinoe. Anumaya Kotia tamagelafa humainea kemoa, Yisasife kanale mono kea, tamahapaiya kea ago evayi higetama Yisasia hulatenea yafe havitama tamakupi maletama tamametiti hutama mukia Yisasife haviya amakua amitafa humainaya veamogamife tamahau tamayamopafi nelamahaiye. Anumaya Kotia tamamisia yana ikapinaga talo tala humaleneafe tamametiti nehaya yapiti aniama nehaya yamoa falote hia yafena taagaya Anumayamotega tamakaifena muse nehutaa ke hutaa havinegoe. mage hutaa

Anima Yisasia hulatenea kanale mono kea mukia kotega kagino ala huno veapina alino kanale auava yana ali falote humaineafe tamakaite eaamo Anumaya Koti kayone hisia yafema havilama haya kanafi aepa heno tamakaipina ania huno kanale auava yana ali falote humaine.

Epafalasia mani mono kea huhaleno higetama havilinae. Ani kanoa taagaila taaya huno Yisasi Kalaisi aliyana alige alige nehia kanogino taagaiene nagopi aliyana nealuna kanogino agaifena aluya huno nenahaiye.
Alu Aotage Avamumoa veafema tamahau tamayamopafi nelahamaiya yana tamaminegetama ania kavama nehaya yafena Epafalasia ago taahapai-maine.

Ani yafe hagote kanafina taagaya ani kea havitetaa ani yupa aepa hetaa tamaya hutaa Anumaya Kotitega havigetaa tamakaifena taagela kaniotamatenoe. Mage hutaa havigoe “Alu Aotake Avamumoa kanale amaku amakesa amamino Anumaya Kotima nehaiya auava yana hamapaisigeno amakupina hiya hinageya havisae.

Hiya hisigetama tamakaya kama vaiyesayana Anumayamo veane fatago hutama maisageno Anumayamoa mukia maisaya auava yatamihena ‘Nagai nafanemoya amatea kava nehae.’ huno haisie. Mukiama nehaya kavala kanale yakeya falote hisigetama Anumaya Koti aepaa aluya hutama agetetama agaifema havilinaya yatamimoa ala hisie.
Anumayamona tokiyaage hale yamaaleti aliya tokiya vaimatesageya hetofa veane maineya mukia kana yama falote hisigenoa amakuamoa atali talua ohinageya tokiyaage veane ako huya amaipa muse yapi maisae.
Tokiyaage hale yapi mainaya veanene hetita maisuna tokiya taminageta tatesia kava huta anifi maisuna yafe Nelafatega tusia muse hisune.” hutaa Anumayamotega havinegoe.
Hagoteno Satani kava hulategeta hani yapi mainonageno Anumaya Kotia ani yapiti tavaleno agaia hau ayamopafi nehaiya nafanemo kava yagai-mainelega tavaleno latene.
Kefo yatimo aigagilategeta mainonageno Anumaya Koti nafanemoa anifiti kalu hetalesiafe miya hulategeta mainonageno kefo yatia aigetateno atalelatene.

Veamoya Anumaya Kotina oagegahe hayanagi agaia nafanea Yisasia Nefaene nago avamete huana mainaanagino Yisasia Anumaya Kotina hagote nafaneagino maineno mukia Anumaya Kotima talo humalenea yatela alaami maine.

Anumaya Kotia hapaigeno Yisasia agaia mukia yana talo humalene. Ikapinaga yaene mopafi yaene neagona yaene noagona yaene ensole vayaene Satani Avamuene ala kava vayaenena agaia agima alisaga hisaya yafe Yisasia talo humalene.
Yisasia hagoteno mainegeno mukia yamoa agaia humainea keleti noamile noamile maime ute ete huya mailama humainae.

Yisasia agaife haviya amakupi malenaya veamogami amakenopa maineno kava yagaimatene. Yisasia agaife haviya amakupi malenaya veamogami aepaa maineno mukia yamona kava yagaimateno ala kanoami maisiafe uhagotemateno fali-mainefitila eteno heti-maine.
Anumaya Kotia haigeno agaiaene mukia tokiyaaene kanale auava yamaaene nafaneamopi maleno hiya humalene.
Naa humaineafe Yisasia yafaga yosalema faligeno lavi-mainea kolateti Anumaya Kotia mukia yamaa ma mopafi yaene ikapinaga yaene aigetateno falu hulateno “Nagoke taipale maisune.” huno humaine.
Nayona tamaku tamakesamoa kame hutesaya kava higetama kefo yana maitama nehutama Anumaya Kotienena kame hutenae.

Hutayanagi Yisasia Nefatega tamavalesigetama kefo yatamia omalesigetama alu aotage veaa maisaya yafeene nagoke veamoya “Kefo ya nehae.” huya ohisaya yafeene Yisasia augafa agata aigeno yafaga yosale fali-maine. Fali-mainea yateti ago aigetamateno falu hunelamateno nagoke taipale alino lamatene.

Lamatenegi tamakaya Yisasima hulamatenea mono kema havitama tamakupi malenaya yana atafa hutama tokiya vaiho. Havigu nago yamo tamavayu hisigetama Yisasima hulamatenea kanale mono kema havilinetama tamametiti nehaya yana ataleyafenagi mai lokiya vaitama maiho. Ani kanale mono kea tamakaya havitageya mukia mopale veamoya havilinagena nagaya Polona anima Yisasi hulatenea kanale mono kemo aliya kano mainena mani kea hamanepauve.

Tamakai tamaya hisuafe naugafa nagata aiya nopima mainoa yafena aluya huna musena nehue. Kalaisi augafamoma tusia agata aimainea avamete huna nagaya naugafa nagatama aiya yateti Yisasife haviya amakupi malenaya veala agaia augafa maigena Yisasina agatama aimainea yana ali hano nehue.
Anumaya Kotia “Yisasina amakua aminaya veanea amaya huo.” huno hunateneanagina mukia Anumaya Koti kea huhalena tamahapaisugetama havilama hisayafene huno hunatene.
Hunatenegeno Anumaya Koti kea nayona falakino hanegeya mukia veala hamaopainagi menia ago fufute evayi higeya mukia Yisasina amakua aminaya veamoya nehaviye.

Nehavianagino Anumaya Kotia agaia haiya kava huno Yuta vea omainaya veamogami amunopi anima falaki-mainea kea, tusia kanale kea, taveligeta anima falaki-mainea kea mage huya hageta havimainone “Yisasi Kalaisia tagupi maineanagita tagaya haenagaa agaia tokiyaage hale yamaaene kumatela umaigahune.” huya hageta haviteta tametitia nehune.

Tagaya nagoke nagokemogami Kalaisifena huhaleta hamanepaita tamavaleta Anumaya Koti aulema tamatesunana Kalaisiene aigamaeya tokiyaage mono veane maisae huta kanale tagu tagesaleti huge tamaveligea nehuta mukia veafena “Kayetama maiho.” huta nehune.
Nehugeno Kalaisia mukia tokiyaama nagupi naminea tokiyaleti nagaya tusia kasageke yapiti himamu huna aliyana nealue.
Tamakaiene Leotisia mainaya veanene mukia nagai naufima onagenaya veanene tamaya hisua yafe nagaya kasageke huna aliyana nealuanagitama havisae huna avona negaove.

Tamakuamona ali lokiya vailamatesigetama nelamafuene nago tamaku tamakesa havitama tamahau tamayamopafi tama-haisigetama Anumaya Kotina falaki-mainea keamo aepa Yisasi Kalaisia agaia mukia kanale agu agesa nehavia yaene Anumaya Koti agesafi hanea yaene havilama hisageno tamakupina hiya hisia yafe tusiya huno nenahaiye.
Havigu nagoa veamoya tamaipa ayesaya ke huya havige ayelamavataga hisaya yafe mani kea nehue.

Tamakaienena tokaena omainoanagi nagu nagesamoa tamakaiene maineanagitama tamakaya Kalaisia hulatenea mono kema havitama tamakupi maletama tamametiti hutetama tokiya vaitama nagopima hetitama fatago hutama maiya yafe havitena tusia muse nehue.
Tamakaya “Yisasi Kalaisia tagaite kava yagai-latesie.” hutama ago avale-mainayafe kava hutama agaiene ailokaetama vaiyeho.

Yisasima hulatenea mono kema huhaleya hagetama havitama tamakupi malenaya kea atafa hutama yosa hafuyamoma mopafi taviteno itaamoma atafa huno hageno ala hume hume analema haiya avamete hutama Yisasi Kalaisiene ailokaetama fatago hutama ala hutama mukia kanafina Anumaya Kotifena muse hiho.

Havigu nagoa veamoya afa kema, yasimo alino esia kema, nehuya havige ayelamavataga nehuya tamavayu huya havi kapi tamatesagi tamakaya kaye ho. Naa augafa veamoya taginagomogami kavaene ma mopafi havigu kene aliya nehagi Yisasi Kalaisifena nohae.
Nohagi mukia Anumaya Kotina tusia lokiya yamaaene kanale auava yamaaene Yisasi Kalaisi agupina tusiya huno hiya humaine.

Hiya humaineafe Kalaisiene aigamaetama ani lokiya yamaaene kanale auava yamaaene ali-mainageno hiya higetama mainae. Mainageno Kalaisia agaia mukia kava vayaene ensole vayaene Satani Avamuyagaene kavaami maine.

Maineafe Kalaisiene hagotetama aigamaetama mainaya kanafina Yuta vayamoya amaugafa laga nehaya avamete huno kefo yama nehaya atafa lamaipa laga huno alitalene. Ani yana veamoya amayatetila taga ohunagi Kalaisia agaia taga hu-talegeno kefo yamoa menia yagai otatene.

Yagai otamateneafe tima falelamatea kanala Kalaisienena aigamaetama maigeno agaiene komufina hevailamatene. Anumaya Kotia komufitima Kalaisina ali hetitenea yafena havitama tamakupi malageno Kalaisiene fali-mainafitila ago ali hetilamatene.

Hagotetama age lamahaye hutama kefo yama haya yamo tamahaegeno tamaku tamamemoa fali-maine. Falianagi Anumaya Kotia tamakaila Yisasi Kalaisiene fali-mainafitila ali hetilamateno haegafa tamahaimula tamamiteno mukia kefo yama haya yana aigetamateno atale-lamatene.

Mukia nayo kahegi kema akave omalonafe kaiyekea hulatesia kemona Anumaya Kotia aye hanane-talene. Ani avomoa kaiyeke hulatesia yate tatafa hu-linegeno Yisasina yafaga yosale maleya nili hetafa hu-malenaya yateti ani kemo akavela nomalonafe anonaa ali hano hu-talene.

Ali hano hu-taleneafe Anumaya Kotia Yisasima yafaga yosale fali-mainea yateti mukia Satani Avamuyagaene kavaamiene tokiyaamia amakaseno alihaviya hu-taleteno mukia veamogami amaulagafi Satani yayaga “Tokiyaamia omalene.” huno amaveli-maine.
Havigu nagoa veamoya nesaya kavefeene tifeene opa kanaene sapati kanaene maifalu hisaya kanaenefena “Naa higetama ma kavala nehae.” huya kaiyekea hu otamatesae.
Ani kavayaga augafaa omalenea yayaga amemaamo hia avamete huya haenagama falote hisia kanamofe tave-neligi Yisasi Kalaisia tama yatafana agaiage maine.

Nagoa veamoya himonama agaya yafena atafa amaipafiti tusiya huya amaugafa aliya haiteya mage nehae “Taugafa alita nohauna veane mainone.” huya amega amaugafafiti huteya “Ensole vayamogami amakia alisaga hiho. Alisaga ohisayana Anumaya Koti nafanea omainae.” huya nehaya yafe havigu amakai kema havisageya fako huya kanale anonatamia tamaha-falesagi kaye ho.

Ani vayamoya Kalaisienena aigamaeya omainae. Tamage Kalaisia tagai kava yagailatesia tagenopa maigeta augafaa mainone. Ani tagenopamoa mukia augafafina taleya taganunaene nuna amigeno ayegamaesia yaene amigeno Anumaya Koti tokiyaleti ani augafamoa ko nehie.

Tamakaya Kalaisiene ago falitetama kefo yatamia ataletama mukia ma mopafi tamakinagomogami kefo yana ago atalenae. Naa higetama Yisasi kea nohaviya veamoya vaineayaya kava hutama vaineayae? Naa higetama mani vayamo kahegi kea akave nemalae?
Mage huya nehae “Ma yatela atafa ohiho. Ma yana oneho. Ma yatela ameamela ohiho.” huya nehae.
Ani kema nehaya yayagamoa nesunageno fanane hugahie. Amakaiami amaku amakesafiti mani kahegi kea tamahanepaiye.

Nehageya tamage ani kahegi kea kanale havi haviya nehaya vayamogami kea kana nehagi amegale kea mage hae “Tagaitige Anumaya Koti agia alisaga nehuna yaene laugafa alita ohaisuna yaene laugafa aiko neluna kavaene tahanemae.” huya hagi ani nehaya kavala taugafa age tahaye hisia yana atalesuna yafe taya ohugahie.

Anumaya Kotia Kalaisiene tamakaila ago alino hetilamateno haegafa tamahaimula ago tamamine. Tamamineafe tamakaya anafinagati alisaya yafe tamakesa havi havi hutama maiho. Anafinaga Yisasia Anumaya Kotina tamaga ayatega hanea siale maine.
Maineafe mukia kanafina tamakaya anafinaga yafekeya tamakesa havi havi hutama mainetama ma mopafi yafena tamakesa ohaviho.
Tamakaya kefo yama nehaya atafa tamaipa ago falitegeno kanaleya hutama maisaya yatamia ago falakino Kalaisiene aigamae-maineanagino Anumaya Kotipi hane.
Hanegeno Kalaisia tamahaimumo aepaa fufutema evayi hisigetama tamakaiene tokiya hale yamaafi umaigahae.

Tokiyaage hale yamaafi umaisaya yafe ma mopafi kefo yama nehaya yayaga hamaetama hano hiho. Maa auavafe nehue munanene anene kumai he yane. Tamaugafamoa oniyaage nehia kefo yane. Augafa haga neyane. Age lamahaye nehaya yane. Alu kanomo yate age lamahaye nehaya yamoa ago fali-mainaya veamogamife “Anumayati maine.” huya amakisana vaiya amaku amisaya avamete huno Anumaya Kotina amaku oaminaya avamete kava nehie.
Mukia ani kavama nehaya veamogamina Anumaya Kotia aipamoa haviya nehianagino haivaimateno anonaamia amakata aisia yana amamigahie.

Hagotetama tamakaienena ani veanene vaiyatete nehutama ani kavala hu-mainagi menia mukia ani kavala ataleho. Kema vaiyane. Tamaipafiti anumayayamo hai yane. Vaya havita haviya humatesaya yane. Veamogamife kamuge hatagetama vaimate yane. Age lamahaye nehaya yamo avagema nehaya kea ataleho.
Tamakaya atafa kenama asagitama hagayu hutalaya avamete hutama atafa lamaipaene humainaya yaenena ago atalenagi nelamafu-gamifena havigema ayemavataga nehaya kea ataleho.

Tamakaya yaufa kenama alitama nefaiya avamete hutama haegafa tamaku tamakesale ago mainageno Anumaya Kotia mukia kanafina agaia auava yana tamave-ligetama havitetama ani haegafa lamaku tamakesamoa nagoene haegafa veane kana hutama Anumaya Koti mainea avamete hutama mainetama Anumaya Kotifena havilama hugahae.

Ani haegafa vayala mainetama mukia veala nagoke avamete mainone Yuta veanene Yuta vea omainaya veanene, amaugafa laga hu-malenaya vayaene taga ohunaya vayaene haesa veanene anupa veanene nofipi aliya nealiya veanene afaa maineya miya nealiya veanene nago avamete mainageno Kalaisia agaia hagote kanoamia kasagoya veamogami amakupina maine.

Tamakaila Anumaya Kotia hapali-lamatenea veala agaila alu aotage veanea mainageno tamakaifena hau ayamopafi nehaiya veane mainaya yafe kenama alitama nefaiya avamete hutama maa kanale kavala failiho. Mukia veafe tamahau humatetama kayone humateho. Tamaugafa alitama ohaiho. Alu kanomo kema havisayana ako hutama kea oamakiho. Tamamena mailava hutama maiho.

Tamakai amunopima mainesia kanomoa nefufena havigema hutesigenofena amena malelava huno maineno aigeateno kefo yamaa ataletesie. Anumayatimoa kefo yatamia ago aigetamateno atalelamateneafe tamakaya ania hutama ani kavakeya hiho.

Tamahau tamayamopafima nelamahaiya yamoa mukia mani kanale kavamona agaseno ala humaine. Kenatimona atafa hisia tamunofima kitama atalakoma huna avamete huno tahau tayamopafima nelahaiya yana ania huno mukia mani kanale kavala hayagino hetofa huligahie.

Kalaisia tamaipa falu hisia yana tamamineanagino kava hulamatesigetama kea haviho. Nagoke tamaipale maisaya yafe Anumaya Kotia tamakaifena ke higetama ageno “Nagai naugafa nagoke mainae.” huno humaine. Mukia yafena mukia kanafina Anumaya Kotitega muse huteho.

Ane nafanea kanaleya huno kava yagai-matesigeya agai agi alisaga nehuya agai ke ali hipoya hisageno kanale yama huno nemaisia kanoe.
Ane nafaneyagaama kanaleyama huno kava noyagaisia kanomoa Anumaya Koti anagamogamitela kanale huno kava oyagaigahie.

Meni kanoa Anumaya Koti nafanema haegafa emainesia kanomoa kava yagaisia aliyatela he otino. Havigu hetinunoa agaia augafa alino haisigeno Anumaya Kotia Satanina kaiyekema huteteno haeno fananema humainea kava huno ani kanomona ania augafa kava hutegahie.

Nagoa yaenefe nehue Yisasi kema nohaviya veanenema vaiyatete nehisigeya ageteya Ma kanoa kanale fatago kano maine. huya hutesaya vayapiti kava vayala ali hetite hetite huo. Kanale yama huno omainesia vayama ali heti-matesanageya veamoya hu haviya humatesageno Satanima hanagi-malenea kalifumoa aupaa hateno amatafa huno havi kate amavaleno amateyafe nehugi amaketeka ali hetimato.

Yisasife haviya amakupi malenaya vayate kava aliya vayamoya ania huya kanale vayaage maisae. Fatago huya nemaiya vayale. Vagala kea ohu vayale. Havi lina neya aneginagi ohu vayale. Moneamihe amakesa havi havi ohu vayale.
Anumaya Kotia Yisasifena falaki-mainea kemo aepaamofena haviya amakupi maleya atafa hu-lineya Anumayamo aufina amakuamoa kefo kavala nohisia vaya maisae.
Hagotetama amakaila avame humatetama amakelama hutetama kefo yaamima omalenesiana kanaleya huya aliya vayala maisae.
Aneamimoyaenena ania huya kanale ya huya maineya alumo kea aliya atifi mafi ohisae. Havi lina neya aneginagi ohuya efi efi huya fatago aliyamaage aliya maisae.
Yisasife haviya amakupi malenaya anagate kava aliya alisaya vayamoya nagokema aami mainesigeya ane nafaneamia kanaleya huya kava yagai-matesageya amakai ke ali hipoya hisae.

Yisasife haviya amakupi malenaya anagate kava huya kanale aliyama alisayana mukia veamoya amavagea haviteya kanaleya huya amakia alisaga hugahae. Alisagama hisayana Yisasi Kalaisife haviya amakupi maleya amametitima nehaya yafena kolia ohuya hetiya hu falote hugahae.

Mani avona nagaya negaena Aupaa mo kagesue. huna nagesaa havuanagi visua kaniama omalesigena aupaama ovisugeka ma avoma kaena kamua avopiti hapalika Anumaya Koti kema nehaviya anagama alitalu hisaya yupa kanaleya huya maisaya kavafe havisane huna mani avona kaena kahanepauve. Anumaya Kotia haimuaene mainegi tagaya agai anagaamogata alitaluma hisunagenoa tokiyaage tunage yosa kana hugahie. Mukia hanae yosama ali manu manu huno atafa hulinea kava hisigeta tagaya kelamage kea tokiyaage huta alisaga hugahune.

Anumaya Kotia hufalote huno tahanepaiya auava yana tusia lamayo aisuna yane. Yisasia ma mopafi vaya augafa kalino efalote huno mainegeno Alu Aotage Avamumoa Lamage huno Anumaya maine. huno tahapai-maine. Ensole vayamoya agaila agageya vayamoya avagea huya alu kote kote mo huya falote hageno ma mopale kasagoya veamoya haviteya aliya amakupi maleya amametiti hageno Yisasia eteno ikapinaga nehaino tokiyaage hale yamona ali-maine.

Alu Aotage Avamumoa huhaleno mage huno humaine Anumayamo esia kanamoa eaupama hisiana nagoa Kefo Avamumoya havigema huya ayemavataga hisaya yafe ani vayamogami ke haviteya akave nemaleya Yisasifema haviya amakupi malenaya kea neatalae.
Anima ayemavataga hisaya veala amakaiami amega amaugafafiti havigeage ke ali falote hageya kanale amaku amakesa akave omalegahae. Naama hisaya yafe amakuamoa Havi kavala nehae. huno kea ohuno maine.

Naa vayamoya mage huya nehae Vemoya anea ali oatesae. huya humategahae. Anumaya Kotia kavela agaia talo humaleteno agai kema aliya amakupi maleya amametiti nehaya veamogamifena Muse nehutama alitama neho. hunoma talo humalenea kavefena nagoa veamoya amakaiami Oneho. huya kahegi-mategahae.
Mukia yana Anumaya Kotia talo hu-malenea yana kanale yamaage hanegi nagoke ya kanoahena Oneho. huno ohuneanagita mukia yana muse nehuta alita nesune.
Anumaya Kotima humainea kemoene Anumayamotega nunamu huta muse hu neateta havinegona yamoene Anumaya Koti aufina ani kavela alino kanaleya nehie.

Timotigae kahapai-mainoa kema kafu-kagana-gamina hamapaisanana Yisasi Kalaisina kanale aliya kanoa maigane. Yisasifema havika kagupi maleka kametitima nehana kemoa hagaage hinageka akavema malesanana tokiyaage kano maigane.
Maigananagi Anumaya Kotina amaku amakesa haviya oaminaya veamoya nehaya manifena aneginagi kema hisaya kea ohavika Anumayamofekeya havika akave maleme maleme haiyo.

Taugafamoma tokiya vaisia yana yokaloma lesuna yana kanale ya haneanagino osia kanaleya huno lahamaegahie. Lahamaegahianagi tagayama Anumayamoma nehaiya kavama huta maisunana meniene haenagaene ikapinaga haita maisuna yafe lahamaegahie.
Mani kemoa tamagelafa huno nehiafe mukia veamoya havilama huya aliya amakupi maleya amametitia hisae.

Haimuaene mainea Anumaya Kotia mukia veamogata kefo kavaage nehuna yapiti alino kalu hetaleno tagu tamena aligatigahe nehigi agaifema haviya amakuafi maleya amametitima nehaya veamogamina amaku amamena ago aligati-maine. Ani yafekeya tametitia nehuta taya mukiki huta aliyana nealune.
Menima kahapauva kea hamanepaika Maa hiho. huka amavelio.

Nagoa vayamoya kagaifena Meni neya kanoa, afa kano maineanagita agai kea ohavisune. huya nahagi Ani kea ohiho. huka hamapaiyo. Anumaya Koti anagamogamina kaana amavene-lika fatago keage nehuka kanale kava huka vaiyatete nehuka vayakamogamina kagua neamamika hamamaeka Yisasifena havika kagupi maleka kametiti nehuka oniyaage ohunesia kagu kagesaene maiyo. Naa hisanageya kagai kakavela visae.
Nagaya aupaa hunama omesugekahena veamogamina Anumaya Koti avopiti kea hapalika hu haleka hamapaigeya haviho.

Mono note kava vayamoya kanute amayana maleya huyonegiya Anumaya Koti aliya kano maiyo. huya hugatageno Anumaya Kotia avayafiti hamapaigeya aune laga hageno Anumaya Kotia tokiya yamaa kaminegi ani yana oataleka aluya huka ani yateti aliyana alio.
Anima kahapauva aliyana aluya huka alige-lige nehuka ani yafeke kagesa havi havi huka kanale aliyama alisanana veamoya negageya Menia kanale ya nehie. huya hugategahae.

Kagaikaa maisana auava yakaaene Yisasi kema hamanepaina yaene atale yafenagi kava hume hume haiyo. Aniama hisanana Anumaya Kotia kagai kagu kamena alinegatino kagai kema nehaviya veamogami amaku amamena aligatisigeya kanaleya huya fatago kate ugahae.
Vayatamamo-gamina kea oamamakika negafama huneatana kava huka kanaleya huka ako humateka ania huka ali hetimato. Yaufa neyavemo-gamina kaganakamo-gamima hu neamatana kava huka ania humato.

Alekanomo-gamina itakamoma hu neatana kava huka ania humato. Yauva anemogamina kasakamo-gamima hu neamatana kava huka ania humateka havi kagu kagesa ohavika Anumaya Koti aulela fatago hisia kava humato.
Keto aneyaga hamamaesaya vayama omainesayana kanale auava kava hu neamateka amaki alisaga huo.

Nago keto amona agehoamopi nafaneamopi mainesayana ani anagamoya kanaleya huya hamaesae. Anumaya Koti kema nehaviya veamoya itaamoa nefaa nafaneyagaama hamamaenesia anonaa kanaleya huya hamaesae. Ani kavama hisagenoa Anumayamo aipamoa kanaleya hugahie.

Nafaneamima vayaamima omainesia keto aneyagama amakaiamige maisayana hamamao huna nehue. Ani keto anemoya kanaleya huya Anumayamofe amakesa haviya Laya hugahie. huya amametiti nehageno Anumayamoa amakaima hamamaesia yafena nateene kegeene Anumayamotega ke huya havinegagi tamakaya amaya hiho.

Amaya hugahayanagi nagoa keto anemoya Anumaya Kotifena amakesa ohaviya amakaiami amakuamoma nehaiya kavafe havi havima nehaya aneyaga hamaimuene mainayanagi fali-mainaya veamoya haya kava huya Anumayamo kea havilama huya nohaviye.
Alu veamoya Yisasina amakua aminaya veafe Kefo kava nehae. huya ohisaya yafe ani keto anemo-gamina kanaleya huya hamamaesae huna mani kea kahanepaugi hamapaiyo.

Nagoa veamoya amakaiami konaga afamoma kanale kava huya oamatesayana amakupima malenaya kea amakaveno huteteya tusia havi kava nehuya Yisasi kema ohavinaya vayamoyama havi kavama nehaya kavala agaseya tusia havi kavaage nehae.
Maa humainaya keto anemogami amakia kaetetama amaya hugahae sikisitia (60) kafu humainesaya alekanoa, nagoke ve kanoale fatago huya mainesagenoma fali-mainesia alekano-mogami amakiage kaeho.

Amavagemoma kanaleyama humainesia anegi, kanale kavaage nehisaya keto alekanoyagagi, nafaneami kanale kava huya kava nehuya natu vayaene kanaleya huya neamateya, Anumaya Kotina amakua neamiya veala kanaleya huya kava hu neamateya, kana yama amakaite evayi hinageya aliya kanale hu neamateya, mukia aliyana kanaleya huya ali-mainesaya keto alekanomo-gami amakiage kaeho.
Yauva keto anemogamina amakia okaeho. Haenagaa Kalaisi aliyana neataleya alu vele umaisaya amaku amakesa havigahae.
Ani kavama hisayana Kalaisi aliya aligahune. huyama hulokiya vai-malenaya kemona ago atalenaya yafe Havi kava humainone. huya amaipa haviya huyafenagi.
Nago yaenena aliyana oaliya afaa maineya nokuyate vaineayeya umaiya-hai emaiya-hai nehuya alu veamogami ke huya atile male nehuya kanale ohunea keyagaene amakesafitila hugahae.
Yauva keto anemoya alu ve aliteya nafaneami neamateya kanaleya huya kava yagai-maisaya yafe nagaila nenahaiye. Ania hisageya kame vayatimoya havigea tagaila hu otatesae.
Nagoa keto anemoya Yisasi kema havisaya kaana neataleya Satani akavema nevaya yafe nehue.

Nagoma Yisasife havino aguafi malenea amoa agaia tayamepima keto ama mainesiana kanaleya huno hamaeno kava yagaitesie. Havigu mono nopi malesaya monema omalesigenoa kana hamaugahigi vayaamima omainesaya keto anege alita amaya hisune.

Yisasina amakua aminaya vayate kava vayamoya kanale aliya nealiya Anumaya Koti ke huhaleya nehuya kanale keage hamapaisaya vayala Kanaleya huya amatesia kava nehae. hutama ani kavama haya anonaa amakia alisaga nehutama kanaleya hutama nagoene monea amamisae huna nehue.
Anumaya Koti avopima kaemalenaya kemoa mage huno humaine
Pulumakamoa viti avina aiyaleti aye hagagema hisigetamahena amavayalela nofila okiho. Amatalegeya aliyaamia nealiya vaiyeya kavela neneya vaiyeho.
Mani kea nehuno nago kene mage huno humaine
Aliya veamoya aliyaamiletila anonaa miyana alisageno amategahie. huno humaineane.
Nagoke kanomoa Anumayamo aliya nealisia kanomofe Naa huno havi kava nehie. hunoma hisigetamahena kea ohaviho. Tolemoganifi tagufa vayamoyama tamahapaisagetamahena havitetama kaiyekea hutesae.

Anumaya Koti aliya nealisaya veamoya kefo kavama huge huge hisagetama mukia mono note veamogami amaufi amavale-matetama amaku amakesa alitama fatago hisageya mukia veamoya ageteya koli hisae huna nehue.

Anumaya Koti aufiene Yisasi Kalaisi aufiene huno yogi-malenea ensole vayaigami amaufiene mage huna kahanepauve Anima kahapauva kemona akave nehuka veala alika fako faka ohuka nago kana kana huka mukia veala kagesa havi neamamika aliyakaa alio.

Anumaya Koti aliya alisie. huka nehanafe nago kanomo anute kaya maleka ani aliyatela aupaa alika heti oato. Agelama huteka ali hetito. Havigu nagoa vayamogami kefo yaamimo kagaipi eyafenagi kagaya fatago kavakeya huka maiyo.
Mukia kanafina kaipa kagata neaigeka kali vaya kana nehanafe titafakeyamaagela oneka nofi alagamo tina osia negeno kaipamoa kanale hino.
Nagoa veamoya kefo kavakeya nehageno kefo yaamimoa ago efufute higeya kaiyekele umainagi nagoa veamoya falakiya kefo kavala maiya nehaya veanea haenagaa kefo yaamimoa efufute huno falote hugahie.
Naa augafa kava huya kanale kava nehaya kavala mukiamogatamina fufu yate nelamakone. Fufutema nohia kanale kavamoa nagola fala okigahianagino mukia falotekeya huno fufu yate hugahie.

Yisasina amakuama aminaya veamoya, nofi humatageya afa aliyama nealiya veamoya, amatesia kava huya kava vayaamimo-gami amakia alisaga hisae. Alisaga nehuya keamia ali hipoya ohisageya veamoya neamakeya Anumaya Koti agia ali haviya nehuya Anumaya Kotiamimo kea akave nomalae. huya hugahae.

Kava vayatamimoya Yisasina amakuama aminaya veama mainaya yafe Afaa nafunagana maineafe agai kea ali hipoya ohugahue. hutama ohiho. Ani kema ohisayana Yisasina amakuama aminaya vayatela afa aliya veane mainetama tamakuama aminayafe tamakaila kanaleya hutama amaya hisaya aliyaamia aliho.
Manima kahapauva kea kagaya Timotiga hamapaiyo.

Nagoa veamoya alu ke hisayana Anumayatia Yisasi Kalaisina kelamage keamona akave ohuya Anumaya Kotina haiya kava hiho. huya nohaya veala amakaiami amaugafa aliya nehaiya kanale amaku amakesa amakai amakupina tamage huno omalene. Omalenea yafe kema hisaya yafena ati neayeya Yisasi kehe ke vaiya nemaiye. Kema vaiya yapiti nago yana falote nehigeya mage huya nehae Agima haneafe ali haviya hugahe nehune. huya amakaiami keamimo tua hu neamategeya amakia hu haviya nehuya Havi kavala nehae. huya humatenayane.

Kelamage kemoa ago amakekani-mainegeya kea vaige vaige maiya nehae. Ani veamoya amakesafiti mage huya nehae Anumaya Koti kemona akave malesunana kuafenotimoa ali kasago hinageta kanaleya huta maigahune. huya tusi yate havi amakesa havimainae.
Havi amakesa nehaviyanagi tamage tagaya Anumaya Koti ke akave nemaleta ali-mainona yafeke muse nehuta Alu yaenena nagoene alisune. huta nohuna yafena tusia muse huta maigahune.
Ehema itatimoya latageta mainonana nago yana alita omenone. Tagaya falisuna yupa nago yana eteta alita ougahune.
Ani yafe Kenatiene kavetiene hai hane. Taipamoa kanale nehinageta kanaleya huta maigahune. huta hisune.

Kanaleya huta maigahunanagi Mone afenoti alita kasago hisunema. haya veala ani yamoa Kefo kava hiho. huno aye-mavataga hisigeya hanagimalenea kalifufi hemaleneya amaugafa ali haviya hisia yafe aneginagi yapi asaga hulaviya kefo kavaage hisaya yaamimo ayegeamategeya ali haviya humatesigeno amaugafa amakata aigahie.
Mukia monehema muse nehaya kavala mukia kefo kavamona aepaa hane. Ani kavamoa haga nehamaigeya nagoa veala Yisasife haviya amakupi malenaya kemona ago atalageno amaipamoa tusia kanaage hamau-maine.

Kagaya Timotigae Anumaya Koti kema akave nemalana kanomoga mukia ani kefo yana neataleka fatago kavaage hisana kagesa havika maineka Anumayamoma nehaiya kavaage nehuka Yisasife havika kagupi malenana yana atafa hulineka veafena kahau kayamopafi kahaino. Tokiya vaisana yana atafa nehuka mailava huka ako huka maiyo.

Aluya huka Yisasifema kagupi malenana kemona atafa hisanafe Satanienena kanaleya huka tua nehuka Anumaya Koti akave neuka agola maige maige hisana kahaimula atafa huo. Mukia veamogami amaufima Yisasifena havina nagupi malenoe. huka hu falotema humainana kanafina ani agolama maige maige hisana kahaimula aligane huno humainea yafe Anumaya Kotia kagaila ago huno yogi-malene.

Anumaya Kotia mukia yamogami hamaimu aepama mainea kanomo aufina hulokiya vaina kahanepauve. Ala kava kanomoa Potiasi Pailatia Yisasi Kalaisina kaiyekema hu neategenoa Yisasi Kalaisia kanaleya huno kelamage kea huno falote humainea kanomo aufina mage huna hulokiya vaina kahanepauve.

Anumaya-moma kahapai-mainea kea nehavika ani kavaageya veamogami amaufina hume hume haiyo. Aniama hisanageya veamoya Havi kava nehie. huya ohugahae. Ani kavakeya hume hume nevisanageno Anumayatimoa Yisasi Kalaisia esie.

Agaiama malenea kanama falote hisia yupa Anumaya Kotia Yisasina hutesigeno eteno elavisigeta agegahune. Tokiyaage huta tusia muse hutesuna Anumaya agaiage mukia yana kava yagaino maine. Anumaya Kotia mukiama uhagote mainaya sauve vayamo-gamina agaiage amakaseno ala sauve kanoamia maine. Ala vayamogamina agaiage amakaseno ala kanoamia maine.

Anumaya Kotia ofalino agola maige maige nehia kano maine. Agaya tusia hale yapi maineafe mopafi veala mo aupa ohuteasine. Nago kanomoa agaila oagenegi tokiyatia omaleneanagita agaila oagoteasine. Agaya agaia ala kava kano agola maige maige huno agola kava kano maisie huta agia alisaga hisune. Mani kea tamage.

Kuafenoamima kasagoya hanea veamoya ani yaamihe amaugafa aliya ohaisae. Fanane hisia kuafenoamihe amametiti ohisagi Anumaya Kotima mukia muse nehuna yama neamamia kanomofe haviya amametiti hiho huka amaumonola malo.
Mukia kuafenoamima hanesia veamoya kanale kava nehuya vayamogamina monene amaya hisae. Vayaamimofe hamau humateya vaya kaikai vea maisae.
Ani kavama hisayana kanale kavaage yayaga aliya halaya hu-maleneya haenagama ikapinaga haiya maisaya no avana huya tunage yosa neayeya kanale hamaimula atafa hu-lineya maige maige hugahae.

Vaeha Timotigae kaminea aliyana aluya huka aunevaika kava neyagaigeno Anumaya Kotia ohunea kea afa kegi ohavika kakaveno huto. Nagoa veamoya Tagaya ke havilama nehuna vea mainone. huya havige huya hisaya veamogami kea ohavika kakaveno huto. Naa augafa kemoa Anumaya Kotina kamea maine.
Nagoa veamoya amakaiami kema haviya akavema malaya yafe Anumaya Kotife havita tagupima malenona kea ago neatalae.
Anumaya Kotia kayone hisia yamaa kaminageno kanaleya huno kaya hisie huna nehue.
Kenia male hano hie.
Nagaini nagia Polonae.

Nagaya Polonae Timotigahe aluya huno nenahaiya nafanenimogahe mani avona negaove. Yisasi Kalaisiene tokaetama maisunana Maige maige hisuna tahaimula tamamigahue. huno hulokiya vai-malenea kema havisaya yafene huno Anumaya Kotia haiya kava huno nagaila huyogi-maleteno Aposolo kanoa hunatene. Kagaya Timotiga Anumaya Kotia Nelafaene Yisasi Kalaisi Anumayatimoene kagaifena hanau hugateana kayone hu yaene kaipa falu kahaisia yaene kamisae.

Nagaila naginagomoya hu-mainaya kava huno naguamoa nahapaigena ani kate neuna Anumaya Koti aliyana nealina nateene felugaene kegeene kagaila kaya hisiafene huna Anumayamotega muse huna nunamuna huna havinegoe.
Kagaya avima atana yafene huna nagesa havinegamina kagaila kagesua yafena aluya huno nenahaigena kagesugeno naipamoa tusia musena hugahie.
Kagehokamoa, Loisiene itakamoa, Yunasiene Yisasife haviana anakupi maleana anametitia hu-mainaa kava kagaya ania huka Yisasife havika kagupi malenane huna nagesa havina negamue.
Naa hu-maineafe nagayama kagai kanute nayama malogeno Anumaya Koti aliyamona tokiya yamaa kamigeka ali-mainana tokiya yana fufu hisanageno kanale anefe tesigeka ani aliyana oataleka alige-lige huo.
Anumaya Kotima laminea Avamumoa koli hisuna tagu tagesa notamiafe tagaya tokiya yamaaene kanaleya huta veanea tagua neamamita tagu tagesalema kava yagaisuna tokiya ago tamine.

Anumayatimo ke huka falote hisana yafena kagayea ohinageka kolia ohuo. Nagaya keama huna falote nehugeya kina nopi natenaya yafena kagayea ohuo. Anumaya Kotia tokiyaa kaminegeka Yisasina kanale keama hana yafe kagaima kana yama kamisageka nakaiene tokaetaa aligahue.

Anumaya Kotia kefo kava huna yapiti tagu tamena alino katigeta alu aotage anagaa maisuna yafe tagaila huno yogi-malene. Tagayama kanale humainona yafene huno huyo okinegi agaia agesa haviteno haiya kava huno kayone hulategahe ani kavala humaine. Ikaene mopaene falote ohunegeno Yisasi Kalaisia Kayone hulamategahue. huno agesaa havimaineanagino menia Yisasia efalotema humainea yateti taveli-maine. Tagayama kefo kavama huna yamo anonaa Yisasi Kalaisia alia yafe tagu tamena aligatiteno fali yamo tokiyaa ago ali hano hu-taleteno ofalita agola maige maige hisuna tahaimula tamiteno umaige maige hisuna kaana ago taveli-maine.
Nagaya Yisasina kanale kea huna falote nehuna huge amavelige hisuafene huno Anumaya Kotia nagaila huyogi-malegena Aposolo kanoa mainoe.

Ani yafe nagaila ali haviya hunatayanagi nagaila lamage huno nagayehena ohuna Anumayamofe havina nagupi malena nametiti humainoa kanomofena ago havilama humainoe. Agaia naminea aliyanagino auvainenateno kanaleya huna alisua yafe Nagaila nahamaegahie. huna nagesa havimainoe. Ani kavala nehinageno Yisasia ikapinagatima eteno elavigahie huna nehue.

Anumaya Koti nafanehema haviyama amakupi maleya amametitima nehaya veamoya Yisasifena amakupi ago havimainagi Anumaya Kotifema haviya amakupi omaleya amametitima nohaya veanea Anumaya Kotia Yisasifema nagaini nafane maine. huno hu-mainea kema nohaviya yafe Anumaya Kotifena Havigeage kano maine. huya nehae.
Anumaya Kotia mage huno humaine Agola maige maige hisaya tamahaimula ago tamaminoe. hunoma hiana agola maige maige hisuna tahaimumona aepaa agaia nafane maine.

Nagoa veamoya Anumaya Kotina nafanehema Nagupi emaiyo. huyama hisayana agolama maige maige hisaya hamaimula ago ali-mainagi Anumaya Kotina nafaneamofema Nagupi emaiyo. huyama nohaya veamogamina Yisasia amakupina omainegeya agolama maige maige hisaya hamaimula oalinae.
Agola maige maige hisuna tahaimula ago ali-mainone hutama havilama hisaya yafe tamakaya Anumaya Koti nafanehe havitama tamakupi maletama tamametitima haya veamogatami mani avona kaena tamahanepauve.
Tagaya Anumaya Kotitegama nelahaisia yafema havigesunana havigahie. Havigahie huta havimainona yafe agaifena kolia ohuta agaite eupa huta havinegone.
Mukia yafema havigesunana havigahie. huta havilama hu-mainona yafe Havigesuna yana lamigahie. huta havimainone.

Nagola kefo kavala falisia augafa kefo kava haneanagi nago kanoa ania augafa kefo kavama hiseana ani kanomofe Anumaya Kotitega ke hutama havigeho huna nohugi nago negafuma agesanageno kefo kavama mainoma nehisia kanomofena Anumayamotega havigesanageno agola maige maige hisia haimula amigahie.
Mukia kefo kavala kefo yamaage hanegi kefo kavafema amakua aiyahaema hisayana ofaligahae.

Tagaya ago havimainone Anumaya Kotima atenea kanomoa kefo kavala maino huge huge nohie. Yisasie, Anumaya Kotima atenea nafanemoa, auvai neamatea yafe Satania melino haviya humategahena mematafa ohugahie.
Anumaya Koti nafaneyaga mainonagi mukia veanemoya Satani tokiyale aiyafinaga nemaiya yafe tagaya ago havimainone.

Yisasi Kalaisia, Anumaya Koti nafanemoa, eaamo aepaa agelama hisuna tagu tagesa ago tamineafe tamage Anumaya Kotina agelama nehuta agaiene nafaneamoene ailokaeta mainone. Ani kanoa tamage Anumaya Koti maineno agola maige maige hisuna tahaimumona aepaa maine.
Mainegi osi nafaneyaganimogatama kava yagaitama afaa Anumayamofena tamakesa havitama tamakua oamiho.
Kaiyekenia male me hano hie.
Nagainia nagia Yoninae.

Nagaya Yoninae Yisasina amakua aminaya vayate kava vayatamamonae mani avona kaogi haviho. Anumaya Kotima hapalino huyogi-katenea amogae kagaifeene nafaneyagakamofeene kaena nelamamue. Tamage huna nagaya tamakaifena nahau nayamopafi nenahaiye. Nagainigela nonahaigi mukia veamoya Anumaya Kotia kelamage kema humainea kema havilinaya veamoya ania huya tamakaifena amahau amayamopafi nehamaiye.
Anumaya Kotina kelamage keamoa tagupi haneme uno agola hanesia yafe tagaya tamakaifena tahau tayamopafina nelahaiye.
Tamageage veane mainonafe nelafu-gamifena tahau tayamopafi tahaisigeno Anumaya Kotia, Nelafaene nafaneamoa Yisasi Kalaisiene kayone hu yamaaene kalagi aimate yamaaene taipa falu hisia yaene lamisae.
Nagaya nagoa nafaneyagaka-moya Nelafama tagaifena Mani kema akave maleho. huno hu-mainea kate maleya Anumaya Kotina kelamage keama akave nemalaya yafe havitena tusia muse nehue.
Musekaa nehugi amogae menia mukia Yisasi kema nehaviya nelamafu-gamifema tamahau tamayamopafina tamahaisie. Nagaya ohavinana kea kahanopaugi nayoma havimainona ke kahanepauve.
Anumaya Kotifema tahau tayamopafima nelahaisiana agai kea akave malegahune. Nayoma havimainaya kemoa mage humaine Nelafu-gamifema tamahau tamayamopafima tamahaisia yana akave maleho. huno humaine.

Nesuya veamoya aye lamavataga huya havige nehuya ma mopafina vaiyatete huya havigea mage huya nehae Yisasi Kalaisia ma mopafina vea eno omaine. huya nehae. Mani kema hisaya veamoya havigelafa aye lamavataga hisaya vaya maineya Yisasina kame vayaa mainae.
Tamakaya aliyama alitetama ali-mainaya yana ataleyafenagi yagaitama tokiya hiho. Ania hisayana mukiamogatama anonaatamia kanale yatamia aligahae.
Nagoa veamoyama Yisasi kema atafa huya tokiya ovaiya haleyama alu kefima vayana Anumaya Kotina oavalenagi Yisasi kema atafa huyama tokiya vai-linaya veamoya Yisasiagi Nefaganiene ani veaene nemaie.
Nago kanomoma tamakaitema evayi hunoma mani Yisasi kema oalino alu ke alu kema alino esigetama tamakaya hu falu fala hu oatetama avaletama notamifina oateho.
Hu faluma hutesaya veamoya ani kanomona havi aliyamaa aya nehae.
Nagaya kasagoya ke kaegahe huanagi Afaa ani kemoa avopina okaesue. Afaa tamakaila mo lamakesugetama kea kea nehuta musekase hugahune. huna nehue.
Nunakamona Anumaya Kotia hapalino agaialega atenea amoene nafaneyagaaene tamakaifena Felugae. huya hu falu fala hu nelamatae.
Kenia male hano hie.
Nagaini nagia Yoninae.
Nagaya Yoninae Yisasina amakuama aminaya veate kava vayatamamonae Kaiyusiga nafunaganagae tamagelafa huna kagaifena nahau nayamopafi nenahaiye huna mani avona negaove.
Nahau-mainea nafunaganaga kagaila kagu kamemoa kanaleya huno nemaiya kava huka mukia kaugafaene aliyama alisana yamoene kanaleya hisie huna nunamuna nehue.
Nagoa tafutaganaya kagayama Anumaya Kotina kelamage keama akave malekama kama vaiyana yafena Tamage huno fatago huno vai neaye. huya me nahapaigena havitena tusiya huna musekasena hu negatoe.
Nafaneyaganimoya fatago huya vai yesayana tusia musekase nehuanagi mani musema hua yamona nagola alu muse yama nehua yamona oagasene.
Nenahaiya nafunaga kanale kava nehuka katega oagenana kafukagana-gamina neageka amayama hu-mainana kavala kanale kava hu-mainane.

Nagoama amaya hu-mainana veamoya eteya mono nopi hetiya kagayama amakaima kayone humatenana kavafena me lahapaigeta haviteta tusia musekaa hugi menia Anumaya Kotina haisia kava huka katema visaya veala amaya huo.

Amakaya Yisasi kea hamapaigahe ayanagi Yisasi kema ohavinaya vayapitila nagola monema oalinaya yafena tagaya aniama hu-mainaya vaya amaya hinuta amakaiene tokaeta Anumaya Kotina kelamage kea ali lokaeta hamapai-mainone.
Nagaya nago kea ago kaena mono nopi vayate ago atalogeno umaineanagi nago kanoa Tiotalefesia uhagoteno maisia yafe nehaigeno Yonini kea ohavine.

Ohavianagina nagaya tamakaitega visuaamona ani kavama hia kavala mono nopima mainaya vaya mo hamapaigahue. Nagaifena havige huno Havi kava nehie. huno nehuno ani kavaagela nohigi tafuta-ganayama neayana amavaleno falu fala hu oamateno amatalegeya nagoa veamoya amavaleyama falu fala humategahema nehayana Ania ohiho. huno nehuno mono nopitila amavayu hu neamataleno nehie.

Nenahaiya nafuna-ganaga kefo kavala akave omalo. Kanalema humainesia kavaage akave malo. Kanale kavaage huge hugema nehaya veamoya Anumaya Kotina nafanea mainagi kefo kavaage huge hugema nehaya veamoya Anumaya Kotina oagenae.

Mukia veamoya Temitaliusifena Kanale kano maine. huya hageno Anumaya Koti kelamage kemoa Kanale kava nehie. huno higena nagaienena Kanale kava nehie. huna nehue. Kagaya nagayama kelamage keage kanoma mainoa yafena ago havimainane.
Nagaya kasagoya kea kaegahe huanagi ani kea nagoke omanafina okaegahue. Kagaila aupa kanafi mo kagesugetaa kea kea hugahue.

Kaipamoa falu huno maisie. Male mainaya kafuka-ganaya kagaifena Felugae. huya hu falu fala hu negatagena nagaya nalegama mainaya nafunagana-gamina ania huna Felugae. huna hu neamatogi amahaote amahaote amaki ayeka hamapaiyo.
Kenia male hano hie.
Nagaini nagia Yoninae.
Nagaya Yutinae Yisasi Kalaisi aliya kanomona Yemesina aganaamona mani avona kaena nelamamue.
Tamakaya Anumaya Koti kema havitama agaitegama nevaya veamogatama Anumaya Koti, Nelafaa agua tamakaila nelamamigeno Yisasi Kalaisia kava hu nelamatea veamogatamale mani avona kaena nelamamue.
Anumayamoa kalagi ainelamatea yaene tamaipa falu hutama maisaya yaene nagoamogamifema tamaipa amamisaya yaene tamakaipi ala hisia yafe aluya huno nenahaiye.

Nenahaiya nafunagana-gatama Anumaya Kotia tamakaiene tagaiene tagu tamema ali negatia yafena mani avona kaena tamamisue huanagi nago yamoa falote higeno Anumaya Kotia alu nagesa namigena mage nehue. Yisasima hu-latenea yafena mukia kea ago tahapaigeta havimainona kanale mono kehena nagoa veamoya Ohaviho. huya nehagena ani kema hisaya vayaene Ke nevaitama maiho. huna mani avona negaove.

Nagoa Yisasi kema nohaviya vayamoya kesi ako huya tagaipima emaiya vayamoya mage huya hae Anumaya Kotia kayone hu-lateno kefo yatia aye hamigahigi afaa molia hu-liteta higetao. huya nehayanagi Anumayatimoa agaiage kava kanotia mainegeya Yisasi Kalaisina amakavenona hu neatae. Hu neatayanagino Anumaya Kotia kaiyekema humateteno kefo yamo anonaamima amamisia yafena nayona agaia avopina ago kae-maleneanagita havimainone.

Nayona ago tamahapaigetama ago havilinaya keagi menia huna lamakesa hao hisue huna nehue. Anumaya Kotia Isipi vea mopaleti mukia Isaleli veala hamamaeno amaugafa aligati-maineanagi haenaga Anumayamoa humatenea yafema haviya amakupi omalaya veala Anumaya Kotia hamaegeya fali-mainae.

Nagi Anumaya Kotia ensole vayafena Kava hiho. huno aliyana amamianagi ani aliyatela mailama huya omaigeno amatenea yapitila ataleya vageno Anumayamoa amavaleno seni nofiteti agola kimatafa hu-mategeya afepinaga haniki-mainea kumate maineya Anumaya Kotia tusiya huno kaiyekema humatesia yafena agava mainae.

Nagi Sotomu kumaene Komola kumaene aupatema hanea kumateene mainaya veamoya ani kava huya kumai kavala nehuya vemoya ve amafaluyaenena moli hu-liteya hu-liteya huya maiya hageno Anumaya Kotia kefo yamo anonaamia neamamino asua ohuno tegelege nehia atafi amatalegeno ani atamoa amaugafa tege sagalige nehigeya anifi agola mainayanagita ani yafena tagesa havi havi huta havisune.

Nehavita Yisasi kehena havigema nehaya vayala tagaiene maineya ani kavakeya nehageno himonama agaya yamoa amavaleno anegi-nagi yapi amategeya kumai yate nehuya kava vayamogami kea ohaviya ensole vayamo-gamifena hu-haviya hu neamatae.

Hu neamatayanagi Mosesema faligenoa hagote ensole kanomo agia Maikoloa Satanienena Mosesema falia augafaaletila Ta alisie. Ta alisie. huana kea vaianagi Maikoloa Satanina hu-haviya hute kea ohunegi Anumayamoa agaia kea kama-kisie. huno hu-maineane.

Naa hu-maineanagi Yisasi kehena havigegeyama nehaya vayamoya ani kavala nohagi amakesamoa havilama ohunea yamofena hu-haviya hu neamatae. Afu kalamoya amaku amakesa nohaviya avamete kava nehageno ani kavama haya yamo amaugafamona ali haviya hu-matene.

Avonio amaugafama alino haviya humatesia yafena kayeya maisae. Kenia havi kavama huno aganaamona Epolona haegeno fali-mainea kava huya tamakaienema nemaiya vayamoya ani kava maiya nehuya hilato ohunea katela nevae. Nevagi nago kanomo agia Palamue mone alisia yafe havigea maino nehianagiya ani vayamoya ani augafa kava huya mone alisaya yafe havigegeyana maiya nehae. Nehageno nago kanomo agia Kolae Anumayamona veganokano hutegeno Anumayamoa fali hano hutenea yafena nohaviyanagiya ani vayamoya ani kavakeya maiya nehuya Anumaya Koti kemona amakavenona hu neatayafe Anumayamoa Faliho. huno hinageya fali hano hugahae.

Tamakaya Yisasina tamakuama aminaya veamogatama agaife nehavitama kave negahema melitalu nehayana ani kefo vayamoya emaineya osagopu vayalagiya amakaiamihekeya amakesa havi havi huya neneya tamakaye hisifa kava huya ani kavema naya kavela ali haviya nehae. Naa vayamoya siamoma aye hani huteno kola oaino laga hulino ute ete higeno afa koma titalea kava higeya ani vayala afa ya kana vaya mainae. Yosamoa alagama ayesia kanamoa falote hianagi alagama noayea yosamoma hia avamete huya mainageno amakaipina nagola kanale yana falote ohune. Avinamoa omalegeya hafuyaene tagasi huya vakai-talageno fayote-mainea yosa kana huya maineya kanale kema tamaya hisaya kea omalegeya havi kavala maiya nehae.

Nehageno kefo yama nehaya yamoa timoma tusiya huno hogiteno ti valufama alino ti agegayalega mo talia kava huno kefo yaamimoa ania augafa kava hu-mainegeta neamakone. Kanefimoma ikatela alu katete katetema ute ete nehia avamete huya havige huya mainagi kanaleya huno fatago humainea kana tamave-notiye. Tamave-notigeno Anumaya Kotia kumayu haniki-mainea kumala afepinaga hanea kumate maisaya yafe kumaamia ago talo tala humateneanagiya agola anifinaga maigahae.

Maigahagi ani vayafena Atamupiti avinama huya maime emainaya vayapitila Inokue Atamupitila seveni (7) molia aginagomoagino falote huno mainea kanomoa anima kefo yama nehaya vayafena Anumaya Koti aune kea hamapaino mage huno hu-maineane
Mama hisua kea haviho. Anumayamoa kasagoya tausenia ensole vayaaene elavino egahie.

Esiana mukia veanea kaiyekea humateteno agai kema neatagaeya kefo yama maiya nehaya veanene Anumaya Kotina kamugema hatageya vaiteya hu-haviya hu neataya veamogamina Anumaya Kotia tusia kefo yamo anonaamia amamigahie. huno hu-maineane.

Anima Anumayamo kehena havigegeyama nehaya vayamoya mukia yafe Otahaiya yane. huya kalu kalu kea nevaigeno amaipamoa haviya nehigeya amakaiami amaugafa age hamaye nehaya yaamihena maiya huge huge nehuya ala kenake nehuya amakaiami amakia alisaga nehuya tamakaiteti nagoa yama alisaya yafena tamakaifena Tahaiya veane mainae. huya tamaipafi ayegegahe nehae.
Tamakaya nahau nayamopafi nenahaiya veamogatama Aposolo vayamoya haenagama falote hisia yafema tamahapai-mainaya kehena tamakesamoa hao hinagetama haviho.

Mage huya tamahapai-mainayane Anumayamo esia kanamoa ago aupa nehisigeya nagoa veamoya Yisasima hulatenea yafe huya kigi huteteya amakaiamia amaugafamo age haye nehia kavakeya huya maigahae. huya hu-mainayane.
Hu-mainayanagi anima Yisasi kehena havigegeyama nehaya vayamoya Yisasina amakuama aminaya veamogamina ali-pasema-talageya mopafi yafekeya amakesa nehavigeno Alu Aotage Avamumoa amakaienena nomaiye.

Naa huya mainagi tamakaya nahau nayamopafi nenahaiya nafunagana-gatama naa kavala ohutama Yisasima hulatenea yafe tusiya huno alu aotage ke hanegi tamakupima malenaya kea atafa hutama tokiyaage higeno Alu Aotage Avamumoa tokiya tamamisigetama Anumayamotega kea hutama havigeho.

Anumaya Kotia tamakaifema huno aguama lamaminea yapi mainetama Anumayati Yisasi Kalaisia tamakaifema kalagima ainelamatea yafena kanaleya hutama agola maige maige hisaya tahaimu tamamisia yafena tamametitia hutama agava maiho.
Mainetama Yisasifema tole amakesa nehaviya veala tamahau humatetama alitama kanale humateho.

Ani veamoya nomoa atama nelea yapi mainaya veane kana huya havi kate uyafenagi ani veala amavayu hutama amaugafa aligatiho. Aligatitama nagoa vayamoya kefo yama nehaya kavafena Otahaiya kavale. hutama koli hutama kayetama mainetama tamahauna humateho.

Havigu kefo yapi asaga hu-lavi yafenagi Anumaya Kotia agaia tamau vaino tamavalesaga huno tamanu kisia kano maineanagitama asaga hu otavitama kefo yatamia omale veane mainesageno tusia muse huno tamavalesaga huno agaia tokiyaage hale yapina Anumaya Koti mainesilega tamategahie.

Anumaya Kotia agaiage tusia tokiyaa hanea Anumayati maineanagino Yisasi Kalaisi Anumayatimoa hulatenea yafe Anumaya Kotia tagu tamena ago aligati-maine. Naama hulatenea yafena tusiya huta tokiyaage hale yamaaene agia alisaga hisune. Agaya hagote ala kava kano maineanagino mukia yana kava yagaisia tokiyaa hanegeno yagaino maine. Agaya ehema ma mopama talo ohunea kanafina aepa heno ania hume hume eaamo menienena ani yakeya huno maine. Haenagaama maisuna kanaene menima mainona kanaene kava yagaimainea yana oataleno ani ya atafa hu-ligahianagiya mukia veamoya havilama huteya agia alisaga hisae. Mani kea tamage.
Kenia male hano hie.
Nagaini nagia Yutinae.

Nagaya Yoninae Yisasi Kalaisia naveligena agetena mani kea kaena tamahapaigahe nehue. Nayona mani kemoa fala-kino haneanagino Anumaya Kotia ani kanamoa aupaa falote hisia yana Yisasi Kalaisina agaia aliya veane amave-lisiafene huno Yonina ave-ligeno kae-malene. Yisasia ensole kanoa hutegeno nagaya agai aliyama nealua kanoa, Yoninile, eaamo mani yayaga me naveli-maine.
Me naveligena age-mainoa yafeene Anumaya Koti kene Yisasi Kalaisi humainea kene alina tamage huna tamahanepauve.
Ma avopima kae-maloa kea ago aupaa falote hisia yafe aune laga huno humainea kema hapaliya havisaya veanene haviteya akavema malesaya veanene tusia muse hugahae.
Nagaya Yoninae Esia kotega sevenia (7) mono noma hanea veamogatamale mani avona kaena nelamamue.

Anumaya Kotia nayona maineanagino menienena maineanagino haenagaa maisia kanogino agaia kava yagai-mainea siamo aulega sevenia (7) Avamumoya hetiya mainayanagiya kayone hisaya yaamiene tamaipa falu hisia yaamiene tamamisae.

Tamamisageno Yisasi Kalaisia fatago huno Anumaya Koti kema hamapai-mainea kanomoa fali-mainaya veapitila uhagote-lateno heti-maineanagino mukia veanema fali-mainesafiti hetisaya katia valilatene. Mukia mopafima mainaya sauve vayamogamina sauveamimoa agaiage maineanagino kayone hisia yamaaene tamaipamo falu hisia yamaaene tamamisie. Tagaifena hau ayamopafi haigeno agaia kolamaa ailaki-talenea yateti mukia kefo yatimoa aigagilateneanagino agola ali kalu hetalene.

He-taleneanagino Anumaya Kotia kava yagailatesia yapi tavaleno tategeta mainonanagita tagayama Nelafa Anumaya Koti aliyama nealita agima alisaga huta musema hutesunafene huno hulatene. Hulateneanagita mukia kanafina agai agia alisaga hisunageno tokiyaage hale yamaamoa agola hanege hanege huno hanesie. Tamage.

Ageho Yisasia siate maiteno egahigi mukia amakavenoma huteteya augafafima kevema aye-mainaya veanene mukia ma mopafima mainaya veamoyaene ageteya tusiya huya hamau huteya avi tegahae. E, ani yana tamage huno falote hugahie. Tamage.

Ala Anumaya Kotia mage huno humaine “Nagaya nagainia mukia tokiyamona aepaa mainoanagina mukia yatela kava yagai-mainoafe alivayayesua kanoa tamage huna mainoe. Nayo kanafina mainoanagina menia mainoanagina haenagaa maigahue. Tusia tokiyania hanea kava kano mainoe.” huno hu-maineane.

Nagaya Yoninae neputamimona tamakaienena Yisasiene ailokaeta mainona yafe tusia kana yaene tagata aiya yaene falote hianagi Anumaya Kotia kava yagailategeta mailava huta tokiyaage huta mainone. Nagaya Anumaya Koti kene Yisasia tagaima hulatenea mono kene huhalena hua yateti navaleya Patimosia ti amunopi hanea kumate kina hunatagena mainoe.
Mainogi nago Sotayupa Alu Aotage Avamumoa tokiyaage huno natafa higena nehavugeno nakavelagati nagola ala kegefamoa ufema nehaya avamete huno agea aigena havimainoe.

Ani kemoa mage huno humaine “Mukia yama agesana yana avopi kaeteka atalegeno sevenia (7) kumate hanea mono note veatega vino. Efesusiene Simenaene Pegamumuene Taiyatailaene Satisiene Filatelefiene Leotisiaene vino.” huno humaine.
Higena kema nahapaiya kanoma agesuafene huna maiyahae huna agoana sevenia (7) lamua kanileta yafateti talo humale lamua hanegena age-mainoe.

Agoa lamuyagamo amunopina nago kanoa, ikapinagati emainea kanoa vayamo atenea nafanemo augafa kana kanoa hetino mainegeno ayaaya kenamoa aiyalega vai-talegeno tavigeno kanileta yafateti talo humale amunofila aigagino haifiyafale hu-malenegena agoe.
Agogeno ayolagefamoa efeage huno sipi sipimo ayolagefaleti talo humale nofi kana huteno efeage sia kana nehigeno aulagamoa ata nefemoma hia avamete humaine.
Higeno aiyamoa nagola atafima kae-malageno teno tokiyaage huno hale yamaaene kanileta yafa kana nehigeno agema aiya agemoa paugegefa nehigeno ala timo agemoma neaiya avamete kava huno aimaine.
Ayapina sevenia (7) kanefi atafa hu-linegeno avayafitila tole kaiyaga avenene naepe kayona anikofi-linegeno augosamoa yagemoma hia kava huno aigalu galu huno aivasa humaine.

Aigalu galu higena neagena fali-mainea vaya kana huna aiyafi nagoya aye-mainogeno tamaga ayana naugafale maleno mage huno hie “Kolia ohuo nagaya mukia tokiyamona aepaa mainoanagina nagaya uhagotena maitena haenagalafana maitena huna mainoa kano mainoe.

Nagaya nahaimuene kano mainoe. Nayona ago fali-mainoanagi ago hetina haegafa huna agola mukia kanafina maige maige huna mainoanagina veama nefalia yaene fali-mainaya veamoya mainaya kumate ki nofitela ali-linena ani yapitima amavalena amatalesua himamunia hane.
Haneafe kagaya menima falote higeka agana yaene haenagama falote hisia yaenena avopi kae-malo.

Sevenia (7) kanefiene sevenia (7) kanileta yafateti talo humalenaya lamuenena tamaga nayapima hanegeka agana yamoa falaki-mainea yamo aepaa kahapaigahue. Sevenia (7) kanefimoa maa humaine sevenia (7) kumatema Yisasife haviya melitalu nehaya veate kava vayafe humaine. Sevenia (7) lamumoa ani sevenia (7) mono noyagafi Yisasife haviya melitalu nehaya veafe humaine.”

Efesusi mono note mainaya veate kava kanohena mage huka kao nagaya tamaga nayapina sevenia (7) kanefi atafa hulinena sevenia (7) kanileta yafateti talo humalenaya lamumo amunopi ute ete nehua kanomona mani kea tamahanepauve.

Nagaya tamakai auava yatamia ago age-mainoe. Tusia kasageke-voke hutama aliyama nealiya yafeene mailava hutama tokiyaagema hutama nemaiya yaenena ago age-mainoe. Kefo yama nehaya veafena “Havigegeyama nehaya yamo otahaiya vayala mainayanagita tamakai kea ohavigahune.” hutama nehae. Nehageya ani vayamoya havige huya “Tagayaenena Aposolo vaya mainone.” huya nehayanagi tamakaya keamia ago havitama fako hutama haviyana “Havigegeya maiya nehaya vaya mainae.” hutama nehae.
Tamakaya nagai nagima alilinageya ali haviyama hulamatayanagi kasalola otamahaenegi lokiya vaitama mainaya yafena ago tamake-mainoe.
Naa nehayanagi nagoa kavala havi kava nehae. Hagotetama nagai kea havitama lamakupi maletama tamakua kanaleya hutama namitetamagi menia ani yana ago neataletama ali hataga huligeno osi nehie.

Nayoma tamahau tamayamopafi tamahau-mainea yafena tamakesa havi havi hiho. Menia ago neataletama asaga hulavi-mainagi tamakua aiyahae hutama nagoene ehema humainaya kavala etetama hiho. Tamakuama aiyahae ohisagena nagaya esuaamona lamutamia melina atalegahue.

Atalegahugi tamakaya nagola kanale auava yana ago hagena age-mainoe. Tamakaya Nikolasi mono kema nehaviya amaugafa age hamayema nehaya yafena tusia lamaipa kafa he neamatae. Nagayaenena aniama nehaya kavaamihena naipa kafa he neamatoe.

Nagi tamakesama hanesimogatama Avamumoma Yisasi kema haviya melitaluma nehaya veamogamifema hia kea haviho. “Nagoa veamoya Sataniene tuma huya agasesayana Anumayamo kumate ikapinaga hanea yosa, agola maige maige hisaya hamaimu amamisia yosamo alaga ‘Neho.’ huna amamisugeya negahae.” huno humaine.
Simena mono note mainaya veate kava kanohena mage huka kao nagaya uhagotena maitena haenagalafana mainoe. Fali-mainofitila ago etena hetina mainoe.

Tamakaya kana yapi mainetama mukia yatamia omale veane mainayanagi Anumaya Kotia kanale yana ago tamamigena nagaya ago age-mainoe. Nagoa veamoya “Tagaya Yuta veane mainone.” huya nehayanagi Yuta veanea omainagi Satani anaga maineya huhaviya hu-lamataya yana nagaya ago age-mainoe.

Tamakata aisia yana aligahayanagi kolia ohiho. Haviho Satania aye lamavataga hisigeya nagoa veamogatamina nofila hulamategahae. Tenia (10) kanafi ani kana yaene tamakata aisia yaenena aligahayanagi havitama lamakupi malenaya yana atafa hu-linetama falisagena ani yateti kanale miyana anonatamia maige maige hisaya tamahaimula tamamigahue.

Nagi tamakesama hanesimogatama Avamumoma mono note mainaya veamogamifema hia kea haviho. “Satanienema tuma hutama agasesaya veamogatama tole yupama etetama falisaya yamoa, hani yapima tegelege nehia atafina visaya yamoa, ali haviya hu otamategahie huna nehue.”
Ma kemoa Pegamumu mono note mainaya veate kava kanohena mage huka kao tole kaiyaga avenene nehia naepe kayona alilinoa kanomona mage huna nehue.

Tamakaya Satanima mainea siamo hanea kumate mainagena ago tamake-mainoe. Ani kumate mainayanagi nagai nagia atafa hulitama tokiyaage hulinageno nago kanoa, Atipasia, tamakaiene maineanagino kolia ohunegi mukia kanafina efi efi huno Yisasi kea huhaleno nehigeya atafa huya ani kumate hayageno fali-maineanagi ani kanafienena tamakaya nagia atafa hulinetama nagaifena havitama tamakupi malenaya yana oatalenae.

Oatalenagi nagoa kefo yana nehageno naipamoa haviyana nehie. Tamakai amunopina nagoa veamoya Palamuma humainea kea atafa huya akave nemalae. Nayona Palamua Isaleli veamoya asaga hu lavisae huno Palakina mage huno hapai-maine “Mage huka hamapaiyo ‘Amayateti talo humalenaya afa yafe ‘Anumayati maine.’ hutama amiya kavela nenetama kumai kavala hiho.’ huka amaipa ayesana kea hamapaiyo.” huno humaineane.
Naa hianagi tamakaipitila nagoamoya Nikolasima hia mono kemona akave nemalae. Ani kemoa Palamuma hia avamete humainea ke.

Ani kefo yafena tamakua aiyahae hutama nagoene ohisaya tamakesa haviho. Aiyahae ohisagena nagaya osi kana kanoa maitena tamakaitela esuaamona navayafima hanea avenene naepe kayoteti amakaienena tua hugahue.

Nagi tamakesama hanesimogatama Avamumoa mono notema nevaya veamogamifema hia kea haviho. Satanienema tuma huya agase-mainesaya veamogamina falakino hanea kavela, manae huya nehaya kavela neamamina nagola efeage yafatela hamaote hamaote haegafa amakima kae-malenoa yafana amamisugeya nagoa veamoya ani amakiyaga oagegahagi agaia yafama alisimoa agaiage agegahie.

Taiyataila maineya mono notema nevaya veate kava kanohena mage huka kao nagaya Anumaya Koti nafanemonia naulagamoa ata nefemo hia kava humainegeno naiyamoa haesa yafamo vagayo vagayo hia kava humainegena tokiyaage huna heti-mainoa kanomona mani kea nehugi kao.

Nagaya tamakai auava yatamia ago age-mainoe. Nagaifena tamahau tamayamopafi nelamahaigetama havitama tamametiti hutetama nagai aliyama aliyana mailava hutama tokiyaage humainagena tamake-mainoe. Menima nehaya yamoa hagotetama humainaya yamona ago agasetama kanale kava nehae.

Nehayanagi nagoa kefo yama nehagenoa naipamoa haviya nehie. Nago amo agia Yesepelie mage huno humaine “Nagaya Anumayamo aune a mainoe.” huno havigea nagai aliya veamogamina ayemavataga huno mage nehie “Kumai yana nehutama amayateti talo humalenaya afa anumayamoma amiya kavela neho.” huno humaine.
Higena nagaya ani amofena “Kumai yakahena kagua aiyahae huka nagoene ohisana kagesa havio.” huna agava mauvanagi agua aiyahae nohie.
Aiyahae nohiafe nagaya tusia agata aisia kalia neamina ani aenema kumaima nehaya veanene kefo yaamihema amakaye huya amakuama aiyahae ohisagenahena tusia kana yana amamigahue.

Neamamina ani amo kema akave nemalaya veamogamina hamaesugeya faligahae. Falisageya mukia Anumaya Koti anagamoya ageteya nagaya veamogami amaku amakesa tamagelegatima huna fako nehua kano mainoa yafena havigahae. Mukia veamogatama nehaya kavala agetena agoma humainaya yateti anonatamia tamamite lamamite hugahue.
Hugahugi nagoa Taiyataila mainaya veamogatama ani amo kea akave omaletama Satani kema falakino hanea kema ohavinaya veamogatama nagoa kahegi kea tamahaopaigahue.
Tamahaopaigahugi mukiama atafa hulinaya kea atafa hutama tokiyaage hu-linetama maime maime nevigena nagaya etena ano.
Sataniene tuma huya agaseya nagai kema akave maleme maleme haisaya veamogamina nagaya tokiyania amamisugeya mukia veatela kava yagaigahae.

Nenafaa tokiya namigena kavama neyagauva tokiyania ania huna tamamisugetama tokiyaage hutama kava yagaigahae. Veamoya mopa susufanelema aiko neligeno aposino yagi-yagipe nelavia avamete kava huya yagaigahae.
Kava yagai-mainesagena natema evayi nehia kanefimoa tusiya huno aivasa huno hale yamaene kanefila tamamigahue.
Nagi tamakesama hanesimoga-tama Avamumoa mono note nevaya veamogamifema hia kea haviho.

Satisi maineya mono note nevaya veate kava kanohena mage huka kao nagaya sevenia (7) Anumayamo Avamuene sevenia (7) kanefiyagaene nayapina atafa hulinoa kanomona mani kea tamahanepauve “Nagaya tamakai auava yatamia ago tamake-mainoanagiya veamoya tamakaifena ‘Agola maige maige hisaya hamaimu hanea veale.’ huya nehayanagi tamakaya nagai kema atalaya yafena ago fali-mainae.
Faligahe hayanagi tamauma fae-maiya yana neataletama hetitama kanale auava yatamia ali lokiya vaiho. Nagaya agoana auava yatamimoa Anumayaniamo aufina fatago ohunae.

Ohuneanagitama agoma havi-mainaya mono kehena tamakesamoa hao hinagetama akave maletama kefo yatamihena tamakua aiyahae hiho. Fae-mainesaletima he otisayana nagaya ‘Omegahie.’ hutama hisaya kanafi musufa vaya kana huna esuaamona kefo yamo anonatamia me lamamigahue.
Me lamamigahuanagi nagoa Satisi mainaya veamoya kanaleya hageno amakuamoa oniyaagela ohunea veane mainayanagiya efeage kenaamia faimatesugeya amatesia kava huya nagaiene ailokaeya vaiyegahae.

Vai neayesagena Sataniene tuma huya agase-mainaya veala efeage kena faimategahue. Maige maige hisaya hamaimu hanesia veamogami amakima kae-malenoa avopi ani veamogami amakia haneanagina aye ohananegahuanagina amakai amakia Nenafa auleene ensole vea amauleene huhalena hugahue.”
Nagi tamakesama hanesimoga-tama Avamumoa mono note nevaya veamogamifema hia kea haviho.

Filatelafia maineya mono note nevaya veate kava kanohena mage huka kao nagaya Anumaya Kotina alu aotage kanogina tamagelafa nehue. Tevitima kava yagai-mainea ki nofila nagaya ago alina fita yaki-malenoanagino nago kanomoa eteno alino fita okigahie. Nagaya fita ago alinama ki-malesugenoa nago kanomoa alino oyakigahie.

Nagaya mage nehue tamakai auava yatamia ago age-mainoe. Ageho tamakai tamaufina fita ago yaki-malogeno visaya fiamoa hane. Agoma yaki-malenoa fita nago kanomoa eteno alino okigahie. Tamakaya osi kanoa tokiyatamia hanegetama nagai kea akave nemaletama nagai nagia ali fala okigena age-mainoe.

Haviho nagoa veamoya mage nehae “Isaleli veane mainone.” huya havigea nehayanagi Satani veane mainayanagina nagaya amakaila alina tamaiyafinaga amatesugeya “Ago tagase.” huya ape humaineya nagaya tamakaifema nayamopafima nenahaiya yana amavelisugeya agegahae.

“Kana yapina tokiyaage hutama mailava hutama maiho.” hunama hu-mainoa kea ago akave malenagi mukia ma mopafi veamogamina avamema humatesua yapina tusia kana yamo falote hugahianagina tamau vaisugetama tamakaya ani yapina omaigahae.
Nagaya naiyayena aupaa egahugi. Atafa hulinaya kea atafa hutalako hulisayana nagoa veamoya tamamisua kanale yana tamahaofalegahae.

Atafa hulineya Satanienema tuma huya agase-mainaya veamoya no yosamo avamete kana hagena Anumayamo mono nopi ayena ali hetimatesugeya maigahayanagiya eteya outafa huya ougahayanagina amaugafale Anumayaniamo agiene Anumayaniamona ikapinagati esia kumamo agia, haegafa Yelusalemu kumamo agiene nagaila haegafa nagiene amaugafale kaemategahue.
Nagi tamakesama hanesimogatama Avamumoa mono note nevaya veamogamifema hia kea haviho.

Leotisia maineya mono note nevaya veate kava kanohena mage huka kao nagaya kelamage kemona aepaa mainena efi efi huna mukia kanafina kea huhalena nehue. Nagaya mukia Anumaya Kotia ehema taloma humalenea yamona aepaa mainoanagina mani kea mage huna tamahanepauve.

Nagaya tamakai auava yatamia ago age-mainoe. Nagai kemona tamakavenona ohunayanagi tamakupina yasiage humainegeno amukoa nohie. Nagai kemoa tamakupina amukoagema hu-maineleasina musena huleasinagi nagai kea osia tamakupina malenageno muvalisua naipa nehigena nagaitegatila tamavalena hagayu hu-lamatalesua nagesa nehie.

Tamakaya mage hutama nehae “Kasagoya afenoyatia hai ali-mainone. Nago ya kanoahena aupa nohune.” hutama nehayanagi tamakaya havige nehagi haviyatafa hutama mainayanagiya veamoya tamakeya kalagi ai-lama-tesaya avamete hutama mukia yafena aupa hutama mainageno tamaulagamoa asu hu-mainegetama tamaugafa alapaage veane kana hutama mainaya yafena tamakaitamia noagae.

Naa humaineafe mani kea tamahanepauve mone afenoene veanema maisayafena nagaitegati kanileta yafana, atafi kae-malenaya yafana me miya hiho. Tamaugafa alapaage mainageno tamakaye hisia yama aiso hisayafe efeage kena me miya hutama failiho. Tamaulagafima falesaya masavena tamamisugetama falesageno tamaulagamoa kanale hinagetama agegahae. Ani yayaga nagaiteti me miya hiho.

Nagaya nayamopafima nahaiya veamoya nagai kema haviya akave malesaya yafena kayo kevea neamamuafe aluya hutama lamakesa nehavitama kefo yatamihena tamakua aiyahae hutama “Nagoene ohugahune.” hutama hiho.
Ageho nagaya fiate heti-mainena tamakaifena kea nehuanagitama ani kema nagoke nagokemogatama havitetama fitama yaki-natesayana haifalena tamakaiene tokaeta maineta kavela negahune.

Nagoa veamoya Sataniene tuma huya agasesaya veafena mage huna humategahue “Nagaya Satanienena tua huna agasetena Nenafama kava yagai-mainea sialela agaiene me lokaena mainoa avamete hutama nagaiene kava yagaigahae.” huna humategahue.
Nagi tamakesama hanesimoga-tama Avamumoa mono note nevaya veafema hia kea haviho.

Yonia mage huno hie ani kemoa hanoma higena agoana ikapina nago fita yaki-malenea fiana age-mainoe. Neagogeno hagotenama ufema nehia augafa agema aigena havua augafa kea nagoene havuana mage huno hie “Male ehaigena mukia yama anilema falote hisia yana kavelino.” huno hie.
Higeno aupaa Anumaya Koti Avamumoa tusiya huno natafa higena agoana ikapinaga nago sia agogeno ani siale nago kanoa maine.

Ani sialema mainegena agoa kanomo augafamoa tusiya huno aihaesa huno alave alave huteno aihalegena age-mainoe. Agogeno nagoma alave alave hiana yosa haisa fulagenamoa sauve kanomo siale aigagi-maineno aihanelegena age-mainoe.

Neagogeno tueti foa (24) sia ani sauve kanomo siale maigagi-mainageya tueti foa (24) kava vayamoya ani siayagale mainae. Maineya efeage kenaamia fai-lineya amanutela sauve veamoya kanileta yafateti talo humale tumano kuma vai nealiya avamete huya vai-linae.

Anumaya Koti sialeti aulumaya alino monagemo huno alu ge lu gema aiya yamoa anifiti falote humaine. Anumaya Koti siamo aulega sevenia (7) lamua aivasa humaine. Ani lamua Anumayamona sevenia (7) Avamuamoya mainae.

Mainageno Anumaya Koti siamo aulega nago tikotuna hanegeno telelalayamaa tamage huno omalegeno galasimoma alave alave hia avamete humaine. Foa (4) hamaimuene anagamoya hetiya ani siale maigagiya mainageno amaulaga kasagoya haneteno amaulegaene amakavelagaene alino anovai-maine.

Hagote haimuene kanomoa kaveage afua, laiyoni afu kana higeno anile haimuene kanomoa pulamaka kana higeno anile haimuene kanomona vaya augosa kali-maigeno anile haimuene kanomona anale haleno vai neayea haki kana nama kana humaine.

Ani foa (4) hamaimuene anagamoya sikisia (6) amagekona hanegeno kasagoya amaulagamo amaugafamona agupilegaene amagekonamona afepinagaene alino vai-maine. Vai-mainageno felugaene kegeene mage huya huge huge nehae
“Anumaya Kotia mukia tokiyamona aepaa maineno kefo yana nohigi tusiya huno alu aotage kano maine. Nayoene meniene maineanagino haenagaa maisia kano maine.” huya humainae.

Hamaimuene anagamoya sauve kanomo siale maiya kanoa, agola maige maige nehia kanomofena, mage huya hae “Tokiyaage hale yamaa hanea kagia alisaga nehuta tusia muse nehune.” huya nehageya ani tueti foa (24) kava vayamoya sauve kanomo siale maiya kanoa agola maige maige nehia kanomo aule mope huya agia alisaga hugahe ali-mainaya kanileta yafateti talo humale tumano kuamia aliya ani siamo aiyafi mo malae.
Mo nemaleya mage huya hae

“Vaeha tagai Anumaya Kotigae kagaya mukia yana ‘Naa huna talo hugahue.’ huka humainanafe mukia yana talo hu-malanageno haneafe tagaya tokiyaage hale yamaaene kagia alisaga nehuta tokiyaage kano mainane huta kagia alisaga nehune.” huya hae.
Hagena nagaya Yonina himona kana yapi age-mainoe.

Nagaya Yoninae agoana ani sauve kanomo sialema maiya kanomona tamaga ayapina nagola avoma kae-male omana aye-gafage ki-malegeno hane. Ani omanamona amegaene agusafinagaene avona kae-maleteno veamoya oagesayafene huno atupale sevenia (7) menimo fuki kana yateti aye kamae-malene.

Aye kamae-malenegena agoana nagola tokiyaa hanea ensole kanomoa ala kegefafiti keha keha huno mage hie “Hana kanoa atesia kanomo anima menimo fukiteti aye kamae-malegeno hanea omana ali vaka yegahie?” huno hie.
Higena agoana atiyeyama agayana ikapinagaene mopafiene mopamona afepinagaene nagola ani avoma ali vaka yesigeno atesia kanoa omaine.
Nagola ani avoma kae-male omanama ali vaka yesigeno atesia kanoa omaigena agetena tusiya huna avia ate-mainoe.

Neatogeno tueti foa (24) kava vayapiti nago kanomoa nagaifena mage huno hie “Avia oateka havio nago kanoa Teviti aginagomoa, kaveage laiyoni afu kana humainea kanoa, Yuta nofipiti kanogino, Sataniene tua huno ago agase-maineafe ani avoma kae-male omana sevenia (7) menimo fukiteti aye kamae-malenea yana ali hakao huteno ali vaka-yegahie.” huno humaine.

Ani sauve kanomo siamo amunopina nagola Sipi sipi nafanea heti-mainegeya foa (4) hamaimuene anagayaene tueti foa (24) kava vayamoyaene agaila mai kagi-mainagena age-mainoe. Agoana ani Sipi sipi nafanea maiyanagi hayagenoma fali-mainea afu kana huno sevenia (7) aveene sevenia (7) aulagaene hane. Ani aulagayaga sevenia (7) Anumaya Kotia hutegeno mukia ma mopafi vaiyatete nehia Alu Aotage Avamulagiya mainae.
Ani Sipi sipimo nafanemoa viaamo sauve kanomo siale mainea kanomona tamaga ayapiti ani avoma kae-male omana ali-maine.

Aligeya foa (4) hamaimuene anagayaene tueti foa (24) kava vayamoyaene ani Sipi sipimo nafanea avate mope huya mukiamoya gita kana yana yagame nehaya yaene kanileta yafateti talo hu-malenaya yopaene atafa hulinae. Ani yopafina manaage halinamo humainea tanefamoa havate-maine. Ani manaage halinamoa maa humaine veamoya nunamuma nehuya Anumayamo agima alisaga nehageno Anumayamo avate vigeno havigeno aipamoa kanale higeno hagaage manama nehavia kava humaine.
Ani anagamoya Sipi sipi nafanemofena mage huya yagamea humainae

“Kagaila kahayageka fali-mainana kolateti ma mopafi veamogamina, alu kote kotega veanene, alu make alu make neaiya veanene, alu amaugafa alu amaugafa kalimainea veanene, kefo yaamimo alino hayagimatenegeka kagayama fali-mainana kolateti anifiti aligalu heka amavayu huteka Anumaya Koti veane maisaya yafe mukia ago miya humatenane. Miya humatenanafe kagaila kanale ya huno katea kava hana kano mainananagika anima aye-gafage ki-maleteya menimo fukiteti aye kamae-malenea avo omana alika ali hakao hisana tokiyakaa hane.
Anumaya Kotia kava yagai-lamatesia yapi ago amatanageya Anumaya Koti agia alisaga nehuya agai aliyana nealiya ma mopafi veamogamina kava humategahae.” huya yagamea hagena havimainoe.

Havitena agoana kasagoya ensole vayala teni milionia (10,000,000) ensole vayamoya hetiya Anumaya Kotima nemaiya sialeene foa (4) hamaimuene anagaene tueti foa (24) kava vayamoyaene maigagiya maineya ala kegefafiti mage huya hagena havimainoe.

“Ani Sipi sipi nafanea hayageno faliteno heti-mainea kanogino tusia kanale kano maineanagino atesia napamaa aliteno tusia tokiyaa hanenageno mukia kanale yaene kanale havi haviyaene hanea kanogino kava hisia tokiyaaenena haneanagita tokiyaage hale yamaene agia alisaga hisunageno anale hanesigeno mukia muse hisia yana alisie.” huya hae.
Hagena havugeno mukiama Anumaya Kotia talo humalenea yamoa ikapinaga mainaya yaene mopafima mainaya yaene mopamo agusafinagama mainaya yaene tipima mainaya yaenena mukiamoya mage huya hae

“Sauve kanomo siale mainana Anumaya Kotigaene Sipi sipi nafanene agola mukia kanafina muse hisaa yamoa hanege hanege huno hanesie. Tokiyaage hale yamaaene tanakia haneanagita alisaga hisunageno anale hanesigetana kava hisaa tokiyatanimoa hanege hanege huno hanesie.” huya hae.
Hageya foa (4) hamaimuene anagamoya “Tamage huya hae.” hageya tueti foa (24) kava vayamoya ape huya Anumayamo agia alisaga humainae.

Nagaya Yonina agoana Sipi sipi nafanemoa eaamo nagola menimo fukiteti aye kamae-malenea fukina ago melino hakao higena havuana foa (4) hamaimuene anagapiti nagomoa agea aigena havuana agema aiya agemoa monagemoma hia avamete huno mage hie “Male eno.” huno hie.

Higena agoana nagola efeage hosi afua agogeno nago kanomoa ani afumo agupifi maineno ati kevea huno atafa hu-lineno tumano kula, vayamoya kame vayaamima tuma huya amakase-mainaya vayamoya vai nealiya tumano kula amigeno nagoene kame vayaamienena tua huno amakasegahe umaine.
Vigeno ani Sipi sipi nafanemoa anile menimo fukiteti aye kamae-malenea fukina melino hakao higena havuana foa (4) hamaimuene anagapiti anile tu (2) molia kanomoa mage huno hie “Male eno.” huno hie.

Higena agoana nagola kolamaage hosi afua agogeno nago kanomoa ani afumo agupifi mainegeno ala avenene naepe kayoene mukia ma mopafi veanene tuma hisia tokiyaaene amigeno aliteno ma mopafi veamoya tuma huya hamaesageya falisaya amakesa ago amamineanagino amaipa falu huya maisaya yamoa mukia ma mopafina ago hano humaine.

Ani Sipi sipi nafanemoa tagufa (3) molia menimo fukiteti aye kamae-malenea fukina melino hakao higena havuana foa (4) hamaimuene anagapiti tagufa (3)molia kanomoa mage huno hie “Male eno.” huno higena agoana nagola anupa hosi afua agogeno nago kanomoa ani afumo agupifi maiya kanomoa sigelima nehaya yana ayapi alilino emaine.

Alilino mainegena neagena havuana foa (4) hamaimuene anagapiti nago agema aigena havua agemoa mage huno hie “Nago kanomoa nagoke yupa nate aepa heno aliyana alime alime visiaamo unema hano hisigeya amisaya miyateti tole osi keayopi laisimo alaga fako huka amamio.
