Ani avamete miyana kamisageka sikisia (6) maya ania huka amamio. Ania huka amamigananagi olivi yosama hanea yosamo alagafiti masavema nealiya yosayagaene nofi alagamo timaa aliya tatiteya nenaya nofiene alika haviyana ohuo.” huno hie.

Higena agoana Sipi sipi nafanemoa foa (4) molia menimo fukiteti aye kamae-malenea fukina melino hakao higena havuana foa (4) hamaimuene anagapiti foa (4) molia kanomoa mage huno hie “Male eno.” huno hie.

Higena agoana nagola kanileta hosi afua agogeno ani afumo agupifi maiya kanomo agia “Vaya fali yamoe.” huya neayaya kanomo akavema via kanomo agia “Fali-mainaya veane nevaya kumale.” huya agia neayaya kanomoa akave vigeana vaana ani tole kanolatamogania tusia tokiya anamigeana mukia ma mopafi mainaya veala ali fako huana foafi (4) amatageya maiya anagapiti nagoa veamogamina he-falimatesia tokiyaania ali-mainae. Aliageya nagoamoya tu huteya fali-mainagi nagoamoya kafu huya amakategeya fali-mainagi nagoamoya alu kali lu kali aliya fali-mainagi afai kalamoya nagoamogamina hamaesageya falisaya tokiyaania ali-mainae.

Naa higeno Sipi sipi nafanemoa faefua (5) molia menimo fukiteti aye kamae-malenea fukina melino hakao higena agoana Anumayamofe amakesa haviya sipi sipia heya folamole kae salamana huya nemalaya folamo kana folamoa ikapinaga hanegena agogeno ani folamomo aiyafina Anumaya Koti kema haviya atafa hu-lineya huhaleya humainaya yatetima hamayageya fali-mainaya veamogami amamena amake-mainoe.

Agogeya ani amamemoya ala kegefafiti mage huya hae “Tokiyaka hanea Anumayatimogae alu aotage kanomoga tamagegeya nehane. Ma mopafi veamoya tahayageta faliteta malela emainonanagika aniama humainaya yatetila kagaya na yu kaiyekea hu-mateteka kefo yaamimo anonaamia amamigane?” huya hae.

Nehageno efeage ayaaya kenaamia alino amamiteno mage huno hamapaiye “Maifalu hutama mainegeya tamafu-tamakanaya tamakaiene Yisasi aliyama nealiya agai kema huhaleya nehaya yateti tamakaima hulamatenaya kava huya hamaesageya faliteya esagena kame vayatamia kaiyekea humategahue.” huno hie.

Huteno Sipi sipi nafanemoa sikisia (6) molia menimo fukiteti aye kamae-malenea fukina melino hakao higena agoana tusia imi aligeno yagemoa asu huno hanimaage higeno ikamoa haesa ko tino kola kana humaine.
Higeno yasimoa yosamona mo lifagagi me lifagagi higeno afuma otenea yosa alagamoa halali hulavia kava huno kanefiyagamoa ikapitila atafai-lavi-maine.
Ikamoa iva yuguma alitama aye kafage kitama hayama negiya kava huno ikamoa fanane higeno mukia agoyaene ti amunopima hanea mopaene noamia ataleya nagoene omalenae.

Naa higeno mukia ma mopafi mainaya sauve vayayagaene kava vayayagaene ati vayate kava vayayagaene miyaamimo hai-mainea veanene tokiyaamima hanea vayaene nofipi maineya miya oali aliya nealiya veanene amakaiami aliyaamile nemaiya veanene tusia amamayo aigeya “Hanate maisune.” huya huteya yafakapiene agoyafi hanea ala yafakefamo akavelega faleya mo falakiya mainae.

Fala kiya maineya keha keha huya mukia agoyaheene yafafeene mage huya hae “Tagaya sauvemo siale mainea kanoa Anumaya Koti aule omaisuna tagesa nehune. Sipi sipi nafanemoa tusia hai vai nelategeta koli nehunagi agoyamogatama kofa hu-lavitama tagaila etama aiso hulateho.

Ala kanolatamogania hanai vai-lateana kaiyeke hulatesaa kanamoa ago falote hianagiya hanaa augafa veamoya anaulela hetigahae?” huya hagena haenagama falote hisia yana himona kana yapi agetena havilinoe.

Ani kema havitena agoana foa (4) ensole vayamoya foa (4) ma mopamo atupalega heti-maineya yasimona atafa huya ali-talako huligeno yasimoa taga higeno mopafima hanea yamoene hagelimoene yosayagamoenena kanage kanagala ohunae.

Ohagena agogeno nago ensole kanomoa yagemoma evayi nehilegati eaamo haimuma hanea Anumaya Kotia agaia veamogami humatenea avona aigamaematesia yana ayapi atafa hulineno ani foa (4) ensole vayala mopaene hageliene ali haviyama hisaya tokiyaamima amaminea ensole vayafe mage huno ala kegefafiti hamapaiye.

“Tamakaya mopaene hageliene yosayagaenema ali haviyama hisaya ensole vayamogatama neataletama tagava mainegeta tagaya hagoteta Anumaya Kotitimo aliya veamogami hamanilela Anumayamoma humatenea avona aigamae-matetesunagetama ani yayaga ali haviyana hugahae” huno hie.
Higena havugeno huyogino hamanile avoma kae-malenea veanea vani hataleti foti fo tausenia (144,000) Isaleli veanea alu nofipiti alu nofipiti huyogi-malenea venea agoe.
Yuta nofipiti tuelufu tausenia (12,000) veanene Lupeni nofipiti tuelufu tausenia (12,000) veanene Kati nofipiti tuelufu tausenia (12,000) veanene huyogi-malene.
Asa nofipiti tuelufu tausenia (12,000) veanene Napatalai nofipiti tuelufu tausenia (12,000) veanene Manase nofipiti tuelufu tausenia (12,000) veanene huyogi-malene.
Simioni nofipiti tuelufu tausenia (12,000) veanene Livai nofipiti tuelufu tausenia (12,000) veanene Isaka nofipiti tuelufu tausenia (12,000) veanene huyogi-malene.
Sepuluni nofipiti tuelufu tausenia (12,000) veanene Yosefe nofipiti tuelufu tausenia (12,000) veanene Penisamini nofipiti tuelufu tausenia (12,000) veanene huyogi-malene.

Kasagoya veanea ohavunamaa veanea alu kotega alu kotega veanene, alu make alu make neaiya veanene, alu amaugafa lu amaugafa kali-mainea veanene, mukia Anumaya Koti sauve kanomo siamo aulegaene Sipi sipi nafanemo aulegaene heti-maineya efe kena ayaaya kenaamia failineya fanofamo haisa amayapi atafa huli huli hulinae.
Hu-lineya ala kegefafiti mage huya hae “Sauve kanomo siale mainea Anumaya Kotitimoene Sipi sipi nafanemoene tagu tamema ago aligati-mainea yamona aepaa mainae.” huya hae.

Nehageya mukia ensole veamoya hetiya Anumaya Kotima mainea sialeene tueti foa (24) kava vayamoyaene foa (4) hamaimuene anagamoyaene maigagiya maineya mukiamoya ani siale ape huya Anumaya Koti agia alisaga nehuya mage huya hae.

“Tamage Anumaya Kotia mukia muse hisia yana alisie. Tokiyaage hale yamaaene agia haneanagino kanale havi haviyamaa hanea kano maineafe agia alisaga nehuta tusia muse hutesune. Agaia kava yagaisia tokiyaamoa agola hanege hanege huno hanesie. Tamage.” huya humainae.
Ani kea hu neatageno nagola ala kava kanomoa nagaifena mage huno nahavige “Nama ayaaya efe kenama fai-linaya veala tayae? Hanategati emainae?” huno nahavige-maine.

Nahavigegena nagaya, Yonina, mage huna hue “Musekaa nehugi kagaya kagaikaa havilinane.” huna hugeno nagaifena mage huno hie “Mani veamoya tusia kana yama hanea kanafi maineya tokiyaage huya kefo yaamihema haviya fali-mainea Sipi sipi nafanemo kolateti kenaamia agola sese hageno efeage hu-maineanagiya emainae.
Ani yafe amakaya Anumaya Kotima mainea siamo aulega heti-maineya felugaene kegeene agai agia alisaga nehuya agai aliya nealiyanagino Anumaya Kotia au vaimateno kava yagaimategahie.
Yagai-mateneanagino nagoene amakala otegahie. Tifena oamakegahie. Yagemoa amuko-nako huno amaleno oamasagaligahie.

Sipi sipi nafanemoa Anumaya Koti mainea siamona aulega hanea amunopi hetino maineno sipi sipi kava kanoami maineanagino kapaima nehagea tima hanea komulega amavaleno mo matenageya maige maige hisaya tina nenesageno Anumaya Kotia amaunua alino hami-matesigeya nagoene avia oategahae.” huno higena nagaya Yonina havimainoe.

Ani Sipi sipi nafanemoa haenagalafana menimo fukiteti aye kamae-malenea yana melino hakao higena agogeno mukia ikapinagama hanea yamoa kanage kanagela ohuya mukia yamoa kea ohigeno vaniagi hafu aovamoa eumaine.
Eutegena anile agoana sevenia (7) ensole veamoya Anumaya Koti aule hetiya mainageno sevenia (7) ufena amamigena age-mainoe.

Agogeno nago ensole kanomoa nagola kanileta yafateti talo hu-malenea yopa ayapi ali-linegeno afuma heya folamole kae salamana huya nemalaya folamo kana folamole heti-mainegeno kasagoya manaage nehia tanefamo halinamoene Yisasina amakua aminaya veamoya nunamuma huya havigaya nunamuene ani yopafina ali malesigeno ailokaenoma haisiana Anumayamoa kanale manaa havisiafene huno sauve kanomo siamo aulega kanileta yafateti talo hu-malenea folamo hanea folamole mo malene.
Momalegeno ani manaage halinamoene Anumaymona amakuama aminaya veamogami nunamuyagaene ani ensole kanomo ayapitila ataleya Anumayamo aule haimainae.

Haigeno ani ensole kanomoa kanileta yafateti talo humale yopa alino folamole atama nelea ata ani yopafi maleno havateteno alino ani ata ikapinagati ma mopafi hagayu hu-talegeno elavigeno ikapinagatila akali kalu huno aulumayala nealigeno nagola ala agegefa neaigeno imila ali-maine.
Sevenia (7) ufema atafa hu-linaya ensole vayamoya ani ufema hisaya yafe talo tala humainae.

Hagote ensole kanomoa agaia ufena higeno komopamoene atamoene kolamoene atagufe-lavino mopafi tavigeno mukia ma mopa tagufale (3) ali fako hu-malageno anifiti nagokema ali fako hu-malaya haupa kaiyaga mukia mopafi hanea yaene mukia yosayagaene mukia apeene atamoa teno asagali-talene.

Asagali-talegeno tu (2) molia ensole kanomoa agaia ufena higeno ala agoya kana yana ata nelegeno hagelipi tavi-maine. Ani hagelimona tagufale (3) ali fako hu-malageno anifiti nago haupa kaiyaga hanea timoa kolamaage huno vali vali humaine.

Kolamoa vali vali higeno ani haupa kaiyagama mainaya noyameyagaene tipi yagaene fali hano hageno ani haupa kaiyagama hanea tipi kaleyaga ali haviya hu-talageno anifima mainaya veala fali hano humainae.

Faligeno tali (3) molia ensole kanomoa agaia ufena nehigeno kanefila ala kanefekefamo agia “Atuage nehuno satuage kanefile.” huya nehayanaginoa kanimoma nelea avamete huno ikapinagatila elaviaamo mukia ma mopamona tagufafi (3) melino fako hu-malageno anifiti nago haupa kaiyagama hanea tiyagaene tima kapaima nehagea ti komufi hanea timoene atuage higeya mukia ani lima ne-mainaya veanea fali-mainae.

Faligeno fo (4) molia ensole kanomoa agaia ufena nehigeno yagemoa tagufafi (3) ali fako hu-malageno anifiti nago haupa kaiyaga asu humaine. Ania huya ikana tagufafi (3) ali fako humalageno anifiti nago haupa kaiyaga ania huno asu humaine. Kanefiyaga tagufafi (3) ali fako hu-malageno anifiti nago haupa kaiyaga ania huno asu humaine. Asu hu-maigeno felugama aye vasa nehia yaamimoa tagufafi (3) ali fako hu-malageno anifiti nago kanafina asu higeno kegela tagufafi (3) ali fako hu-malageno anifiti nago kanafina ikaene kanefiene asu higeno tusia haniki-maine.

Nagaya Yonina agogeno nagola ala hakiki kana nama ikamo amunote haleno vigena age-mainoe. Neagogeno ala kegefafiti mage huno hie “Avonio avonio tagufa (3) ensole anagamoya ufena nehisageno tusia kana yamoa ma mopafi mainaya veamogatamile falote hugahe higena tusia nahau hu nelamatoe.” huno higena havue.

Faefu (5) molia ensole kanomoa agaia ufena higena agogeno nago kanefimoa ikapinagati atafai-lavino mopafi elavigeno ma mopafina nago komua afe yapi tavi-mainea komumona ayola omale komugefagino ani komumo ki nofila ani kanefimona amine.
Amigeno aliteno ani ki nofiteti ani komua yakigeno ani komufitila tusia halinamo huno ehaiyana tusia atagefafiti hia halinamo avamete huno ehaiyaamo yagene ikaene ayesu higeno tusia hani kimaine.

Kigeno kasagoya kenu kafamoya ani halinafitila mopafina aitagu-fetageno veama akafu amanisaya tokiyaamia amamigeya akafuma amani yana kulumale nehaya osifavemoma neamania avamete huno amanigeya tusia amakata aimaine.
Ani kenufena mage huno hie “Apeene talayaene yosayagaenena oneho. Nagoa veanege, Anumaya Kotia hapalimateteno agia hamanilela aigamae oamatenea veamogamina akafu amanitama ali haviya humateho.

Faefua (5) ikana amakata aisia yana amamite amamite hugahayanagi hamaegeya ofaliho.” huno higeya akafu amanigeya amakata yama aliyana kulumale nehaya osifavemoma veama akafu neamania avamete huno amanigeya tusia amakata aimaine.
Ani yama alisaya kanafina veamoya falisaya yafena tusiya huno hamaugahianagi ofaligahae. Amakatama aiya yafena tusiya huya falisaya kafena ati yegahayanagi oagegahae.
Ani kenumoya tuma hugahema nehaya hosi afumo avamete huya amanutela kanileta yafateti talo humale tumano kula vai-linageno amaugosamoa veamogami amaugosa kali-maine.
Kali-maigeya ani kenumoya ayaaya amayolagefa, haesa anemogami amayolagefa kana hu-mainegeno amavemoa kaveage laiyoni afumo ave kana humaine.

Humainegeya hamaifiyafafina kapaleti talo humale halegu kana yana anovai-maleneya amagekona agema aiyana tuma hugahe vaya hosimoya avayu nehaya kalemo nehia kea ala kegefa huno neaiya agemoma hia kava huno agea aimaine

Ani kenumo amaigoyafina avetanafaage nekaya, kulumale nehaya osifavemo akafu neamania ave kana hia nekaya, hanegeya ani nekayaleti faefua (5) ikamo aguafina veala akafu amaniya ali haviya humategahae.

Ani kenumo sauve kanoamia maineanagino ani kava kanoamimoa Satanie, ayoa omale komugefale kava yagai-maineanagino agia Yuta veamogami kea, Hipalu kefina Apatonie huya nehagi Kaliki kefina Apolionie huya nehagi tagaiti kefina mage humaine “Vea alino haviya hinageya fali hano hu-matesia kanoe.” humaine.
Kenumoya ali haviya humatesaya kanamoa hano hianagi avonio tolea tusia kana yatala falote hisaa yafena nahau hulamatoe.
Sikisi (6) molia ensole kanomoa agaia ufena higena havugeno Anumaya Koti aulema kanileta yafateti talo humale folamomo foa (4) atupale hanea avela foa (4) avepitila agea aigena havimainoe.

Havugeno ufema atafa hulinea ensole kano sikisi (6) molia ensole kanomofena mage huno hie “Foa (4) ensole vayala, Yufaletisi titegama nofima humatenaya ensole vayala kalu heka amatalegeya viho.” huno hie.

Higeno “Anumaya Kotia na kafufina na ikatela na kanafina na aovaa ani foa (4) ensole vayamoya mukia ma mopafi veamogamina tagufafi (3) ali fako humalageno anifiti nago haupa kaiyagama mainesaya veala hamaesagetama faligahae.” huno huteno amatafa hu-lineane. Ani kanamoa efalote higeno ani ensole vayala kalu heno amatalegeya ani kavala nehae.
Ani kavama nehisageya amaya huya hamaesaya ati vayaamia tu hataleti milionia (200,000,000) hosimo agupifi mainaya ati vayala mainae huya hagena nagaya Yonina havimainoe.

Havitena himona kana yapi amakoana ani hosimogami amakupifima mainaya vayamoya hamaifiyafafina halegula haesaene okoene kaniletaene halegula aye hai-linageno hosimogami amanutela kaveage afua laiyoni afumogami amanu kana hutegeno amavayafitila atamoene halinamoene himanaage atama nelea yafayagaene falote huno mukia ma mopafi veamogamina tagufafi (3) ali fako hu-malageno anifiti nago haupa kaiyaga veamogamina ani ataene halinamoene himanaage atama nelea yafayagaletiene hamayageya fali-mainae.
Hosimogamina hamaesaya tokiyaamia amavayafiene amaigoyafiene hanegeno amaigoyamoa osifave kana huno akafu amanisia amanuna hanegeya veala akafu amanigeya hamae-mainae.

Anima tusiya huno ali haviya hia yamoma ohamaenea veamoya agayanagi kefo yama humainaya yafena amakua aiyahae nohae. Kanileta yafatetiene siliva yafatetiene haesa yafatetiene afa yafatetiene yosaletiene talo hu-malenaya yafena “Anumayati mainae” huya hayanagi ani yayaga amaulaga oageya kea ohaviya kama vai oayeyama nehaya afa anumayamo-gamiene Kefo Avamumogami amakiene alisaga huya “Anumayati mainae.” huya nehaya kavala oatalenae.
Oataleneya veama hamae nefaliya yaene analisama nehaya yaene kumaima nehaya yaene musufa yama hu-liteya nehaya yaenefena amakua aiyahae nohae.

Anile nagaya Yonina agoana nagola tokiyaage ensole kanoa ikapinagati elavino egena age-mainoe. Ani ensole kanomo augafamona siamoa alino anovai-tegeno anutela fulagenamoa maleno kagi-mainegeno augosamoa yagemoma hia kava huno aivasa nehigeno tole aiyamoa ata anefemo nehia tunage yosa kana nehigeno emaine.
Egena agogeno nagola osi avona ayapi hanegeno tamaga aiyamoa hagelimo agupile ayegeno haoga aiyamoa mopafi ayegeno huteno aye hala hale humaine.
Humaineno agema aiyana laiyoni afumoma vale vale nehia avamete huno keha keha nehigeno sevenia (7) akali kalu ko nelino tusiya huno monagemoa humaine.

Sevenia (7) akali kaluma hia kea havitena avopi ago kaegahe huanagi ikapinagati nago kea falote huno mage huno higena havue “Sevenia (7) akali kaluma hia kea avopina okaeka fala-kilio.” huno higena havue.
Havugeno timo agupileene mopafienema aiya aye hala halema hu-mainegena agoa ensole kanomoa tamaga ayana ikate alisaga hie.

Huteno mage hie “Haimuene kanogino Anumaya Kotia mukia kanafina maige maige huno ikaene ikapinaga hanea yaene mopaene mopafima hanea yaene hageliene hagelipima hanea yayagaene talo hu-malenea kanomo agile tamage nehue. Anumaya Kotia nagoene agava omaigahigi seveni (7) molia ensole kanomoa agaia ufena hugahe nehinageno Anumaya Kotia nayoma falakino hanea kea, agaia aliyama ali-mainaya amaune vayama hamapai-mainea kemoa falote huno tamage hugahie.” huno hie.

Higena hagoteno ikapinagatima higena havua kemoa eteno nagoene mage huno hie “Hagelimo agupileene mopafiene aiyama aye hala hale huno heti-maiya ensole kanomo ayapima hanea ali vakaye-linea avona kagaya molio.” huno hie.

Higena ani ensole kanomote vuaamona mage huna hue “Kagaya ani osi avo omana namio.” huna hugeno mage huno nahapaiye “Kagaya alika no. Nesanana kavayafina tumemo timoma hia kava huno hagaage hugahianagi nakaisanana kaipafinaga atuage hugahie.” huno hie.
Higena ani osi avona ensole kanomo ayapiti alina nogeno navayafinaga tumemo timoma hia avamete huno hagaage hianagi nenama nakauvana naipafinaga atuage humaine.

Higeya Yoninia mage huya nahapaiye “Kagaya nagoene alu amaugafa kalimai veanene, alu kote kote mainaya veanene, alu make lu make neaiya veanene ala sauve veanenefena kaune kea laga huka hamapaigane.” huno nahapaiye.

Nago kanomoa malena agege gege hisua ayopa kana kayona namiteno mage hie “Kagaya hetika Anumaya Koti mono noene kae salamana nehaya folamoleene mo maleka agege gege huka hapalika ago. Ani nopina Anumaya Koti agima alisaga nehaya veala hapalika ago.

Hapaligananagi malagama hanea mopa maleka agege gege huka ohapalio. Ani kaiyaga Anumaya Koti kema nohavisaya veamogami amamineanagiya tagufa (3) kafuene sikisia (6) ikaene ani veamoya Anumaya Koti kumala alu aotage kuma meli haviya hugahae.
Nehisagena nagaya tolea nagai kema huhaleana hisaa kanolatana tokiyania anamisugeana kayavo kena fai-lineana tagufa (3) kafuene sikisia (6) ikaene nagai kea huhaleana hugae.” huno hie.
Ani lole kanolatana ma mopafi kava humainea Anumayamo aule heti-mainaana tole olivi yosa kana huteana tole kani kana humainae.

Nagoa veamoya ani kanolatana ali haviya hugahema hisagenoa ani kanolatamogani anavayafitila atamo aikalu huno kame veaania temasagalisigeya faligahae. E, anakaima ali haviya hunatesaya veamoya faligahae.

Ani lole kanolatamo-gania tokiyaanileti “Kola oaiyo.” huana hisaageno kema huhaleana hisaa kanafina kola oaigahie. Tifema “Kolamaage huo.” huana hisaagenoa ania hugahie. Anakesama havisaa kanafina “Tusia kana yaene kaliene falote huo.” huana hisaagenoa ma mopafi veala nagoene nagoene huana hamaegae.
Hamaegaanagi Anumaya Kotima anaminea kea hu hano hutesaageno kefo afai afumoa ayola omaleno afepinaga tavi-mainea komufinagati ehaino me hanaesigeana faligae.

Falisaageno anaugafamoa ala kumamo katema, Anumayaanimona Yisasina yafaga yosalema haeya asai-malenaya kumamo, yegegate malegahae. Avame kefima hu-maleya nehaya ala kumamo agia Sotomuene Isipienene huya nehae.

Falisaa anaugafa yegegate tagufa (3) kanaene ani kanamo yagemoa amunote enevigeya nagoa veanea alu kote kote veanene, alu make lu make neaiya veanene, alu maugafa lu maugafa kalimai veaneyagaene, ani kanolatamo-gani anaugafa ageme-geme vayanagi nagoa veamoya aliya hevainategahe hayanagi ani veamoya “Aao.” huya hageya aliya hevai oanatenae.

Hevai oanatenagi ani kanolatamogania mukia kotega veama tusiya huana ali haviyama hu neamataa kanolatama falia yafenagiya tusiya huya musena nehuya muse yana amafaluamimo-gamina momami memami hugahae.

Hugahagi tagufa (3) kanaene ani kanamo yagemoa amunote evia kanamoa hano hutegeno Anumaya Kotia ani kanolatamo-gani anaugafafi hanaimula huvainategeana ani kanolatana eteana hetiageya mukia veamoya ani yana agageno amamayoa aigeya kolia humainae.
Koli nehuya haviyana ikapinagati ala kegefafiti ani kanolatafena mage huno hie “Tanakaya ehaitana eo.” huno higeya kame veaanimoya age-mainageana siapi hai-faleana ikapinaga hai-mainae.

Hai-mainaa anayufina tusia imila aliteno ani ala kumakefa teniafi (10) ali fako hu-malageno anifiti ani imimoa nago kaiyaga ali haviya higeno seveni tausenia veane (7,000) hamaegeya fali hano humaine. Naa hu-mainayafe ofaliyama afaa mainaya veamoya tusia koli huteya ikapinagama mainea Anumaya Koti agia alisaga humainae.
Tole kana yana ago hano hianagi avonio nagoke kana yana aupa kanafi falote hugahe higena nahau hu nelamatoe.

Anile seveni (7) molia ensole kanomoa agaia ufena higena havugeno ikapinagati nagoa veamoya ala kegefafiti mage huya humainae “Anumaya Kotiene taugafama aligatisiafene huno hutenea kanoene ma mopafi kava veamogamina ago amakasaageya anaiyafinaga mainayanagino Anumaya Kotia agola maige maige huno kava yagaigahie.” huya humainae.
Anile Anumaya Koti aule hanea sialema mainaya vayala tueti foa (24) kava vayamoya mopafi asaga hu-laviya amakoya ye-maineya Anumaya Koti agia alisaga huya mage hae
“Vae Anumaya Kotigae tusia tokiyakaa haneanagika nayona mainananagika menia mainananagika tusia tokiyakaleti aepa heka mukia yatela kava neyagaina yafe tagaya kagaifena tusia musekaa nehune.

Kagai kema nohavia veamoya kagaifena amaipa kafa henegatayafe kagaya kaipa kafa hemateka mukia fali-mainaya veanema kaiyeke humateka kefo yaamimo anonaamia amamisana kanamoa ago falote humaine. Ani kanafina kagai kema haviya amakupi malenaya veanene kagai amaune veanene mukia kagai kagima alisaga huya kaiyafinagama nemaiya veanene ala amakima hanea veanene osi amakima hanea veanene kanale anona yaamia amamigane. Amamiteka nagoa veamoya ma mopafi veamogamima ali haviya huneamataya veamogamina kefo yaamimo anonaamia kagaya ali haviya humategane.” huya humainae.

Hageno Anumaya Koti nona ikapinaga hanea mono nona yaki-talageno Anumaya Kotima alino hagelafimatenea kema hanea pokisia ani mono nopina fufu yate hanegeya neagageno anile ala agegefa neaigeno monagemoa tusiya nehigeno imila nealigeno komopamoa talagufe-lavino aimaine.

Nagola tusia tokiyaage avame yana ikapinaga falote hie. Nago amoa mainegeno kenaamoa yege aumona ayeno auvai-maigeno ikamoa aiyafinaga hanegeno anutela tuelufua (12) kanefimoya tumano ku kana huno vai-line.
Ani amoa aipaene maineno inamu ya alitegeno agata aigeno avovo humaine.

Nehigeno nagola tokiyaage avame yana ikapinaga falote hie. Nagola tusia haesa osifave mainegeno sevenia (7) anuna hanegeno tenia (10) aveyaga anuyagafina hanegeno sevenia (7) ala sauve kanomo tumano kuyaga ani avetela vai-line.

Ani osifavemoa ikatema hanea kanefiyaga tagufafi (3) ali fako hu-malageno anifiti nago haupa kaiyaga kanefiyaga aigoyaleti aye tafai-talegeno mopafi elavi-mainegeno ani osifavemoa amo aule hetino nafaneama neatesiana ani havi osifavemoa haeno nesiafene huno agava maine.

Mainegeno ani amoa ne nafanema neateana ani nafanemoa haenaga ala kano maiteno aeni ayopaa ali-lineno mukia ma mopafi veate tokiyaage huno kava yagaisia nafanema neateana ani nafanea aupaa hafaleya avalesaga huya anafinaga Anumaya Koti siale atenae.
Atageno ani amoa nafanema atetenoa faleno vigeno Anumaya Kotia maisia kumala talo tala hutegeno kame kotega viaamo tagufa (3) kafuene sikisia (6) ikaene Anumaya Kotia yagaitene.
Naa higeno ikatela tusia tua falote humaine. Ensolemo-gami kava kanoamimo agia Maikoloe ensole vayayagaene tokaeya havi osifavene agaia Kefo Avamuyagaene tusia tua humainae.
Tuma hayanagi havi osifavemo tokiyaa omalegeya asaga hu-mainageya avaleya ikapinagati avaleya hagayu hu-talegeno nagoene anile omaigahie.

Ani nayoma nemaiya ala osifavemo agia Satanie nehaya kanomoa ma mopafi veafena havigegeya huno ayemavataga hugeno omai kanoene agaia avamuyagaene ikapinagatila amavaleya hagayu humatalageya ma mopafina elavi-mainae.

Elavi-mainagena havugeno ikapinaga ala kegefafiti mage huno hie “Anima avaleya hagayu hu-talaya kanomoa tafu-tagana-gamina mukia kanafina humatege humatege huno mage hie ‘Ani kefo yana nehae.’ huno Anumaya Koti aufima hufalote nehia kanomona ikapinagatila ago avaleya hagayu hu-talenaya yafe Anumayatimoa tagu tamema aligatisia yamoa ago falote humaine. Anumaya Kotia agaia tokiyaa mukia veanea ago amave-liteno agaya ala sauve kava kano maine. Maineanagino agaia tamaugafa aligatisiafene huno hutenea kanomo kava yagaisia tokiyaa hane.

Haneanagino Satania tafu-tagana-gamifena ‘Naa kefo yana nehae.’ huno ali falotela hianagi tafu-taganaya Yisasia, Sipi sipi nafanemo kolamoma tavi-mainea kene Anumaya Koti kemoene huhaleya humainaya yateti Satanina agase-mainayanagi amakaiami amaugafahena amakesa ohaviya falisaya yafe kolia nohae.

Naa humainaya yafe ikamogaene ikapinaga mainaya veanene musena hiho. Musena hugahayanagi Satanina ikapinagatila avaleya hagayu hu-talageno ma mopafina elavi-mainegeno ‘Aupa kana kanoa maigahue.’ huno agesa havimainea yafenagino aipamoa ata neleanagina avonio ma mopafiene hagelipiene mainaya yayagahena nahau hugi kayeho.”
Ala osifavea ago avaleno hagayu hu-talegeno ma mopafi elavinoma emainea yana ageteno ani ne nafanema atenea amona ali haviya hutesia yafe mo nati-maine.

Mo natianagi Anumaya Kotia ani amona aluga aluga haopalega ala hakikimo agekona talo huno ategeno ani amoa haleno kame kotega, Anumaya Kotia talo tala humalenea kumate umainegeno Anumaya Kotia tagufa (3) kafuene sikisia (6) ikaene yagai-mainegeno ani havi osifavemoa ali haviya hutesia tokiyaa omalene.
Omaleneno ani osifavemoa avayafitila muvali-talegeno tavia timoa tusia ti hogino aiyayeno laviaamo ani amona asaga huno nakaino ali haviya hisie huno ani kavala humaine.
Naa hianagi ani amona aya hisia yafe mopamoa eko alino avaya aka hu-mainegeno ani osifavemo avayafitima lavia timoa ani eko kapi tavi fale hano humaine.

Tavi hano hianagi ani osifavemoa amofena aipa kafa heteteno ani amo aginagomoyaene tua hugahe umaine. Ani veamoya Anumaya Koti kahegi kema haviya akavema nemaleya Yisasi humainea kema atafa hu-linaya veanene tua hugahe umaine.
Ani osifavemoa hagelimo agegayalega hetino maine.

Osifavemoa hagelimo agegayalega hetino mainegena nagaya Yonina agogeno nagola kefo afai afua hage lipiti vayi higena age-mainoe. Ani kefo afai afumo anumoa sevenia (7) anuyaga hanegeno tenia (10) aveyagamo anupitila hai-mainegeno ani aveyagamotela ala sauve kanomo tumano kuyaga tenia (10) tumano ku vailine. Ani sevenia (7) anutela kefo afai afumo agia hanegeno ani agiyagamoa Anumaya Kotifena kamuge hatageya vaiteya hu-haviya hutaya agiyaga kae-malageno hane.

Ani kefo afai afumona agoana maa humaine. Nagola afai pusimo agia lepatie nehaya afu kana huno aiyamoa nago ala afai kalamo agia peamo aiya kana humaine. Avayamoa laiyoni afumo avaya kana hu-mainegena age-mainoe. Agogeno ani ala osifavemoa agaia tokiyaaene ala kava hisia siaaene ani kefo afai afumona amine.

Amigeno ani kefo afai afumona nago anuna ago hae-malenaya falitesea afugula haneanagi amuna ageno ago eteno kanale hutene. Kanale hutegeya ageteya mukia ma mopafi veamoya ageteya amamayo aigeya ani kefo afai afumona akave umainae.

Ala osifavemoa agaia tokiya kefo afai afumona aminea yafe mukia veamoya ani kefo afai afumofena “Alati maine.” huya agia alisaga humainae. Kefo afai afumo agiene alisaga nehuya mage huya hae “Hana kanomoa kefo afai afumo tokiyaamoma hia kavala huno hugahie? Ta agaienema tuma hisia tokiyaa hane?” huya hae.

Hageno Anumaya Kotia mage huno hie “Atalegeno tagufa (3) kafuene sikisia (6) ikaene kava yagaino.” huno higeno ani kefo afai afumoa agaia agia alisaga huno Anumaya Kotifena tusiya huno kamugea hatageno vaitene.
Ani kefo afai afumoa avaya aka-naka huno Anumaya Kotina kamugea hu neateno Anumaya Koti agiene nemaiya kumaaene ikapinagama mainaya veaaenena hu-haviya humatene.

Hu neamategeno Anumaya Kotia atalegeno Yisasina amakua aminaya veanene tua huno amakaseteno mukia alu kote alu kote veanene, alu make lu make neaiya veanene, alu maugafa lu maugafa kalimai veanene, kava humatesia tokiya amigeno kava yagaino maine.

Kava yagai-maineanagiya mukia ma mopafi veamoyama agia alisaga hugahayanagi maige maige hisaya hamaimuma hanea veamogami amakima hanea avopi amaki kae-malenea veamoya agia alisaga ohugahae. Ani avona Anumaya Kotia ma mopama taloma ohunea kanafina mage huno hu-maineane “Nagai Sipi sipi nafanea, Yisasia, faligahie.” huno hutenea kanomo avone.
Nagi tamakesama hanesimo-gatama mani kea havilama hutama hiho.

Anumaya Kotia “E.” huno hisigeya nagoa veamoya kina nopina ugahae Anumaya Kotia “Naepe kayoteti haetama falimato.” huno hisigeya nagoa veamoya naepeleti falilamategahae. Ani auava yamoma falote hisigetama Anumaya Koti kea haviya amakupima malenaya veamogatama tokiya vaitama mani kea ali lokiya vaitama atafa hu-litama maiho.

Nagaya Yonina agogeno nago kefo afai afumoa mopamo agusafiti evayi humaine. Ani kefo afai afumo anupina tole avela, sipi sipi nafanemo ave kana ave haneanagi agema aiyana tusia puku pukumo age kana huno agea aimaine.

Neaigeno hagote kefo afai afumoa tokiyaa amigeno ani himamuleti mukia ma mopafi veamogamitela kava humaineno anima nago kefo afai afumoa mukia ma mopafi mainaya veamogamifena mage huno hie “Hagote kefo afai afumona anupina haeya falitesaya kava hageno amuna ale-maineanagino eteno kanale hutenea afumo agia alisaga hiho.” huno humaine.
Nehuno anima nago kefo afai afumoa mukia alua augafa tokiyaage avame yana nehuno atamofena “Ikapinagati elavio.” hunoma hiana veamoya neagageno atamoa ikapinagati mopafina elavi-maine.

Elavigeno hagote kefo afai afumoa “Naa huo.” huno tokiya amigeno nago afai afumoa tokiya avame yama nehia yateti veala aye mavataga hiaamo ani veafena mage huno humaine “Tamakaya hagote kefo afai afua, naepeleti honomu ayageno faliteno eteno mainea afumo agia alisaga hisaya yafe yosaleti avamename hutama amena talo hiho.” huno humaine.

Higeya taloma hayana Anumaya Kotia atalegeya nago kefo afai afumo amena yosaleti talo humalaya kefo afai afumo amela haimula amigeno aepa heno nagoa veamoya agai agima alisaga nohageno haegeya fali-maine.

Ani kefo afai afumoa mage huno hie “Mukia veamogamina, amakima omale veanene, amakima hanea veanene, miyaami hanea veanene, miyaamima omale veanene, nofipi maineya miya oali aliya nealiya veanene, amakaiami miya alisaya aliyama nealiya veanene tamaga amayatelo hamanilelo ohananesia avona kaemateho.” huno higeya kasagoya veamo-gamina ani avomoa hamanileti kae-male kae-male humaine.
Higeya ani avona hagote kefo afai afumo agio ifi ani agimo napamao amaugafalema ani alegana yama omalenesaya veamoya nago yana alu veaneletila miya ohigeya amakaiami yana alu veamoya miya ohugahae.

Nagoa veama kanale havi haviyaami hanea veamoya ani hagote kefo afai afumo napamaa hapaliya havilama hisae. Ani napana nago kanomo agimo napamaa hane. Ani agimo napana sikisi hataleti sikisiti sikisia (666) napamaa hane.

Nagaya Yonina agogeno Anumaya Koti Sipi sipi nafanea Saiyoni agoyale hetino mainegeya kasagoya veamoya vani hataleti foti fo tausenia (144,000) veamoya agaienena ani agoyale hetiya mainae. Ani veamogami hamanilela Sipi sipi nafanemo agiene agaia Nefa agiene kae-malenae.

Nagaya ikapinagati kanale age aiya agea havugeno ti anamoma asaga hu-lavino nelavino agema neaiya kava huno neaino monagemoma hia kava higena havimainogeno kasagoya veamoya gitama neaigeno agema neaiya kava higena havimainoe.

Havugeya ani veamoya Anumaya Kotima mainea siamo auleene foa (4) hamaimuene anagamo-gami amauleene kava vayamo-gami amauleene hetiya maineya haya yagamea nagoa veamoya ohavinaya yagamea, haegafa yagame humainae. Ani yagame haya veanea ma mopafi mainageno Anumaya Kotia amaku amamema aligati-mainea veala vani hataleti foti fo tausenia (144,000) veamoya amakaiamige ani yagame havimainae.

Ani veamoya anea amavayu huya ofaeyageno amakuamoa oniyaagela ohigeno Sipi sipi nafanemoa vai neyageya ani veaamoya akavela vai neayaye. Anumaya Koti Sipi sipi nafanemoa faliteno kefo yaamimo aigagimatenea yapiti miya humateteno ma mopafi veamogami amunopiti hagoteno amaugafa aligati-mainegeno Anumaya Kotiteene Sipi sipi nafanemoteene amavaleno amate-maineane.
Amategeya ani veamoya havige ohu vealagiya nagoa kefoamia omaleneane.

Nagaya agoana nago ensole kanomoa ikamo amunote haleno vai neayeno agola hanege hanege huno nehanea kanale mono kea alino mukia ma mopafi mainaya veamogamina alu kote alu kote veanene, alu make lu make neaiya veanene, alu maugafa lu maugafa kalimainea veanene hamapaisia yafe vai neaye.

Vai-yeno ala kegefafiti mage huno hie “Anumaya Kotia veamogami alino kaiyekema humatesia kanamoa ago falote hu-mainegi tamakaya koli nehutama Anumaya Koti agia alisaga hiho. Anumaya Kotia ikaene mopaene hageliene mopafitima kapai nehagea tiene agaia talo hu-malegetama agai agia alisaga hiho.” huno humaine.

Hume hume nevigeno akavelega nago ensole kanomoa neeno mage huno humaine “Ala kumala Papiloni kumala tusiya huya ago aliya tagape aitalae. Papiloni veamoya mukia kotega veafena mage huya humainae ‘Tagayama huna kava hutama kumai yana hagaage huno havili kana humainegi afaa neho.’ huya hageya ani kumai yana maiya humainae.”

Ani lole ensole kanolamogani anakavela nago ensole kanomoa neeno ala kegefafiti mage huno hie “Nagoa veamoya kefo afai afuene amayateti avave-name huya talo hu-malenaya ameenema agima alisagama nehuya ‘Ani kanomo agia nayatelo nahanilelo agia aigamaelato.’ huyama hu-mainaya veamogamina Anumaya Kotia haima nevaiya yana aligahae. Anumaya Koti aipamoa haviya hinageno hai vaimateno ata nelenageno atuage huno havili kana higeno takino amamisigeya ani veamoya ani havilina negahae. Nesayana alu aotage ensole veamogami amauleene Sipi sipi nafanemo auleene himanaage ata nelea yafayaga hanea atafi mainesageno amaleno asagalisigeya tusiya huya amakata aigahie.

Mukia kanafina ani amakatama aige aige hisia atamo halinamoa taga ohugahianagino agola haige haige huno haigahie. Haigeya ani veamoya kefo afai afuleene amayateti avame-name huya talo hu-malenaya amemaaene agia alisaga nehuyama ani kanomo agima amaugafale hanesia veamoya mukia kanafina agola kegeene felugaene amaugafa amakata aige aige hinageya hano ohugahie.” huno humaine.
Havisayana tamakaya Yisasina tamakuama aminaya veamogatama Yisasife havitama tamakupi malenaya kea atafa hu-linetama Anumaya Koti kahegi kema akave maletama mailokiya vaitama maiho.

Nagaya Yonina ikapinagati nago kea havugeno mage huno hie “Kagaya kea maa huka kao mukia Anumayamoene ailokaeya nemaiya veamoya menima aepa heya falisaya veamoya tusia muse hugahae.” huno humaine. Higeno Alu Aotage Avamumoa mage hie “E, aliya ali-mainaya yana neataleya maifalu hisageya kanale kavama hu-mainaya yamoa amakaiene ugahae.” huno humaine.

Nagaya agogeno nago efeage siatela nago vemoa ikapinagati emainea kanoa vayamo atenea kano avamete hia kanoa siate maineno anute kava vayamogami tumano kula, kanileta yafateti talo humale tumano kula vaiteno ayapina avenene huno fagagi-mainea naepe kayona ali-line.

Ali-linegeno nago ensole kanomoa Anumaya Koti nopiti hati-lavino neeno ani siatema maiya kanohena ala kegefafiti mage huno hapaiye “Mukia ma mopafi kavemoa afule-mainegeno ani kave alisuna kana haneanagika kagayama ali-linana naepe fagagi humainea naepe kayotetila nesatema humainea kavela alio.” huno hie.
Higeno siatema maiya kanomoa fagagi-mainea naepe kayotetila mukia ma mopafima afule-mainea kavela hataga humaine.
Nehigeno nago ensole kanomoa ikapinaga hanea mono nopiti hati-lavino elaviaamo agaienena ania huno tusia kayona fagagino avenene huno naepe kayona ali-lino emaine.

Neegeno nago ensole kanoa atalema kava nehia kanogino afuma heya negaeyaya folamole maineleti neataleno emaine. Eaamo fagagino avenenea naepe kayoma ali-lia kanomofena ala kegefafiti mage huno hie “Mukia mopafi nofi alagayagamoa ago afule-maineafe kagaya ani naepe kayokaa alika ani nofi alagayaga mo hataga huka halaya huo.” huno humaine.

Higeno ani ensole kanomoa naepe kayomaa ali-lino ape huno mukia mopafima hanea nofi alagayaga hataga huno helafi-lino viaamo veamoya amaiyaletima aye lata-pageno timaamoma nelavia yafa yopa, Anumaya Kotia kefo yafena tusiya huno aipa kafa huteno kefo yama nehaya veamogamina anonaamima amamisia ala yafa yopafi mo malene.

Mo malegeno ala kumamona malaga ani nofi alagama aye lata-pegenoa anima aye latapea kolamoa tusiya huno lavino lavino laviaamo timoa hogino veamogami amayonalema nehaiya avamete huno hogino ayaaya kotega tali hataleti (300) kilomita tavigena age-mainoe.

Nagaya Yonina nagola tusia tokiyaage alegana avame yana ikapinaga falote higena agoana maa humaine. Sevenia (7) ensole vayamoya anile maineya sevenia (7) havi yatafana veamogami haenagalafa falote hisia ali haviya humatesia yana atafa hulinae. Anima ali haviya humatesia yana hano hisigeno Anumaya Kotina aipamoma ata nelea yana agola hano hugahie.

Nagaya agoana nagola hageli kotuna galasi kana huno alave alave nehigeno amunoafina ata nelegena age-mainoe. Ani kotute mukia veamoya “Kefo afai afuene amayateti talo hu-malenaya amefeenena agia alisaga ohugahunagi. Agiene napamaaene taugafalega okaegahae.” huyama ani afumona agase-mainaya veamoya ani hagelimo agegayale heti-maineya Anumaya Kotima amaminea yaveya atafa hu-lineya yagamea humainae.
Ani veamoya Mosesea Anumaya Koti aliya kanomo yagamene Sipi sipi nafanemo yagamene huya maa humainae

“Ala Anumaya Kotigae tusia tokiyakaa haneanagika mukia humainana yamoa kanaleya huka talo hanageta tagaya neagonageno tamayoa neaiye. Mukia mopafi veamogamina ala sauve kanoami maineka kava neyagaika kagaikaa auava yakamoa tamagelafa huno fatago humaine.

Ala kanomogae kagaikaage nagokemoga kefo yana ohuka alu aotage kanoma mainana yafena hana kanomo kagaifena kolikaa ohugahie? Hana kanomo kagai kagia alisaga ohugahie? Mukia mopafi veamoya kagaya fatago huka mainana auava yakaa ago age-mainaya yafe kagaitega eaamoya kagia alisaga hugahae.” huya yagamefitila humainae.
Yagamea nehagena ikapinaga etena agoana mono nopina, kelamagema ali falote nehia nona, alu aotage seli nona yaki-mainegena age-mainoe.

Neagogeya sevenia (7) ensole veamoya sevenia (7) yayaga veama ali haviya humatesaya yama atafa hu-linaya ensole vayamoya mono nopitila hati-laviya kumatega emainae. Ani veamoya oniya ohu kenamoa alave alave huno efeage humainea kena fai-lineya kanileta yafateti talo humale nofila amaifiyafale ayegalaki-lineya emainae.

Ageno foa (4) hamaimuene anagamogami amunopitila nago kanomoa eaamo sevenia (7) yopa kanileta yafateti talo humale yopayaga ali-lino amamine. Ani yopayagafina Anumaya Kotia maige maige huno mainea kanomona haima vaigeno aipamoa atama nelea yana ani yopafina havate-maine. Havate-mainegeno alino sevenia (7) ensole veala ani yopayaga me mamine.

Me mamigeya Anumaya Kotina tokiya hale yamaaene himamuaene halina kana huno ani mono nopina havate-maine. Havate-maineanagiya nagoa veamoya ani nopinaga haiya ofalenae. Ofalenayanagiya sevenia (7) ensole veamoya anima sevenia (7) ali haviya humatesaya aliyaamia ali hano hutesageya veamoya eteya ani nopinaga hai-falegahae.

Naa higena havuana ikapinaga hanea mono nopiti nagola tusia agegefa aigena havugeno sevenia (7) ensole vayafe mage huno hie “Tamakaya Anumaya Kotina haima vaigeno aipamoa atama nelea yana sevenia (7) yopafi hanegi alitama mopafi mo aitagu-feho.” huno hie.

Higeno hagote molia ensole kanomoa viaamo ani yopaafima hanea yana alino mopafi mo aitagu-fegeya kefo afai afumo avoma amaugafalema kae-malenea veamoya ani kefo afai afumo amefena “Anumayati mainane.” huya agima alisaga nehaya veamogamina tusia kele amamu amale-maine.

Amamuna amalegeya mainageno anile molia ensole kanomoa yopaafima hanea yana alino hagelipi mo laki-talegeno ani hagelimoa falimainaya veamogami kolamoma hia kava huteno mukia tipima mainaya kafayaga faliya faluti-mainae.
Falutigeno anile tagufa (3) molia ensole kanomoa yopaafima hanea yana ala tima nelavia tipiene kapaima nehagea tipiene taki-talegeno ani liyagamoa kolamaage ti hapae-maine.

Naa higena havugeno titema kava yagai-mainea ensole kanomoa mage huno hie “Anumaya Kotiga nayona mainananagika menia ania huka maineka kefo yana nohana Alu aotage kanogika kaiyekema humateka kefo yamo anonaama hu-matana yana fatago huka nehane.

Ani veamoya kagaikaa alu aotage veanene amaune veanekaene hamayageya fali-mainae. Faligeno ani veamogami kolamoma takilavi-mainea yafe kagaya ani kefo yaamimo anonaamia neamaminanagiya ani kola tima nesayana kagaya kanale kava hu nematane.” huno humaine.

Higena havugeno afuma heya kae salamanama hu neataya folamoleti nago kemoa falote huno mage hie “E, tamage mukia tokiyakaa hanea Anumaya Kotiga kaiyekea fatago hulama huka hu neamatana kano mainane.” huno humaine.
Higena agogeno anile fo (4) molia ensole kanomoa yopaafitila yagefi ailaki-talegeno Anumaya Kotia atalegeno yagemoa tusia amukoage huteno mukia veala teno amasagali-maine.
Amasagaligeyagi veama kefo yamo anonaamima amamisia tokiyaama hanea Anumaya Koti agia aye haviya nehayanagiya amakua aiyahae huya Anumayamo agia alisaga ohunae.

Ohageno faefu (5) molia ensole kanomoa yopaafima hanea yana kefo afai afumo siale taki-talegeno mukia ani kefo afai afumoma kava humatenea kaiyaga tusia hani kigeya agai veamoya amaugafa amakatama aiya yafe amakaiami amavefunafi hataga hatago huya akafula ani-mainae.
Neanigeno amaugafaleenena amamuna amaleno amakatama aiya yafena ikapinaga mainea Anumaya Kotifena kamuge hatageya vaitayanagi kefo yama humainaya yafena amakua aiyahae ohunae.

Aiyahae ohageno sikisi (6) molia ensole kanomoa yopaafima hanea yana tusia lina Yufaletisi lima nelavia tipi taki-talegeno ani limoa taneno hau huteno ala kakefa falote humaine. Higeno yagema vayi nehilegati ala Sauve vayama esaya kamoa falote humaine.

Falote higena nagaya neagogeno tagufa (3) Kefo Avamula utu kana avamula nagola osifavemo avayafiti vayi higeno nagola kefo afai afumo avayafiti vayi higeno nagola havigegeyama nehia aune kanomo avayafiti vayi humaine.

Vayi huteya ani talia (3) Kefo Avamumoya haiya maineya tokiyaage avame yana nehuya mukia ma mopafi Sauve vayatema vayana ani vayala amavaleya alitalu humategahe umainae. Tusia tokiyaama hanea Anumaya Kotia ala tuma hisia kanafina Anumaya Kotiene tuma hisaya yafe melitalu humatenae.

Yisasia mage huno humaine “Haviho ‘Omegahie.’ hutama nehaya kanafina musufa kanomoa neea avamete kava huna egahue. Egahuanagi ani kanafina kenaamia omalenageya alapaagela maisaya veala amakayea ohisaya yafe menia nagaifema amakesa nehaviya amaula ofaeya kenaamia fai-lisayana musena hugahae huna nehue.” huno humaine.
Utu kana Kefo Avamumoya mukia kotegati ala Sauve veamogamina amavaleya ayaamoya Yuta veamogami kefina Amagetoni huya nehaya kumate melitalu humatene.

Aupaa seveni (7) molia ensole kanomoa yopaafima hanea yana ikate hanea yasifi taki nea-talegeno ikapinagama hanea mono nopitila ala kegefa falote huno mage hie “Mukia yana hai hano hie.” huno humaine.

Ani kea nehigeno aulumaya kotino ute ete higeno monagemoa tusiya huno agea neaigeno tusia imila ali-maine. Veamoya ma mopafima mainaya kanafina ania augafa imila aligeya oagenayanagino mukia imila agaseno tusia imikefa ali-maine.

Aligeno ala kumala Papilonia ali haviya huno tagufafi (3) ali fako higeno mukia ma mopafi ala kumayagaene alino haviya humatene. Anumaya Kotia Papilonia ala kumapi maineya kefo yama nehaya veafena agela okaninegi agesa havino haima nevaiya yamoa aipafina ata nelegeno kefo yaamimo anonaamia amamigeya alimainae.
Ala imikefa aligeno mukia hagelimo amunopima hanea mopaene agoyagaene fanane humainae.

Tusia komopa, yafa ku kana huteno, ala alaisi ku kana huno kanaage huno ikapinagati asaga hulavi hulavi hiaamo veamogami amaugafale taviaamo ali haviya humategeya Anumaya Kotifena “Otahaiya kano mainane.” huya kamugea hatageya vaitenae.

Sevenia (7) yopa atafa hulinaya ensole vayapiti nagoke ensole kanomoa eaamo nagaifena mage huno hie “Kagaya male egena kavelino. Ma kumai amoa, timona avoyalega ala kumate mainea amoa, kefo yamaamo anonaa alisia yafena nagaya kaveligahue.

Mukia ma mopafima mainaya Sauve vayamoya ani kumate mainaya veanenena tusiya huya kumaiya heya vai neayageya ma mopafima mainaya veamoyaenena ani kumate veanenena kefo yama nehaya kava huya havilima neya anegi-nagima nehaya kava humainae.” huno higena havi-mainoe.

Nehavugeno Alu Aotage Avamumoa nagaila Yoninia tokiyaa namitegeno ani ensole kanomoa navaleno vea omai kame kotega mo natene. Mo nategena nagaya nago akefa agoana haesa kefo afai afumo agupifi mainegena age-mainoe. Ani kefo afai afumo augafalela Anumaya Kotina kamugema hatageya amakiya agia augafale kae-malenae. Ani kefo afai afumona sevenia (7) anuyaga hanegeno ani anuyagalela tenia (10) aveyaga hane.

Hanegena nagaya agoana ani akefamoa oko kenaene haesa kenaene fai-lino maine. Miyamoa hai-mainea seveliyaene kanileta yafateti talo humale yaene fai-linegeno augafalela aleale nehigeno maiya akefa age-mainoe. Agogeno ayapina kanileta yafateti talo humale keayola ali-linegeno kumai yama nehia yaene havigu-nagu himanaage kefo yamaaene ani keayopina havate-maine.
Ani amo hanilela agaia agia avame kea mage huya kae-malenae “Papilonia ala kumatema mukia kumai yama nehaya yaene ma mopafima kefo yama nehaya yaenena itaamoe.” huno kae-malene.

Kaegenama agoana ani amoa mukia Anumaya Kotina alu aotage veanene, Yisasima hulatenea mono kema hamanepaiya veanene hamaegeya fali-mainaya veamogami kolana ani amoa valu valu huno neteno havilima neteya anegi-nagima nehaya kava higena agetena atali talu nehugeno namayoa aimaine.

Neaigeno ani ensole kanomoa mage huno hie naa higeno kamayoa neaiye? Nagaya ani amofeene agupifima mainea afua, sevenia (7) anuyaga hanegeno ani anuyagalela tenia (10) aveyaga hanea afuenefena falakino hanea kea hu falote huna kahapaigahue.

Agana kefo afai afumoa nayona maineanagino meni kanafina ago fali-maineanagino haenagaa ayoma omale komufitila hetino ataleno ehaisiaamo hani yapima tegelege nehia atafina agola umaigahie. Umaigahianagi Anumaya Kotia ma mopa taloma ohunea kanafima hanea avopina, maige maige hisaya hamaimuma hanea veamogami amakima kae-malenea avopina, ma mopafi mainaya veanea amakima okaenea veamoya ani kefo afai afuma agesayana atali huya tusia amamayo aigahie. Ani afua nayona maineanagino menia ago fali-maineanagino haenagaa eteno evayi hisia afai afue.
Kanale havi haviyaamima hanesia veamoya mani yafena havilama huya havigahae. Haviho. “Ani kefo afai afumona sevenia (7) anumoa sevenia (7) agoyale humaleno higeno ani kumai amoa ani agoyale maine.

Naa higeno ani anuyagamoa sevenia (7) ala sauve kava vaya mainae. Maineya ani sauve vayapitila faefua (5) ago faligeno nagoke menia mainegeno nagokela yaufa falote ohune. Haenaga evayima hisiana osi kana kanoa maigahie.

Maigahianagi kefo afai afumoa nayona maineanagino menia ago fali-mainea afugino eiti (8) molia Sauve kano maineanagino seveni (7) molia Sauve anagapi maineanagino hani yapi visiaamo tege-lege nehia atafi agola umaigahie.
Agana tenia (10) avemoa tenia (10) Sauve vaya maineya menia yaufa kava aliyana oalinayanagiya kefo afai afuene tokiyaami aliteya ani kava aliyana aupa kana kanoafi kava yagaiteya atalegahae.
Ani tenia (10) Sauve vayamoya nagoke amaku amakesale maineya tokiyaamia kefo afai afumona amigahae.

Amiteya ani Sauve vayamoyaene kefo afai afuene ali nagopi ataleya Sipi sipi nafanenema tuma hisayana Sipi sipi nafanemoa, ala kava veamogamina kavaami maineanagino ala Sauve veamogamina ala Sauve kanoami mainea yafe ani luma hisayana amakaila amakasegahie. ‘Nagaitega eho.’ hunoma huyogi-malenea veamoya mukia kanafina efi efi huya agai kema akave nemalaya veanene Sipi sipi nafanene ailokaeya maineya ani luma hisayana amakasegahae.” huno ani ensole kanomoa higena havimainoe.

Havugeno mage huno nahapaiye “Agana tiyaga, kumai amoa ani ti avoyalema mopale mainea timoa, veafe humaine. Kasagoya veamoya alu kote alu kote veanene, alu make lu make neaiya veanene, alu maugafa lu maugafa kali-mai veanene elitalu huya maine.

Anima tenia (10) aveyagama hanegeka agana tenia (10) Sauve vayamoyaene ani kefo afai afuene ali nagopi ataleya ani kumai amona amaipa kafa huteteya ali haviya hutegahae. Huteya aluya huya tua huteteya kenaa augafaletila hate-taleteya augafa alagaage mainesigeya augafamona amea neteya atafi kae-talegahae.

E, Anumaya Kotia agaiama humainea kemoa tamage huno falote hisiafene huno ani amaku amakesa tenia (10) Sauve vayamogamina amaminegeya nagoke amakesageya haviteya ‘Ala kava kano maisie.’ huya ani kefo afai afumona tokiyaamia aminae. Amigeno kavama maisia yamaa hanesigeno Anumaya Kotia hamapai-mainea kemoma falote huno tamagema hisia kana ani kefo afai afumoa hano hugahie.
Ani akefa aganana tusia ala kava yagai-mainea kumala, mukia Sauve vayamogamina ago amakaseno hai-mainea kumafe nehie.” huno higena havimainoe.
Ikapinagati nago ensole kanoa elavigena nagaya Yonina agogeno ani ensole kanomoa tusia tokiyaa hanegeno elavinoma eana yagemoma aivasa nehia avamete huno konagali yamaamoa mopamona aivasa humaine.

Hu-malegeno ani ensole kanomoa ala kegefafiti mage huno hie “Papilonia ala kumakefamoa tusiya huno ago haviya hu-mainegeya menia Kefo Avamuyagaene nagoa fali-mai afuyaga aye laga-feya nevaiya namayagaene ani kumapina ali vai-mainae.

Ani Papiloni veamoya mukia kotega veafena ‘Tagayama nehuna kava hutama kumaima he auava yamoa hagaage ti kana hu-mainegi neho.’ huya hageya ani kavama haya yamo ani kumala agola ali haviya humaine. Mukia ma mopafi Sauve vayaene ania huya agaiene kumai yana hu-mainayagiya ma mopafi miyana tusia miya alisaya aliya nealiya veamoya tusiya huya kumai yana hu-liteya haya yateti ala miyakefa ali-mainaya yafe ani kumala agola ali haviya hu-talenae.” huno humaine.

Nagaya havugeno nago kemoa ikapinagati mage huno humaine “Mukia veanimogatama ani kumapitila neataletama hati-lavitama malaga eviho. Havigu nagopi tamakaya afalu falu hutama mainesageno ani veamogami kefo yaamimoene huyafenagi ailokaetama ani veamogami kefo yamo anonaami aliyafenagi hati-lavitama eviho.
Ani veamoyama humainaya kefo yaamimoa ala itugefamoma hia kava huno maleme maleme ikapi nehaiyanagino Anumaya Kotia mukia ani kumate veamoyama hu-mainaya kefo yafena agesa havino maine.
Anumaya Kotigae neaganageno agoma kefo yama humainea yamaamona alika tolegeya ali lokaeka hu-mainea avamete masufina takika amigeno neno.

Ani kumai amoa agaia augafa alino nehaino ageno hayema hia kavama hu-mainea yatetila kagaya ania huka augafa agata aisia yaene tusia aviteno augafahema kalagi aisia yaene amio. Ani amoa agupinaga mage huno nehavie ‘Nagaya ala Sauve anemo siale mainoanagina megusa akefa omainoanagino nagaitela kana yamoa falote hisigena nagaya avia oategahue.’ huno agesa havimaine.

Havianagi ani kefo yama humainea yateti aupaa nagoke yupa anonaa agata aisia yana falote hugahie. Ani kumate mainaya veamoya kasagoya kaliene amaka tesia yaene aliteya falisageya mukia veamoya amahau huya avi tegahae. Atamoa Papiloni kumala tesagali-talegahie. E, tusia tokiyaa hanea Anumaya Kotia havino kaiyekea humateteno anima amaugafa amakata aisia yana tusi yate amamigahie.
Mukia Sauve vayamoya ani kumai akefaenena kumaima heya mukia kefo yaenema humainaya Sauve vayamoyama ani kumatema kae-malesageno ata halinamoma ageteya tusiya huya hamauna huteya avia ategahae.

Ani veamoya agatama aiya yama alia yafena tusia koli huteya aluale hetiya maineya mage huya hugahae ‘Vaeha tahau hane tahau hane Papilonia ala kumala tokiyaage kumamogagi nagoke yagefi kaugafa kagata yana anonakaa ago ali-mainane.’ huya hutegahae.
Ma mopafima tusia miyama alisaya aliya nealiya veamoya afeno yaamima miya hisaya veanea omaigeya ani kumafena amakesa havi havi huya avia neateya amaipamoa kanaage hia yapi maigahae.

Ani afeno yama miya hisageya monea alisia afeno yana kanileta yafateti talo humale yaene efe yoleti talo humale yaene miyamaamoa hai-mainea seveliyaene sesuyagaene haesa ohaesa kenaene kayogayo humainea kenaene oko kenaene mukia kanale manaage yosaene afumo avete talo humale yaene miyamaamoa hai-mainea yosale talo humale yaene haesa yafateti talo humale yaene kapaleti talo humale yaene tokiyaage yafaene manaage kimamufaene hagaage higeya nenaya yamoene manaage halinama nehia yaene manaage masaveene vaini tiene atafi negayaya masaveene tanefa falauvaene vitimo alagaene pulamakaene sipi sipiene hosi afuene hosimo avayuma nehia kalene veamogami amaugafa mukia miya higeya nofipi maineya miya oali aliyama nealiya veanene, aliya vaiyatete nehaya afenoami miya hisaya veanea omaigeya avia neateya amaipamoa kanaage humainae.

Humainageya ani ala kumafena mage huya hugahae ‘Mukia tamahayema higetamama nealiya afenoyana ago tamahafaleya hano hutalae. Kanale miya afenotamiene konagali yatamiene ago hano hianagitama nagoene oaligahae.’ huya hugahae.

Huteya ani veamoya ani ala kumapitima afenoyaamileti monema hu-hatiyama nealiya veamoya ani ala kumatema mainaya veamoya kefo yamo anonaamia amakatama aiya yana aliya yafe tusia koli huteya aluale hetiya maineya avia neateya kalagila neaiya hamauna hugahae.

Nehuya mage huya hugahae ‘Vaeha tusia tahau nehane tahau nehane. Nayona kanale kenakaa haesa ohaesa kenaene oko kenaene fai-lineka konagalima ali-maleneka kanileta yafateti talo humale yaene kanale miyamaamo hai-mainea seveliyaene kaugafale vai-lineka konagalia ali-maleka nemainane.
Nemainanagi nagoke yagefi mukia ani ala mone afeno yakaa mukia ali haviya hugatae.’ huya hugahae.
Nehisageya ‘Mukia tipi kalefi kava vayaene tipi kalema aliya vai neayaya vayamoyaene ani tipi kalefima aliya nealiya yapiti miyamaa ali-mainaya veanene aluale heti-maineya Papiloni kumala agegahae.
Neageya Papiloni kumala atamoma teno asagaligeno halinamoma muti muti hia yana neageya mage huya hugahae ‘Ani kumala mukia kumala agase-mainea kumalageno teno ali haviya nehie.’ huya hugahae.

Nehuya tanefa kateya amanupi aiteya avia neateya hamauna nehuya mage huya hugahae ‘Vaeha ala kumamogae tusia lahau nehane.’ Mukia tipi kaleyagamona amafaheya anile visayaamoya miyaamima ani kumategatila ala huya nealiyanagi nagoke yagefi haviya-tafana hane.’ huya hugahae.

Hugahayanagi tamakaya ikapinaga mainaya veamo-gatamaene Yisasina tamakua aminaya veamo-gatamaene Aposolo vayamo-gatamaene Anumaya Koti aune veamogatamaene ani kumama ali haviya hutalea yafena muse hiho. Ani ala kumamo tamakaila ali haviya hu nelamatea yafenagino Anumaya Kotia kefo yamaamo anonaa ago amine hutama hiho.” huno humaine.

Higeno nagola tokiyaage ensole kanomoa nagola tusia yafakefa alisaga huteno hagelipi hagayu hu neataleno mage huno hie ani ala yafakefama hagayu hutaloa yamoa Anumaya Kotia ani avamete huno ani Papilonia ala kumala, alino tusiya huno ali haviya huteno alino hagayu hu-talenageno fanane hinageya nagoene veamoya oagegahae.

Yaveyamoma agema neaiya yaene alua alua yagamema nehaya yaene kapufama nehaya yaene ufema nehaya yamoenena nagoenena agea aisigeya ohavigahae. Veamoya kagaipina nagoene aliyana oaligahae. Talo tala huya imuma kiya kanafima kema yeso nehisaya kea nagoene ohavigahae.

Nayona kagai veamoya miyana hu hatisaya aliyama nealiya veamoya ma mopafina ala veane mainagetama tamakaya alua alua hanageke yama humatenaya yamoa mukia veala ayemavataga hu-mainayafe Anumaya Kotia tamakai kumala ali haviya hu-taleneanagino tamakai kumatela kanimoa nagoene aivasa ohugahie. Anema aligahe hageno amoa vema aligahe higeya musema nehaya kemoa tamakaipina nagoene falote ohugahie.

Anumaya Kotia ageana ani kumate mainaya veamoya Anumaya Kotina amakua aminaya veanene agai amaune veanenena ma mopafina kasagoya veanenena hamaeya falimatenaya kolamoa ani kumapina hanea yafe auhanageke yamaamoene hanea yateti Anumaya Kotia ali haviya hutegahie.

Nagaya anile havugeno kasagoya ikapinaga mainaya veamoya ala kegefafiti mage huya hae “Tagaya Anumaya Koti agia alisaga hisune. Anumaya Kotia kaiyekema humategahena kanaleya huno kelamage keleti fatago huno kaiyekea hu neamateno ani kumai amona tokiyaama hanegeno mukia ma mopafi veafena ‘Kefo yama hiho.’ huno ali haviya hu neamatea yatetila Anumaya Kotia ani kefo yamo anonaa ago amine. Ani kumai amoa Anumaya Koti aliya veala hamaeno falimateneanagino ani yateti Anumaya Kotia kefo yamaamo anonaa ago amine. Amineanagita Anumaya Koti agia alisaga hisune. Anumaya Kotitimoa agaiage tokiyaage hale yamo aepa maineanagino tagu tamena ago aligati-maineanagita agia alisaga nehune.”

Eteya ala kegefaleti nagoene mage huya hae “Tagaya Anumaya Koti agia alisaga hisune. Ani kumala atama leno asagali-talia yapiti halinamoa agola haige haige huno nehaiya yafe Anumaya Koti agia alisaga hisune.” huya humainae.

Nehageya tueti foa (24) kava vayamoyaene foa (4) hamaimuene anagamoyaenena ala sauve kanomo siale mainea Anumaya Kotite asaga hulaviya amakoya yemaineya agia alisaga nehuya mage hae “Tamagelafa huya nehayanagita Anumaya Koti agia alisaga hisune.” huya humainae.

Nehageno ala sauve kanomo sialeti nago kemoa falote huno mage hie “Tamakaya Anumaya Koti aliya nealitama aiyafinagama mainaya veamogatamaene afa veanene tamakima hanea veanenena Anumaya Koti agi alisaga hiho.” huno humaine.

Anile nago kea havuana kasagoya veamoya alitalu huya maineya ailalupeya haya kemoa, timoma anama nelavino agema neaiya avamete nehuya, monagemoma nehia avamete huya ala kegefafiti mage huya hae “Anumaya Koti agia alisaga hisune. Anumaya Kotiti mukia tokiyaa hanegeno kasagoya kava veamogamina amakaseno agaiage ala kava kano maineanagita agia alisaga hisune.

Sipi sipi nafanemoa ama alisia kanamoa ago falote higeno alisia amoa ago talo tala huno maineafe tagaya tusia muse nehuta taipa kanale yapiti yagamea huta Anumaya Kotina tokiyaage hale yamaa hanea agia alisaga hisune.

Anumaya Kotia oniya ohuno efeage humainea kena ani amona amigeno fai-line.” huya humainae. Ani kenahema hiana Yisasina amakuama amitafa huteya alu aotage veanema fatago huya nemaiya veamogami auavafe humaine.

Anile ensole kanomoa Yisasina amakua aminaya veafena mage huno nahapaiye “Kagaya mani kea avopi kao. ‘Sipi sipi nafanemoa ama alisia imua ago kimalegeno ‘Eho huno ke humalenagiya esaya veamoya tusia muse hisae.’ Mani kea Anumaya Koti kelamage kea hugeka nehavine.” huno humaine.

Higena nagaya ani ensole kanomo agia alisaga hugahe aiyafi asaga hulavina nagoya yemaugeno “Aaogi kagaya naa ohuo. Nagaya kagaiene kafu-kaganayaenena, Yisasi kema havitama atafa hu-linetama huhaletama nehaya veamogatamaene nagoke aliya nealuna kano mainogi nagai nagia alisaga ohuganagi Anumaya Koti agiage alisaga huo. Yisasima humainea kemoa Anumaya Koti kema huhaleya hisaya tokiya veamogami amamine.” huno nahapai-maine.

Ikamoa aihagalo higena agogeno nagola efeage hosimoa mainegena age-mainoe. Ani hosimo agupifima maiya kanomo agimoa maa humaine “Efi efi huno kanale aliya nealia kanoe. Kelamage kegeya nehia kanoe.” huya agia aye-mainae. Ani kanomoa fatago huno kaiyekea humateno nagoa veamoyaenema tuma hisiana fatago yateti huno tua nehie.

Aulagamoa atamo kani kana huno aiha nelegeno anutela ala Sauve vayamogami tumano kuyaga kasagoya vai-linegeno augafalela nago agia kae-malegeno ani agia agaiage havilinea agi haneanagiya mukia veamoya ani agia ohavinae.
Agaiama fai-linea kolamoa ayaaya kenaale tusiya hu-mainegeno Anumaya Koti aepama hugafino humainea yafe agima ayayana “Anumaya Kotina keae.” huya agia ayemainae.
Ikapinaga ati vayamoya efe hosiyagamo agupifi maiteya kanaleya huno efeage huteno oniya ohu kena, faili faili huya akavela umainae.

Nevageno mukia ma mopafi veanema hamaesia avenene humainea naepea avayafina aniline. Ani-lineanagino amakaseno hagote Sauve kano maineno tokiyaage huno mukia veamogamina kava humategahie. Humateneno veamoya nofi alagayaga amaiyaletima aye lata-pageno timaamoma nelavia avamete kava huno ani kanomoa tusia tokiyaama hanea Anumaya Kotia haima vai neamatea kame vayaa kefo yamo anonaamia amamigahie.
Neamamino kenaaleene aiya amoteenema kae-malenea agimoa maa humaine “Ala Sauve vayamogamina ala Sauve kanoamie. Ala kava veamogamina ala kavaami mainea kanoe.” huno agia kae-malene.

Kae-malenegena neagogeno nago ensole kanomoa yagemo aufi hetino mukia ikamo amunote haleya vai-yayea namayagahena mage huno hie “Tamakaya Anumaya Kotia ala kavema taloma humalea kavetela melitalu hiho.

Melitalu hutama fali-mainaya Sauve veanene ati veate kava veanene mai-lokiya vaiya nemaiya veanene hosi afuyagaene ani hosimo agupifi nemaiya vayaene, nofipi maineya miya oali aliya nealiya veanene afaa mainaya veanene, ala amakiene veanene, osi amakima hanea veanene mukia falisagetama amakaila amaugafamo amamela negahae.” huno humaine.
Higena nagaya agoana ani kefo afai afuene ma mopafi Sauve vayaene ati vayaamienena efe hosimo agupifima maiya kanoene ati vayaaene tu hugahe melitalu humainae.

Naa hayanagi anima efe hosimo agupifima maiya kanomoa kefo afai afuene havigegeyama nehia aune kanoene alino nofi hunatene. Ani kefo afai afumoa hapaigeno ani havigegeyama nehia aune kanomoa tokiyaage avame yana humaine. Nehuno anima tokiyaage avame-name yama humainea yateti amaugafalela kefo afai afumo agia kae-malenageya kefo afai afumona amemaamo agima alisaga nehaya veanena havige aye mavataga humaine. Anima aye mavatagama humainea kefo afai afuene havi aunema laga humainea kanoene hanaegeana ofalinaagi afaa hanaimula hanegeya anavaleya tusia komugefa himanaage yafayagama hanegeno atama tegelege nehia komufi anasaga huno vai-talenae.

Vai-taleteno efe hosimo agupifima maiya kanomoa mukiama melitalu humainaya ati vayamogamina ayaaya naipea avayafina ani-lineanagino ani naipeleti hamaegeya fali-mainae. Faligeya mukia namayagamoya ani veamogami amaugafa aye laga-feya nageno tusiya huno amamupa-napa ayemaine.
Nagaya Yonina agogeno nago ensole kanoa ikapinagati elavi-maine. Ani kanomo ayapina ayola omale komule ki nofiene ayaaya seni nofiene hanegeno elavi-maine.

Elaviaamo ani osifavea metafa humaine. Ani osifavea ehe kanafima mainea osifavea kame kanotigino agia Satanie. Ani Satanina metafa huno tokiyaage seni nofila kiteteno anima ayoma omale komufina asaga huno vai-taleteno avaya tileno tokiyaage hutegeno Satania vani tausenia (1,000) kafu ani komufina nofipi maineanagino ani kanafina veamogamina havigea aye mavataga ohugahianagino vani tausenia (1,000) kafuma hano hutesigenoa ani komufitila atalesigeno aupa kana kanoafi ute ete hugahie.

Anile nagaya agoana nagoa veala ala sauve vayamogami siale mainageno Anumaya Kotia kaiyekema humateya ali fako hu-matesaya aliyamo tokiya amamine. Ani veamoya Yisasina amakua amiteya agai kene Anumaya Koti kene hamapai-mainaya yatetima amakeya hataga hageya falimainaya veamogami amamena age-mainoe. Ani amamema agoa veamoya kefo afai afuene talo hu-malenaya ameene agiene alisaga ohuya kefo afai afumo agienema hamanileene amayateenema omalene. Omalea veamoya eteya hamaimula aliteya ala kava veane maineya Kalaisiene vani tausenia (1,000) kafua kava yagaiya maigahae.

Ani veanema heti-mainaya kana hagote-lamateya fali-mainaya veala hetisaya kana hane. Haneanagi nagoama fali-mainaya veamoya ani kanafina heotigahagi vani tausenia (1,000) kafumoa hano hu-tesigeya hetigahae.

Anima hagoteya hetisaya veala Anumaya Kotina alu aotage veanea mainayanagiya tusi muse hugahae. Anumaya Kotia tegelege nehia atafina amatesigeya nagoene eteya tole molia kanalela ofaligahae. Ofaligahayanagiya Anumaya Kotigani Kalaisigani anakia alisaga nehuya aliya veaani maineya vani tausenia (1,000) kafua Kalaisiene sauve kava maigahae.
Haenagaa vani tausenia (1,000) kafumoa hanoma nehigenoa Satanina nofima hutenea nopitila atalesigeno ehaigahie.

Hati-lavino visiaamo mukia mopaene mopaene mainaya veamo-gami amakia Kogi nofi veanene Magogi nofi veanene Satania havige huno aye-mavataga hisiaamo “Melitalu hutama tu hiho.” huno amavaleno melitalu hu-matesigeya ani veamogami napamoa ti kahaepa kana hu-maineanagiya huyo okigahae.

Ani veamoya mukia kotega vai neayeya Anumaya Kotina amakua aminaya veamogami kumala, Anumaya Kotia muse nehia ala kumamona meli kagiya amavayagigahayanagi ikapinagati atamoa elavisiaamo ani veamogamina tesagali hano hugahie.

Hano hinageno Anumaya Kotia Satanina, havigema aye mavataga humainea kanomona, ata neleno himanaage nehia yafayagama tegelege nehia komufina asaga huno vaigahie. Ani komufina kefo afai afuene havigema nehia aune kanoene mainaa komufinagino ani lagufa (3) vayala anifinaga maineya kegeene felugaene mukia kanafina agola amagata aige aige hisia yamoa hanetafa huno hanemategahie.

Anile nagaya Yonina himonafi kana yapi agoana ala efeage ala Sauve kanomo sia hanegeno ani siale mainea kanoa age-mainoe. Agogeno mopamoene ikamoenena agai aulela faleana fanane huana nagoene omaletafa humainae.

Nagaya fali-mainaya veama agoana amaki hanea veanene, amakima omale veanene, ala Sauve kanomo aule heti-mainageno ensole vayamoya avoyaga ali vakaye-mainae. Nago avona, maige maige hisaya hamaimuma hanea veamogami amakima hanea avoene vakayeya ani avopina agoma humainaya auava kavaamimo kema kae-malenaya keleti fali-mainaya veala Sauve kanomo siale maiya kanomoa kaiyekeamia fako humatene.

Hage lipima fali-mainaya veala ani limoa amatalegeya uvayi huya mo heti-mainageya fali yamoene fali-mainaya veamoya nevaya kotegaene anakaipima mainaya veamogamina amatalaageya eteya hetigeno Anumaya Kotia humainaya auava yateti kaiyekeamia fako humatene.

Kaiyekea humateteno mukia veamogami amakimoa maige maige hisaya hamaimuma hanea veamogami amaki hanea avopima amakima okaenesaya veala Anumaya Kotia atama tegelege nehia komufi amavaleno hagayu huma-talegahie. Fali yaene fali veamoya unemaiya koene ata tegelege nehia komufi anasaga huno vai-talesigeana hano hutafa hugae. Ani atama nelea komufima visayana tole (2) yupa eteya faligahae.
Nagaya Yonina agoana hagotenoma hanea ikaene mopaene hage limoene fanane higeno haegafa ikaene mopaene age-mainoe.

Nagaya alu aotage kumala, haegafa Yelusalemu, Anumaya Kotia ikapinagati ataleno elavigena agoe. Agogeno amoa vema aligahe kanale kenama fai-lineno kanale konagali ali-maleno velema nevia augafa kava huno elavigena age-mainoe.

Nagaya havugeno ala sauve kanomo sialeti nago ala kegefafiti mage huno hie “Menia Anumaya Kotia veanene tokaeno maigahie. Ani veamogami amunopi mainesigeya mukia veala agaia veane maisageno Anumaya Kotiami maigahie.

Maineno amaunua aye hami-talesigeya nagoene veala ofaligahae. Amaipamoa kana ohinageya avia oategahayanagino amakata aisaya yamoenena hano hugahie. Nayoma nemaiya augafa auava yamoa ani kanafina hano hugahie.” huno hu-maine.

Higeno ala Sauve kanomo sialema maiya kanomoa mage huno hie “Haviho nagaya mukia yana ago alina haegafaage hu-maluanagino haegafa huno hanegahie. Mani kea tamage nehue. Mukia veamoya haviya amakupi maleya amametiti hisaya yafe mani kelamage ke nehugi kae-malo.”

Mage huno nahapaiye “Mukia aliyania hai alivaya aye-mainoe. Nagaya mukia tokiyamona aepaa mainoanagina kava yagai-mainena mukia yana ali vayayesoa kano mainogi uhagotena maitena haenagalafa mainoe. Veamoya tifema amakesigeya hamaimu alisaya tina kapaima nehagea tinagiya miya ohugahagi afaa amamisugeya negahae.
Veamoya Sataniene tuma huya agasesayana nagaya mani kanale yayaga afaa amamigahue. Amamitena nagaya Anumayaami maisugeya amakaya nagai nafaneyaga maigahae.

Maigahagi koli nehaya veanene, nagaifema haviya amakupima nomalaya veanene, amakuamo oniyaage humai veanene, veama hamaeya falimate veanene, kumai heya vai neayaya veanene, hanageke kavama nehaya veanene, ago fali-mainaya veafe ‘Anumayati maine.’ huya amakisana nevaiya veanene, havigeage veanene himanaage atama nelea yafayagamoa atama tegelege nehia komufi hanea yate taviya maigahae. Ani veamoya hagoteya fali-mainayanagiya ani atama nelea komufima visayana tole (2) yupa eteya faligahae.”

Anile sevenia (7) yopafi, haenagalafama Anumayamona hai vai-mateno ali haviya humatesia yamaa hanea yopayagama atafa hu-linaya ensole veapiti nago kanomoa nagaifena mage huno hie “Kagaya egena Sipi sipi nafanemoa menima ama alitesia anea kavelino.” huno hie.

Higena Alu Aotage Avamumoa tusiya huno natafa huteno navaleno nagola anayapi hai-mainea agoyafi mo nateteno alu aotage kumala, Yelusalemua, Anumaya Kotitegati ikapinagati ataleno elavia kumala naveli-maine.

Nave-ligena agoana Anumaya Kotina tokiyaage hale yamaamoa ani kumatela aivasa humaine. Hale yamaamoa tusiya huno alua augafa kava huno ala miyamo hai-mainea yafatetima aivasa nehia avamete kava humaine. Ani yafamo agia yasipa taugosama neagona galasimoma nehia kava huno alave alave higena halegena age-mainoe.

Neagogeno ani ala kumatela kegiya anayapi hu-malageno hane. Ani kegiya kovefina tuelufua (12) fiana hane. Ani fiamo amete ametela ensole veala hetiya maite maite humainae. Ani fitatela tuelufua (12) Isaleli nofi veamogami amakia kae-malenae.

Ani kegiyafima hanea fiana yagema vayi nehilega tagufa (3) fiane. Yagema tavi nefalea kaiyaga tagufa (3) fia hane. Aluga aluga haopalega nago haopalega tagufa (3) fia hanegeno nago haopalega tagufa (3) fia hanegeno humaine.

Ani kegiya ala kumatema aye-govema huya kegiyama humalayana hagoteya tuelufua (12) yafana amalaguma aimale yatela maleteya kegiya hu-malenae. Ani yafatela Sipi sipi nafanemona tuelufua (12) aposolo vayamogami amakia kae-malenae.
Nagaienema kea kea hia ensole kanomoa ani kumaene kegiyaene fiaene maleno agege gege huno hapaligahe kanileta yafateti talo humale kayona ali-line.

Ali-lino eaamo me maleno ageana ani ala kumala ayaayaamoene nago kaiyagaamoene anayafima hai-maineaamoenena nagotineno nago avamete tueti tu hataleti (2,200) kilomita higeno mukiamoa nago avamete humaine.
Higeno maleno neagea kayoteti ani kegiyamona maleno ageana amegama hanemamoa veamoyama maleyama neagaya augafa kava huno vani hataleti fotifo (144) mita humaine.

Ani kumate kegiya Anumaya Kotima hu-maleana ala monemo hai-mainea yafana yasipae nehaya yafateti hu-malene. Hu-maleteno ani kumatela kanileta yafateti ki-malegeno aivasa huno alave alave hia yamoa galasimoma hia kava humaine.

Ani ala kumatema amalagu aimale yatema hu-maleana kegiyale malenaya yafana ala miyakefa hai-mainea yafateti malete malete huno humalene. Hagotenoma malegamae-malenea yafamo agia yasipa. Anima tole molia yafana oko yafamo agia sapaiya malene. Anile tagufama (3) molia yafana nagola efeage yafamo agia agetie huno malene. Anile foa (4) molia yafana yosa haisa yafamo agia emelalie huno malene.

Anile faefu (5) molia yafamoa efeene haesaene havigu humainea yafamo agia satonikisie huno malene. Anile sikisima (6) molia yafana haesa yafamo agia konilianie huno malene. Anile seveni (7) molia yafana kanileta yafamo agia kalisolaitie huno malene. Anile eiti (8) molia yafana yosa haisa yafamo agia pelie huno malene. Anile naeni (9) molia yafana nagola kanileta yafamo agia topasie huno malene. Anile teni (10) molia yafana yosa haisa kaliteno kaniletamaa hanea yafamo agia kalisopelesie huno malene. Anile aleveni (11) molia yafana oko yafamo agia haiyasinie huno malene. Anile tuelufuma (12) molia yafana haesa yafamo agia ametisie huno malene.

Ani kumamo kegiyalema hanea fita tuelufua (12) fitmona miyamaamoa hai-mainea seveliyateti talo humale fita hane. Nagoke nagoke fitalela nagoke ala seveliyateti talo humalene. Ani kumatema visaya katela kanileta yafateti talo hu-malenegeno alave alave nehigeno akalo katema he-nemalaya galasimoma hia kava higeya age hagalo huya age-mainae.

Agogeno ani kumatela nagola mono nona omalegena age-mainogi tusia tokiyaa hanea Anumaya Kotiene Sipi sipi nafanene ani kumatela mainaageya mukia veamoya anakai anakima alisaga haya yafenagino mono no kana huana mainaagena age-mainoe.

Agogeno ani ala kumatela yagemoene ikamoene aivasa hisia aliyaania omalegi Anumaya Kotina tokiyaage hale yamaamo ani kumatela tusiya huno aivasa hu-maigeno Sipi sipi nafanemoa ani kumate kanila maine.
Mainaageno ani kumateti hale yamo aivasa hu-mainegeya mukia koteti veamoya vai neyesageya mukia ma mopafi Sauve vayamoya kanale-nale yaamia aliya ani kumate esayaamoya emaigahae.
Mainesageno ani kumatela hanina okigahianagiya ani kegiyamo fita aliya okigahae.
Mukia veamoya konagali yaamiene ala amakiene aliya ani kumatekeya egahae.

Egahayanagi kefo yamaagema nehaya veanene, amakuamo oniyaage hu-mainea veanene, havigeage veanenena ani kumatela ometafa huya omegahae. Omegahagi Sipi sipi nafanemo avopima, maige maige hisaya hamaimuma hanea avopima amakima kae-malenesia anagamoya amakaiamige ani kumatela ehaigahae.

Anile ani ensole kanomoa nagola ala tikefa, hamaimu neamamia tina naveli-maine. Ani limona telelalayamaa omalegeno galasifima age-hagalo nehia kava nehigeno ani limoa Anumaya Kotiene Sipi sipi nafanemogani mainaa sialeti ani limoa elavi-maine.

Elavia timoa aiyayeno ala kumamo kamona amunopi nelavigeno ani timona aluga aluga agegayale hamaimu neamamia yosayaga hane. Ani yosayagamoa nago kafumo aguafina tuelufua (12) kanale ikamaahe ikamaahe ani alagamoa afula neleane. Ani yosamo haisamoa mukia kotega veama kali alisagenofena alino falu hu-matesia yosa haisa hane.
Nagoa Anumaya Kotia hinageno ali haviya humatesia yana omalegahigi Anumaya Kotiene Sipi sipi nafanene nemaia sialatana ani kumatela hanesigeya Anumaya Koti aliya veamoya agia alisaga nehuya maigahae.
Maineya Anumaya Koti aufina neagesageno agaia agia hamanilela kaemategahie.

Ani kumatela nagoene hanina okigahie. Anumaya Koti hale yamoa aivasa humategahianagiya nagoene kanila hanagalisaya yaene yagemoenena aivasa ohugahie. Amaku amamema agigati-mainea veamoya agola kava yagaiya maigahae.

Ani ensole kanomoa mage huno hie “Manima nehavina kea kelamage kea hanegeka kagupi malesana ke hane. Anumaya Kotia amaune veaneahena ‘Naa hutama hamapaiho.’ huno amaku amakesa neamamia kanomoa ensole kanoamona agai aliya veanele hutegeno eaamo mukia yamoa aupaama falote hisia yana amave-lisiafene huno hutegeno umaine.”

Haviho. Yisasia mage huno humaine “Nagaya aupa kanafi egahue.” huno higena nagaya mage hue “Nagoa veamoya Anumaya Kotia haenaga falote hisia yafe mani avopima hu-mainea kemo akave nemalesaya veamoya tusia muse hugahae.”
Nagaya Yonina ani yayaga agetena mani kea ago havimainoe. Mukia ani yana nave-ligena agetena havimainena ensole kanomo agia alisaga hugahe aiyaafi ape humainoe.

Huanagi ani ensole kanomoa mage huno hie “Kagaya naa ohuo. Nagaya kagaiene amaune kafu-kaganayaene mukia mafima Anumaya Koti avopima hanea kemo akave nemalaya veanene aliya amafaluna mainoanagika nagai nagia alisaga ohuganagi nagoke Anumaya Kotina agaiage agigeya alisaga huo huno hie.”
Huteno mage huno hie “Manima Anumaya Koti avopima hanea kemoa aupaa falote hisia yafe kagaya ani kea fala okio.

Ani kanamoa aupaa falote hugahe nehiafe kefo yama nehisaya veala nagoene ani kefo yana maiya hisae. Kumai yama nehisaya veala ani kava maiya hisae. Fatago kavakeyama nehisaya veala ani kavakeya maiya hisae. Alu aotage auava yapima nemaisaya veamoya nagoene ani kava nehuya maisae.” huno humaine.
Nehigeno Yisasia mage huno hie “Haviho nagaya aupaa esuana mukia veamoya hu-mainesaya avamete amamisua anonaamia alina egahue.
Nagaya mukia yamona aepaa maitena kava yagai-mainoanagina mukia aliyana alina avaya-yesua kano mainoe. Uhagotena maitena haenaga-lafana mainoe.

Kasagoya veamoya kefo yaamihema haviya amakuama sesema humalenesaya veamoya musena hugahae. Amakua agoma sese hu-malenayafe hamaimu amamisia yosamo alaga aliya neneya ala kumamo fiatela afaa hai falegahae.

Hai falegahayanagi kefo yamaage veanene, hanageke kava nehaya veanene, kumai heya vaineayaya veanene, vea hamaeya falineamataya veanene, ago fali-mainaya veafe ‘Anumayati maine.’ huya amakisana nevaiya veanene havigehe muse huya akave nemalaya veanene ani kumamona malaga maigahayanagiya Anumayamo ala kumatela haiya omaigahae.

Nagaya Yisasina ensole kanonimona hutogeno tamakaitega eaamo nagaifema havitama tamakupi malenaya veamo-gatamina mani kea hufalote huno tamahapaisie huna hutenoe. Nagainige Teviti nofipiti aginagomona mainena Teviti nafanea mainoe. Nagaya hale yamaaene kanefila, natema hagoteno vayi nehia kanefi mainoe.” huno humaine.

Higeno Alu Aotage Avamuamoene Yisasina amakua amitafa humainaya veanene Yisasife mage hae “Kagaya eno.” huya hageya mani kema havisaya veala Yisasife mage huya hisae “Kagaya eno.” huya hisae. Hisageya tifema amakesia veamoya etama Anumaya Kotima afaa tamamisia timoa maige maige hisaya tamahaimu tamamisia tinagi tamahaisigetama me neho.

Nagaya manima Anumaya Koti kefima aune laga humale kema mani avopima hanea kema havisaya veamogatama mani kene alu kene moli lokaetama ayaaya kea ohiho. Tokiyaage ke tamahanepaugi naama hisayana Anumaya Kotia mani avopima tamahanepaiya havi yama falote hulamatesia yamoa tamakata aisia yanagino tamakaila tamamigahie.

Tamamigahigi nagoa veamoya manima Anumaya Koti avopima hanea aune kema ali talesayana Anumaya Kotia mani avomoma tamahapaiya kanale yana otamamigahianagitama ani veamogatama maige maige hisaya tamahaimu tamamisia yosamo alaga nesaya yana tamaha-falesigetama Anumaya Koti alu aotage kumatela ougahae.
Yisasia mani kema tahapaiya kanomoa mage hie “Tamage nagaya aupaa egahue.” huno humaine. Higena nagaya Yonina mage huna nehue “E, tamage Anumayati Yisasiga eno.” huna nehue.
Anumayatimoa Yisasia kayonema nehia yamaamoa mukia amakuama amitafa nehaya veamo-gatamina tamamisie. Mani kea tamage.
Kenia male hano hie.
Nagaini nagia Yoninae.
